"Anaor kihondko otel nyimu mondo ochand joma dwaro kedo kodu, mi anamiwasiku duto ringu.  28Bende anaor luoro mondo otel nyimu, kendo luoronogo noriemb jo-Hivi gi jo-Kanaan kod jo-Hiti, mondo owenu thuolo.  29Oknariembgi duto e higa achiel, nimar dipo ka piny odong’ nono, molokorethim, kendo ondiegi dinywolre mi thagu.  30To anariembgi matintin nyakachop kusemedoru mang’eny moromo kawo pinyno duto.  31Anayar tong’ pinyu,kochakore e Nam Makwar nyak Nam Maduong’ manie tong’ jo-Filistia, kendokochakore e thim man yo milambo, nyaka aora Yufrate.  Anami ulo jopinyno,mi unuriembgi.  32Kik utim kodgi winjruok kendo kik ulam nyisechegi,33kik uwe gidag e pinyu nimar dipo ka gimiyo uketho e nyiuma mi ulamonyisechegi.  Mano dilokrenu obadho. "Wuok 24Jo-Israel otimo winjruok gi Nyasaye1Noyudo ka Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho ni Musa niya, "Bi ira e got, kaachielgi Harun gi Nadab gi Abihu kod jodong Israel piero abiriyo, to kapokuchopo machiegni, kulreuru mondo ulem.  2In kendi, Musa, ema nichopmachiegni koda.  Jomokogo ok nosud ira, to bende onge ng’ato ang’ata manoidh kodi ku. "3Musa nodhi monyiso ji chike kod buche duto mag Ruoth Nysaye.  Ji dutonodwoke niya, "Wayie timo gik moko duto ma Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho. "4Musa nondiko chike duto mag Ruoth Nyasaye.  To kinyne gokinyi nogerokendo-mar-misango e tiend got, kendo nochungo kite apar gariyo magrapar, maromre gi kar romb dhout Israel apar gariyo.  5Eka nooro yawuowimoko ma jo-Israel monego rwedhi, mi gitimogo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengnimiwang’o pep, kod misengni mag sawo.  6Musa nokawo remo moko, moolo etewni, to remo modong’ nokiro e kendo mar-misango.  7Bang’e nokawo kitabumondikie weche mag singruokgo, mosomo matek mondo ji duto owinji.  Gidutone giwacho niya, "Wayie winjo Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo wanatim dutomosechiko. " 8Bang’ mano Musa nokawo remo, mokiro kuom ji, kowacho niya,"Ma e remo mar singruok mane Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyo utimo kode, kaluworegi weche manie kitabuni. "9Musa gi Harun gi Nadab kod Abihu, kaachiel gi jodong Israel pieroabiriyo nodhi e got, moneno Nyasach Israel.  10Nochung’ ewi gima chalo gilaro molos gi kit ombo marieny mana ka polo.  11To Ruoth Nyasaye ne okohinyo jodong Israelgo.  Ne gineno Ruoth Nyasaye, mi gichiemo kode kendogimetho. Musa e got Sinai12Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Bi ira e got ku, mondo ibed ka. Abiro miyi kite mopamore ma asendikoe buche kod chike mondo ipuonj ji. "13Musa kaachiel gi Joshua jatichne nodhi e god Nyasaye.  14Noyudo Musaosewacho ni jodong Israel niya, "Ritwauru ka, nyaka waduogi.  Harun kodHur eki odong’ kodu.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato man gi wach modwaro loso to mondoodhi irgi. "15Kamano Musa nodhi ewi got, kendo bor polo noimo got.  16Duong’ malermar Ruoth Nyasaye nolor ewi got Sinai, mi bor polo noimo got kuom ndaloauchiel.  To chieng’ mar abiriyo Ruoth Nyasaye noluongo Musa gi e borpolo.  17Duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye ne chalo ni jo-Israel mana kamach maduong’ maliel ewi got.  18Musa nodonjo e bor polono, modhi ewigot, kendo nobet kuno kuom ndalo piero ang’wen odiechieng gotieno. Wuok 25Nyasaye okwayo jo-Israel mondo okelne chiwo(Wuok
.
-
)1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyis jo-Israel mondo okelnachiwo, kendo ichokna chiwo moro amora kuom ji duto moyie golo kuomherogi.  3Gik ma onego ichok e magi: Dhahabu gi fedha kod mula, 4kaachielgi law mambulu kod marathuol kod makwar, kod law katana maber, gi yiediek, 5gi piende rombe molok gi range makwar gi piende monyong’ gi yiendshita, 6gi mor taya kod gik mang’ue ng’ar, 7gi kite mibiro keto e lawdolo miluongo ni efod kod law agoko.  8Bang’ mano gigerna Kama Ler mondoadag kodgi.  9To nyaka gere kaachiel gi gige duto, kiluwo mana kido maabiro nyisi. Sanduk mar Rapar(Wuok
.
-
)
"Los sanduk ma borne oromo mita achiel, to lachne nus mita, kendoborne modhi malo bende nus mita.  11Bawe gi dhahabu maler, oko gi iye,kendo ilosne laini mar dhahabu molwuoro bethene duto.  12Thedhne rategeang’wen mag dhahabu, kendo ketgi e tiendene ang’wen.  Ratege ariyo nobede bathe konchiel, to ariyo e bathe komachielo.  13Los ludhe ariyo giyiend sida, mi ibawgi gi dhahabu, 14kendo irwakgi e ratege manie bathsanduk koni gi koni mondo oting’go sanduk.  15Ludhego nyaka sik eiratege, ma ok ogolgi oko.  16To ketie kite ariyo mag rapar ma abiro miyi.
"Losne raum mar dhahabu ma borne oromo mita achiel, to lachne nusmita, obed kar-ng’wono.  18Kaw dhahabu, ithedhgo kido ariyo machalo gimalaika miluongo ni kerubi, mondo gibed gimoro achiel gi raum, mondoobed kar ng’wono.  19Kerubi achiel nobed e dho raum konchiel, kendoachiel e dhoge komachielo.  20Ginibed ka giyaro buombegi malo mondogigeng’ raum, kendo ginimanyre, ka ging’iyo wi raum.  21Ket raumno e dhosanduk, to iye ketie kite ariyo mag rapar ma abiro miyi.  22Kanyo emanaromie kodi, kendo ka an ewi raum e kind kerubi ariyo manie wi SandugRapar, anamiyi chikena duto, iter ni jo-Israel. Mesa mar makati miketo e nyim Nyasaye pile(Wuok
.
-
)
"Los mesa gi yiend sida, ma borne romo mita achiel, to lachne nusmita, kendo borne modhi malo bende nus mita.  24Bawe gi dhahabu maler,kendo ilosne laini mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto.  25Chue mithe alworama lachne romo tat lwedo achiel, kendo ichue dir mitheno gi dhahabu. 26Ilos ratege ang’wen mag dhahabu, kendo ichomgi e tunge ang’wen magmesa kama tiendene nitie, mondo oting’ego.  27Ratege ma norwakie ludhemiting’ego nobed e mithe.  28Ilos ludhego gi yiend sida, kendo ibawgi gidhahabu.  Gin ema noting’ kodgi mesano.  29Los tewni gi kikombe gi agulnikod agwetni mitiyogo kitimo misengni miolo piny.  Gigo duto nyaka los gidhahabu maler.  30To makati miketo e nyima pile nyaka bed e mesano ndaloduto. Rachung taya mar dhahabu(Wuok
.
-
)
"Ilos rachung taya gi dhahabu maler.  Tiende kod kore to mondo ilos gidhahabu mothedhi, kendo maupe mogorie, kaachiel, gi thiepegi kodobokegi, nyaka los obed gimoro achiel kode.  32Nobed gi bede auchiel moae bathe koni gi koni, adek e bathe konchiel, kendo adek e bathekomachielo.  33Moro ka moro nyaka bed gi maupe adek mogor kaachiel githiepegi kod obokegi, machal gi thiep oyungu.  34E kor taya hie nyakabedie maupe ang’wen man gi thiepe kod oboke machalo gi thiep oyungu. 35Bede ariyo ariyo mag rachungino nyaka bed gi maua achiel e bwogi. 36Maupego gi bedego kod rachungino nobed gimoro achiel mothedh gidhahabu maler.  37To bende ilos teyni abiriyo ni rachungi, kendo iketgimalo mondo giliel ka gimenyo yo ka nyime.  38Rangis teyni kod tepe nyakalos gi dhahabu maler.  39To nyaka ikonyri gi kilo piero abich mag dhahabumaler kuom loso rachungino, kaachiel gi gige duto.  40To nyaka ine niilosogi machal gi kido mane onyisi ewi got. Wuok 26Hema Maler(Wuok
.
-
)
"Los Hema Maler gi pasia apar mag law katana maber.  Nyaka gor kuomgikido mar kerubi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, ma jatweng’o maolony ema ogoro.  2Bor pasia ka pasia nyaka bed mita apar gang’wen, tolachne mita ariyo, kendo giduto nyaka gibed maromre.  3Abich kuomgi noriwkaachiel, kendo abich modong’ bende noriw kamano.  4Nyaka ilos tondemambulu piero abich e riak pasia matung’ kuom pasia abich mokwongo,kendo tonde piero abich moko e riak pasia matung’ kuom pasia abichmodong’.  5Tondego nyaka bed momanyore.  6Bende ilos ramekni piero abichmag dhahabu kendo iriwgo pasia ariyo momanyorego, mondo Hema Maler obedgimoro achiel.
"Los Hema gi pasia apar gachiel mag yie diek, mondo obed hema ma okomaumo Hema Maler.  8Bor pasia ka pasia nyaka bed mita apar gabich, tolachne mita ariyo.  Giduto nyaka gibed maromre.  9Riw pasia abichkaachiel, kendo auchiel modong’ bende iriw kamano.  Bang’e ban pasia marauchiel mondo obed e dho Hema gi malo.  10Los tonde piero abich e riakpasia matung’ kuom pasia abich, kendo tonde piero abich moko e riakpasia matung’ kuom pasia auchiel.  11Bende los ramekni piero abich magmula, kendo irwakgi e tonde mondo iriwgo hema obed gimoro achiel.  12Bathhema modong’ koliero, nyaka geng’ tok Hema Maler.  13Kamano hema maokobiro bedo mabor moloyo pasia maiye gi nus mita koni gi koni, omiyo obiroliero mondo ogeng’ Hema Maler.  14To bende los raum mar piende imbe molokgi range makwar mondo oumgo hema maokono, kendo raum machielo molos gipiende monyong’, mondo obed ewi mokwongono.
"Nyaka ilos ni Hema Maler sirni mag yiende shita.  16Bor mar siro kasiro nyaka bed mita abich, to lachne nus mita.  17Siro ka siro nyaka bedgi tiendene ariyo moriw kaachiel.  Sirni duto mag Hema Maler nyaka losmachal kamano.  18Kiloso sirnigo, to nyaka ilos piero ariyo migerogo sisimar Hema Maler mochomo yo milambo, 19kendo ilos rachungi piero ang’wenmag fedha mirwakoe sirnigo.  Rwak tiende ariyo mag siro mokwongo erachungi ariyo, kendo itim kamano gi sirni duto.  20Sisi mar Hema Malermochomo yo nyandwat bende nyaka ilosne sirni piero ariyo, 21kaachiel girachungi piero ang’wen mag fedha.  Rwak siro ka siro ei rachungi ariyoariyo.  22Bende los sirni auchiel ni tok Hema Maler koma odok yo podhochieng’, 23kaachiel gi ariyo mamoko mibiro keto e konde ariyo man yo katok Hema Maler.  24Sirni mag kondego nyaka riw gi ratego achiel, chakreka tiendegi nyaka malo.  Sirni ariyogo duto nyaka los machal.  25Kamanoginibed sirni aboro kod rachungi apar gauchiel mag fedha.  Siro ka siromondo orwak ei rachunge ariyo ariyo.
"Los rariw apar gabich gi yiend shita.  27Rariw abich obed mag sirnimag bath Hema Maler konchiel, kendo abich mamoko obed mag sirni molosgoka toke, mochomo yo podho chieng’.  28Rariw ka rariw madiere mondo okadhe kor sirni, koa tung’ konchiel nyaka tung’ komachielo.  29Nyaka gibawsirnigo gi dhahabu, kendo iketnigi ratege mag dhahabu mondo omakrariwgo, ma bende nyaka ibaw gi dhahabu.  30Kamano nyaka ilos Hema Maler,kiluwo mana kido mane onyisi ewi got.
"Twang’ pasia mar law katana maber.  Nyaka jatueng’o molony gor kuomekido mag kerubi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar.  32Ng’aw pasiano girang’aw mag dhahabu e sirni ang’wen mag yiend shita, mobaw gi dhahabu,kendo morwak ei rachungi ang’wen mag fedha.  33Kiseliere e rang’awgo, ekaiket Sandug Rapar e toke gi yo ka iye.  Kamano pasiano nopog kind KaMaler kod Kama Ler Moloyo.  34Bang’e ket raum ewi Sandug Rapar ei KamaLer Moloyo.  35Mesa nyaka ket yo nyandwat gi yo ka oko mar pasia, torachung taya iket momanyore gi mesa, yo milambo mar Hema Maler.  36Los nidho Hema pasia mar law katana maber.  Nyaka gorie maradadi gi usi mambulugi maralik kod makwar.  37Los ni pasiano sirni abich gi yiend shita, miibaw gi dhahabu, kendo iketnigi rang’aw mag dhahabu kod rachunge abichmag mula. Wuok 27Kendo-mar-Misango(Wuok
.
-
)
"Los kendo-mar-misango gi yiend shita.  Borne gi lachne mondo obed mitaariyo gi nus.  2Nyaka ilosne konde ang’wen e kondene mondo gibed gimoroachiel kode, kendo ibawe gi mula.  3Bende losne agulni mag golo buru kodmo, kaachiel gi rajow gi tewni gi rachwow kod tep mach.  Giduto nyakailosgi gi mula.  4Losne gimoro mar mula machalo gi sing’enge, kendoikelne ratege achiel achiel mag mula e kondene ang’wen.  5Kete e bwondiri molworo kendo-mar-misango gi yo ka piny, mondo ochop mana e korkendo-mar-misango.  6Los ni kendono ludhe mag shita, kendo ibawgi gimula.  7Norwakgi e ratege man e bath kendo koni gi koni, mondo oting’ego. 8Nyaka ilos kendo-mar-misango gi bao, to iye mondo obed thuolo, ka isanduk.  Lose mana kaka ne onyisi ewi got. Laru mar Hema Maler(Wuok
.
-
)
"Los laru ni Hema Maler.  Koma odok yo milambo nyaka bed gi pasia marlaw katana maber ma borne romo mita piero abich, 10mong’aw e sirni pieroariyo, morwak e rachungi piero ariyo mag mula.  To rang’aw kod rategemiriwogo sirnigo nyaka bed mag fedha.  11Kamano koma odok yo nyandwatbende nyaka bed gi pasia ma borne romo mita piero abich, mong’aw e sirnipiero ariyo, morwak e rachungi piero ariyo mag mula.  Rang’epi kod rategemiriwogo sirni bende nyaka bed mag fedha.  12To lach laru modok yo podhochieng’ nyaka bed gi pasia ma borne romo mita piero ariyo gabich,mong’aw e sirni apar, morwak e rachungi apar.  13To lachne koma omanyo yowuok chieng’, bende borne nyaka rom mita piero ariyo gabich.  14E dirrangach koni gi koni nyaka bedie pasia ma borne romo mita abiriyo ginus.  15Pasia ka pasia nyaka ng’aw e sirni adek, morwak e rachungi adek. 16To e dhoranga laru iketie pasia mar law law katana maber, mogoriemaradadi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar.  Pasiano nong’aw e sirniang’wen morwak e rachungi ang’wen.  17Sirni duto molworo laru nyaka bedgi ratege mag fedha, kod rachungi mag mula.  18Kamano bor laru biro bedomita piero abich, to lachne mita piero ariyo gabich, kendo borne modhimalo mita ariyo gi nus.  Pasiano nyaka los gi law katana maber, kendorachungi duto nyaka bed mag mula.  19Gik moko duto mibiro tiyogo e HemaMaler, kaachiel gi loyene duto, kod mago mag laru, nyaka los gi mula. Tich rito Taya(Tim jo-Lawi
.
-
)
"In iwuon nyaka ichik jo-Israel mondo okelni mor zeituni maliw mondooliel e taya pile.  21Tayano nyaka bed ei Hemb Romo ma Nyasaye romoe gijoge, gi yoka oko mar pasia mogeng’o Sandug Rapar.  Harun gi yawuotenyaka rite pile mondo oliel e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, chakre odhiambo nyakapiny ru.  Chikni omako jo-Israel kod nyikwagi nyaka chieng’. Wuok 28Lep Jodolo(Wuok
.
-
)
"In iwuon nyaka iluong Harun owadu gi yawuote, ma Nadab gi Abihu giEleazar kod Ithamar, kuom jo-Isarael mondo iket obed jodolona.  2Twang’niHarun owadu lep dolo, mondo omedu duong’ gi chia.  3Nyis jotich molony maasemiyo rieko olos ni Harun lewni morwako kokete jadolona.  4Lewni monegogilos e magi: Law agoko gi law dolo miluongo ni efod, gi aroya, gi lawakor mogorie maridadi, kaachiel gi kilemba kod okanda.  Ginibed lewnimaler ma Harun owadu gi yawuote rwako ka tiyona tich dolo.  5Nyaka losgigi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, kod law katana maber.
"Bende gilos law dolo miluongo ni efod gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gimaralik kod makwar, kod law katana maber ma jatueng’o molony oloso.  7Toobed gi misibe ariyo mitueyego gok, gi yo ka nyime kod yoka chien. 8Okanda man kuome nyaka chue machal kode, kendo en bende nyaka lose gidhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, kod law katana maber. 9Kaw kite ariyo mag berul mondo indikie nying yawuot Israel.  10E kidimokwongo ndikie nying’ auchiel, to nying’ auchiel modong’ ndik e kidimar ariyo, kaluwore gi nywolgi.  11Ng’at molony e goro kidi ema nyakandik nying’ yawuot Israel e kite ariyogo, eka ichomgi e otunge magdhahabu.  12Tuegi e misib efod, obed rapar mar yawuot Israel.  Harunnoting’ nyinggi e goke ka rapar e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Los otunge mag dhahabu 14kod thiwni ariyo mag dhahabu maler, molos katol mokadi, kendo ituegi kuom otungego.  15Jatueng’o molony ema nyaka loslaw agoko mar ng’ado bura gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kodmakwar, kod law katana maber, mana kaka olos efod.  16Borne obed lwedoachiel, to lachne bende lwedo achiel, kendo mondo obane diriyo.  17Nyakaichan laini ang’wen mag kite ma nengogi tek.  Laini mokwongo nobediesardius gi topaz kod karbunkel, 18to laini mar ariyo ketie emerald gisafir kod diamond.  19Laini mar adek to ketie jasinth gi agat kodamethust, 20kendo laini mar ang’wen ketie berul gi oniks kod jasper. Kidi ka kidi mondo orwak e otunge achiel achiel molos gi dhahabu. 21Kitego nyaka ndikie nying mag dhoudi apar gariyo, kaka igoro teremigoyogo sei.  Kidi ka kidi mondo ondikie nying’ mag dhoudi apargariyogo.
"Los ni law agoko thiwni mag dhahabu maler, mokadi ka tol.  23Bende losratege ariyo mag dhahabu, kendo iketgi e riak law agoko gi malo koni gikoni.  24Tue tonde ariyo mag dhahabugo e ratege manie riak law agoko konigi koni, 25to dho tondego komachielo tue e otunge ariyo kande.  Kamano ekaka itud law agoko gi misibe miriwogo ka nyim efod gi katoke.  26Losratege ariyo mag dhahabu, kendo iketgi e riak law agoko gi yo ka malo gika iye koni gi koni.  Nyaka gibed momanyore gi efod.  27Bende ilos rategeariyo moko mag dhahabu, mi iketgi yo ka mwalo e dho misibe ariyo mag gokefod kama otwang’gigo e okanda.  28Eka iriw ratege mag law agoko giratege mag efod gi tol mambulu, mondo law agoko obed ewi okanda gi malo,mondo kik ogonyre.  29Kamano ka Harun donjo Kama Ler, nobed koting’onying yawuot Israel e law agoko mar ng’ado bura e kore ka rapar e nyimRuoth Nyasaye kinde duto.
"To koro mogik, nyaka iket ombulu miluongo ni Urim gi Thumim ei lawagoko mar ng’ado bura, mondo gibed e kor Harun kodonjo e nyim RuothNyasaye, ka Harun donjo e nyim Ruoth Nyasye, nobed koting’o gik ng’adobura ni jo-Israel e kore.
"Los aroya mar umo efod gi law mambulu.  32Nyaka obed gi otuch e dierema wich wuokie.  Aluora mar otuchno duto nyaka twang’ gi pien, mondo kikyiech.  33Twang’ gik mong’inore ka machunga molos gi usi mambulu gimaralik kod makwar e riak lawno alwora, kendo iketie gara mag dhahabu ekindgi e kindgi.  34Kamano gik mong’inorego nobed mokikore gi garago elaini achiel alwora mar riake mogik piny.  35Harun nyaka rwak aronyanokotiyo tich dolo, mondo garago owinj ka odonjo Kama Ler e nyim RuothNyasaye, kendo kowuok.  Kamano ok notho.
"Los gima opamore ka san gi dhahabu maler, kendo indikie ni, ‘MOWAL NIRUOTH NYASAYE’.  Wechego nyaka gor kaka igoro tere migoyogo sei.  37Itueyegi tol mambulu, kendo ikete ka nyim kilemba.  38Gima opamoreno nyaka bede wi Harun, kendo kamano e kaka enopwodh ketho moro ma dipo kobetie kuommich maler ma jo-Israel ochiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Omiyo gino nyaka bed ewiye kinde duto, mondo Ruoth Nyasaye oyie chiwogo.
"Itwang’ law akor mar katana maber, kendo ilos kilemba bende gi lawkatana maber, kod okanda mogoye maradadi.  40Los ni yawuot Harun kendhegi okendni kod kilembni, mondo omedgi duong’ gi chia.  41Gigi imi Harunowadu gi yawuote, eka iwirgi gi mo, kendo iwalgi mondo gibed jodolona. 42Ilosnigi sirweche mag law katana machopo e thochgi, mondo oim duggi. 43Harun gi yawuote nyaka rwakgi ka gidonjo e Hemb Romo, kata ka gidhi ekendo-mar-misango mondo giti tich dolo.  Kamano ok ginikethi, kendo okginitho.  Chikni omako Harun gi nyikwaye nyaka chieng’. Wuok 29Keto Harun gi yawuote e tich dolo(Tim jo-Lawi
.
-
)
"Kiwalo Harun gi jowuote mondo obed jodolona, to nyaka itim kama: Kawnyarwath kod imbe ariyo maonge gi songa.  2Bende ikaw makati, kek motedgi mo, kod chapat mowirie mo.  Magi duto nyaka los gi mok ngano mayom, maok oketie thowi.  3Iketgi e odheru, kendo ikelgigo.  Bende ikel nyarwathgi imbe ariyo kande.  4Bang’e ikel Harun gi yawuote e dho Hemb Romo kendoilwokgi.  5Eka ikaw lewni kande, ma gin kandhu gi aroya maumo efod giefod wuon, kod law agoko, irwak ni Harun, kendo ituene efod gi okandane. 6Sidhne kilemba, kendo ituene gima opamore cha, ma en osimbo maler.  7Ekaikaw mor wir, iol e wiye kiwalego.  8Bang’ mano ikel yawuote, miirwaknegi aroche, 9kendo ituenigi okanda e nungogi, bende isidhnigikilemba.  Mano e kaka iniket Harun gi yawuote e tichgi, kendo ginibedjodolo mosiko nyaka chieng’.
"Kel nyarwath e nyi Hemb Romo, kendo Harun gi yawuote oket luetgi ewiye, 11eka iyange e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye e dho Hemb Romo kanyo.  12Kawrembe moko, imien gi lith lweti e tunge kendo-mar-misango.  To remo dutomodong’ iol e tiend kendono.  13Eka ikaw boche duto mogawo jambich, giatel man kuom chuny, kod nyirokene, kaachiel gi boche mogawogi, kendoiwang’gi e kendo-mar-misango.  14To ring nyarwath kod piene, kaachiel giich iwang’ e tok kambi oko, nikech en misango mar golo richo.
"Bang’ mano ikaw achiel kuom imbe kande, kendo Harun gi yawuote oketluetgi e wiye.  16Eka iyange, kendo ikaw rembe, ipuk e korkendo-mar-misango.  17Ipoge lemo lemo, kendo ilwok jambi iye kodtiendene, mi iketgi kaachiel gi ringe moko kod wichne.  18Eka iwang’ imnoduto e kendo-mar-misango.  Mano en misango miwang’o pep ni Ruoth Nyasaye. En tik mang’ue ng’ar moa kuom misango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Kaw im mar ariyo, kendo Harun gi yawuote oket luetgi e wiye.  20Ekaiyange, kendo ikaw rembe moko mondo imien e it Harun makorachwich kod ityawuote ma korachwich kod lith luetegi mathuon makorachwich kod lithtiendegi mathwon bende.  To remo modong’, ipuk e kor kendomar-mar-misango koni gi koni.
"Kaw remo moko manie wi kendo-mar-misango, kod mor wir, mi ikir kuomHarun gii yawuote, kendo kuom lepgi, kamano Harun gi yawuote kaachiel gilepgi nodok maler.  22Kaw bor im, gi sembe kod boche mogawo ich, gi atelman kuom chuny, gi nyirokene, kaachieel gi boche mogawogi, kod emmakorachwich, ni mar en im mirwakogo jodolo.  23Bang’ mano ikaw makatiachiel, gi kek achiel moted gi mo, kod chapat achiel, mogol e odherumoting’o makati ma ok ketie thowi man e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  24Ket magoduto e lwet Harun, kendo e lwet yawuote, kendo iyieggi e nyim RuothNyasaye.  25Eka ikawgi e lwet Harun gi yawuote, kendo iwang’gi ekendo-mar-misango, kaachiel gi misango kmiwang’o pep, mondo gidum tikmang’ue ng’ar moa kuom misango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Bang’e ikaw agoko im mane orwakgo Harun, kendo iyiege e nyim RuothNyasaye.  En ema nobed lembi kuom chiayono.  27Ipuodh agoko im maneorwakgo Harun gi yawuote, kiyiege e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  Em imno mokettenge ni jodolo bende itim kamano.  28Mago nobed lemo ma Harun gi yawuoteyudo kuom jo-Israel, nyaka chieng’.  En lemo moket tenge ni jodolo majo-Israel golo kuom misengni mag sawo.  En mich ma nyaka gichiw ni RuothNyasaye.
"Lep harun mag dolo nyaka dong’ ni yawuote bang’ thone mondo girwakkiwirogi kendo kiketogi e tich dolo.  30Wuod Harun ma noket kare e tich,kendo ma nobed kadonjo e Hemb Romo mondo oti e Kama Ler nyaka rwakgikuom ndalo abiriyo.
"Kaw im morwakgo jodolo, inegi, eka ited ringe kamoro mowal niNyasaye, 32mi Harun gi yawuote nocham ring’ono, kaachiel gi makatimodong’, ka gin e dho Hemb Romo.  33Ginicham gigo mane opwodhgo richogikirwakogi kendo kiwalogi.  To ng’ato ma ok jadolo kik chamgi nimar gingik maler.  34Kapo ni ring’o, kata makati moko odong’ nyaka okinyi, tonyaka wang’gi.  Kik chamgi, nimar gin gik maler.
"Tim ni Harun gi yawuote mana kaka asechiki.  Kamano ketogi e tichnokaw ndalo abiriyo.
"Odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ kuom ndalo abiriyo duto, nyaka itim misangomar golo richo gi nyarwath mondo opwodhgo richo.  Kamano inipwodhkendo-mar-misango, kitimo misango mar golo richo kuome, kendo iniwire gimo kiwalego ni tich Nyasaye.  37Nyaka ipwodh kendo-mar-misango kuom ndaloabiriyo, mondo obed maler moloyo.  Gimoro amora mogere kuome nodok mowalni Ruoth Nyasaye. Misengni mitimo pile(Kwan
.
-
)
"Gik ma inichiw e kendo-mar-misango gin e magi: Odiechieng’kodiechieng’ nyaka itim misango gi nyirombe ariyo ma hikgi achielachiel.  39Ineg nyarombo achiel gokinyi, to machielo ineg godhiambo. 40Kichiwo nyarombo mokwongo, to nyaka ichiw bende mogo mayom moromoondweto, moruw gi mo maliw moromo lita ariyo.  To bende nyaka ichiw divaimoromo lita ariyo, ka misango miolo piny.  41To godhiambo ineg nyarombomachielo, kendo ichiwe kaachiel gi misango mar cham kod misango miolopiny, mana kaka nende ichiwo gokinyi, mondo odum tik mamit.  En misangomiwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  42Misangono nyaka bed kitimo e dho Hemb Romoe nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kuom tienge duto nyaka chieng’.  Kanyo ema an RuothNyasaye nabed karomoe kodu, kendo losoe kodi.  43Kanyo bende ema naromiegi jo-Israel, kendo duong’na maler nomi kanyono bedo maler.  44AnaguedhHemb Romo kod kendo-mar-misango obed maler, bende anawal Harun giyawuote mondo obed jodolona.  45Anadag gi jo-Israel, mi anabed Nyasachgi,46kendo dakna kodgino nomi ging’e ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgimanogologi Misri.  Adier, an Ruoth Nyasaye an Nyasachgi. Wuok 30Kendo-mar-misango miwang’oe obani(Wuok
.
-
)
"Los kendo-mar-misango mar wang’o ubani, gi yiend shita.  2Borne gilachne obed nus mita maromre, to borne modhi malo obed mita achiel. Tungene nyaka bed gimoro achiel kode.  3Bawe duto gi dhahabu maler, kendoichuene ndiga mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto.  4Losne ratege ariyoariyo mag dhahabu, kendo iketgi e bwo ndigano e konde ariyo man koni gikoni, mondo irwakie ludhe miting’ego.  5Nyaka ilos ludhego gi yiendshita, kendo ibawgi gi dhahabu.  6Ket kendono e nyim pasia mogeng’oSandug Rapar, kama nobed karomoe kodu.  7Harun nyaka wang’ ubani mang’ueng’ar e kendono okinyi kokinyi koiko teyni, 8kendo odhiambo kodhiambokomokogi.  Kamano ubani nobed kiwang’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye nyakachieng’.  9Kendono kik wang’ie ubani ma ok owinjore, kata misangomiwang’o pep, kata mar cham, kata mana mano miolo piny.  10Harun nyakamien tunge kendono gi remb chiayo mitimogo misango mar golo richo higaka higa, kopwodhego.  Nyaka tim kamano dichiel e higa kuom tienge dutomondo opuodhego.  Kendono nobed maler moloyo, mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye. "Chiwo ma jo-Israel warogo ngimagi11Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Kikwano jo-Israel, to ng’ato kang’ato nyaka chul Ruoth Nyasaye chiwo mowarogo ngimane, mondo kik giyudmasira e ndalo mikwanogie.  13Ng’ato ka ng’ato mokwan nyaka chul nusshekel mondo obed chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye, (shekel achiel oromo gerapiero ariyo, kopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye. ) 14Nga’to ka ng’atomokwan ma hike oromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo nyaka chul RuothNyasaye chiwono.  15Kuchulo Ruoth Nyasaye chiwo muwarogo ngimau, ng’at majamoko ok nochul mang’eny moloyo, to bende ng’at ma jachan ok nochulmorem.  16Pesa ma jo-Israel chiwo kar ngimagi nyaka itigo e Hemb Romo. Pesa muchiwo kar ngimaugo nomi Ruoth Nyasaye paro jo-Israel. "Karaya mar lwok molos gi mula17Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Los karaya mar lwok gi mula, marachungine bende mar mula.  Kete e kind Hemb Romo gi kendo-mar-misango,mi iolie pi 19mondo harun gi yawuote olwokgo luetegi gi tiendegi.  20Pileka gidonjo e Hemb Romo to nyaka gilwokre gi pigno kamano mondo kikgitho.  Bende ka gidhi e kendo-mar-misango mondo gitiye, kendo giwang’iemisango ni Ruoth Nyasaye, 21to nyaka gilwok luetegi gi tiendegi mondokik githo.  Mano nobed chik mochwere momako harun gi nyikwaye kodtiengegi duto. "Mor wir, kod ubani22 Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho ni Musa niya,
"In to ikaw gik mang’ueng’ar, mabeyo machal kama: Manemane manumu moromo kilo apar gi dalasinimoromo kilo abich, gi ondago bende kilo abich, 24gi kasia kilo apar,(duto nyaka pim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye,) kod mor zeitunimoromo lita abiriyo.  25Gigo ema mondo ilosgo mor wir maler mang’ueng’ar, mana kaka jalos gik mang’ue ng’ar loso.  Mano nobed mor wir maler. 26Morno iwirgo Hemb Romo gi Sandug Rapar, 27kod mesa gi gige, kodrachung taya gi gige, kod kendo-mar-misango miwang’oe ubani, 28gi marmisango miwang’o pep, kaachiel gi gige, kod karaya mar lwok girachungine.  29Kamano nyaka ipwodh gigo mondo obed maler ahinya.  Togimoro amora mogere kuomgi nobed mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  30To bende iwirHarun gi yawuote, kiwalogi mondo gibed jodolona.  31Wach ni jo-Israelkama: ‘Morni nobed mor wir maler kuom tiengeu duto.  32Kik konyruok kodekuom wiro joma ok jodolo, bende kik ulos mo moro machal kode.  Em momowal maler, kendo nyaka obednu kamano.  33Ng’ato ang’ata ma nolos momachal kamano, kata manowir kode ng’at ma ok jadolo nyaka ng’ad kare okokuom jowetene. ’ "34Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Kaw gik ma kiwang’o to ng’ueng’ar, machalo duogo gi sare gi mieny kod ubani maler.  Pimgi maromre,kendo iketie chumbi 35mondo ilosgo ubani mang’ue ng’ar, kaka jalos gikmang’ue ng’ar loso.  Nobed gima ler, kendo mowal ni tich Nyasaye.  36Kawmoko, iswag mayom mondo iket e nyim Sandug Rapar ei Hemb Romo kamanaromie kodu.  Enobednu gima ler ahinya.  37Ubani molos e yo makama kikukonyrugo e yoru uwegi.  Nyaka obednu gima ler ahinya, mowal ni RuothNyasaye.  38Ng’ato ang’ata ma nolos ubani machal kode kamano, mondo otigoe yore owuon, nyaka ng’ad kare oko kuom jowetene. "Wuok 31Ruoth Nyasaye oluongo Bezalel gi Oholiab(Wuok
.
—
.
)1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Ng’eni aseyiero Bezalel wuod Hur,ja Juda.  3Asepong’e gi Roho mara mondo obed gi lony kod nyalo, kaachielgi rieko mar ng’eyo tije duto mag lwedo, kaka: 4goro kido mabeyo magdhahabu gi fedha kod mula, 5kendo ng’ado kite michomo, kaachiel gi payobao, kata tich moro amora mar lwedo.  6To bende aseyiero Oholiab wuodAhisamak, ja Dan, mondo okonye, kendo asemiyo jotich duto molony riekomondo olos gigo duto masechiki.  7Ginilos Hemb Romo, kod Sandug Rapar giraumne kod gik moko duto mag hema, 8kaka mesa gi gige, kod rachung tayamag dhahabu maler gi gige, 9kod kendo-mar-misango miwang’oe ubani, gimar misango miwang’o pep, gi gige, kod karaya mar lwok gi rachungine,10kod lep dolo malich mag Harun jadolo gi mag yawuote, ma girwako kagitiyo tich dolo, 11kod mor wir gi ubani mang’ue ng’ar mar Kama Ler.  Kagiloso gigo duto, to nyaka giti mana kaka asenyisi. "Oket chieng’ Sabato mondo obed ranyisi12Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyis jo-Israel kama, ‘Nyakaurit chieng’ Sabatona, nikech chieng’ yueyono en ranyisi manie kindakodu kaachiel gi nyikwau nyaka chieng’, mondo ung’e ni an e RuothNyasaye mopuodhou.  14Kuom mano nyaka urit Sabato nikech en chieng’ moketmondo obednu maler.  Ka ng’ato ok orite, to nyaka nege.  Ng’ato ang’atamotiyo chieng’no nyaka ng’ad kare oko kuom jowetene.  15Unyalo tiyo tijeukuom ndalo auchiel, to chieng’ mar abiriyo en chieng’ yueyo maler, mowalni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ng’ato ang’ata manoti chieng’ Sabato nyaka negi. 16Jo-Israel nyaka rit chieng’ Sabato kuom tiengegi duto kaka chieng’ magisesingore rito nyaka chieng.  17En ranyisi mochwere manie kinda kodjo-Israel, nimar an Ruoth Nyasaye, nachueyo polo gi piny kuom ndaloauchiel, to chieng’ mar abiriyo naweyo tich, mayueyo. ’ "18Kane Ruoth Nyasaye osetieko wuoyo gi Musa e got Sinai, nomiye kitemopamore ariyo mag rapar.  Gin e kite ariyo mane Nyasaye ondikoe gi lithlwete. Wuok 32Nyaroya molos gi dhahabu(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Kane ji oneno ni Musa osedeko e got, ka pok olor piny, ne gichokorekuom Harun, mi giwachone niya, "Bi ilosnwa nyasaye mondo otelnwa, nikechwakia gima osetimo ng’at ma Musano, mane ogolowa e piny Misri. " 2Harunnodwokogi niya, "Deduru bonje mag dhahabu ma mondu gi yawuotu kod nyiuorwako mondo ukelna. " 3Mi ji duto nogolo bonjegi, motero ni Harun. 4Nokawo bonjego molenyo, eka noolo e gimoro mokuny iye e kido marnyaroya, molosogo nyaroya.  Jo-Israel nowacho niya, "Ma e nyasaye maneogolowa e piny Misri!" 5To kane Harun owinjo gima giwachono, nogerokendo-mar-misango e nyim nyaroyano.  Eka nogoyo milome, kowacho niya,"Kiny wanatim sawo mwamiyogo Ruoth Nyasaye duong’. " 6Kinyne ji nochiewgokinyi mang’ich, motimo lisweche miwang’o pep, kendo ne gikelo liswechemag sawo.  Ne gibet piny mondo gichiem, kendo gimethi, to bang’e ne giamalo mondo gitugi. 7Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Lor piyopiyo, nikech jou maneigolo Misri osetimo marach.  8Piyopiyo nono giseweyo yo mane achikogi nimondo giluw, mi giseloso nyaroch dhahabu mondo gilam.  Gisekulorene,kendo gisetimone liswa, ka giwacho niya, ‘A jo-Israel, ma e nyasaye manogolowa e piny Misri. ’ " 9Ruoth Nyasaye nomedo wacho ni Musa niya,"Aserango jogi, maneno ni gin joma wigi tek.  10Koro weya mondo atiekgigi mirimba mager.  Bang’e anamiyi doko oganda maduong’. "
To Musa nohombo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache, kowachone niya, "A RuothNyasaye, ang’o momiyo iwang’o jogi gi mirimbi? Donge gin jogi mane igoloMisri gi teko maduong’? 12Ang’o momiyo imiyo jo-Misri biro wacho, niya,‘Ruoth Nyasaye nogolo jo-Israel Misri mana ni mondo otimnigi marach,konegogi e gode, kendo otiekgi chuth’? Yie iwe mirimbi mager, kendo ilokparoni, mondo kik ikel masirani kuom jogi.  13Par jotichni ma Ibrahim giIsaka kod Israel, kendo kaka nikuong’orinigi gi nyingi iwuon, kiwachoniya, ‘Anamiu nyikwayo mang’eny ka sulue ma e polo, kendo anamigi pinyniduto kaka nasingora, ni nobed margi nyaka chieng’. ’ " 14Omiyo RuothNyasaye noloko parone, mi koro ne ok okelo ni joge masira mane osewacho. 15Musa nowichore molor oa e got, koting’o kite ariyo mag rapar e lwete. Kitego nondiki koni gi koni.  16Ne gin tich Nyasaye, kendo ndiko mane nikuomgi ne mar Nyasaye. 17Joshua nowinjo ka ji goyo koko, mowacho ni Musa niya, "Awinjo mahu marlweny e kambi. " 18To Musa nodwoke niya, "Mano ok agoro mar joma oloyolweny, bende ok en ywak mar joma olo e lweny, to en mana koko mar jomawer. "19Kane Musa osesudo machiegni gi kambi, noneno nyaroya, kendo noneno jikamiel, mi nokecho malich.  Nowito kitego piny e tiend got mobarore. 20Nokawo nyaroya mane ji oselosono mowang’o.  Norege, molokore buru, ekanokire e pi, momiyo jo-Israel pigno omodho.  21Nopenjo Harun niya, "Ang’oma ne jogi otimoni momiyo imiyo gitimo richo maduong’ kama?" 22Harunnodwoke niya, "Ruoth, kik ikechi.  Ing’eyo ang’eya kaka chuny jogi richo. 23Ne giwachona niya, ‘Losnwa nyasaye mondo otelnwa, nikech wakia gimaosetimo Musani, ma nogolowa e piny Misri. ’ 24Omiyo nawachonogi mondojoma nigi dhahabu oded oko.  Ne gimiya dhahabugo, mabolo e mach, minyaroyano ema owuok. "25Kane Musa oneno ka ji osenjawni, nikech Harun noseweyo ni wasikgithuolo mondo ojargi, 26nochung’ e dhoranga kambi, mogoyo koko niya, "Ekejoma ni kor Ruoth Nyasaye? Biuru ira!" Mi jo-Lawi duto nochokore ire. 27Nowachonigi niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel owacho ni, ng’atoka ng’ato kuomu mondo orwak liganglane, kendo ong’ad e dier kambi koa edhorangach ma koni nyaka dhorangach ma kocha.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato mondooneg owadgi gi osiepne kod ng’at modak bute. " 28Jo-Lawi notimo kaka Musanosechikogi, kendo chieng’no ji alufu adek notho.  29Eka Musa nowachonigikendo niya, "Kawuono usewaloru ni tich Nyasaye chuth, nikech usenegoyawuotu kod oweteu, omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye oseguedhou tinende. "30Kinyne Musa nowacho ni ji niya, "Usetimo richo maduong’.  To koro abiroidho got, mondo adhi ir Ruoth Nyasaye.  Kamoro onyalo yie weyonu richouka akwaye. " 31Kamano Musa nodok ir Ruoth Nyasaye mowachone niya, "Yieiwinj wachna.  Jogi osetimo richo maduong’ ahinya! Giseloso nyasaye mardhahabu mondo gilam.  32To koro yie iwenigi richogi.  Ka ok iyie timokamano, to kara yie iruch nyinga oko e kitabu misendiko. " 33RuothNyasaye nodwoko Musa niya, "Ng’at motimo richo e nyima ema naruch nyingee kitapa.  34Koro dhiyo mondo itel ni ji nyaka kuma nasenyisi.  Malaikananotel nyimi, to kinde biro chopo ma anakumgie kuom richogi. " 35Bang’eRuoth Nyasaye nogoyo jo-Israel gi tuo kuom lamo nyaroya mane Harunoloso. Wuok 33Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko jo-Israel mondo oa e got Sinai1 Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Wuoguru in kaachiel gi jomanigolo Misri, kendo udhi e piny mane asingora ni nami Ibrahim gi Isakakod Jakobo, kawachonigi ni nami nyikwagi pinyno.  2Anaor malaika mondootel nyimu, kendo anariemb jo-Kanaan gi jo-Amor gi jo-Hiti gi jo-Perizigi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus.  3Anateru e piny momeu kendo machiek.  To anawuon ok nadhi kodu, nimar dipo ka atiekou e yo, nikech un ji ma tokgitek. " 4Kane jo-Israel owinjo wach magerno, ne gichako ywak, mi ongeng’at ma norwako bonjene. 5Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Nyis jo-Israel ni gin joma tok gitek, kendo ka da bed ni anyalo wuotho kodu kata kuom sa matin kende, todatieku te.  Koro mondo gilony bonjegi, eka abiro ng’eyo gima anyalo timonigi. " 6Omiyo jo-Israel nogonyo bonjegi e got Horeb kanyo, kendo ne okgichako girwakogi. Hemb Romo ma Nyasaye romoe gi joge7Musa ne thoro golo hema e kambi kendo guro oko mochwalore.  Nochake niHemb Romo, kendo ng’ato ang’ata mane dwaro penjo Nyasaye wach ne dhikanyo.  8Kinde duto kane Musa wuok dhi e hemano, ji duto ne a malo, kendong’ato ka ng’ato chung’ e dho hembe ka rango Musa nyaka donj e hema.  9Tokane Musa osedonjo e hema, bor polo ne lor piny kendo chung’ e dho hemaka Ruoth Nyasaye wuoyo gi Musa.  10Kane ji oseneno ka bor polo ochung’ edho hema kamano, ne gikulore giduto, ng’ato ka ng’ato e dho hembe owuon. 11Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ne wuoyo gi Musa wang’ gi wang’ mana kaka ng’atowuoyo gi wadgi.  Bang’e Musa ne duogo e kambi.  To Joshua wuod Nun, wuowimane kone, ne dong’ mana e hema. Ruoth Nyasaye osingore ni obiro bet kod jo-Israel12Musa nowacho ni Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "En adier ni isenyisa mondo atelni jogi nyaka piny Kanaan, to pok inyisa ng’at ma ibiro orago.  To bendeisewacho ni ing’eya maber, kendo imor koda.  13Ka imor koda kamano, tokoro akwayi mondo ipuonja yoreni mondo ang’eyi, kendo imed bedo mamorkoda.  To bende ng’e malong’o ni jogi gin jogi. " 14Ruoth Nyasaye nodwokeniya, "Abiro dhi kodi an awuon, kendo anamiyi kue. " 15Musa nowachoneniya, "Ka in iwuon ok idhi kodwa, to kik igolwa ka, 16nikech ka ok idhikodwa, to ere kaka ji nyalo ng’eyo ni imor kodwa? To ka idhi kodwa, jogikaachiel gi an nobed joma opogore gi dhoudi duto manie piny. " 17Mi RuothNyasaye nodwoko Musa niya, "Abiro timo mana kaka isekwayo, nikech amorkodi, kendo ang’eyi maber. "18Musa nokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Yie inyisa duong’ni maler. " 19RuothNyasaye nodwoke ni, "Abiro miyo berna duto kadh buti, kendo anahulnyinga ma JEHOVA mana kiwinjo.  Anaher ng’at ma adwaro hero, gi heramosiko, bende anakech jalo ma adwaro kecho. " 20Nomedo wacho ni Musa ni,"To ok inyal neno wang’a, nikech onge dhano ma nyalo neno wang’a, mi podobed mangima. " 21Eka nodhi nyime, kowachone niya, "Nitie kamoro buta ka. Bi ichung’ e wi lwanda, 22to ka duong’na maler kadho, abiro keti e geklwanda, kendo anaumi gi lweta nyaka akadhi.  23Eka nagol lweta, mi ininemana ng’eya.  To wang’a ok nine. "Wuok 34Kite ariyo mamoko(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Pa kite ariyo machal gi mane igoyopiny, mobarore kande, mondo andikie weche mane ni e kite mokwongogo. 2Kiny iikri gokinyi mondo ibi e got Sinai.  Ichung’ kuno, kendo irita. 3Ng’ato kik idh kodi kuno, bende ng’at moro kik bed kamoro amora ewigodno, kata mana jamni kik kwa e alwora ne. " 4Kuom mano Musa nopayo kiteariyo machal gi mokwongo.  Kinyne gokinyi nodhi ewi got Sinai, kaka RuothNyasaye nosechike koting’o kitego.  5Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nolor e bor polo,mochung’ bute kanyo, mi ohulo nyinge ma JEHOVA.
Nokadho e nyim Musa, kowacho gi dwol maduong’ niya, "An JEHOVA.  AnRuoth Nyasaye, an Nyasaye ma jang’wono kendo makecho ji.  Iya ok wang’piyo, kendo anyiso hera mosiko kod adiera.  7Arito singruokna masetimo giji gana gi gana, kendo aweyonigi rochruokgi gi kethogi kod richogi, tokata kamano ok akwan jaketho ka ng’ama ler, to akumo nyithindo ginyikwayo nyaka tieng’ mar adek kod mar ang’wen nikech richo kweregi. "8Musa nokulore piny piyopiyo, molemo.  9Nowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye,kimor koda adier, to koro akwayi mondo idhi kodwa, jogi tokgi tek, tokata kamano, yie iwenwa kethowa gi richowa, kendo ikawwa ka mwanduniiwuon. "Nyasaye ochako otimo singruok gi jo-Israel(Wuok
.
-
; Rapar mar Chik
.
-
;
.
-
)10Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Koro adwaro timo kodu singruok.  Abirotimo honni madongo ka jou neno, ma nyaka nene pok otim e piny ngima,kata e oganda moro.  Ji duto ma un e kindgi biro neno gima an RuothNyasaye anyalo timo, nikech abiro timonu gima lich.  11Kuom mano, rituruchike ma abiro miyou kawuono, eka abiro riembo jo-Amor gi jo-Kanaan gijo-Hiti gi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus mondo owenu thuolo. 12Ritreuru mondo une ni ok utimo winjruok moro gi jo piny mudhiyeno,nono to gilokorenu obadho.  13Nyaka umuk kendegi mag liswa, kendo ukethsirni maggi milamo, mag kite gi mag yien.
"Kik ulam nyasaye moro machielo ni mar an Ruoth Nyasaye, nyinga enNyasaye ma Janyiego, kendo an Nyasaye ma janyiego adier! 15Ritreurumondo kik utim winjruok gi jopinyno nikech ka gilamo nyisechegi, kendogitimonigi liswa, to gibiro lwongou, mi kamoro dipo ka uchamo chiembliswechegi.  16Yawuotu bende dikend nyigi, to mondgigo dilam nyisechegi,mi gimi yawuotu weya, kendo lam nyisechegigo.
"Kik ulos nyiseche mag mula mondo ulam.
"Rituru sawo mar makati ma ok oketie Thowi, kaka asechiki.  Nyakaucham makati ma ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo e ndalo mar Abib,nikech dueno ema ne ua e piny Misri.
"Nyithindo makayo ma chwo duto mag dhano kata mag jamni gin maga. 20To ngima kanyna makayo unyalo waro gi nyarombo, to ka ok udwar ware,to nyaka tur ng’ute.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka war ngima wuode makayo,kendo onge ng’at ma nobi ira gi lwete nono.
"Unuti kuom ndalo auchiel, to chieng’ mar abiriyo nyaka uyue, kataobedo ni en kinde mag pur kata mag keyo.
"Nyaka urit Sap Jumbe, tiende ni sap chiwo mar cham mokwongo nyak.  Tobende nyaka urit Sap Pono Olembe e giko higa.
"Jou machwo duto nyaka bi e nyima didek e higa, an Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel 24nimar kaseriembonu ogendini ma weg pinyno, kendo ayaropinyu, to onge wasigu ma notem kawo pinyu e kinde adek mubiro biroe enyima higa ka higa.
"E kinde mutimoe misango ni chiayo, kik uchiw gimoro moketie thowi,kendo kik uwe ring chiayo motimgo Sap Pasaka dong’ nyaka piny ru makuwang’o te.
"Cham mabeyoe moloyo mukwongo kayo nyaka ukel e Od Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu. "Kitedo nyadiel, to kik uolie cha min. "27Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Ndik wechego, nikech gin emaatimogo singruok kodi kaachiel gi jo-Israel. " 28Omiyo Musa nobet giRuoth Nyasaye kanyo kuom ndalo piero ang’wen, odiechieng’ gotieno, ma okochiemo kata metho, kendo nondiko weche mag singruokno e kitego.  Ne ginChike Apar. Musa olor oa e got Sinai29 Kane Musa lor a e got Sinai, koting’o kite ariyo mag rapar, wang’e nerieny nikech nosewuoyo gi Ruoth Nyasaye, to kata kamano ne ok ong’eyo niwang’e rieny kamano.  30Harun gi jo-Israel duto norango Musa moneno kawang’e rieny, mi ne giluor sudo bute.  31To Musa noluongogi, mi Harun gijodong oganda nodok ire, moloso kodgi.  32Bang’ mano jo-Israel duto nodhiirgi machiegni, kendo Musa nomiyogi chike duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyee got Sinai.  33Kane Musa osetieko wuoyo kodgi, nogeng’o wang’e gi law,34E kinde duto mane Musa donjo e hemb Ruoth Nyasaye mondo olos kode,nogolo lawno e wang’e nyaka owuog oko.  To pile kane owuok mondo onyisjo-Israel weche duto ma nochike ni mondo owachi, 35ne gineno wang’e karieny.  Eka bang’e nogeng’o wang’e kendo, nyaka odonj e hema, mondo owuogi Ruoth Nyasaye. Wuok 35Chike mag Sabato1Musa noluongo jo-Israel duto, mowachonigi niya, "Ruoth Nyasayeosechikou ni mondo uti kama: 2Unyalo tiyon kuom ndalo auchiel, tochieng’ mar abiriyo nyaka bednu chieng’ yueyo maler, nimar en Sabatomowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ng’ato ang’ata motiyo chieng’no nyaka negi.  3Kikumok kata mana mach e miechu chieng’ Sabato. "Chiwo mokel ni Ruoth Nyasaye(Wuok
.
-
)4Musa nowacho ni jo-Israel duto niya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye nosechiko ni mondouchiwne mich.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato moyie timo kamano, mondo okelna chiwo magdhahabu kod mula, 6gi nanga mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, gi law katanamaber, gi yie diek, 7gi piende rombe molok gi range makwar, gi piendemonyong’ gi yiend shita, 8gi mor taya, kod gik mang’ue ng’ar milosogomor wir, gi ubani mang’ue ng’ar, 9gi kite mag oniks kod kite moko miketokuom law dolo miluongo ni efod, kendo kuom law agoko. Gik moket e Hema Maler(Wuok
.
-
)
"Jotich duto molony man kuomu mondo obi, kendo olos gik moko duto maneRuoth Nyasaye ochiko.  11Ginilos Hema Maler, gi hembe maoko, kod raumne,gi ramekni mage, gi bepene, gi raripene, gi rachungine, 12kod Sanduk giludhene miting’egoo, gi raumne, kod pasia mogeng’e, 13gi mesa kodludhene gii gige duto, gi makati miketo e nyim Nyasaye pile, 14kodrachung taya machiwo ler, kod gige duto, gi teyni mage kod mor taya,15gi kendo-mar-misango miwang’oe ubani kaachiel gi ludhene, kod mor wirgii ubani mang’ue ng’ar, gi pasia manie dho hema, 16kodkendo-mar-misango miwang’o pep, kaachiel gi ndiri mare molos gi mula, giludhene kod gige duto, gi karaya, kod rachungine, 17gi pasia mag laru gisirni kod rachungigi gi pasia mar dhoranga laru, 18kod loye mag Hema giloye mag laru kod tondegi, 19kaachiel gi lewni malich ma jodolo tiyogoKama Ler, ma gin lep lemo ma Harun jadolo gi yawuote rwako ka gitiyotich dolo. "Ji okelo Chiwo20Oganda jo-Israel duto nowuok oa ir Musa.  21Ng’ato ka ng’ato ma noyiegolo chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye notimo kamano, mondo olosgo Hemb Romo gi gikmoko duto mitiyogo kanyo, kaachiel gi lep lemo.  22Mon gi chwo nobiro,kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato ma noyie golo chiwo nokelo ngaga gi sitadi gibony gi mula kod gimoro amora maber mar dhahabu.  Ji duto nokelo ni RuothNyasaye chiwo mag dhahabu, 23to bende ng’ato ka ng’ato nokelo gima en gokaka nanga mambulu kata maralik kata makwar, kata law katana maber, katayie diek, kata piende rombe molok gi range makwar.  24Joma ne nyalo chiwomich mag fedha gi mag mula nokelo ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Kendo jii duto maneni gi yiend shita mane inyalo losogo gimoro amora bende nokelo.  25Monduto mane olony e wicho nowiyo usi mambulu gi maralik gi makwar mokelo,kaachiel gi law katana maber.  26Bende mon duto mane olony e tich wiyoyie diek nowicho gi chuny achiel.  27Jodongo nokelo kite mabeyo mag oniksgi kite miketo kuom efod kendo kuom law agoko, 28kaachiel gi gik mang’ueng’ar kod mor taya gi mor wir kod mor ubani mang’ue ng’ar.  29Jo-Israelduto machwo gi mamon mane oyie golo chiwo ni tich duto mane RuothNyasaye osechiko Musa ni mondo otim, nokelo ni Ruoth Nyasaye michgi. Luong mar Bezalel gi Oholiab(Wuok
.
-
)30Musa nowacho ni jo-Israel niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye oseyiero Bezalel wuodUri ma wuod Hur ja Juda.  31Osepong’e gi Rohone, mondo obed gi lony kodnyalo kaachiel gi rieko mar ng’eyo tije duto magh lwedo, 32kaka gorokido mabeyo mag dhahabu gi fedha kod mula, 33kendo ng’ado kite michomo,kaachiel gi payo bao, kata tich moro amora mar lwedo.  34Ruoth Nyasayeosemiyo Bezalel gi Oholiab wuod Ahisamak ma ja Dan, teko, mondo gipuonjji tich lwedo.  35Osemiyogi rieko mathoth mar tiyo tije duto mag lwedo,kaka tich goro kite, gi mar kwoyo nanga, gi mar tweng’o gi usi mambulugi maralik, gi mar loso law katana maber, kod mar chweyo nanga.  Gin jimanyalo timo tich moro amora. Wuok
"Bezalel gi Oholiab kod jotich molony duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyorieko kod ng’eyo mar loso gik moko duto midwaro mondo olosgo Kama Lernyaka los gigo duto mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye osechiko. "Ji okelo chiwo mang’eny2Musa noluongo Bezalel gi Oholiab kod joma olony e tijegi, mane RuothNyasaye osemiyo rieko, kendo mane oyie konyo tich, mi nonyisogi mondogichak tich.  3Nomiyogi chiwo mane jo-Israel okelo mondo olosgo Kama Ler. To jo-Israel nomedo mana kelo chiwo ni Musa okinyi kokinyi, 4nyaka jomane olony e tije mopogore opogore mane loso Kama Ler noweyo tijegigo,5mobiro ir Musa ka giwachone niya, "Ji kelo gik mang’eny moloyo karmidwaro kuom tich mane Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko ni mondo otim. " 6Omiyo Musanogoyo milome e kambi kokwero ji duto niya, "Ng’at ma dichwo kata madhako kik med loso gimoro mitiyogo e Kama Ler. " Kamano ji noweyo kelogik moko.  7Gik mane osekel ne ng’eny mohewoo tieko tich. Loso Hema Maler(Wuok
.
-
)8Jotich molony ema noloso Hema Maler.  Ne gilosone pasia apar mag lawkatana maber, mogoe kido mag kerubi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwarmana kaka jatueng’o molony goro.  9Bor pasia ka pasia ne romo mita apargang’wen, to lachne mita ariyo, kendo giduto ne giromre.  10Abich kuomginoriw kaachiel,, kendo abich modong’ bende noriw kamano.  11Ne gilosotonde piero abich mambulu e riak pasia matung’, kuom pasia abichmokwongo, kendo tonde piero abich moko e riak pasia matung’ kuom pasiaabich modong’.  12Tondego nobedo momanyore.  13Bende ne giloso rameknipiero abich mag dhahabu, mi giriwogo pasia ariyo momanyorego, mondo HemaMaler obed gimoro achiel. 14Ne giloso pasia apar gachiel mag yie diek, mondo obed hema maoko maumoHema Maler.  15Bor pasia ka pasia, ne romo mita apar gabich, to lachnemita abich, to lachne mita ariyo.  Giduto ne giromre.  16Ne giriwo mitaabich kaachiel, kendo auchiel modong’ bende ne giriwo kamano.  17Negiloso tonde piero abich, e riak pasia matung’ kuom pasia abich, kendotonde piero abich moko e riak pasia matung’ kuom pasia auchiel.  18Bendene giloso ramekni piero abich mag mula, mane giriwogo hema mondo obedgimoro achiel.  19Ne giloso raum mar piende imbe molok gi range makwarmondo giumgo hema maoko, kendo raum machielo molos gi piende monyong’mondo obed ewi mokwongono. 20Ne giloso ni Hema Maler sirni gi yiend shita.  21Bor siro ka siro neromo mita abich, to lachne nus mita.  22Siro ka siro ne nigi tiende ariyomoriw kaachiel.  Sirni duto mag Hema Maler nolos machal kamano.  23Negipayo sirni piero ariyo mondo gilosgo sisi mar Hema maler mochomo yomilambo, 24kod rachungi piero ang’wen mag fedha mane girwako e sirnigo. Ne girwako siro mokwongo e rachungi ariyo, kendo ne gitimo kamano esirni duto.  25Sisi mar Hema Maler mochomo yo nyandwat bende ne gilosonesirni piero ariyo, 26kaachiel gi rachungi piero ang’wen mag fedha.  Negirwako siro ka siro ei rachungi ariyo ariyo.  27Bende ne giloso sirniauchiel ni tok Hema Maler koma odok yo podho chieng’, 28kaachiel giariyo mamoko mane giketo e konde ariyo man yo ka tok Hema Maler.  29Negiriwo sirni mag kondego gi ratego achiel, chakre ka tiendgi nyaka malo,kendo sirni ariyogo nolos machalre.  30Kamano ne gin sirni aboro kodrachungi apar gauchiel mag fedha.  Siro ka siro norwak ei rachungi ariyoariyo. 31Ne giloso rariw apar gabich gi yiend shita.  Rariw abich nomako sirnimag bath Hema Maler konchiel, 32kendo abich mamoko nomako sirni e bathekomachielo, to abich modong’ nomako sirni mane olosgo ka toke, mochomoyo podho chieng’.  33Ne giloso rariw ka rariw madiere mondo okadh e korsirni, koa tung’ konchiel nyaka tung’ komachielo.  34Ne gibawo sirnigo gidhahabu, kendo ne giketonigi ratege mag dhahabu mondo omak rariw. Rariwgo bende ne gibawo gi dhahabu. 35Ne gitwang’o pasia mar law katana maber, mi gigoyoe kuome kido magkerubi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, mana kaka jatueng’o molonygoro.  36Ne giloso ni pasiano sirni ang’wen mag yiend shita, mi gibawo gidhahabu, kendo ne gilosone rachungi ang’wen mag fedha. 37Ne gitwang’o ni dho hema pasia mar law katana maber, mi gigoyoemaradadi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar.  38Ne gibawo wi sirnigokod ratege molworogi gi dhahabu, to rachungi abich mirwako e sirnigonolos gi mula. Wuok 37Loso Sanduk mar Nyasaye(Wuok
.
-
)1Bezelel noloso Sanduk gi yiend shita, ma borne oromo mita achiel, toolachne nus mita, kendo borne modhi malo bende nus mita.  2Nobawe gidhahabu maler iye gi oko, kendo nolosone ndiga mar dhahabu molworobethene duto.  3Nothedhone ratege ang’wen mag dhahabu, moketo e tiendeang’wen.  Ratege ariyo nobet e bathe konchiel, to ariyo e bathekomachielo.  4Noloso ludhe ariyo gi yiend shita, mobawo gii dhahabu,5kendo norwakogi e ratege manie bath Sanduk koni gi koni mondo gibed magting’e.  6Bende nolosone raum mar dhahabu maler ma borne oromo mitaachiel to lachne nus mita, obed kar ng’wono.  7Nothedho kerubi ariyo magdhahabu, mondo obed gimoro achiel gi raum.  8Kerubi achiel noketo e dhoraum konchiel, kendo achiel e dhoge komachielo.  9Ne gibedo ka bwombegioyarore kochomo malo mondo ogeng’ raum, kendo ne gimanyore, ka ging’iyoraum. Loso mesa mar makati(Wuok
.
-
)10Bezalel noloso bende mesa gi yiend shita, ma borne oromo mita achiel,to lachne nus mita, kendo borne modhi malo bende nus mita.  11Nobawe gidhahabu maler, kendo nolosone ndiga mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto. 12Nochueyo mithe alwora ma lachne oromo tat lwedo achiel, kendo nochueyodir mitheno gi dhahabu.  13Nothedhone ratege ang’wen mag dhahabu, moketo,e kendo ang’wen mag mesa, kama tiendene nitie, mondo obed mag ting’e. 14Ratege mane orwakie ludhe miting’ego noket e mithe.  15Noloso ludhegogi yiend shita, mobawo gi dhahabu.  16Bende noloso gik mitiyogo e mesa,kaka tewni, gi kikombe gi agulni kod aguetni mitiyogo gitimo misengnimiolo piny.  Gigo duto noloso gi dhahabu maler. Loso rachung taya(Wuok
.
-
)17Noloso rachung taya gi dhahabu maler.  Tiende gi kore noloso gi dhahabumothedhi, kendo maupe ma nogorie, kaachiel gi thiepege kod obokeginobedo gimoro achiel kode.  18Ne en gi bede auchiel moa e bathe koni gikoni, adek e bathe konchiel kendo adek e bathe komachielo.  19Bedenegomoro ka moro ne nigi maupe adek molos gi thiepegi kod obokegi machal githiep oyungu.  20E kor rachung taya hie ne nitie maupe ang’wen man githiepe kod oboke machal gi thiep oyungu.  21Bedene ariyo ariyo ne nigimaua achiel achiel e bwogi.  22Maupego gi bedego kod rachungi nobedogimoro achiel mothedh gi dhahabu maler.  23Bende noloso ni rachunginoteyni abiriyo gi rangis teyni kod tewni.  Mago duto noloso gi dhahabumaler.  24Rachung taya kod gige duto nolos gi dhahabu maler moromo kilopiero abich. Loso kendo miwang’oe ubani(Wuok
.
-
)25Noloso kendo miwang’oe ubani gi yiend shita.  Noromre koni gi koni. Borne ne nus mita, kendo lachne bende nus mita, to borne modhi malo mitaachiel.  Tungene nobedo gimoro achiel kode.  26Nobawe duto te gi dhahabumaler, kendo nochueyo laini mar dhahabu molworo bethene duto.  27Nolosoneratege ariyo ariyo mag dhahabu, moketo e bwo laini e konde ariyo mankoni gi koni, mondo orwakie ludhe miting’ego.  28Ludhego noloso gi yiendshita, mobawo gi dhahabu.  29Noloso bende mo maler mar wir, kod ubanimaler mang’ue ngar. Wuok 38Loso kendo-mar-misango(Wuok
.
-
)1Bezalel noloso kendo-mar-misango miwang’o te gi yiend shita.  Borne gilachne ne mita ariyo gi nus maromre, to borne modhi malo ne mita achielgi nus.  2Noloso tungene e kondene ang’wen mobedo gimoro achiel kode,kende nobawe duto gi mula.  3Noloso gik moko duto mitiyogo ekendo-mar-misango, kaka agulini, gi rajope, gi tewni, gi rachwow, kodtegni mag mach.  Gigo duto noloso gi mula.  4Bende nolosone kendono gimoromar mula machalo gi sing’enge moketo e bwo ndiri molwore.  Gino nochopomana e kore gi yo ka malo.  5Nothedho ratege ang’wen mag mula, moketo ekonde ang’wen mag gima chalo gi sing’engeno, mondo orwakie ludhene. 6Noloso ludhego gi yiend shita, mobawo gi mula.  7Norwakogi e rategemanie bath kendo-mar-misango koni gi koni, mondoo gibed mag ting’e. Nolose gi bepe moweyo iye thuolo ka i sanduk. Loso karaya mar mula(Wuok
.
)
Nolenyo mula mag rangi mane okawo kuom mon mane tiyo e dho Hemb Romo,mi olosogo karaya mar lwok kod rachungine. Loso laru mar Hema Maler(Wuok
.
-
)9Bende noloso laru.  Kuma odok yo milambo noketoe pasia molos gi lawkatana maber ma borne romo mita piero abich.  10Nong’awogi e sirni pieroariyo, morwak e rachungi piero ariyo mag mula.  To rang’aw kod rategemiriwogo sirnigo nolos gi fedha.  11Koma odok yo nyandwat noketoe pasiama borne romo mita piero abich.  Nong’awogi e sirni piero ariyo, morwak erachungi piero ariyo mag mula.  12To koma odok yoo podho chieng’ noketoepasia ma borne romo mita piero ariyo gabich mong’aw e sirni apar kodratege apar.  Rang’aw kod ratege miriwogo sirni nolos gi fedha.  13Bor markoma odok yo wuok chieng’ ne romo mita piero ariyo gabich.  14E dirrangach koni gi koni nolieroe pasia ma borne oromo mita abiriyo gi nus. 15Pasia ka pasia nong’aw e sirni adek, morwak e rachungi adek.  16Pasiamag laru duto notwang’ gi law katana maber.  17Rachungi norwakie sirnimolos gi mula, to rang’aw kod ratege mag sirni nolos gi fedha, kendonobaw wi sirnigo gi fedha.  Ratege mag sirni duto mag laru bende nolos gifedha.  18Pasia mar dhoranga laru nolos gi law katana maber, mogoe kidogi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar.  Borne ne romo mita apar, to bornemodhi malo mita ariyo gi nus maromre gi pasia mar laru.  19Ne ong’awe esirni ang’wen morwak e ang’wen mag mula, to rang’awgi nolos gi fedha,kendo wigi kod rategegi nobaw gi fedha.  20Loye duto mag Hema Maler kodmag laru nolos gi mula. Kar romb chumbe molosgo Hema Maler21Magi e kar romb gik mane Musa oketo e lwet jo-Lawi mane tiyo e bwoIthamar wuod Harun jadolo, mondo olosgo Hema Maler, ma nyinge moro enHemb Rapar.  22Bezalel wuod Uri ma wuod Hur ja-Juda noloso gik moko dutomane Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko Musa.  23Oholiab wuod Ahisamak ma ja Dan ema nekonye.  Oholiab nolony e tich goro kite, gi tweng’o, kod tich goyomaradadi e law katana gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar. 24Kar romb dhahabu duto mane otigo kuom loso Kama Ler ne romo kilo alufuachiel gi mia ariyo kod piero adek, kipimo gi rapim mitiyogo e tichNyasaye.  Dhahabugo duto nochiw ka mich mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  25Karromb fedha mane ji ogolo e kinde mane ikwanogie, ne romo kilo alufuang’wen gi mia abich kod piero aboro, kipimo gi rapim mitiyogo e tichNyasaye.
Fedhago ema ne ochok ka ne ng’ato ka ng’ato mokwan ogolo nus-shekel,nimar kar romb joma ne okwan ma hikgi oromo piero ariyo kata mokadhokanyo ne alufu mia auchiel gadek, kod mia abich gi piero abich. (
,
) Nus shekelno nopim gi rapim mitiyogo tich Nyasaye.  27Kiloalufu ang’wen gi mia abich kod piero abich mag fedhago nolosgo rachungimag Kama Ler kod mag pasia.  Kilo alufu ang’wen gi mia abich kod pieroabichgo ema nolosgo rachungi mia achiel, ka rachung ka rachung kawo kilopiero ang’wen gabich gi nus.  28To kilo piero adek mag fedha mane odong’nolosgo rang’aw kod ratege mag sirni, kendo nobawgoo wi sirni.  29Mulamane ji ochiwo ka mich mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye noromo kilo alufu adek gimia abich.  30Mago Bezalel nolosogo rachungi mag dhoranga Hemb Romo,kendo nolosogo kendo-mar-misango mar mula kod gima chalo gi sing’enge,kaachiel gi gik moko duto mitiyogo e kendono.  31Bende nolosogo rachungiduto mag laru gi mag sirni mane ni e dhoranga laru, kaachiel gi loyeduto mag Hema Maler kod mag laru. Wuok 39Loso lep jodolo(Wuok
.
-
)1Ne gitiyo gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar kuom loso lewni malichmane jodolo rwako ka gitiyo Kama Ler, kendo kuom loso ni Harun lep lemokaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa. 2Ne giloso law dolo miluongo ni efod gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gimaralik kod makwar, kendo gi law katana maber.  3Ne gipamo dhahabu nyakaodoko mareprep, mi ne gilire matindotindo, kendo ne gikade ka tol mondojatweng’o molony oti kode kaachiel gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwarkod law katana maber.  4Ne giloso ni efod misibe ariyo mitweyego e gok giyo ka nyime kod kang’eye.  5To okanda mane ni kuome nolos machal kodekendo en bende nolose gi dhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwarkod law katana maber, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.  6Ne giloso kitemag berul, mi gichomo e otunge mag dhahabu, mondikie nying yawuot Israele yo ma jagoro molony goroe.  7Noketogi e misib efod ka rapar mar dhoutIsrael mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa. 8Ne giloso law agoko e yo ma jatueng’o molony tueng’oe, ka gitiyo gidhahabu kod usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, kod law katana maber manakaka niloso efod.  9Ne gilose maromre, mi gibane diriyo.  Borne ne romolwedo achiel, to lachne bende lwedo achiel.  10Ne gichano kuome lainiang’wen mag kite ma nengogi tek.  Laini mokwongo noketie sardius gi topazkod karbunkal, 11to laini mar ariyo ne mar emarald gi safir kod diamond. 12Laini mar adek noketie jasinth gi aget kod amethust, 13to laini marang’wen ne mar berul gi oniks kod jasper.  Kidi ka kidi norwak e tungemar dhahabu.  14Kitego nondikie nying dhout Israel apar gariyo.  Nogorgika kido, ma moro ka moro ne nigi nying achiel achiel mag dhoudi apargariyogo.  15Ne giloso ni law agoko thiwni mag dhahabu maler, molos katol mokadi.  16Ne giloso otunge ariyo kod ratege ariyo mag dhahabu, ekane giketo ratege ariyogo e riak law agoko gi malo koni gi koni.  17Negitueyo thiwni ariyo mag dhahabu e ratege kande mane ni e riak law agokokoni gi koni.  18To dho tondego komachielo ne gitueyo e otunge ariyo ka. Kamano e kaka ne gitudo law agoko gi misibe miriwogo ka nyim efod gi katoke.  19Ne giloso ratege ariyo mag dhahabu mi giriedo e riak law agokogi yo ka mwalo kod yoka iye, koni gi koni kama omanyore gi efod.  20Bendene giloso ratege ariyo moko mag dhahabu, mi girwako yo ka mwalo e dhomisibe ariyo mag gok efod, but kama otuang’gigo e okanda.  21Ne gitueyoratege mag law agoko e ratege mag efod gi tol mambulu mondo law agokoolier e okanda gi malo, kendo kik ogonyre.  Mano e kaka Ruoth Nyasayenochiko Musa. 22Ne giloso aroya mar umo efod gi law achiel mambulu.  23Notuch diere mawich wuokie, kendo aluora mar kama otuchino notwang’ gi pien, mondo kikyiechi.  24E riak lawno aluorane ne gitwang’o gik mong’inore ka machunga,molos gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, kod law katana maber. 25Bende ne giloso gara mag dhahabu, mi giketo e riak lawu aluora e kindgik mong’inorego.  26Kamano gara nokikore gi gik mong’inore ong’inore elaini achiel e aluora mar riak lawno mogik piny.  Lawno nirwako pilekitiyo tich dolo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa. 27Ne gitwang’o kandhe ni Harun gi yawuote, 28kendo ne gilosonigi kilembagi ogute gi sirweche 29kod okanda.  Gigo duto nolos gi law katana mabermogoe maradadi gi usi mambulu gi maralik kod makwar, eyo ma jagoromolony goyoe.  Mago duto ne gitimo mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa. 30Ne giloso gima opamore ka san gi dhahabu maler mondo obed osimbo malerkendo ne gindiko kuome ni, "MOWAL NI RUOTH NYASAYE" wechego nogor mana eyo ma jagor kidi goroe.  31Ne gitueyone tol mambulu mondo oketego ekilemba gi yo ka malo, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa. Tich loso Hema Maler orumo(Wuok
.
-
)32Tije duto mag Hema Maler, ma en Hemb Romo ma Nyasaye romoe gi jogenorumo.  Jo-Israel notimo gik moko duto mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochikoMusa.  33Ne gikelo ni Musa Hema Maler gi hema ma oko kod gige duto, kakaramekni gi bepe gi rariw gi sirni kod rachungi, 34gi raum molos gipiende imbe molok gi range makwar, kod raum molos gi piende monyong’ kodpasia mogeng’o sanduk, 35gi Sandug Rapar, gi ludhene, gi raum, 36kodmesa gi gige duto gi makati miketo e nyim Nyasaye pile, 37kod rachungtaya molos gi dhahabu maler, kaachiel gi teyni miketo kuome, gi gigeduto, kod mor taya, 38gi kendo mar dhahabu, gi mor wir, gi umani mang’ueng’ar, gi pasia mar dho Hema, 39kod kendo-mar-misango molos gi mula gigire mar mula machalo gi sing’enge, gi ludhene kod gige duto, gi karayakod rachungine 40gi pasia mag laru, gi sirni mage kod rachungine,kaachiel gi pasia man e dhoranga laru, gi tondene kod loyene gi gik mokoduto mitiyogo tich Hema Maler, ma en Hemb Romo.  41Ne gikelo bende lewnimotwang’ malich ma jodolo tiyogo e Kama Ler, tiende ni lep lemo magHarun jadolo kod lep yawuote ma girwako ka gitiyo tich dolo.  42Jo-Israelnosetimo tije duto mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.  43Musa norangogik moko duto mane giseloso, moneno ni giselosogi mana kaka RuothNyasaye nosechiko, omiyo noguedhogi. Wuok 40Chungo Hema Maler kendo walogi1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Chieng’ due achiel mar duemokwongo, nyaka ichung Hema Maler, ma en Hemb Romo.  3Ket Sandug Rapar eiye kendo igeng’ Sanduk gi pasia.  4Kel mesa e iye, kendo ichanie gikmoko duto monego obedie.  Rachung taya bende ikel, mi imok teyni mankuome.  5Ket kendo miwang’oe ubani e nyim Sandug Rapar, kendo igeng’ dhoHema Maler gi pasia.  6To ket kendo-mar-misango e nyim dho Hema Maler, maen Hemb Romo.  7Ket karaya e kind Hemb Romo gi kendo-mar-misango, miiolie pi.  8Bang’e ichielne laru aluora gi pasia, kendo ilier pasia moromondo ogeng’ dhoranga laru.
"Eka ikaw mor wir, iwirgo Hema Maler kod gik moko duto manie iye. Kamano inipuodhe kaachiel gi gige duto mondo obed gima ler ahinya. 10Bang’e iwir kendo-mar-misango, kaachiel gi gige duto mondo obed malerahinya.  11Bende iwir karaya kaachiel gi rachungine mondo iwalego.
"Bang’e ikel Harun gi yawuote e dho Hemb Romo, kendo ilwokgi gi pi. 13Eka irwak harun gi lep dolo, kendo iwire gi mo, kiwale mondo obedjadolona.  14Bang’ mano ikel yawuote machiegni, kendo irwaknigi kandhe. 15Wirgi mana kaka isewiro wuon-gi, mondo gin bende gibed jodolona.  Wirnobiro miyo gibedo jodolona kaachiel gi nyikwagi kuom tiengegi duto nyakachieng’. "16Musa notimo gik moko duto mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.  17Omiyochieng’ due achiel mar due mokwongo e higa mar ariyo ka ne gia Misri,nochungo Hema Maler.  18Nochunge kama: Nochano rachungi, morwakoe bepe,kendo noketo raripene mochungogo sirni.  19Noyaro hema maoko e wi Hemamaler, mi noume gi raumne kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.  20Nokawo kite magrapar moketo e sanduk.  Norwako ludhe e ratege mag sanduk, eka noyieyoraum e wiye.  21Noketo sanduk e Hema Maler, mogeng’e gi pasia.  Kamanonogeng’o Sandug Rapar kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike. 22Noketo mesa e Hemb Romo gi yo ka oko mar pasia, koma ochomo yonyandwat, 23mochanoe makati miketo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye pile mana kakaRuoth Nyasaye nochike.  24Noketo rachung taya e Hemb Romo gi yo milambokoma omanyore gi mesa, 25moketo teyni kuome e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, manakaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.  26Noketo kendo-mar-dhahabu e Hemb Romo gi yoka oko mar pasia, 27mowang’oe ubani mang’ue ng’ar mana kaka RuothNyasaye nochike.  28Nogeng’o dho Hema Maler gi pasia, 29kendo noketokendo-mar-misango e dho Hema Maler, ma en Hemb Romo.  Notimoe misango marmogo mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.  30Noketo karaya mar lwok e kindHemb Romo gi kendo-mar-misango, mooloe pi lwok.  31Musa gi Harun giyawuote ne lwokoe lwetegi gi tiendegi 32ka gidonjo e hemb romo kata kagidhi e kendo-mar-misango mana kaka Nyasaye nochiko Musa.  33Nolieropasia e aluora duto mar laru, mogeng’ogo Hema Maler kaachiel gikendo-mar-misango, kendo noliero pasia moro e dhoranga laru. Bor polo olor ewi Hemb Romo(Kwan
.
-
)Kamano Musa notieko tich duto, 34mi bor polo noimo Hemb Romo, kendoduong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nopong’e.  35Musa ne ok nyal donjo e HembRomo nikech bor polo ne ni kanyo, bende nikech duong’ maler mar RuothNyasaye nopong’e.  36E wuodh jo-Israel duto, ne ginyalo dhi e kambi moromana ka bor polo oa e Hema Maler, 37to kane bor polo ok oa, ne ok gidhinyime gi wuoth, to ne girito nyaka chieng’ moro oa.  38Kamoro amora manejo-Israel dhiye, bor polo mar Ruoth Nyasaye nosiko ewi Hema Malergodiechieng’, to gotieno mach ne liel ei bor polono, kendo jo-Israelduto ne nyalo nene. Tim jo-Lawi 1Misengni miwang’o pep1Ruoth Nyasaye noluongo Musa mowuoyo kode gi e Hemb Romo ma Nyasayeromoe gi joge, kowachone niya: 2Nyis jo-Israel ni ka ng’ato kuomgi chiwochiayo mondo otimna misango, to chiayono nyalo bet dhiang’ kata dielkata rombo. 3Ka ng’ato chiwo dhiang’ mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep, to nyakaobed rwath maonge songa.  Enochiwe e dhoranga Hemb Romo e nyim RuothNyasaye mondo Ruoth Nyasaye oyie kode.  4Nyaka oket lwete ewi chiayono,mi Ruoth Nyasaye noyie gi misangono mondo obed gima opwodhnego richone. 5Eka noneg rwadhno e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo jodolo ma joka Harunnokaw remo, kendo nokir e bethe duto mag kendo-mar-misango manie dhoHemb Romo.  6Bang’ mano noyang’ chiayono, kendo nopoge lemo lemo.  7JokaHarun jadolo nomok mach e kendo-mar-misango, kotimogo misango, miginiketie yien.  8Ginichan lemogo kod wich gi bor e yien moket e majno. 9Jambich gi tielo to nyaka lwok gi pi, eka jadolo nowang’gi kaachiel gilemo duto e kendo-mar-misango, kotimogo misango miwang’o pep, mondo odummamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye. 10Ka ng’ato ochiwo rombo kata diel mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep, tonyaka obed im kata nyuok maonge songa.  11Nyaka onege e nyim RuothNyasaye e bath kendo-mar-misango koma ochomo yo Nyandwat, kendo jodoloma joka Harun nyaka kir remo e bethe duto mag kendo-mar-misango.  12Ekang’atno nopog ring’o lemo lemo, mi jadolo nocham lemogo kaachiel gi wichkod bor kuom yien moketi e mach manie kendo-mar-misango.  13Jambich gitielo to nyaka lwok gi pi, eka jadolo nochiwgi kaachiel gi lemo duto ekendo-mar-misango mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep ma tikne dum mamitni Ruoth Nyasaye. 14Ka ng’ato chiwo winyo mondo otimgo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango miwang’opep, to nyaka ochiw mana akuch odugla kata nyathi akuru.  15Jadolo nokelchiwono e kendo-mar-misango kendo nochod wiye, eka owang’e e kendomar-misango, to rembe nyaka bi mi chuer e kor kendo-mar-misango.  16Nyakaogol oswakone kaachiel gi gik manie iye, mi owit e bathkendo-mar-misango komma ochomo yo wuok chieng’, kama ipukoe buru. 17Nyaka obambe ma ok ogolo buombene oko, eka owang’e ewi yien moket emach manie kendo-mar-misango.  En misango miwang’o pep, madum mamit niRuoth Nyasaye. Tim jo-Lawi 2Misengni mag cham1Ka ng’ato timo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango mar cham, to nyaka ochiw mogomayom, kendo ool mo kuome, mi omedie ubani.  2Eka nokele ni jodolo majoka Harun, kendo jadolo achiel nojuk mogo sanja moruw gi mo, mi nowang’kaachiel gi ubani duto ka rapar e kendo-mar-misango.  Mano en misangomiwang’o mondo tikne odum mang’ue ng’ar ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  3To mogo gi momodong’ kuom chiwono nobed mar Harun gi yawuote.  En gima ler moloyo,nimar ogole kuom misango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye. 4Ka ichiwo gima otedi mondo otimgo misango mar cham, to nyaka obedmakati matindotindo ma ok ketie thowi, molos gi mogo mayom modwal gi mo,kata chapat ma ok ketie thowi, mowir gi mo.  5To ka en gima ochiel etawo, to nyaka obed mar mogo mayom moruw gi mo, to ok oketie thowi. 6Nyaka ging’inge madundedunde, kendo olie mo.  Mano en misango mar cham. 7Ka ichiwo gima otedi e sufuria mondo otimgo misango mar cham, to nyakaobed mar mogo mayom modwal gi mo.  8Kel ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango moloskamano, kendo imiye jadolo, mi jadolo notere e kendo-mar-misango. 9Enopog moko mondo owang’ e kendo-mar-misango ka rapar.  En misangomiwang’o mondo tikne odum mang’ue ng’ar ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  10To gimaodong’ kuom chiwono nobed mar Harun gi yawuote.  En gima ler moloyo,nikech ogole kuom misango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye. 11Misengni duto mag cham muchiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye nyaka bed ma ok oketiethowi.  Bende kutimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango miwang’o, to kik thowi katamor kich bedie.  12To gigo unyalo chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ka misango marchamb agwela, to kik wang’gi e kendo-mar-misango kaka iwang’o misangomadum tik mang’ue ng’ar.  13Misengni duto mag cham mutimo nyaka ketiechumbi majiwo singruok mane utimo gi Nyasaye.  Kamano chumbi nyaka keti emisengni duto mutimo. 14Ka utimo ni Nyasaye misango mar cham gi cham mokwongo nyak, to nyakauchiw cham manyien molodi kendo moyoki.  15Nyaka uolie mo, kendo uketieubani.  Mano en misango mar cham.  16Jadolo nokaw cham moko moruw gi mo,mi nowang’ kaachiel gi ubani duto ka rapar.  En misango miwang’o ni RuothNyasaye. Tim jo-Lawi 3Misengni mag sawo1Ka ng’ato chiwo rwath kata dwasi mondo otimgo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misangomar sawo, to nyaka obed mana dhiang’ ma onge songa.  2Ng’atno nyaka ketlwete ewi dheno, kendo oyang’e e dho Hemb Romo.  Jodolo ma joka Harunnokaw remo, kendo nokir e bethe duto mag kendo-mar-misango.  3Achiel kuomjodologo nyaka kaw boche duto mag jambich, 4gi nyiroke gi boche mogawogiman but oguro, kod jwala mabor man ewi chuny gi nyiroke, mi owang’gi niRuoth Nyasaye ka misango miwang’o pep.  5Joka Harun nowang’gi ekendo-mar-misango ewi misango miwang’o pep man e yien moket e mach mondoobed misango miwang’o madum mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye. 6Ka ng’ato chiwo diel kata rombo mondo otimgo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misangomar sawo, to nyaka obed ma dichwo kata ma dhako maonge songa.  7Ka im emaotimogo misango, to nyaka okele e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, 8mi oket lwete ewiye, kendo oyang’e e nyim Hemb Romo.  Eka joka Harun nokaw remo, kendonokir e bethe duto mag kendo-mar-misango.  9Bang’ mano, ng’atno nyaka pogboche duto kaka sembe mong’ad gie lihumblu, gi boche mag jambich, 10kodnyiroke kaachiel gi boche mogawogi man but oguro kod jwala mabor man ewichuny gi nyiroke, mondo obed misango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  11Jadolonowang’ mago duto e kendo-mar-misango ka chiemo michiwo ni RuothNyasaye. 12Ka chiwo ma otimogo misangono en diel, to nyaka ochiwe e nyim RuothNyasaye, 13mi oket lwete ewi chiayono, kendo oyang’e e nyim Hemb Romo. Eka joka Harun nokaw remo, kendo nokir e bethe duto magkendo-mar-misango.  14Bang’ mano ng’atno nyaka pog boche duto magjambich, 15kod nyiroke, kaachiel gi boche mogawogi man but oguro, kodjwala mabor man ewi chuny gi nyiroke, mondo obed misango miwang’o niRuoth Nyasaye.  16Jadolo nowang’ mago duto e kendo-mar-misango madummamit.  Boche duto gin mag Ruoth Nyasaye.  17Enobed chik mochwere kuomtienge duto, kamoro amora mudakie, ni kik ucham bor kata remo. Tim jo-Lawi 4Misengni mag golo richo1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya: 2Nyis jo-Israel ni magi e chike maomako ng’ato ang’ata ma oboth, mi oketho chikna moro amora mi otimogimoro ma chikgo okwero:3Ka jadolo maduong’ oketho, mi okelo chola kuom jo-Isarel, to nyakaochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye nyarwath maonge songa mondo otimgo misango margolo richo, kopwodhogo ketho ma osetimono.  4Enokel nyarwadhno e dho HembRomo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi noket lwete e wiye, kendo noyang’e kanyo. 5Eka nokaw rembe moko, mi okel ei Hemb Romo.  6Enolut lith lwete eremono, kendo nokir nyadibiriyo e nyim pasia maler e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. 7Bang’ mano, jadolono nomien remo moko e tunge kendo mar misangomiwang’oe ubani e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ei Hemb Romo, to nopuk remo dutomodong’ e tiend kendo-mar-misango miwang’o pep manie dho Hemb Romo.  8Toboche duto mogol kuom nyarwadhno nyaka ket tenge.  Gin boche mag jambich,9kod nyiroke, kaachiel gi bocho mogawogi man e bath oguro, kod jwalamabor man ewi chuny gi nyiroke.  10Mago noket tenge mana kaka iketo bochemogol kuom boche mitimogo misengni mag sawo.  Jadolo nyaka wang’ bochegoe kendo-mar-misango miwang’o pep.  11To pien nyarwadhno gi ringe duto,kaachiel gi wiye kod tiendene gi jambiye kod owuoche, 12ma tiende ninyarwadhno duto, noting’ kendo noter oko mar kambi kama owe ni puko buchkendo-mar-misango, mi nowang’e kanyo te e mach mar yien e pidh buruno. 13Ka oganda Israel duto odoko joketho kakia, mi gitimo gimoro ma chikRuoth Nyasaye okwero, mi wachno ok ong’ere, 14to achien ofwenyore, tonyaka gichiw nyarwath mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, mi gikele enyim Hemb Romo.  15Eka jodong oganda noket lwetgi ewi nyarwadhno e nyimRuoth Nyasaye, kendo noyang’e kanyo.  16Jadolo maduong’ nokaw remo mokokendo nokel ei Hemb Romo.  17Eka nolut lith lwete e remono kendo nokirnyadibiriyo e nyim pasia maler e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  18Bang’ mano nomienremo moko e tunge kendo-mar-misango man e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ei HembRomo, kendo nopuk remo duto modong’ e tiend kendo-mar-misango miwang’opep man e dho hemb romo.  19Eka nokaw boche duto mag nyarwadhno, minowang’gi e kendo-mar-misango.  20Nowang’ nyarwadhno mana kaka iwang’orwath mitimogo misango mar golo richo.  Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodhnigikethogi, mi nowenigi.  21Enogol nyarwadhno oko mar kambi, kendo nowang’emana kaka nowang’ rwath machielo cha.  Mano en misango mar golo richo nioganda. 22Ka jatelo moro oketho chik moro amora mar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachekakia, mi odoko jaketho, 23to bang’e onyise ni oseketho chik, nyakaochiw nywok maonge songa mondo otimgo misango.  24Enoket lwete ewichiayono, kendo noyang’e e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kama iyang’oe chiayomitimogo misango miwang’o pep.  En misango mar golo richo.  25Eka jadolonogwel remb chiayono gi lith lwete, mi nomien e tunge kendo-mar-misangomiwang’o pep.  To remo duto modong’ nyaka puk e tiend kendono.  26Enowang’boche duto e kendo-mar-misango mana kaka iwang’o boche mag misengni magsawo.  Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodh ketho ng’ato mi nowene.
Ka ng’ato ang’ata oketho chik moro amora mar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasache kokia, mi odoko jaketho,, 28to bang’e onyise ni oseketho chik,to nyaka okel diel maonge songa mondo otimgo misango maonge songa mondootimgo mosango mar golo richo, kopwodhogo ketho mosetimono.  29Enoketlwete ewi chiayono, kendo noyang’e e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kama iyang’oejamni mitimogo misengni miwang’o pep.  30Eka jadolo nogwel remo gi lithlwete, mi nomien e tunge kendo-mar-misango miwang’o pep.  To remo dutonyaka puki e tiend kendono.  31Enogol bochene duto mana kaka igolo bochemag jamni mitimogo misengni mag sawo, mi jadolo nowang’gi ekendo-mar-misango mondo odum mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Kamano e kakajadolo nopwodh ketho ng’atno, mi nowene. 32Ka ng’ato ochiwo rombo mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, to nyakaobed rombo ma nyaburi maonge songa.  33Enoket lwete e wiye, kendonoyang’e mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, kama iyang’oe jamnimitimogo misengni miwang’o pep.  34Eka jadolo nogwel remo gi lith lwete,mi nomien e tunge kendo mar misango miwang’o pep.  To remo duto nopuk etiend kendono.  35Enogol boche duto, mana kaka igolo boche mag rombemitimogo misengni mag sawo.  Eka nowang’ bochego ewi misengni miwang’o niRuoth Nyasaye, kopwodhogo ketho ma ng’atno osetimo, mi nowene. Tim jo-Lawi 51Ka omi ng’ato okuong’ore mondo ohul gima oseneno kata mosewinjo, tootamore hulo, en bende odoko jaketho, kendo nyaka ochul. 2Ka ng’ato omulo gimoro makuero, kaka le makuero motho, bed ni en lemaoko kata mopidhi, kata gima mol motho, 3kata ka ogere kuom gimoroamora makuero moa kuom dhano, ka ok ong’eyo, mi ofwenyo achien, toenodok jaketho.  4Kata ka ng’ato omwomore, mokuong’ore ka ok ong’eyo,mondo otim gima rach kata gima ber e wach moro ma ji thoro mwomoreekakuong’ore, mi ofwenyo achien, to enodok jaketho.  5Ka achiel kuombuchegi omako ng’ato, mi ohulo kaka oseketho, 6to nyaka okel ni RuothNyasaye chiayo madhako, ma rombo kata diel, kuom keto mosetimono mondootimgo misango mar golo richo.  Eka jadolo nopwodhnego kethoneno, minowene. 7Ka ng’ato odhier ma ok onyal yudo kata mana chiayo moro matin, toenokel ni Ruoth Nyasaye akuch odugla ariyo, kata nyithi akuru ariyo,kuom richo mosetimono.  Akuru achiel notimgo misango mar golo richo, tomachielo notimgo misango miwang’o pep.  8Enokel ni jadolo winygo, kendonokuong ochiw winyo monego timgo misango mar golo richo, mi jadolo nominwiye, to ok nochod chuth.  9Enokir remb winyono moko e korkendo-mar-misango, to remo modong’ nyaka bi, mi chuer e tiend kendono. En misango mar golo richo.  10Winyo machielo, to notimgo misango miwang’opep, kaka chik dwaro.  Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodhnigo ng’atno kethone,mi nowene. 11Ka ng’ato ok nyal kata mana chiwo akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuruariyo kuom richone, to nyaka ochiw kilo ang’wen mag mogo mayom mondootimgo misango mar golo richo.  To kik oolie mo, kata kik oketie ubani,nikech en misango mar golo richo.  12Enokel ni jadolo mogono, mi jadolonojuk sanja ka rapar, mondo owang’ e kendo-mar-misango ewi misengnimiwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  13Kamano e kaka jadolo nopwodh ni ng’atnoketho mosetimo kuom chikego, mi nowene. Misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi14Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya: 15Ka ng’ato oboth, moketho, mi okochiwo gima onego ochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye, to nyaka okelni Ruoth Nyasayeim maonge songa, mondo otimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi.  Nengoimno nyaka pim gi shekel mar fedha mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye.  En misangomar golo ketho.  16Bende nyaka ochul nengo mar gima ne ok ochiwo ni RuothNyasaye, komedoe achiel kuom abich mar nengono.  Enochiwe ni jadolo, mijadolo nokaw imno, kendo notimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, miketho ng’atno nowene. 17Ka ng’ato oketho, motimo gima Ruoth Nyasaye okwero, be dni ok ong’eyoni osetimo kamano, to pod en mana jaketho.  18Nyaka okel ni jadolo immaonge songa, mondo otimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, kendojadolo nopwodhnego ketho mosetimo kokia, mi nowene.  19En misangomipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, nikech ng’atno oseketho mobedo gi gowi e nyimRuoth Nyasaye. Tim jo-Lawi
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya: 2Ka ng’ato oketho, motimo gimarach e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mokuong’ore gi miriambo, kowuondo wadgi kuomgima nomiye mondo okan, kata kuom gima osingne, kata kuom gima osekwalo,kata kosechamo malang’ 3kata kokwanyo gimoro to oriamboe, 4odokojaketho.  Omiyo nyaka ochul gima osekwalo kata mosechamo malang’, kata manomiye mondo okan, kata mane olal to okwanyo, 5kata gimoro amora maneokuong’oree gi miriambo, to enochul gino pep, chieng’ mochiwoe misangomipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, komedoe achiel kuom abich mar nengo gino. 6Bende enokel ni Ruoth Nyasaye im maonge songa ma nengone opim ni oromotimogo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi.  7Jadolo notimnego misangomipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, mi nowene kuom gimoro amora ma notimo,mosemiyo obedo jagowi. Chike mag misengni mamoko8Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Koro nyis Harun gi yawuote nichik mar misango miwang’o pep ema: Misango miwang’o pep nyaka bed ekendo mar misango otieno duto nyaka okinyi, to bende mach nyaka sik kaliel kanyo.  10Bang’e jadolo norwak law katana maber, kod sirwari mondoogeng’go duge.  Eka nogol buch misango ma mach osewang’o ekendo-mar-misango, mi noket e bath kendono.  11Bang’e nolok lepe moko,eka nogol buru e kambi, mi oter oko kama oyangi.  12Mach nosik ka liel ekendo mar misango ma ok otho.  Okinyi kokinyi, jadolo nyaka ketie yienmondo oliel, eka ochanie misango miwang’o pep, kendo owang’ie boche magmisengni mag sawo.  13Mach nyaka sik ka liel e kendo mar misango ma okotho ngang’. 14To ma e chik mar misango mar cham: Joka Harun nochiwe e nyim RuothNyasaye e dho kendo-mar-misango.  15Achiel kuom jodolo nojuk mogo sanjamoruw gi mo, kaachiel gi ubani duto moketie.  Enowang’ sanja mojukono karapar e kendo-mar-misango mondo odum mang’ue ng’ar ni Ruoth Nyasaye. 16To modong’, Harun gi yawuote nocham, maonge thowi, e laru mar HembRomo, ma en kama oyang ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  17Mogono asemiyo joka Harun kamigapgi kuom misengni motimna kiwang’o gi mach.  En gima ler moloyo manaka misango mar golo richo kendo ka misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi. 18Joka Harun duto machwo nyalo chame ka migapgi kuom misengni mowang’ niRuoth Nyasaye.
