Mano en chik mochwere kuom tiengeu duto.  Gimoro amoramogerer kuom misengnigo nodok mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye. 19Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Mich ma Harun gi yawuote nochiwni Ruoth Nyasaye chieng’ mowire nobed mogo moromo kilo ang’wen, ma enmisango mar cham mapile.  Nus mogono nochiw gokinyi, to nus machielonochiw godhiambo.  21Notede gi mo e tawo, eka inikele ka oseruwore maber,mi inichiwe kong’injore matindotindo mondo otimgo misango mar cham madummamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  22Nyakwar Harun ka nyakwar Harun mobedo jadolomaduong’ ema nochiwe.  Mano en chik mochwere nyaka chieng’.  Nowang’e niRuoth Nyasaye ka misango miwang’o pep.  23Misengni duto mag cham majodolo chiwo nyaka wang’ pep.  Kik chamgi kata matin. "24Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyis Harun gi yawuote ni chikmar misango mar golo richo ema: Chiach misango mar golo richo nyakayang’ kama iyang’oe jamni mitimogo misengni miwang’o pep.  En gima lermoloyo.  26Jadolo motimo misangono ema nochame e laru mar Hemb Romo ma enkama oyang ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  27Gimoro amora mogere kuom misangono nobedmowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ka remb misangono okirore e nanga, to nyakalwoke kama oyang ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  28Agulu motedie ring misango mar goloricho nyaka negi.  To ka aguch mula ema otedee, to nyaka rudhe kendo lawegi pi.  29Ng’ato ang’ata ma dichwo ma jaodgi jadolo nyalo chamomisangono.  En gima ler moloyo.  30Ka remb chiayo motimgo misango mar goloricho okel e Hemb Romo mondo opwodhgo richo e Kama Ler, to misangono oknocham, to nowang’e mana gi mach. Tim jo-Lawi 71Ma e chik mar misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi.  En gima ler moloyo. 2Chiach misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi nyaka yang’ mana kama iyang’oejamni mitimogo misengni miwang’o pep, kendo rembe nyaka kir e bethe dutomag kendo-mar-misango.  3Jadolo nokaw bochene duto, kaka sembe gi bochemoumo jambich, 4kod nyiroke kaachiel gi boche mogawogi man but oguro kodjwala mabor manie wi chuny kod nyiroke.  Enochiwgi 5kowang’ogi ekendo-mar-misangoo mondo obed misango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Enmisango mipwodhogo kethoo mar gowi.  6Ng’ato ka ng’ato ma dichwo majaodgi jodolo nyalo chame, to nyaka chame kama owal ni Ruoth Nyasaye,nikech en gima ler moloyo.  7Nitie chik achiel moriwo misango mar goloricho kod misango pipwodhogo ketho mar gowi.  Misengnigo nodong’ nijadolo motimogi, kopwodhogo richo.  8Jadolo motimo misango miwang’o gichiayo ma ng’ato ochiwo, nodong’ gi pien chiayono.  9Bende misango kamisango mar cham motedi e kendo, kata mochiel e sufuria kata e tawo,nodong’ ni jadolo matime.  10To misengni mamoko duto mag cham, moruw gimo kata ma ok oruw gi mo, joka Harun duto nopogre maromre. 11Chik mar misango mar sawo michiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ema: 12Ka ng’atoochiwe ka gir erokamano, to nyaka omedie makati ma ok oketie thowi,moted gi mo, gi chapat maonge thowi mowirie mo, kod kek matindotindomoted gi mogo mayom, modwal gi mo.  13To bende nyaka medie makati moketiethowi.  14To kek achiel kuom misango ka misango nyaka yiegi e nyim RuothNyasaye.  Enodong’ ni jadolo ma kiro remb misango mar sawo e kendo marmisango.  15Ring misango mar sawo nyaka cham chieng’ mochiwee.  Ok nowekata matin nindi nyaka okinyi. 16To ka ng’ato otimo misango mochopogo kuong’ruok, kata ma otimo atimakuom herone, to jodolo nyaka chame chieng’ mochiweno kod kinyne.  17To karing’o moko odong’ nyaka chieng’ mar adek, to nyaka wang’ie e mach.  18Karing misango mar sawo ocham nyaka chieng’ mar adek, to Nyasaye ok noyiegi ng’at mochiweno, kata misango bende ok nochiw ka gima ber, to enobedgima kwero, kendo ng’at mochame nobed jaketho. 19Ring’o aring’a ma ogere kuom gima ogak ok nocham, to nyaka wang’e gimach. Ng’ato ang’ata ma ok ogak nyalo chamo ring’o, 20to ng’at mogak kochamoring misango mar sawo mochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye, to nong’ad kare oko kuomogandagi.  21Ka ng’ato ogere kuom gimoro mogak, bed ni en dhano kata le,kata gimoro amora makuero, to bang’e ochamo ring misango mar sawo mochiwni Ruoth Nyasaye, to nong’ad kare oko kuom ogandagi. 22Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 23ni mondo onyis jo-Israel kama: Kikucham bor chiayo moro amora.  24Bor chiayo motho athoya kende kata maondiek onego unyalo konyorugo e tich moro, to kik uchame.  25Ng’atoang’ata mochamo bor chiayo ma lembe moko nono osetimgo misango miwang’oni Ruoth Nyasaye, nyaka ng’ad kare oko kuom ogandagi.
Kik ucham remo moro amora, bed ni en mar winyo kata mar le, kamoroamora mudakie.  27Ng’ato ang’ata mochamo remo nong’ad kare oko kuomogandagi. 28Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 29ni mondo onyis jo-Israel kama: "Ng’atoang’ata mobiro mondo otim misango mar sawo nyaka pog lemo moko obedmisango michiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  30En owuon nokel ni Ruoth Nyasayeboche miwang’o gi mach, kod agoko ma iyiego e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. 31Jadolo nowang’ bochego e kendo-mar-misango, to agoko nodong’ ni Harungi yawuote.  32Bende unumi jadolo em ma korachwich mar chiayo ka chiayomotimgo misango mar sawo.  33Jaka Harun machiwo remo kod boche magmisango mar sawo ema nokaw emno.  34Agoko kod em mag chiayo ka chiayo majo-Israel timogo misengni mag sawo, amiyo Harun jadolo kod yawuote mondoobed mich moyiedhi migolo kuom jo-Israel nyaka chieng’.  35Mano en lemomomi Harun gi yawuote kuom misengni miwang’o, chakre chieng’’ maneoketgie jodolo mag Ruoth Nyasaye.  36Chieng’ mane owirgieno, RuothNyasaye nogolo chik ni, jo-Israell nyaka mi jodolo migepego.  Mano enchik momako jo-Israel nyaka chieng’. 37Mago e chike mag misango miwang’o pep, gi mag misango mar cham, gi magmisango mar golo richo, gi mag misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, gi magmisengni mitimo chieng’ miketo jadolo e tich, kod mag misengni mag sawo. 38Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo Musa chikego e got Sinai chieng’ mane ochikoejo-Israel mondo ochiwni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni maggi, ka gin e thimSinai. Tim jo-Lawi 8Oket Harun kod yawuote e tich dolo(Wuok
.
-
)1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Kaw Harun gi yawuote kendo kawlep dolo gi mor wir gi rwath mitimogo misango mar golo richo gi imbeariyo kod odheru moting’o makati ma ok ketie thowi, 3bende ichok ogandajo-Israel duto e dho Hemb Romo. " 4Musa notimo kaka Ruoth Nyasayenochike, mi jo-Israel nochokore e dho Hemb Romo.  5Eka nonyiso ji niya,"Gima adwaro timoni, ema Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko. " 6Nokelo Harun giyawuote, mi olwoko gi pi.  7Bang’ mano norwako ni Harun kandhu, miotweyone okanda e nungone kendo norwakone aroya, gi law efod, kotueyo giokanda mar efod.  8Notueyone law agoko, moketo ombulu miluongo ni Urim giThumim e iye.  9Eka nosidhone kilemba, kendo oketone dhahabu mopamore, maen osimbo maler, e nyim kilemba, kaka ne Ruoth Nyasaye ochike.  10Bang’eMusa nokawo mor wir, mowirogo Hema Maler kod gik moko duto mane ni eiye, kopwodhogi ni tich Nyasaye.  11Bende nokiro mo moko dibiriyo ekendo-mar-misango, mowire kaachiel gi gige duto, kod karaya mar lwok girachungine, kopwodhogi ni tich Nyasaye.  12Noolo mo moko ewi Harun, miowire, kokete e tich dolo.  13Eka nokelo yawuot Harun, morwakonigikendhe, kendo otueyonigi okanda, mi osidhonigi kilemba, kaka RuothNyasaye nochike. 14Bang’ mano Musa nokelo rwath mane idhi timgo misango mar golo richo,mi Harun gi yawuote noketo lwetgi e wiye, eka Musa nonege.  15Nokawo rembrwadhno mi omieno e tunge kendo-mar-misango gi lith lwete, mondoopwodhego.  Eka nopuko remo modong’ e tiend kendo-mar-misango, mi owaloni Ruoth Nyasaye, kotimoe misango mipwodhogo richo.  16Bang’e nokawoboche mag jambich gi jwala mabor man ewi chuny, kod nyiroke gi bochemogawo nyiroke, mi nowang’ogi e kendo-mar-misango.  17To rwadhno duto, matiende gi piene gi ringe kod owuoche nogolo oko mar kambi, mowang’o pep,kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike. 18Eka Musa nokelo im mane ibi timgo misango miwang’o pep.  Harun giyawuote noketo lwetgi ewi imno, eka Musa nonege.  19Nokawo remo mokiro ebethe duto mag kendo-mar-misango.  20Ne opogo imno lemo lemo, mowang’owiye gi lembe duto kod bochene.  21Eka nolwoko jambich kod tielo e pi,mowang’ogi e kendo-mar-misango.  Mano ne misango miwang’o pep mondo odummamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa. 22Bang’ mano Musa nokelo im machielo mar keto jadolo e tich.  Harun giyawuote noketo lwetgi e wiye, eka Musa nonege.  23Nokawo remo momieno eit Harun ma korachwich, kendo e lith lwete mathwon ma korachwich, kendoe lith tiende mathwon ma korachwich.  24Eka nokelo yawuot Harun, momienoremo e itgi ma korachwich gi lith lwetgi mathwon ma korachwich, kod lithtiendgi mathwon ma korachwich.  Bang’e nokiro remo modong’ e bethe dutomag kendo-mar-misango.  25Eka nokawo boche duto, kaka sembe gi bochemogawo jambich gi jwala mabor man ewi chuny, kod nyiroke gi boche mogawonyiroke, kaachiel gi em ma korachwich.  26Eka nodhi e odheru moting’omakati ma ok ketie thowi mane ni e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mokawoe makatiachiel ma ok ketie thowi gi kek achiel moted gi mo, kod chapat achiel,moketogi e wi boche gi em ma korachwich.  27Gigo duo noketo e lwet Harungi yawuote mondo ochiw ka mich moyiedhi.  28Bang’e nochako okawogi elwetgi, mowang’ogi kaachiel gi misango miwang’o pep e kendo-mar-misango. Mano ne misango mar keto jodolo e tich, miwang’o gi mach mondo odummamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye. 29Musa nokawo agoko mochiwo ka mich moyiedhi.  Mano ne e lembe kuom immar keto jodolo e tich, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.  30Nokawo mor wirmoko gi remo moko mane ni ewi kendo mar misango, mokiro kuom Harun gilepe mag dolo, kendo kuom yawuote gi lepgi mag dolo. 31Musa nowachoni Harun gi yawuote niya, "Teduru ring imno e dho HembRomo, kendo uchame kuno kaachiel gi makati manie odheru moting’o gikmiketogo jodolo e tich, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochika niya, ‘Harun giyawuote nyaka cham ring’ono. ’ 32To ring’o kod makati modong’, nyakauwang’ pep gi mach.  33Kuom ndalo abiriyo kik ua e dho Hemb Romo, nyakandalo mar ketou e tich dolo rum, nimar nyasi mar ketou e tich dolo kawondalo abiriyo.  34Kaka wasepwodhou kawuononi e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochikoni mondo otim.  35Omiyo koro beduru e dho Hemb Romo odiechieng’ gotienokuom ndalo abiriyo, kutimo gima Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko, mondo kik utho. Mano e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochika. "36Kamano Harun gi yawuote notimo gik moko duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyoMusa ochikogi. Tim jo-Lawi 9Harun otimo misengni1Chieng’ mar aboro Musa noluongo Harun gi yawuote kod jodong Israel. 2Nowacho ni Harun niya, "Kaw nyarwath mondo otimgo misango mar goloricho, kod im otimgo misango miwang’o pep, mondo ikelgi e nyim RuothNyasaye.  Jamnigo nyaka bed maonge songa.  3Bang’e chik jo-Israel mondookaw nywok otimgo misango mar golo richo, kendo gikaw nyaroya ginyarombo ma hikgi achiel achiel, maonge songa, mondo otimgo misangomiwang’o pep, 4kendo gikaw rwath gi im mondo otimgo misengni mag sawo enyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kaachiel gi misango mar cham moruw gi mo, nimarRuoth Nyasaye biro fwenyorenu tinende. "5Ne gikelo gik mane Musa ochikogigo duto e nyim Hemb Romo, kendo ogandaduto nosudo, mochung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  6Eka Musa nowacho niya, "Mae gima Ruoth Nyasaye osechikou mondo utim mondo duong’ne malerofwenyrenu. " 7Nowacho ni Harun ni, "Sud but kendo-mar-misango, mondoitim misango mar golo richo, kod misango miwang’o pep, mondo ipwodhrigo,kendo ipwodhgo joodi.  Bang’e itim misango gi jamni ma oganda ochiwo,kipwodhogo oganda, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko. "8Omiyo Harun nosudo but kendo-mar-misango, mi onyang’o nyarwath mibitimgo misango mar golo richone owuon.  9Yawuote nokelone remo, mi olutoelith lwete, kendo omienogo tunge mag kendo-mar-misango.  To remo modong’nopuko e tiend kendo.  10Nokawo boche gi nyiroke kod jwala mabor man ewichuny mag chiayo mane otimgo misango mar goolo richo, mowang’o ekendo—mar-misango kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.  11To ring’o gi piennotero oko mar kambi, mowang’o pep. 12Bang’ mano Harun noyang’o chiayo mane ibi timgo misango miwang’o pep,kendo yawuote nogamone remo, mokiro e bethe duto mag kendo-mar-misango. 13Eka ne gigamone lemo mag chiayono, kaachiel gi wich, mi ne owang’ogi ekendo-mar-misango.  14Nolwoko jambich kod tielo, mi nowang’ogi ekendo-mar-misango, kaachiel gi misango miwang’o pep. 15Eka nokelo gik mane ji ochiwo, mokawo nywok mane ibi timgo misango margolo richo ni oganda.  Noyang’e kendo nopwodhogo richogi kaka ne opwodhorichone owuon.  16Bang’ mano nokelo chiayo mane ibi timgo misangomiwang’o pep, mi notiyo kode kaka chik dwaro.  17Eka nokelo mogo mane ibitimgo misango mar cham, kendo nojuko sanja mowang’o e kendo-mar-misangokaachiel gi misango mar okinyi miwang’o pep.
Bang’e noyang’o rwath kod im mane ibi timgo misango mar sawo nioganda, mi yawuote nogamone remo mokiro e bethe duto magkendo-mar-misango.  19Ne gikawo boche mag rwath, gi sembe mar im gi bochemogawo jambich kod nyiroke gi boche mogawo nyiroke, kaachiel gi jwalamabor man ewi chuny, 20mi giketogi ewi agoko mag jamnigo, eka negiwang’ogi e kendo-mar-misango.  21Harun nokawo agoko gi em makorachwich, mi ochiwo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi, kaka Musanochiko.
Bang’e Harun noting’o lwete malo kochomo oganda, moguedhogi.  Ekanolor oa kama notimoe misengni mag golo richo, gi misengni miwang’o pep,kod mag sawo.  23Musa gi Harun nodonjo e Hemb Romo, to kane giwuok oko negiguedho ji, mi duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nofwenyore ni ji duto. 24Mach nomwuoch e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mowang’o misango miwang’o pep,kaachiel gi boche mane nie kendo-mar-misango.  Kane ji duto oneno kamano,ne gikok, mi gipodho piny auma. Tim jo-Lawi 10Richo mag Nadab kod Abihu1Nadab gi Abihu, ma yawuot Harun, nokawo tepgi mag mach, mi giketoemach, eka ne gioloe ubani.  Ne gidonjo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi giyiegoemach ma ok ni kare, mane Ruoth Nyasaye ok ochiko mondo ochiwne.  2Mi machnomwoch e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, motiekogi pep.  Kamano ne githo kanyo enyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  3Bang’ mano Musa nowacho ni Harun niya, "Ma e gimaNyasaye nowuoyoe niya, ‘Joma sudo buta nyaka ng’e ni an Ng’ama Ler,kendo nyaka gimiya duong’ e nyim ji duto. ’ " To Harun noling’ aling’athi, ka dhoge omoko. 4Musa nooro wach, mi oluongne Mishael gi Elzafan ma yawuot Uziel, maowadgi wuon Harun kod yawuote ma Eleazar gi Ithamar niya, "Biuru uting’ringre oweteu ugol oko mondo oa Kama Ler. " 5Omiyo ne gibiro migiting’ogi gi lepgi, kendo gigologi oko mar kambi kaka Musa nosechikogi. Chike moko momako jodolo6Bang’e Musa nowacho ni Harun kod yawuote ma Eleazar gi Ithamar niya,"Kik uwe wiu yugno, kendo kik uyiech lepu, manyiso ni uywak, nimar dipoka utho, mi Ruoth Nyasaye okecho gi oganda duto.  Joweteu ma jo-Israelnyalo ywago joma ne Ruoth Nyasaye otieko gi mach.  7To un kik ua e dhoHemb Romo, nono to utho, nimar osewiru gi mor wir mar Ruoth Nyasaye. " Mine gitimo kaka Musa nowacho. 8Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Harun niya,
"In kod yawuoti kik umadh kong’okata gimoro mamero ji, ka udhi e Hemb Romo, nono to utho.  Mano en chikmomako nyikwau nyaka chieng’.  10Nyaka umak chikno, kupogo gik mowal niRuoth Nyasaye, kod gik moko nono, kendo kupogo gik mokwer kod gik ma okokwer, 11kendo kupuonjo jo-Israel chike mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyogi gidho Musa. "Pok jodolo12 Musa nowacho ni Harun gi yawuote modong’ ma Eleazar gi Ithamar niya,"Kawuru mogo modong’ kuom misango mar cham miwang’o gi mach ni RuothNyasaye mondo ucham maonge thowi but kendo-mar-misango, nikech en gimaler moloyo.  13Mano emomiyo nyaka uchame Kama Ler, nimar en poknikaachiel gi yawuoti.  Pok onogo ogol kuom misengni miwang’o ni RuothNyasaye nikech kamano e kaka nochika.  14Un gi yawuotu unucham agoko giem mar mich moyiedhi michiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye, to nyaka uchamgi kamoroamora mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye, nimar osemiugi kuom misengni mag sawo majo-Israel timo.  15Em kod agoko nyaka kel kaachiel gi boche mag misengnimiwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye, mondo obed mich moyiedhi michiwo ni RuothNyasaye.  To bang’e em gi agoko nodong’ni gi nyithindi kaka poku mosikonyaka chieng’, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko kamano. "16Musa nopenjo wach diel mane otimgo misango mar golo richo, mi neonyise ni osewang’e.  Omiyo mirima nomake gi Eleazar kod Ithamar mayawuot Harun mane odong’.  Nopenjogi niya,
"Marang’o ne ok uchamomisango mar golo richo Kama Ler, to en misango maler moloyo? Ne omiugomondo ugolgo richo mar oganda jo-Israel kupwodhogi kuom richogi e nyimRuoth Nyasaye.  18Ne ok ukelo rembe ei Kama Ler, omiyo ne onego uchame eiKama Ler kaka nochika. " To Harun nodwoko Musa niya,
"Kawuono yawuotaosetimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango mar golo richogi giwegi kod misangomiwang’o pep, to kata kamano neye gima osetimorena! To koro ka da achammisango mar golo richo kawuono, bende datimo maber e nyim RuothNyasaye?" 20Kane Musa owinjo kamano, noneno ni Harun ni kare. Tim jo-Lawi 11Le ma jo-Israel nyalo chamo gi mago makuergi(Rapar mar Chik
.

)1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun 2ni mondo onyis jo-Israel kama:3Unyalo chamo kit le moro amora, kata kit chiayo moro amora ma ombong’neopogore ariyo kendo nyamo kambula.  4To kik ucham mago ma ombong’giopogore ariyo to ok nyam kambula, kata mago manyamo kambula to ombong’giok opogore ariyo.  Nyaka ukuer ngamia, 5gi terere, 6kod apuoyo, nikechkata ginyamo kambula kamano, to ombong’gi ok opogore ariyo.  7Mbidhibende nyaka ukuer, nikech kata ombong’ne opogore ariyo kamano to okonyam kambula.  8Kik ucham lego, kata mana mulogi ka gisetho kik umulgi. Unukwan-gi ka gik makuero.  9To kuom gik modak e thim unyalo chamo magoduto man gi thuokgi kod kagahla, bed ni gidak e pi chumbi, kata e pimaonge chumbi.  10To nyaka ukuer mago duto maonge gi thuokgi katakagahla, kata ka gin gik matindo manywolore, kata ka gin gik madongo. 11Ginibednu gik makuero.  Ok omuchamgi, kendo kata mana mago mothonobednu gik makuero.  12Gimoro amora modak e pi maonge thuoke katakagahla nobednu gik makuero. 13Winy ma nyaka kuer e magi: Ongo gi koga gi kwasi 14gi otenga kod kitokunekune duto, 15gi kit agak duto 16gi udo gi nyatawo gi okok kod kitolith duto, 17gi tula matin gi osou gi tula maduong’ 18gi tula ma itedongo gi mbusi gi achuth 19gi nyamnaha gi kit ng’ang’a duto gi cherwakot oliktik. 20Gik mahuyo kanyakla duto, kendo ma wuotho gi tiende ang’wen, nobednugik makuero, 21mak mana mago ma tiendegi ochomore e ogwendegi mondogichikrego.  22Kuom gik makamago unyalo chamo kit bonyo madongo duto, gigit osialo duto, gi kit onjiri duto, kod kit dede duto.  23To gik mokoduto mahuyo kanyakla, kendo man gi tiende ang’wen, nobednu gik makuero. 24Ka ng’ato omulo gik makamago to obedo mogak, kendo gimoro amora mogerekuomgi ka gisetho nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.  25Ng’at moting’ogi kagisetho nyaka lwok lepe, to nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo. 26Unukuer le duto ma ombong’gi ok opogore ariyo, kendo ma ok nyamkambula, kendo ng’ato ang’ata momulogi nobed mogak.  27Bende unukuer leduto man gi tiende ang’wen, ma wuotho ka nyono piny gi i tiendegi kakapaka kata guok.  Ng’at momulogi ka gisetho nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo. 28Ng’at moting’ogi ka gisetho nyaka lwok lepe, to nosik kogak nyakaodhiambo.  Le makamago nyaka ukuer. 29Gik mamol ma nyaka ukuer e magi: Oyieyo gi gudhugudhu kod kit ng’echduto, 30gi ogue gi kalagwena gi olele gi obongo kod ong’ongruok. 31Unukuergi, kendo ng’at momulogi ka gisetho nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo. 32Ka achiel kuomgi otho, molwar kuom gimoro, to gino nobed mogak, bed nien gima olos gi yien, kata en law, kata pien kata ogunia, kata gimoroamora mikonyruokgo pile.  Nyaka nyume e pi, to nosik kogak nyakaodhiambo.  Bang’e nobed maler.  33Ka achiel kuom gigo olwar e agulu, togik manie agulugo duto nobed mogak, kendo aguluno nyaka negi.  34Chiemomoro amora moolie pi moa e aguluno nobed mogak, kendo gimoro amoramimadho manie aguluno bende nobed mogak.  35Ka achiel kuom gigo otho miolwar kuom gimoro amora, to gigo nobed mogak.  Ka olwar kuom kendo, tokendono nyaka kethi, nimar odoko mogak, kendo nyaka okwane kamano. 36Kata obedo ni gimoro amora mogere kuom gima othono bedo mogak kamano,to soko kata dago ma pi gudore nosik ka ler, kata bed ni gima kamanoolwarie.  37Kapo ni achiel kuom gigo otho, molwar kuom kodhi mipidho, tokodhigo nosik ka ler, 38to ka kodhigo osebudi e pi, to unukwane ka gimaogak. 39Ka chiayo moro michmo otho, to ng’ato ang’ata momule nobed mogak nyakaodhiambo.  40Ng’at mochame nyaka lwok lepe, to nosik kogak nyakaodhiambo.  Kata ng’at moting’o chiayono bende nyaka lwok lepe, kendonosik kogak nyaka odhiambo. 41Gik mamol duto gin gik makuero, omiyo kik chamgi: 42Gin gik ma lak gibund igi, kata ma wuotho gi tiende ang’wen, kata man gi tiende mathoth. Ok nuchamgi, nikech gin gik makuero mamiyo ji bedo mogak.  43Kik uchidrugi gimoro amora ma lak e lowo.  Kik uduwru kodgi, nono to ubedo jomaogak.  44An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, omiyo nyaka opuodhru kendo ubedjoma ler, nikech an aler.  Kik uchidru gi gimoro mamol kata malak e lowo. 45An e Ruoth Nyasaye mane ogolou e piny Misri mondo ubed Nyasachu.  Omiyonyaka obed maler nikech aler. 46Mago e chike mag le gi winy kod gik moko duto modak e pi, kaachiel gigik moko duto malak e lowo.  47Chikego oket mondo opog gik makuero kodgik ma ok kuero, kendo opog gik mangima michamo kod mago ma ok cham. Tim jo-Lawi 12Puodhruok mar mon bang’ nywol1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 2ni mondo onyis jo-Israel kama: Ka dhakoomako ich mi onywolo nyathi ma wuowi, to enobed mogak kuom ndaloabiriyo, mana kaka obedo mogak ka en e due.  3Chieng’ mar aboro to nyakater nyathi nyangu.  4Bang’ mano dhakono nyaka rit kuom ndalo piero adekgadek mondo rembe opuodhre.  Kik omul gimoro mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye, katakik odonj Kama Ler nyaka ndalone mag puodhruok rum.  5To ka onywolonyathi manyako, to nobed mogak kuom ndalo apar gang’wen, mano kaka obedomogak ka en e due.  Bang’ mano nyaka orit kuom ndalo piero auchielgauchiel mondo rembe opuodhre.  6Ka kindene mar puodhruok kuom nyathimawuowi kata manyako oserumo, to enokel nyaim mondo otimgo misangomiwang’o pep, kaachiel gi nyathi akuru kata akuch odugla mondo otimgomisango mar golo richo, mi omi jadolo e dho Hemb Romo.  7Jadolo nochiwe enyim Ruoth Nyasaye mondo opuodhgo dhakono, mi dhakono nodok maler kuomrembe mosechuer.  Mano e chik momako dhako monywolo nyathi mawuowi katamanyako.  8Ka dhakono odhier ma ok nyal yudo nyaim, to nokel akuch oduglaariyo, kata nyithi akuru ariyo.  Achiel kuomgi notimgo misango miwang’opep, to machielo notimgo misango mar golo richo.  Jadolo notimmisengnigo, ka opwodhogo dhakono, mi dhakono nodok maler. Tim jo-Lawi 13Chike mag tuo dhoho1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa kod Harun niya,
"Ka dend ng’ato obokorekata oluro kata olokore mamarmar, mi opar ni dipo kobedo dhoho, to nyakater ng’atno ir Harun jadolo kata ir achiel kuom yawuote.  3Jadolo norangkama litno, to ka oyudo ni yier man kanyo olokore rachar, kendo tuonenenore ni odonjo ei pien, to mano nyiso ni en dhoho.  Ka oserange kamano,to nong’ad wach ni nga’tno ogak.  4To ka kama litno rachar, kendo oknenre ni odonjo ei pien, to yier man kanyo bende ok olokore rachar tojadolo noket ng’at matuono kar kende kuom ndalo abiriyo.  5Jadolo nochakorange chieng’ mar abiriyo, kendo koyudo ni kama litno pod psiko kakachon, kendo ok olandore, to nochak oket ng’atno kar kende kuom ndaloabiriyo mamoko.  6Chieng’ mar abiriyo jadolo nochak orange, kendo koyudoni kama litno odok chien, kendo ok olandore, to mano nyiso ni en manakama oroch, omiyo noland wach ni ng’atno ok ogak.  7To ka bang’ mano kamaorochno ochako olandore e dend ng’atno, to nyaka odog ir jadolo.  8Jadolonyaka chak range, kendo koyudo ni kama litno landore, to mano nyiso nien tuo mar dhoho, omiyo nong’ad wach ni ng’atno ogak. 9Ka tuo machalo dhoho omako ng’ato, to nyaka tere ir jadolo, 10mi range. Ka nitie kido marachar kama litno, mi yier man kanyo olokore marachar,kendo kanyo onogo otimo adhola, 11to mano nyiso ni en dhoho mosedak edel, omiyo jadolo nyaka ng’ad wach ni ng’atno ogak, kuom mano ok onegokete kar kende kuom ndalo abiriyogo, nikech ong’ere ni ng’atno ogak. 12To ka tuono nenore ni jadolo ka gima olandore motieko dend ng’atnoduto, 13to jadolo nyaka range.  Koyudo ni tuono olandore e dende dutoadier, to nong’ad wach ni ng’atno ok ogak, nikech dende duto oselokoremarachar, omiyo oler.  14To ka dende ochako dholore, to nokwane ka ng’amaogak.  15Jadolo norang adhondeno, mi nong’ad wach ni ogak.  Kama dholorenyaka kwan ka gima ok ler, nikech onyiso ni tuono en dhoho.  16To bendeka adholano ochango, molokore rachar, to ng’atno nyaka dog ir jadolo. 17Jadolo nyaka range, kendo koyudo ni adhondego oselokore rachar, tonyaka ong’ad wach ni ng’at matuono koro ok ogak, nikech adier oler. 18Ka bur omako ng’ato, mi ochango, 19to bang’e kanyono olokore rachar,kata obokore mamarmar, to ng’atno nyaka nyis jadolo kama litno.  20Jadolonorange, kendo ka tuono nenore ni odonjo ei pien, kendo yier man kanyoolokore rachar, to mano nyiso ni dhoho otuch kama bur ne nitie, omiyonyaka ong’ad wach ni ng’atno ogak.  21To ka jadolo orange, mi oyudo niyier man kanyo ok olokore rachar, kendo tuono ok odonjo ei pien, toosedok chien, to nyaka oket ng’atno kar kende kuom ndalo abiriyo. 22Bang’ mano, koyudo ni tuono olandore e dende kata mana matin, to manonyiso ni en tuo mar dhoho, omiyo nyaka jadolo ng’ad wach ni ng’atno okler.  23To ka kama obokoreno odong’ adong’a mana kaka ne en, kendo pokolandore, to kara en mana mbala mar bur, omiyo jadolo nyaka ng’ad wachni ng’atno ler. 24Ka mach owang’o dend ng’ato, to bang’e kanyo ochako dhe mamarmar katamarachar, 25to jadolo nyaka rang kama litno.  Ka oyudo yier man kanyoolokore rachar, kendo tuono nenore ni odonjo ei pien, to mano nyiso nituo mar dhoho otuch kama owang’no.  Jadolo nong’ad wach ni ng’atno ogak,nimar tuono en dhoho.  26To ka jadolo orange, moyudo ni yier maracharonge kanyono, kendo tuono ok odonjo ei pien, to odok chien, to nyakaoket ng’atno kar kende kuom ndalo abiriyo.  27Chieng’ mar abiriyo jadolonyaka ng’iye kendo, to ka oyudo ni tuo oselandore e dende, mano nyiso nien dhoho, omiyo nyaka ong’ad wach ni ng’atno ogak.  28To ka kama litno okomedore, to odok chien, mano nyiso ni en mana kama owang’.  Jadolo nyakang’ad wach ni ng’atno ok ogak, nikech en mana mbala mar mach. 29Ka ng’at moro, ma dichwo kata ma dhako nigi adhola e wiye kata e tike,30to jadolo nyaka rang adholano.  Ka oyudo ni tuono odonjo ei pien, kendoyier man kanyo olokore mamarmar, kendo okelore okelore to mano nyiso nikit dhoho mawuok buk ema omako wich kata tik.  Omiyo jadolo nyaka ng’adwach ni ng’at matuono ogak.  31To ka jadolo orango kama litno, moneno niok odonjo ei pien, kendo onge yier moselokore mamarmar to nyaka oketng’at matuono kar kende kuom ndalo abiriyo.  32Nyaka orang kama litnochieng’ mar abiriyo, to koyudo ni kama otimo bukno ok olandore, kendo niyier man kanyo ok olokore mamarmar, kendo ni kama litno ok odonjo eipien, 33to jatuo nyaka liel wiye kama buk nitieno, mi jadolo nokete karkende kuom ndalo abiriyo.  34Jadolo nochak orang kanyo chieng’ marabiriyo, to ka oyudo ni kama otimo bukno ok olandore, kendo nenore ni okodonjo ei pien, to nyaka ong’ad wach ni ng’atno ok ogak.  Ng’atno nyakalwok lepe, mi bed maler.  35To bang’ mano, ka kama otimo bukno ochakoolandore, 36to jadolo nochak orange.  Ka onwang’o ni oselandore adier, took onego odew ng’iyo ka yier oselokore mamarmar, nimar onge kiawa ning’atno ogak.  37To ka kama otimo bukno osiko mana kaka chon, kendo yiermarateng’ ochako twi kanyono, to mano nyiso ni osechango.  Adier ng’atnokoro ler, kendo jadolo nyaka ng’ad wach kamano. 38Ka ng’at moro ma dichwo kata ma dhako nigi kuonde moko marachere edende, to jadolo norange.  39Ka oyudo ni kuondego rachere, kendo dokchien, to mano nyiso ni en mana kit dhoho moro maloko del marachar,omiyo ng’atno ok ogak. 40Ka yie wi ng’atno oluny, modoko rabondo gi e dier wiye to mano ok miodok mogak.  41Kata ka yie wiye oluny ka nyiem wang’e mano bende nyiso niorabondo to ok ogak.  42To ka adhola mamarmar omako bondono, to manonyiso ni dhoho otuch kanyo.  43Jadolo norange, kendo koyudo ni adholaolokore mamarmar, machalo gi dhoho matuch e del, 44to mano nyiso ning’atno nigi tuo dhoho, kendo ogak.  Omiyo jadolo nyaka wach kamano,nimar tuo mar dhoho omakoo wi ng’atno. 45Ng’at man gi tuo mar dhoho norwak lewni moyiech, kendo wiye bende nowemak ogolo.  Noum dhoge gi yo ka malo, kendo noywag niya, "Abet mogak!Abet mogak!" 46To kinde duto ma pod en gii dhoho, nyaka kwane ka ng’atmogak.  Kuom mano enodag oko kar kende, ma ok odonj e kambi.
-49Ka law kata usi kata pien kata gimoro molos gi pien opur molokoremakwar kata maratiglo, to nyaka tere ir jadolo mi range.  Mano nyakatimre kata ka lawno olos gi yie rombo kata gi katana.  50Jadolo noranggima opurno, eka nokete kar kende kuom ndalo abiriyo.  51To chieng’ marabiriyo nochak orang gino, to ka kama opurno olandore, mano nyiso ni engima ketho gik moko kaka dhoho ketho del.  52Nyaka owang’ lawno, katausino, bed ni en mar yie rombo kata mar katana, kata ka en gima olos gipien, nikech gima landoreno en gima rach ka dhoho.  Mano emomiyo nyakawang’e gi mach. 53To ka jadolo oneno ni kama opurno ok olandore e gino, 54to enogol chikmondo olwok gino, eka nochak okete kar kende kuom ndalo abiriyo mamoko. 55Bang’e jadolo nyaka chak range.  Kata koyudo ni kama opurno okolandore, to osiko mana kaka chon, mano pod nyiso ni ogak.  Emomiyo nyakawang’e gi mach, kata bed ni kama opurno nigi yo ka iye kata gi yo kaoko. 56To ka jadolo orange moyudo ni kama opurno odok chien bang’ lwoko, tonong’ad kanyo oko, bed ni en kuom law kata kuom pien kata kuom usi.  57Toka kama opurno ochako othinyore e lawno, kata e usino kata e gima olosgi pienno, to mano nyiso ni gima rachno landore e gino, omiyo nyakawang’ gino gi mach.  58To ka oneno ni kidono olal bang’ lwoko, to nyakachak lwoke, eka gakne rum. 59Mano e chik mar gima rach ka dhoho man kuom law molos gi yie rombo,kata mar katana, kata man kuom usi, kata kuom gima olos gi pien, mondoong’e ka gima kamano ogak kata ok ogak. Tim jo-Lawi 141Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa kama: 2Ma e chik mar ng’at mipwodho kuomtuo dhoho.  Chieng’ mipwodhe to nyaka ter ir jadolo.  3Kuom mano jadolonyaka wuog oko mar kambi mondo odhi orange.  Ka oyudo ni ng’atno ochangokuom tuoneno, 4to nyaka ogol chik mondo okelni ng’at mipwodhono winyariyo mangima michamo, kaachiel gi yiend sida gi usi makwar kod badowino.  5Eka jadolo nogol chik mondo winyo achiel onegi e agulu moting’opi aora.  6Bang’ mano nokaw winyo mangima gi yiend sida gi usi makwar kodowino, mi nolutgi e remb winyo mosenegno.  7Eka nokir remono nyadibiriyokuom ng’at mipwodhone tuo dhoho.  Bang’e nong’ad wach ni ng’atno ler,kendo nowe winyo mangima cha dhi e thim.  8Ng’at mipwodhono nolwok lepe,kendo noliel yie dende duto, mi nolwokre gi pi, eka nobed mopwodhore. Bang’ mano onyalo donjo e kambi, to ok nonind e hembe nyaka ndaloabiriyo rum.  9Chieng’ mar abiriyo nochak oliel yie wiye duto gi yie tikekod yie wang’e kaachiel gi yie dende mamoko duto.  Bang’e nolwok lepekendo nolwokre gi pi, eka nobed mopwodhore chuth. 10Chieng’ mar aboro nyaka okel imbe ariyo ma hikgi achiel achiel, kodrombo ma swini ma bende hike achiel.  Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maongesonga.  Bende nokel mogo moromo kilo apar moruw gi mo, mondo otimgomisango mar cham, kaachiel gi mo moromo nus lita.  11Jadolo mapwodhong’atno nokete kaachiel gi chiwone e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye e dho Hemb Romo. 12Bang’e jadolo nokaw im achiel gi morno, mondo otimgo misangomipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, kendo nochiwgi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye mondogibed mich moyiedhi.  13Imno nyaka yang’ ei Kama Ler miyang’oe jamnimitimogo misengni mag golo richo kod misengni miwang’o pep, nimarmisango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi dong’ni jadolo mana kaka misango margolo richo.  En gima ler moloyo.  14Jadolo nokaw remb misango mipwodhogoketho mar gowi, mi nomien e dho it ng’at mipwodhono ma korachwich, kendoe lith lwete mathwon ma korachwich, kendo e lith tiende mathwon makotachwich.  15Bang’ mano jadolo nokaw mo, mi nool moko e tat lwete owuonma koracham.  16Eka enolut lith lwete ma korachwich e mo man e tat lwetema koracham, kendo nokir nyadibiriyo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  17Bang’enokaw mo moko modong’ e tat lwete, mi nowir e dho it ng’at mipwodhono makorachwich, kendo e lith lwete ma korachwich, kendo e lith tiendemathwon ma korachwich, mana kuonde ma nomienie remb misango mipwodhogoketho mar gowi.  18Modong’ e tat lwet jadolo, to nool ewi ng’atmipwodhono.  Kamano jadolo nopwodhe e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  19Bang’e jadolonotim misango mar golo richo mondo opwodhgo ng’atno kar gakne.  20Ekaenowang’ chiayo mitimogo misango miwang’o pep, kendo nochiwe ekendo-mar-misango kaachiel gi misango mar cham.  Kamano e kaka jadolonopwodhe, kendo nodok maler. 21Kapo ni ng’atno jachan, ma ok nyal yudo gigo, to nokel nyaim mondootimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi.  Imno nobed mich moyiedhi,kendo mitimogo misango mipwodhogo gakne.  Kendo nokel mogo moromo kiloapar moruw gi mo mondo otimgo misango mar cham, kaachiel gi mo moromonus lita, 22kod akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo kaka onyaloyudo.  Winyo achiel notimgo misango mar golo richo, to machielo notimgomisango miwang’o pep.  23Chieng’ mar aboro nokel gigo ni jadolo e dhoHenb Romo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye mondo pwodhego.  24Jadolo nokaw im mi bitimgo misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, kaachiel gi morno, mi nochiwgie nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi.  25Eka noneg imno, kendo nokawrembe moko, mi nomien e dho it ng’at mipwodhono ma korachwich, kendo elith lwete mathwon ma korachwich, kendo e lith lwete ma korachwich. 26Bang’e jadolo nool mo moko e tat lwete owuon ma koracham, 27kendonokir mo moko nyadibiryo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye gi lith lwete makorachwich.  28Eka nokaw mo moko modong’ e tat lwete, kendo nowir e dhoit ng’at mipwodhono ma korachwich, kendo e lith lwete mathwon makorachwich, kendo e lith tiende mathwon ma kotachwich, mana kuonde manomienie remb misango mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi.  29Mo modong’ e tat lwetjadolo, to nool ewi ng’at mipwodhono mondo opuodhego.  30Jadolono nokawwinyo achiel kuom winy mane ng’atno okelo, kata bed ni gin akuch oduglakata gin nyithi akuru, 31mi notimgo misango mar golo richo, to machielonotimgo misango miwang’o pep.  To bende enotim misango mar cham.  Kamano ekaka jadolo nopwodh ng’atno e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  32Mano e chik moket ning’at modhier man gi tuo mar dhoho, kendo ma ok nyal yudo chiwo mitimogomisengni piwodhego. 33Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun niya,
"Ka usedonjo e pinyKanaan ma abiro miyou mondo udagie, mi akelo gimoro marach momiyo kor otmoro opur, 35to wuon odno nyaka dhi ir jadolo kendo nyise ni gima rachni e ode.  36Jadolo nyaka gol chik mondo gik moko duto manie odno ogol kapok odhi range, nono to gigo duto obedo mogak.  Bang’e jadolo nodonj eodno mondo orangi.  37Ka onwang’o ni kuonde ma gigo nitie olokore ratiglokata makwar, kendo nenore ni odonjo e kor ot, 38to nyaka owuog oko edhot, kendo olor odno kuom ndalo abiriyo.  39Chieng’ mar abiriyo nyakaoduogi mi ochak orang ot, to koyudo ka gima rachno oselandore e kor ot,40to nyaka ogol chik mondo kite ma gino nitie ogol oko kendo owiti e tokdala kamoro ma ok ler.  41Bang’ mano nogol chik mondo ochwer kor odnoduto gi yo ka iye, kendo gipuk lowo ma gichwero e tok dala kamoro ma okler.  42Eka giniket kite manyien kuonde ma gisegoloe moko ka, mi gimwonot gi lowo manyien. 43To ka gino ochako owuok molandore, kosegol kite ka, kendo ochuer korot, mi ochak omwon, 44to jadolo nyaka duog rang odno.  Ka oyudo ni ginooselandore, to mano nyiso ni en gima rach ka dhoho.  Kuom mano odno obedomogak, 45kendo nyaka muke, mi kitene gi yiende kod lope ter e tok dala,mi wit kamoro ma ok ler.  46Ng’ato ang’ata mane oyudo odonjo e odno ekinde mane olore nobed mogak nyaka odiambo, 47kendo ng’ato ang’ata maosenindo e odno kata ochiemoe, nyaka lwok lepe. 48To ka jadolo odhi morango odno kendo oyudo ni gino ok oselandore bang’mwone, to nong’ad wach ni odno osepwodhi, nikech gima rachno orumo. 49Jadolo nyaka kaw winy ariyo matindo kendo kaw yiend sida gi usi makwarkod owino opwodhgo ot, mondo odok maler.  50Eka noneg winyo achiel eagulu moting’o pi aora, 51kendo nokaw yiend sida gi owino kod usi makwarkaachiel gi winyo mangima cha, mi nolutgi e remb winyo mosenegno, kendoe pi malerno, mi nokir nyadibiriyo kuom ot.  52Kamano e kaka nopwodh ot,kokonyore gi remb winyo gi pi maler gi winyo mangima gi yiend sidakaachiel gi owino kod usi makwar.  53Winyo mangima to nowe ring dhi ethim.  Kosepwodho ot kamano, to ot nodok maler. 54Mano e chik man kuom tuo dhoho kido mopogore opogore, kod tuo mawuokbuk, 55gi pur mamako nanga kata mamako ot 56gi kuonde mobokore e del,kata moluro kata mamarmar.  57Chikno nyiso kaka ipogo gik mogak kod gikma ok ogak.  En chik mar tuo dhoho gi mar gik mopur. Tim jo-Lawi 15Gik machuer e dend ng’ato mamiyo obedo mogak1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun 2ni mondo onyis jo-Israel ni: Kanyot ng’ato owuok, kata koyudo tuo nyach machuer, to gima chuerno bedomogak.  3Kata ka nyajno chuer kata kodinore, to ng’atno ogak kendo chikmar gakne kuom chuer kamano chalo kama:4Kitanda ma ng’at ma dende chuer kamano onindoe, kata gimoro amoramobetie bedo mogak, 5ng’ato ang’ata momulo kitandano nyaka lwok lepe,kendo lwokre, to nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo.  6Bende ng’ato ang’ata mobetkama ng’at ma dende chuer osebetie, nyaka lwok lepe, kendo lwokre, tonosik kogak nyaka odhiambo.  7Ng’ato ang’ata momulo ng’at ma dende chuernyaka lwok lepe, kendo lwokre, to nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo.  8Ka ng’atma dende chuer ong’ulo olawo kuom ng’ato, to ng’at mong’ul kuome olawnonyaka lwok lepe, kendo lwokre, to nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo.  9Gimoroamora ma ng’at ma dende chuerno obetie ka en e wuoth bedo mogak. 10Ng’ato ang’ata momulo gima ng’atno osebetie nobed mogak nyaka odhiambokendo ng’ato moting’o gik ma kamago nyaka lwok lepe, kendo lwokre, tonosik kogak nyaka odhiambo.  11Ng’ato ang’ata ma ng’at ma dende chueromulo ka pok ologo nyaka lwok lepe kendo lwokre, to nosik kogak nyakaodhiambo.  12Gimoro amora mochue gi lowo ma ng’at ma dende chuer omulonyaka negi, to ka en gima olos gi bawo, to nyaka lawe gi pi. 13Ka ng’at ma dende chuerno ochango, to nyaka owe ndalo abiriyo kadhikopwodhore.  Nolwok lepe, kendo nolwokre gi pi maler, eka nopwodhre. 14Chieng’ mar aboro nokaw akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuru ariyo, minobigo e dho Hemb Romo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo nomigi jadolo. 15Jadolo nokaw akuru achiel, mi notimgo misango mar golo richo, tomachielo notimgo misango miwang’o pep.  Kamano nopwodh ng’atno e nyimRuoth Nyasaye, kaka chik dwaro kuom gak mar chuer. 16Ka nyot ng’ato owuok, to nyaka olwok dende duto gi pi, kendo nosikkogak nyaka odhiambo.  17Nanga moro amora kata pien moro amora ma nyodootonie nyaka lwoki, kendo nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.  18Chikno bendeomako dhako ma ng’ato oriworego.  Giduto ji ariyogo nyaka gilwokre, toginisik ka gigak nyaka odhiambo. 19Ka dhako odhi e due, to nobed mogak kuom ndalo abiriyo, kendo ng’atoang’ata momule nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.  20Gimoro amora monindoe katamobetie e kindego nobed mogak.  21Ng’ato ang’ata momulo kitanda dhakono,22kata momulo gimoro mosebetie nyaka lwok lepe, kendo lwokre, to nosikkogak nyaka odhiambo.  23Kata ka omulo gima nie kitanda dhakono, kata mankama obetie, to nobed mogak nyaka odhiambo.  24Ka ng’ato oriwore gidhakono mi rembe omiene, to nobed mogak. 25Ka dhako moro chuer kuom ndalo mogwarore e kinde ma ok odhi e due,kata ka ochuer aming’a mokadho kaka ojadhi e due, to nobed mogak e kindemochwerieno duto, mana kaka ndalo modhi e due.  26Kitanda moro amoramonindoe kata gimoro amora mobetie e kindeno nobed mogak mana ka kitandamonindoe kodhi e due.  27Ng’ato ang’ata momulo gigo nobed mogak, omiyonyaka olwok lepe, kendo olwokre, to nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo.  28Kadhakono ochango, to nyaka owe ndalo abiriyo kadhi, bang’e nobed maler. 29To chieng’ mar aboro nyaka okaw akuch odugla ariyo kata nyithi akuruabiriyo, mi oter ni jodolo e dho Hemb Romo.  30Jadolo nokaw akuru achiel,mi notimgo misango mar golo richo, to machielo notimgo misango miwang’opep, kopwodho dhakono e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kaka chik dwaro kuom gak marchuer. 31Kamano e kaka unusiem jo-Israel kuom bet mogak, nimar dipo ka gidwanyoKar Dakna Maler manie kindgi, mi githo nikech gakgino. 32Mano en chik momako ng’at moyudo nyach machuer kata ma nyote owuok miodoko mogak.  33Bende en chik mamako dhako modhi e due, kaachiel ging’ato ang’ata bed ni en dichuo kata dhako, ma dende chuer, kod ng’atmoriwore gi dhako mogak. Tim jo-Lawi 16Chieng’ pwodhruok mar oganda jo-Israel1Kane yawuot Harun ariyo kande osetho kuom chiwo mach ma ok ni kare enyim Ruoth Nyasaye, 2Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Nyis Harunowadu ni kik okadh pasia, mi odonj e Kama Ler e nyim raum Sandug Mumamiluongo ni kar ng’wono, mak mana e kinde moketi, nono to otho, nikechafwenyora gi e bor polo man ewi raum.  3E kinde ka kinde ma Harun donjoeKama Ler, to nyaka okel nyarwath mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo,kod im mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep.  4Enorwak law dolo mabor gisirwari mondo ogeng’go duge, kendo notue misip e nungone, kendo nosidhkilemba e wiye, mago duto nobed mag katana maber.  Gin lep dolo, omiyoHarun nyaka lwokre ka pok orwakogi.  5Enokaw nyuogi ariyo kuom ogandajo-Israel mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, kendo im achiel mondootimgo misango miwang’o pep. 6Nyaka otim misango mar golo richo gi rwath mondo opwodhrego kaachiel gijoode.  7Bang’ mano, nokaw nyuogi ariyo kende nokelgi e nyim RuothNyasaye e dho Hemb Romo.  8Nyaka ogo ombulu kuomgi mondo diel achiel obedmar Ruoth Nyasaye, to machielo obed mar Azazel.  9Eka nokaw diel maombuch Ruoth Nyasaye olwar kuome mi notimgo misango mar golo richo. 10Diel ma ombuch Azazel olwar kuome to nokel ka ngima e nyim RuothNyasaye, mi nopwodhe.  Eka noriembe odhi e thim ir Azazel. 11Harun nyaka chiw rwath mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo,kopwodhorego kaachiel gi joode.  12Enokaw tap mach moketie mach mogol ekendo-mar-misango manie nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kaachiel gi ubani mang’ueng’ar moromo lwedo ariyo, mi nokel ei kama nogeng’ gi pasia.  13Eka noolubani e majno e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye mondo ich ubani oim Sandug Rapar,mondo kik otho.  14Enokaw remb rwath, mi nokir gi lith lwete e bath raumkoma ochomo yo wuokchieng’ kendo nokir remono nyadibiriyo gi lith lwetee nyim raum.
Bang’ mano noyang’ diel mitimogo misango mar golo richo ni ogandajo-Israel, mi noter rembe ei kama ogeng’ gi pasia, kendo nokir remonoewi raum, kendo e nyim raum, mana kaka nokiro remb rwath.  16Mano e kakaenopwodh Kama Ler kuom timbe mogak ma jo-Israel osedwanyego, kendo kuomtimbe mane giweyogo Ruoth Nyasaye, tiende ni richogo duto.  Kamano bendee kaka nopwodh Hemb Romo manie diergi, kama timbegi ogakie.  17Ong’eng’at moro machielo manobed ei Hemb Romo chakre sa ma Harun donjo eiKama Ler mondo opwodhre owuon, kendo opwodh joode kod oganda duto marjo-Israel nyaka sa ma owuokie, kosetieko tich pwodhruok duto. 18Bang’e nowuog oko e kendo-mar-misango manie nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, minopwodh kendono.  Nokaw remb rwath moko kod remb diel moko mi nomien-gotunge duto mag kendo-mar-misango, 19kendo nokir remo moko nyadibirioyogi lith lwete e kendo-mar-misango.  Kamano nopuodhe kuom timbe mogak magjo-Israel mi nomi obed maler. 20Ka Harun osetieko pwodho Kama Ler gi Hemb Romo kendo-mar-misango, tonokel diel mangima e nyim oganda.  21Enoket lwetene duto ewi diendno,kendo nohul richo duto mag jo-Israel gi timbe mane giweyogo RuothNyasaye, tiende ni richogi duto.  Enowe richogo duto ewi diendno, ekanomiye ng’at manoyud obet ka rito mondo otere e thim.  22Kamano diendnonoting’ richo duto, mag jo-Israel e thim kuma bor.  Ng’atno noweye kunomondo odhi adhiya.
Bang’ mano, Harun nodonj e Hemb Romo, mi nolony lep katana maneorwako kodonjo e Kama Ler kendo nowegi kanyo.  24Eka nolwokre gi pi,kamoro moyang ni Nyasaye, kendo norwak lepe mag dolo, mi nowuog okomondo otim misangone owuon miwang’o pep, kod mar oganda jo-Israel. Kamano nopwodhre, kendo nopwodh ji bende.  25Enowang’ boche chiayomotimogo misango mar golo richo e kendo-mar-misango.  26To ng’at maneoriembo diel, ka tero ir Azazel kik donj e kambi nyaka chop olwok lepekendo olwokre.  27Rwath gi diel motimgo misengni mag golo richo, kendo marembgi oseter ei Kama Ler mondo opwodhgo richo, nogol ringi gi piendegikod owuochgi oko e tok kambi, kama nyaka wang’gie pep.  28Ng’at maowang’ogi nyaka lwok lepe kendo lwokre, eka bang’e onyalo dwogo e kambi.
Koro chik momakou nyaka chieng’ ema: Due apar mar due mar abiriyo, unjo-Israel kaachiel gi jopinje mamoko modak kuomu, nyaka utue chiemo,kendo kik uti tich moro, 30nikech chieng’no ema nogolnue richou mondoupwodhru.  Kamano unupuwodhru kuom richou duto e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. 31Chieng’no en chieng’ Sabato moyiedhi ma nyaka uyueye, kendo nyakautueye chiemo.  En chik momakou nyaka chieng’.  32Jadolo mowir kendomoketi kar wuon mare e tij dolo ema notimnu pwodhruok.  Enorwak lep dolomag katana maber.  33Kendo enopwodh Kama Ler gi Hemb Romo kodkendo-mar-misango.  Eka nopwodh jodolo kod oganda jo-Israel duto.  34Manonobed chik momakou nyaka chieng’ mondo upwodh jo-Israel dichiel e higakuom richogi. Kamano Musa nochopo chike mag Ruoth Nyasaye. Tim jo-Lawi 17Misengni nyaka tim kamoro achiel kende1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 2ni mondo onyis Harun gi yawuote kaachielgi jo-Israel duto ni Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko kama: 3Ka ja-Israel moro amoraonego dhiang’ kata rombo kata diel ei kambi kata oko mar kambi, 4to okokelo e dho Hemb Romo mondo otimgo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango e nyim HemaMaler mar Ruoth Nyasaye, to nokwane ka ng’ama oneko.  Osechuero remo,omiyo nyaka ng’ad kare oko kuom ogandagi.  5Chikni oketi mondo jo-Israelokel ni Ruoth Nyasaye jamni ma ginego oko.  Nyaka gikelgi ni jadolo e dhoHemb Romo, mondo gitim kodgi misengni mag sawo ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  6Jadolonokir remo e kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye man e dho Hemb Romo,kendo nowang’ boche mondo odum mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  7Ka jo-Israelnego jamni, to kik gimed timo misengni ni jochiende ma gilamo, kagidwanyorego mana kaka dhako moweyo chwore dwanyore gi chwo mamoko, manonobed chik momakogi kaachiel gi nyikwagi nyaka chieng’. 8Ruoth Nyasaye nomedo wacho ni Musa mondo owach ni jo-Israel niya, "Kaja-Israel moro amora kata japiny moro modak kuomu otimo misango miwang’opep kata misango moro amora, 9to ook okelo e dho Hemb Romo mondootimnigo Ruoth Nyasaye misango, nong’ad kare oko kuom ogandagi. Ruoth Nyasaye okwero chamo remo10 "Ka ja-Israel moro amora kata japiny moro modak kuomu ochamo remo toanabed jasike, mi nang’ad kare oko kuom ogandagi, 11nikech ngima gimoroni e rembe.  Achiwo remo mondo otimgo misango e kendo-mar-misango mondoupwodhrugo, nimar remo, tiende ni ngima, ema ipwodhogo richo.  12Manoemomiyo asekwero jo-Israel kaachiel gi jopinje moko modak kuomgi ni kikgicham remo.
"Ka ja-Isarel moro amora kata japiny moro modak kuomu odhi duar,momako le kata winyo minyalo chamo, to nyaka ool rembe piny, kendo oikgi lowo, 14nikech ngima gimoro ni e rembe.  Mano emomiyo asekwerojo-Isarel mondo kik ocham remb gimoro, nikech ngima gino ni e rembe. Ng’at mochamo remo nong’ad kare oko.
"Ng’ato ang’ata, bed ni en ja-Israel kata japiny moro modak kuomu,mochamo gimoro motho athoya kende, kata ma ondiek onego, nolwok lepekendo nolwokre, to nosik kogak nyaka odhiambo, eka bang’e nobed maler. 16To ka ok olwoko lepe, kendo ok olwokore, to noyud kum kuom kethone. "Tim jo-Lawi 18Okwer terruok gi timbe ma kamago1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 2ni mondo onyis jo-Israel kama: An eRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  3Kik utim timbe jo-Misri, mane udak e pinygi,kata kik utim timbe jo-Kanaan ma aterou e pinygi.  Kik ulu chike jogoduto, 4to nyaka urit chikena, kendo uluw yorena.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye,5omiyo nyaka urit chikena gi buchena, ma ka ng’ato orito, to yudo ngima. An e Ruoth Nyasaye. 6Kik ng’ato moro kuomu terre gi dhako moro ma watne.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye. 7Kik ikuod wi wuoru kuom terruok gi meru.  En meru, omiyo kik ikuod wiye. 8Kik iterri gi chi wuoru, nikech kitimo kamano to ikuodo wi wuoru.  9Kikiterri gi nyameru hie, kata gi nyameru ma ng’at machielo onywolo, bed nionywole dala kata kamoro machielo.  10Kik iterri gi nyar wuodi kata ginyar nyari, nikech kitimo kamano to ikuodo wiyi iwuon 11Kik iterri ginyameru ma ot machielo.  En nyameru, omiyo kik ikuod wiye.  12Kik iterrigi wayu, nikech en gi wuoru gin remo achiel, 13kata kik iterri gi nyaminmeru, nikech en gi meru bende gin remo achiel.  14Kik iterri gi chiowadgi wuoru, nikech kitimo kamano to ikuodo wi wuoruno.  15Kik iterri gichi wuodi, nikech kitimo kamano to ikuodo wiye.  16Kik iterri gi chiowadu nikech kitimo kamano to ikuodo wi owaduno.  17Kik iterri gi dhakomoro to nyare bende iterorigo, kata kik ikaw nyar wuod dhakono kata nyarnyar dhakono mondo iterrigo, nimar dipo kiriwori gi rembi iwuon, to manoen richo maduong’.  18Kik ikaw nyamin chiegi mondo obed nyieke, mi iriwrikode ka nyamin pod ngima.
Kik iriwri gi dhako ka ni e due.  20Kik iterri gi chi wadu, mi omiidok mogak.  21Kik ichiw nyathini moro ni nyasaye manono miluongo niMolek, nikech kitimoo kamano to ikwedo nying Nyasachu.  An e RuothNyasaye.  22Kik inind gi ng’ama dichwo kaka dinind gi ng’ama dhako nikechmano kwero.  23Kik iterri gi chiayo moro, mi omiyi ibed mogak.  Dhakobende kik yie mondo chiayo moro oriwre kode.  Mano en gima mono. 24Kik udwanyru kutimo timbe ma kamago nikech timbego ema nomiyo ogendinima abiro riembo mondo owenu thuologi odoko joma odwanyore.  25Mano e kakapinyno nodoko mogak, mi ne akume nikech richogo, omiyo nong’ogo jomaodakie oko.  26Un to nyaka urit chikena.  Onge ng’ato kuomu ma notim timbemakuerogo, bed ni en ja-Israel kata jadak,
-28nono to pinyno ong’ogouoko kuom dwanye, mana kaka nong’ogo oganda mane okuongonu dakie.  Ogandamane okuongonuno notimo timbe makuerogo, mi ne gimiyo pinyno odokomogak.  29Ng’ato ang’ata motimo achiel kuom timbe makuerogo nong’ad kareoko kuom ogandagi.  30Emomiyo rituru chikna kendo kik uluw timbe makueromane weg pinyno otimo kapok ubiro.  Kamano ok nudok mogak.  An e RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu. Tim jo-Lawi 19Chike mag timbe makare1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 2ni mondo onyis jo-Israel niya, "Nyakaubed joma ler, nikech an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu aler.  3Ng’ato kang’ato kuomu nyaka luor min gi wuon, kendo nyaka rit Sabato maga.  An eRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  4Kik uluw nyiseche manono, kendo kik uthedhnyiseche mag nyinyo mondo ulam.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
"Ka uyang’o chiayo mondo utimgo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango mar sawo, toneguru chiayono kaka chik dwaro mondo Ruoth Nyasaye oyie kodu.  6Nyakachame mana chieng’ mitimoe misangono, kata kinyne.  To ring’o modong’nyaka chieng’ mar adek, nyaka wang’ e mach.  7Ka ochame chieng’ mar adek,to Ruoth Nyasaye ok noyie kode, nikech ne en gima kuero.  8Ng’ato ang’atamochame nyaka yud kum kuom kethone, nikech osechayo gima ler mar RuothNyasaye.  Ng’atno nong’ad kare oko kuom ogandagi.
"Ka ukayo cham e puotheu, to kik uke nyaka giko puotheu, kata kik uhulabang’ tiang’.  10Bende kik upon olembeu mag mzabibu mutiek pep, kata kikukwany mago molwar piny.  Nyaka uwegi ni joma odhier kod jodak.  An eRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
"Kik ikwel, kata kik iwuond wadu kata kik imaye e yor wuond.  12Kikikuong’ri gi nyinga kiwuondo ng’ato, nimar kitimo kamano to ichayo nyingRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye.  13Kik idhir wadu, katakik imaye gire.  Bende nyaka ichul jatich mana e odiechieng’ motiyonieno. 14Kik iyany ng’at ma ite odino, kata kik iket gimoro e nyim muofu madochwanyre.  Luoruru Nyasachu.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Kik iket bura kuom dok ni jachan, kata kuom luoro ng’ama duong’ tong’ad ni wadu bura kare kichung’ e adiera.  16Kik iwuoth koni gi konikiketho nying jou, kata kik ihangne wadu wach kodonjne e buch nek.  An eRuoth Nyasaye.  17Kik imak sadha gi wadu, to nyaka inyise kethone wang’gi wang’; mano eka ok dibed jaketho.  18Kik ichul kuor kata kik ibedmamon gi jowadu, to nyaka iher wadu kaka iherori iwuon.  An e RuothNyasaye.
"Nyaka urit chikena.  Kik uwe jamni mopogore opogore luwre, kendo kikuchwo kothe ariyo mopogore opogore e puotheu.  Bende kik urwak lewnimolos gi usi ariyo mopogore opogore.
"Ka ong’iew misumba ma nyako ni ng’at moro mondo okendi, mi ng’atooterore kode ka pok owar nyakono, kata ka pok omiye thuolo mondo odhi,to nyaka non wachno.  To ok noneg nyako kod ng’at moterore kodeno, nikechpod en misumba.  21Ng’at moterore kodeno nyaka kel im e nyim RuothNyasaye e dho Hemb Romo mondo otimgo misango mar golo ketho mar gowi. 22Jadolo notim misango e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye gi imno mondo opwodh ning’atno richone, eka nowene richo mosetimono.
"Ka usedonjo e piny ma abiro miyou, mi upidho yath moro amora maolembe inyalo cham, to nyaka ukwan olembego ka gima kuero, kendo okunuchamgi kuom higni adek.  24E higa mar ang’wen olembe duto nobed chiwomaler ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo mano nomi gibed gik ma inyalo cham.  25To ehiga mar abich unyalo chamo olembego.  Kutimo kamano, to ginimed nyakmoloyo.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
"Kik ucham ring’o man gi remo.  Kik upor wach, kata kik ubed ajuoke. 27Kik utit wiu kata yie tiku.  28Kik usar dendu kuywago ng’ama otho katakik usar kido moro kuomu.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Kik umi nyiu bed jochode, mi lokre ohodho, dipo ka pinyu okethore,mi richo opong’o.  30Nyaka urit Sabato maga, kendo uluor Kama Ler mara. An e Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Kik udhi ir jonyakalondo kata kuom ajuoke ma moko, nikech kutimokamano to udoko mogak.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
"Nyaka uchung’ ni ng’ama duong’ ma wiye oti lwar, kumiye duong’ kendouluor Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Ka japiny moro odak kuomu, to kik uthage.  34Nyaka urite mana kakawuodu, kendo uhere mana kaka uheroru uwegi, nikech un bende ne un jodake piny Misri.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
"Kik uketh chik kuom gimoro mipimo borne kata mipimo pekne kata manamipimo ng’eny mare.  36To nyaka ubed gi rapim makare mipimogo gik moko. 37An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mane ogolou e piny Misri.  Nyaka uritchikena kendo uluwgi.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye. "Tim jo-Lawi 20Kum miyudo kuom ketho chik1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 2ni mondo onyis jo-Israel niya, "Kaja-Israel moro amora kata japiny moro modak kuomgi ochiwo nyathine moroni nyasaye moro manono miluongo ni Molek, to nyaka neg ng’atno. Jo-Israel duto nogoye gi kite, nyaka otho, 3kendo an awuon nabed jasike,mi nang’ad kare oko kuom ogandagi, nikech osechiwo nyathine ni Molek,kodwanyogo Kama Ler mara, kendo kochayo nyinga maler.  4To ka ji otemofwayo wach ng’at mochiwo nyathine ni Molek, mi ok ginege, 5to an awuonnabed jasik ng’atno, kaachiel gi dhoodgi duto.  Anang’ad kargi oko kuomogandagi, kaachiel gi jogo duto maluwe kendo madwanyore ka lamo Molek.
"Ka ng’ato oweya, modwanyore gi jonyakalondo kod ajuoke ma moko kakadhako weyo chwore kendo dwanyore gi chwo mamoko, to nabed jasik ng’atno,kendo nang’ad kare oko kuom ogandagi.  7Kuom mano puodhreuru ubed maler,nikech an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu aler.  8Nyaka urit chikena kendouluwgi, nimar an e Ruoth Nyasaye mapwodhou.
"Ka ng’ato oyanyo wuon mare kata min mare, to nyaka nege.  Rembenodong’ e wiye, nikech oseyanyo wuon gi min.  10Ka ng’at oterore gi chiwadgi, to ng’atno kaachiel gi dhakono nyaka negi.  11Ng’at moterore gichi wuon, oelo dug wuon mare.  Giduto ji ariyogo, nyaka neggi kendorembgi nodong’ e wigi.  12Ka ng’ato oterore gi chi wuode, to nyaka neggigiduto ji ariyogo, nikech gisetimo gima mono.  Rembgi nodong’ e wigi. 13Ka ng’ato onindo gi dichwo wadgi ka ng’ama terore gi dhako, gidutogitimo gima kuero.  Nyaka neggi, kendo rembgi nodong’ e wigi.  14Ka ng’atookendo nyako moro, kaachiel gi min nyakono to mano richo maduong’.  Nyakawang’gi gi mach giduto, mondo richo maduong makamano kik bed kuomu. 15Ng’at moterore gi chiayo moro amora nyaka negi.  Chiayono bende nyakanegi.  16Ka dhako moro odhi ir chiayo moro mondo oterre kode, to nyakaneg dhakono kaachiel gi chiayono.  Noneggi duto, kendo rembgi nodong’ ewigi.
"Ka ng’ato okawo nyamin mare ma nyar wuon kata ma nyar min, migiterore, to mano en wichkuot marach.  Nyaka neggi ka ji duto neno. Ng’atno oseterore gi nyamin, omiyo nyaka kume.  18Ka ng’ato oriwore gidhako ka nie due, to okuodo wi dhakono, nikech oseelo kama rembe wuokie;dhako bende oseelo kama rembe wuokie.  Giduto nyaka ng’ad kargi oko kuomogandagi.  19Kik iterri gi nyamin meru kata gi wayu, nikech mano en kethowat.  Joma timo kamano nyaka yud kum.  20Ng’at moterore gi chi owadgi wuonmare, okuodo wi wuon mareno, omiyo giniyud kum.  Noneggi, kendo nyingginolal nono kuom ogandagi.  21Ka ng’ato oterore gi chi owadgi, otimo gimaogak, kendo okuodo wi owadgi.  Nyinggi nolal nono kuom ogandagi.
"Nyaka urit chikena gi buchena duto, kendo uluwgi, mi piny ma akeloumondo udagie kik ng’ogu oko.  23Kik uluw timbe ogendini ma ariembonumondo owenu thuolo.  24Ne gitimo gik marichogo duto, mi asin kodgi, omiyonawachonu ni abiro miyou pinygi maber kendo momewno mondo ukaw.  An eRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mosepogou gi ogendini mamoko, 25omiyo un bendenyaka upog le mi chamo gi le makuero kod winy michamo gi winy makuero. Kik udok mogak nikech le kata winy, kata gimoro amora mamol, nimaraseketo pogruok e kindu kodgi, ka ahulonu ni gin gik makuero.  26Unubedjogo maler, nikech an Ruoth Nyasaye aler.  Asepogou gi ogendini mamokomondo ubed joga.
"Ng’ato ang’ata kuomu ma dichwo kata ma dhako ma janyakalondo kata maajuoga moro amora nyaka go gi kite mi otho, kendo rembe nodong e wiyeowuon. "Tim jo-Lawi 21Chike moket ni jodolo1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa ni mondo onyis jodolo ma joka Harun nikik jadolo moro amora tim gimoro ni ringre jadhoodgi moro motho, ma dimiobed mogak, 2mak mana ka ng’atno watne hie, kaka min kata wuon, katawuode kata nyare, kata owadgi, 3kata nyamin mare hie ma nyako ngili mapok okendi.  4To ka nyamin mareno osekendi, to kik otimne gimoro ma dimiobed mogak.
Jodolo kik liel yie wigi atuota, ka ginyisogo ni giywak, kata kikgitit yie tikgi, kata kik gisar dendgi.  6Nyaka gibed joma owal niNyasachgi, kendo kik gicha nying Nyasachgi, nikech gin ema gitimomisengni miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Misengnigo gin chiemb Nyasachgi,emomiyo nyaka gibed maler.  7Jadolo kik kend ohodho kata nyaka maonge giringre kata dhako ma chwore oriembo, nimar en ng’at maler mowal niNyasache.  8Unuwale ni Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech en e jachiw chiemo niNyasachu.  Nyaka ukwane ka ng’ama ler nikech an Ruoth Nyasaye ma apuodhojodolo, aler.  9Ka nyar jadolo odwanyore modoko ohodho, omiyo wuon marebedo mogak.  Nyaka wang’ nyakono gi mach mi tho. 10Jadolo maduong’ e kind owetene ma en jadolo moseol mo e wiye, mi owalmondo orwak lep dolo, kik we wiye koyuothore, kata kik yiech lawe,konyisogo gi iye owang’.  11Ok nodonj kama ng’at motho nitie ma dimi obedmogak, bed ni en wuon kata min.  12Kik owuog oa Kama Ler, nikech dipo kaomiyo Kama Ler mar Nyasache obedo mogak, nimar osewale gi mor wir marNyasache.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye. 13Jadolo maduong’ nyaka kend nyako ngili.  14Ok nokend nyako ma chworeotho, kata ma chwore oriembo, kata ma onge gi ringre, kata ma ohodho,15To nyaka okend mana nyako ngili moa e dhoodgi, mondo kik nyithinde bedmogak kuom kiko remb jo Lawi kata remb jomoko nono, nikech an e RuothNyasaye mapwodho jadolo maduong’. 16Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 17ni mondo onyis Harun niya, "Kuomtiengeu duto onge ng’at mong’ol ma nobi mondo ochiw chiemo ni Nyasache. 18Ng’ato ang’ata ma rang’ol kik sud machiegni, bed ni en muofu kata enputh kata ka dende kamoro okethore, kata ka gimoro otwi e dende, 19kataka tiende kata ka bade ong’ol, 20Kata ka thur wiye obiro, kata kaorachiero, kata ka wang’e dhuth, kata ka en gi aput kata adhola machuer,kata ka en buoch.  21Nyakwar Harun moro amora ma rang’ol ok nosudmachiegni mondo otim ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango miwang’o.  22Kaka orang’olkamano, kik osud machiegni mondo ochiw chiemo ni Nyasache.  Onyalo chamochiemb Nyasache, bed ni ogol chiemo kuom gik maler kata kuom gik malermoloyo.  23To kik osud machiegni gi Pasia kata gi kendo-mar-misango,nikech dipo ka omiyo kuondena maler obedo mogak ni mar orang’ol.  An eRuoth Nyasaye mapwodhogi. " 24Kamano e kaka Musa nowuoyo gi Harunkaachioel gi yawuote kod jo-Israel duto. Tim jo-Lawi 22Chike mag misengni1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyis Harun gi yawuote ni nyakagiritre ahinya ka gitiyo gi mich maler ma jo-Israel chiwona, nono togichayo nyinga maler.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye.  3Wachnigi ni, ka ng’ato moromogak osudo machiegni gi chiwo maler ma jo-Israel walo ni Ruoth Nyasaye,to nang’ad kare oko e nyima.  Mano en chik momakou nyaka chieng’.  An eRuoth Nyasaye.  4Nyakwar Harun moro amora man gi tuo mar dhoho, kata mangi nyach machuer, kik cham chiwo maler ka pok opwodhe.  Koro magi e jomaobedo mogak: Ng’at momulo gimoro mosegere kuom gima otho, kata ng’at manyote owuok, 5kata ng’at momulo gimoro mamol, kata ng’at momulo ng’atmogak.  6Ng’ato ang’ata momulo achiel kuom gik makamago nobed mogak nyakachieng’ podhi, kendo ok nocham chiwo malergo ka pok olwokore.  7Kachieng’ osepodho to nobed maler, eka bang’ mano onyalo chamo chiwomalergo, nikech gin chiembe.  8Kik ocham gima otho athoya kende, katachiayo ma ondiek onego, nikech kotimo kamano to obedo mogak.  An e RuothNyasaye.  9Jodolo nyaka rit chikna, nono to gidoko joketho, mi githo kuomchayo nyinga.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye mapwodhogi.
"Ng’ato ang’ata ma ok jadolo kik cham chiwo maler, kata en wendomolimo jadolo, kata en mana jatichne mondiki.  11To misumba ma jadoloong’iewo nyalo chamo chiwogo, kendo wasumbni monywol e dalane nyalochamo chiemben.  12Ka ng’at ma ok jadolo okendo nyar jadolo, to nyakonook nocham mich moyiedhi mogol kuom chiwo maler.  13To ka chwore otho,kata ka chwore oriembe kendo oonge gi nyathi, mi oduogo dak e dalagi, toonyalo chamo chiemb wuon mare.  To ng’ama ok jadolo kik cham chiemono.
"Ka ng’ato ochamo gimoro maler mochiw ni Ruoth nyasaye kokia, toenochul jadolo gino komedoe achiel kuom abich.  15Jadolo kik keth chiwomaler ma jo-Israel walo ni Ruoth Nyasaye 16ka giyie ni joma ok jodolochamogi, ma dimi jogo bed joketho kendo yud kum, nikech an e RuothNyasaye mapwodho gigo. "17Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa, 18ni mondo onyis Harun kod yawuote,kaachiel gi jo-Israel duto niya, "Ka ja-Israel moro amora kata japinymoro modak kuomu okelo chiwo mondo ochopgo kuong’ruok kata kaka chiwomokelo kuom herone owuon, mi ochiwe ni Ruoth Nyasaye ka misango miwang’opep mondo Ruoth Nyasaye oyie kode, 19to nyaka ochiw chiayo maonge songa,bed ni en rwath kata rombo kata diel.  20Kik uchiw chiayo man gi songanimar Ruoth Nyasaye ok nyal yie kode.  21Ka ng’ato otimo misango marchiwo gi dhiang’ kata gi rombo mondo ochopgo kuong’ruok, kata kaka chiwoma okelo kuom herone owuon, to nyaka obed chiayo malong’o maonge songaeka Ruoth Nyasaye noyie kode.  22Kik uchiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye chiayo moroma muofu kata ma rang’ol kata man gi songa kata kalanga, kata man gialuny kata bur.  Kik uket chiayo ma kamano e kendo-mar-misango mondo obedmisango miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  23Rwath kata rombo magana unyalotimogo misango ma ng’ato chiwo, to ok noyie kode kuom timo misangomichopogo kuong’ruok.  24Chiayo ma mendene otore kata ogol kata opuodikik chiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Tim ma kamano okwer e pinyu.  25Bende kik uyiekawo chiayo makamano kuom japiny moro mondo ochiw ni Nyasachu kachiembe.  Ka ging’ol kamano to gin gi songa mosiko, omiyo ok digimi RuothNyasaye yie kodu. "26Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni Musa niya, "Ka onywol nyaroya kata nyarombokata nyadiel, 27to ok onego poge gi min nyaka ndalo abiriyo rum.  Kochiweni Ruoth Nyasaye ka misango miwang’o chakre chieng’ mar aboro ka dhinyime, to noyie kode.  28Kik uneg dhiang’ gi nyathine, kata rombo ginyathine odiechieng’ achiel.  29Ka uchiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango marerokamano, to chiweuru kaka chik dwaro, mondo Ruoth Nyasaye oyie kodu. 30Nyaka chame duto chieng’no, kendo gimoro kik dong’ nyaka chop okinyi. An e Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Nyaka urit chikena kendo uluwgi.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye.  32Kik uchanyinga maler.  Jo-Israel nyaka mi nyinga maler duong’.  An e Ruoth Nyasayemapwodhou, 33kendo mane ogolou e piny Misri mondo obed Nyasachu.  An eRuoth Nyasaye. "Tim jo-Lawi 23Sewni moketi(Kwan
.
—
.
)1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa mondo onyis jo-Israel niya,
"Sewni maRuoth Nyasaye oketo e magi: Gin chokruok maler, ma nyaka ogonigi milomenikech gin sewni maga ma aseketo.  3Unuti tijeu kuom ndalo auchiel, tochieng’ mar abiriyo en chieng’ yueyo moyiedhi.  En odiechieng chokruokmaler, ma kik utimie tich moro amora, nikech en sabato mar Ruoth Nyasayekuonde duto mudakie.
"Sewni ma Ruoth Nyasaye oketo e magi: Gin chokruok maler ma ka kindegiochopo to nyaka ugo milome maggi.
"Due apar gang’wen, due mokwongo chakre odhiambo, en chieng’ Pasakamar Ruoth Nyasaye.  6To Sap Makati ma ok ketie thowi mar Ruoth Nyasayechakore tarik apar gabich mar dueno.  Unucham makati ma ok ketie thowikuom ndalo abiriyo.  7Chieng’ mokwongo mar jumano, unubed gi chokruokmaler, kendo ok unuti tijeu ma pile.  8Unuchiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengnimiwang’o kuom ndalo abiriyo.  Chieng’ mar abiriyo bende nobedie chokruokmaler, kendo ok unuti tijeu mapile. "9Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa mondo onyis jo-Israel niya,
"ka uchopoe piny ma abiro miyou, mi ukayoe cham, to nyaka ukel ni jadolo chammukwongo kayo higa ka higa.  11Jadolo nochiwgi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kamich moyiedhi chieng’ moluwo sabato mondo Ruoth Nyasaye oyie kodu.  12Tochieng’ onogo muchiwoe michno, nyaka uchiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye nyaim mahike achiel maonge songa mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep.  13To misangomar cham michiwo gi imno nobed mogo mayom moromo kiliko abiriyo, moruwgi mo.  Misango nyaka wang’ mondo odum tik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Tomisango miolo piny nobed divai moromo lita achiel.  14Kik ucham makati,kata cham molodi kata manumu, ka pok ochopo chieng’ michiwoe ni Nyasachumichne.  15Chakre chieng’ maluwo sabato mukeloe cham mar mich moyiedhi,nyaka ukwan jumbe abiriyo, 16to chieng’ maluwo sabato mar abiriyo nobedchieng’ mar piero abich.  Chiengno unutim misango mar cham gi cham marhiga manyien.  17Nyaka ukel makati ariyo mugolo e miechu kaka michmoyiedhi.  Nyaka losgi gi mogo mayom moromo kilo abiriyo moketie thowi,kendo nyaka chiwgi ni Ruoth Nyasaye ka chamb agwela.  18Bende nyaka uchiwmakati gi nyirombe abiriyo maonge songa, kendo ma hikgi achiel achiel,gi nyarwath achiel kod imbe ariyo.  Ginibed misango miwang’o pep mitimoni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Unuchiwgi kaachiel gi misango mar cham kod misangomiolo piny mondo obed misango miwango madum tik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye. 19Bende nyaka uchiw nyuok achiel mitimogo misango mar golo richo, kodnyiimbe ariyo ma hikgi achiel achiel mitimogo misengni mag sawo. 20Jadolo nyaka chiwgi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ka mich moyiedhi, kaachiel gimakati mag chamb gwel.  Ginibed mich moyiedhi michiwo e nyim RuothNyasaye, kendo ginidong’ ni jadolo.  21Unugo milome mar chokruok malerchieng’ onogo, kendo ok unuti tijeu mapile.  Mano en chik momakou ginyikwau nyaka chieng’, kamoro amora mudakie.
"Ka ukayo cham e puotheu, to kik uke nyaka giko puotheu, kata kikuhul abang’ tiang’.  Nyaka uwegi ni joma odhier kod jodak.  An e RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu. "23Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 24mondo onyis jo-Israel niya, "Dueachiel mar due mar abiriyo nobednu chieng’ yueyo ma unugoe milome gitung’ mondo obed chokruok maler.  25Kik utim tijeu mapile, to chiwuru niRuoth Nyasaye misango miwang’o. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 27mondo onyis jo-Isarel niya, "Due apardue mar abiriyono nobednu chieng’ migolonue richo.  Enobed chokruok malerma nyaka uriye kech, kendo uchiwie ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango miwang’o. 28Chieng’ onogo kik uti tich moro amora nikech en chieng’ pwodhruok,migolonue richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  29Emomiyo ng’ato kang’ato ma ok oriyo kech chiengno nyaka ng’ad kare oko kuom ogandagi. 30Anatiek ng’at motiyo tich moro amora chieng’no kang’ade oko kuomogandagi.  31Kik uti tich moro.  Mano en chik momakou gi nyikwau nyakachieng’, kamoro amora mudakie.  32Chieng’ono nobednu sabato mar yueyomaber, omiyo nyaka uri kech.  Chakre odhiambo mar due ochiko nyakaodhiambo mar due apar kik uti. "
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 34mondo onyis jo-Israel bende ni,chakre due apar gabich mar due abiriyono, Sap Kiche mar Ruoth Nyasayenobedie kuom ndalo abiriyo.  35Chieng’ mokwongo nobedie chokruok maler makik utiye tijeu mapile.  36Kuom ndalo abiriyogo nyaka uchiw ni RuothNyasaye misengni miwang’o, to chieng’ mar aboro chokruok maler nobedie. Chieng’no bende unuchiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango miwang’o.  En chokruokmitiekogo nyasi, omiyo kik uti tijeu mapile. 37Mago e sewni ma Ruoth Nyasaye oketo ma nyaka ogoe milome ni gin echokruok maler michiwoe ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni miwang’o kod misengnimiwang’o pep, kod misengni mag cham gi misengni mag sawo gi misengnimiolo piny, moro ka moro gi chieng’e.  38To ewi mago nitie sabato magRuoth Nyasaye kod chiwou moko duto gi mich muchopogo kuong’ruok mau, kodmago muchiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye kuom herou.
"To chakre due apar gabich nogo, due mar abiriyo, bang’ keyo, nyakautim sap Ruoth Nyasaye kuom ndalo abiriyo.  Chieng’ mokwongo nobedchieng’ yueyo mowal, to chieng’ mar aboro bende kamano.  40Chieng’mokwongono unukaw olembe mag yien mabeyo gi bede othidhe kod bede yienmotimo otie, kaachiel gi bede yien matwi e tiend aore, mi unubed mamor enyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kuom ndalo abiriyo.  41Nyaka utim sawonini Ruoth Nyasaye kuom ndalo abiriyo higa ka higa.  En chik momakou ginyikwau nyaka chieng’.  E due mar abiriyo nyaka utimie sawoni.  42Uduto maun jo-Israel nyaka ubed e kiche kuom ndalo abiriyo.  43Mondo omi nyikwauopar kaka namiyo jo-Israel odak e kiche ka ne agologi e piny Misri.  An eRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. "44Mano e kaka Musa nonyiso jo-Israel sewni ma Ruoth Nyasaye oketo. Tim jo-Lawi 24Tich rito taya(Wuok
.
-
)1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Chik jo-Israel mondo okelni morzeituni maler mondo ool e taya, mondo taya oliel pile, oko mar pasiamageng’o sandug rapar e Hemb Romo.  3Harun nyaka rit taya mondo osik kaliel pile e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, chakre odhiambo nyaka okinyi.  Mano enchik momakou gi nyikwau nyaka chieng’.  4Pile Harun nyaka rit teyni mankuom rachung taya maler mar dhahabu mochung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. "Makati miketo e nyim Nyasaye pile5 "Nyaka ukaw mogo, mi utedgo makati apar gariyo, ma moro ka moro otedgi mogo moromo kilo abiriyo.  6Nyaka uchan-gi e laini ariyo e mesa malermochung’ e nyim Ruothh Nyasaye, auchiel e laini ka laini.  7Unuket ubanimaler e laini ka laini, mondo obed rapar mar makati michiwo ni RuothNyasaye ka misango miwang’o.  8Chieng’ sabato ka chieng’ sabato Harunnochan makatigo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  Gin mich ma jo-Israel osingore ninochiw nyaka chieng’.  9Makatigo nodong’ ni Harun gi nyikwaye, kendoginichamgi kamoro moyang ni Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech en mich maler moloyo. En pok migolone nyaka chieng’ kuom misengni miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye. "Buch yanyo Nyasaye10Ne nitie ng’at moro e kambi jo-Israel ma min mare ne nyar Israel, towuon mare ne ja-Misri.  Nying min mare ne Shelomith, nyar Dibri maja-Dan.  Jalo nodhi modhaw gi ja-Israel moro.  11Nokwong’e koyanyo nyingmaler mar Ruoth Nyasaye, omiyo ne gikele ir Musa.  12Ne gikete e odtuech, ka girito gima Ruoth Nyasaye biro nyisogi. 13Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Gol ng’at moseyanyono oa ekambi, mondo ji duto mane owinje koyenyo oket lwetgi e wiye.  Bang’ejo-Israel duto ogoye gi kite nyaka otho.  15Nyaka iwach ni jo-Israel ning’ato ang’ata moyanyo Nyasache noyud kum kuom kethone.  16Ng’at moyanyonying Ruoth Nyasaye nyaka negi.  Oganda jo-Israel nyaka goye gi kitemotho.  Bed ni en jadak kata ja-Israel ema ohulo nying malerno nyakanege. Chike mag chulo kuor17 "Ka ng’ato ogoyo wadgi monego, to en bende nyaka nege.  18Ka ng’atoogoyo chiayo motho, to nyaka ochul chiayo kar chiayono.  19Ka ng’atoohinyo wadgi momiyo songa, to notimne mana kaka osetimono: 20Lero karlero, wang’ kar wang’, kendo lak kar lak.  Nyaka hiny ng’atno mana kakaosehinyo wadgi.
"Ng’at mogoyo chiayo monego, nyaka chul chiayo, 22to ng’at mogoyowadgi monego, en bende nonege.  Nyaka kum jadak mana kaka ikumoja-Israel, nimar an e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. "23Ka ne Musa osewacho ni jo-Israel kamano, ne gigolo ng’at ma neoyenyono oa e kambi, mi gigoye gi kite nyaka otho.  Ne gitimo mana kakaRuoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa. Tim jo-Lawi 25Higa mar Sabato, gi higa mar mor1 Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa e got Sinai 2mondo onyis jo-Israel niya,"Ka usechopo e piny ma abiro miyou, to pinyno nyaka rit sabato, kimiyogoRuoth Nyasaye duong’.  3Kuom mano higni auchiel unyalo chuoyo puotheu,kendo loso yiendu mag mzabibu, kendo kayo chambu gi pono olembeu.  4Tohiga mar abiriyo en sabato maler mimiyogo Ruoth Nyasaye duong’, ma pinynyaka yueye.  E higano, kik uchwo puotheu, kata kik ulos yiendu magmzabibu.  5Kik uka orowe, kendo kik upon mzabibu manyak kendgi e yienmane ok ulosogo, nikech en higa maler ma piny yueyoe.  6To kata kamano,gik ma piny ochiego e hik sabato nobed chiembu, kendo chiemb wasumbumachwo gi mamon, gi mar jotichu kod wendu, 7kendo mar jambu gi le maepinyu.  Gik moko duto ma piny ochiego nobed chiembu.
"Nyaka ukwann sabato abiriyo mag higni ma en higni abiriyo nyadibiriyo,tiende ni higni piero ang’wen gochiko.  9Due apar, due mar abiriyo ehigano, ma en chieng’ pwodhruok, unugo tung’ e pinyu duto.  10Kamanounuwal higa mar piero abich, kugoyo milome mondo obed higa miweyoejopinyu duto thuolo.  Higano nobed higa mar mor, ma ng’ato ka ng’atonodogie pinygi ir joodgi.  11Higa mar piero abichno nobednu higa mar mor. Kik uchuoye kata kik ukae orowe, kendo kik uponie mzabibu monyak anyakae yien mane ok uloso, 12ni mar en higa mar mor, ma nyaka uwal maler niRuoth Nyasaye.  Unucham gik monyak e lowo.
"E higa mar mor nogono, ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nodog thurgi.  14Kang’ato ng’iewo lop wadgi, to kik ng’ato wuond wadgi.  15Nyaka kwan higni,chakre higa mar mor mokadho, kendo nengo noket maromre gi higni ma podibiro keyoe.  16Ka hignigo ng’eny to nochul nengo mamalo, to ka ginok,nochul nengo mapiny, nikech cham mibiro kayoe ema ong’iewo.  17Kik ng’atokuomu wuond wadgi, to mondo uluor Nyasachu, nikech an e Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu.
"Rituru chikena, kendo uluwgi, eka unudag e pinyno gi kue.  19Lowonochieg cham, mi unuchiem muyieng’, kendo unudag gi kue.  20Kapo niupenjo gima ubiro chamo e higa mar abiriyo ka ok uchuoyo, kata ka okukeyo, 21to nadwoku kama: Abiro guedhou e higa mar auchiel, mi pinynochieg cham moromou chamo kuom higni adek.  22Kuchuoyo e higa mar aboro,to noyud ka pod uchamo cham machon.  Unubed kuchamo cham machon nyakachop uka cham manyien mar higa mar ochiko.
"Ka ng’ato ong’iewo lowo kuom wadgi, to lowono ok nobed mare nyakachieng’, nikech an e wuon lowo, to un un mana jodakna.  24E pinyu dutounuyie mondo puodho ma noseng’iew owar.
"Ka wadu moro odoko modhier, mi ong’iewo lope moro, to watne machiegninyaka war lowono.  26To ka ng’atno onge gi watne manyalo waro lowono, toen owuon onyalo ware koyudo pesa.  27Enokwan higni, chakre higa manong’iewe mi nochul ng’at ma nong’ieweno pesa moromo higni modong’ nyakahiga mar mor chopi.  Eka nokaw lope odok mare kendo.  28To ka ok onyalware, to lowono nodog e lwet ng’at ma ne ong’iewe cha nyaka chop higamar mor.  To e higa mar mor, lowono nowe odog ni wuon, mi wuon-go nokawe.
"Ka ng’ato oyie, mi wadgi ong’iewo ode mar dak manie dala mochiel giohinga, to onyalo ware mana ka higa achiel pok orumo nyaka ne ng’iewe. Higano duto enobed gi thuolo mar ware, 30to ka ok oware ka higa pokorumo, to odno nosik kobedo mar ng’at mane ong’iewe, kaachiel ginyikwaye nyaka chieng’.  Ok noweye odog ni wuon e higa mar mor.  31To udimanie mier ma ok ochiel gi ohinga nokwan mana kaka ikwano lowo.  Gin gikma inyalo waro, kendo e higa mar mor ginidog ni wegi.  32Jo-Lawi to nobedgi thuolo mochwere mar waro udi manie miechgi.  33Ka ja-Lawi moro okyowaro ode manie dalagi, to odno nyaka dogne e higa mar mor, nimar udimanie miech jo-Lawi e mwandugi e piny Israel.  34To puothe molworomiechgi ok nyal ng’iew, nikech gin mwandugi nyaka chieng’.
"Ka ja-Israel wadu odoko modhier ma ok onyal konyore, to nyaka okonyemana kaka unyalo konyo japiny moro kata wendo, kendo nodag kodu. 36Kuhole gimoro, to kik ukaw kuome ohala, to luoruru Nyasachu, kendouyie owadu odag kodu.  37Kik uhole pesa mondo uyudie ohala.  Kata kik ukawohala kuom chiemo muhole.  38An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mane ogolou epiny Misri mondo omiu piny Kanaan, kendo mondo obed Nyasachu.
"Ka wadu odoko modhier, kendo obiro iri, mi ing’iewe, to kik iketemondo otini ka misumba.  40To mondo obedi kaka jatich michulo, kendo kakawendo modak kodi.  Enotini nyaka chop higa mar mor, 41eka nowe tiyoni, minodog gi nyithinde kuom joodgi kendo e lop kwerene.  42Jo-Israel ginwasumbni maga mane agolo e piny Misri, emomiyo ok onego ng’iewgi kakaing’iewo wasumbni.  43Kik isand ja-Israel waduno to nyaka iluor Nyasachu.
"Kudwaro wasumbni machwo kata mamon, to unyalo ng’iewogi kuom ogendinimokiewo kodu.  45To bende unyalo ng’iewo nyithind jodak man kuomu, kodjoodgi monywol e piny, mi ginibed mwandu, 46kendo unyalo weyogi niyawuotu kusetho.  Unyalo loko jogo wasumbu nyaka chieng’, to jo-Israelweteu kik usand.
"Ka ja piny moro modak kuomu odoko jamoko, to wadu moro odoko modhier,mi odhi ir ng’atno kata ir jaodgi moro mi ong’iewe, 48to thuolo nitiemar ware.  Owadgi moro nyalo ware, 49kata owadgi wuon mare, kata wuodwuon kata watne moro amora.  To bende onyalo warore owuon, koyudo pesa. 50Enogo nengo gi jal mane ong’ieweno, ka gikwano higni chakre higa maneong’iewe nyaka chop higa mar mor.  Pesa monego dwok ni ng’at manong’ieweno nyaka bed maromre gi misara ma dine ng’atno ondikogo jatichkuom higni ma ng’atno osetiyonego.  51Enoware gi pesa maromre gi hignimodong’ to chop higa mar mor.  Ka hignigo ng’eny, to enochul pesamang’eny, 52to ka ginok, to nochul pesa matin.  53Nyaka rit ng’atnomachal gi jatich mondiki, bende kik uyie mondo ng’at mane ong’iewenoosande.  54Ka ng’atno ok owar e kinde modong’ ka pok higa mar mor ochopo,to nyaka weye odhi kaachiel gi nyithinde e higa mar mor, 55nikechjo-Israel gin wasumbini maga.  Gin maga ma nagolo e piny Misri.  An eRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Tim jo-Lawi 26Gueth miyudo kuom winjo chik(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
;
.
-
)
"Kik ulos kido mar nyasaye ma nono, kendo kik uchung kido mopa katasiro milamo.  Kidi moro amora mopa kik bed e pinyu mukulorune kulamo,nikech an e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  2Nyaka urit sabatona, kendo uluorKama Ler mara.  An e Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Ka uwuotho e yorena, mi urito chikena, kendo uluwogi, 4to anakelnukoth e kinde mowinjore, mi pinyu nochieg cham kendo yiendu nonyagolembe.  5Unudin cham nyaka e kinde miponoe mzabibu, kendo unupon mzabibunyaka kinde michwoyoe.  Unuyud chiemo moromou, kendo unudag e pinyu gikue.
"Anakel kue e pinyu, mi ununind maonge luoro.  Anatiek ondiegi e pinyu,kendo lweny ok nomi pinyu kethre.  7Unuriemb wasiku, kendo ununeggi.  8Jouabich nobed gi teko mar riembo ji mia achiel, kendo jou mia achiel nobedgi teko mar riembo ji gana apar, mi unutiek wasiku.
"Anabed ka aguedhou, mi anami unyuol kendo unya mathoth, kendo anachopsingruok duto ma natimo kodu.  10Chambu machon ma nie dereu noromu chamonyaka chop kinde ma uwitogie, mondo uyud kama ukanoe cham manyien. 11Analos kar dakna kuomu, kendo ok najuang’u.  12Anawuoth e dieru koni gikoni, mi nabed Nyasachu, kendo unubed joga.  13An e Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu ma nogolou e piny Misri mondo uwe bedo wasumb jo-Misri.  Aseturolodi ma ne otuenu, mi omiyo koro uwuotho tir. Kum miyudo kuom tamruok winjo chik(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
"To ka utamoru winja, kendo ok urito chikenago duto, 15mi udagibuchena, kendo ok uluwo yorena, mi uketho singruok ma ne atimo kodu,16to ng’euru malong’o ni anatimnu kama: Anapou gi masira kendo gi thomarach kod tuo mayuyo wang’, kendo ma miyo del dhi.  Chambu muchwoyo oknokonyu, nimar wasiku ema nochamgi.  17Anabed mosin kodu, mi wasikunonegu.  Unubed e bwo loch joma mon kodu, kendo unubwogru gi ng’wech kataka onge joma lawou.
"Ka pod utamoru winja bang’ gigo duto, to anamed kumou nyadibiriyokuom richou.  19Anaketh sunga mar wich teko ma un go.  Anami polo malorieny ka chuma, kendo piny mwalo dok matek ka mula.  20Unuketh tekreunono kuchwoyo, nimar chambu ok nochiegi, kata mana yiendu bende oknonyag olembe.
"Ka pod upiem koda, mutamoru winja, to nakelnu masichenyadibiriyo marom gi richou.  22Anaor ondiegi mondo omak nyithindu, miginineg jambu kendo ginimi udong’ manok, bende wang’yore duto muluwonotho.
