Wabiro tho waduto koso?"Kwan 18Pok jodolo gi jo-Lawi1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Harun niya, "In gi yawuoti, kaachiel gijodhoodu duto, ema unubed ka urito tich Kama Ler, kendo gimoro amoramarach motimore kuome nobed wachu.  To gimoro amora motimore marach kuomtich dolo, nobed wachni kaachiel gi yawuoti.  2Iniwe jodhoodu ma jokaLawi bed kodu kendo konyu, kutiyo gi yawuoti e nyim Hemb Rapar.  3Ginibedka gikonyou, mi gitiek tije duto mag Hema, to kik gisud machiegni gi gikmaler, kata gi kendo-mar-misango, nono to githo kaachiel gi un bende. 4Ginibed kodu, kendo ginikaw ting’ duto mag rito Hema e yo moro amora,to onge ng’at ma ok jadolo ma nosud machiegni kodu.  5To un uwegi unubedkutiyo tije mag Kama Ler, kod tich dolo e kendo-mar-misango, mondomirima mager mar Ruoth Nyasaye kik bi kuom jo-Israel kendo.  6An awuonasepogo joweteu ma jo-Lawi kuom dhout Israel mamoko duto mondo achiwnugika joma owalna mondo orit Hema.  7To in gi yawuoti kende ema nyaka utitichu mar dolo mitimo e kendo-mar-misango, kendo mitimo e tok Pasia. Tich dolono e tich ma amiyou.  Ng’ato ang’ata ma ok jadolo motiyo tichdolo nyaka negi. "8Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho ni Harun niya, "An awuon aketo e lwetimich duto, tiende ni chiwo maler duto ma jo-Israel okelo.  Amiyigi kapokni kaachiel gi nyikwayi, kaluwore gi chik mochwere.  9Gima ogol kuomchiwo moro amora maler moloyo, ma ok owang’ e kendo-mar-misango, nobedmari gi nyikwayi, bed ni en misango mar cham, kata mar golo richo, katamipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, mochiwna ka mich maler moloyo.  10Unuchamekaluwore gi chik mar chamo gik maler moloyo, kendo ng’ato ang’ata kuomuma dichwo nyalo chame, enobed gima ler.
"Gik ma jo-Israel chiwo ka mich moyiedhi bende nobed mau.  Achiwonugikaachiel gi yawuoti kod nyigi, kaluwore gi chik mochwere.  Ng’ato ang’atamae odi ma ok ogak nyalo chamogi.
"Amiyou mo maber gi divai manyien mabeyo duto gi cham mabeyo, tiendeni cham agwela mochiw ni Nyasaye.  13Olembe duto mokwong pon e pinyu,mokel ni Ruoth Nyasaye nobed mau.  Ng’ato ang’ata mae odi ma ok ogaknyalo chamogi.
"Gimoro amora mochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye chuth e Israel nobed maru.
"Nyithindo makayo duto michiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye nobed mau, bed ni ginmag dhano kata mag le.  To nyaka war nyitnindo duto makayo mag dhano kodmag le ma ok ler.  16Ka gisetieko due achiel, to nyaka wargi gi shekelabich abich, mopim gi rapim mitiyogo e tich Nyasaye (shekel achiel oromogera piero ariyo. ) 17To kik wariw nyithindo makayo mag dhok kata magrombe kata mag diek, nimar gin jamni maler.  Nyak ukir rembgi e kendo-marmisango, kendo uwang’ bochegi kutimogo misango miwang’o mondo odum tikmamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  18Ringgi to nodong’nu mana kaka agoko gi em makorachwich mag mich moyiedhi dong’nu.
"Mich duto mag gik maler ma jo-Israel chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye, amiyo giyawuoti kod nyigi, kaluwore gi chik mochwere.  Mano en singruok mosiko maok kethre, ma Ruoth Nyasaye otimo kodi kaachiel gi nyikwayi bende. "20Ruoth Nyasaye nomedo wacho ni Harun niya, "In ok nibed gi lowo mopognie piny jo-Israel.  Ok ginipogni kata lithe matin, nimar an e mwandunikendo e pokni.
"Jo-Lawi to amiyo achiel kuom apar mag gik moko duto obed pokgi kuomtich rito Hemb Romo.  22Jo-Israel ok nochak osud machiegni gi Hema, nonoto githo.  23To jo-Lawi ema nobed ka tiyo tich Hema, kendo gimoro amoramarach motimore kuome nobed wachgi.  Mano e chik momakou gi nyikwau nyakachieng.  Ok giniyud lowo moro mopognigi kuom jo-Israel, 24nimar amiyogiachiel kuom apar mag gik moko ma jo-Israel chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye, mondoobed mwandugi.  Mano emomiyo anyisogi ni ok giniyud lowo mopognigi kuomjo-Israel. "25Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyis jo-Lawi kama, "Kajo-Israel chiwonu achiel kuom apar mag mwandugi, ma amiyou ka poku, toun bende nyaka uchiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye achiel kuom apar mag gigo. 27Chiwono nokwan mana ka cham mogol kar dino, kata divai mogol karbicho.  28Mano e kaka unugol ni Ruoth Nyasaye chiwo mogol kuom achielkuom apar duto ma uyudo kuom jo-Israel.  Chiwo mugolo ni Ruoth Nyasayenonyaka umi Harun jadolo.  29Kuom chiwo duto muyudo, unugolie mich michiwoni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Nyaka uchiw mana mabeyo moloyoe kuomgi.
"Bende wach ni jo-Lawi niya, "Ka usegolo ni Ruoth Nyasaye mich mabeyomoloyo kuom poku, to modong’ nobednu ka cham mogol kar dino, kata divaimogol kar bicho.  31Unyalo chamogi kamoro amora gi joodu.  En e pok muyudokuom tiyo e Hemb Romo.  32Ka usegolo ni Ruoth Nyasaye gik mabeyoe moloyokamano, to ok unubed joketho kuom wachno, kendo ok nobed ni udwanyo gikmaler ma jo-Israel ochiwo, ma dimi utho. "Kwan 19Chike mag pwodho joma ogak1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Harun mondo onyis jo-Israel chikmoseketno, kowacho miya,
"Wachnigiuru ni mondo gikel ni Musa dhiang’malando ha maonge songa, kendo ma pok otuene jok.  3Nyaka ichiwe niEleazar jadolo mondo ogole oko yo wuokchieng’ mar kambi, kendo onegekuno.  4Eleazar jadolo nogwel remo gi lith lwete, kendo nokir nyadibiriyokochomo yo ka nyim Hemb Romo.  5Nyaka wang’ dheno mana e wang’e koneno;piene gi ringre gi rembe kod owuoche duto nyaka wang’.  6Jadolo nokawyiend sida gi owino kod usi makwar, mi nobolgi e chuny mach ma dhiang’wang’ie.  7Bang’e enolwok lepe kendo nolwokre gi pi, eka onyalo donjo ekambi, to kata kamano, pod nosik kogak nyaka chieng’ podhi.  8Ng’atmowang’o dheno nolwok lepe, kendo nolwokre, to en bende nosik kogaknyaka chieng’ podhi.  9Bang’ mano, ng’at ma ok ogak nojow buch dheno, minodhi oole oko mar kambi, kamoro maler.  Nyaka kan buruno mondo ogandajo-Israel olosgo pi mar pwodhruk, nikech dheno otimgo misango mar goloricho.  10Ng’at mane ojowo buch dheno nyaka lwok lepe, to en bende nosikkogak nyaka chieng’ podhi.  Chikni omako jo-Israel nyaka chieng, kaachielgi jopinje mamoko modak kuomgi.
"Ng’at momulo ng’at motho nobed mogak kuom ndalo abiriyo.  12Enopwodhregi pi pwodhruok chieng’ mar adek gi chieng’ mar abiriyo, to nosik kogak. 13Ng’ato momulo ng’at motho, to ok nopwodhre, ochido Hema Maler marRuoth Nyasaye.  Ng’atno nong’ad kare oko kuom jo-Israel.  Pi pwodhruok neok kir kuome, omiyo osiko kogak.
"Ka ng’ato otho e hema, to chik moketi ema: Ng’ato ang’ata modonjo ehemano, kata ng’ato ang’ata manie hemano nobed mogak kuom ndalo abiriyo,15kendo agulu manie hemano ma dhoge ni nono ma ok oum, bende nobedmogak.  16Kata ka ng’at man oko omulo ng’at moneg e lweny kata ng’at maotho athoya, kata omulo choke dhano kata mana liel obedo mogak kuomndalo abiriyo.  17Kuom gak ma kamano, ginikaw buch misango mar goloricho, mi giruw gi pi aora manie agulu.  18Bang’e ng’at ma ok ogak nokawowino mi nolut e pigno, eka nokir e hema kod e gik moko manie iye,kaachiel gi ji duto ma tho ng’atno oyudo kanyo.  Ng’at momulo chokedhano, kata ng’at monegi, kata ng’at motho athoya, kata momulo liel,bende nokir pigno kuome.  19Ng’at ma ok ogak nyaka kir pigno kuom ng’atmogak chieng’ mar adek gi chieng’ mar abiriyo, mi chieng’ mar abiriyonodok mopwodhore kuom gakne.  Nolwok lepe, kendo nolwokre, eka nobedmaler ka chieng’ opodho.
"To ka ng’at ma ogak ok opwodhore, to nyaka ng’ad kare oko kuomogandagi, nimar dochid Kama Ler mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  Pi pwodhruok ok okirkuome, omiyo osiko kogak.
"Chikno omakou nyaka chieng’.  Ng’at makiro pi pwodhruok nyaka lwoklepe, kendo ng’ato ang’ata momulo pigno nobed mogak nyaka chieng’ podhi. 22Gimoro amora ma ng’at mogak omulo bedo mogak, kata ng’at momulo ginobende bedo mogak nyaka chieng’ podhi. "Kwan 20Pi owuok e lwanda(Wuok
.
-
)1E due mokwongo, oganda jo-Israel duto nochopo e thim Zin, kendo negibet Kadesh kuom kinde mogwarore.  Kanyo ema Miriam nothoe, moyikee.
Pi ne onge ni jo-Israel kanyo, omiyo ne gichako ng’ur ni Musa giHarun.  3Ne gidhaw gi Musa ka giwacho niya, "Mad ne watho kaachiel gijowetewa mane otho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye! 4Ere gima omiyo isekelo ogandamar Ruoth Nyasaye e thimni mondo wathoe kaachiel gi jambwa? 5Ang’omomiyo nigolowa Misri kikelowa kama rach ma kata cham kata ng’owo katamzabibu kata komamanga ok nyagie, bende onge kata mana pi ma dwamodhi?"6Musa kod Harun nodhi e Hema Miromoe gi Nyasaye e nyim jo-Israel.  Negipodho piny auma, mi duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nothinyore. 7Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Kaw ludhi, kendo in gi Harunowadu, uchok jo-Israel kanyakla, kendo chik lwanda mondo ogol pi ka jiduto neno.  Kamano inigol pi e lwanda mondo oganda omodhi, kaachiel gijambgi. " 9Musa nokawo ludhno e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mowuokgo kaka RuothNyasaye nosechike.  10Bang’e Musa gi Harun nochoko oganda kanyakla e nyimlwandano.  Musa nowachonigi niya, "Winjuru un joma tokgi tekgi! Uparo ninyaka wagolnu pi e lwandani koso?" 11Eka noting’o bade mogoyo lwandanodiriyo gi ludhe.  Pi nobubni mang’eny, mi oganda nomodho kaachiel gijambgi.  12To Ruoth Nyasaye nowachi ni Musa gi Harun niya, "Ne ok ugenamoromo nyiso jo-Israel ni an ng’ama ler! Kuom mano ok unyal teroogandani nyaka piny mane asingora ni namigi. "13Mago e sokni mag Meriba, kama ne jo-Israel odhawie gi Ruoth Nyasaye minonyisogi ni en ng’ama ler.  (Tiend Meriba en dhaw. )Jo-Edom otamo jo-Israel kadho e pinygi14Kane jo-Israel ni Kadesh, Musa nooro joote ir ruodh Edom, kowachoniya, "Owadu Israel owacho kama: Ing’eyo malong’o chandruok dutomwaseyudo, 15kendo kaka kwerewa nodhi Misri, mi wasedak kuno kuom hignimang’eny.  Jo-Misri nothagowa malit mana kaka ne githago kwerewa, 16tokane waywak ni Ruoth Nyasaye mondo okonywa, nowinjo ywakwa, mooromalaika mogolowa Misri, omiyo koro wan Kadesh, dala ma en tong’ pinyi. 17Wakwayi ni yie wakadhi e pinyi.  Ok wananyon puotheu mag cham kata magmzabibu, kendo ok wanamodh e sokniu.  Wanaluw mana Ndach Ruoth, kendo okwanabar korachwich kata koracham nyaka wakadh pinyi. " 18To jo-Edomnodwoke niya, "Ok unyal kadho e pinywa, nono to wamonjou. " 19Tojo-Israel nowacho niya, "Donge wabiro mana luwo Ndara? To kata ka wan gijambwa wamodho piu to wanachulu.  Omiyo wewauru wang’ad ang’ada. " 20Tojo-Edom ne ok oyienigi mondo gikadhi, kendo ne giwuok gi jolweny mathothmondo girad kodgi.  21Kamano jo-Edom notamo jo-Israel kadho e pinygi, mijo-Israel notando, moluwo komachielo. Harun otho e got Hor22Oganda jo-Israel nowuok Kadesh, modhi e got Hor.  23Ruoth Nyasayenowacho ni Musa gi Harun e got Hor man but tong’ piny Edom niya,
"Harun biro tho, mi luw kwerene, to ok nodonji e piny ma nasingora ninami jo-Israel, nikech nudagi rito chikna kuom pi Meriba.  25Kaw Harunkod Eleazar wuode mondo uidhgo got Hor.  26Eka ilony lep Harun mondoirwakni Eleazar wuode.  Harun to notho mana kanyo, koluwo kwerene. "27Musa notimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike, mi ne giidho got Hor, kaoganda duto neno.  28Nolonyo lep Harun, morwako ni Eleazar wuod Harun. Harun to notho ewi got kanyo.  Bang’e Musa gi Eleazar nolor piny oa egot.  29Kane oganda jo-Israel oneno ni Harun osetho, ne giywage kuomndalo piero adek. Kwan 21Jo-Kanaan omonjo jo-Israel1 Kane ja-Kanaan ma ruodh Arad mane odak yo milambo mar pinyno owinjo nijo-Israel biro koluwo yor Atharim, nomonjogi momako jomoko kuomgi.  2Ekajo-Israel nokuong’ore ni Ruoth Nyasaye kawacho niya, "Ka ichiwo jogi elwetwa, to wabiro ketho miechgi chuth. " 3Ruoth Nyasaye nowinjo kwayogi,mi ochiwo jo-Kanaan e lwetgi.  Ne gitiekogi kendo giketho miechgi chuth,mi gichako kanyo ni Horma, (tiende ni, keth. )Thuond mula4 Bang’e ne gia got Hor ka giluwo yor Nam Makwar malworo piny Edom.  5Tone gichako ng’ur ka gin e yo, mi giywak ni Nyasaye kod Musa, ka giwachoniya, "Ere gimomiyo usegolowa e piny Misri mondo watho e thimni, kamaonge chiemo kata pi? Chiemo marachni ojogowa!" 6Eka Ruoth Nyasaye noorothuonde man gi kwiri mager, mokayo jo-Israel kendo onego ji mang’eny. 7Omiyo ji nobiro ir Musa, mowachone niya, "Ne waketho kuom ng’ur niRuoth Nyasaye kod in.  Yie ikwanwa Ruoth Nyasaye mondo ogol thuonde okokuomwa. " Kuom mano Musa nokwayonigi Ruoth Nyasaye, 8mi Ruoth Nyasayenowachone niya, "Los thuond mula, igur e luth mabor.  Ka ng’ato thuolokayo, mi orango thuond mulano to nochangi. " 9Kamano Musa noloso thuondmula moketo e luth, ni, ka ng’ato thuol okayo, mi orango thuond mulano,to chango. Jo-Israel owuotho kalworo piny Moab10Jo-Israel nodhi nyime gi wuoth, moguro kambi kamoro miluongo ni Oboth. 11Bang’e gia Oboth, mi gidhi giguro kambi Iye-abarim, e thim man yowuokchieng’ mar piny Moab.  12Ka ne gia kanyo, to ne gidhi mi gigurokambi e hoho mar Zared.  13Eka ne gia Arnon e thim momakore gi pinyjo-Amor.  Aora Arnon ne ni e tong’ piny jo-Moab gi piny jo-Amor.  14Manoemomiyo Kitap Lwenje mag Ruoth Nyasaye wuoyo kuom Vaheb man Sufa, kodhohni man kuno niya,
"Arnon kod hohni motimo thidhya,gi piny maridore kochomo mier mag Ar,kod tong’ piny Moab. "16Jo-Israel noa aora Arnon modhi Beer, (tiende ni soko. ) Mano e sokomane Ruoth Nyasaye owuoyo kuome ni Musa niya, "Chok ji kaachiel mondoami pi. "
"Chieng’no ema jo-Israel nowerie niya,In soko, bubni oko!Waweruru ni soko!18En soko mane jodongo okunyogi ludhe kod odungnigi,mi obedo chiwo manie thim. "19Ne gia Beer, mi gidhi Nahaliel, kendo ne gia Nahaliel, mi gidhiBamoth.  20Bang’ a Bamoth, ne gidhi e holo man piny Moab ewi got Pisga,kama inyalo nenogo thim. Jo-Israel oloyo Sihon(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)21Jo-Israel nooro joote ir Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, ka gikwaye niya,
"Yienwa mondo wakadh e pinyi.  Ok wananyon puotheu mag cham kata magmzabibu.  To bende ok wanamodh e sokniu.  Wanaluw mana Ndach Ruoth nyakachop wakadh pinyi. " 23To Sihon ne ok oyie mondo jo-Israel okad e pinye. Ne ochoko joge duto, mi owuok mondo oked gi jo-Israel e thim.  Nodhinyaka Jahaz, momonjogi kuno.  24To jo-Israel nonegogi oyokre, mokawopinygi, chakre aora Arnon nyaka aora Jabok, ma en tong’ piny jo-Amon,kuma ne giyudoe ka weg pinyno rateke.  25Kuom mano jo-Israel nokawo miechjo-Amorgo duto, modakie.  Miego ne gin Heshbon kod mier matindo mage. 26Hesbon ne dala maduong’ mar Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, mane oyudo osekedo giruodh Moab machon, mi okawo pinye nyaka aora Arnon.  27Mano emomiyo jowernochuogo wer niya,"Biuru Heshbon, biuru!Wageruru dala Sihon obed kaka chon,
nimar mach nomuoch Heshbon!Ee, mach noliel e dala Sihon. Noketho Ar dala Moab,kendo notieko gode mag Arnon. 29A yaye Moab!Uromo, un jo-Kemosh. Kemosh oseriembo yawuote,moringo, kendo osemiyo Sihon ruodh Amor omako nyige. 30Nyikwagi orumo, chakre Heshbon nyaka Dibon,to mach pod liel kochomo Medeba!"31Kamano jo-Israel nokawo piny jo-Amor, modakie. Jo-Israel oloyo Og ruodh Bashan(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)32Eka Musa nooro joote mondo odhi ocheng Jazer, mi jo-Israel nokawe,kaachiel gi mier matindo mage, kendo ne giriembo jo-Amor mane oyudo odakkuno.  33Bang’e ne giwichore mi giluwo yo mochomo Bashan.  Og ruodh Bashankod joode duto nobiro Edrei, mondo oked kodgi.  34To Ruoth Nyasayenowacho ni Musa niya, "Kik iluore, nimar asechiwe e lweti, kaachiel gijoge duto kod pinye.  Timne mana kaka nitimo ni Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, maneodak Heshbon. " 35Kamano jo-Israel nonego Og kaachiel gi yawuote kod jogeduto, nyaka ne onge kata ng’at achiel modong’, mi ne gikawo pinyegidakie. Kwan 22Balak oluongo Balaam1Jo-Israel nodhi moguro kambi e piny Moab mamwalo, man yo wuokchieng’mar aora Jordan, kama omanyore gi Jeriko. 2Balak wuod Zipor nowinjo gima ne jo-Israel otimo ni jo-Amor.  3Tojo-Moab bende kihondko malich nomako, nikech ne gineno ka jo-Israelng’eny ahinya.  4Omiyo ne giwacho ni jodong Midian niya, "Oganda maduong’malichni biro nang’owa mana kaka dede nang’o lum. " Balak wuod Zipor,mane ruodh Moab e kindego, 5nooro joote ir Balam wuod Beor mane oyudo niPethor but aora Yufrate e piny jo-Amav, kowachone niya, "Oganda maduong’moa e piny Misri osebiro, mi opong’o piny, kendo othung’a marach.  6Omiyobi piyo mondo ikuong’gi nikech ging’eny ahinya mohewowa.  Bang’e dipo kaaloyogi, mi ariembogi oko e pinywa, nikech ang’eyo ni joma igwedho toyudo gueth, to joma ikwong’o to yudo kuong’. "7Jodong Moab gi Midian ne jokawo gik michulo jokor, mi gidhi ir Balaam,kendo ginyise kaka Balak oorogi.  8Balaam nowachonigi niya, "Ninduru kaotienoni, kendo abiro wachonu gima Ruoth Nyasaye onyisa kuom wachni. "Kuom mano jodong Moabgo nonindo ka Balaam.  9Eka Nyasaye nofwenyore niBalaam, mopenje niya, "Joma olimigo oa kanye?" 10Balaam nodwoke niya,"Balak wuod Zipor ma ruodh Moab ema oseorogi ira, konyisa ni 11ogandamaduong’ osea e piny Misri mopong’o piny.  Omiyo odwaro ni mondo adhiakuong’negi, eka dipo ka oloyogi, mi oriembogi. " 12To Nyasaye nowacho niBalaam niya, "Kik idhi kodgi, to bende kik ikuong’ jogo nikech gin jomaoguedhi. " 13Kuom mano, kane Balaam ochiew gokinyi, nonyiso jodongo maneBalaam ooro niya, "Doguru thuru nimar Ruoth Nyasaye osekwera ni kik adhikodu. " 14Omiyo jodong Moabgo noa modok ir Balak, monyise ni Balaamosedagi biro kodgi. 15Eka Balak nochako ooro jodongo moko mang’eny kendo madongo moloyo maneoseoro mokwongo.  16Ne gibiro ir Balaam, mi giwachone niya, "Balaam wuodZipor oorowa mondo wanyisi kama, ‘Kik gimoro moni biro ira, 17nikechabiro miyi duong’ miwuoro, kendo anatimni gimoro amora miwacho.  Omiyonyaka ibi mondo ikuong’na jogi. ’ " 18To Balaam nodwoko jodong Balakniya, "Kata ka bed ni Balak dwaro miya fedha gi dhahabu duto manie ode,to ok anyal chayo chik Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha e yo moro amora.  19Tokata kamano, ninduru ka gotienoni kaka ne jou mokwongo ka onindo mondoawinj ane gima nyien ma Ruoth Nyasaye nyalo nyisa kuom wachno. "20Nyasaye nofwenyore ni Balaam gotieno, mowachone niya, "Ka jogo osebiroluongi, to dhi kodgi.  To nyaka itim mana gima abiro wachoni. " 21Omiyokane Balaam ochiew gokinyi, nogawo kanje, modhi gi jodong Moab. Malaika kod kanj Balaam22To kata kamano Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho nikech Balaam ne dhi, omiyo kaneBalaam biro koidho kanje, ka en gi jotichne ariyo, malaika mar RuothNyasaye nobiro mochung’ e nyime mondo ogeng’ne kik okadhi.  23Kane kanynaoneno malaika kochung’ e yo gi ligangla, nobaro moweyo yo, to Balaamnochwade mondo oduog e yo.  24Eka malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nodhimochung’ kamoro ma yo dinygo e kind puothe mag mzabibu, kama ochiel giohinga koni gi koni.  25Kanyna noneno malaika kochung’ kanyo, mi norere eohinga, kendo odiyo tiend Balaam e ohingano, mi Balaam nochako chwade. 26Bang’ mano, malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nosudo modhi ochung’ kamoromadiny ma ng’ato ok nyal baroe korachwich kata koracham.  27Kane kanynaoneno malaika kanyo, nonindo gi Balaam piny, mi mano nomiyo Balaammirima, mochwade gi ludhe.  28Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo kanyna owuoyo, kapenjo Balaam niya, "Koro igoya didek, to ere gima aseketho?" 29Balaamnowachone niya, "Isebedo kichanda, kendo ka dabed ni an gi ligangla, todikoro asenegi!" 30To kanyna nopenjo Balaam niya, "To donge an e kanjima isebedo kiidho pile? Bende asetimonie gima kamano nyaka nene?" Balamnodwoke ni, "Ooyo. " 31Eka Ruoth Nyasaye noyawo wang’ Balaam monenomalaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye kochung’ e yo gi ligangla.  Nokulore, mopodhopiny auma e nyim malaika.  32Malaika nopenje niya, "Ere gima omiyo inyalogoyo kanji didek kamano? Ne abiro mondo ageng’ni, to ne ichoma mana tir,33to ka kanji nende onena didek, mobaro oa e yo.  To ka da bed ni okobaro, to dikoro asenegi, mi aweye odhi. " 34Balaam nowacho ni malaikamar Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Aseketho.  Ne ok ang’eyo ni ichung’ e nyima e yomondo igeng’na.  To koro ka wuodhani ok berni, to ayie dok dala. " 35Tomalaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Dhiyo adhiya gi jogo, tonyaka iwach mana gima abiro nyisi. " Omiyo Balaam nodhi adhiya gi jodongBalak. Balaam gi Balak36Kane Balak owinjo ni Balaam biro, nowuok modhi nyaka Ar e piny Moabbut aora Arnon manie tong’ pinye, mondo oromne.  37Balak nopenjo Balaamniya, "Donge naoroni joote ndalo mang’eny mondo oluongi? Ang’o ma neomoni biro? Koso ne iparo ni ok anyal miyi duong’?" 38Balaam nodwokeniya, "Eri asebiro, to koro ere teko ma an-go ma dawachgo gimoro amora?Wach moro amora ma Nyasaye omiya ema abiro wacho. " 39Kamano Balam nejodhi gi Balak nyaka Kiriath-huzoth, 40mi Balak oyang’o dhok gi rombe niBalaam kod jodongo ma ne ni kode. Balaam oguedho jo-Israel41Kinyne gokinyi Balak nokawo Balaam motero ewi got miluongo niBamoth-baal, kuma ne onyalo nenogo oganda jo-Israel duto. Kwan 231Eka Balam nowacho ni Balak niya, "Gerna kende abiriyo mag misango ka,kendo kelna ruedhi abiriyo gi imbe abiriyo. " 2Balak notimo kamano,mochiwo rwath achiel gi im achiel e kendo ka kendo mar misango.  3Ekanowachoni Balaam niya,
"Aseloso kende abiriyo mag misango kendoasechiwo rwath achiel gi im achiel e kendo ka kendo. " Balaam nowacho niBalak niya, "Chung’ e bath misango misechiwo to an iweya adhi kenda. Kamoro dipo ka Ruoth Nyasaye ofwenyorena, kendo gimoro amora mowachonaabiro nyisi. " Kamano nowuok modhi, kendo Nyasaye nofwenyorene 5monyiseweche ma onego owachi, kowachone niya, "Dog ir Balak, kendo iwachne manakaka anyisi. " 6Omiyo nodok moyudo Balak kochung’ e bath misango maneosechiwo, kaachiel gi jodong Moab duto.  7Eka ne Balaam ohulo wach moakuom Nyasaye kama:"Balak ruodh Moab oseoma Arampiny gode man wuok chieng’ kowachona niya,‘Bi mondo ikuong’na joka Jakobo!Bi ikwer jo-Israel. ’8To ere kaka dakwong’joma Nyasaye ok osekuong’o?Ere kaka dakwerjoma Ruoth Nyasaye ok osekwero?9Anenogi kachung’ ewi lwendni maboyo,kendo arangogi gi ewi gode. Aneno oganda modak kar kende,ma ok oseriworegi ogendni mamoko. 10Ere ng’ama nyalo kwano oganda joka Jakobo,kata manyalo riwokar romb jo-Israel?Weuru atho kaka joma kare tho,kendo abed achiel kodgi. "11Bang’ mano Balak nowacho ni Balaam niya, "Mano to ang’o misetimono? Nealuongi mondo ikuong’na wasika, to in koro isemana guedhogi!" 12ToBalaam nodwoke niya, "Donge nyaka awach mana gima Ruoth Nyasayeosenyisa?"13Eka Balak nowachone niya, "Bi mondo ateri kamoro machielo ma inyalonenogo mana bath jo-Israel konchiel, to ok giduto, mondo ikuong’nagikanyo. " 14Kamano ne otero Balaam e paw Zofim ewi got Pisga, kendonogeroe kende abiriyo mag misango, mi ochiwoe rwath achiel gi im achiele kendo ka kendo.  15Eka ne Balaam owacho ni Balak niya, "Chung’ butmisango misechiwo, an to adhi romo gi Nyasaye kucha. " 16Ruoth Nyasayenofwenyore ni Balaam monyise gima onego owachi kowachone niya, "Dog irBalak kendo iwach mana kaka anyisi. " 17Omiyo nodok, moyudo ka Balakochung’ e bath misangone kaachiel gi jodong Moab.  Balak nopenjo gimaRuoth Nyasaye owacho.  18Mi Balaam nohulo wach moa kuom Nyasaye kama:"Balak a malo mondo iwinj!Ruodh Zipor winji gima onyisa mondo awachi!19Nyasaye ok en dhano ma doriambi. Ooyo, ok en dhano ma dolokre. Osewuoyo, to donge obiro timo kaka owacho?Adier, obiro chopo gima osehulo. 20Osechika mondo achiw gueth,omiyo abiro chiwo gueth,to ok anyal loko guethno. 21Onge ketho moseyudo kuom joka Jakobo. Ooyo, onge richo moseneno kuom jo-Israel. Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi ni kodgien ema giyie ni en e Ruodhgi. 22Nyasaye, ma nogologi e piny Misri,tekone chalonigi gi teko jowi. 23Tim ajuoke onge kuom joka Jakobo,adier, timbe ndagla onge kuom jo-Israel. Koro ma e sa monego wanyisie joka Jakobo ma jo-Israel niya,‘Neyeuru gima Nyasaye osetimonu!’24Ogandagi chalo gi sibuor ma dhako mokichore,kendo ojuol ka sibuor ma dichwo. Ok onyal nindo piny,ka pok ochamo gima onego momadho rembe. "25Eka Balak nowacho ni Balaam niya, "Ka ok idwar kuong’ogi, to kara bermondo kik iguedhgi bende. " 26To Balaam nodwoke niya, "Donge ne anyisi ninyaka atim gik moko duto ma Ruoth Nyasaye ochika?" 27Balak nowachoneniya, "Bi mondo ateri kamoro machielo, dipo ka Nyasaye oyie, miikuong’onagi kanyo. " 28Kamano notero Balaam ewi got Peor, momanyore giJeshimon.  29Eka Balam ne onyise mondo olosne kende abiriyo mag misangokanyo, kendo ochiw ruedhi abiriyo kod imbe abiriyo.  30Balak notimo kakane Balam onyise mi ochiwo rwath achiel gi im achiel e kendo ka kendo. Kwan 241Koro kaka Balam nong’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro ni mondo oguedhjo-Israel, ne ok odhi mondo otim tim ajuoke, kaka ne osetimo mokwongo,to nowichore mochomo thim, 2kendo kane ong’icho, noneno jo-Israel kogurokambigi kochanore e dhoutgi.  Eka teko mar Nyasaye nobiro kuome, 3miohulo kama:"Ma e wach madiermar Balaam wuod Beor,mana ng’at ma wang’e bith,4kendo ma winjo weche Nyasaye. En wach ma ng’at ma wang’e oyepo,kendo ma neno fwenyruokmoa kuom Ng’at ma Nyalo Gik Moko Duto. 5A joka Jakobo,mano kaka hembeu beyo!A jo-Israel,kar daku long’o!6Hembeu chalo gi yiend othidhemopidhi e laini maboyo,kendo chalo gi puothemae bath aora,kaka yien mabeyoma Ruoth Nyasaye opidho,kendo kaka yiend sidamae dho pi. 7Pi mae dapigeu biro bubni oko,kendo kothu nochal gi nembe madongo,mondo ruodhu obed maduong’moloyo Agag,kendo lochne oyud duong’,8Nyasaye mane ogolou e piny Misri,tekone chalo gi teko jowi. Uchamo ringre ogendini ma wasikubende urado chokegi,kendo uturo lembgi matindotindo.
Uchalo gi sibuor madhako manindo piny,ma onge ng’ama hedhore chiewo. Joma guedhou mondo oyud gueth,to joma kuong’ou mondo oyud kuong’!"Balaam okoro wach10Kane Balak owinjo wechego, nokecho ahinya gi Balaam, mi ne okeyolwetene, kowacho ni Balaam niya, "Ne aluongi mondo ikuong’na wasika, toin koro iseguedhogi mana nyadidek! 11Omiyo wuogi, idhi thuru.  Neasingora ni damiyi duong’ mang’ongo, to koro Ruoth Nyasaye osemoni yudoduong’no. " 12To Balaam nodwoke niya, "Donge ne anyiso jooteni mane ioroira 13ni kata dibed ni Balak dwaro miya fedha kod dhahabu duto manieode, to ok anyal chayo chik Ruoth Nyasaye, ka atimo dwarona awuon, bedni en gima ber kata gima rach, to abiro wacho mana gima Ruoth Nyasayeonyisa.  14Koro adok ir jowa, to ka pok adhi, to nyaka anyisi gimajo-Israel biro timo ni jogi e ndalo mabiro. " 15Kamano Balaam nohulo wachmoa kuom Nyasaye kama:"Ma e wach madiermar Balaam wuod Beor,mana wach ng’at ma wang’e bith,16kendo mawinjo weche Nyasaye. En wach ng’at mong’eyo riekomar Ng’ama Duong’ Moloyo,ng’at ma wang’e oyepo,kendo ma neno fwenyruok moa kuom Ng’ama Nyalo Gik Moko Duto. 17Anene, to ok sani,kendo ang’iye,to ok machiegni. Sulue nobi koa kuom joka Jakobo,kendo ludh duong’ nowuog kuom jo-Israel. Obiro goyo oganda lweny mag jo-Moab,kendo nolo joma sungore. 18Obiro loyo piny Edom e lweny, mi okawkendo jo-Seir ma wasike nobed mage. Jo-Israel biro timo timbe chir. 19Ee, joka Jakobo biro loyo wasikgi. Onge ng’at ma nodong’ Ar ka ngima. "20Eka Balaam norango piny Amalek, mi ohulo kama:"Oganda mane okwongo betie ne jo-Amalek. To mogik ginirum chuth. "21Eka norango jo-Keni, mi owacho niya,"Yaye un jo-Kain,kata obedo ni kar daku otegno,kendo udak malo ewi gode,22to obiro wang’. Uparo ni unyalo dak e nyima kanyo nyaka karang’o?"23Ne ochako ohulo kendo niya,"Yaye, mago jokanye machokore malogo?24Gin mony moa Saipras. Gibiro ketho Asuria,kendo giniketh Eber,to kata gin bendegibiro rumo chuth. "25Bang’ mano Balaam nowuok modok thurgi, to Balak bende nodhi. Kwan 25Jo-Israel olamo Baal-peor1Kane jo-Israel ni Shitim, ne gichako terore gi nyi Moab, 2mane luongogie sep misengni mane gitimo ni nyisechegi.  Ne gidhi, mi gichamo chiemogo,kendo gilamo nyiseche jo-Moab.  3Kane jo-Israel ochako lamo Baal-peorkamano, Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho kodgi.  4Mowacho ni Musa niya, "Ter jotendoganda ewi got idhir olwar piny, mondo otho e nyima odiechieng’ alanga,mondo mirimba mager oa kuom jo-Israel. " 5Omiyo Musa nowacho ni jong’adbura mag Israel niya, "Ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nyaka neg joge moselamoBaal-peor. "6Noyudo ja-Israel moro okelo nyar Midian e hembe ratiro ka Musa kodoganda duto neno, ka noyudo giywak e dho Hemb Romo.  7Kane Finehas wuodEleazar ma wuod Harun jadolo onene, nowuok e oganda mokawo tong’, 8kendoodonjogo e ot ma iye, kodwaro ja-Israelno.  Nochwowe gi tong’ moriwekaachiel gi nyakono.  Eka tho mane oyudo ogoyo jo-Israel orumo.  9Tonoyudo ka thono osenego ji piero ariyo gang’wen. 10Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Finehas wuod Eleazar ma wuodHarun jadolo osemiyo mirima mane an go gi jo-Israel orumo, nikech mirimamosemake kodgi chal gi mara.  Mano emomiyo kata obedo ni ne an gi nyiegokod jo-Israel nikech aherogi ahinya, to ne ok atiekogi.  12Dhi iwach niFinehas ni asingorane ni obiro bedo jadolo nyaka chieng’.  13Asingorane,en kaachiel gi nyikwaye ni ginibed jodolo nyaka chieng’ nikech osebedogi mirima ma nyiso ni ohero Nyasache, mi opwodho jo-Israel kuomrichogi. "14Ja-Israel mane onegi kaachiel gi nyar Midian niluongo ni Zimri wuodSalu ma jatend dhoot achiel kuom dhout jo-Simeon.  15To nyar Midian ma neonegno nyinge ne Kozbi nyar Zur, ma ne jatend dhout Midian moko. 16Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Sanduru jo-Midian, kendouneggi, 18nikech ne githagou gi timbegi mag amara mane gitimo Peor,kendo kuom wach Kozbi ma nyargi, ma nyar jatend Midian, mane oneg ndalomane yamb tho obiro nikech gima notimore Peor. "Kwan 26Okwan jo-Israel e piny Moab1 Bang’ yamono, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa gi Eleazar jadolo ma wuodHarun niya,
"Kwanuru oganda jo-Israel e dhoutgi, kundiko joma hikgioromo piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo, kendo moromo dhi e lweny," 3Musagi Eleazar nochoko ji duto ma hikgi piero ariyo kata mokadho kanyo, 4epiny Moab mamwalo, e bath aora Jordan kama omanyore gi Jeriko, kakaRuoth Nyasaye nosechiko Musa. Jo-Israel mane owuok Misri e magi:5Jo-Reuben ma wuod Israel makayo, kochan e dhoutgi, ne joka Hanok gijoka Palu 6gi joka Hezron gi joka Karmi.  7Mago ne dhout Reuben.  Kar rombjoma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero ang’wen gi mia abiriyo kod piero adek. 8Wuod Palu ne Eliab, 9to yawuot Eliab ne Nemuel gi Dathan kod Abiram. Gin e Dothan gi Abiram mane joma ogen e oganda, to ne gipiem gi Musa kodHarun, mi giriwore gi jo-Korah mondo gipiem gi Ruoth Nyasaye.  10Bang’epiny nong’amo dhoge, mi omwonyogi kaachiel gi Korah, mi ogandagi norumo,kendo mach nowang’o ji mia ariyo gi piero abich kande.  Ne gidoko ranyisima siemo ji.  11To kata kamano jo-Korah ne ok otho duto. 12Jo-Simeon, kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Nemuel gi Joka Jamin gi joka Jakin13gi joka Zera kod joka Saulo.  14Mago ne dhout joka jo-Simeon.  Kar rombjoma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero ariyo gariyo gi mia ariyo. 15Jo-Gad, kochan e dhoutgi, ne joka Zefon gi joka Hagi gi joka Shuni16gi joka Ozni gi joka Eri 17gi joka Arod kod joka Arieli.  18Mago nedhout jo-Gad.  Kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero ang’wen gi miaabich. 19Yawuot Juda ne Er gi Onan gi Shela gi Perez kod Zera.  To Er gi Onannotho e piny Kanaan.  20Jo-Juda, kochan e dhoutgi, ne joka Shela gi jokaPerez kod joka Zera.  21Dhout Perez ne joka Hezron gi joka Hamul.  22Magone dhout Juda.  Kar romb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero aabiriyogauchiel gi mia abich. 23Jo-Isakar kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Tola gi joka Pua 24gi joka Jashubkod joka Shimron.  25Mago ne dhout Isakar.  Kar romb joma ondik nyinggi nealufu piero auchiel gang’wen gi mia adek. 26Jo-Zebulun kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Sered gi joka Elon kod jokaJaleel.  27Mago ne dhout Zebulun.  Kar romb joma ondik nyingi ne alufupiero auchiel gi mia abich. 28Yawuot Josef ne Manase gi Efraim. 29Jo-Manase kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Makir gi joka Gilead.  (Gilead newuod Makir. ) 30Dhout Gilead ne Jezeer gi joka Helek 31gi joka Asriel gijoka Shekem 32gi joka Shemida kod joka Hefer.  33Zelofehad wuod Hefernonywolo mana nyiri kende.  Nyingi ne Mala gi Noa gi Hogla gi Milka kodTirza.  34Mago ne dhout Manase.  Kar romb joma ne ondik nyinggi ne alufupiero abich gariyo gi mia abiriyo. 35Jo-Efraim kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Shuthela gi joka Beker kod jokaTahan.  36Dhood Shuthela ne joka Eran.  37Mago ne dhout Efraim.  Kar rombjoma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero adek gariyo gi mia abich. Mago duto ne joka Josef, kochan e dhoutgi. 38Jo-Benjamin kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Bela gi joka Ashbel gi jokaAhiram 39gi joka Shufam kod joka Hufam.  40Yawuot Bela ne Ard gi Naaman. Dhout Bela ne joka Ard gi joka Naaman.  41Mago ne dhout Benjamin.  Karromb joma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero ang’wen gabich gi mia auchiel. 42Jo-Dan kochan e dhoodgi ne joka Shuham.  Mano ne dhood Dan.  43Kar rombjoka Shuhan ma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero auchiel gang’wen gi miaang’wen. 44Jo-Asher kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Imna gi joka Ishvi kod joka Beria. 45Dhout Beria ne joka Heber gi joka Malkiel.  46Bende Asher ne nigi nyakoma nyinge Sera.  47Mago ne dhout Asher.  Kar romb joma ondik nyinggi nealufu piero abich gadek gi mia ang’wen. 48Jo-Naftali kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Jazeel gi joka Guni 49gi jokaJezer kod joka Shilem.  50Mago ne dhout Naftali, kochan e utgi.  Kar rombjoma ondik nyinggi ne alufu piero ang’wen gabich gi mia ang’wen. 51Kamano kar romb jo-Israel duto ne ji alufu mia auchiel gi achiel, kodmia abiriyo gi piero adek.  (
,
)Piny nyaka pog gi ombulu52 Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Nyaka pog piny gi dhoudi manamaromre gi kar joma ondik nyinggi.  54Oganda maduong’ inimi lowomaduong’, to oganda matin nimi matin.  Oganda ka oganda nopogne lowomaromre gi kar romb joma ondik nyinggi.  55Kata kamano unupog piny managi ombulu, 56mi dhoot ka dhoot noyud lowo maromre gi kar romb nying jomaondik e dhoodgi.  Lowo nopog gi ombulu ni ogendni madongo gi matindobende. "Dhood Lawi57Jo-Lawi mondik nyinggi kochan e dhoutgi ne joka Gershon gi joka Kohathkod joka Merari.  58Dhout Lawi ne joka Libni gi joka Hebron gi joka Maligi joka Mushi kod joka Korah. Kohath ne wuon Amram, 59to chi Amram ne nyinge Jokebed nyar Lawi, maneLawi onywolo Misri.  Jokebed nonywolo ni Amram nyithindo ma nyinggi Harungi Musa kod Miriam ma nyamin-gi.  60Yawuot Harun ne Nadab gi Abihu giEleazar kod Ithamar.  61To Nadab gi Abihu notho nikech ne giyiego mach maok ni kare e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. 62Kar romb jo-Lawi ma chwo, chakre ja due achiel kadhi nyime, ne alufupiero ariyo gadek.  Nondik nyinggi mopogore gi dhout Israel mamoko,nikech ne ok opognigi lowo kaka ipogo ni dhout Israel mamoko. Kaleb gi Joshua kende ema odong’63Mago e nying jo-Israel mane Musa gi Eleazar jadolo ondiko e piny Moabmamwalo e bath aora Jordan kama omanyore gi Jeriko.  64To onge ja-Israelmoro kata achiel mane Musa gi Harun jadolo okwano e thim Sinai, maneokwan e kweno mar ariyoni, 65nimar Ruoth Nyasaye nosewacho ni nyakagitho giduto e thim.  Onge ng’ato kuomgi mane pod ngima, mak mana Kalebwuod Jefune kod Joshua wuod Nun. Kwan 27Kwayo mar nyi Zelofehad1Bang’ kweno, nyi Zelofehad nobiro.  Zelofehad ne wuod Hefer ma wuodGilead ma wuod Makir ma wuod Manase ma wuod Josef.  Nying nyirigo ne Malagi Noa gi Hogla gi Milka kod Tirza.  2Ne gibiro e dho Hema Miromoe giNyasaye e nyim Musa gi Eleazar jadolo kaachiel gi jodongo kod ogandaduto, mi giwacho niya,
"Wuonwa ne otho e thim, to ne ok en achiel gijo-Korah mane piem gi Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ne otho athoya kuom richone owuon,kendo noonge gi yawuowi.  4Koro ere gimomiyo nying wuonwa dilal e dhoodgimana nikech oonge gi wuowi? Pognwa lowo mana kaka ipogo ni ominewuonwa. "5Kuom mano Musa notero wachgi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, 6mi Ruoth Nyasayenowachone niya,
"Gima nyi Zelofehad dwaro ni kare.  Nyaka ipognigi lowomana kaka ipogo ni omine wuon-gi.  8To wach ni jo-Israel ni ka ng’atootho maonge wuowi, to mwandune nyaka dong’ ni nyare.  9Ka oonge gi nyako,to mwandune nyaka dong’ ni owetene.  10To ka oonge gi owetene, tomwandune dong’ ni omine wuon-gi.  11Ka wuon onge gi ominene, to mwandunedong’ ni watne moro machiegni, kendo ng’atno ema kawo.  Wachni nobed chikni jo-Israel. " Mano e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa. Oket Joshua jatelo kar Musa(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Idh got Abarim, mondo ine pinymasemiyo jo-Israel.  13Ka isenene, to ibiro tho miluw kwereni, mana kakaHarun owadu notho, 14nikech nutamoru rito chikna kane oganda jo-Israelpiem koda e sokni manie thim Zin, kendo ne ok unyiso oganda ni an Ng’amaLer. " (Mago e sokni mag Meriba man but Kadesh e thim Zin. )15Bang’e Musa nowacho niya,,
"A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach ngima, yierjatelo ni ogandani, 17mondo otel nigi e gik moko duto ma gitimo, kendooritgi ka giwuok kendo ka giduogo dala, mondo oganda Ruoth Nyasaye kikbed ka rombe maonge jakwath. " 18Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko Musa niya, "KawJoshua wuod Nun, ng’at ma teko ni kuome, mondo iket lweti kuome, 19kendoikete e nyim Eleazar jadolo gi oganda duto.  Miye chik e nyimgi, 20kendoimiye tekoni moko mondo oganda jo-Israel duto oluore.  21Enobed kodhi irEleazar jadolo ma nobed ka goyone ombulu miluongo ni Urim, mondo ong’egogima Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro.  Oganda jo-Israel, kaachiel gi Joshua, nowuogoko kendo noduog dala, mana kaka Eleazar ochikogi. "22Musa notimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.  Nokawo Joshua moketo e nyimEleazar jadolo gi oganda duto, 23moyieyo lwete kuome, kendo omiye chikkaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosechike. Kwan 28Misengni mitimo pile(Wuok
.
-
)1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, 2Chik jo-Israel mondo ochiw gikmitimonago misengni miwang’o mondo obed chiemba madum tik mamit e kindemoketi.
"Bende nyisgi ni misengni miwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye e magi: Odiechieng’kodiechieng’ nyaka chiw nyiimbe ariyo maonge songa ma hikgi achiel,mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep.  4Nyaim achiel unutimgo misangogokinyi, to machielo unutimgo misango godhiambo mar ang’ich welo. 5Misango mar cham michiwo kodgi to nobed mogo moromo kilo adek moruw gimo maber moromo lita ariyo.
(Mano e misango mitimo miwang’o mitimo pilemondo odum mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye, mane ochak tim e got Sinai. ) 7Tomisango miolo piny mitimego nobed divai moromo lita ariyo kuom im ka im. Nyaka uol divai makechno ei Kama Ler ka misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  8Nyaimmachielo mutimogo misango godhiambo mar ang’ich welo nyaka chiw gimisango mar cham kod miolo piny maromre gi mago michiwo gokinyi.  Enmisango miwang’o mondo odum tik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye. Misengni mitimo chieng’ sabato, kendo mitimo due ka due9"Chieng’ sabato to nyaka uchiw nyiimbe ariyo maonge songa ma hikgiachiel achiel mondo otimgo misango.  Nyaka chiwe gi misango miolo piny,mitimego kaka chik dwaro.  10Misango miwang’o pep mitimo chieng’ sabatoka sabatono nyaka utim kumedo ewi misango miwang’o pep mitimo pile, kodmisango miolo piny mitimego.
"To chieng’ due achiel mar due ka due nyaka uchiw nyiruedhi ariyo giim achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgomisango miwang’o pep.  Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge songa.  12Misango marcham michiwo gi nyarwath ka nyarwath nobed mogo moromo kilo apar moruwgi mo, to michiwo gi im nobed moromo kilo abiriyo, 13kendo michiwo ginyaim ka nyaim, kilo adek.  Mano en misango miwang’o pep mondo odum tikmamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  14Misango miolo piny mitimo gi nyarwath kanyarwath nobed divai moromo lita ang’wen, to michiwo gi im nobed litaariyo, kendo michiwo gi nyaim ka nyaim lita achiel, mano en misangomiwang’o pep ma nyaka tim due ka due e higa ngima.  15Bende nyaka uchiwnywok mondo otimnigo Ruoth Nyasaye misango mar golo richo.  Mano nyakautim kumedo ewi misango miolo piny michiwego. Misengni mitimo e sewni moketi16 "Nyaka utim Pasaka mar Ruoth Nyasaye due apar gang’wen mar duemokwongo, 17to due apar gabich unutim sawo, kensdo nyaka ucham manamakati ma ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo.  18Chieng’ mokwongo to nyakaubed gi chokruok mar lemo, kendo ok unuti tijeu mapile chieng’no. 19Nyaka uchiw nyiruedhi ariyo gi im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo ma hikgiachiel achiel mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep, madum tik mamit niRuoth Nyasaye.  Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge songa.  20Misango mar chammichiwo gi nyarwath ka nyarwath nobed mogo moromo kilo apar moruw gi mo,21to michiwo gi im nobed kilo abiriyo, to michiwo gi nyaim ka nyaim,kilo adek.  22Bende nyaka uchiw nywok mondo otimgo misango mar goloricho, upwodhrugo.  23Mago duto nyaka uchiw kumedo ewi misango miwang’opep mitimo gokinyi pile.  24Unutim misengnigo pile nyaka chieng’ marabiriyo.  En misango mitimo mondo obed chiemo madum tik mamit ni RuothNyasaye.  Nyaka uchiwe kumedo ewi misangoo miwang’o pep mitimo pile, kodmisango miolo piny michiwego.  25Chieng’ mar abiriyo bende nyaka ubed gichokruok maler, kendo ok unuti tijeu mapile.
"Chieng’ muchiwoe chamb gwel, ka ukelo ni Ruoth Nyasaye chiwo marcham manyien e Sap Jumbe, to nyaka ubed gi chokruok maler, kendo ok nutitijeu mapile.  27Unuchiw nyiruedhi ariyo gi im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyoma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep madum mamit niRuoth Nyasaye.  28Misango mar cham michiwo gi nyarwath ka nyarwath nobedmogo moromo kilo apar moruw gi mo, to michiwo gi im nobed kilo abiriyo,29kendo michiwo gi nyaim ka nyaim, kilo adek.  30Bende nyaka uchiw nywokmondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, upwodhrugo.  31Jamnigo duto nyakabed maonge songa, kendo misengnigoo duto nyaka utim kumedo ewi misengnimiwang’o pep mitimo pile, kaachiel gi misango miolo piny michiwogigo. Kwan
"Due achiel due mar abiriyo, nyaka ubed gi chokruok mar lemo, kendo okunuti tijeu mapile.  Mano en chieng’ mor mugoyoe tung. ’ 2Unuchiw nyarwathachiel gi im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo ma hikgi achiel achiel mondootimgo misango miwang’o pep madum tik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Jamnigoduto nyaka bed maonge songa.  3To misango mar cham michiwo gi nyarwathnobed mogo moromo kilo apar moruw gi mo, to michiwo gi im nobed kiloabiriyo, 4kendo michiwo gi nyaim ka nyaim, kilo adek.  5Bende nyaka uchiwnywok mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, upwodhrugo.  6Mago duto nyakautim kumedo ewi misango miwang’o pep mitimo due ka due, kendo mitimopile, kaachiel gi misengni mag cham gi miolo piny, michiwogigo kaka chikdwaro.  En misango miwang’o mondo odum tik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Due apar due mar abiriyono nyaka ubed gi chokruok maler, kendo nyakausandru kuriyo kech, bende kik uti tich moro amora.  8Unuchiw nyarwathachiel gi im achiel kod nyiimbe abiriyo ma hikgi achiel achiel mondootimgo misango miwang’o pep madum tik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Jamnigoduto nyaka bed maonge songa.  9Misango mar cham michiwo gi nyarwath nobedmogo moromo kilo apar moruw gi mo, to michiwo gi im nobed kilo abiriyo,10kendo michiwo gi nyaim, kilo adek.  11Bende nyaka uchiw nywok mondootimgo misango mar golo richo, kumedo ewi misango mipwodhogo richo, kodmisango miwang’o pep mitimo pile, kaachiel gi misango mar cham kod miolopiny michiwo kodgi.
"Due apar gabich due mar abiriyo, nyaka ubed gi chokruok mar lemo.  Okunuti tijeu mapile, to nyaka utim ni Ruoth Nyasaye sawo kuom ndaloabiriyo.  13Unuchiw nyiruedhi apar gadek gi imbe ariyo kod nyiimbe apargang’wen ma hikgi achiel achiel, mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep madumtik mamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge songa. 14Misango mar cham michiwo gi nyarwath ka nyarwath nobed mogo moromokilo apar moruw gi mo, to michiwo gi im ka im nobed kilo abiriyo,15kendo michiwo gi nyaim ka nyaim, kilo adek.  16Bende nyaka uchiw nywokmondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, kumedo ewi misango miwang’o pepmitimo pile, kaachiel gi misango mar cham kod miolo piny michiwego.
"Chieng’ mar ariyo unuchiw nyiruedhi apar gariyo gi imbe ariyo kodnyiimbe apar gang’we ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgo misango. Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge songa.  18Misengni mag cham kod miolo pinynyaka bed moketi kaka chik dwaro, maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.  19Bendenyaka uchiw nywok achiel mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, kumedo ewimisango miwang’o pep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gi milo pinymichiwego.
"Chieng’ mar adek unuchiw ruedhi apar gachiel gi imbe ariyo kodnyiimbe apar gang’wen ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgo misango. Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge gi songa.  21Misengni mag cham kod milopiny nyaka bed moketio kaka chik dwaro, maromre gi kar romb jamnigo. 22Bende nyaka uchiw nywok achiel mondo timgo misango mar golo richo,kumedo ewi misango miwang’o pep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gimiolo piny michiwego.
"Chieng’ mar ang’wen unuchiw ruedhi apar gi imbe ariy kod nyiimbe apargang’wen ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo timgo misango.  Jamnigo duto nyakabed maonge songa.  24Misengni mag cham kod miolo piny nyaka bed moketikaka chik dwaro, maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.  25Bende nyaka uchiw nywokachiel mondo timgo misango mar golo richo, kumedo ewi misango miwang’opep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gi milo piny michiwego.
"Chieng’ mar abich unuchiw ruedhi ochiko gi imbe ariyo kod nyiimbeapar gang’wen ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgo misango.  Jamnigo dutonyaka bed maonge songa.  27Misengni mag cham kod miolo piny nyaka bedmoketi kaka chik dwaro, maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.  28Bende nyaka uchiwnywok achiel mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, kumedo ewi misangomiwang’o pep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gi miolo piny michiwego.
"Chieng’ mar auchiel unuchiw ruedhi aboro gi imbe ariyo kod nyiimbeapar gang’wen ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgo misango.  Jamnigo dutonyaka bed maonge songa.  30Misengni mag cham kod miolo piny nyaka bedmoketi kaka chik dwaro, maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.  31Bende nyaka uchiwnywok achiel mondo timgo misango mar golo richo kumede ewi misangomiwang’o pep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gi misango miolo pinymichiwego.
"Chieng’’ mar abiriyo unuchi ruedhi abiriyo gi imbe ariyo kod nyiimbeapar gang’wen ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo otimgo misango.  Jamnigo dutonyaka bed maonge songa.  33Misengni mag cham kod miolo piny nyaka bedmoketi kaka chik dwaro, maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.  34Bende nyaka uchiwnywok achiel mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo kumedo ewi misangomiwang’o pep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gi misango miolo pinymichiwego.
"Chieng’ mar aboro unutim nyasi mitiekogo chokruok, kendo ok unutitijeu mapile.  36Nyaka uchiw rwath achiel gi im achiel kod nyimbe abiriyoma hikgi achiel achiel, mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pep madum tikmamit ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Jamnigo duto nyaka bed maonge songa.  37Misengnimag cham kod miolo piny michiwogo ruedhi gi imbe kod nyiimbe nyaka bedmoketi kaka chik dwaro maromre gi kar romb jamnigo.  38Bende nyaka uchiwnywok achiel mondo otimgo misango mar golo richo, kumedoe misangomiwang’o pep mitimo pile, kod misango mar cham gii milo piny michiwego.
"Mago e misengni ma nyaka utim ni Ruoth Nyasaye e sewni moketi, kumedoewi misengni muchopogo kuong’ruok, gi muchiwo kuom herou, gi miwang’opep gi mag cham gi miolo piny kod mag sawo. "40Musa nonyiso jo-Israel mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike. Kwan 30Chike mag kuong’ruok gi singruok1Musa nowacho ni jotend jo-Israel niya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko kama: Kang’ato osingore ni Ruoth Nyasaye kata okuong’orene, to kik olokre. Gimoro amora mowacho gi dhoge, to nyaka otim.
"Ka nyaka matin ma pod ni e odgi osingore ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kataokuong’orene, 4kendo wuon mare owinjo singruokno kata kuong’ruokno, took owachone gimoro, kuong’ruokneno nyaka siki.  5To ka wuon odagi wachnochieng’ mowinjeeno, to kuong’ruokgo duto ok nyal mako nyakono.  RuothNyasaye nowene nikech wuon mare osedagi.
"To ka nyako okendi ka pod kuong’ruok omake, kata ka wach mane owachopiyopiyo ka ok oparo pod otweye, 7to eka bang’e chwore owinjo to oling’aling’a to kuong’ruokno nyaka siki.  8To ka chwore odagi kuong’ruoknochieng’ mowinjoe wach mi oketho kuong’ruok, to kuong’ruokno ok nyal makodhakono, to Ruoth Nyasaye nowene.
"Kuong’ruok moro amora ma chi liel kata dhako ma chwore oriembookuong’orego nyaka siki.  10To ka dhako okuong’ore kata otuere gikuong’ruok, 11to eka bang’e chwore owinjo to oling’ aling’a mi ok odagiwachno, to kuong’ruokgo duto nyaka siki.  12To ka chwore odagikuong’ruokgo ratiro kowinjogi, to onge gimoro amora mane chiege owachoma nomake, bed ni en kuong’ruok kata singruok.  Chwore osekethogi, omiyoRuoth Nyasaye nowene.
"Chwor dhako nyalo guro kata ketho singruok kata kuong’ruok ma chiegedwaro sandorego.  14To ka dichwo oling’ chieng’no kod kinyne, to manonyiso ni oyie gi singruok kata kuong’ruok mane chiege otuerego. Ginisiki, nikech ka ne owinjogi, to noling’.  15To kolokore mana achien,modagi kosewinjogi, to ketho mar chiege nobed mare, kendo nyaka ochul. "16Mago chike mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa kuom dichwo gi dhako kendokuom wuon nyako gi nyare matin ma pod ni e odgiKwan 31Jo-Israel ochulo kuor ni jo-Midian1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Inimi jo-Israel chul kuor nijo-Midian.  Bang’ mano ibiro tho, miluw kwereni. "3Omiyo Musa nowacho ni jo-Israel niya, "Yieruru jou moko, mondo odhioked gi jo-Midian, ochulnigi kuor e nying Ruoth Nyasaye.  4Nyaka ugol jialufu achiel achiel e dhoot ka dhoot mar Israel. " 5Kamano noluongjo-Israel alufu apar gariyo moikore ni lweny, ka ogol ji alufu achielachiel e dhoot ka dhoot.  6Musa nooro jolwenygo gi Finehas wuod Eleazarjadolo mane oting’o gik lemo mag Kama Ler kod tunge migoyo mondo ji ogosigich lweny.  Ji alufu achiel achiel noa e dhoot ka dhoot.  7Ne gikedo gijo-Midian kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa, mi ginego jogi machwo duto. 8To bende ne ginego Evi gi Rekem gi Zur gi Hur kod Reba, mane ruodhiabich mag Midian, kaachiel gi Balaam wuod Beor.  9Jo-Israel nomako mondjo-Midian gi nyithindgi, kendo ne giyako jambgi kod mwandugi duto.  10Negiwang’o miechgi duto, kod kuondegi mag buoro.  11Bang’e ne gikawo jamnikod gik moko duto mane giyako, kaachiel gi joma ne gimako, 12mi giteroir Musa gi Eleazar jadolo kod oganda jo-Israel e kambi mane ni e pinyMoab mamwalo but aora Jordan kama omanyore gi Jeriko. Chik mar pwodho gik moyaki13Musa gi Eleazar jadolo gi jodong oganda duto nodhi romo ni jolwenygo edho kambi oko.  14To Musa nokecho gi jotend ogend lweny madongo gimatindo mane duogo koa e lweny, 15mopenjogi niya, "Ere gimomiyo useweyomon-gi mak unego? 16Donge ung’eyo ni ka ne Balaam osea gweng’ Peor, tomon-go ema nobet kawuondo jo-Israel mondo owe Ruoth Nyasaye, mi manonomiyo tho ogoyo oganda Ruoth Nyasaye? 17Emomiyo neguru nyithindo machwoduto, kaachiel gi mon duto, 18to uwe nyiri ma pok ong’eyo chwo, mondoukaw.  19To ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu moseneko, kata mosemulo ng’at motho,nyaka dong’ oko mar kambi kuom ndalo abiriyo.  Gudreuru chieng’ mar adekkod chieng’ mar abiriyo, kendo upwodh joma umako e lweny.  20Bendepwodhuru lewni duto gi gimoro amora molos gi pien, kata gi yie dielmokadi, kata gi bao. "21Eleazar jadolo nowacho ni jolweny mane dwogo koa e lweny niya, "Ma echik achiel kuom chike mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa.
,23Gimoro amoramanyalo tamo mach wang’o, kaka dhahabu gi fedha gi mula gi nyinyo giopanga kod lisasi, nyaka uketi e mach, eka obed maler.  To kata kamanonyaka pwodhgi gi pi mar pwodhruok.  Bende gimoro amora ma mach nyaloketho nyaka lwok e pigno.  24Chieng’ mar abiriyo nyaka ulwok lepu, miubed maler, eka bang’e unyalo dwogo e kambi. "Gik moyaki opogi25Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Un gi Eleazar jadolo kod jodongdhout oganda mondo ukwan jamni gi gik moko moyaki, kaachiel gi joma omake lweny.  27Bang’e poguru gigo maromre e kind jolweny mane odhi kedo, kodji duto mane odong’.  28Kuom mago mopogni jolweny, ugolie achiel kuom miaabich abich, bed ni gin ji kata dhok kata kenje kata rombe, mondo obedchiwo momi Ruoth Nyasaye.  29Gik mugolo kuom pok jolwenygo nyaka miEleazar jadolo kaka chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  30To kuom gik mopog nijo-Israel modong’, ugolie achiel kuom piero abich abich, bed ni gin jikata dhok kata kenje kata rombe, omi jo-Lawi ma jorit Hema Maler marRuoth Nyasaye. "31Musa gi Eleazar jadolo ne jotimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa.  32Togik moyaki, ka ok okwan mago mane jolweny okawo e magi: Rombe alufu miaauchiel gi piero abiriyo gabich (
,
) 33Gi dhok alufu piero abiriyogariyo, 34kod kende alufu piero auchiel gachiel, 35kaachiel gi nyirialufu piero adek gariyo ma pok ong’eyo chwo. 36Kamano gik mane omi joma ne okedo e lweny 37ne rombe alufu mia adek gipiero adek gabiriyo kod mia abich, (
,
) 38Gi dhok alufu piero adekgauchiel, 39kod kenje alufu piero adek gi mia abich, 40kaachiel gi jialufu apar gauchiel.  Kuom mano, pok mane ogol mondo ochiw ni RuothNyasaye ne rombe piero abiriyo gariyo, gi dhok mia auchiel gi pieroabiriyo gabich, kod kenje piero auchiel gachiel, kaachiel gi ji pieroadek gariyo.  41Musa nomiyo Eleazar jadolo pok mane ogol ni RuothNyasaye, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.  42To gik mane odong’ ni jo-Israel,tiende ni mago mane Musa oketo tenge komiyo jolweny pokgi, 43ne rombealufu mia adek gi piero adek gabiriyo gi mia abich, (
,
) 44gi dhokalufu piero adek gauchiel 45kod kenje alufu piero adek gi mia abich,46kaachiel gi ji alufu apar gauchiel.  47Kuom gik mane opogni ogandajo-Israelgo, Musa nogolo achiel kuom piero abich abich, bed ni gin jikata jamni, momiyo jo-Lawi mane jorit Hema Maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye kakaRuoth Nyasaye nochike. 48Bang’e jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo nobiro ir Musa,49nowachone niya, "Jaduong’, wasekwano jolweny mawa duto mwayudo nigintie gite.  50Kuom mano wasekelo gik molos gi dhahabu mane wayako, kakathiwni gi manyonge gi tere gi stadi kod tigo, mondo wachiw ni RuothNyasaye ka gik mwawarogo ngimawa. "51Eka Musa gi Eleazar jadolo nokawo gik molos gi dhahabugo kuom jotelomadongo gi matindo.  52Pek chiwo mar dhahabu mane gimiyo Ruoth Nyasayenoromo kilo mia ariyo, 53nimar jalweny ka jalweny noseyako.  54KamanoMusa gi Eleazar jadolo noyudo dhahabu kuom jotend ogend lweny madongo gimatindo, mi ne gikelo e Hema Miromoe gi Nyasaye mondo Ruoth Nyasayeopargo jo-Israel. Kwan 32Jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod nus jo-Manase omi piny man yo wuok chieng’ maraora Jordan(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)1Jo-Reuben kod jo-Gad ne ni gi jamni mang’eny, kendo kane gineno ka pinyJazer kod piny Gilead ni gi lege mabeyo, 2ne gibiro ir Musa gi Eleazarjadolo kod jodong oganda, mi giwacho nigi niya,
"Piny moting’o Atarothgi Dibon gi Jazer gi Nimra gi Heshbon gi Eleale gi Sebam gi Nebo kodBeon 4ma Ruoth Nyasaye osekawo ka jo-Israel neno, en piny man gi lekmaber mar jamni, kendo ung’eyo ni wan jopith jamni.  5Kuom mano ka uyiekodwa, to miwauru pinyno obed marwa.  Kik wang’ad aora Jordan. "6To Musa nopenjo jo-Gad kod jo-Reubengo niya, "Udwaro ni mondo joweteuodhi oked e lweny ka un to udong’ ka? 7Ere gimomiyo unyoso chunyjo-Israel mondo kik ng’ad loka, odhi e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyogi?8Mano e gima ne wuoneu otimo kane aorogi ka wan Kadesh-barnea mondogidhi gicheng piny Kanaan.  9Ne gidhi mi gichengo pinyno nyaka holo marEshkol, to kane gidwogo ne ginyoso chuny jo-Israel ni ok ginyal dhi kawopiny mane Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyogi.  10Mirima mager nomako Ruoth Nyasayechieng’no, mi okuong’ore niya,
‘Jo-Israel osedagi luwa gi chunygiduto, omiyo onge kata ng’ato achiel ma jahigni piero ariyo kata mokadhokanyo mane owuok Misri, manone piny mane asingora ni Ibrahim gi Isakakod Jakobo.  12Kaleb wuod Jefune ja-Kenizi, kod Joshua wuod Nun kende emanodonj e pinyno, nikech giseluwo Ruoth Nyasaye gi chunygi duto. ’ 13RuothNyasaye nokecho gi jo-Israel mi ne omiyo gidigni e thim kuom higni pieroang’wen gi, nyaka tieng’ mane oketho e nyimeno otho duto.  14Koro kendouluwo mana timbe wuoneu! Un joma timbegi richo, ma pod biro mana medomirimb Ruoth Nyasaye kuom jo-Israel.  15Nimar ka udagi luwe, to obirojwang’o oganda jo-Israel duto e thim, kendo un ema ubiro miyo girum. "16Bang’ kinde matin ne gidwogo ir musa, mi giwacho niya, "Wadwaro geroabilni ni jambwa ka, kod mier mondo mondwa gi nyithindwa odagie. 17Bang’e wanyalo dhi e lweny mondo waked ka watelo ni jo-Israel, nyakachop gikaw piny ma gidhi dakie.  To e kinde ma pod wadhi kedo, mondwa ginyithindwa nyalo dak e mier mochiel motegno gi ohinga ma jo pinyni oknyal monjogie.  18Ok wanaduogi ka pok ja-Israel ka ja-Israel oyudo lowomopogne.  19Wan ok wadwar mondo opognwa piny kodgi loka machielo mar aoraJordan, nikech osepognwa lopwa yo wuok chieng’chieng’ mar Jordanlokani. " 20Musa nodwokogi niya, "Ka unyalo rito singruokmusesingorugoni, mi uyie kedo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, 21kendo jou duto majolweny ong’ado aora Jordan e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi gibet kuno nyakachop Ruoth Nyasaye riemb wasike, 22mokawo pinyno, to un udwog ka, kendounubed maonge ketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kendo e nyim jo-Israel, mipinyni nobed maru e nyim Ruloth Nyasaye.  23To ng’euru ni ka ok utimokamano, to unubed joketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo richou nokelnukum.  24Kuom mano, geruru mier ni mondu kod nyithindu, kendo uger abilnini jambu, to nyaka utim mana kaka usesingoru!"25Jo-Gad gi jo-Reuben nodwoko Musa niya, "Jaduong’ wan jogi omiyo wabirotimo kaka ichikowa.  26Nyithindwa gi mondwa kod jambwa duto biro dong’ emiech Gilead ka, 27to jowa duto ma jolweny biro ng’ado aora mondo odhioked e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kaka isechiko. "
Kuom mano, Musa nochiko Eleazar jadolo gi Joshua wuod Nun kod jodongdhout Israel niya,
"Ka jo-Gad gi jo-Reuben duto ma jolweny ong’adoaora Jordan kodu mondo oked e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi ukawo pinyno, tonyaka upognigi piny Gilead.  30To ka ok ging’ado aora mi gidhi e lwenykodu, to upognigi lowo e piny Kanaan. " 31Jo-Gad gi jo-Reuben nodwokoniya, "Jaduong’, wabiro timo mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye osechikowa. 32Waduto mwaromo dhi e kedo wabiro ng’ado loka cha e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,to lopwa nobed mana loka Jordan koni. "33Omiyo Musa nomiyo jo-Gad gi jo-Reuben kod nus jo-Manase wuod Josefpiny Sihon ruodh jo-Amor, gi piny Og ruodh Bashan duto, kaachiel gimiechgi kod gwenge mokiewo kodgi.  34Jo-Gad nogero Dibon gi Ataroth giAroer, 35gi Atroth-safan gi Jazar gi Jogbeha 36gi Bethnimra kodBethharan, duto mier mochiel motegno gi ohinga, kendo ogerie abilni magjamni.  37Jo-Reuben to nogero Heshbon gi Eleale gi Kiriathaim 38gi Nebogi Baal-meon, (mane nyinge oloki) kod Sibma.  Mago e nying mane gichakomier mane gigerogo.  39Joka Makir wuod Manase to nomonjo piny Gilead,mokawo, kendo ne giriembo jo-Amor mane oyudo odakie.  40Eka Musa nomiyojoka Makir wuod Manase piny Gilead, mi gidak kuno.  41Jair nyakwarManase, to nomonjo miech Ham, mi okawo, kendo ochako ni Havoth-jair,(tiende ni, miech Jair. ) 42Noba to nomonjo Kenath gi mier matindomikiewo kode, mi ne ochake ni Noba, nyinge owuon. Kwan 33Wuodh jo-Israel e thim1Kane Musa gi Harun otelo ni jo-Israel e dhoutgi ka giwuok e pinyMisari, 2Musa nondiko nying kuonde mane gibworoe mana kaka Ruoth Nyasayenochiko, kendo magi e kuonde mane gibworoe gogo:3Jo-Israel noa Ramases chieng’ due apar gabich mar due mokwongo, ma enchieng’ maluwo chieng’ Pasaka.  Ne giwuok ka jo-Misri nenogi, to ne okgidewo.  4Jo-Misri noyudo yiko nyithindgi makayo duto mane Ruoth Nyasayeonego, kang’adogo bura ni nyisechegi. 5Jo-Israel noa Ramases, modhi oguro kambi Sukoth.  6Eka ne gia Sukoth, migidhi giguro kambi Etham e bath thim.  7Ne gia Etham, mi gidok chien butPihahiroth, yo wuok chieng’ mar Baal-Zefon, mi giguro kambi kamaomanyore gi Migdol.  8Bang’e ne gia Pihahiroth, mi ging’ado nam nyakathim, kendo ne giwuotho kuom ndalo adek e thim Etham, mi giguro kambikamoro miluongo ni Marah. 9Ka gia Marah, ne gidhi Elim kuma ne giyudoe sokni apar gariyo mag pikod yiend othidhe piero abiriyo, mi giguro kambi kuno.  10Eka ne giaElim, mi giguro kambi e bath Nam Makwar.  11Ne gia e bath Nam Makwar, migidhi giguro kambi e thim Sin.  12Bang’e ne gia kanyo mi gidhi gigurokambi Dofka.  13Ne gia Dofka, mi gidhi giguro kambi Alush.  14Kane giaAlush, ne gidhi mi giguro kambi Refidim, kuma ne onge pi ma ji modhi. 15Eka ne gia Refidim, mi gidhi giguro kambi e thim Sinai.  16Ne gia ethim Sinai, mi gidhi giguro kambi Kibroth-hatava.  17Bange ne giaKibroth-hatava mi gidhi giguro kambi Hezeroth.  18Ne gia Hezeroth, migidhi giguro kambi Rithma.  19Eka ne gia Rithma, mi gidhi giguro kambiRimon-parez.  20Ne gia Rimon-parez, mi gidhi giguro kambi Libna.  21Bang’ene gia Libna, mi gidhi giguro kambi Risa.  22Ne gia Risa mi gidhi gigurokambi Kehelatha.  23Ne gia Kehelatha, mi gidhi giguro kambi e Got Shafer. 24Kane gia got Shafer, ne gidhi mi giguro kambi Harada.  25Eka ne giaHarada, mi gidhi giguro kambi Makeloth. 26Bang’e ne gia Makeloth, mi gidhi giguro kambi Tahath.  27Ne gia Tahath,mi gidhi giguro kambi Tara.  28Ne gia Tara, mi gidhi giguro kambi Mithka. 29Eka ne gia Mithka, mi gidhi giguro kambi Hashmona.  30Ne gia Hashmona,mi gidhi giguro kambi Moseroth.  31Bang’e ne gia Moseroth, mi gidhigiguro kambi Bene-jaakan.  32Ne gia Bene-jaakan, mi gidhi giguro kambiHorhagidgad.  33Kane gia Horhagidgad, ne gidhi mi giguro kambi Jotbatha. 34Ne gia Jotbatha, mi gidhi giguro kambi Ebrona.  35Eka ne gia Ebrona, migidhi giguro kambi Ezion-geber.  36Ne gia Ezion-geber, mi gidhi gigurokambi e thim Zin, ma en thim Kadesh.  37Ne gia Kadesh, mi gidhi gigurokambi e got Hur, manie tong’ piny Edom.  38Eka Harun jadolo noidho gotHor kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike, mi otho kuno due achiel, due mar abich ehiga mar piero ang’wen bang’ wuok jo-Israel e piny Misri.  39Ne enjahigni mia achiel gi piero ariyo kane otho kuno.
Ruodh Arad ma ja-Kanaan, mane odak yo milambo mar piny Kanaan,nowinjo ni jo-Israel biro.  41Kane gia got Hor ne gidhi mi giguro kambiZalmona.  42Ne gia Zalmona, mi gidhi giguro kambi Punon.  43Eka ne giaPunon, mi gidhi giguro kambi Oboth.  44Ne gia Oboth, mi gidhi gigurokambi Iye-Abarim e tong’ piny Moab.  45Bang’e ne gia Iyim, gidhi gigurokambi Dibon-gad.  46Kane gia Dibon-gad, ne gidhi mi gidhi giguro kambiAlmon-diblathaim.  47Ne gia Almon-diblathaim, mi gidhi giguro kambi egode mag Abarim, yo wuok chieng’ mar Nebo. 48Ne gia e gode mag Abarim, mi gidhi giguro kambi e piny Moab, mamwalo ebath aora Jordan, kama omanyore gi Jeriko.  49Kambigino nochakoreBeth-Jeshimoth, moyarore nyaka Abel-shitim e piny Moab ma mwalo. Tong’ piny Kanaan, kendo kaka nopog pinyno50Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Musa e piny Moab mamwalo e bath aora Jordan,kama omanyore gi Jeriko, 51mowachone mondo onyis jo-Israel niya, "Korouchiegni ng’ado aora Jordan mondo udonj e piny Kanaan.  52Nyaka uriemb jiduto modak e pinyno mondo owenu thuolo, kendo uketh kido maggi mopa kodmag mula moleny 53Kawuru pinyni mi udagie, nimar asemiyougo mondo obedmaru.  54Nyaka upoge gi ombulu e kind dhoutu, mondo dhoot ka dhoot oyudlope.  Dhoot maduong’ nyaka yud lowo maduong’ to dhoot matin nyaka yudmatin.  Pognigiuru mana kaka ombulu owacho, ka dhoot ka dhoot kendo jootka joot yudo lopgi.  55To ka ok uriembo joma odak e pinyno mondo owenuthuolo, to joma uweyogo nobednu kaka pedo mandhodho wang’u, kendo kakudho machwowo dendu.  Ginibed ka gilaro kodu piny mudakieno, 56kendogima naparo timonigi, ema natimnu. "Kwan 341Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 2mondo onyis jo-Israel niya, "Korouchiegni donjo e piny Kanaan, momiu mondo obed mwandu nyaka chieng’.  Enpiny Kanaanno duto, ma tong’ne chalo kama: 3pinyu man yo milambonochakre e thim Zin manie tong’ piny Edom.  Tong’u ma yo milambo mogik yowuok chieng’ nobed giko mar nam Kado.  4Eka kochopo yo milambo mar pithAkrabim, too nogom mokadh Zin, kendo gikone ma yo milambo nobedKadesh-barnea.  Eka nochom Hazar, mochop Azmon, 5kendo nogom kochomo aoramanie tong’ piny Misri, mi nogik e Nam Mediterenia.
"Tong’u ma yo podho chieng’ to nobed Nam Mediterenia, gi dho namno. Mano ema nobed tong’u ma yo podho chieng’.
"To tong’u ma yo nyandwat nobed koa e Nam Mediterenia kochomo got Hortir, 8kendo koa got Hor, nochom kama idonjogo Hamath, mi nogik Zadad. 9Eka noa kanyo kochomo Zifron, mi nodhi ogik Hazer-enan.  Mano ema nobedtong’u ma yo nyandwat.
"Tong’u ma yo wuok chieng’ noa Hazar-enan kochomo Shefam tir.  11Bang’enoridre koa Shefam nyaka Ribla yo wuok chieng’ mar Ain, molor nyaka godeman yo wuok chieng’ mar Nam Galili.  12Eka nomed lor nyaka aora Jordan,mi ogik e Nam kado.  Kamano piny duto ma tong’go olworo nobed maru. "
Bang’e Musa nochiko jo-Israel kama: "Mano e piny ma ubiro pogo giombulu, mondo dhoot ka dhoot oyud lope.  En piny ma Ruoth Nyasayeosechiko ni mondo omi dhoudi ochiko gi nus, 14nikech jo-Reuben gi jo-Gadkod nus jo-Manase oseyudo pinygi, dhoot ka dhoot.  15Dhoudi ariyo ginusgo oseyudo pinygi loka aora Jordan koni, yo wuok chieng’ mar Jeriko. "16Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Joma biro konyi pogo pinynoe magi: Eleazar jadolo kod Joshua wuod Nun.  18To bende nyaka ikaw jotenddhoot ka dhoot mondo okonyi e tijno, 19kendo magi e nyinggi: E dhoodjo-Juda en Kaleb wuod Jefune.  20E dhood jo-Simeom en Samuel wuod Amihud,21to e dhood jo-Benjamin en Elidad wuod Kislon.  22E dhood jo-Dan tojatelo nobed Buki wuod Jogli.  23Kuom joka Josef, jatend dhood Manasenobed Haniel wuod Efod, 24to jatend dhood Efraim nobed Kemuel wuodShiftan.  25E dhood jo-Zebulun to jatelo nobed Elizafan wuod Parnak, 26toe dhood jo-Isakar jatelo nobed Paltiel wuod Azan.  27E dhood jo-asher,jatelo nobed Ahihud wuod Shelomi, 28to e dhood jo-Naftali, jatelo nobedPedahel wuod Amihud. "29Mago e joma ne Ruoth Nyasaye oyiero mondo opog ni jo-Israel lowo epiny Kanaan. Kwan 35Miech jo-Lawi1 Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Musa e piny Moab mamwalo but aora Jordan kamaomanyore gi Jeriko, mowacho niya,
"Nyis jo-Israel mondo oyier miechgimoko, kaachiel gi lowo molworogi, mondo omi jo-Lawi odagie.  3Ginidag emiergo, kendo jambgi nokwa e legegi.  4Lach mar lowo mumiyo jo-Lawi,chakre e ohinga mar dala ka dala, kadhi nyime noromo mita mia abichkuonde duto koni gi koni.  5Kamano bor tong’ man yo wuok chieng’ nobedmita alufu achiel, gi man yo milambo gi man yo podho chieng’ kod man yonyandwat, duto mita alufu achiel achiel maromre.  To dala nobed e dierlowono tir.  Lowo molworo dala ka dala nobed lek ma joma odak e dalanokwayoe jambgi.
"Ka umiyo jo-Lawi miechgi, to auchiel kuomgi nobed miech tony, ma jomaoneko nyalo pondoe.  To bende unumigi mier piero ang’wen gariyo mamoko. 7Kamano kar romb mier monego umi jo-Lawi, kaachiel gi legegi, gin pieroang’wen gaboro.  8Ka uyiero miergo e piny jo-Israel duto, to ukaw miermang’eny kuom dhoudi matindo.  Dhoot ka dhoot nomi jo-Lawi mier maromregi lowo mane opogne. "Miech tony(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
; Joshua
.
-
)
Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa 10mondo onyis jo-Israel niya,"Kuseng’ado aora Jordan, mudonjo e piny Kanaan, 11to yieruru mier mokomondo obed kuonde ma ma ng’at moneko kobothne nyalo tonyie.  12Miergonobed miech tony, ma ng’at moneko nyalo tonyie koringo ng’at madwarochulone kuor, mondo kik nege kapok oyale e nyim oganda.  13Ginibed mierauchiel moyier kaka miech tony, 14ka adek ni yo wuok chieng’ mar aoraJordan, to adek nie piny Kanaan.  15Mier auchielgo nobed kuonde tony, maka ng’ato oboth monego nyawadgi, to onyalo tonyie, bed ni en ja-Israelkata wendo kata japiny moro modak kuomu.
"Ka ng’ato ogoyo wadgi gi gima olos gi nyinyo, mi otho, to ng’atmogoyeno doko janek, omiyo nyaka nege.  17Ka ng’ato nigi kidi e lwete manyalo nego ng’ato, mi ogoyogo wadgi, motho, to en janek, kendo nyakanege.  18Kata ka ng’ato nigi gimoro molos gi yien e lwete manyalo neko,mi ogoyogo wadgi motho, to en janek, omiyo nyaka nege.  19Owadgi ng’atmonegno nyaka neg janekno koyudo mondo ochulne kuor.  20Ka ng’ato odhirowadgi goyiem, kata ka odiro gimoro mogoye, 21kata kogoye adhong’, motho,to nyaka nege, nikech en janek.  Owadgi ng’at monegno nyaka neg janekno,koyudo.
"Kapo ni odhiro wadgi ma ok gimonrego, kata ka ochiele gi gimoro ka oken gi paro mar goye, 23kata ka oboth, mobolo kuome kidi manyalo neko kaok onene, mi otho, kendo ka en adier ni ok gimonre, kendo ne ok odwarhinye, 24to oganda nyaka yal wachno e kind janek gi owadgi ng’at monegi,kaluwore gi chikegi eki.  25Oganda nyaka kony janekno kuom kuor ma owadging’at monegi dochulone, mi gidwoke e dala tony, kuma ne otonyiemokwongo.  Enobed kuno nyaka jadolo maduong’ tho.  26To kapo ni chieng’moro janekno okadho tong’ mar dala tony, 27mi owadgi ng’at mane onegocha oyude monege, to owadgi ng’at mane onegono onge gi ketho.  28Janeknyaka sik mana e dala tony nyaka jadolo maduong’ tho.  Ka jadolo maduong’osetho, to eka onyalo dok thurgi.  29Mago nobednu chik mochwere, kamoroamora mudakie.
"Ng’at moneko nyaka ng’adne buch tho mana kuom dho joneno.  To wachjaneno achiel kende ok oromo ng’ado ni ng’ato buch tho.  31Kik uyie janekmong’adne buch tho warre, to nyaka nege.  32Bende kik uyie ng’at mopondoe dala tony warre mi dog dag e dala, kapok jadolo maduong’ otho.  33Kikuketh pinyu gi remo kamano, nikech remo ketho piny, kendo pinyu ok nyalpwodhore kuom gak mar remo mochuer, mak mana ka opwodhe gi remb ng’atmane ochuero remono.  34Kik uchid pinyu mudakie, kendo ma an bendeadakie, nimar an Ruoth nyasaye adak e kind jo-Israel. "Kwan 36Chik kend mar nyiri ma opognigi lop wuonegi1Jodong dhout Gilead wuod Makir ma wuod Manase ma achiel kuom dhoutJosef, nodhi ir Musa gi jotend oganda kod jodong dhout Israel, 2mowachoniya, "Jaduong’, Ruoth Nyasaye nochiki mondo ipog ni jo-Israel lowo giombulu, to bende nochiki mondo ipog lowo ma dine owadwa Zelofehad oyudoni nyige.  3To kapo ni moro kuom nyirigo okendi e dhood ja-Israel moro,to lowo mopogne biro lal kuom lop kwerewa, mi nomiye dhoot ma okendienyakono.  Kamano lopwano dilal.  4Ka higa mar mor ochopo e piny Israel, tolowono nomi dhoot mokendie nyakono, mi nolal chuth kuom lop kwerewa. "5Kane Musa oseng’eyo gima Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro, nonyiso jo-Israel niya,
"Joka Josef ni kare, kendo kama e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye osechiko kuom wachnyi Zelofehad.  Ginyalo tedo ni ng’ato ang’ata ma gihero, mak mana ninyaka bed ni okendgi e dhoodgi.  7Onge lop ja-Israel moro amora ma nowuoge dhoodgi, kimiyo dhoot machielo, to ng’ato ka ng’ato e Israel nyaka sikmana gi lop wuon mare.  8Nyar Israel moro amora ma opogne lop wuon marenyaka kendi mana e dhoodgi.  Kamano ng’ato ka ng’ato e Israel nosik e lopkwerene.  9Onge lowo ma noa e dhoot moro kimiyo dhoot machielo, to dhootka dhoot nosik gi lope. "
,11Kuom mano, Mala gi Tirza gi Hogla gi Milka kod Noa, ma nyiZelofehad, notimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa, mi gitedo mana niyawuot omine wuon-gi.  12Nokendgi e dhood Manase ma wuod Josef, kendolopgi nosik mana e dhood kweregi. 13Mago e chike mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa onyiso jo-Israel e pinyMoab mamwalo e bath aora Jordan kama omanyore gi Jeriko. Rapar mar Chik 1Musa oparo ni jo-Israel singruok mane Nyasaye otimonigi Horeb1Magi e weche mane Musa owacho ni jo-Israel duto kane gin e thim manieholo, yo wuokchieng’ mar aora Jordan.  Kuno nomanyore gi Suf, ka Parannie bathe konchiel, to Tofel gi Laban gi Hazeroth kod Dizahab e bathekomachielo.
(En wuodh ndalo apar gachiel kia Horeb nyaka Kadesh-barnea,kiluwo yo mokadho e piny gode mag Seir. )3Chieng’ mokwongo mar due mar apar gachiel, e higa mar piero ang’wenbang’ wuok Misri, Musa nonyiso jo-Israel weche duto mane Ruoth Nyasayeosechike mondo owachnigi.  4Mano notimore kane oseloyo Sihon ruodh Amor,mane odak Heshbon, kod Og ruodh Bashan, mane odak Ashtaroth gi Edrei.  5Epiny Moab loka Jordan kuno, ema Musa nong’adoe bura e chunye, ni mondoonyis ji tiend chikni.  Nowacho niya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwanowuoyo kodwa Horeb, mowachonwa kama: ‘Usebet e godni moromo, 7omiyokoro chakuru wuoth, mondo udhi e piny gode mag jo-Amor, kendo uked gijoma odak machiegni kodgi e holo mar aora Jordan, gi piny gode kod pinypewe gi piny man yo milambo, kod dhonam, ma tiende ni piny Kanaan kodpiny Lebanon duto nyaka aora maduong’ mar Yufrate.  8Aseikonu pinyno,omiyo dhiuru mondo ukawe.  En e piny mane Ruoth Nyasaye osingore ni nomikwereu ma Ibrahim gi Isaka gi Jakobo kod nyikwagi. ’Oyier jong’ad bura(Wuok
.
-
)
"E kinde nogo nawachonu niya, ‘Ting’uru pek ma ok anyal ting’o kenda,10nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyo unya ahinya, ma koro ung’enymana ka sulue mae polo.  11Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu onego mi umednya nyadi gana gi gana moloyo kaka uromoni, kendo oguedhu kakanosingore.  12To tich bedo jatendu kod ng’ado buchu osedoko mapek mohewa. 13Kuom mano, yieruru ji man gi rieko kendo molony mondo oketgi jotenddhoutu. ’ 14Ne udwoka ni uyie gi gima nawachonu.  15Omiyo nakawo ji man girieko kendo molony, maketo mondo oritu.  Moko kuomgi naketo jotend jigana, to moko jotend ji mia mia, to moko jotend ji piero abich abich,kod ji apar apar, kendo moko bende naketo jotelo mopogore opogore edhoutu duto.  16E kinde nogo nachiko jong’ad bura mau niya: ‘Un ema onegouyal buche mag joweteu, kendo nyaka ung’ad bura kare e kind ng’ato giwadgi, kata bed ni ng’atno en ja-Israel wadu, kata en jadak.  17Nyakaubed jaratiro kung’ado bura, kendo nyaka uwinj wach ng’at modhier manakaka uwinjo wach jamoko.  Kik uluor wang’ ng’ato, nikech ng’ado bura enmar Nyasaye.  Kapo ni uneno ka bura moro tek ahinya, ma ok unyal ng’ado,to kelnagouru mondo ayale. ’ 18Chieng’ onogo bende nachikou kuom gik mokoduto monego utim. Oor jombetre koa Kadesh-barnea odhi ocheng piny Kanaan(Kwan
.
-
)
"Bang’e ne wawuok Horeb kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochikowa, mi ne wawuotho ethim maduong’ kendo malich kaka ne uneno cha, kwadhi e piny gode magjo-Amor, mi wachopo Kadesh-barnea.  20Eka nawachonu ni, ‘Koro wasechopo epiny gode mag jo-Amor, ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa miyowa.  21RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu oseikonu piny ma uneno e nyimuno, omiyo dhiuru mondoukawe kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu nosingorenu.  Kik chunyunyosre, kata kik ubed maluor. ’ 22To kane uwinjo kamano, nubiro irauduto, muwachona niya, ‘We mondo waor jomoko mondi nyimwa, odhiochengnwa pinyno, eka gidwoknwa wach, ka ginyisowa yo ma onego waluw,kod mier man kuno. ’ 23Ne ayie gi wachuno, mi ayiero jou apar gariyo kang’ato achiel achiel ochung’ ni dhoot ka dhoot.  24Ne giwuok, mi giwuothoe piny gode nyaka holo mar Eshkol, mi gichengo gweng’no.  25Ne gikawo gikmonyak e pinyno, mi gikelonwa, ka ginyisowa ni piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachwa dwaro miyowano en piny maber ahinya.
"To kata kamano nudagi dhi kuno, kendo nutamoru winjo chik RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu.  27Ne ung’ur e hembeu, kuwacho niya, ‘Ruoth Nyasayeok oherowa, emomiyo osegolowa Misri mondo oketwa e lwet jo-Amor,otiekwa.  28Ang’o ma wabiro yudo kuno ka wadhi? To jowetewa mane waoroosenego chunywa, ka wachonwa ni ji man kuno rabede kendo boyo mohewowa!Bende ginyisowa ni mier man kuno dongo, kendo nigi ohinga maboyo mochopoe polo.  To kendo nyikwa Anakim bende gineno kuno!’
"To nanyisou ni, ‘Chunyu kik nyosre, kendo kik uluor jogo.  30RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu e jatendu, kendo en ema obiro kedonu, mana kakanokedonu e Misri cha. ’ 31To bende kane un e thim nuneno kaka ne RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu oting’ou e wuodhu duto nyaka nuchopo kaeri, mana kang’ama ting’o nyathine.  32To kata obedo kamano, pod nutamoru atama genokuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, 33mane telo nyimu mondo ong’inu kuondemane unyalo bworoe.  Gotieno notelo nyimu kobet ei mach, mondo onyisukuma onego uluw, to godiechieng’ notelonu kobet e bor polo. Nyasaye okumo jo-Israel(Kwan
.
-
)
"Kane Ruoth Nyasaye owinjo wecheugo, mirima nomake, mokuong’ore niya,
‘Onge kata ng’at achiel kuom tieng’ marachni ma none piny maber maneasingora ni nami kweregi, 36mak mana Kaleb wuod Jefune.  En ema nonepinyno, kendo anamiye kaachiel gi nyikwaye piny ma osenyonono, nikechosebedo ka oluwa gi chunye duto. ’ 37Gima nutimono nomiyo Ruoth Nyasayeokecho koda an bende, mowachona niya, ‘Kata in bende ok inidonji epinyno, 38to Joshua wuod Nun matiyoni ema nodonj kuno.  Kuom mano, jiwemondo obed motegno, nimar en ema nomi jo-Israel okaw pinyno.  39Nyithinduma pod tindo mane uparo ni nobed joma nomak e lweny, kendo mapok ong’eyopogo ber gi rach ema nodonj e pinyno.  Gin ema namigi pinyno, kendoginidagie.  40Omiyo chakuru wuoth mondo udog e thim kuchomo Nam Makwar. ’Olo jo-Israel Horma(Kwan
.
-
)
"Eka nudwoka niya, ‘Waseketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, omiyo koro wabirodhi mondo wamonj pinyno kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ochikowa. ’ Omiyong’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nokawo gi lwenje, kuparo ni en gima yot monjopiny godeno.  42To Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Kwergi kik gidhigikedi, nimar an ok nabed kodgi, omiyo wasikgi biro loyogi. ’ 43Nanyisoukamano, to ne ok udewo.  Nudagi winjo wach Ruoth Nyasaye, mudhi umonjopiny gode mana gi wiu matek.  44Jo-Amor modak e piny gode nowuok kedokodu, mi ginur kuomu mana ka kich, kendo ne gikeyou e gweng’ Seir, migiriembou nyaka Horma.  45Bang’ mano nuduogo, muywak e nyim RuothNyasaye, to ne ok onyal winjo ywaku, kendo ne ok onyal dewou.  46Mano emaomiyo nudak Kadesh-barnea kuom ndalo mang’eny. Rapar mar Chik 2Higni mane jo-Israel otieko e thim1 "Bang’e ne wamako yo mang’ado thim, kwachomo Nam Makwar, kaka RuothNyasaye nochikowa, kendo ne wadigni e piny gode mag Seir kuom ndalomang’eny, 2nyaka Ruoth Nyasaye nokona niya,
‘Usebedu kudigni e pinygodegi moromo, omiyo koro wichreuru uchom yo nyandwat.  4To wach ni jikama: "Bang’ kinde manok ubiro ng’ado e piny joweteu ma nyikwa Esaumodak Seri.  5Ginibed maluor ka ginenou, to un nyaka une ni ok ukwinyogi,nikech ok namiu pinygi kata matin nono, nimar piny gode mag Seir asemiyoEsau ka mwandune.  6Unyalo yudo chiemo gi pi kuomgi, to nyaka uchul,7nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseguedhou kuom gik moko duto mausetimo.  Oseritou ka uwuotho e thim malichni.  Kuom higni pieroang’wen-gi duto Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osebedo kodu, kendo onge gimausechando. " ’ 8Kamano ne wakadho, mi waweyo jowetewa ma nyikwa Esaumodak Seir, kendo ne waweyo yo mochomo Elath gi Ezion-geber, mi newawichore mwamako yo mochiko thim Moab.
"Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Kik umonj jo-Moab, kendo kikukwinygi nikech ok namiu pinygi kata matin mondo obed mwanduu, nimarasechiwo dala mar Ar ni nyikwa Lut mondo obed mwandugi. ’
(Jo-Emim maneoganda maratego ahinya, kendo mane nigi ji mang’eny nosedak kuno e kindemoko.  Ne gin joma raboche mana ka jo-Anakim.  11Ji ne luongogi nijo-Refaim, mana kaka niluongo jo-Anakim, to jo-Moab ne luongogi nijo-Emim.  12Mokwongo jo-Hori nodak Seir to nyikwa Esau notiekogi, mokawopinygi kendo odakie, mana kaka jo-Israel notimo e piny mane RuothNyasaye omiyogi mondo obed mwandugi. )
"Ruoth Nyasaye nodhi nyime kowachona niya, ‘Wuothuru mondo ung’ad holomar Zere. ’ Mi ne wang’ado.  14Ne wasetieko higni piero adek gaboro chakrekinde mane wawuokie Kadesh-barnea, nyaka wang’ado holo mar Zered.  Ekindeno tieng’ mar jolweny ne koro osetho duto, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasayenosekuong’ore.  15Ruoth Nyasaye ema nokelonigi masira, motiekogi pep, maonge kata ng’atgi achiel mane odong’ e kambi.
"Kane jolwenygo duto osetho te, 17Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya,
‘Kawuono ubiro ng’ado tong’ mar Moab e dala mar Ar, 19kendo kuchopo epiny jo-Moab, to kik ukwinygi kata kik umonjgi, nikech ok namiu pinygimondo obed mwanduu, nimar asechiwe ni nyikwa Lut. ’
(Pinyno bendeikwano ka piny jo-Refaim.  Jo-Refaim nosedak kuno mokwongo, to jo-Amon nelwongogi ni jo-Zamzumim.  21Ne gin oganda maratego ahinya, kendo manenigi ji mang’eny.  Ne gin joma raboche mana ka jo-Anakim, to RuothNyasaye notiekogi, kane gitemo geng’o ni jo-Amon mane monjogi, mijo-Amon nokawo pinygi mi odakie.  22Mano notimore mana kaka Ruoth Nyasayenotimo ni jo-Hori mane otemo geng’o ni nyikwa Esau mane odak Seir. Notieko jo-Horigo mi nyikwa Esau nokawo pinygi kendo pod gidakie nyakachil kawuono.  23To jo-Avim mane odak e mier matindo but Gaza, jo-Kaftorema notieko, mokawo pinygi, modakie. )
"Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nodhi nyime, kowachone niya, ‘Wuothuru mondo ung’adholo mar Arnon, nimar asechiwo Sihon ja-Amor ma ruodh Heshbon e lwetukaachiel gi pinye.  Koro donjuru e pinye mondo uked kode.  25Chakrekawuono abiro miyo ogendni duto ma e piny ngima luorou ahinya, ma kataka giwinjo mana humbu, to gibiro kirni ka kihondko omakogi. ’Jo-Israel oloyo Sihon(Kwan
.
-
)
"Omiyo kane pod wan e thim Kedemoth, naoro joote ir Sihon ruodhHeshbon kakwaye gi ng’wono niya,
‘Yie mondo wakadh e pinyi.  Wabiroluwo mana yo tir ma ok wabaro korachwich kata koracham.  28Bende wabirong’iewo kuomu chiemo mwachamo kod pi mwamodho.  29Omiyo yienwa mondowakadhi mana kaka nyikwa Esau modak Seir kod jo-Moab modak Ar ne joyienwa, mwakadho.  Bang’ mano, wanyalo ng’ado Jordan mondo wadonj e pinyma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa miyowa. ’ 30To kata kamano, Sihon ruodhHeshbon nodagi miyowa thuolo mondo wakadhi, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu nomiyo toke odoko matek mondo ochiwe kaachiel gi pinye e lwetu,kendo uneno ka pinyno pod marwa nyaka chil kawuono.  31Kuom mano RuothNyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Biuru, nikech koro adwaro chiwo Sihon kaachielgi pinye e lwetu.  Monjeuru, mondo ukaw pinye. ’ 32Kamano Sihon gi jogenowuok morado kodwa Jahaz.  33To Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa nochiwe elwetwa, mi wanege kaachiel gi yawuote kod joge duto.  34Kinde nogonobende ema ne wakawoe mier mage duto, mwaketho chuth, kendo wanego jiduto mane odakie, chwo gi mon kod nyithindo.  Onge ng’ato kata achielmane waweyo ka ngima.  35Jamni kaachiel gi gik mane wayako e mier manewaloyo kende emane wakawo.  36Onge dala mane nyalo sirowa, chakre Aroer edho holo mar Arnon, kod dala man e holo hie, nyaka chop Gilead.  AdierRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ema nochiwo gik moko duto e lwetwa.  37To katakamano, nomako chik Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa gi chunyu duto mi okumonjo piny jo-Amon ji yo ka holo mar Jabok, kata mana gi yo ka miechgimanie gode. Rapar mar Chik 3Jo-Israel oloyo Og ruodh Bashan(Kwan
.
-
)
"Bang’e ne wawuok, mi wamako yo mochomo piny Bashan.  Eka Og ruodhBashan kaachiel gi joge duto ne jowuok mondo oked kodwa Edrei.  2To RuothNyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Kik uluor Og, nimar asechiwe kaachiel gi jogekod pinye e lwetu.
