Timneuru mana kaka nutimo ni Sihon ruodh jo-Amor maneodak Heshbon. ’ 3Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa nochiwo Og ruodhBashan kaachiel gi joge e lwetwa, mi ne wanegogi duto, ma ok waweyo katang’at achiel ka ngima.  4E kindeno bende ne wakawoe gweng’ Argob duto,man e piny Og ruodh Bashan.  Ne wakawo mier mage duto, ma onge kataachiel mane odong’.  5Ne gin mier piero auchiel, mochiel motegno giohinga maboyo, moketie dhorangeye man gi thipe kod lodi.  To bende newakawo mier moko matindo mang’eny ma ok ochiel.  6Dala ka dala ne wanegoeji duto modakie, chwo gi man kod nyithindo, mana kaka be watimo ni miechSihon ruodh Heshbon.  7To jamni kod mwandu duto mane nie miego, newayako.
"Kamano e kaka ne wakawo pinje mag ruodhi ariyo mag jo-Amor mane niloka Jordan yo wang’chieng’, chakre holo mar Arnon nyaka got Hermon.
(Jo-Sidon lwongo got Hermon ni Sirion, to jo-Amor luonge ni Senir. )10Ne wakawo mier duto manie piny gode motarore, kaachiel gi piny Gileadkod piny Bashan, nyaka Saleka gi Edrei, miech Og ruodh Bashan.
(Ogruodh Bashan kende ema nodong’ kuom jo-Refaim.  Sandug liende, molos gikite maratenge, pod ni Raba dala jo-Amor nyaka chil kawuono.  Bornechiegni romo mita abich to to lachne mita ariyo. )Jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod nus jo-Manase omi piny man yo wuokchieng’ marJordan(Kwan
.
-
)
"Kane wakawo pinyno ne apogo ni jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad piny man yonyndwat mar Arwer, e bath holo Arnon, kod nus mar piny gode man Gilead,kaachiel gi mier duto mane ni kuno.  13To nus piny Gilead, komachielo kodBashan piny Og, napogo ni nus jo-Manase.  (Piny Bashan duto niluongo nipiny jo-Refaim.  14Jair nyakwar Manase nokawo gweng’ Argob duto nyakatong’ jo-Geshur gi jo-Maakath.  Pod nitie mier moko e Bashan kunomiluongo ni Havoth-jair ma tiende ni miech Jair. ) 15Napogo ni joka Makirpiny Gilead.  16To jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad napogonigi piny mochakore Gileadnyaka dier holo mar Arnon, kendo nyaka holo mar Jabok, moting’o tong’ gipiny jo-Amon, 17kaachiel gi piny manie holo mar aora Jirdan, chakre NamGalili nyaka Nam Araba miluonmgo ni Nam Kado, man yo podhochieng’ margot Pisga.
"E kinde nogono nachiko dhoudi ariyo gi nusgo kama: ‘Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu osemiyou pinyni mondo obed mwanduu, to jolwenju duto nyakadong’ e oganda lweny, kendo otel e nyim jo-Israel weteu.  19Mak manamondu gi nyithindu kod jambu ema mondo odong’; e mier masemiyougo. (Ang’eyo ni un gi jamni mathoth. ) 20To ka Ruoth Nyasaye osekonyo oweteukaka osekonmyou, mi gikawo piny man loka Jordan ma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu miyogi, mi gidakie, eka unyalo dok e piny ma asemiyouni, ng’atoka ng’ato e dalane. ’
"Chieng’no bende nachiko Joshua niya, ‘Nuneno gi wang’u gima RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu notimo ni ruodhi ariyo kande.  Ruoth Nyasaye birotimo mana kamano ni pinje duto mubiro donjoe kuseng’ado aora Jordan. 22Kik uluorgi, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ema biro kedonu. ’Ruoth Nyasaye ok oyie mondo Musa odonj e piny Kanaan23 "Chieng’ onogono, nakwayo Ruoth Nyasaye niya,
‘A Ruoth Nyasaye,isechako nyisa duong’ni gi tekoni.  Onge Nyasaye moro amora e polo kata epiny ma tekone nyalo romo gi tekoni, kata manyalo timo timbe madongomitimogi.  25Akwayi ni yie ang’ad Jordan mondo aneye piny maber man lokacha kod piny gode mabeyo, kaachiel gi piny Lebanon. ’ 26To Ruoth Nyasayenokecho koda ahinya nikech gik musetimo, omiyo notamore winjo kwayona. Nodwoka nioya, ‘We! Mano oromo.  Kik ichak iwuo koda kendo kuom wachno. 27Dhiyo ewi got Pisga mondo irang yo nyandwat gi yo milambo, kendo irangyo wuokchieng’ gi yo podhochieng’.  Inyalo mana neno pinyno gi wang’i, toin iwuon ok ning’ad Jordan.  28Ket Joshua mondo okaw kari.  Ijiwe kendoimiye teko, nimar en ema obiro telo ni jogi, koterogi loka cha mondogikaw piny minenono. ’
"Kuom mano ne wadong’ e hoho momanyore gi Beth-peor. "Dholuo DC Bible © Bible Society of Kenya and Bible Society of Tanzania,
. Rapar mar Chik 4Musa ojiwo jo-Israel mondo orit chik1Musa nomedo wacho niya, "To koro, un jo-Israel, winjuru chike gi buchema apuonjou, kendo umak, eka unubed mangima kendo unudonj e piny maRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu nomiu, mudagie.  2Kik umed gimoro kuomgik ma achikou, kata kik ugol gimoro kuomgi.  Rituru chike mag RuothNyasaye adimba, mana kaka amiyougi.  3Nuneno gi wang’u gima Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu notimo Baal-peor.  Nonego jou moko duto mane lamo Baal manyasach Peor.  4To un mane upadoru kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, podungima uduto nyaka chil kawuono.  5Asepuonjou chike gi buche kaka RuothNyasaye ma Nyasacha nochika.  Mago duto nyaka urit e piny mudhi donjoe,kendo kawo.  6Ritgiuru adimba, nimar mano biro nyiso ogendini mamoko niuriek.  Ka giniwinj chikegi eki, to giniwach niya, ‘Onge oganda moromariek ka oganda maduong’ni. ’ 7Giniwach kamano nimar onge oganda moro,kata bed ni oduong’ manade, ma nyasache nyalo sudo machiegni kode kakaRuoth Nyasaye sudo machiegni kodwa e sa asaya ma walame.  8Onge ogandamoro kata bed ni oduong’ manade, man gi chike kod buche makare machal giChik ma aseketo e nyimu tinendeni. Musa oparo ni jo-Israel gima notimore Horeb9"To beduru kutang’ kendo neuru ni wiu ok owil gi gik museneno giwang’u.  Kik uwe gia e chunyu ka pod ungima, to hulgiuru ni nyithindukendo ni nyikwau.  10Nyaka uparnigi gik mane otimore chieng’ mane uchung’Horeb e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu cha, ka Ruoth Nyasaye wachona ni,‘Chokna ji e nyima ka, mondo giwinj kawuoyo kodgi, kendo gipuonjre luorae ngimagi duto. ’ 11Nusudo machiegni, mi uchung’ e tiend got.  Got newang’ gi mach matundo e polo, e mudho mandiwa gi rumbi kod ong’weng’omopoto.  12Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye noloso kodu gie majno, muwinjo dwolmawuoyo, to ne ok uneno kit gimoro amora.  Dwol kende ema nuwinjo. 13Nohulonu ratiro singruok ma koro notimo kodu, kochikou mondo uritsingruokno, tiende ni rito Chike Apar, mane ondiko kuom kite ariyomopamore.  14To bende e sano Ruoth Nyasaye nochika ni mondo apuonju chikegi buche ma nyaka udhi urit e piny mudhi donjoe mondo ukauw. Osiem jo-Israel ni kik lam gik maket15"Chieng’ mane Ruoth Nyasaye owuoyo kodu Horeb gie mach, ne ok unenokit gimoro amora, 16omiyo ritreuru matek ni kik udonj e richo mar losokido maket, bed ni en gima chal gi dichwo, kata gi dhako, 17kata manamachal gi chiayo, kata gi winyo, 18kata gi gima mol, kata gi rech. 19Bende kung’iyo polo, muneno gik moko duto mantie, kaka chieng’ gi duekod sulue, to kik gimoro ywau mondo ukulrunigi kata ulamgi.  Gik makamago Ruoth Nyasaye osechiwo ni ogendini mamoko e piny duto ka gik magilamo.  20To un e oganda ma Ruoth Nyasaye nokawo, mogolo Misri e sandmager ka mach makakni, ni mondo ubed joge owuon, kaka pod un nyaka chilkawuono.  21To Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nokecho koda nikech un, miokuong’ore ni ok nang’ad aora Jordan, kata donjo e piny maber ma omiyoumondo obed maruno.  22An to nyaka atho e pinyni mak ang’ado Jordan, to unubiro dhi loka mondo ukaw piny maberno.  23Ritreuru mondo une ni wiu okowil gi singruok mane Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osetimo kodu.  Kik uloskido moro amora maket, kukethogo chik mar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,24nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu en mach matieko gik mowang’o, kendo enNyasaye ma janyiego.
"Ka usedak e pinyno aming’a munywolo nyithindu gi nyikwau, to bedurumotang’ mondo kik udonj e richo kuom loso kido moro amora maket.  26Koroaluongo polo gi piny mondo obed janeno ni, ka timbeu obedo maricho enyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kamano, mokecho kodu, to unurum piyopiyo,kendo ok nudag aming’a e piny ma koro ung’ado Jordan mondo udhi ukaw, tonotieku chuth.  27Ruoth Nyasaye noriembu, kendo nokeu e kind ogendinimamoko, mi nudong’ ji manok e kindgi.  28Kuondego unulamie nyiseche molosgi yien kata gi kidi, ma ok nyal neno, kata winjo wach, kata chamogimoro.  Tik gimoro bende ok ginyal winjo.  29To kudwaro Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu gi chunyu duto gi adiera kuonde moterouego, to unuyude.  30Tomogik, ka gigi otimorenu, mi udonjo e masira, to unudog ir Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu, kendo unurit chikene.  31Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu enNyasaye mang’won, omiyo ok nojwang’u, kata kethou ok nokethu, kendo wiyeok nowil gi singruok ma notimo gi kwereu kokuong’ore.
"Koro penjuru ane gima notimore e higni machon, ndalo mane pokonywolu, chakre kinde mane Nyasaye ochueyoe dhano e piny.  Bende penjuruane wach, chakre tung’ piny nyaka tung’ piny, ka gima duong’ kamanooseneye kata osewinjie.  33Bende nitie oganda moro mosewinjo dwondNyasaye kawuoyo gie mach kaka usewinjo, to kendo pod ngima? 34Koso nitieNyasaye moro mosetemo golo oganda moro kuom oganda machielo maneoselokogi wasumbni? Bende nyasaye moro osetimo timbe madongo gi ranyisikod honni, kokedo gi teko maduong’ kendo komiyo ji luoro kod kibaji? ToRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu notimonu gik ma kamago kogolou Misri manakuneno gi wang’u.  35Mago duto Ruoth Nyasaye notimo mondo onyisu ni enNyasaye.  Onge Nyasaye moro mak mana en.  36Ne oyienu winjo dwonde giepolo mondo opuonjugo, bende noyienu neno maye malich ei majno.  37Noherokwereu, moyiero nyikwagi, omiyo en owuon nogolou Misri gi tekonemaduong’, 38kendo noriembo ogendini madongo kendo mohewou gi teko, nimondo udonj e pinygi, kendo ukaw obed maru, kaka pod en nyaka chilkawuono.  39Kuom mano koro beduru gi adiera, kendo ung’e ni Ruoth Nyasayeen Nyasaye, kendo onge nyasaye moro e polo kata e piny.  40Emomiyo riturubuche kod chike Nyasaye ma amiyou kawuono.  Eka un kaachiel gi nyikwauunubed maber, kendo unudag aming’a e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachumiyou mondo obed maru nyaka chieng’. "Miech tony man yo wuokchieng’ mar aora Jordan41 Bang’e Musa noyiero mier adek e piny man yo wuokchieng’ mar aoraJordan, 42mondo obed kuonde ma ka ng’ato oboth, monego wadgi ma yande okgimonrego, to onyalo pondoe.  Kochopo e achiel kuom miergo, to oresongimane.  43Miergo ne: Bezer-e-thim manie piny gode motarore, manejo-Reuben nyalo pondoe, gi Ramoth-gilead manie piny Gilead, mane jo-Gadnyalo pondoe, kod Golan manie piny Bashan, mane jo-Manase bende nyalopondoe. Kinde mane Musa onwoyoe weche mag Chik44Koro magi e chike mane Musa omiyo jo-Israel.  45Gin e chike gi buchemane Musa onyiso jo-Israel kane gisea Misri, 46mi gichopo e piny man yowuokchieng’ mar aora Jordan e hoho momanyore gi Beth-peor e piny Sihonruodh Amor modak Heshbon.  Musa gi jo-Israel noloyo ruodhno kane giseaMisri, 47mi ne gikawo pinye kaachiel gi piny Og ruodh Bashan.  Ruodhigone mag jo-Amor mane odak e piny man yo wuokchieng’ mar Jordan.  48Pinynonochakore Aroer man e bath holo mar Arnon nyaka got Sirion, ma bendeiluongo ni Hermon, 49kaachiel gi piny pap duto man yo wuokchieng’ maraora Jordan, nyaka Nam Kado man e tik got Pisga. Dholuo DC Bible © Bible Society of Kenya and Bible Society of Tanzania,
. Rapar mar Chik 5Chike Apar(Wuok
.
-
)1Musa noluongo jo-Israel duto mowachonigi niya, "Un jo-Israel winjuruchike kod buche ma awasecho kuwinjo kawuono ni.  Puonjreuru, kendo uritgimaber.  2Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa notimo kodwa singruok Horeb.  3Ne okotimo singruok gi kwerewa, to mana kodwa, waduto ma wan ka, ma podwangima.  4Ruoth Nyasaye noloso kodu wang’ gi wang’ gie mach, ewi godno. 5Chutho an nachung’ e kindu gi Ruoth Nyasaye e sechego, mondo eka akownuweche Ruoth Nyasaye nikech nuluoro mach, mi ne ok uidho godno. "Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya,
" ‘An e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachun ma nogolou e piny Misri kuma neubedoe wasumbini.
" ‘Kik ubed gi Nyasaye moro mak mana an.
" ‘Kik ulos kido moro mopa kata gima chalo gi gimoro manie polo malokata manie piny mwalo kata mana manie pi mae bwo piny.  9Kik ukulrunigi,kata lamogi kik ulamgi, nikech an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu an Nyasayema janyiego.  Akumo nyithind joma ochaya nikech richo jonywolgi nyakatieng’ mar adek gi mar ang’wen, 10to tienge gana gi gana mohera kendomomako chikena, ahero gi hera mosiko.
" ‘Kik uluong nying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kayiem nono, nimaranakum ng’ato ka ng’ato mokonyore gi nyinga e yo ma ok kare.
" ‘Rituru chieng’ Sabato kendo uwale ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kaka RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu nochikou.  13Nyaka uti tijeu duto kuom ndalo auchiel,14to chieng’ mar abiriyo en chieng’ yueyo mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu.  Chieng’no un, kaachiel gi yawuotu kod nyiu, kata wasumbumachwo gi mamon, kata ruethu kata kata kenjeu kata dhou, kata mana jodakmanie miechu kik ti tich moro.  Mano en ni mondo wasumbu machwo gi mamonoyue kaka un bende uyueyo.  15Paruru malong’o ni un uwegi ne un wasumbnie piny Misri, to Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nogolou kuno gi teko mathothkod bat morie.  Mano emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nochikou ni mondourit Sabato.
" ‘Luor wuoru gi meru kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nochikou, ekamondo udag aming’a, kendo udhi maber e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachubiro miyou.
" ‘Kik ineki.
" ‘Kik iterri.
" ‘Kik ikwal.
" ‘Kik ihang ni ng’ato wach.
" ‘Kik igomb chi ng’ato kata od ng’ato kata puoth ng’ato kata misumbang’ato kata dher ng’ato kata kanj ng’ato, kata gimoro amora mar ng’ato. ’Luoro omako jo-Israel(Wuok
.
-
)
"Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyou chikego ka uchokoru uduto e got.  Noloso gidwol maduong’ gie mach ei rumbi kod ong’weng’o mopoto, eka noweyo wuoyo. Bang’e nondiko chikego e kite ariyo mopamore, momiya.  23Kane uwinjo dwolka wuok e mudho, to got wang’, jotend dhoutu gi jodongu nobiro ira,24mowachona niya, ‘Ne! Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa osenyisowa duong’nemaler gi tekone, kendo wasewinjo dwonde kawuok ei mach.  Omiyo korowang’eyo ni kara Nyasaye nyalo wuoyo gi dhano, mi dhano chak bed abedamangima.  25To kata kamano, kik wawit ngimawa, nimar mach malich chanyalo mana wang’owa, mi tiekwa.  Kwachako wawinjo dwond Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachwa kendo, to wabiro tho, 26nikech onge ng’at moro amora mosewinjodwond Nyasaye mangima kawuok e mach, kaka wasewinjo, to pod ngima.  27Inema inyalo sudo machiegni mondo iwinj weche duto ma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachwa dhi wacho.  Bang’e iduog iwachnwa gigo duto mowachoni, ekawanawinjgi, kendo wanamakgi. ’
"Ruoth Nyasaye nowinjo gima nuwachona, mokona niya, ‘Asewinjo gima jiowachoni.  Gin kare.  29Da ber ka gisiko gi chuny moluora kendo moritochikena duto, eka mondo gin gi nyikwagi gidag maber nyaka chieng’. 30Dhiyo kendo iwachnigi mondo gidog e hembegi, 31to in dong’ koda kamondo ahulni chike gi buche ma nyaka ipuonjgi girit e piny ma amiyogimondo gidagie. ’
"Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osemiyou chikegi, omiyo ritgiuru maber. 33Luwuru yo ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechikou, mak ubaro korachamkata korachwich.  Bang’e eka unubed maber kendo unudag aming’a e piny maudhi kawo. Rapar mar Chik 6Chik maduong’ moloyo1"Koro magi e chike kod buche mane Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ochikamondo apuonju uriti e piny mubiro donjoe kendo kawo mondo obed maru.  2Engimau duto un kaachiel gi nyikwau nyaka uluor Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, kendo urit buchene gi chikene ma amiyou kawuono.  Bang’e ekaunudag maber aming’a.  3Omiyo un jo-Israel winjuru kendo rituru chikegomondo udag maber kendo unya e piny maber kendo momewno, mana kaka RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu nosingorenu.
"Winjuru un jo-Israel.  Ruoth Nyasaye e Nyasachwa, en e Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo en kende e Nyasaye.  5Heruru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi chunyuduto, gi parou duto, kendo gi tekou duto.  6Chike ma amiyou kawuonogi,kanuru e chunyu, 7kendo puonjgiuru nyithindu.  Bende twaguru kuomgi emier, kata kuwuotho e yo, kata kudhi nindo, kata kuchiew gokinyi. 8Tuegiuru ka ranyisi e lwetu, kendo mien-giuru e lend wang’u ka kido,9bende ndikgiuru e sirni mag dhoutu kendo kuom rangeyeu. Osiem jo-Israel ni kik gitamre mako chik10 "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nokelu e piny mane osesingore ni kwereu maIbrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo ni nomiu.  En piny man gi mier mang’enymadongo miwuoro, mane ok ugero, 11kod udi mopong’ gi kit gik moko dutomabeyo ma un ne ok uketoe.  En gi sokni mokuny e lwanda ma un ne okukunyo, kod puothe mag olemb mzabibu kod mag zeituni mane ok upidho. Kusechiemo, muyieng, 12to kik wiu wil gi Ruoth Nyasaye mane ogolou epiny Misri, kuma ne ubedoe wasumbni.  13Luoruru Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, kendo utine.  Ka ukuong’oru to nyaka ukuong’ru mana gi nyinge. 14Kik uluw nyiseche mag ogendini mokiewo kodu, 15nikech kuluwogi, toRuoth Nyasaye modak e dieru biro kecho kodu ahinya mi dotieku e wang’piny, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu en Nyasaye ma janyiego.
"Kik utem Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kaka nuteme ka un Masa.  17Nyakaurit malong’o chike Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kaachiel gi wechene kodbuchene moko mane omiyou.  18Timuru gik makare kendo mabeyo e nyim RuothNyasaye, mondo udag maber mi udonj kendo ukaw opiny maber maneosesingore kokuong’ore ni kwereu 19Obiro riembonu wasiku duto mondoowenu thuolo, kaka nosingore.
"To e ndalo mabiro ka yawuotu nopenju ni, ‘Weche gi buche kod chikemane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyou, tiendgi ang’o?’ 21To nudwokgi niya, ‘Ne wanwasumb Farao e piny Misri, to Ruoth Nyasaye nogolowa kuno gi tekomaduong’. ’ 22Kendo nosando piny Misri gi Farao kod joge duto, kokelonigimasiche madongo gi ranyisi kod honni, kaka ne waneno.  23Nogolowa kunomondo oterwa e piny mane osesingore ni kwerewa ni nomiwa.  24RuothNyasaye nochikowa ni mondo warit chikegi duto, kendo ni mondo waluore. Eka dwadag maber ndalo duto, kendo domed ritowa.  25Ka warito chikegiduto e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, to obiro kwanowa ka joma kare. "Rapar mar Chik 7Jo-Israel onego obed joma owal ni Ruoth Nyasaye(Wuok
.
-
)
"Ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oterou mondo ukaw piny ma ubirodhiyoeno, noriembnu ogendini abiriyo madongo kendo marateke moloyou, magin jo-Hiti, gi jo-Girgash gi jo-Amor gi jo-Kanaan gi jo-Perizi gijo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus.  2Kosechiwogi e lwetu kamano, muloyogi to nyakauneggi duto.  Kik utim kodgi winjruok, to bende kik uwe mak utiekogi,3Kik uyie yawuotgi okend nyiu, bende kik yawuotu kend nyigi, 4nimarkutimo kamano, to nyigo nolok chuny yawuotu mondo kik lam Ruoth Nyasaye,to olam mana nyiseche mamoko.  Mano dimi Ruoth Nyasaye kech kodu, kendotieku piyopiyo.  5Kuom mano, onego utimnigi mana kama: Mukuru kendegi magliswa, kendo kethuru sirni maggi milamo mag kite gi mag yien, mi uwang’kido mag nyisechegi manono, 6nimar un joma owal ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu.  Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noyierou e kind ji duto mae pinymondo ubed ogandane moyiero.
"Uparo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noparou, moyierou nikech ung’enymoloyo ogendini mamoko duto koso? Ooyo, ka adier to un e oganda matiniemoloyo.  8Noyierou mana nikech noherou, kendo nikech norito singruok maneotimo ni kwereu.  Mano emomiyo nogolou gi tekone maduong’ e piny maneunie wasumbini, moresou e lwet Farao ruodh Misri.  9Omiyo koro ng’euru niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu en Nyasaye.  En Nyasaye ma jaadiera kendomarito singruokne kuom tienge gana gi gana mag jii mohere kendo momakochikene, koherogi gi hera mosiko.  10To jogo mochaye kendo ma ok ohere,otieko chuth piyopiyo ma ok odeko.  11Nyaka umak chikene gi buchene maamiyou kawuononi, kendo uritgi. Gueth miyudo kimako chik(Tim jo-Lawi
.
-
; Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
"Kuwinjo chikegi kendo uritogi, to Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu birorito singruok mane otimo gi kwereu, kendo obiro siko koherou.  13Enoherukendo enogwedhu, mi enomi unya mathoth.  Enoguedhu gi nyithindo mang’enykod gik manyak e pwotheu, kaka ngano gi divai kod mo, kendo enoguedhu gijamni mang’eny e piny ma nosingore ni kwereu ni nomiu.  14Unubed jomaogwedhi moloyo ogendini mamoko duto.  Ok nobedie bwoch kata lur kuom joukata kuom jambu.  15Ruoth Nyasaye notiek tuoche duto kuomu bende oknokelnu tuoche maricho mane goyou e piny Misri, to wasiku ema nokelnetuochego.  16Tiekuru ji duto ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro chiwo elwetu.  Kik uwegi, to bende kik ulam nyisechegi, nikech kutimo kamano, tomano dibednu obadho.
"Dipo ka uwacho niya, ‘Ogendinigi ng’eny mohingowa.  Ere kakadwariembgi?’ 18Kata kamano kik uluorgi, to paruru gik ma Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu notimo ni Farao kendo ni piny Misri ngima.  19Paruru timbemadongo mane uneno gi wang’u kod ranyisi gi honni kaachiel gi tekomaduong’ mane Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ogolougo Misri gi bat morie. Kamano e kaka obiro timo ni ogendini duto muluorogo.  20Bende obiromiyogi kihondko, mondo otiek joma pod odong’, kata mago mopondo kamoroamora.  21Kik luoro maku kukedo kodgi, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,ma en Nyasaye maduong’ kendo malich ni kodu.  22Obiro riembonu ogendinigomatintin nyaka girum.  Ok unutiekgi dichiel, nimar dipo ka ondiegionywolore mang’eny, mothagou.  23To Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nochiwogendinigo e lwetu, kendo ok nowenigi thuolo nyaka chop girum te. 24Enochiw ruodhi mag ogedinigo e lwetu, mi unumi kargi lal chuth, kendoonge kata ng’at achiel kuomgi ma nosiru, to unutiekgi pep.  25Nyakauwang’ kido mag nyisechego manono, kendo kik ugomb fedha gi dhahabu magibawogo nyisechegigo, bende kik ukawgi.  Kutimo kamano, to enobednuobadho, nimar gigo gin gik makuero e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. 26Kik ukel gimoro amora makuero e miechu, nikech kutimo kamano, to unbende unubed joma okwedi.  Nyaka ubed mosin kod gik ma kamago, kendoukwan-gi ka gik makuero, nikech gin gik ma nyaka utiek, marum chuth. Rapar mar Chik 8Piny maber ma jo-Israel biro kawo1"Nyaka urit chike duto ma amiyou kawuononi, mondo ubed mangima, miunya, kendo udonj e piny mane Ruoth Nyasaye osingore ni nomi kwereu,odagie.  2Paruru wuoth mabor mane Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu otelonue kuomhigni piero ang’wen ka un e thim.  Nodwokou piny kotemougo, mondo ong’eane ka unyalo rito chikene adier.  3Nodwokou piny, kendo nomiyo kechokayou, eka bang’e nomiyou manna mondo ucham.  En chiemo mane pok uneno,kendo kwereu bende ne ok oneno.  Notimo kamano mondo onyisugo ni dhano okbed mangima nikech chiemo kende, to obedo mangima gi weche duto mawuok edho Ruoth Nyasaye.  4Kuom higni piero ang’wen go duto, lepu ne ok oti,kata tiendu ne ok okuot.  5To nyaka ung’e ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nerieyou mondo opuonju mana kaka ng’ato puonjo nyathine.  6Rituru chikeRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mondo uwuoth e yorene, kendo umiye duong’,7nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu terou e piny maber, motimo aore gisokni, kendo man gi kuonde ma pi wuokie ewi gode kendo e holni.  8En pinymachiego cham kaka ngano gi shairi, kendo machiego mzabibu gi ng’owo gizeituni kod olembe mamoko, bende ma mor kich ng’enyie.  9En piny maunubedie gi chiemo mang’eny, kendo onge gima unuchandie.  Bende en pinyman gi kite miloso nyinyo.  Mula bende unyalo kunyo e godene.  10Kusebedogi chiemo mang’eny, moromou, to pakuru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kuompiny maber mosemiyouno. Osiem jo-Israel ni kik wi Nyasaye11 "Kik wiu wil gi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo kik uwe rito chikenegi buchene ma amiyou kawuononi.  12Kusebedo gi chiemo mang’eny moromou,kendo usegero udi mabeyo mudakie, 13mi jambu gi fethu gi dhahapu kodmwanduu duto omedore, 14to kik ubed josunga, mi wiu wil gi Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu mane ogolou Misri kuma nubedoe wasumbni, 15nimar notelonu ethim maduong’ kendo malich, kuma otwo ma onge pi, kendo ma thuonde mangi kwiri maricho kod thomoni opong’o.  En ema nomiyo pi owuoknu e lwandamotegno, 16bende nomiyou manna mane kwereu pok ong’eyo mondo ucham ethim.  Notimo kamano mondo odwokugo piny, kotemou, eka bang’e ogwedhu. 17Emomiyo kik uwach ni tekou gi riekou ema osemiyo uyudo mwandugo, 18toparuru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, nimar en ema omiyou teko mar yudomwandu.  Kamano ochopo singruok mane omiyo kwereu, kokuong’ore.
"To kapo ni wiu owil gi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, muluwo nyisechemamoko, mi ulamogi kendo ukulorunigi, to akuong’ora kawuono ni natiekuma onge kiawa.  20Adier, ka ok uluoro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, tonotieku mana kaka ogendini ma obiro tieko ka odonjo e pinyni. Rapar mar Chik 9Ruoth Nyasaye biro tieko ogendini modak e piny Kanaan1"Winjuru un jo-Isarel.  Kawuono ubiro ng’ado Jordan mondo udhi ukaw pinyogendini marateke kendo madongo moloyou, kaachiel gi mier mochiel giohinga mochopo e polo.  2Gin joma dongo kendo maboyo ma nyikwa Anakim,kaka ung’eyo, nimar usewinjo ka iwacho niya, ‘Ere joma nyalo siro nyikwaAnakim?’ 3To ubiro ng’eyo kawuono ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu emaotelonu kachalo mach matieko gik mowang’o.  Obiro tiekogi en owuon, kendoobiro loyonugi.  Kuom mano, ubiro riembogi kendo tiekogi piyopiyo, manakaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosingorenu.
"Ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu riembo jogo mondo owenu thuolo, to kikuwach ni timbeu mabeyo ema osemiyo Ruoth Nyasaye okelou e pinyni.  5Oktimbeu mabeyo kata dimbruok ma un-go ema omiyo ubiro donjo e piny jogomondo ukaw, to en mana nikech richo mag ogendinigo emomiyo Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu riembogi mondo giwenu thuolo, kochopogo singruok ma notimogi kwereu ma Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo.  6Kuom mano koro ng’euru niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ok miu piny momewni nikech timbeu mabeyo,nimar ka adier, to un joma tokgi tek. Jo-Israel ong’anyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ka gin Horeb(Wuok
.
—
.
)
"Paruru ma wiu ok owil kaka numiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mirima ethim, chakre chieng’ ma ne uwuokie Misri nyaka chieng’ mane uchopoe ka,usebedo kutamoru winjo Ruoth Nyasaye.  8Nukwinye e got Horeb, mokechokodu, kendo odwaro tiekou.  9Noyudo ka asedhi ewi got mondo akaw kitemopamore mag singruok ma Ruoth Nyasaye otimo kodu, mi ne abet ewi gotkuno kuom ndalo piero ang’wen, odiechieng’ gotieno, ka ok achiem kata okamadh gimoro.  10Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nomiya kite ariyo mopamore, mondik gilith lwete.  Weche duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye owachonu gie mach ewi gotchieng’ chokruok, ondiki e kitego.  11Kane ndalo piero ang’wen-go orumo,Ruoth Nyasaye nomiya kite ariyo mopamore mag singruokgo, 12kowachonaniya, ‘Lor piny piyopiyo ia e got, nikech jou mane igolo Misri osetimomarach.  Piyopiyo nono, giseweyo yo mane achikogi ni mondo giluw, migiloso kido mar dhahabu moleny mondo gilam. ’
"Bang’ mano Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Aserango jogi, ma ayudo nigin joma tokgi tek.  14We mondo atiekgi, kendo ami nyinggi olal e pinyduto.  Bang’e anamiyi doko oganda maratego kendo maduong’ moloyogi. ’15Kamano nawichora mi alor piny kaa ewi got mane oyudo wang’, ka ating’okite mopamore mag singruok e lweta.  16Naneno ni useketho e nyim RuothNyasaye kuom loso kido mar nyaroya gi dhahabu moleny, kendo ni piyopiyonono, useweyo yo mane Ruoth Nyasaye ochikou mondo uluw.  17Omiyo nakawokite ariyo mopamorego, mawito piny gi lwetena ariyo, mi ne ging’inyorematindotindo e nyimu.  18Eka nariera piny e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kuom ndalopiero ang’wen odiechieng gotieno, kaka nasetimo e kinde mokwongo, miariyo kech ka ok achiem kata ok amadh gimoro, nikech richo duto maneusetimo kuketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo kumiye mirima.  19Naluoromirima mager mar Ruoth Nyasaye mane chiegni tiekou, to Ruoth Nyasayenochako owinjo ywakna.  20Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho gi Harun ahinya, kendonodwaro tieke, to e sano en bende ne alemone.  21Eka nakawo gimanukethogo, ma en kido mar nyaroya mane uloso, mi awang’o e mach.  Neatoye matindotindo mi arege, molokore buru, kendo nakawo buruno makiro eaora mamol koa e got.
"Bende numiyo Ruoth Nyasaye mirima ka un Tabera gi Masa kodKibroth-hataava, 23kendo kane un Kadesh-barnea, Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu nowacho ni mondo udhi ukaw piny momiyou, to nudagi winjowachne, kendo ne ok ugeno kuome, bende ne ok urito chikne.  24Usebedokudagi Ruoth Nyasaye chakre chieng’ mokwongo mane ang’eyoue.
"Nariera piny e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kuom ndalo piero ang’wen,odiechieng’ gotieno nimar nosewacho ni odwaro tiekou.  26Nalamo RuothNyasaye kakwaye niya, ‘A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ruodha, kik itiek jogi, nimargin mwanduni mane iwaro gi tekoni maduong’, mi igolo Misri gi batmotegno.  27Par jotichni ma Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo, kendo kik idewwich teko gi kethruok kod richo mag jogi, 28nikech ka ok kamano to wegpiny mane igolowae biro wacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye osetero joge e thimmondo otho kuno, nikech osin kodgi, kendo nikech ok onyal terogi e pinymane osesingore ni nomigi. " 29To Ruoth Nyasaye, jogo gin jogi kendomwanduni iwuom mane igolo e piny Misri gi tekoni maduong’ kod batmorie. ’Rapar mar Chik 10Kite ariyo mamoko(Wuok
.
-
)
"Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Pa kite ariyo machal gi mane igoyo pinymobarore kande, mondo ibigo ira ewi got.  Bende los sanduk mar bao. 2Weche mane andiko kuom kite mokwongo mane ibaro kande ema abiro ndikokuom kitego, kendo iniketgi e sandugno. ’ 3Kuom mano, naloso sanduk giyiend shita, kendo napayo kite ariyo machal gi mokwongo ka, mi adhi ewigot kating’o kite ariyogo e lweta.  4Ruoth Nyasaye nondiko kuom kitegochike apar mane osewachonu gie mach ewi got chieng’ chokruok, mana kakanosendiko e kite mokwongo ka, mi nomiyagi.  5Eka nadwogo iru kaa ewi got,mi aketo kitego ei sanduk mane aloso, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochika, kendogisebedo kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.
"Jo-Israel noa e gweng’ sokni mag jo-Jaakan, mi giwuotho matintin kagidhi Mosera.  Eka Harun notho, moyike kuno, mi Eleazar wuode, nodokojadolo kare.  7Ne gia kuno, mi gidhi Gudgoda.  Eka ne gia Gudgoda, migidhi Jotbatha, piny motimo aore.
"E kindego Ruoth Nyasaye nowalo jo dhood Lawi mondo obed joting’Sandug Muma mare, kendo obed jodolo mage, ka giguedho ji e nyinge, manakaka pod gitimo nyaka chil kawuono.  9Mano emomiyo jo-Lawi onge gi pinymopognigi ka mwandugi, kaka opog ni dhout Israel mamoko.  Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu owuon e mwandugi, mana kaka nosesingorenigi.
"Nabet ewi got kuom ndalo piero ang’wen odiechieng’ gotieno, manakaka nasetimo mokwongo, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owinjo kwayona moyie niok obi tiekou.  11Nowachona niya, ‘Chak wuoth kitelo ni ji, mondo gidhigikaw piny mane asingora ni nami kweregi. ’Gik ma Nyasaye dwaro kuom joge12"Koro un jo-Israel, ang’o ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaro kuomu?Donge odwaro mana ni mondo uluore kendo uwuoth e yorene duto, kuherekendo kutiyone gi chunyu duto? 13Ubiro timo kamano kurito chikene gibuchene duto, ma amiyou kawuono mondo okonyu.  14Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu e wuon polo duto, kata polo man malo manadi, kaachiel gi pinybende kod gik moko duto manie iye.  15To kata kamano, Ruoth Nyasaye nepod rito kwereu nikech noherogi, mi bang’gi noyiero mana un nyikwagikuom ogendini moko duto mondo ubed joge, kaka pod ubet nyaka chilkawuono.  16Kuom mano, koro nyaka uyie mako singruok gi chunyu duto,kendo kik umed bedo joma tokgi tek, 17nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu enNyasaye moloyo nyiseche duto, kendo Ruoth moloyo ruodhi duto.  En Nyasayemaduong’ kendo malich miwuoro.  En kende e Nyasaye miluoro, ma ok dewwang’ ng’ato, kendo ma ok cham asoya.  18To ong’ado bura kare ni mondliete, kendo ni nyithi kiye.  Ohero jodak, kendo omiyogi chiemo gi lewni. 19Omiyo un bende onego uher jodak man kuomu, nimar un bende ne un jodake piny Misri.  20Nyaka uluor Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo ulame gichunyu duto, bende kukuong’oru mana gi nyinge.  21En ema nyaka upake,nimar en Nyasachu mosetimonu timbe madongo kendo malich, ma useneno giwang’u.  22Kane kwereu odhi Misri, ne gin mana ji piero abiriyo kende, tokoro Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyo unya ka sulue mae polo. Rapar mar Chik 11Duong’ mar Ruoth Nyasaye1"Heruru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo nyaka urit chikene gi buchenendalo duto.  2Kawuono paruru puonj mane uyudo kuom Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, nimar, kata obedo ni nyithindu pok oneno kata pok ong’eyopuonjno, un to ung’eye.  Bende paruru duong’ mar Ruoth Nyasaye gi tekonekod bade morie, 3gi ranyisi kod timbe mane otimo e piny Misri, kosandogoFarao kaachiel gi pinye duto.  4Donge nuneno gima notimo gi jolwenj Misrigi faresegi kod gechegi? Kane oyudo gilawou, nomiyo pi Nam Makwaroimogi, motiekogi pep.  5Bende paruru gik mane otimonu e thim nyakanuchopo kaeri, 6kod gima notimo ni Dathan kod Abiram, yawuot Eliab maja-Reuben, kendo kaka piny nong’amo dhoge momwonyogi kaachiel gi joodgigi hembegi kod ji duto mane gin-go, mana ka jo-Israel duto neno.  7Unuwegi useneno timbe madongo kendo malich ma Ruoth Nyasaye osetimo. Gueth ma jo-Israel biro yudo e piny Kanaan8"Nyaka urit chike duto ma amiyou kawuono, mondo ubed gi teko kendo ukawpiny ma ubiro donjeno.  9Kamano unudag aming’a e piny maber kendo momewmane Ruoth Nyasaye osingore ni nomi kwereu gi nyikwagi.  10Piny ma ubirodonjoe mondo udagieno ok chal gi piny Misri kuma ne uaye, nimar kunokane usechwoyoe cham, to bang’e nusombo pi uole, mana kaka itimo nipuoth alot.  11To piny ma udonjoe mondo udagieno en piny motimo gode giholni, kendo en piny koth.  12Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu rito pinynomaber, kendo orange pile pile e higa ngima.  13Omiyo kurito chike maamiyou kawuonogi, mi uhero Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo utiyone gichunyu duto, 14to enokelnu koth e ndalo chwiri gi ndalo opon, mondo uyudcham gi mzabibu kod mo.  15Enomi lum lodhi e legeu mondo jambu ocham,kendo un bende unuyud chiemo moromou.  16To ritreuru mondo kik ulal, miuti ni nyiseche ma moko kendo ulamgi.  17Kutimo kamano, to mirimb RuothNyasaye noliel kuomu ka mach, mi enomi koth rum.  Piny ok nochieg cham,kendo karu nolal nono piyopiyo e piny momew ma Ruoth Nyasaye nomiuno. 18Kanuru wechegi e chunyu, kutueyogi ka ranyisi e lwetu, kendo kuketogie lend wengeu ka kido.  19Puonjuru nyithindu wechegi kendo twaguru kuomgika un e mier, kata kuwuotho e yo, kata kudhi nindo, kata kuchiew. 20Ndikgiuru e sirni mag dhoutu, kendo kuom rangeyeu, 21mondo un ginyithindu udag aming’a e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye nosingore ni nomi kwereuobed maru nyaka chieng’.
"Ka urito chike ma amiyougi adimba, mi uhero Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, kendo uwuotho e yorene duto, kuketo chunyu kuome, 23to obiroriembonu ogendinigo mondo owenu thuolo, mi unukaw pinje mag ogendinimadongo kendo marateke moloyou.  24Kamano kamoro amora ma tiendu onyononobed maru, kendo mbap pinyu nochakre e thim yo milambo nyaka pinyLebanon yo nyandwat, kendo chakre aora Yufrate yo wuok chieng’ nyaka namMediterania yo podho chieng’.  25Onge kata ng’ato achiel ma nonyal sirou,kendo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nomi ji luorou, mi kibaji nogogi kuondeduto mudhiye, mana kaka nosingorenu.  26Kawuono aketo gueth kod kuong’ enyimu.  27Ka urito chike mag Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ma amiyou kawuono,to ubiro yudo gueth.  28To ka ok uritogi, mi ubaro kuweyo yo ma asechikoukawuono mondo uluw, mulamo nyiseche mamoko ma ok ung’eyo, to ubiro yudokuong’.
"Ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseterou e piny mudhiye mondo ukaw obedmaru, to uhul weche gueth e got Gerizim, to weche mag kuong’ uhul e gotEbal.  30Godego ni yo podho chieng’ mar aora Jordan, kama omanyore giGilgal, but yadh More, e yo mochiko piny jo-Kanaan.  31Koro uchiegning’ado aora Jordan mondo udonj e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu miyoumondo ukaw obed maru.  To ka usekawe, mudakie, 32to nyaka une ni uritochike gi buche ma amiyou kawuononi. yasachu osetieko ogendini ma udonjo e pinygi, mi ukawo kargi, kendo udake pinyno, 30to beduru kutang’ mondo kik uluw timbegi, nono to gilokorenuobadho.  Ka osetiekgi, mi giweyonu thuolo kamano, to kik upenjru ni, ‘Ereyo mane ogendinigi lamoe nyisechegi? Mondo wan bende watim mana machalkamano kamano. ’ 31Kik ulam Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kaka gilamonyisechegi, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye mon gi timbe makuero ma gilamogonyisechegi, nimar gise kata mana wang’o ni nyisechegigo yawuotgi ginyigi ka misango.
"Neuru ni urito gik moko duto machikou.  Kik umediegimoro, kata kik ugolie gimoro. Rapar mar Chik
"Ka jakor wach kata jalek moro ohonore e kindu, mokoro ni ranyisi katahono moro biro timore, 2mi ranyisi kata hono mowuoyeno otimore, kendobang’e owachonu ni mondo udhi uluw nyiseche mamoko ma ok ung’eyo, kendoulam, 3to kik uwinj wachne.  Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu temou mondo ong’eane kuhere gi chunyu duto.  4Luwuru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kumiyeduong’ kendo kurito chikene.  Winjuru gima owacho, kendo lameuru kupadorukuome.  5To nyaka neg jakor wachno kata jalekno, nimar osewuoyo marachkodwaro ni mondo utamru winjo wach Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu maneoresou, kagolou Misri, kama nubedoe wasumbni.  Ng’atno osetemo witoumondo uwe yo mane Ruoith Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ochikou mondo uluw.  Kunegekamano, eka unugol richo ma kama kuomu.
"Ka owadu hie kata wuodi kata nyari kata chiegi mihero, kata manaosiepni migeno osemi ling’ling’ kawachoni ni mondo idhi ilam nyisechemamoko ma in ok ing’eyo kata ma kwereni bende ne ok ong’eyo, 7ma ginnyiseche mag ogendini moluorou, bed ni gin mabor kata machiegni, 8to kikiyie, kata mana winjo wachne kik iwinji, nyaka inege anega mak iweyekata ikeche kata ichwake.  9In ema nyaka ikwong keto lweti kuome, ekabang’e jou duto nokonyi nege.  10Unugoye gi kite nyaka otho, nimar notemohoyou mondo uwe Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mane ogolou Misri kuma nubedoewasumbni.  11Jo-Israel duto nowinj wachno, mi ginidok, maluor, kendo gimarach makamano ok nochak otimre kuomu.
"Kuwinjo ni joweteu ma acheje osehoyo joma odak e dala moro ma RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou mondo udagie, 13ka giwachonigi ni mondogidhi gilam nyiseche mamoko ma un ok ung’eyo, 14to nonuru wachno matut. Koyud ni gima kuero kamano osetimore kuomu adier, 15to nyaka uneg jomaodak e dalano duto kaachiel gi dhok, kendo uketh chuth gik moko dutomanie dalano.  16Nyaka uchok mwandu duto mag dalano kanyakla, kendo ukete laru manie dier dalano.  Eka uwang’ dala duto, kaachioel gi gik mokoduto manie iye ka misango miwang’o pep ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Dalano ok noger kendo, to nodong’ gunda nyaka chieng’.  17To kik ukawgimoro kata achiel kuom gik monego keth chuthgo, eka mirima mager marRuoth Nyasaye norum, mi notimnu ng’wono kendo nomi unya kaka nosingoreni kwereu.  18Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro timo kamano kuwinjo dwonde,kendo urito chikene ma amiyou kawuono, kendo kutimo gik malongo e nyime. Rapar mar Chik 14Kit ywak ma Ruoth Nyasaye ok dwar1 "Un e nyithind Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, omiyo kik usar dendu katakik uliel nyiem wengeu kuywago ng’at motho, 2nikech un joma ler mowal niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  Ruoth Nyasaye noyierou kuom ogendini dutomanie piny mondo ubed joge owuon. Le ma jo-Israel nyalo chamo gi mago makuergi(Tim jo-Lawi
.
-
)
"Kik ucham gimoro makuero.  4To jamni gi le munyalo chamo e magi:Dhiang’ gi rombo gi diel 5gi nyakech gi ogunde gi ngawo gi diend thim gipuro gi omoro kod nyambaja.  6Unyalo chamo kit jamni gi kit le duto maombong’gi opogore ariyo, kendo ma nyamo kambula.  7To mak mana ni kikucham mago ma nyamo kambula, to ombong’gi ok opogore ariyo, kata mago maombong’gi opogore ariyo to ok nyam kambula kaka ngamia gi apuoyo kodterere.  Mago nyamo kambula to ombong’giu ok opogore, omiyo nyakaukwan-gi ka gik makuero.  8Mbidhi bende kik ucham, nikech kata ombong’neopogore kamano, to ok onyam kambula omiyo en gima kuero.  Kik ucham legokata mulogi kik umulgi ka gisetho.
"Unyalo chamo rech duto man gi thuokgi kata man gi kagahla, 10to kikucham rech moro amora maonge gi gigo, nimar ka en kamano to en gimakuero.
"Unyalo chamo winy duto ma ok kuero, 12to mago ma kuero ma kik ucham emagi: Ongo gi koga gi kwasi 13gi kalamindi gi okunekune gi otenga giwiny machal kamago, 14kod kit agak duto, 15gi udo gi nyatawo gi okok kodkit olith duto, 16gi tula matin gi tula maduong’ kod tula ma ite dongo,17gi mbusi gi achuth gi osou 18kod nyamnaha gi kit ng’ang’a duto gicherwa kod oliktik.  19Gik mahuyo mang’eny kanyakla gin gik makuero,omiyo kik uchamgi.  20To unyalo chamo gik mahuyo ma ok kuero.  21Kik uchamgima otho kende, nimar un joma ler mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Gima kamano unyalo miyo jopinje mamoko modak kodu mondo ocham, kataunyalo ng’iewe gi jopinje mamoko. "Kutedo nyadiel, to kik uolie cha min mare. Chike mag chiwo mar achiel kuom apar22 "Higa ka higa nyaka uket tenge achiel kuom apar mag gik moko dutomonyak e puotheu, kaka cham gi divai gi mo, kaachiel gi nyithind jambuduto mokwong nywol.  23Chamgiuru e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kamaobiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie.  Kamano ubiro puonjoru luoro RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu ndalo duto.  24To ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuoseguedhou gii gik mang’eny, kendo ng’atu moro odak mabor gi kama RuothNyasaye biro yierono, ma ok onyal ting’o gigo motundgo kuno, 25to onyalolokogo pesa, moter kuno.  26Kosetundo kuno, to onyalo ng’iewo gima oherogi pesago, bed ni en ring dhiang’ kata ring rombo, divai kata kong’o. Unuchiem kuno gi joodu kumor e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  27Todhiuru gi jo-Lawi modak kodu, ni mar dhood Lawi ok opogne piny kakaopognu.
"To bang’ higni adek ka higni adek, keluru achiel kuom apar mag gikmonyaknu e higano, kendo uket e dhorangeyeu, 29mondo jo-Lawi ma onge gipiny mopognigi, kod jopinje mamoko, gi nyithindo ma kiye kod mond lietemodak kodu oyud chiemo moromogi.  Kutimo kamano, to Nyasaye noguedh gikmoko duto mutimo. Rapar mar Chik 15Higa miweyoe gope1"Bang’ higni abiriyo ka higni abiriyo nyaka uwe gopeu duto ma ji nigo. 2Unuwegi kama: Ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka we gope ma ja-Israel owadgioseholo kuome.  Ok nochune mondo ochul, nikech higa ma Ruoth Nyasayeoketo mondo oweyee gope osechopo.  3Jo pinje mamoko to unyalo chuno mondoochul gope ma gin-go, to gopeu ma jo-Israel weteu nigo nyaka uwenigi.
,5To kuluoro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kendo urito chikene ma amiyougi,to jochan ok nobedie kuomu, e piny ma omiyou mondo obed mwanduu, toRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noguedhu ahinya.  6Ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuoseguedhou kaka nosingore ni notim, ji moa e pinje mang’eny biro hologik moko kuomu, to un ok nuhol gimoro kuomgi.  Pinje mang’eny nobed e bwolochu, to un ok nubed e bwo lochgi.
"Kapo ni nitie jo-Israel weteu moko ma jochan e dalau moro e piny maRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou, to kik iu bed makwar, mutamrukonyogi, 8to ubednigi mang’won, mi uholgi gimoro amora ma gichando. 9Kata dabed ni higa mar abiriyo miweyoe gope chiegni chopo, to kik ubedgi ich lit, mutamru miyogi gimoro.  Jogo diywag ni Ruoth Nyasaye, midubed joricho.  10Nyaka umigi gik ma gidwarogo mabup, kendo gi chunymaler.  Kutimo kamano to Ruoth Nyasaye biro guedhou kuom gik moko dutomutimo.  11Pile ubiro bedo gi jochan e pinyu, mano emomiyo achikou nimondo ubed mang’won ni jo-Israel weteu ma jochan kata manie chandruok. Chike mag rito wasumbni(Wuok
.
-
)
"Ka ing’iewo ja-Hibrania wadu ma dichwo kata ma dhako mondo obedmisumbani, enotini kuom higni auchiel, to e higa mar abiriyo nyaka iweyeodhi.  13To kik iweye odhi gi lwete nono, 14mak ikowe mabup gi jamni kodcham gi divai.  Bed ne mang’won, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuosebedoni mang’won.  15Paruru ni ne un wasumbni e piny Misri, to RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu noresou.  Mano emomiyo amiyou chikni.  16To kamisumbanino ohero dak kodi, mi owacho ni ok odwar weyo dalani, nikechoheri kaachiel gi joodi, 17to ikaw riw, ituchgo ite, kitenoe dhoot, ekanobed misumbani kuom ngimane duto.  Chikno oriwo koda ka misumba ma dhakobende.
"To kapo ni iweyo ni misumba thuolo odhi, to onge gima inyalo ywago,nimar ka dine indiko jatich, to dine ichulo msara nyadiriyo moloyo ting’mane ikawo kirito misumbano.  Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noguedhgik moko duto mitimo. Chike mag walo jamni makayo19 "Waluru kach jambu machwo duto ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  Kik uketruedhi ma jou okuongo nywolo e tich, bende kik ung’ad yie imbe ma rombuokuongo nywolo, 20to giga ka giga nyaka utergi kuma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu biro yiero, mondo uchamgi kaachiel gi jouteu e nyim RuothNyasaye kuno.  21To ka chiayo moro nigi songa, kata ka osuto, kata ka enmuofu kata ka en gi mbala moro marach manade, to kik timgo misango niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  22Unyalo chame e miechu.  Joma ogak kaachielgi joma ok ogak nyalo chamo ring’ono mana ka gima en ring ogunde kataring mwanda.  23Remo to kik ucham, to oleuru piny mana ka pi. Rapar mar Chik 16Sewniu adek madongo(Wuok
.
-
;
.
-
)
"Nyaka utim Sap Pasaka e due mar Abib, nimar dueno ema ne RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu ogolou e Misri gotieno.  2Nyaka uneg nyarombo katanyadiel kata nyaroya kutimogo misango mar Pasaka ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, kama obiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie.  3Kik ucham sawono gimakati moketie thowi, to kuom ndalo abiriyo unucham mana makati ma okketie thowi, ma en ranyisi mar sandruoku, nikech nuwuok Misri kurikni. Mano nobednu rapar mochwere muparogo chieng’ mane uwuokie Misri.  4Kikubed gi thowi kamoro amora e pinyu kuom ndalo abiriyogo, to bende ringchiayo muyang’o godhiambo e odiechieng’ mokwongo mar sawo kik nind nyakaokinyi mak uwang’o pep.  5Kik uyang’ jamni mag Pasaka e mier ma RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaro miyou, 6to mak mana kama obiro yiero mondonyinge obedie.  Nyaka uyang’gi godhiambo ka chieng’ podho, e sa maneuwuokie Misri.  7Nyaka uted ringgi kendo ucham kama Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu biro yiero, to kinyne nyaka udog e miechu.  8Chamuru makati maok ketie thowi kuom ndalo auchiel, to chieng’ mar abiriyo nyaka ubed gichokruok kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaro, kendo kik uti tich moroamora chieng’no.
"Kwanuru jumbe abiriyo, chakre ndalo michako kayoe cham.  10Bang’jumbego nyaka utim Sap Jumbe kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaro kukelochiwo ma ng’ato golo kuom dwarone, maromre gi gueth ma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu guedhougo.  11Un kaachiel gi yawuotu kod nyiu, gi wasumbu machwokod mamon, gi jo-Lawi modak e miechu gi jopinje mamoko gi nyithindo makiye kod mond liete modak kodu, nubed mamor e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, kama obiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie.  12Paruru ni ne unwasumbni e piny Misri.  Mano emomiyo nyaka une ni urito chikego.
"Kusetieko kayo ngano kendo pono mzabibu, to nyaka utim Sap Kichekuom ndalo abiriyo.  14Unutim sawono gi mor, kaachiel gi yawuotu gi nyiukod wasumbu machwo gi mamon gi jo-Lawi kod jopinje mamoko gi nyithi kiyekod mond liete modak kodu.  15Nyaka utime ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachukaka obiro yiero, nimar unubed mamor ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuoguedho gik monyak e puotheu kod gik moko duto mutimo.
"Jou machwo duto nyaka bi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye didek e higa ka higa,mondo otim sewni adekgo kama Ruoth Nyasaye biro yiero.  Gin Sap Makati maok ketie Thowi, gi Sap Jumbe, kod Sap Kiche.  Onge ng’at ma nobi e nyimNyasaye gi lwete nono.  17To ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka kel gima romre gigueth ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseguedhego. Chike mag ndalo bura18"Unuyier jang’ad bura kod jotend dhoutu e mier duto ma Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu biro miyou, kendo nyaka ging’ad ni ji bura kare.  19Kikung’ad buch amwor kata buch nyakonchiel, to bende kik ucham asoya, nimarasoya mono kata mana ng’at mariek wacho adiera, kendo wito buch ng’at maonge ketho.  20Nyaka une ni uluwo mana adiera kende.  Kutimo kamano, tounudag aming’a e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou.
"Kik upidh yath moro amora milamo but kendo-mar-misango, mubiro geroni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, 22kata kik uchung siro milamo, nimar gingik ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ok dwar. Rapar mar Chik
"Kik utim misango ni Ruothn Nyasachu gi rwath kata rombo kata diel mangi mbala kata songa, nikech gima kamano en kuero e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Kapo ni unwang’o ng’at ma dichwo e dala moro amora ma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu biro miyou, kotimo gima rach e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mi okethosingruok kendo odagi chikna, 3kolamo kendo okulore ni nyiseche mamoko,kata ni wang’chieng kata ni due kata ni gimoro amora manie kor polo, 4tonyaka unon wachno maber.  Ka ofweny malong’o ni gima rach kamanoosetimore adier e Israel, 5to nyaka ukel ng’at motimo kamano e dhorangadala, mi ugoye gi kite nyaka otho, kata da bed ni en dhako kata endichwo.  6Kik ung’ad ni ng’ato buch tho ka nitie mana janeno achielkende, to unyalo ng’adone buch tho mana ka nitie joneno ariyo kata adek. 7Joneno ema nyaka kwong goyo ng’at ma kamano gi kite, eka ji duto bendenogoye.  Kamano e kaka unupwodhru kuom richo ma kamano.
"Kapo ni unwang’o buche matek ma ok unyal ng’ado, to nyaka udhipiyopiyo kama Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro yiero.  Buchego nyalo betmag nek, kata mag laro gimoro kata mag gorruok.  9Unudhi ir jodolo majo-Lawi man kuno, kendo ir jang’ad bura muyudo ka nie tich kuno, mondounyisgi wachno, kendo gin ema gining’ad bura.  10Gima giwachonu kamaRuoth Nyasaye biro yierono ema nyaka utim.  11Nyaka une ni utimo manakaka giwachonu, ma ok uweyo kata matin.  12Ng’ato ang’ata modagi wachjadolo matiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kanyo, kata modagi wachjang’ad bura, nyaka negi.  Kamano e kaka unupwodh jo-Israel kuom richo makamano.  13Kutimo kamano, to ji duto nowinj wachno, mi ginibed maluor,kendo onge ng’at ma nochak otim wichteko. Chike mag tich ruoth14 "Ka usedonjo e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou mondoukaw, udagie, mi uparo ni mondo uket ruoth oritu kaka ogendini dutomoluorou timo, 15to nyaka uket mana ng’at ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachunoyiernu.  Ng’at ma uketo ruothno nyaka bed mana ja-Israel wadu, to kikuket ng’at ma ok ja-Israel.  16Kik ruodhno bed gi farese mang’eny, tobende kik oor jo-Israel Misri mondo oomne farese moko ni eka omed bedogi farese mang’eny, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye nokwerou ni kik udog kuno kendongang.  17Kik obed gi mon mathoth, nikech mano dipo koketho parone, tomwandu bende kik obedgo mang’eny.  18Kosekete ruoth, to nyaka ondik wecheduto mag chik, kogologi e kitap chik ma jadolo ma jo-Lawi nigo.  19Nyakaobed gi kitabuno, kendo nyaka osome pile e ndalo duto mag ngimane, mondoopuonjrego luoro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache, korito chike gi buchegoduto.  20Kotimo kamano, to ok nosungre ni jowadgi, kendo ok nowe makorito chikego kata matin.  Bang’e en kaachiel gi nyikwaye ginibed ruodhimag Israel aming’a. Rapar mar Chik 18Pok ma jodolo gi jo-Lawi yudo1"Jodolo ma jo-Lawi, tiende ni dhood Lawi duto, ok noyud pinygi giwegikaka dhout Israel mamoko.  Ginibed ka giyudo pokgi mana kuom misengnimotim ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo kuom dir mwandu muchiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye. 2Kaka ok giniyud piny mopognigi ka mwandugi, Ruoth Nyasaye owuon emanobed mwandugi kaka nosingore.  3Ka ji timo misango gi rwath kata girombo kata gi diel, to nyaka gimi jadolo bat gi lem duto kod chino kakalembgi.  4Bende nyaka umigi cham mukwongo kayo gi divai mukwongo loso, gimor zeituni mokwongo nyak, kaachiel gi yie rombu mukwongo ng’ado, 5nimarRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseyierogi kuom dhoutu duto mondo gin kaachielgi nyikwagi giti e nying Ruoth Nyasaye nyaka chieng’.
"Ka ja-Lawi moro modak e achiel kuom miech Israel obiro kuom heronekama Ruoth Nyasaye biro yiero, 7mi otiyo tich dolo e nying Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasache kaka jo-Lawi wetene ma tiyo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kanyo, 8tonyaka oyud pok maromre kodgi, ka ok okwan mwandu monego ocham e dalawuon mare. Nyasaye osiemo jo-Israel ni kik giluw timbe ogendini mamoko9"Kusedonjo e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou, to kikupuonjru luwo timbe makuero mag ogendini mamoko modak e pinyno.  10Kikuyie ni ng’ato kuomu wang’ wuode kata nyare ka gir misango.  Bende kikbedie jakor kata jambofwa kata jadil kata jandagla 11kata ajuoknyakalondo kata japenj jochiende wach.  12Joma kamago Ruoth Nyasayeokwedo, kendo timbegi makuerogo ema omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuriembo ogendinigo mondo owenu thuolo.  13Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaromondo utine gi chunyu duto. Nyasaye osingore ni nomi jo-Israel janabi machal gi Musa14"Ogendini ma ubiro kawo pinygigo oyie gi weche jombofwa kod wechejokor, to un, Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu okwerou ni kik utim gik makamago.  15Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noyier janabi moro ka an kuom jouuwegi, kendo nyaka uwinj wachne.  16Mano e gima nukwayo Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu chieng’ mane uchokore Horeb, kuwacho niya, ‘Owinjore kik wachakwawinj duond Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, bende ok onego wachak wane machmaduong’ kama kendo, nono to wabiro tho. ’ 17Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachonaniya, ‘Gima giwachono ni kare.  18Abiro yieronigi janabi kaka in, kuomogandagi giwegi.  Abiro keto wechena e dhoge, kendo enowachnigi wecheduto ma achike.  19Ng’ato ang’ata modagi winjo wachna ma janabino wacho,to noyal.  20To janabi ma nohedhre wacho wach moro e nyinga ma ok achikeni mondo owachi, kata ma nowuo e nying nyiseche mamoko, nyaka negi. ’21To ma e kaka unyalo ng’eyo wach ma ok oa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye: 22Kajanabi owacho wach moro e nying Ruoth Nyasaye to bang’e wachno ok ochopokare, mano nyiso ni ok en wach Ruoth Nyasaye, to osewuoyo mana gi tekoneowuon.  Omiyo kik umiye duong’. Rapar mar Chik 19Miech Tony(Kwan
.
-
; Joshua
.
-
)
"Ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osetieko ogendini ma obiro miyou pinygi,udakie, 2to unuyier mier adek manie pinyno.  3Poguru pinyno didek, kendoulosie yore mondo ka ng’ato onego wadgi, to nyalo luwo kadhi tony eachiel kuom miego.  4Ng’at moboth monego wadgi ma ok gimonrego ema nyaloringo dhi kuno mondo ores ngimane.  5Ranyisi mar nek moboth kamano chalkama: Ng’ato nyalo dhi e bungu gi wadgi mondo otong’ yien, to kaonyigore gi le kong’udo, mi wi le obwodhore oa e loge mogoyo wadginomonego, to ng’atno nyalo ringo dhi e achiel kuom miego mondo oresngimane.  6Ka ok uloso yorego, kata ka miego bor gi kar nek, to ng’at madwaro chulo kuor dipo kolawo janek ka pod mirimbe liet, mi ojuke, kendoonege.  To chutho, janekno ok owinjore negi, nikech ne ok gimonre giwadgi mane onegono.  7Mano emomiyo achikou mondo uyier mier adek.
"To kapo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oyaro pinyu, mi omiyou piny dutomane osingore ni kwereu ni nomiu, 9to nyaka umed yiero mier moko adekkuom mago.  Adier enomiu pinyno, kuketo chunyu kuom rito chik ma amiyoukawuononi, mi uhero Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kuwuotho e yorene pile. 10Kuyiero miego, to remb joma onge ketho ok nochuer e piny ma RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou obed mwanduu, kendo richo mar chuero remook nobed kuomu.
"To ka nga’to nigi sigu gi wadgi, mi obutone, eka opoye, kendo ogoyemotho, mi bang’e oringo odhi e achiel kuom miego, 12jodong dalagi nyakaor ji moko mondo oome, mi kete e lwet owadgi jal monegono, mondo onegeka chulonego kuor.  13Kik ukeche, nyaka ugol ketho mar chuero remb ng’atma ok oketho oko kuom piny Israel.  Kamano unudag maber. Kiepe machon14 "Ka udak e lowo mubiro yudo e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacu dwaromiyou, to kik ng’ato kuomu gol kidi ma kwereu noketo manyiso kiepe giwadgi. Chik moket ni joneno15 "Wach janeno achiel kende ok nyal mi ng’ad ni ng’ato bura kuom kethomoro, kata kuom richo moro, to wach nyaka ng’ere malong’o e nyim jonenoariyo kata adek.  16Ka ng’ato obedo janeno mar miriambo mana ni mondoohiny wadgi kuom ketho moro, 17ji ariyogo nyaka chung’ e nyim RuothNyasaye kendo e nyim jodolo gi jong’ad bura.  18Jong’ad bura nyaka nonwachno matut, to ka giyudo ni janenono hango ni wadgi wach, 19to nyakautimne mana kaka odwaro timo ni wadgino.  Mano e kaka unupwodhru kuomricho ma kamano.  20Bang’e jou moko duto nowinj wachno, mi ginidokmaluor, kendo gima rach ma kamano ok nochak otimre kuomu.  21Kik ukechjaketho.  Ngima nyaka chul kar ngima, wang’ kar wang’, lak kar lak, lwedokar lwedo, kendo tielo kar tielo. Rapar mar Chik 20Chike mag lweny1"Kudhi kedo gi wasiku, muneno ogandagi ka duong’ moloyo maru, kendonigi farese kod geche lweny, to kik uluorgi, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu ma nogolou Misri ni kodu.  2Ka uchiegni rado kodgi, to jadolonowuogi e nyim ogandau mar lweny, 3kendo nowach niya, ‘Un jo-Israel,winjuru, kawuono uyuoro machiegni mondo uked gi wasigu.  Kik chunyunyosre, kendo kik uluor.  Kibaji bende kik gou kuneno wasikugo, 4nikechRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ema dhi kodu, mondo okednu, kendo olonuwasigu. ’ 5Jodongo bende nowach ni jolweny niya, ‘Ka ng’at moro kuomuosegero ot manyien, to pok orwako, onego odog dala, nimar dipo ka otho elweny, mi ng’at machielo ema orwako odno.  6Kata ng’at mosepidho mzabibu,to pok ochamo olembgi, bende onego odog dala, nimar dipo ka otho elweny, mi ng’at moro nono ema ochamo olembego.  7To bende ka nitie ng’atomosenywomo nyako, to pok okawo, onego odog dala, nimar dipo ka otho elweny, mi ng’at moro ema okawo chiege. ’ 8Jodongo nomed wuoyo gi jolweny,kawacho niya, ‘Bende kapo ni nitie ng’ama luor, kata ma chunye onyosore,to onego odog dala nikech dipo ka omiyo jowetene obedo maluor ka en. ’9Ka jodongo osetieko wuoyo, eka noket jotend lweny.
"Kuchopo machiegni gi dala mudhi kedogo, to penjuru jodalano kagidwaro timo kodu winjruok mar kue.  11Ka giyie timo kodu winjruok, migiyawonu dhoranga dala, to nyaka uchun ji duto munwang’o dalano e mondootinu.  12To ka gidagi timo kodu winjruok, mi gichako kedo kodu, tolworuru dalano, 13kendo ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu okete e lwetu, tonyaka uneg chwo duto man kanyo.  14To unyalo kawo mon gi nyithindo, kendoyako jamni kod gik moko duto manie dalano, mi ukonyru gi gik ma RuothNyasaye oseketo e lwetugo kaka uhero.  15Timuru kamano ni mier duto manmabor gi pinyu, mak mana miech ogendini mokiewo kodu ema kik utimnigikamano.  16To e miech ogendini ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyougo,kik uweyee kata gimoro achiel ka ngima.  17Jo-Hiti gi jo-Amor gijo-Kanaan gi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus, nyaka utiek chuth, kakaRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechiko.  18Timuru kamano mondo kik gipuonjuluwo timbegi makuero ma gitimo ni nyisechegi, nimar timbe ma kamago ginricho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
"Ka uselworo dala moro kuom kinde malach mondo ukaw, to kik utong’yiend dalano mi ukethi.  Unyalo mana chamo olembgi, to kik utong’gi,nimar yath ok en dhano ma unyalo kedogo.  20To unyalo ng’ado kata tong’oyien ma ung’eyo ni olembgi ok cham, mi ugergo raidhi kod gi lweny mamokomondo umonjgo dala mukedogo nyaka ukaw. Rapar mar Chik 21Gima itimo kuom wach nek, ka janek ok oyudi1"Ka oyud ringre ng’at motho ka oriere e pap e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu dwaro miyou, to ng’at monege ok ong’e, 2jodongu gi jou majong’ad bura nyaka dhi opim bor mae kind kama ringruokne nitie, gi miechgweng’no, mondo ong’e ni ere dala machiegni gi kanyo.  3Jodong dalamachiegni gi ringruokno nyaka yier nyaroya ma pok otiyo tich moro katama pok oywayo jok.  4Ginikele e holo moro ma ok pur man gi aora ma okdwon, kendo ginitur ng’ute kanyo.  5Jodolo ma jo-Lawi bende nyaka bedie,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseyierogi mondo gitine, kendo giguedhji e nyinge.  Gin ema omigi tich ng’ado buche ma ji laroe gimoro, kodbuche goruok duto.  6Bang’e jodongo duto mag dala machiegni gi ringruoknonyaka log lwetgi kuom nyaroya mosetur ng’ute e holo cha, 7ka giwachoniya, ‘Wan ne ok wachuero remoni, kata ng’at ma nochuere bende ne okwaneno.  8A Ruoth Nyasaye, yie iwe richo mag jogi Israel ma isewaro,kendo kik iyie mondo remo ma onge gi ketho mien-gi. ’ Kamano ginipuodhrekuom richo mar chuero remono.  9Mano e kaka unugol remo ma onge gi kethokuomu, kutimo gima ber ma Ruoth Nyasaye dwarono. Kaka irito mon momak e lweny10"Kusekedo gi wasiku, mi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oketogi e lwetu,kendo umako jomoko udhigo, 11mi ng’ato kuomu oneno dhako moro ma jaberkuomgi ma doher mondo okendi, 12to onyalo kawe akawa, motere dala.  Bang’mano noliel wiye, mi ong’ad koke, 13kendo olony lewni mane omakego. Dhakono nodag e dala ng’atno koywago min gi wuon kuom due ngima, ekang’atno nyalo loke dhako.  14To kapo ni bang’e ojok kode, to onyalo weyeodhi kuma ohero.  To ok nong’iewe gi ng’ato, kata loke misumba, nikechoseriwore kode. Pok wuowi makayo15"Ka ng’ato nigi mon ariyo, ma achiel ohero, to machielo ok ohero, todhako ma ok oherono ema onywolone wuowi makayo, 16kendo kinde modwarolamo nie yawuowi ochopo, to kik okaw wuod dhako moherono ka wuode makayokar wuod dhako ma ok ohero, ma adier e wuowi makayo.  17Nyaka omi wuodemakayo duong’ne mar nywol, kopogone pok nyadiriyo moloyo yawuote mamoko,kata dabed ni en wuod dhako mocha kamano, nimar en e wuode motiekowuowine, omiyo duong’ mar nywol en mare. Wuowi ma achach18"Kapo ni ng’ato nigi wuowi ma wiye tek kendo ma achach, ma ok nyalwinjo jonywolne, kata da gikume, 19to nyaka gimake, mi gitere e nyimjodongo e dhoranga dala.  20Giniwach ni jodongo niya, ‘Wuodwani wiye tek,kendo en achach.  Ok otim gima wawachone, bende timbene richo kendoojamer. ’ 21Eka jodalano duto nyaka goye gi kite nyaka otho.  Mano e kakaunupodhru kuom richo ma kamano, mi jo-Israel duto nowinj wachno, kendonobed maluor. Chike moko mopogore opogore.
"Ka oseng’ad ni ng’ato buch tho, mi onege, kendo olier ringre e yath,23to ringreno kik we kanyo otienono duto.  Nyaka yike chieng’ onogo,mondo kik uketh piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou ka mwanduu,nikech ng’at molier e yath okuong’ e nyim Nyasaye. Rapar mar Chik
"Kineno dher wadu moro kata rombone ka ringo lal, kik iweye to nyakaigeng’e, mi idwoke ni wuon-go.  2Kopo ni wuon-go ok jagweng’u, kata ka oking’eye, to nyaka iter chiayono e dalani, kendo irite nyaka wuon-gonwang’e kuomi, eka idwoknego.  3Nyaka itim kamano ni kanj wadu, kata nilawe, kata ni gimoro amora molalne, to kik iweye orweny.  4Kineno kanjwadu moro kata dhere kopodho e yo, to kik iwe mak ikonyo wuon-go chunge.
"Dhako kik rwakre ka dichwo, dichwo bende kik rwakre ka dhako, nimarjoma otimo kamano okwedi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
"Kapo ni iyudo od winyo man gi nyithindo kata tong’ e yath manie diryo, kata man piny e lowo ka min-gi butnoe, to kik ikaw min-gi kaachielgi nyithinde.  7Nyaka iwe min-gi dhi, to ikaw mana nyithinde kende. Kamano inibed maber kendo nidag aming’a.
"Ka igero ot, to nyaka iriw rageng’ e lak tado gi yo ka oko, mondo kikng’ato podhi koa ewi tatino, mi kel bura mar remo kuom odi.
"Kik ipidh kodhi moro amora e puothi mar mzabibu, nimar kitimo kamano,to gik ma kodhino onyago, kaachiel gi olembe mag mzabibu nyaka chiw niRuoth Nyasaye.
"Kik ipur gi dhiang’ kod kanyna e kwer achiel.
"Kik irwak law molos gi usi mar yie rombo mokik gi usi mar katana.
"Nyaka iket usi momin e konde ang’wen mag lawi mar abola. Chike moko mag kend13"Ka ng’ato okendo chiege, to bang’e ojok kode, 14mi ohangone wachkendo oketho nyinge, kowacho ni nokawe to ok oyude gi ringre, 15tojonywol nyakono nyaka dhi ir jodongo e dhoranga dala, ka gitero gimanyiso ni nyargino ne nigi ringre.  16Eka wuon nyako nowachni jodongoniya, ‘Namiyo ng’atni nyara mondo okendi, to koro ojok kode, 17omiyoosehangone wach, kendo oketho nyinge kowacho ni ne ok oyude gi ringre. To kata kamano ma e gima nyiso ni nyara ne nigi ringre. ’ Bang’ mano,noyar law mane oywego ringre nyakono e nyim jodong dala.  18Jodongogonyaka chwad ng’atno, 19kendo goye faini pesa moromo fedha mia achielmondo omi wuon nyako, nikech ng’atno oseketho nying nyar Israel.  Nyakononosik kode, kendo ok noriembe nyaka chieng’.  20To ka en adier ni nyakonone onge gi ringre, kendo oonge gima nyiso ni ne en gi ringre, 21to nyakatere e dhood wuon mare, kendo jodalagi nogoye gi kite nyaka otho nimarosekelo wichkuot e piny Israel kochodo ka pod en e dala wuon.  Mano ekaka unupwodhru kuom richo ma kamaano.
"Ka onwang’ ng’ato ka terore gi chi wadgi, to nyaka neggi giduto.  Manoe kaka unupwodh jo-Israel kuom richo ma kamano.
"Ka ng’ato onwang’o nyako moro minywomo, mi oterore kode e dala, 24tonyaka ukelgi giduto e dhoranga dala, mi ugogi gi kite nyaka githo.  Nyakaneg nyakono nikech kata obedo ni ne en e dala kamano, to ne ok ogoyo uwimondo okonye.  Ng’atno to nyaka neg kuom kuodo wi chi wadgi.  Mano e kakaunupwodh ogandau kuom richo ma kamano.
"To ka ng’ato oyudo nyako moro minywomo, mi omako, kendo oterorego githwon oko e pap, to ng’atno kende ema nyaka negi.  26Kik utim gimoro ninyako, nikech en ok osetimo gimoro moromore gi buch tho, 27nimar ng’atnonomake oko e pap, omiyo kata obedo ni nogoyo uwi to onge ng’at manenyalo konye.  Tim ma kamano chalo gi tim ng’at momonjo wadgi monego.
"Ka ng’ato omako nyako ma ok nywom, mi oterorego, bang’e ofwenygi,29to nyaka ng’atno chul wuon nyako pesa moromo fedha piero abich.  Tobende nyaka okend nyakono, nikech osemiye wichkuot, kendo ok onyalriembe nyaka chieng’.
"Kik ng’ato ter chi wuon mare, nimar kotimo kamano, to okuodo wiwuon. Rapar mar Chik 23Joma ok oyienigi bet e chokruok mar jo-Nyasaye1"Ng’at ma nyangetane otore kata ma duong’ne ong’ad oko, kik donj echokruok mar jo-Ruoth Nyasaye.
"Kimirwa kik donji e chokruok mar jo-Ruoth Nyasaye, nyaka nyikwaye marapar.
"Jo-Amon gi jo-Moab kata mana nyaka nyikwagi mar apar kik donj echokruok mar jo-Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ok ginidonj e chokruokno, 4nikech ne okgiromonu gi chiemo kata gi pi kane uwuok Misri, to bende nikech negiluongo Balaam wuod Beor modak Pethor manie piny Mesopotamia mondookuong’u.  5To Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ne ok odewo wach Balaam, minoloko kuong’no obedonu mana gueth, nikech noherou.  6Kik udwar gimadikelnigi kue kata gima dikelnigi dongruok e ndalou duto.
"To kik ukaw jo-Edom ka joma okwedi, nikech gin joweteu, bende kik ukawjo-Misri ka joma okwedi nikech ne udak e pinygi ndalo moko.  8Nyikwagimar adek ema nyalo donjo e chokruok mar jo-Ruoth Nyasaye. Rito ler e kambi9"Ka un e kambi ndalo lweny, to kik utim gimoro mochido.  10Ka ng’at morokuomu ogak nikech nende olekore gotieno, to nyaka owuog oa e kambi mobedoko.  11To kochopo odhiambo, nyaka olwokre, eka oduog e kambi ka chieng’podho.  12Nyaka ubed gi kamoro oko mulosorue, 13kendo kudhi kanyo, tonyaka udhi gi rapur, ukunygo bur, mi ka uselosoru to uiko.  14Nyaka utimkamano nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu wuotho kuonde duto e kambiu,mondo oritu kendo omiu loyo wasiku.  Emomiyo kambiu nyaka bed maler,mondo kik Ruoth Nyasaye nwang’ie gimoro marach ma dimi oweu. Chike mopogore opogore15"Ka misumba moro opondo koa e piny moro, mi oringo obiro iru, to kikuduoke ni ruodhe.  16Nyaka uweye odag e pinyu e dala moro amora mohero. To kik uloke misumba.
"Onge nyar Israel moro kata wuod Isreal moro manyalo bedo jachode eod lemo.  18Pesa ma dhako moro kata ma dichwo moro oyudo kuom chode kikkel e Od Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu mondo ochopgo kuong’ruok, nikech pesamoyud kamano okwedi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.
"Kik imi ja-Israel wadu chul ohala kuom gima oholo, bed ni en pesa,kata chiemo, kata gimoro amora monego dwok gi ohala.  20Inyalo kawo ohalakuom gima iholo japiny moro nono, to ok kuom ja-Israel wadu.  Kuluwochikno, to Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noguedhu kuom gik moko duto mutimoe piny ma ubiro donjoe mondo udagie.
"Kikuong’ori kuom wach moro, to nyaka ichop kuong’ruokno piyopiyo,nikech ka ok itimo kamano, to Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nobandhi wachno,kendo nibed jaketho.  22Ka ok ikuong’ori to ok iketho, 23to kikuong’orini Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu kuom heroni iwuon, to nyaka irit kendoichop gima iwachono.
"Ka idonjo e puoth ng’ato mar mzabibu to inyalo chamo mzabibu kakaihero, to kik ikaw moko iago.  25Bende kidonjo e puoth ng’ato mar cham,to inyalo jako ajaka cham gi lweti, to kik ika gi pala. Rapar mar Chik 24Chike mar weyo dhako1 "Ka ng’ato okendo chiege, to bang’e oyudo ni ok ohere nikech osetimogimoro ma ok owinjore, onyalo ndiko barup weruok momiye, kendo oriembe. 2Bang’e ka dhakono osea, nyalo bet ni ng’ato ochako okende, obedochiege, 3to ka chwore mar ariyono bende ojok kode, mondiko barup weruokmomiye, kendo oriembe, kata ka chwore mar ariyono otho, 4to chworemokwongo mane oriembe cha kik chak kawe mi loke chiege kendo, nikechkoro osedokone mogak.  Tim ma kamano en kuero e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu, kendo dikel richo e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biromiyou obed mwanduu.
"Ka ng’ato okendo, to kik tere e lweny kata e tich moro amora, to onegoobed dala kuom higa achiel komiyo chiege mor. Chike mopogore opogore6"Kik ng’ato mak pong’ rego kata mana nyapong’ ka gir singo, nikech manochalre gi nego dhano.
"Ka oyud ng’ato kokwalo ja-Israel wadgi mi oloke misumbane, kataong’iewe gio ng’ato, to nyaka neg jakuogno.  Mano e kaka unupwodhru kuomricho ma kamano.
"Kuom weche mag tuo dhoho, nyaka utim mana kaka jodolo ma jo-Lawi birochikou, nimar namiyogi chikena duto ma nyaka uriti.  9Paruru gima neRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu otimo ni Miriam ka ne usewuok Misri!
"Kiholo ja-Israel wadu gimoro, to kik idonj e ode kikawo gir singo. 11Nyaka irit mana gi oko mondo ng’at ma jagopino ema okelni gino.  12Kaen ng’at ma jachan, mi omiyi lawe mar abola ka gir singo, to kik inind elaweno, 13to nyaka idwoknego ka pok chieng’ opodho mondo onindie.  Kamanong’atno noguedhi, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi nokwan gima itimono kagima ber.
"Kik itim marach ni jatich moro modhier machandore, kataa obedo ni enja-Israel kata jadak.  15Nyaka imiye pokne pilepile kapok chieng’ opodho,nimar en jachan kendo pokneno ema konye.  Ka ok itimo kamano, to onyaloywakni kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, mi dibed jaketho.
"Kik neg wuone nikech richo mag nyithinde, kata kik neg nyithindonikech richo mag wuonegi, too ng’ato ka ng’ato noneg mana nikech richoneowuon.
"Kik ung’ad buch amwor ni jodak kata ni nyathi kich, bende kik ukawlaw dhako ma chwore otho ka gir singo.  18Paruru nii ne un wasumbni epiny Misri, to Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noresou mogolou kuno.  Manoemomiyo achikou ni mondo utim kamano.
"Ka ikayo cham e puothi, mi wiyi owil gi cham moko motue kuno, to kikidog iom, to nyaka iwegi ni jodak gi nyithindo ma kiye kod mond lietemondo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oguedhi kuom gik moko duto mitimo.
"Ka iseyiengo yiendi mag zeituni mondo olembe olwar, to kik ichakiyienggi kendo, to nyaka iwe modong’ ni jodak gi nyithi kiye kod mondliete.
"Ka isepono mzabibu e puothi to kik ichak ipon kendo, to nyaka iwemodong’ ni jodak gi nyithi kiye kod mond liete.  22Paruru ni ne unwasumbni e piny Misri.  Mano emomiyo achikou ni mondo utim kamano. Rapar mar Chik
"Ka ji ariyo larore e wach moro, mi gibiro mondo oyalgi, to nyakajong’ad bura ng’ad nigi bura kare, ka giweyo ng’at ma onge gi ketho, togikumo jaketho.  2Ka ong’ad ni ng’at ma jakethono buch chweto, to nyakaonind piny e nyim jang’ad bura, mi chwade.  Nyaka chwade maromre gikethone, 3to kar kwan kiboko kik kadh piero ang’wen, nono to dipo kachweto ohingo ja-Israel waduno, mi oyudo wichkuot marach e nyimu.
"Kik itue dho dhiang’ ka ywayo lodi madiemo cham. Chik mar tero dhako5 "Ka owete odak kanyakla, mi achiel kuomgi otho ka ok oweyo nyathi mawuowi, to ng’at moro nono ma ok jadalano ok nyal tero chiege.  Owadgichwor dhakono ema nyaka riwre kode, mi loke chiege, kendo timne gik mokoduto ma owinjore yuor dhako tim.  6Nyathi ma wuowi ma dhakono okwongonywolo nyaka kaw nying wuon mare mothono, mondo nyinge kik lal e Israel. 7To ka owadgi ng’at mothono ok dwar tero chi owadgino, to dhakono nyakadhi ir jodongo e dhoranga dala kar bura, mondo onyisgi niya, ‘Yuoraotamore chungo wi owadgi e Israel, kendo odagi timona gima owinjore yuorng’ato tim ni chi owadgi. ’ 8Ka jodong dala owinjo kamano, to nyakagiluong ng’atno, kendo giwuo kode e wachno.  Ka owachonigi malong’o ni okodwar kawe, 9to chi owadgino nyaka dhi ire e nyim jodongo mi lony wuoree tiende, kendo ng’udh wang’e olawo.  Bang’ mano dhakono nyaka wach niya,‘Ma e kaka watimo ni ng’at modagi chungo wi owadgi. ’ 10E Israel joodng’atno noluong ni, ‘Jood ng’at ma olony wuore. ’Chike mamoko11"Ka ji ariyo gore, mi chi ng’at achiel kuomgi odhi konyo chwore,momako duong’ ng’at machielono, 12to nyaka ng’ad lwet dhakono oko ma okukeche.
"Kik ibed gi rapim mopogore opogore e mifuki, ma moro duong’ to morotin.  14Bende kik ibed gi rapur mopogore opogore e odi, ma moro duong’ tomoro tin.  15Nyaka ubed gi rapim kod rapur malong’o kendo makare mondoudag aming’a e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou.  16Joma timogik ma kamago kawuondo ji, okwedi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. Nyasaye ochiko jo-Israel mondo otiek jo-Amalek17 "Paruru gima ne jo-Amalek otimonu e yo, ka uwuok e piny Misri.  18Negibutonu mi gimonjou gi ka ng’eu, ka uol kendo ujony, mi ginego jomanodong’ chien, ma ok gidewo luoro Nyasaye.  19Emomiyo ka Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu osemiyou kue kuom wasiku duto molworou e piny ma obiro miyoumondo obed mwanduu, to kik wiu wil mak utieko jo-Amalek, mi nyinggi lale piny. Rapar mar Chik 26Chike mag chiwo gik mokwongo nyak1"Ka usechopo e piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou mondo obedmwanduu, mi udak kuno, 2to nyaka ng’ato ka ng’ato kaw gik moko dutomokwongo nyak e pinyno, kendo ket e atonga, mi dhigo kama Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu biro yiero mondo nyinge obedie.  3Nyaka odhi ir jadolo mankanyo, kendo owachne niya, ‘Ahulo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha kawuononi asechopo e piny mane Ruoth Nyasaye osingore ni kwerewa ni nomiwa. ’4Bang’ mano jadolo nokaw atonga e lwet ng’atno, mi noket piny e nyimkendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  5Eka ng’atno nowach e nyim RuothNyasaye niya, ‘Kwara ne en ja-Aram ma bayo abaya, ma onge gi kar dak.  Neodhi e piny Misri kane pod joge nok, mi gidak kuno.  Bang’e ne ginya, migidoko oganda maratego man gi ji mang’eny.  6To jo-Misri nosandowa,monyorowa, kendo oketowa e tich misumba malit.  7Ne waywak ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach kwerewa mondo okonywa, mi nowinjo ywakwa, kendo onenothagruok gi nyor mane inyorowago, kod tich matek mane watiyo.  8Kuom manonogolowa e piny Misri gi teko maduong’ kod bat morie, kendo gi timbemadongo kod ranyisi gi honni.  9Nokelowa kaeri momiyowa piny maber kendomomewni.  10A Ruoth Nyasaye, mano emomiyo akeloni gik mokwongo nyak elowo misemiya. ’ Eka noket atongano piny e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, miokulorene piny mondo olame.  11Bang’e un gi jo-Lawi kod jopinje mamokomodak kuomu nyaka utim sawo mondo upargo gik mabeyo duto ma RuothNyasaye osetimonu kaachiel gi jou. Chike mag chiwo achiel kuom apar mag gik monyak12 "Ka usetieko choko achiel kuom apar mag gik monyak e higa mar adek,ma en higa michiwoe achiel kuom apar mar gik manyak, to nyaka uchiw gigoni jo-Lawi gi jopinje mamoko modak kuomu, kaachiel gi nyithindo ma kiyekod mond liete, mondo gibed gi chiemo moromogi e miechu.  13Bang’ manong’ato ka ng’ato nowach e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu niya, Asegologik mowalni e oda, mi amiyo jo-Lawi gi jopinje mamoko gi nyithindomakiye kod mond liete mana kaka nichika.  Wiya ok osewil, kata okaseketho chikni moro kata achiel.  14Pok achamo gik mowalnigo e ndalo maaywago ng’at motho, kata gologi e oda ka agak, kendo ok asechiwogi ning’at motho.  A Ruoth Nyasaye asemako chikni, katimo gik moko dutomidwaro.  15Rang piny gie polo kar dakni maler, mondo iguedh jogi Israelkod piny maber kendo momew misemiyowa, kaka nikuong’ori ni kwerewa. "Jo-Israel nyaka bed oganda mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye16"Kawuono, Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu chikou mondo urit chikegi gibuchegi duto.  Nyaka uritgi gi chunyu duto.  17Usehulo tinende ni RuothNyasaye e Nyasachu, kendo ni ubiro luwo yorene, murit chikene gibuchene, kendo uwinj wachne.  18Ruoth Nyasaye bende osehulo tinende ni une joge owuon, marito chikene duto, kaka nosingorenu.  19Obiro ting’oumalo moloyo ogendini mamoko duto mane ochueyo, mondo nyinge oyud duong’gi pak kod huma.  Kamano unubed oganda mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachumana kaka nosingore. "Rapar mar Chik 27Ndiko chike e got Ebal1Kane Musa nigi jodong Israel, nochiko ji niya, "Rituru chike duto maamiyou kawuono, 2kendo chieng’ ma ung’ado aora Jordan kudhi e piny maRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro miyou, to uchung kite madongo, kendoumwon-gi.  3Ndikuru kuomgi weche duto mag chikni, mondo udonji e pinymaber momew ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nosingore ni kwereu ni nomiu. 4Ka useng’ado aora Jordan, to unuchung kitegi e got Ebal mana kakaachikou kawuono, kendo umwon-gi.  5Geruru kendo-mar-misango kanyo niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi kite ma ok opa gi chuma.  6Kendo mar RuothNyasayeno nyaka ger gi kite ma ok opa, bende utimie ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu misengni miwang’o pep.  7Timuru misengni mag sawo, kendochiemuru kanyo, mi ubed mamor e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  8Ndikurumalong’o weche duto mag chikni kuom kitego. "9Musa kod jodolo ma jo-Lawi nowacho ni jo-Israel duto niya, "Chikuru itumaber, un jo-Israel.  Tinendeni usedoko jo-Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. 10Winjuru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo rituru chikene gi buchene maamitou kawuono. "Weche mag kuong’ ma nyaka hul e got Ebal11Chieng’no ema Musa nogoloe chik, kowacho ni ji niya,
"Ka useng’adoaora Jordan, to jo-Simeon gi jo-Lawi gi jo-Juda gi jo-Isakar gi jo-Josefkod jo-Benjamin nyaka chung’ e got Gerizim, mondo oguedh ji.  13Tojo-Reuben gi jo-Gad gi jo-Asher gi jo-Zebulun gi jo-Dan kod jo-Naftalimondo ochung’ e got Ebal, kihulo weche mag kuong’.  14Bang’ mano jo-Lawinowach nii jo-Israel duto gi dwol maduong’ niya.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moloso kido mar nyasaye manono mar bao kata marchuma, kata bed ni oketo gino kama opondo.  Mano en tim makuero e nyimRuoth Nyasaye.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at mochayo wuon kata min.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moketho kiepe gi wadgi.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at mowuondo muofu, mi obaro oweyo yo.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moketho buch japiny moro modak kodu, kata buchnyathi ma kich, kata buch chi liel.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moterore gi chi wuon, nikech oelo dug wuon mare.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moterore gi le moro amora.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moterore gi nyamin hie, kata nyamin ma nyar wuon.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at moterore gi mar mare.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at mogoyo wadgi ling’ling’.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at mochamo asoya mondo oneg ng’at ma onge gi ketho.
" ‘Okuong’ ng’at ma ok orito kata ma ok ochopo weche duto mag chikni. Bang kuong’ ka kuong’ to ji duto nyaka duok ni, ‘Obed kamano. ’Rapar mar Chik 28Gueth miyudo kuom rito chik(Tim jo-Lawi
.

; Rapar mar Chik
.

)
"Ka uluoro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo urito adimba chikene dutoma amiyou kawuono, to enoting’u malo moloyo ogendini duto mag piny,2kendo guethgi duto biro bironu: 3Noguedhu kamoro amora ma untie; ka une dala, kata ka un oko.  4Noguedhu gi nyithindo mang’eny, kendo gi chammogundho kod jamni mathoth.  5Noguedh atongeu gi dakuondeu.  6Noguedhukudonjo e dala kendo kuwuok.
"Ruoth Nyasaye noket wasiku momonjou e luetu, kendo unulogi muriembgi. Ginirad kodu ka gin oganda achiel, to giniringu ka gike e sidienjeabiriyo.  8Ruoth Nyasaye noguedh dereu kaachiel gii tich luetu duto epiny ma obiro miyou.  9Kurito chike Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendouwuotho e yorene, to obiro miyo udoko joge owuon maler, kakanosesingorenu.  10Ogendini duto mag piny none ni un jo Ruoth Nyasaye miginiluoru.
"Ruoth Nyasaye biro miyo udhi maber.  Ubiro bedo gi nyithindo mang’eny,kendo gii jamni mathoth, kod cham mogundho e piny mane Ruoth Nyasayeosingore ni kwereu ni nomiu.  12Ruoth Nyasaye biro golo koth e polo karkenone, mondo ochwenu e ndalo mowinjore, kendo obiro guedho gik mokoduto mutimo.  Ogendini mang’eny biro holo gik moko kuomu, to un ok nuholkuomgi.  13Kurito chike mag Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ma anyisou kawuonomondo urit matek, 14kendo ka ok utamoru chikego mi udagi lamo nyisechemamoko, to Ruoth Nyasaye biro ketou jotelo, to ok joma itelonigi.  Kamanoubiro dhi nyime maber, kendo ok nudog chien. Kuong’ miyudo kuom tamruok mako chik(Tim jo-Lawi
.
-
)
"To ka ok uluoro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mi udagi rito chikene gibuchene ma amiyou kawuono, to kuong’ gi duto biro makou: 16Nokuong’ukamoro amora ma untie; ka un e dala, kata ka un oko.  17Nokuong’ atongeugi dakuondeu.  18Nokuong’u kuom nywol kendo kuom cham kod kuom jamni. 19Nokuong’u kudonjo e dala kendo kuwuok.  20Ruoth Nyasaye noornu kuong’gi chandruok kod kum ma ketho gik moko duto mutimo, nyaka otieku mi urumka diemo wang’ kuom timbeu maricho, kendo nikech useweye.  21RuothNyasasye biro goyou gi tuoche nyaka tieku ua e piny mudonjoe mondo ukaw. 22Ruoth Nyasaye biro goyou gi kahera gi midhusi gi tuo akuodi kodguonyo, kendo kelonu oro, mi cham rochre ewi dongo.  Gigo duto birothagou nyaka urum.  23Polo norieny ka mula, to piny nodok matek ka chuma. 24Kar kelo koth, to Ruoth Nyasaye nomi lowo gi buru chwenu mana ka koth,nyaka tieku.  25Ruoth Nyasaye noketu e lwet wasiku, mi ginilou.  Unuradkodgi ka un oganda achiel, to unuringi kuke e sidienje abiriyo, miunubed joma pinje duto wuoro.  26Ringreu nobed chiemb winy gi le, kendoonge ng’at ma noriembgi.
"Ruoth Nyasaye biro goyou gi tuo buche mag Misri gi akuodi kendo gikalanga kod guonyo ma ok nyal thiedhi.  28Obiro goyou gi tuo mar neko,kendo lokou muofni gi joma morundore.  29Unubed kumulo godiechieng’, manakaka muofu mulo, kendo ok nuchop kuma udwaro dhiyoe.  Nothiru kendonoyaku e ngimau duto, kendo onge ng’at ma nokonyu.  30Unukend mon, tojomoko nono ema nonind kodgi.  Unuger udi, to ok nudagie.  Unupidhmzabibu, to ok unucham olembegi.  31Unune dhou kiyang’o, to ok unubilringgi.  Nomau kenjeu kuneno, to ok nodwoknugi.  Rombeu nomi wasiku, toonge ng’ama nokonyu.  32Yawuotu gi nyiu nokaw, kendo nomi jopinje mamokoong’iew mana kuneno, mi siso nolou kodgi, to ok nubed gi teko mar timogimoro.
"Oganda moro ma ok ung’eyo nocham gik monyak e puotheu, kendo unubedjoma othir malich e ngimau duto.  34Gigo biro miyo udoko joneko.  35RuothNyasaye biro goyo chongeu kod tiendeu gi buche ma ok nyal thiedhi, toginilandre e dendu duto.
"Ruoth Nyasaye biro terou, kaachiel gi ruoth mubiro yiero, kuom ogandama un ok ung’eyo kata kwereu bende ne ok ong’eyo, kendo kuno unulamienyiseche mamoko mag yien kod mag kite.  37Nyingu nolokre ka ngero kendogima ji jaro kendo nyiero.
