"Ubiro chwoyo kodhi mang’eny e puotheu, to unuka matin, nimar bonyobiro chamogi.  39Unupidh mzabibu, kendo unudogi, to ok unuka olembgi katamadho divachgi, bende ok unumadhi nikech kudni nokethgi.  40Yiend zeituninoyudre e pinyu kuonde duto, to ok unuwirru gi mogi, nimar ginilwar pinyka pok gichiek.  41Ununywol yawuowi gi nyiri, to ok ginisik kodu, nikechnotergi e tuech.  42Yiendu duto, kod gik monyak e puotheu, bonyo notiekpep.  43Jopinje mamoko modak kuomu biro medo dongore molou, to un ubirodok piny.  44Ginibed gi gik ma giholou, to un ok nubed gi gima duholgi. Ginibed jotelo, to un unubed joma itelonigi.
"Masichego duto biro lawou mi maku nyaka tieku, nikech kane RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu ochikou mondo urit chikene gi buchene, to ne okuwinjo wachne.  46Masichego nobednu ranyisi mochwere, kendo ni nyikwau,47nikech ne ok utiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu gi mor kendo gi ilokuom chiwone mogundho.  48Emomiyo unuti ni wasigu ma Ruoth Nyasaye birioro mondo omnju.  Kech nokau, kendo riyo nolou; unuwuoth duge, kendonuchand gimoro amora.  Ruoth Nyasaye noket jok mar nyinyo e ng’utu nyakaotieku.
"Ruoth Nyasaye biro kelo kuomu oganda moro moa kuma bor ma dhogi oknuwinji.  Ginimuomre kuomu mana kaka ongo muomore kuom nyagweno. 50Ogandano nobed mager ahinya.  Ok ginidew joma oti, kendo ok ginikechnyithindo.  51Ginicham jambu gi chambu, ma ok giweyonu cham kata divaikata mo kata mana chiayo moro kuom jambu nyaka urum.  52Ginilwor mierduto ma Ryuoth Nyasaye nomiu mondo gikau, nyaka gimuk ohinga maboyokendo motegno muparo ni dugeng’rugo.  53Wasikugo nokelnu chandruok malichahinya, e ndalo ma giluoro e miechu, mi unucham kata mana nyithinduuwegi ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu omiyou.  54Kata mana ng’at malong’okendo mang’wonie moloyo biro bedo ma iye kwar gi wadgi, kata mana chiegemohero kaachiel gi nyithinde modong’, 55mi notamre pogonigi ringrenyithinde mochamo, nimar onge gimoro machielo ma nodong’ne, nikechchandruok malich ma wasiku biro kelonu e ndalo ma giluoroe miechu. 56Bende kata mana dhako malong’o kendo mang’wonie moloyo bende, ma nyakanene ok wuoth gi tiende, biro bedo ma iye kwar gi chwore mohero kaachielgi nyithinde, 57mi notamre pogonigi bieche kata mana nyathi mosenywolo,nikech chandruok malich ma wasigu biro kelone e ndalo ma giluoroe miechuduto.
"Ka ok urito chike duto mondiki e kitabuni, kendo ok luoro nying RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu, ma en nying maduong’ kendo malich, 59to ubiro kelokuomu, kendo kuom nyikwau, masiche malich kendo miwuoro, kod tuochemayuayo ji kuom kinde malach.  60Ruoth Nyasaye nokel tuoche duto magMisri mane uluoro, kendo ginisik kuomu.  61To bende nokel kuomu tuochekod masiche ma ok ondik e kitap chikni, nyaka urum.  62Kata obedo niung’eny ka sulue manie polo kamano, to ji manok kuomu kende ema nodong’nikech ne ok uwinjo wach Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  63Ruoth Nyasayenobed mamor kokethou, kendo kotiekou mana kaka nobedo mamor koguedhoukendo omiyo unya, mi nogolu gi thuon e piny ma udonjoe mondo ukau. 64Ruoth Nyasaye nokeu e kind ogendini, chakre tung’ piny konchiel nyakatung’ piny komachielo, kendo kuondego duto unulamie nyiseche mag yienkod mag kite, ma un ok ung’eyo kata kwereu bende ne ok ong’eyo.  65Ka une kind ogendinigo, to ok nuyud kue, to unuriwni e kindgi, kendo RuothNyasaye nomi ubed gi parruok, gi wenge mojony, kod chuny mokuyo.  66Okunung’e gima biro timorenu, kendo unubed gi kihondko odiechieng’gotieno, mi ok unung’e sa thou.  67Kihondkono gi gik mubiro neno, nomiuwach okinyi kokinyi ni, ‘Yaye! Mad obed odhiambo!’ To odhiambokodhiambo unuwach ni, ‘Yaye! Mad obed okinyi. ’ 68Ruoth Nyasaye nodwokuMisri gi yiedhi, kata obedo ni nosingore ni ok nudog kuno kendo. Unuhonru ni wasiku mondo ong’iewu ka wasumbni, to onge ng’amanong’iewu. "Rapar mar Chik 291Mago e weche mag singruok mane Ruoth Nyasaye ochiko Musa mondo omijo-Israel otim, kane gin e piny jo-Moab.  Singruokno ne omedi kuomsingruok mane otimo kodgi Horeb. Singrouk mane Nyasaye otimo gi jo-Israel e piny Moab2Musa noluongo jo-Israel duto, mowachonigi niya, "Ne uneno gi wang’u gikmoko duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye otimo e piny Misri ni Farao gi jodonge kodpinye duto.  3Timbe madongo mane unenogo ne gin ranyisi gi honni 4to katakamano, nyaka chop sani Ruoth Nyasaye pok omiyou chuny mar ng’eyo, katawang’ mar neno, kata it mar winjo.  5Ruoth Nyasaye osetelonu e thim kuomhigni piero ang’wen, to lepu kata wuochu pok oti, 6bende ok usechamomakati kata madho divai kata gimoro mamero ji.  Notimonu kamano mondoung’ego ni en e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  7Ka ne uchopo ka, to Sihonruodh Heshbon kod Og ruodh Bashan ne jomonjowa, to ne waloyogi.  8Newakawo pinygi, mi wamiyo jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod nus jo-Manase mondoobed mwandugi.  9Nyaka urit weche mag singruok adimba, mondo udhi maberkuom gik moko duto mutimo.
"Kawuono uchung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, koda ka jotenddhoutu gi jodongu gi jotendu mamoko kod jo-Israel duto, chwo, 11gi monkod nyithindo, kaachiel gi jopinje mamoko modak kuomu, kata mana jomamodonu yien, kendo ma umbonu pi.  12Uikoru mondo ukuong’ru, kutimosingruok ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu dwaro timo kodu kawuono.  13RuothNyasaye dwaro mondo oloku joge, kendo mondo obed Nyasachu kaka nonyisou,kendo kaka nosingore ne kwereu ma Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo.  14Ok unkende ema amiyou utimo singruokni, 15to ji duto mochung’ kodwa ka e nyimRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kaachiel gi ji duto maonge kodwa ka kawuono,bende amiyo otimo singruokni.  16Ung’eyo kaka ne wadak e piny Misri,kendo kaka ne wakadho e pinje mag ogendini mamoko.  17Bende nuneno gikmakuero ma gilamo, kod kido mag nyisechegi manono mag yien gi mag kite,kod mag fedha gi mag dhahabu.  18Kapo ni nitie ng’ato kuomu ma dichwokata ma dhako, kata ka nitie joot kata dhoot moro madwaro weyo lamoRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, mondo odhi olam nyiseche mag ogendinimamoko, to mano nyalo bedone chakruok mar masira gi lit.  19Ka ng’atnoowinjo weche mag singruokni, mi owuondore e chunye ni onge gima birotime, kata koluwo timbene mag wich teko, to mano nokel masira maduong’. 20Ruoth Nyasaye ok nowe ni ng’atno richone, kendo mirimbe mager nolielkuome, mi kuong’ duto mondiki e kitabuni nomake kendo Ruoth Nyasayenoruch nyinge oko.  21Ruoth Nyasaye nopoge kuom dhout Israel duto, minosande kaka kuong’ duto mondik e kitabu mar chikni dwaro.
"E ndalo mabiro, nyikwau kod joma oa e pinje mamoko maboyo nonemasiche kod tuoche mane Ruoth Nyasaye osetimo e pinyni.  23Piny dutonowang’ gi mach kendo notim chumbi, ma ok nyal pidhie, kata mana lumbende ok notwiye.  Nokethre mana ka Sodom gi Gomora, kod Adma gi Zeboim,mane Ruoth Nyasaye otieko gi mirimbe mager.  24Bang’e ogendni dutonopenjre ni, ‘Ang’o momiyi Ruoth Nyasaye osetimo gima kama e pinyni? Eretiend mirima magerni?’ 25To nodwokgi niya, ‘Mano osetimore nikechjo-Israel ne ok oriti singruok mane Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kweregiotimo kodgi kane gin e piny Misri.  26Ne gilamo nyiseche mamoko mane okging’eyo, kendo mane Ruoth Nyasaye ok omiyogi mondo gilam.  27Manoemomiyo mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye nobedo mager kuom pinyni, mi nokeloe kuong’duto mondik e kitabuni.  28Osedhuologi gi lop tiendgi e pinygi gi mirimbemager, mi oterogi e piny machielo ma pod gintie nyaka chil kawuono. ’
"Nitie gik moko mopondo, to gin mag Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, to gikmoelnwa tiendgi ema omiwa kaachiel gi nyikwawa nyaka chieng, omiyowanyalo timo gik moko duto ma chikni dwaro. Rapar mar Chik 30Gik ma onego ji tim mondo oduog ir Ruoth Nyasaye, mi oguedhgi1"Ka gueth kod kuong’ ma aketo e nyimugo duto osetimorenu, muparowechena e pinje ma Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu oseteroue, 2mi uduogo iregi chunyu duto, kaachiel gi nyithindu, mana kaka chike ma amiyougidwaro, 3to Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nong’wonnu, mi nochak omi udhinyime maber kendo.  Enochak ochoku kendo kanyakla, kogolou e pinje dutomane okeyoue.  4Kata obedo ni osekeyou e tung’ piny gi tung’ piny kamano,to nochak ochoku kaachiel kendo.  5Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nodwoku epiny kwereu mondo udagie.  Enomi unya mang’eny, kendo ubed gi mwandumathoth moloyo kwereu.  6Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nomi chunyu gi chunynyikwau tim gik ma odwaro, mondo uhere gi chunyu duto kendo gi adiera,eka ubed mangima.  7Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nolok kuong’go dutoni wasiku, kendo ni joma sandou.  8Unuchak uluor Ruoth Nyasaye kendo, miunurit chikene duto ma amiyou kawuonogi.  9Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachunomedu mwandu mang’eny moloyo.  Unubed gi nyithindo mathoth, gi jamnimang’eny, kod cham mogundho.  Enobed mamor komiyou mwandu, mana kakanobedo mamor komiyo kwereu mwandu, 10to mana ka uluore, murito chikenegi buchene kaka ondiki e kitabu mar chikni, kendo ka uduogo ire gichunyu duto kendo gi adiera.
"Chik ma amiou kawuononi ok en chik matek, to bende ok en kuma bor.  Oken e polo ma dimi uwach ni,
‘Ng’ama didhinwa malo e polo mondo oomnwachikno, kendo opuonjwa, eka warite?’ 13Bende ok en loka nam, ma dimiuwach ni, ‘Ng’ama ding’adnwa nam mondo okelwago, mi opuonjwa, ekawarite?’ 14To wach Nyasaye chiegni kodu ahinya, kendo en mana e dhoukendo e chunyu, omiyo ritogo yot.
"Neuru, kawuono aketo gik moko ariyo e nyimu mondo uyier.  Gin ngima giber, kata tho gi rach.  16Ka umako chik Ruoth Nyasachu ma amiyou kawuono,muhere kuluwo yorene, kendo urito chikene gi buchene, to unubed mangima,mi ununya mang’eny, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu noguedhu e piny maubiro donjoe mondo ukaw.  17To kuweye, mubaro kudhi lamo nyiseche mamokokendo ukulorunigi, 18to ng’euru maler ni karu nolal nono, kendo okunudag aming’a e piny ma ubiro donjoe mondo ukaw, kuseng’ado aoraJordan.  19Koro aluongo polo gi piny mondo obed joneno ni aseketo gikmoko ariyo e nyimu mondo uyier.  Gin ngima gi gueth, kata tho gi kuong’. To yieruru ngima, mondo udag maber kaachiel gi nyikwau.  20Heruru RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu, kuwinjo wachne, kendo kuketo chunyu kuome.  Manonomi ubed mangima, kendo udag aming’a e piny mane osingore ni kwereu maIbrahim gi Isaka kod Jakobo. "Rapar mar Chik 31Oket Joshua kar Musa1Musa nomedo wuoyo ni jo-Israel, kowacho niya,
"Koro hika gin miaachiel gi piero ariyo, kendo ok anyal dhi nyime gi telonu.  To bendeRuoth Nyasaye osenyisa ni ok nang’ad aora Jordan.  3Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu owuon biro telo nyimu mondo otiek ogendini mudhi kawo pinygigo,mi unudag e pinygi, kendo Joshua notelnu kaka Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho. 4Ruoth Nyasaye biro tieko ogendinigo mana kaka notieko Sihon gi Og,Ruodhi jo-Amor, kaachiel gi pinjegi.  5Nochiwgi e luetu, mi unutimnigimana kaka nochikou.  6Beduru gi chir, kendo gi jing’o.  Kik uluorgi, kendokik chunyu nyosre, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro dhi kodu, kendook noweu kata jwang’ou ok nojwang’u. "7Bang’e Musa noluongo Joshua mowachone e nyim jo-Israel duto niya, "Bedgi chir kendo gi jing’o, nikech in ema ibiro telo ni jogi ka gidhi epiny ma Ruoth Nyasaye nosingore ni kweregi ni nomigi, kendo inimigikawe.  8Ruoth Nyasaye owuon biro teloni, kendo nobed kodi.  Ok noweyi,bende ok nojwang’i, omiyo kik ibed maluor, kendo kik chunyi nyosre. "Nyaka som chik bang’ higni abiriyo ka higni abiriyo9Musa nondiko chikno momiyo jodolo ma jo-Lawi mane ting’o Sandug Mumamar Ruoth Nyasaye, kod jodong Israel duto.  10Eka nochikogi kama: "Bang’higni abiriyo ka higni abiriyo e higa miweyoe gope, e kinde mutimoe SapKiche, 11ka jo-Israel duto biro mondo olam Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachukama obiro yiero mondo nyinge obedie, to nyaka usom chikni matek enyimgi duto.  12Nyaka uchik ji duto, chwo gi mon kod nyithindo, kaachielgi jopinje mamoko modak kuomu, mondo giwinj chikno, eka gipuonjre luoroRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mi girit wechene duto maber.  13Tienge mabiromapok ong’eyo wechegi nowinjgi, mi nopuonjre luoro Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu ndalo duto ma gidakgo e piny ma ubiro kawo ka useng’ado aoraJorda,. "Chike mogik mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa14Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Ibiro tho machiegni, omiyo luongJoshua udhi e Hemb Romo mondo akete e tich. " Omiyo Musa gi Joshua nejodhi kaka nowachnigi, 15kendo Ruoth Nyasaye nofwenyore e Hema ka ni ebor polo mane ochung’ e dho Hema. 16Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Ka isetho, moyiki, to jogi biroweya mi luw nyiseche mag jomoko ma gidhi yudo ka gidonjo e pinyno, manakaka dhako weyo chwore, to dwanyore gi chwo mamoko.  Giniweya, kendoginiketh singruok ma asetimo kodgi.  17Kuom mano, mirimba mager nolielkuomgi ka mach mi notiekgi.  Anawegi, kendo ok nakwan-gi ka joga, miginithagre malit, kendo ginine masiche madongo.  Eka bang’e giniwachniya, ‘Thagruokgi osebironwa mana nikech Nyasachwa koro ok ni kodwa. ’18To ok nawinjgi e ndalogo, nikech richo ma gisebedo ka gitimo mar lamonyiseche mamoko.
"Kuom mano, koro ndik wer ma anyisi ni, kendo ipuonjgi kaka iwere,mondo oparnigi chikena.  20Ka asekelogi e piny maber kendo momew, kakanasingora ni kweregi, mi giyudo chiemo, kendo gidoko machwe, eka bang’eginichara, kendo giniketh singruokna, ka giluwo nyiseche mamoko kendotiyonigi.  21Ka githagore malit kendo gineno masiche malit kamano, towendni nobednigi rapar, nimar nyikwagi nosik ka were.  Kata koroni, kapok akelogi e piny ma nasingora ni namigi, ang’eyo kaka chunygi chalo. "22Musa nondiko wendno chieng’no, mopuonjo jo-Israel.
Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Joshua wuod Nun niya, "Bed gi chir, kendo gijing’o, nikech in ema nitelni jo-Israel ka gidhi e piny ma ne asingorani namigi kendo anabed kodi. "24Kane Musa osetieko ndiko chikno duto e kitabu, 25nochiko jo-Lawi maneting’o Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye niya,
"Kawuru kitap chikni, ukete bath Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mondo obednu kanyo karapar, 27nimar ang’eyo ni un joma wigi tek ta.  Usetamoru winjo RuothNyasaye kata ka pod angima ka an kodu.  Koro kasetho to ubiro dage machalnadi? 28Omiyo chokuru jodong dhoutu gi jotendu duto e nyima, mondoawachnigi wechegi, kendo aluong polo gi piny mondo obedna joneno. 29Ang’eyo ni ka asetho, to ubiro duworu malich, muwe yo ma asechikoue. Kuom mano, unune masiche e ndalo mabiro, nikech numiyo Ruoth Nyasayemirima gi timbeu maricho. "Wend Musa30Bang’e Musa nowachonigi weche duto mag wendni, ka oganda jo-Israelochiko itgi. Rapar mar Chik
"In polo, chik iti ka awuoyo!In piny, winj wechena!2Puonj mara mondo obedka koth machue e lek,kendo wechena mondo obedka tho mamiyo lum doko mang’ich. 3Abiro luongo nying Ruoth Nyasaye,to dwokuru ni,‘Omi Nyasaye duong’!’4En lwanda, ma tichne long’o,nikech yorene duto ni kare. En Nyasaye ma jaadiera,kendo maonge ketho,ma timbene kare,kendo ma jaratiro. 5Tieng’ni to en tieng’ makoch,kendo mobam,ma timbegi mobam nyiso niok gin nyithind Ruoth Nyasaye. 6Yaye, oganda mofuwoma onge gi rieko,mano e kaka utimoni Ruoth Nyasaye adier?Donge en e wuorumane ochueyou?Donge en ema omiyou dokooganda maratego?7Paruru ndalo machon,kod tienge ma koro osekadho. Penjuru wuoneu kod jodongu,mondo ogannu sigendgi.
Kane Ng’ama Duong’ Moloyoochiwo ni ogendini pinjegi,mondo obed kuondegi mag dak,noketo ni oganda ka oganda tong’ pinygimaromre gi kar romb nyithi Nyasaye. 9To Ruoth Nyasaye owuonnoyiero joka Jakobomondo obed joge owuon,kendo obed mwandune. 10Noyudo ogandano e thimmalich ma ondiegi rutoe,mi nolworogi koni gi koni,moritogi maber. 11Kaka ongo yiengo odemondo nyithinde owuogi,koyaro bwombene mondo okawgi,kendo oting’gi e bwombene,e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye yaro bwombene,kendo kawo ogandane. 12Ruoth Nyasaye kende ema otelonigi,ka onge nyasaye moro makonye. 13Nomiyo giidho gode mag piny,kendo omiyo gichamo gik ma nyak e lowo. Nomiyo gichamo mor kichmothodhi e kind lwanda,kod mor zeitunimanyak e lowo motimo kite. 14Ne gin gi cha adila gi cha rombe,kod nyirombe gi imbe mabeyo moloyogi dhok moa Bashan, kod nyuogi,kaachiel gi ngano maber. Ne gimadho mana divai makwar maber. 15Kamano dhood Jakobo nochiemo, moyieng’. Adier, joka Jeshurun nodoko machwe, mogwecho. Ee, nubedo machwe ahinya,nikech nuchiemo mang’eny. Ne giweyo Nyasaye ma nochweyogi,ka gicharo Lwanda ma noresogi. 16Ne gimiyo nyiego omakekuom lamo nyiseche mamoko,kendo ne gimiye mirimagi timbegi makuero.
Ne gitimo liswecheni jochiende ma ok Nyasaye,kendo ni nyiseche ma ok ging’eyo,ma kata mana kweregi bende ne ok ong’eyo. 18Wigi nowil gi Lwandama nochweyogi!Ne ok giparo Nyasayema nomiyogi ngima. 19Ruoth Nyasaye noneno gik mane yawuote gi nyige timo,mi nojwang’oginikech ne giwang’o iye. 20Nowacho niya,‘Ok named kwanogi ka joga,to abiro neno gikogi,nimar gin tieng’ ma wigi tek,nyithindo ma ok nyal gen.
Gisemiyo nyiego omaka,nikech giselamo gikma ok nyasaye. Adier gisewang’o iya,nikech giselamo gima nono. Omiyo abiro miyo nyiego makgika ayiero oganda ma nono oloyo,kendo abiro wang’o igi,ka ayiero oganda ma ok dew Nyasaye. 22Mirimba osemoko mach!Mawang’o pinykaachiel gi gik manyakie,kendo owang’o mise mag gode,bende ochopo kata kar joma otho e liel piny. 23Anamed masiche kuom joga,kendo nachielgi gi asechena duto,24mi kech nokagi,kendo midhusi notuogi,kendo tuoche maricho nogogi,bende naol kuomgi ondiegi mangemo,kod thuonde man gi kwiri mager. 25Ligangla noneggi ka gin oko,kendo ka gin ei udi,mi nyithindgi nodong’ kiye,kendo mondgi nodok mond liete. Yawuowi gi nyiri bende notho,kaachiel gi nyithindo mayom,kod jodongo moti. 26Naparo ni mondo ang’adgi matindotindo,kendo atiekgi ma ok nochak opargi. 27To naparo ni dipo ka wasigu ojara,ka gipakore ni gin ema gisetimo gigo duto,to ok an, Ruoth Nyasaye. ’
"Joma wacho kamanogin oganda mofuwo,kendo maonge gi paro. 29Ka dine giriek,to dine ging’eyo tiend gik matimore,dine ging’eyo gima biro timorenigi e giko. 30Ere kaka ng’at achiel dilaw ji gana achiel,kata ji ariyo riemb ji gana apar,mak mana ka ok Ruoth Nyasaye ma Lwandagi ema oweyogi,moketogi e lwet wasikgi?31To adier, lwanda mar wasikwa ok chal gi Lwandawa,kata mana wasikwa bende ong’eyo kamano. 32Mzabibu maggi gin mzabip Sodom, mopidh Gomorama olembgi otimo kwiri, kendo kech. 33Divachgi chalo gi kwich thuol mager.
"Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya,‘Donge gigo duto okan maber e od kenona,
nyaka chop chieng’ ma abiro chuloe kuor kendo kumogimana chieng’ ma tiendgi nokierie, mi gipodh piny?Chieng’’ mar masira,ma gibiro rumoesudonigi machiegni!’
"Adier, ka Ruoth Nyasaye oneno ni joge ool,kendo ni onge kata ng’at achiel modong’ makonyogi,to obiro ng’adonigi bura maber,kendo obiro kechogi. 37Enowach niya,‘Nyisecheu ni kanye,lwanda mane udwaro yudo konyruok kuome?38Ere nyisecheu mane chamo boche mag misengni mau,kendo madho divai mar misengni miolo piny?Koro gibi mondo gikonyu,kendo gibednu kar konyruok. ’
"Koro ng’euru malong’o nian e Nyasaye,kendo onge nyasaye moro,mak mana an. An kende ema anego ji,kendo an ema achiwo ngima. Ahinyo, bende achango. Onge ng’ama nyalo reso ng’ato e lweta. 40Koro ating’o badaka akuong’ora gi nyinga awuon mochwere ni,41kasepiago ligangla mamil,to anachul kuor ni wasika,kendo kasechako ng’ado bura,to anakum jogo mochaya. 42Anami asere maga chadhregi remb joma onegi kod joma omaki. Liganglana nochadh jotend wasigu.
"Un polo, morurukaachiel gi Ruoth Nyasaye. Un nyiseche duto,kulreneuru. Moruru un ogendini kaachiel gi joge,kendo malaika duto mag Nyasaye mondo opak tekone,nikech enochul kuor kuom remb jotichne,kokumo wasike kod joma ochaye. Enopwodh piny kaachiel gi joge. "44Musa nobiro gi Joshua wuod Nun, mosomo weche duto mag wendno, ka jiochiko itgi.  45Kane Musa osetieko wuoyo ni jo-Israel duto, 46nowachoniginiya, "Chikuru itu maber mondo uwinj weche duto ma asiemougo kawuono. Puonjuru nyithindu chikego duto, mondo girit kendo gitim, mak giweyokata achiel, 47nikech ok gin weche ma nono, to gin e ngimau.  Kuritogi,to gibiro miyo udag aming’a e piny ma ubiro kawo ka useng’ado aoraJordan. "Nyasaye oyie mondo Musa one piny Kanaan48 Odiechieng’ onogo Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya,
"Idh got Neboma en achiel kuom gode Abarim manie piny Moab, yo wuokchieng’ marJeriko, mondo irang piny Kanaan ma abiro miyo jo-Israel ka mwandugi. 50Initho ewi got ma ibiro idhono, mi iluw kwereni, mana kaka owadu Harunnotho e got Hor, moluwo kwerene.  51Gima kamano nyaka timre nimar nukethoe nyima kane ok uluora e nyim jo-Israel e sokni mag Meribath-kadesh, ethim Zin.  52Inine piny ma abiro miyo jo-Israelno gi chien, to okinidonjie. "Rapar mar Chik 33Musa oguedho dhout Israel1Kane Musa ng’at Nyasaye chiegni tho, noguedho jo-Israel, kowacho kama:
"Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro koa Sinai. Ne orienynigi gie Seir,kendo gie got Paran. Nobiro ka ji maler gana gi gana oruowo e bathe ma korachwich. 3Adier, ohero joge maler,kendo oguedhogi. Giluwe kamoro amora modhiye,kendo giwinjo chikene4mane Musa omiyowa,mondo obed mwandu mar oganda joka Jakobo. 5Ruoth Nyasaye nodoko Ruodh Israelma bende iluongo ni jo-Jeshurum,kane jodong dhoutgi ochokore kaachiel. "6Kuom jo-Reuben, Musa nowachoe niya,"Jo-Reuben mondo obed mangima kendo kik githo,to kata kamano, onego gibed manok. "7Kuom jo-Juda to nowuoyoe kama,"A Ruoth Nyasaye, winj ywak jo-Judamondo idwokgi kuom ogandagi. Bednigi tekregi ma gisiroregokendo ikonygi kuom wasikgi. "
Jo-Lawi to nowuoyo kuomgi niya,"A Ruoth Nyasaye,nimiyo nyikwa Lawi ombulumiluongo ni Urim gi Thumimmondo ging’ego dwaroni,nikech gin joma tiyoni gi adiera. Ne itemogi Masa,kendo e sokni mag Meribami inwang’o nigin joma inyalo geno. 9Hera mane giherigooloyo heramane giherogo wuonegigi minegi kod owetegi,kata nyithindgi,nikech ne giluwo mana chikeni,mi girito singruok mari maber. 10Gipuonjo joka Jakobo chikeni. Ee, gipuonjo jo-Israel chikeni. Giwang’oni misengni,madum tik mamit,kendo gitimoni misengnimiwang’o pepe kendoni mar misango. 11A Ruoth Nyasaye,guedh riekogi duto,kendo iyie gi tichgi. Tiek wasikgi duto,mondo wasikgigo kik chak bed gi teko. "12To kuom jo-Benjamin nowuoyoe kama,"Joma Ruoth Nyasaye oheroodak gi kue;Nyasaye Maduong Moloyoritogi seche duto,kendo gidak e godene. "13Kuom joka Josef to nowachoe niya,"Ruoth Nyasaye onego guedh lopgi,gi chiwo maber moa e polo malo,kaachiel gi pi manie bwo piny,14gi olembe mabeyo ma chieng’ onyago,kod olembe mabeyo manyak due ka due,15gi gik mabeyo mag gode ma chon mochwere,16kaachiel gi gik mabeyo mag piny,kod gik moko duto manie iye,gi ng’wono mar Jal modak e Bungu Maliel. Guethgi duto onego bed ewi joka Josef,jal mane oyier kuom owetene. 17Dhoode nochal gi nyarwath makayo,ma tungene chalo gi tung jowi,ma obiro chwowogo ogendini,moriembgi nyaka tung piny gi tung’ piny. Tungego gin gi ji tara gi tara ma jo-Efraim,kod ji gana gi gana ma jo-Manase. "18Jo-Zebulun to nowuoyo kuomgi kama,"Un jo-Zebulun,beduru mamor e wuodheu,kendo un jo-Isakar,beduru mamor e hembeu. 19Dhoudi ariyogo biro luongo ogendini e got,kama gitimoe misengni makare,nimar gibiro yudo mwandu mogundho e nembe,kendo gik mabeyo mopondo e dhonam. "20Kuom jo-Gad to nowuoyoe niya,"Oguedh jalo mayaro tong’ jo-Gad. Dhood Gad chalo gi sibur madhako, mogwom piny,ka yiecho bat gi wi gima omako. 21Ne giyiero piny koma ber moloyo,nikech gin ema nopognigi migap jatelo. Ne gibiro ir jotend ji,kendo ne gitimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro,ka girito chikemane Ruoth Nyasayeomiyo jo-Israel. "22Kuom jo-Dan nowachoe kama,"Dhood Dan chalo gi nyathi sibuor,machikore koa Bashan. "23Kuom jo-Naftali to nowuoyoe niya,"Dhood Naftali nigi gik moko duto modwaro,kendo en gi gueth mogundho,moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye. Bende opogne nam Galilikod dho wedhe ma milambo. "24To kuom jo-Asher nowachoe kama,"Dhood Asher mondo oyud guethmoloyo dhout owetene mamoko. Dhout owetene mondo oher dhoode, kendo mondo dhoode odag maber. 25Lodi mag dhorangeyene obed mag chuma gi mag mula,kendo tekone omedre ndalo duto.
"Onge Nyasaye moro machal gi Nyasach joka Jeshurunmaringo e kor polo e duong’ne maler mondo okonyu. 27Nyasaye mochwere ma nyaka chieng’ en kar daku,kendo bedene mochwere ema konyou. Noriembonu wasigu,mi ogolo chik mondo neggi. 28Kamano jo-israel odak gi kue. Adier, nyikwa Jakobo odakmaonge ng’ama thagogie piny machiego cham gi divai,kama tho moa e polo tonie maber. 29Ere joma mor ka un,un jo-Israel ma Ruoth Nyasaye owaro!Ruoth Nyasaye e kuot mogeng’ou,kendo en e liganglau mar duong’. Wasiku mondo obolrenu,kendo unyon hembko maggi gi tiendu. "Rapar mar Chik 34Tho mar Musa1Musa nowuok oa e paw Moab moidho got Nebo nyaka wi Pisga yo wuokchieng’mar Jeriko, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nonyise piny Kanaan duto, chakre Gileadnyaka Dan, 2gi piny Naftali duto, kod piny Efraim gi Manase kaachiel gipiny Juda duto nyaka nam Mediterenia man yo podho chieng’, 3gi piny manyo milambo, kod paw holo man yo Jeriko miluongo ni Dala Othidhe, nyakaZoar.  4Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Ma e piny mane asingora ni Ibrahimgi Isaka kod Jakobo ni nami nyikwagi.  Asenyisigo mondo inene gi wang’i,to kata kamano, ok niidh loka, midonjie. "5Kamano, Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye notho e piny Moab kuno, mana kakaRuoth Nyasaye nosewacho, 6mi noyike e holo momanyore gi Beth-peor e pinyMoab.  To onge ng’ama ong’eyo liende nyaka chil kawuono. 7Musa ne otho ka jahigni mia achiel gi piero ariyo, to ne pod en ng’atmatek ma wang’e bith.  8Jo Israel noywage e paw Moab kuom ndalo pieroadek, nyaka ndalo miywagego norumo.  9Joshua wuod Nun nomi rieko mathoth,nikech Musa noseyieyo lwete kuome, mi jo-Israel nowinje, motimo gik maneRuoth Nyasaye ochiko Musa.  10Nyaka koroni janabi moro machal gi Musa,mane Ruoth Nyasaye romogo wang’ gi wang’, pok owuok e Israel.  11Parururanyisi gi honni duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye ooro Musa mondo odhi otim niFarao gi joge kod piny Misri duto, 12kendo paruru timbe madongo kendomalich mane Musa otimo, ka jo-Israel neno. Joshua 1Jo-Israel ikore mondo omonj piny Kanaan1Kane Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye osetho, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshuawuod Nun, mane jalup Musa niya,
"Musa jatichna osetho.  Omiyo ikri gijo-Israel duto mondo ung’ad aora Jordan, udhi e piny mamiyou.  3Kamoroamora ma tiendu onyono, nobed maru, kaka nasingora ni Musa.  4Kuonde dutonobed mau, chakre e thim ma yo milambo, nyaka Lebanon yo nyandwat, kendokoa Yufrate, aora maduong’ man yo wuok chieng’, koluwo piny jo-Hiti,nyaka Nam Mediterenia man yo podho chieng’.  5Onge ng’at ma nosiri nyakachieng’.  Anabed kodi kaka nabet gi Musa, Ok naweyi kata jwang’i oknajwang’i.  6Bed gi chir, kendo gi jing’o, nimar in ema nitel ni jogagi,ka gikawo piny mane asingora ni kweregi ni namigi.  7To bed mana gi chir,kendo gi jing’o, kiluwo chik duto mane Musa jatichna omiyi.  Kik iwechikno, kibaro koracham kata korachwich, mi inibed gi hawi kuonde dutomidhiye.  8Kik wiyi wil gi Kitap Chikno, to nyaka isome odiechieng’gotieno, kendo ine ni iluwo chik duto mondikie.  Eka inidongi, kendonoguedh gik moko duto mitimo.  9Par kaka asechiki ni mondo ibed gi chirkendo gi jing’o.  Kik iluor, kendo kik chunyi nyosre, nikech an RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachi, an kodi kuonde duto midhiye. "10Eka Joshua nochiko jotend jo-Israel kowachonigi niya,
"Wuothuru ekambi duto, kunyiso ji niya, ‘Ikreuru, nimar bang’ ndalo adek ubirong’ado aora Jordan, mondo ukaw piny ma Ruoth Nyasaye miyou. ’ "
Joshua nowacho ni jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel niya,
"Paruru gima Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye nochikou, kowacho niya, ‘RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu nomiu pinyni mondo obed kar daku. ’ 14Mondu ginyithindu kod jambu nyalo dong’ e piny mane Musa omiyou yo wuok chieng’mar aora Jordan, to un jolweny nyaka uidh loka, kutelo e nyim jo-Israelweteu, mondo ukonygi kedo.  15Ka gin bende gisekawo piny ma Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu miyogi, kendo gidakie, eka unuduogi, mondo udag e pinyuuwegi man yo wuok chieng mar aora Jordan, mane Musa jatich Nyasayeomiyou. "16Ne giduoko Joshua niya, "Wanatim duto michikowa, kendo wanadhi kamoroamora miorowae.  17Wanawinji kaka ne wawinjo Musa, to Nyasaye mondo obedkodi kaka nobedo gi Musa! 18Ng’ato ang’ata ma nodagi winjo chikni, katama notamre timo gima ichiko, nonegi.  Omiyo bed gi chir kendo gi jing’o!"Joshua 2Joshua ooro jombetre Jeriko1 Kane pod gin Shitim, Joshua wuod Nun nooro jombetre ariyo ling’ling’mondo odhi ocheng piny.  Jombetrego nodhi Jeriko modonjo e od dhako moroma ohodho ma nyinge Rahab, kendo ne ginindo kanyo.  2To ruodh Jerikonoyudo wach ni jo-Israel moko osebiro kanyo gotieno mondo ocheng piny,3omiyo nooro ni Rahab wach, kochike niya, "Golnwa joma nie odigo oko,nimar gisebiro mondo gicheng pinywa duto. " 4To noyudo dhakonoosepandogi, omiyo nodwoko ruoth niya, "Adier, jomoko nende obiro e oda,to ne ok ang’eyo kuma giaye.  5Nende giwuok kar sa miloroe rangach kapiny dwaro yuso, to akia kuma gidhiye.  Kulawogi matek, to ubiro jukogi. "6To chutho, noseterogi e tado, moumogi gi tworo mane osechano kanyo. 7Jootego nowuok, molor rangach.  Ne gilawo jombetre ka giluwo yo madhikuma iyorogo aora Jordan. 8Kane Rahab odhi ir jombetrego e tado, nonwang’o ka pok ginindo,9mowachonigi niya, "Ang’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyou pinyni, kendo enadier ni waduto waluor nikech birou, kendo kibaji omako piny duto. 10Wasewinjo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nodwono pi Nam Makwar e nyimu, kane uaMisri.  Bende wasewinjo kaka nunego Sihon gi Og, ruodhi mag jo-Amon manloka Jordan, kaachiel gi ogendini mag lweny.  11Kane wawinjo wachno, newadoko maluor.  Birou bende osekawo chunywa duto, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu en Nyasach polo gi piny.  12Emomiyo koro kuong’renauru e nyingRuoth Nyasaye kendo umiya ranyisi ni kaka asetimonu maber, un bendenutimne joodwa maber.  13Singrenauru ni unures wuora gi mama kod owetenagi nyiminena, kaachiel gi joutgi duto.  Kik uwe watho. " 14Jogo nodwokeniya, "Kutho, to kara wan bende owojore watho.  Ka Ruoth Nyasayeosemiyowa pinyni, to wanarit singruokwa, kendo wanatimni maber, mak manakihulo wachwani. "15Rahab nodak e ot mochuog e kor ohinga mar dala Jeriko, omiyo nogologigie dirisa, molorogi piny gi tol, 16kowachonigi niya, "Dhiuru e got,nikech dipo ka joma lawou oyudou, ponduru kuno kuom ndalo adek, tobang’e ka jogo oseduogo, eka uchak wuoth. " 17Jombetrego nosieme ni ka okotimo gima gichike, to muma ok nomakgi.  18Ne giwachone niya, "Chieng mawanadonj e pinyni, to nyaka itue tol makwarni e dirisa kama ilorowaeni,kendo ichok wuoru gi meru gi oweteni kod joodu duto, mondo gibed kodi eodi ka.  19Ka ng’ato nowuog oko, mi negi, to rembe nobed e wiye owuon,kendo ok wanabed joketho.  To ka oneg ng’ato man kodi e ot, to rembenobed e wiwa.  20To kapo ni ihulo wachwani, muma ok nomakwa. " 21Nodwokoginiya, "Obed kamano. " Eka noweyogi, mi gidhi.  To bang’e notueyo tolmakwar e dirisa. 22Kamano ne gidhi e got, mi gipondo kuno.  Joma ne lawogi nomanyogikuonde duto e yo madhi Jordan kuom ndalo adek, to ne ok giyudogi, omiyone gidok Jeriko.  23Eka jombetre ariyogo nolor oa e got.  Ne ging’adoaora, mi gidok ir Joshua.  24Ne ginyise weche duto ma notimorenigi, kagimedo nyise niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyowa pinyno duto, kendo kibajiosemako ji duto, ka giwinjo birowa. "Joshua 3Jo-Israel ong’ado aora Jordan1Gokinyi mang’ich, Joshua kod jo-Israel duto nowuok Shitim, mi gidhiaora Jordan.  Ne gibworo kanyo ka pok ging’ado aora.  2Bang’ ndalo adekjotelo nowuotho e kambi duto, 3ka ginyiso ji niya, "Kuneno ka jo-Lawi majodolo otelo e nyimu koting’o Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasachu, eka unbende unuchak wuoth kuluwo Sanduk.  4Kuluwe kamano, eka unung’e yo monegouluw, nimar yandi pok ubiro koni.  To kik usud machiegni kode; weuruthuolo ma dirom ondamo alufu achiel. " 5Joshua nowacho ni ji niya,"Puodhreuru nikech kiny Ruoth Nyasaye notimnu hono maduong’. " 6Ekanowacho ni jodolo niya, "Ting’uru Sandug Muma, kendo utel ni ji. " Mi negitimo kamano. 7Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Tinendeni abiro chako miyi bedogi duong’ e nyim jo-Israel duto kendo gining’e ni abedo kodi mana kakanabedo gi Musa.  8Omiyo nyis jodolo moting’o Sandug Muma, ni, ka gichopoe aora Jordan, to mondo gichung’ e pi. "9Joshua nowacho ni jo-Israel niya, "Biuru ka mondo uwinj gima RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu owacho.  10Tinende unuyud ranyisi ni Nyasaye mangimani kodu, kendo nodarnu jo-Kanaan gi jo-Hiti gi jo-Hivi gi jo-Perizi gijo-Girgash gi jo-Amor kod jo-Jebus.  11Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye maRuodh piny ngima notelnu kung’ado aora Jordan,
,13kendo ka jodolomoting’e nonyon pi Jordan, to aora nowe mol, mi pi moa malo nogudrekogingore ka pith.  Koro yieruru ji apar gariyo kuom dhout Istrael,kugolo ng’at achiel e dhoot ka dhoot. " 14Omiyo ji nowuok e kambi mondoong’ad aora Jordan, ka jodolo otelonigi koting’o Sandug Muma.  Ne enndalo keyo, kinde mane aora pong’ie mao.  15Kane jodolo ochopo e dhoaora, mi giketo tiendegi e pi, 16gikanyono pi nochung’ gi yo ka malo,kogingore machiegni gi Adam, dala man but Zarethan.  Pi mane mol kochomonam mar Araba, miluongo ni Nam Kado, noduono chuth, mi jo-Israelnong’ado aora kama omanyore gi Jeriko.  17Jodolo ma noting’o Sandug Mumamar Ruoth Nyasaye nochung’ e lowo motwo e dier Jordan nyaka jo-Israelduto notieko kadho, ka giwuotho e lowo motwo. Joshua 4Ogol kite apar gariyo e aora Jordan1Kane ji duto oseng’ado aora Jordan, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshuaniya,
"Yier ji apar gariyo, kigolo ng’at achiel e dhoot ka dhoot,3kendo chikgi mondo gikwany kite apar gariyo e dier Jordan, kama nejodolo ochung’ie, mondo giting’gi mi gichunggi kama ang’ nubworiegotienoni. " 4Eka Joshua noluongo ji apar gariyo ma noseyiero,5mowachonigi niya, "Kadhuru utel e nyim Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu nyaka e dier Jordan, kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo okwany kidiachiel oyie e goke, mondo kidi ka kidi ochung’ ni dhoot ka dhoot. 6Kitego nobednu ka rapar e ndalo mabiro, kendo ka nyithindu nopenjungechgi, 7to ununyisgi kaka pi aora Jordan ne odono kane Sandug Muma marRuoth Nyasaye kadho.  Kamano kitego nobed rapar ni jo-Israel ndalo duto. "8Jo-Israelgo notimo gima ne Joshua ochikogi, kaka Ruoth Nyasayenosechike.  Ne gikwanyo kite apar gariyo e dier Jordan, maromre gi karkwan dhoutgi, kendo ne giting’ogi nyaka kama ne gidhi bworoe, migiketogi kanyo.  9Bende Joshua nochungo kite apar gariyo moko e dier aoraJordan, kama jodolo mane oting’o Sandug Muma ochung’ie, kendo kitego podni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.  10Jodolo ma noting’o Sandug Muma nochung’achung’a e dier Jordan nyaka ji notieko timo gik moko duto mane RuothNyasaye ochiko Joshua mondo gitim.  Ji nokadho piyopiyo, 11to kanegiseng’ado aroa giduto, eka jodolo bende nong’ado gi Sanduk mar RuothNyasaye, 12Jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel ema nong’ado aorakotelo ni jo-Israel, ka giikore ni lweny kaka Musa nosewachonogi.  13Jialufu mia ang’wen moikore ni lweny nong’ado aora e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kagiidho loka nyaka paw Jeriko mondo gikedi.  14Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasayenomiyo Joshua bedo gi duong’ ahinya e nyim jo-Israel duto, kendo negimiye luor e ngimane duto, mana kaka ne gimiyo Musa. 15Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya,
"Chik jodolo moting’o SandugRapar, mondo owuog e aora Jordan. " 17Mi Joshua notimo kamano.  18To kanejodolo oseidho loka, mo nyono lowo motwo, aora nochako mol kendo, migenge nopong’ kaka chon,19Jo-Israel nong’ado aora Jordan tarik apar mar due mokwongo, kendo negibworo Gilgal, yo wuok chieng’ mar Jeriko.  20Kanyo Joshua nochungoekite apar gariyo mane gigolo e aora Jordan.  21Eka nowacho ni jo-Israelniya, "Ka nyikwau nopenju ngech kitegi e ndalo mabiro, 22to ununyisgi nijo-Israel nong’ado aora Jordan kotwo, 23kendo ne Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu nomiyo aora Jordan odwono nyaka ne ukadho uduto mana kakanomiyo nam Makwar oduono nyaka ne wakadho.  24Kamano ji duto manie pinynong’e teko mar Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo ginimi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachuduong’ nyaka chieng’. "Joshua 5Jo-Israel oter nyangu, kendo ocham Pasaka, Gilgal1Ruodhi duto mag jo-Amor ma nodak yo podho chieng’, kod jo-Kanaan manodak mokiewo gi Nam Mediterenia nowinjo ni Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyo aoraJordan oduono ka jo-Israel kadho.  Omiyo kihondko nomakogi, mi gidokomaluor, kendo chunygi noa nikech jo-Israel. 2E ndalogo, Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Los miriye mag kite,mondo ochak oter jo-Israel nyangu kendo. " 3Omiyo Joshua noloso miriye,motero ji nyangu e Gibeathhaaraloth.  4Notimo kamano nikech ji duto manosebedo madongo moromo kedo e kinde mane gia Misri nosetho e thim kanepod gin e yo.  5To kata obedo ni joma chwo duto ma noa Misri noseternyangu, ji duto ma nonywol e kinde mane ging’ado thim ne pok oternyangu.  6Jo-Israel nosewuotho e thim kuom higni piero ang’wen, kendojoma dongo duto mane oa Misri koseromo kedo nosetho, nikech ne ok giritochik Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ruoth Nyasaye noramo ni ok nowe gine piny momewkendo man gi mwandu mane osesingore ni kwerewa ni nomiwa.  7To yawuotgima nodongo bang’gi ne ok oter nyangu kane giwuotho e thim.  Omiyo gin emaJoshua noterogi nyangu. 8Kane osetergi nyangu, ji duto nobet e kambi nyaka ne gichango.  9EkaRuoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Musa niya, "Tinendeni asegolo ayanj jo-Misrioko kuomu. " Mano emomiyo nochak kanyo ni Gilgal, kendo pod iluongekamano nyaka chil kawuono.
Kane jo-Israel obworo Gilgal e paw Jeriko, ne gitimo Pasaka godhiambodue apar gang’wen mar dueno.  11Kinyne ne gichamo chamb Kanaan.  Ne enchamb abula, kod makati moted maonge thowi.  12Chakre chieng’ manejo-Israel ochamoe chiemb Kanaanno, chiemb Manna mane oyudo gichamonorumo, mi ne ok giyudo moko kendo.  Higano ne gichamo mana chemb Kanaan. Joshua oromo gi ng’at moying’o ligangla13Kane Joshua ochopo machiegni gi Jeriko, noneno ng’at mochung’; enyime, koting’o ligangla, Joshua nodhi ire, mopenje niya, "In jakorwa,koso jasikiwa?" 14Ng’atno nodwoke niya, "An ka kaka jaduong’ jolweny magRuoth Nyasaye. " Joshua nogoyo chonge piny, mokulore nyaka e lowo,mowacho niya, "Ang’o midwaro mondo atim ruodha?" 15Jaduong’ jolweny magRuoth Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "Lony wuocheni nimar kama ichung’ieno enkama ler. " Mi Joshua notimo kamano. Joshua 6Jo-Israel okawo Jeriko1Ranga Jeriko nolor matek mondo ogeng’ jo-Israel oko, kendo onge ng’amane nyalo donjo kata wuok.  2Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya,"Asechiwo Jeriko gi ruodhe e lweti.  3Nyaka ilwor dalano gi jogi maglweny kuom ndalo auchiel, kilwore odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ dichiel. 4Jodolo abiriyo nyaka dhi e nyim Sandug Muma, koting’ tunge abiriyomolos gi tunge imbe.  To chieng’ mar abiriyo nyaka ilwor dala gi jogi maglweny nyadibiriyo, ka jodolo goyo tungegi.  5Ka giselwore kamano, tomondo gigo tung’ dichiel matek.  Gikanyono muwinjoe tung’, to ji dutomondo okog matek.  Eka ohinga mar Jeriko nopodh riep, kendo oganda lwenynodonj e dala, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato ochomo nyime tir. "6Omiyo Joshua wuod Nun nolwongo jodolo, mowacho nigi niya, "Ting’uruSandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye, to ji abiriyo kuomu mondo otel e nyime,koting’o tunge abiriyo molos gi tunge imbe. " 7Eka nowacho ni jolwenyniya, "Wuothuru mondo ulwor dala Jeriko, ka jolweny moa e dhoudi ariyogi nus kande otelo gi Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye. " 8Kane Joshua osechikojolweny kamano, jodolo abiriyo moting’o tunge abiriyo e nyim RuothNyasaye nochako wuoth ka goyo tung’, kendo Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasayene luwo bang’gi.  9Jolwenygo notelo e nyim jodolo mane goyo tung’, tomoko ne luwo bang’ Sanduk, kendo e kindeno duto tung’ ne ywak.  10ToJoshua nokwero ji ni kik gikogi, kendo kik gilos nyaka chop chieng’ maenogol chik, eka ginikog matek. 11Kane Joshua osegolo chik kamano, ne gilworo dala dichiel gi Sanduk marRuoth Nyasaye.  Eka bang’e ne gidok e kambi mi ginindo kanyo.  12Joshuanochiew gokinyi mang’ich, kendo jodolo noting’o Sanduk mar RuothNyasaye.  13Jodolo abiriyo moting’o tunge abiriyo notelo e nyim Sandukmar Ruoth Nyasaye ka goyo tung’.  Jolweny moko notelonigi, to moko neluwo Sanduk, kendo e kindego duto tung’ ne ywak.  14Kamano ne gilworodala dichiel chieng’ mar ariyo eka gidok e kambi.  Ne gitimo kamano kuomndalo auchiel. 15To chieng’ mar abiriyo, ne gichiew ka ugue wang’, mi gilworo daladibiryo.  Chieng’no kende ema ne gilworoe dalani dibiriyo.  16E sa manegilworee mar abiriyo jodolo ne goyo tung’.  Eka Joshua nowacho ni jolwenyniya, "Koro gueuru, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyou dalani.  17To jomaodakie kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye noketh chuth, kendo dhano oknomulgi, to ginibed gik mochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Rahab gi ji duto manieode kende ema nowe ka ngima, nikech en ema nopando jombetre mane waoro. 18To un, beduru motang’ kendo kik ugomb gik mokwer! Kik ukaw kata achielkuomgi, nikech kutimoo kamano to masira momako jodalano nomak kambijo-Israel, kendo nokelnigi chandruok.  19To fedha gi dhahabu duto kod gikmoko molos gi mula kod molos gi nyinyo ema nobed gik mochiw ni RuothNyasaye, kendo nyaka tergi e kar keno mare. "
Jodolo nogoyo tung’, kendo kane jolweny owinjo, ne gigueyo gi duolmaduong’, mi ohinga mar dala nopodho.  Eka jolweny duto nodonjo e dala,ka ng’ato ka ng’ato ochomo nyime tir, mi gikawe.  21Ne giketho gik mokoduto e dalano, bende ne ginego ng’ato ang’ata ma dichwo kata ma dhako,ma rawera kata moti, kod dhok gi romb kod kenje. 22Joshua nowacho ni jombetre ariyo kande mondo odhi e od Rahab okelekaachiel gi joode, kaka ne gisesingore ni ginitim.  23Omiyo yawuowigonodhi, mogolo Rahab gi wuon kod min, gi owetene kod ji duto mane nikode.  Ne gikelogi duto, mi giweyogi e kambi mar jo-Israel gi yo ka oko. 24Eka ne giwang’o dala gi gik moko duto manie iye, mak mana fedha gidhahabu kod gik molos gi mula kod molos gi nyinyo ema ne gikawo, migikano kar keno mar od Ruoth Nyasaye.  25Kamano Joshua noreso ngima Rahabgi joode kod ji duto mane nii kode, nikech nosepando jombetre ma noormondo ocheng Jeriko.  Nyikwa Rahab pod odak gi jo-Israel nyaka chilkawuono.
Chieng’no Joshua nokwero ji gi kuong’ niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye mondo okumng’at ma notem gero Jeriko kendo! Koketo mise mare, to wuode makayonotho, kendo kochungo dharangaye, to wuode ma chogo notho. "27Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ne ni kod Joshua, mi humbe nolak e pinyno duto. Joshua 7Richo mar Akan1To jo-Israel ne ok orito chik mane Nyasaye ogolo ni mondo oketh gikmoko duto.  Akan wuod Karmi ma wuod Zabdi ma wuod Zera ma ja-Juda nokawogik mokwer mi Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho gi jo-Israel. 2Kane gin Jeriko, Joshua noseoro jomoko mondo odhi Ai, dala manmachiegni gi Bethaven, yo wuokchieng’ mar Bethel, mondo girang kakapinyy chalo.  Mi jogo notimo kamano.  3Kane giduogo Jeriko, ne giwacho niJoshua niya, "Jolweny duto ok onego dhi Ai to or mana ji alufu adek kataariyo kende ema mondo odhi omonje.  Kik imi jolweny duto sandre gi idhomalo kuro, nikech joma odak kuno nok. " 4Kamano ji ma dirom alufu adeknodhi Ai, to jo-Ai noriembogi, 5kendo nonego ji alufu piero adekgauchiel kuomgi.  Jo-Ai nolawogi chakre rangagi nyaka Shebarim, monegogikama yo ridoree.  Gikanyono chir mane jo-Israel nigo nolalnigi ka yamo. 6Joshua gi jodong Israel noyiecho lepgi, kendo noolo buru e wigi.  Negiriere piny auma e nyim Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mi giriyo kanyo nyakaodhiambo.  7Joshua nowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, ere gimomiyo isekelojogi loka Jordan mana ni mondo ichiwgi e lwet jo-Amor, kendo itiekgi?Mad ne wasik loka cha! 8A Ruoth Nyasaye ang’o ma dawachi ka koro wasiguoseriembo jo-Israel? 9Kapo ni jo-Kanaan kod jopinyno duto owinjo wachni,to gibiro nur kuomwa, kendo yweyowa ka yuech.  To koro ang’o ma nitimmondo ires nyingi maduong’ni?"10Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko Joshua niya, "A malo! Ang’o momiyo inindo aumakamano? 11Jo-Israel oseketho! Ok giserito chik mane amiyogi, togisekwalo gik mokwer, kendo giriwogi gi mekgi.  12Mano emomiyo ok ginyalsiro wasikgi, to giringo nimar gin bende koro okwedgi.  Ka ok giwang’ogimoro amora mokwer ma gisekawo, to ok anabed kodgi.
"A malo! Luong ji duto, kendo chikgi mondo gipwodhre ka giikore nigima kiny notimre.  Nyisgi ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel owacho nigisekawo gik mokwer, omiyo ka pok gigolo gigo kuomgi, to ok ginyal sirowasikgi.  14Kiny gokinyi giniwuog oko libamba ka libamba, kendo libambama Ruoth Nyasaye okwanyo nowuog oko dhoot ka dhoot.  To dhoot ma RuothNyasaye okwanyo nowuog oko anywola ka anywola.  15Eka anywola ma RuothNyasaye okwanyo nowuog oko ng’ato ka ng’ato.  To ng’at ma ombulu nonyisni nokawo gik mokwer, nowang’ gi joge kaachiel gi mwandune duto, nikechosetimo gima nono, kendo oseketho chik mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo jogeIsrael. "16Joshua nochiew gokinyi mang’ich, moluongo jo-Israel oko libamba kalibamba, to libamba mar jo-Juda ema nokwany.  17To noluongo dhout Juda,joka Zera ema nokwany.  Kuom joka Zera, anywola mar Zabdi ema nokwany. 18Kane ogolo ng’ato ka ng’ato kuom joka Zabdi, to Akan wuod Karmi, mawuod Zabdi, ma wuod Zera, ema nokwany.  19Eka Joshua nowacho ni Akanniya, "Wuoda, mi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel duong’, kendo hulnerichoni.  Nyisa gima isetimo, ma ok ipanda kata achiel. " 20Akan nodwokeniya, "Adier aseketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, 21nikechkane aneno law maber molos Shinar, gi fedha ma pekne oromo kilo ariyo,kod dhahabu ma pekne oromo nus kilo kuom mwandu Jeriko, gombo nomaka,makawogi.  Nakunyogi e hemba ka fedha ema akuongo keto e bur. " 22Joshuanooro joote, modhi e hema piyopiyo.  Ne giyudo gigo koyiki e lowo manakaka Akan nowacho.  23Ne gigologi, kendo gikelogi ir Joshua kod jo-Israelduto, mi giyarogi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  24Eka Joshua kod jo-Israel dutonokawo Akan nyakwar Zera, kaachiel gi fedha kod law kod dhahabu, giyawuote gi nyige gi dhoge gi kenjene gi rombene gi hembe kod mwanduneduto, moterogi e holo mar Akor.  25Joshua nowacho ni Akan niya,"Isekelonwa masira marach! Koro in bende Ruoth Nyasaye biro kelonimasira!" Eka jo-Israel duto nogoyo Akan kod joge gi kite nyaka githo, migiwang’ogi kaachiel gi mwandune.  26Ne gidhuro kuome kite mogundho, mapod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.  Mano emomiyo pod iluongo kanyo ni Holomar Akor, (tiende ni, holo mar masira).  Eka bang’e mirimb Ruoth Nyasayenorumo. Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, 21nikech kane aneno law maber molos Shinar,gi fedha ma pekne oromo kilo ariyo, kod dhahabu ma pekne oromo nus kilokuom mwandu Jeriko, gombo nomaka, makawogi.  Nakunyogi e hemba ka fedhaema akuongo keto e bur. " 22Joshua nooro joote, modhi e hema piyopiyo.  Negiyudo gigo koyiki e lowo mana kaka Akan nowacho.  23Ne gigologi, kendogikelogi ir Joshua kod jo-Israel duto, mi giyarogi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. 24Eka Joshua kod jo-Israel duto nokawo Akan nyakwar Zera, kaachiel gifedha kod law kod dhahabu, gi yawuote gi nyige gi dhoge gi kenjene girombene gi hembe kod mwandune duto, moterogi e holo mar Akor.  25Joshuanowacho ni Akan niya, "Isekelonwa masira marach! Koro in bende RuothNyasaye biro keloni masira!" Eka jo-Israel duto nogoyo Akan kod joge gikite nyaka githo, mi giwang’ogi kaachiel gi mwandune.  26Ne gidhuro kuomekite mogundho, ma pod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.  Mano emomiyo podiluongo kanyo ni Holo mar Akor, (tiende ni, holo mar masira).  Eka bang’emirimb Ruoth Nyasaye norumo. Joshua 8Jo-Israel okawo Ai moketho1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Kik iluor, kendo kik chunyinyosre.  Kaw jolweny duto, kendo dhi imonj Ai.  Anachiw ruodh Ai gi dalanegi joge kod pinye e lweti, 2kendo unutim ni Ai kod ruodhe mana kakanutimo ni Jeriko kod ruodhe.  To wang’ni unyalo kawo dhok kod gik mokomuyudo kuno.  Koro or jolweny moko mondo odhi opond yo podho chieng’ mardalano. " 3Omiyo Joshua kod jolweny duto noikore mondo omonj Ai.  Noyierojolweny alufu piero adek, moorogi gotieno, kowachonigi niya,
"Ponduruyo podho chieng’ mar dalano, kubet machiegni kode, kendo kuikore.  5An toanamonje gi jolweny modong’, to ka jogo nowuog mondo orad kodwa kaka negitimo chieng’ mokwongo, to wanaring e nyimgi.  6Kuom mano ginipar niwaringogi kaka ne watimo mokwongo, mi ginilawwa nyaka chop waseywayogimabor gi dalagi.  7Kwaringo kamano, eka uwuogi kama upondoe, kendo ukawdalagino, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro chiwe e lwetu, 8kendoosechiko ni kusekawe to uwang’e.  Koro timuru kamano. " 9Eka Joshuanoorogi yo podho chieng’ mar Ai, mondo gipond e kind dalano kod Bethel. Joshua nonindo kanyachiel gi jolweny, 10to gokinyi mang’ich nochiew,mochokogi, kendo ne gidhi Ai, kotelo gi jodong Israel, 11nyaka negichopo machiegni gi dalano.  Ne gijot yo nyandwat mar Ai, to holo ne nie kindgi gi dalano.  12To Joshua noseoro ji maromo alufu abich yo podhochieng mar Ai mondo opond e kind dalano kod Bethel.  13Kamano thothjolweny nojot yo nyandwat mar Ai, to joma nopondo ne ni yo podhochieng’.  Joshua to nonindo e holo. 14Kane ruodh Ai oneno ni jo-Israel nowuok mapiyo gi joge duto mondo okedkodgi.  Ne ok ong’eyo ni jolweny moko osepondone yo podho chieng’ mardala.  15Joshua kod jo-Israel nowuondore ni ologi, mi giringo ka gichomothim.  16Eka noluong jo-Ai duto mane ni e dala mondo olawgi.  To kanegilawo Joshua kamano, ne gichwalora mabor gi dalagi.  17Onge ng’ato kataachiel ma nodong’ e Ai, nikech ne gisewuok giduto mondo gilaw jo-Israel. Kuom mano ne giweyo dala nono. 18Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Siem yo Ai gi tong’i, nimarabiro chiwe e lweti. " Mi Joshua notimo kamano.  19Kane jo-Israel mopondooneno ranyisi ma Joshua otimono, ne giwuok.  Ne giringo piyopiyo, migidonjo e dala, kendo kane gisekawe, ne giwang’e gi kanyono. 20Kane jo-Ai ogoyo machiemo, ne gineno iro kadum e dala kochomo polo. Onge kuma ne ginyalo tonyie, nikech jo-Israel ma noyudo wuondore niringo kochomo thim, nolokore gi joma ne lawogi.  21Joshua gi jo-Israelduto nolokore gi jo-Ai nikech ne gineno ka joma nopondo koro osekawodala, mi owang’o.  22Jo-Ai mane owuok mondo orad gi jo-Israel koro noketdiere, mi jo-Israel nonegogi duto, maonge modong’ kata motony, 23makmana ruodh Ai ema ne gimako kangima, mi gitero ir Joshua.  24Kanejo-Israel osenego jo-Ai duto mane ni e pap, kod mane ni e thim kuma negiselawogie, ne gidok Ai, mi ginego ji duto ma nodong’ kuno.  25Chieng’nononeg jo-Ai duto, ma onge ng’ama dichwo kata madhako ma nodong’.  Negiromo ji alufu apar gariyo. 26Joshua ne ok oweyo siemo Ai gi tong’ nyaka noneg ji duto ma nodakkuno.  27Jo-Israel nokawo mana dhok gi mwandu mane giyudo, kaluwore giwach mane Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni Joshua.  28Kamano Joshua nowang’o Aichuth, moweye kokethore, ma onge ji modakie nyaka chil kawuono. 29Noliero ruodh Ai e yath, moweye kanyo nyaka odhiambo.  To ka chieng’podho, nogolo chik mondo ong’ade oko e yath.  Ne giwito ringre e dhorangadala, mi gidhuro kuome kite mogundho, ma pod ni kanyo nyaka chilkawuono. Joshua ondiko chik Musa ka jo-Israel nie got Ebal(Rapar mar Chik
.
-
)
Joshua nogero kendo-mar-misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel egot Ebal.  31Nogere gi kite ma ok opa gi gir nyinyo, kaluwore gi chikmane Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo jo-Israel, kaka ondik e kitap Chikmar Musa.  Ne gitimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni miwang’o pep kod mag sawoe kendono.  32Joshua nondiko chik Musa e kitego e nyim jo-Israel.  33Mijo-Israel duto gi joma nobiro kodgi, kaachiel gi jodongo gi jotelo kodjong’ad bura, nochung’ e dir Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye koni gi koni,ka gimanyore gi jo-Lawi ma jodolo ma noting’e.  Jo-Israel moko nochung’kochomo got Gerazim, to modong’ nochomo got Ebal, mondo oguedhgi kakaMusa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye nosechiko chon.  34Eka Joshua nosomo weche dutomag gueth kod mag kuong’ mana kaka ondik e Kitap Chik.  35Ne ok oweyokata wach achiel kuom weche mane Musa osechiko, to nosomogi duto gi dwolmaduong’ ni jo-Israel duto, machwo gi mamon gi joma tindo, kod jomanobiro kodgi. Joshua 9Jo-Gibeon owuondo jo-Israel1Ruodhi duto ma nodak yo podho chieng’ mar Jordan nowinjo humb wechego. Ne gin ruodhi mag jo-Hiti, gi mag jo-Amor, gi mag jo-Kanaan, gi magjo-Perizi, gi mag jo-Hivi, kod mag jo-Jebus, mane gin ogendini modak egode, gi pewe kod e dho Nam Mediterenia nyaka Lebanon yo nyandwat.  2Kanegiwinjo wechego, ne giriwore giduto, mondo giked gi Joshua kodjo-Israel. 3To kane jo-Gibeon owinjo gima Joshua osetimo Jeriko gi Ai, ne giparomondo giwuonde.  4Ne gikawo gunde moti moting’o chiemo motwo kendo mopur,mi giketo e ng’e kenjegi, kaachiel gi ndede mobaw obaw mag divai.  5Negirwako wuoch moyiech, kod nengni moti, 6eka ne gibiro ir Joshua e kambiGilgal, mi giwachone kod jo-Israel niya, "Waa e piny mabor ahinya, omiyoyie watim kodu winjruok mar kue. " 7To jo-Israel nodwoko jo-Hivigo niya,"Ang’o ma dimi watim kodu winjruok mar kue? Kamoro udak mana machiegnikodwa. " 8Jo-Hivi to nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Wayie bedo e bwo lochni. "Eka Joshua nopenjogi nyinggi, kendo kuma giaye.  9Ne gidwoke niya,"Ruoth, waa e piny mabor ahinya nikech humb Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu. Wasewinjo gik ma notimore e Misri, 10kendo gima notimo ni ruodhi ariyomag jo-Amor man yo wuok chieng’ mar Jordan, ma gin Sihon ruodh Heshbonkod Og ruodh Bashan ma nodak Ashtaroth.  11Omiyo jodongwa duto nochikowamondo wakaw chiemo ma dirom wuoth, kendo wabi iru mondo wanyisu ni wayiebedo e bwo lochu.  Kuom mano, yie watim kodu winjruok mar kue.  12Neurumakati mwating’ogi.  Kane wachako wuoth kwabiro ka, ne pod giliet, tokoro gisetwo kendo gipur.  13Neuru ndedewagi! Kane waoloe divai, neginyien, to koro giseyiech.  Wuochewa gi lepwa bende oseti nikech wuothmabor. " 14Jotelo moko mag jo-Israel nobilo chiemb jogo, mak gipenjoRuoth Nyasaye wach.  15Omiyo Joshua norwako jootego, motimo kodgiwinjruok mar kue, kokuong’orenigi ni ok noneggi, kendo jodong Israelbende okuong’orenigi kamano. 16Chieng’ mar adek bang’ timo kodgi winjruokno, wach nofwenyore ni karagin manaa jogweng’ modak machiegni.  17Mano omiyo jo-Israel nochakowuoth, kendo bang’ ndalo adek ne gichopo e mier mane jogo odakie.  Miegone gin Gibeon gi Kefira gi Beeroth kod Kiriath-jearim.  18Jo-Israel ne okonegogi, nikech singruok mane jodong Israel otimo kodgi e nying RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, to kata kamano ji duto nong’ur gi jodonggi. 19To jodongo duto nodwokogi niya "Ng’euru ni ne wachamo kodgi muma enying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, omiyo koro ok wanyal mulogi. 20Wabiro weyogi mak wanegogi, mondo muma mane wachamo kodgi kik dognwa,21to wabiro ketogi joma baronwa yien kendo ma umbonwa pi. " Kamanojo-Israel duto noyie gi wach mane jodonggi onyisogi. 22Joshua noluongo jo-Gibeon, mopenjogi niya, "Ere gimomiyo ne uwuondowakamano? Nunyisowa ni ua e piny mabor ahinya, to kara un mana jogweng’!23Koro unubed joma okwedi nikech wachni, kendo e kinde duto unubedwasumbwa ma baro yien kendo ma umbo pi mitiyogo e Od Nyasachwa. " 24Negidwoke niya, "Ruoth, ne watimo kamano nikech nonyiswa ni Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachi nochiko Musa jatichne ni mondo ochiwnu pinyni duto, kendo nimondo uneg ji duto modakie.  Kuom mano, birou osemiyo kihondko omakowa. 25Koro wan e lweti, omiyo timnwa gima ineno ni ber. " 26Kamano Joshuanoresogi e lwet jo-Israel, mi ne ok ginegogi.  27To chakre kanyononoketogi jobar yien kod joumb pi ni jo-Israel, kendo ni tichkendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  Pod gitiyo kamano nyaka chilkawuono kamoro amora ma Ruoth Nyasaye oyiero. 16Ruodhi abichgo noringo mopondo e rogo man Makeda, 17to noyudgi, monyisJoshua ni gipondo kanyo.  18Eka Joshua nowacho niya, "Ng’ieluru kitemadongo olorgo dho rogono, kendo uket ji orite.  19To kik udek kuno, tomeduru mana lawo wasiku, kendo kik uwe gichop e miechgi mak unegogi,nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osechiwogi e lwetu. " 20Joshua kodjo-Israel nonego jo-Amor motieko, mak mana ji manok ma nodonjo e miermochiel gi ohinga ema notony.  21Eka jolweny duto nodwogo ir JoshuaMakeda kangima.  Onge ng’ama notemo timo gimoro marach ni jo-Israel. 22Koro Joshua nowacho ni mondo oel dho rogo, kendo okelne ruodhiabichgo.  23Mi ne gitimo kamano.  Ne gin ruodhi mag Jerusalem gi Hebron giJarmuth gi Lakish kod Eglon.  24Kane gisekelogi ire, Joshua noluongojo-Israel duto, mowacho ni jotend jolweny ma nodhi kode niya, "Suduruka, mondo unyon ng’ut ruodhigi. " Mi ne gitimo kamano.  25Eka Joshuanowacho ni jotelogo niya, "Kik uluor kata kik chunyu nyosre.  Beduru gichir kendo gi jing’o, nimar mano e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye notim ni wasiguduto mubiro kedogo. " 26Bang’e Joshua nonego ruodhigo, kendo nolierogi eyien abich, mi ne giriyoe nyaka odhiambo.  27Kane chieng’ podho, Joshuanogolo chik, mi ong’adgi oko, kendo nowitgi e rogo mane gisepondoeno. Eka nolor dho rogo gi kite madongo, ma pod ni kanyo nyaka chil kawuono. 28Chieng’no, Joshua nokawo Makeda, monego ruodhe gi joge.  Notiekogiduto, kaachiel gi gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno.  Ne ok oweyo ng’atoka ngima kata achiel, kendo notimo ni ruodh Makeda mana kaka nosetimo niruodh Jeriko. 29Bang’ mano Joshua gi jo-Israel duto noa Makeda modhi Libna.  Ne gimonjodalano, 30mi Ruoth Nyasaye nochiwe gi ruodhe e lwetgi, kendo ne ginegojoma odakie duto, kod gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno.  Ne ok giweyokata ng’at achiel kangima, kendo ne gitimo ni ruodh dalano mana kaka negitimo ni ruodh Jeriko. 31Kane Joshua kod jo-Israel duto oa kanyo, ne gidhi mi gilworo Lakish. Ne gimonje, 32kendo Ruoth Nyasaye nochiwe e lwetgi.  Ne gikawe bang’ndalo ariyo, mi ne ginego gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno, kaka negisetimo Libna.  33E kindeno, Horam ruodh Gezer nobiro mondo ores Lakish,to Joshua nonege kaachiel gi joge, ma onge ng’ama otony. 34Joshua kod jo-Israel duto noa Lakish modhi Eglon.  Ne gilwore kendogimonje, 35mi gikawe mana odiechieng’no.  Ne ginego ji duto modakie, kodgimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno, mana kaka ne gitimo Lakish. 36Kane gia Eglon, Joshua kod jo-Israel duto nodhi momonjo Hebron.  37Negikawe, mi ginego ruodhe kod gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno, kaachielgi mago mane nie mier matindo mokiewo kode.  Joshua noketho dalano chuth,ma ok oweyo kata ng’at achiel kangima, mana ne gitimo Eglon. 38Bang’e Joshua gi jo-Israel duto nowichore mochomo Debir, mi gimonje. 39Ne gikawe kaachiel gi ruodhe kod mier matindo mokiewo kode, mi neginego ji duto kod gimoro amora mangima mane ni kuno.  Ne ok giweyong’ato otony kata achiel.  Ne gitimo ni Debir gi ruodhe mana kaka negitimo ni Hebron kod Libna gi ruodhi maggi. 40Kamano Joshua nokawo pinyno duto.  Noloyo ruodhi mag piny gode, kod magpiny milambo, gi mag pewe, kod mag kuonde motimo thidhiya.  Nonego jiduto, ma ok oweyo ng’ato otony kata achiel, kotieko gimoro amora mayueyo, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel nosechiko.  41Nonegojopinjego duto, chakre Kadesh-barnea nyaka Gaza, kokwako piny duto marjo-Goshen nyaka Gibeon.  42Joshua nomako ruodhigo duto, kaachiel gipinjegi e lweny achielno, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel nokedoni joge.  43Bang’e Joshua gi jo-Israel duto nodok e kambi Gilgal. Joshua 11Jo-Israel oloyo Jabin gi joma ne oriwore kode1Kane Jabin ruodh Hazor owinjo wechego duto, nooro wach ni Jobab ruodhMadon kod ruodhi mag Shimron gi Akshaf, 2kod ruodhi mae piny gode ma yonyandwat, gi holo mar aora Jordan man yo milambo mar Kinereth, kod maepewe, gi mae piny Dor yo podho chieng’.  3Nooro wach bende ni jo-Kanaanma yo wuokchieng’ gi ma yo podho chieng’, kendo ni jo-Amor gi jo-Hiti gijo-Perizi gi jo-Jebus ma nodak e piny gode, kod jo-Hivi ma nodak e tiendgot Hermon e piny Mizpa.  4Giduto ne giwuok gi jolwenjgi duto.  Neging’eny ka kuoyo mae dhonam, kendo ne gin gi geche lweny mogundho. 5Ruodhigo duto noriwo paro achiel, mi ne gibiro, kendo gijot e dhokuonde motimo thidhiya mag Merom mondo gimonj jo-Israel. 6Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Kik iluorgi, nimar kiny samakama nachiwgi e lwet jo-Israel, kendo giduto ginitho, mi ning’ad odondfaresegi kendo niwang’ gechegi. " 7Kamano Joshua kod jolwenje nopoyogi edho kuonde motimo thidhiya mag Merom, mi gimwomore kuomgi.  8RuothNyasaye nochiwogi e lwet jo-Israel, mi jo-Israel noloyogi, kendonolawogi yo nyandwat nyaka Sidon Maduong’, kendo yo podho chieng’ nyakaMisrefoth, kendo yo wuok chieng’ nyaka holo mar Mizpa.  Ne ginegogi, maonge kata ng’at achiel ma nodong’ ka ngima.  9Joshua nong’ado odondfaresegi, kendo nowang’o gechegi, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko. 10Eka Joshua nowichore ni Hazor, dala ma noyudo otelo ni pinjego. Jo-Israel nokawe, monego ruodhe.  11Ne ginego gimoro amora mangima maneni kuno, ma onge gima yueyo manodong’, kendo ne giwang’o dalano. 12Kamano Joshua nomako ruodhigo monego, kendo noketho miechgi.  Nonego jiduto ma nodak e miego, kendo noketho gik moko duto, kaka Musa jatichRuoth Nyasaye nosechiko.  13To jo-Israel ne ok owang’o mier mane oger ewipidhe, mak mana Hazor kende ema ne Joshua owang’o.  14Ne gipeyo dhok, migiyako gimoro amora mane giyudo e miego, kendo ne ginego ji duto, ma okgiweyo kata ng’at achiel ka yueyo.  15Ruoth Nyasaye noketo chikene e lwetMusa jatichne, to Musa nomiyogi Joshua, mi Joshua nochopo duto, ma okoweyo kata chik achiel mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa. Joshua okawo piny Kanaan duto16Joshua nokawo piny gode gi piny milambo duto gi piny Goshen duto,kaachiel kod pewe gi holo mar aora Jordan kod piny gode mag Israel gipewe mokiewo kode.  17Lochne nochakore got Halak man but Seir, nyakaBaal-gad e holo mar Lebanon manie tiend got Hermon.  18Nokedo gi pinjegokuom ndalo mang’eny, nyaka nomako ruodhi maggi duto, monego.  19Miegoduto nokaw gi thwon, ma onge mane otimo winjruok gi jo-Israel mak manaGibeon mane jo-Hivi odakie.  20Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyogi chir mar kedo gijo-Israel mondo jo-Israel oneggi maonge ng’wono, kendo otiekgi chuth,mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosechiko Musa. 21E ndalogo ema ne Joshua odhiye piny gode, motieko jo-Anak mane odakHebron gi Debir gi Anab kendo e piny gode duto mag Juda kod mag Israel. Notiekogi duto, kendo noketho miechgi.  22Onge jo-Anak ma nodong’ kataachiel e piny mane jo-Israel okawo, mak mana mago ma nodak Gaza gi Gathkod Ashdod.  23Kamano Joshua nokawo pinyno duto, kochopo chike duto maneRuoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa.  Joshua nomiyo jo-Israel pinyno, kopogo nidhoot ka dhoot lembe, mi piny nokue. Joshua 12Ruodhi mane Musa oloyo1 Jo-Israel nosekawo piny duto man yo wuokchieng’ mar aora Jordan,chakre aora Arnon, koluwo aora Jordan nyaka got Hermon, kendo ne ginegoruodhi mag pinyno.  2Ne ginego Sihon, ruodh jo-Amor ma nodak Heshbon. Pinye nochakore Aroer man but holo mar Arnon, koluwo holono.  Piny Gileadkonchiel nyaka aora Jabok motimo tong’ Amon bende 3ne nie pinye kaachielgi piny man yo wuok chieng’ mar aora Jordan, chakre Nam Galili nyaka NamAraba, miluongo ni Nam Kado, koluwo yor Beth-jeshimoth, kochomo yomilambo nyaka got Pisga.  4Bende ne ginego Og ruodh Bashan, ma nodakAshtaroth gi Edrei.  Ne en achiel kuom jo-Refaim manok ma nodong’.  5GotHermon gi Saleka kod Bashan duto mochopo e mbap Geshur gi Maakath kodGilead komachielo nyaka mbap Sihon ruodh Heshbon ne nie pinye.  6Musajatich Nyasaye kod jo-Israel nonegogi duto, mokawo pinygi.  Nomiyojo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel pinyno mondo obed margi. Ruodhi mane Joshua oloyo7Joshua kod jo-Israel nonego ruodhi modak e piny man yo podho chieng’mar aora Jordan, chakre Baal-gad e holo mar Lebanon, nyaka got Halak manbut Seir.  Joshua nokawo pinygi mopogo ni dhout Israel mondo obed margi. 8Ne en piny gode gi pewe gi holo mar aora Jordan gi kuonde motimothidhiya gi piny milambo.  Kuondego ema jo-Hiti gi jo-Amor gi jo-Kanaangi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus odakie.  9Ne ginego ruodhi magJeriko gi Ai man but Bethel, 10gi Jerusalem gi Hebron 11gi Jarmuth giLakish 12gi Eglon gi Gesher 13gi Debir gi Geder 14gi Horma gi Arad 15giLibna gi Adulam 16gi Makeda gi Bethel 17gi Tapia gi Hefer 18gi Afek giSharon 19gi Madon gi Hazor 20gi Shimron-meron gi Akshaf 21gi Taanak giMegido 22gi Kedesh gi Jokneam-karmel 23gi Dor e piny Dor gi Gaim-galili24kod Tirza.  Giduto ne gin ruodhi piero adek gachiel. Joshua 13Bath piny Kanaan ma pod onego kaw1Joshua koro noseti, kendo hike oniang’, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nowachoneniya, "Isedoko jaduong’ moti to piny malach pod odong’ monego kaw.  2Magie pinje ma pod odong’: Piny jo-Filistia kod piny jo-Geshur duto. "
(Pinyno duto chakre Shihor yo wuok chieng’ mar Misri, nyaka Ekron yonyandwat, ikwano ka piny Kanaan.  To ruodhi mag jo-Filistia ma nodak Gazagi Ashdod gi Ashkelon gi Gath kod Ekron ema ne weg pinyno. ) "Pinyjo-Avim duto 4yo milambo, gi piny jo-Kanaan duto, chakre Meara e pinyjo-Sidon nyaka Afek gi mbap jo-Amor, 5kod piny jo-Gebal gi piny Lebanonduto man yo wuok chieng’ mar Baal-gad manie tiend got Hermon nyaka kamaidonjogo Hamath.  6Pinyno oting’o jo-Sidon modak e piny gode, chakreLebanon nyaka Misrefoth-maim.  Anariemb jogo duto mondo oweni jo-Israelthuolo.  To pinyno duto ipog ni jo-Israel mondo obed margi, kakaasechiki.  7Koro pog pinyni ni dhoudi ochiko kande, kaachiel gi jo-Manasekonchiel. "Piny mopog ni jo Manase konchiel gi jo Reuben kod jo Gad8 Jo-Manase komachielo, kaachiel gi jo-Reuben kod jo-Gad, noseyudo pinjemane Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye omiyogi yo wuok chieng’ mar Jordan. Nopogonigi pinyno 9chakre Aroer man but holo mar aora Arnon gi pinymopie man e bath holo konchiel kendo noting’o piny pap duto chakreMedeba nyaka Dibon, 10kod mier duto mag Sihon ruodh jo-Amor ma nodakHeshbon, nyaka mbap jo-Amon.  11Noting’o bende piny Gilead kod pinyjo-Geshur gi jo-Maakath kod got Hermon duto gi piny Bashan duto nyakaSaleka.  12Piny Bashan noting’o piny Og duto, mane Og orito kodakAshtaroth gi Edrei.  E ndalo mane Musa onegoe jo-Refaim manok ma nodong’,mokawo pinygi, Og kende ema notony.  13To jo-Israel ne ok oriembojo-Geshur gi jo-Maakath, omiyo pod gidak gi jo-Israel nyaka chilkawuono.  14Jo-Lawi kende ema ne ok oyudo piny, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel ema nobedo ka mwandugi, kaka nosesingorenigi. 15Musa nosepogo piny gi dhout jo-Reuben.  16Pinygi nochakore Aroer manbut holo mar aora Arnon, kod piny mopie manie bath holo konchiel, kendonoting’o piny pap duto nyaka Medeba, 17gi Heshbon kaachiel gi miermokiewo kode duto, kod Dibon gi Beth-baal-meon 18gi Jahaz gi Kedemoth giMafaath 19gi Kiriathaim gi Sibma kod Zereth-shahar e got manie holo,20gi Beth-peor gi kuonde thidhiya mag got Pisga, gi Beth-jeshimoth 21kodmier moko duto mag piny pap, gi piny duto mane Sihon ruodh jo-Amor manodak Heshbon orito.  Musa nosenego Sihon kaachiel gi Evi gi Rekam gi Zurgi Hur kod Reba mane jodong jo-Midian.  Jodongogo nodak e pinyno, ka gine bwo loch Sihon.  22Balaam wuod Beor, mane jakor wach, ne en achiel kuomjoma jo-Israel nonego.  23Aora Jordan ema nobedo mbap jo-Reuben.  Pinynokaachiel gi mieche kod mier matindo mokiewo kodgi nobedo mwandu dhoutjo-Reuben. 24Bende Musa nopogo piny ni dhout jo-Gad.  25Pinygi ne en Jazer gi miechGilead duto kod piny jo-Amon konchiel nyaka Aroer man yo wuok chieng’mar Raba.  26Nochakore Heshbon nyaka Ramoth-mizpe gi Betonim, kendochakre Mahanaim nyaka mbap Lodeba.  27To pinygi mane nie holo mar aoraJordan noting’o Beth-haram gi Beth-nimra gi Sukoth gi Zafan kod bathpiny Sihon ruodh Heshbon modong’.  Pinygino ne ni yo wuokchieng’ mar aoraJordan kendo Jordan nyaka Nam Galili nodoko mbape.  28Pinyno kaachiel gimieche, kod mier matindo mokiewo kodgi nobedo mwandu dhout jo-Gad. 29Kamano bende Musa nopogo piny ni dhout jo-Manase komachielo cha. 30Pinygi nochakore Mahanaim, mokwako piny Og ruodh Bashan duto kod mierpiero auchiel mag Jair e Bashan.  31Kamano dir Gilead konchiel giAshtaroth kod Edrei, ma gin joka Makir wuod Manase, tiende ni dhout jokaMakir konchiel. 32Mago e pinje mane Musa opogo ni dhoudigo e paw Moab, yo wuok chieng’mar Jordan.  33To ne ok opogo ni jo-Lawi piny, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel nobedo ka mwandugi, kaka nosesingorenigi. Joshua 14Piny Kanaan opog gi ombulu1Koro magi e pok mane jo-Israel oyudo e piny Kanaan kaka Eleazar jadologi Joshua wuod Nun kod jodong dhout Israel nopogonigi.  2Pinyno nopog giombulu, ni dhoudi ochiko gi nus kande kaluwore gi chik mane RuothNyasaye omiyo Musa.  3Musa nosepogo ni dhoudi ariyo gi nus kande pinygiloka Jordan, to ne ok opogo ni jo-Lawi piny kaka nopogo ni dhoudimamoko.  4Joka Josef nosepogore dhoudi ariyo, ma Manase gi Efraim. Jo-Lawi ne ok oyudo pok moro e pinyno, mak mana mier mag dak kod legejamni ma nokiewo gi miego.  5Jo-Lawi nopogo piny kaka Ruoth Nyasayenosechiko Musa. Dala mar Hebron omi Kaleb6 Jo-Juda nobiro ir Joshua Gilgal, mi Kaleb wuod Jefune ma ja Keniznowachone niya, "Bende iparo gima ne Ruoth Nyasaye onyiso Musa jatichNyasaye kuomi gi kuoma kane wan Kadesh-barnea? 7Ne an jahigni pieroang’wen kane Musa jatich Nyasaye oora mondo abi anon pinyni, kendo kaneadok, naterone wach ma adieri.  8Jomoko mane wabirogo nonyoso chuny ji,to an ne aluwo dwaro mar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha gi chuny modimbore. 9Chiengno Musa nosingore kawachona niya, ‘Piny ma isenyono gi tiendinobed mari kod yawuoti nyaka chieng’, nimar iseluwo dwaro mar RuothNyasaye ma Nyasacha gi chuny modimbore. ’ 10Koro en higni piero ang’wengabich nyaka ne Ruoth Nyasaye singre ni Musa e wachno e ndalo manejo-Israel pod wuotho e thim.  To Ruoth Nyasaye oserito ngimana kakanosingore mi koro an jahigni piero aboro gabich.  11To pod atek mana kakane atek e kinde mane Musa oora, kendo pod anyalo kedo, kata timo gimoroamora monego atim.  12Omiyo koro miya piny gode mane Ruoth Nyasayeosingorena e kinde cha.  Chieng’ cha donge niwinjo ni jo-Anak odak kuno,kendo ni gin gi mier madongo kendo mochiel matek mar siro wasigu? Todipo ka Ruoth Nyasaye okonya, mi ariembogi kaka nosesingorena. "13Joshua noguedho Kaleb, momiye dala mar Hebron, 14kendo pod en marKaleb wuod Jefune ma ja Kenaz, nikech noluwo dwaro mar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel gi chuny modimbore.  15Koro piny nobedo mokue.  E ndalomachon niluongo Hebron ni Kiriath-arba, tiende ni, dala Arba.  Arbano nejaduong’ jo-Anak. Joshua 15Piny mopog ni jo-Juda1Piny ma nopog ni dhout Juda gi ombulu nogik yo milambo e mbap jo-Edomman e thim Zin.  2Mbapgi ma yo milambono nochakore yo milambo mar NamKado, 3koluwo yor Akrabim, mokadho Zin, kochomo yo milambo marKadesh-barnea.  Eka nokadho Ezron nyaka Adar, mogomo kochomo Karka 4nyakaAzmon, kendo noluwo aora manie tong’ piny Misri nyaka Nam Mediterenia. Mano e mbapgi ma yo milambo. 5Nam Kado nyaka dho aora Jordan ema nobedo mbapgi ma yo wuok chieng’.  Tombapgi ma yo nyandwat nochakore e dho aorano, 6modhi nyaka Beth-hogla,kokadho yo nyandwat mar Beth-araba, mochopo nyaka Lwanda Bohan wuodReuben.  7Eka noluwo holo mar Akor nyaka Debir, kochomo yo nyandwat nyakaGilgal, machiegni gi yo maidho Adumin man yo milambo mar aora.  Ekanokadho kuonde thidhiya man En-shemesh, mochopo En-rogel.  8Noluwo holomar Ben-hinom, yo milambo mar; piny gode mane jo-Jebus odakie, ma tindeogerie Jerusalem.  Noidho got momanyore gi holo Hinom yo podho chieng’,ma en giko holo mar Refaim.  9Noluwo wi godno molor nyaka soko marNeftoa, kendo nyaka mier man e got Efron.  Kosekadho miego, nogomokochomo Baala, miluongo bende ni Kiriath-jearim.  10Koa Baala, nochikogot Seir, mokadho yo nyandwat mar got Jearim, miluongo bende ni Kesalon,nyaka Beth-shemesh, mochopo Timna.  11Eka nochomo yo nyandwat nyakaEfron, mogomo kochiko Shikeron.  Bang’ mano nokadho got Baala, kendonodhi Jabneel, mogik e Nam Mediterenia.  12Nam Mediterenia ema notimotong’ pinygi ma yo podho chieng’.  Mano e tong’ ma nolworo dhout Judaduto. Kaleb okawo Hebron gi Debir(Jobura
.
-
)
Nopog ni Kaleb wuod Jefune dir piny jo-Juda, kaka Ruoth Nyasayenosechiko Joshua.  Pok ma noyudono ne en Hebron, dala mar Arba, kwarjo-Anak.  14Kaleb nodaro jo-Anak adek ma nodak kuno, ma nyinggi Sheshaigi Ahiman kod Talmai.  Ne gin nyikwa Anak.  15Bang mano, nodhi momonjojoma nodak Debi, ma chon niluongo ni Kiriath-sefer.  16Eka nowacho niya,"Ng’at ma nokaw Kiriath-sefer ema nami Aksa nyara mondo okendi. "17Othniel wuod Kenaz owadgi Kaleb ema nokawo dalano, omiyo Kaleb nomiyeAksa nyare mokendo.  18Kane Aksa odhi ir chwore, nojiwe mondo okwa wuonmare lowo, mi Aksa nodhi ir Kaleb, kendo kane oselor e kanje, Kalebnopenje gima odwaro.  19Nodwoke niya, "Kaka iseketa e piny milambomotwoni, yie imiya sokni. " Kuom mano Kaleb nomiye sokni mamalo gimamwalo. Miech jo-Juda20Koro magi e mier duto mopog ni dhout Juda, kaachiel gi mier matindo manokiewo kodgi:21Mier man yo milambo e tong’gi gi jo Edon ne gin Kabzeel gi Eder giJagur 22gi Kina gi Dimona gi Arara 23gi Kedesh gi Hazor gi Ithnan 24giZif gi Telem gi Bealoth 25gi Hazor-hadata gi Kerioth-hezron, 26gi Amamgi Shema gi Molada 27gi Hazar-gada gi Heshmon gi Beth-pelet 28giHazar-shual gi Beer-sheba kod mier matindo mokiewo kode, 29gi Baal giIyim gi Ezem 30gi Eltolad gi Kesil gi Horma 31gi Ziklag gi madmana giSansana 32gi Lebaoth gi Shilhim gi Ain kod Rimon.  Giduto ne gin mierpiero ariyo gochiko. 33To mier mane giyudo e pewe ne gin Eshtaol gi Zora gi Ashna 34gi Zanoagi En-gamin gi Tapua gi Enam 35gi Jarmuth gi Adulam gi Soko gi Azeka. 36Gi Shaaraim gi Adithaim gi Gedera kod Gederathaim.  Giduto ne gin mierapar gang’wen. 37Bende jo-Juda noyudo Zenan gi Hadasha gi Migdal-gad 38gi Dilan giMizpe gi Joktheel 39gi Lakish gi Bozkath gi Eglon 40gi Kabon gi Lamas giKithlish 41gi Gederoth gi Beth-dagon gi Naama kod Makeda.  Giduto ne ginmier apar gauchiel. 42Kendo ne giyudo Libna gi Ether gi Ashan 43gi Ifta gi ashna gi Nezib44gi Keila gi Akzib kod Maresha.  Giduto ne gin mier ochiko. 45Ekron bende ne margi 46kod mier duto mokiewo gi Ashdod, chakre Ekronnyaka Nam Mediterenia. 47Ashdod gi Gaza, kod mieche mochopo nyaka aora manie tong’gi gi Misri,kendo nyaka Nam Mediterenia ne maggi bende. 48To mier mane giyudo e piny gode ne gin Shamir, gi Jatir gi Soko 49giDana gi Kiriath-sana, miluongo bende ni Debir, 50Anab gi Eshtemoa giAnim 51gi Goshen gi Holon kod Gilo.  Giduto ne gin mier apar gachiel. 52Kendo ne giyudo Arab gi Duma gi Eshan 53gi Janim gi Beth-tapua gi Afek54gi Humta gi Kiriath-arba, miluongo bende ni Hebron, kod Zior.  Gidutone gin mier ochiko. 55Nomigi bende Maon gi Karmel gi Zif gi Juta 56gi Jezreel gi Jokdeam giZanoa 57gi Kain gi Gibea kod Timna.  Giduto ne gin mier apar. 58To bende ne giyudo Halhul gi Beth-zur gi Gedor 59gi Maarath giBeth-anoth kod Eltekon.  Giduto ne gin mier auchiel.  Ne giyudo bendeTekoa gi Efratha, ma tinde iluongo ni Bethlehem, gi Peor gi Etam giuKulom gi Tatam gi Sores gi Karem gi Galim gi Baither kod Manak.  Gidutone gin mier apar gachiel.  60Kiriath-baal, miluongo ni Kiriath-jearim,kod Raba ne maggi bende.  61To mier mane giyudo e thim ne gin Beth-arabagi midin gi Sekaka 62gi Nibshan gi Ir-melek kod Engedi.  Giduto ne ginmier auchiel.
Jo-Juda ne ok nyal riembo jo-Jebus ma nodak Jerusalem, omiyo podgidak kodgi kuno, nyaka chil kawuono. Joshua 16Piny mopog ni jo-Efraim gi jo-Manase komachielo1Piny mane opog ni joka Josef gi ombulu nochakore e aora Jordan, kamaomanyore gi Jeriko, yo wuok chieng’ mar sokni mag Jeriko man but thim. Tong’gi noa Jeriko, moidho Bethel.  2Koa Bethel, noidho Luz mochopoataroth manie tong’ piny jo-Arki.  3Eka nochomo yo podho chieng, kolornyaka tong’ piny jo-Jaflet, mochopo but Beth-horon mamwalo kod Gezer,mogik e Nam Mediterenia.  4Pinyno ema nopog ni jo-Manase kod jo-Efraim mayawuot Josef. 5To piny dhout jo-Efraim e ma: Mbapgi ma yo wuok chieng’ nochakoreAtaroth-adar, modhi nyaka Beth-horon mamalo.  6Eka nochiko yo-podhochieng’, koweyo Mikmethath yo nyandwat, kendo nokadho yo wuok chieng’mar Taanath-shilo kod Janoa.  7Kosekadho Janoa nolor nyaka Ataroth kodaora Jordan.  8Tong’gi ma yo nyandwat noa Tapua, kochiko yo podho chieng’moluwo aora Kana, nyaka nogik Naaroth, mokadho machiegni gi Jeriko,mogik e nam Mediterenia.  Pinyno ema nopogni dhout jo-Efraim, 9kaachielgi mier moko mane omigi ei piny jo-Manase kod mier matindo mokiewokodgi.  10To jo-Efraim ne ok oriembo jo-Kanaan ma nodak Gezer, mijo-Kanaan-go pod odak e diergi nyaka chil kawuono, to nochun-gi mondogibed wasumbni nyaka chieng. Joshua 171Nopog ni jo-Manase dir piny nikech Manase ne e wuod Josef maduong’. Makir wuon Gilead nomi piny Bashan gi piny Gilead nikech ne en wuodManase maduong’. 2Dhout jo-Manase modong’ ma gin joka Abiezer gi joka Helek gi jokaAsriel gi joka Shekem gi joka Hefer kod joka Shemida, bende nopognigipiny.  Mago ne gin dhout nyikwa Manase wuod Josef. 3Zelofehad wuod Hefer, ma wuod Gilead, ma wuod Makir, ma wuod Manase,nonywolo mana nyiri lilo, ma nyinggi Mala gi Noa gi Hogla gi Milka kodTirza.  4Ne gibiro ir Eleazar jadolo gi Joshua wuod Nun kod jotend Israelmi giwachonigi niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Musa mondo opognwa piny manakaka opog ni jowetewa. " Kuom mano Joshua nopogonigi piny kaka nopog niowete wuon-gi, kaluwore gi chik Ruoth Nyasaye. 5Jo Manase noyudo pok apar, ka ok okwan piny Gilead gi piny Bashan manyo wuok chieng’ mar aora Jordan, 6nikech nopog piny ni nyikwa Manasemanyiri kaachiel gi nyikwaye ma yawuowi.  Piny Gilead nobedo pok marnyikwa Manase modong’. 7Tong’ piny jo-Manase nochakore e piny Asher mochopo nyaka Mikmethathman yo wuok chieng’ mar Shekem.  Eka tong’gi nochomo yo milambo nyakaJashub, kokadho but En-tapua.  8Piny Tapua nobedo mar jo-Manase, to dalaTapua hie, mane nie mbapgi, nobedo mar jo-Efraim.  9Koa kuno, tong’ginoluwo aora Kana, to mier man yo milambo mar aorano ne mag Efraim, kataobedo ni gin e dier miech jo-Manase kamano.  Tong’ Manase noluwo gengaora Kana gi yo nyandwat, mogik e Nam Mediterenia.  10Piny Efraim ne niyo milambo mar aorano, to piny Manase ne ni yo nyandwat, ka NamMediterenia obedo tong’gi giduto.  Jo-Manase nokiewo kod jo-Asher gi yonyandwat, kendo kod jo-Isakar gi yo milambo.  11Bethshean kaachiel gimier mokiewo kode gi joma nodak Ibleam gi Dor manie dhonam, gi En-dor giTaanak kod Megido, kaachiel gi mier matindo ma nokiewo kodgi ne nie bwojo-Manase, kata obedo ni ne gin e pinje mag jo-Isakar gi jo-Asherkamano.  12Jo-Kanaan pod weg pinyno nyaka chil kawuono, nikechh jo-Manasene ok nyal riembogi.  13To kane jo-Israel osebedo motegno, ne gichunojo-Kanaan mondo obed wasumbgi. 14Joka Josef nopenjo Joshua niya, "Ere gima omiyo isemiyowa mana pokachiel kende e pinyni? Wasenya ahinya, nikech Ruoth Nyasayeoseguedhowa. " 15Joshua nodwokogi niya, "Kusenya kamano, kendo uhingopiny gode mag Efraim, to koro dhiuru e bungu manie piny jo-Perizi gijo-Refaim, mondo ubete obed lopu. " 16To joka Josef nowachone niya,"Adier piny godeno ok oromowa, to bende jo-Kanaan modak Beth-sheam gimier mokiewo kode kaachiel gi mago modak e paw Jezreel, nigi geche lwenymag nyinyo!" 17Joshua nowacho ni jo-Efraim gi jo-Manase ma nyikwa Josefniya, "Un ji mang’eny, kendo man gi nyalo.  Ok unubed gi pok achielkende, 18to piny gode bende nobed maru. "Kata otimo bungu kamano, to kaweuru, kendo ubete nyaka uchop e tong’. Adier, jo-Kanaan ni gi geche lweny mag nyinyo, to pod unuriembgiariemba. "Joshua 18Piny modong’ opog gi ombulu Shilo1Ka ne jo-Israel osekawo pinyno, ne gichokore Shilo giduto, mi giguroHemb Romo kuro.  2To dhout Israel abiriyo ne pok okawo lowo, 3omiyoJoshua nowacho ni jo-Israel niya, "Ang’o murito momiyo pok ukawo piny maRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu osemiyou? 4Dhoot ka dhoot mondo omiya jiadek ma anyalo oro mondo odhi onon kaka dipog pinyno duto e migepeabiriyo, ka gindiko kaka migawo ka migawo chalo.  Ka gisetieko, ekagiduog ira 5mondo opog pinyno ni dhoudi abiriyogo.  To jo-Juda to nobedabeda e pinygi man yo milambo, kendo joka Josef bende nobed e pinygi manyo nyandwat.  6Kusepogo piny nyadibiriyo kamano, kendo usendiko kakaochalo, eka ukelna ndiko manyiso migepego, kendo nopognugi gi ombulu enyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  7To jo-Lawi ok noyud lowo kaka uyudo, nimar pokgi enbedo jodolo mag Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo jo-Gad gi jo-Reuben gi jo-Manasekonchiel bende ok nopognigi nikech giseyudo lopgi loka Jordan mane Musajatich Ruoth Nyasaye omiyogi. "8Joma noyiergo nodhi, mowuotho e pinyno duto ka ginono kaka ochalo,nikech Joshua nosechikogi niya, "Dhiuru uwuoth e pinyno duto, kendoundik kaka ochalo; eka uduog ira Shilo ka.  Bang’e napognu piny gi ombulue nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. " 9Kuom mano jogo nodhi monono pinyno duto, kendone gindiko e kitabu kaka ochalo.  Ne gipogo piny nyadibiriyo, ka gichanonying mier duto mane ni kuno.  Bang’e ne giduogo ir Joshua e kambi Shilo,10kendo Joshua nogoyonigi ombulu e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mopogo ni dhootka dhoot lope. Piny mopog ni jo-Benjamin11Ombulu mokwongo nolwar kuom dhout Benjamin, mi giyudo lowo e kindjo-Juda gi joka Josef.  12To malo yo nyandwat tong’gi nochakore e aoraJordan modhi nyaka gode man yo nyandwat mar Jeriko.  Noluwo piny godego,kochomo yo podho chieng’ nyaka e thim machiegni gi Beth-aven.  13Ekanochomo Luz yo milambo nyaka god Luz ma tinde iluongo ni Bethel.  Bang’enodhi nyaka Ataroth-adar e got man yo milambo mar Beth-horon mamwalo. 14Nogomo koa yo podho chieng’ mar godno, mochomo yo milambo mar got manbut Beth-horon, mogik Kiriath-baal, dala jo-Juda, miluongo bende niKiriath-jearim.  Mano e tong’gi ma yo podho chieng’.  15Tong’gi ma yomilambo nochakore Kiriath-jearim, kochomo yo podho chieng’ nyaka sokomar Neftoa.  16Eka nodhi nyaka bath got mochomore gi holo Ben-hinom manyo nyandwat mar holo Refaim.  Noluwo holo Hinon tir kochomo yo milambomar god jo-Jebus nyaka En-rogel.  17Bang’e nogomo kochomo yo nyandwatnyaka Enshemesh, kendo nyaka Geliloth momanyore gi yo maidho Adumin.  Ekanolor nyaka Lwanda Bohan wuod Reuben, 18mokadho yo nyandwat marBeth-araba kendo noridore nyaka holo mar aora Jordan.  19Bang’e nodhi yonyandwat mar got Beth-hogla, mogik yo nyandwat mar Nam Kado e dho aoraJordan gi yo milambo.  Mano ne tong’gi ma yo milambo.  20To tong’gi ma yowuok chieng’ ne en aora Jordan.
