Thuondno niluongo ni Nekushtan, (tiende ni, gimaolos gi mula. ) 5Hezekia nogeno Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, kendoonge ruoth moro machal kode kuom ruodhi duto mag Juda, 6nikech nopadorekuom Ruoth Nyasaye chutho, ka ok oweyo luwe, kendo norito chike dutomane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo Musa.  7Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye ne ni kode,kendo noguedho gik moko duto mane otimo.  Nodagi bet e bwo loch Asuria,8kendo noloyo jo-Filistia e lweny, kokawo mier madongo gi matindo duto,nyaka Gaza gi mier mokiewo kode. Ruodh Asuria okawo Samaria, mi otero jo-Israel e tuech9E higa mar ang’wen mar loch Hezekia, kane Hoshea wuod Ela osebet ruodhIsrael kuom higni abiriyo, Shalmaneser ruodh Asuria nomonjo Samaria. 10Nolworo dalano kuom higni adek, mokawo e higa mar auchiel mar lochHezekia, kane Hoshea wuod Ela osebet ruodh Israel kuom higni ochiko. 11Ruodh Asuria nodaro jo-Israel, motero nyaka Asuria, mi noketo mokokuomgi mondo odag Hela but aora Habor man Gozan, to moko noketo e miechjo-Media.  12Wachno notimore nikech ne ok girito chik Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachgi, to ne giketho singruok mane gitimo kodgi.  Ne ok gimako wecheduto mane Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye ochikogi, kata dewogi bende ne okgidewo. Senakerib, ruodh Asuria, omonjo piny Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)13E higa mar apar gabich mar loch Hezekia, Senakerib ruodh Asurianomonjo miech Juda duto mochiel gi ohinga, mokawo.  14Eka Hezekia ruodhJuda nooro wach ni ruodh Asuria mane oyudo ni Lakish niya, "Aseketho towe kedo koda kendo, nikech ayie chulo gimoro amora midwaro. " Kamanoruodh Asuria nodwaro kuome fedha maromo kilo alufu apar, kod dhahabumoromo kilo alufu achiel.  15Mi Hezekia nomiye fedha duto mane nie OdRuoth Nyasaye, kod mane nie kar keno mar od ruoth.  16E ndalono emaHezekia nogoloe dhahabu mane obawgo thike kod sirni mag dhood RuothNyasaye, momiyo ruodh Asuria. 17Ruodh Asuria nooro Tartan gi Rabsaris kod Rabshake, ma jodonge,kaachiel gi oganda lweny maduong’, ir Hezekia, mi ne giwuok Lakish kagidhi Jerusalem.  Kane gichopo kuno, ne gichung’ but fereji ma golo pi eyawo mamalo, e yo maduong’ madhi e puodho miluongo ni Puoth JalwokLewni.  18Ne giluongo ruoth, to Eliakim wuod Hilkia, mane jaduong’ odruoth, gi Shebna jagoro, kod Joa wuod Asaf, ma jachan weche mag piny,ema ne jowuok irgi.  19Rabshake nowachonigi ni mondo ginyis Hezekia niruoth maduong’, ma ruodh Asuria owachone kama: "Ere gimomiyo idhialorikamano? 20Iparo ni weche awecha nyalo lokore rieko kod teko mar loyolweny? En ng’a ma igeno ni biro konyi piem koda? 21Ang’eyo ni idhialorinikech jo-Misri, to nyaka ing’e ni Farao ruodh Misri chalo gi odundumobarore, ma ka ng’ato oyiengoree, to pilore, kendo chwowo lwete.  Mano ekaka farao ruodh Misri chalo ni ji duto mogeno kuome.  22To kuwachona niugeno kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, donge en ema Hezekia osekethohembkone gi kuonde mitimonee misengni kochiko jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem ninyaka lem mana e nyim kendo-mar-misango man Jerusalem?
"Koro in Hezekia, singri ni ruodh Asuria ma atiyone! Ayie miyi faresealufu ariyo, kapo nono ni inyalo yudo joma diidhgi! 24Ka jo-Misri emaigeno ni biro konyi gi geche kod joidh farese, to ere kaka iparo ni dilokata mana achiel matinie moloyo kuom jotend lweny mag ruodha? 25Kosoiparo ni asebiro mana ni mondo amonj amonja Jerusalem, akethi, ka okRuoth Nyasaye ema ne owachona ni mondo abi amonj pinyni, akethi!"26Eka Eliakim wuod Hilkia gi Shebna kod Joa nowacho ni Rabshake niya,"Wasayi, yie iwuo kodwa gi dho Aram, nikech en dhok mwang’eyo, to wewuoyo kodwa gi dho Hibrania kae, nimar joma ni ewi ohinga nyalowinjowa. " 27To Rabshake ne odwokogi, kapenjogi niya, "Uparo ni un kodruodhu kende ema ne ruodha oora iru mondo awachnu wechegi? Ooyo, noorair joma ni ewi ohinga, ma ochunore ni nyaka cham chiethgi, kendo madhlachgi, mana kaka un bende unutim!"28Bang’ mano Rabshake nochung’ mokok gi duol maduong’ gi dho Hibranianiya, "Winjuru wach ruoth maduong’ ma ruodh Asuria! 29Owacho ni kik uyieHezekia wuondu, nikech ok onyal resou e lweta.  30Kik uwe ohou ni mondougen kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, kowachonu ni, adier Ruoth Nyasaye ema noresu,kendo ni ruodh Asuria ok nokaw dala maduong’ni.  31Kik uwinj wachHezekia, nimar ruodh Asuria owacho niya, ‘Winjreuru koda mondo ubi ira,mi ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nocham olemb mzabipe kod ng’ope, bende nomodhpi e sokone owuon, 32nyaka chop abi, mi agolu kendo ateru e piny machalgi pinyuni, mondo kik utho, to ubed mana mangima.  En piny ma cham gimzabibu chiekie maber, kendo ma makati gi divai gi mor zeituni kod morkich ng’enyie.  To kik uwinj Hezekia kawuondou ni Ruoth Nyasaye birokonyou.  33Bende nitie nyasach piny moro mosereso pinye e lwet ruodhAsuria? 34Nyiseche mag Hamath gi arpad ni kanye? Koso ere nyiseche magSefarvaim gi Hena kod Iva? Bende ne gireso Samaria e lweta? 35Kuomnyiseche duto mag pinjego, ere mosereso Jerusalem e lweta?’ "36To ji noling’ thi, ma onge ng’at modwoke kata wach achiel, nikechruoth Hezekia nosegolo chik ni kik dwoke.  37Eliakim wuod Hilkia majaduong’ od ruoth, gi Shebna jagoro kod Joa wuod Asaf ma jachan wechemag piny ne jobiro ir Hezekia, ka joyiecho lepgi, mi ginyise gima neRabshake owacho.
Ruodhi 19Nyasaye oreso piny Juda e lwet Senakerib(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)1Kane ruoth Hezekia owinjo wechego, noyiecho lepe, mi orwako pien gugru,kendo odhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  2Nooro Eliakim ma jaduong’ ode gi Shebnama jagoro kod jodolo madongo ir janabi Isaya wuod Amoz ka jorwako piendegugru, 3mondo odhi owachne niya, "Hezekia owacho ni kawuono en chieng’dhier gi kum kod wichkuot.  Wachalo gi dhako ma muoch kayo, to onge muyamochologo nyathi.  4Nyalo bet ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi osewinjo wecheRabshake ma ruodh Asuria oseoro mondo oyany Nyasaye Mangima.  Omiyokamoro obiro kumo Rabshake nikech weche ma osewinjo ka Rabshake wachogo. Kuom mano, in Isaya, lem ni jowa mapod odong’. "5Kamano kane jodong ruoth Hezekia ochopo ir Isaya, nowachone wechego,6nodwokogi niya, "Dhiuru uwach ni ruodhu ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama:‘Kik iluor weche ma isewinjo ka ruodh Asuria yanyago, 7nikech abiro miyechuny man gi kibaji, mi, kowinjo wach moro marach, to noring odog epinye, kuma nami onegee. ’ "8Rabshake nodok, moyudo ni ruodh Asuria osea Lakish, odhi monjo Libna. Omiyo nodhi ire kuno.  9To kane ruodh Asuria owinjo Tirhaka ruodhEthiopia obiro monje, nochako ooro joote ir Hezekia ruodh Juda, kowachoniya,
"Kik iyie Nyasachi migeno kuomeno wuondi ni ruodh Asuria oknokaw Jerusalem 11Chutho, isewinjo kaka ruodhi mag Asuria oseketho pinjemane gikedogo chuth.  To koro iparo ni in ema dikwo? 12Kwerena nonegojo-Gozan gi jo-Haran gi jo-Rezef kod jo-Eden ma nodak Telasar.  Koro dakne nyisechegi okonyogi? 13Koso ere ruodhi mag Hamath gi Arpad giSefarvaim gi Hena kod Iva?"14Hezekia nokawo barua mane joote okelone, mi osomo.  Bang’e ne odhi eHekalu, mi oyaro baruano e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kokwaye niya,
"A RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, mobet ewi kerubi kaka ruoth bet e komduong’ne, in kendi e Nyasach ogendini duto mae piny, kendo in emanichueyo polo gi piny.  16A Ruoth Nyasaye, chik iti mondo iwinji, kendoyaw wang’i mondo inen.  Winj weche ma Senakerib yanyigo, in Nyasayemangima! 17A Ruoth Nyasaye, en adier ni ruodhi mag Asuria oseketho pinjeduto, 18mi gibolo nyisechegi e mach, kendo gisekethogi chuth, nimar neok gin nyiseche kata matin, to mana tich dhano molos gi yath kata gikidi.  19To koro in Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, yie ireswa e lwetSenakerib, mondo ogendinii duto mae piny ong’e ni in kendi e Nyasaye. "20Eka Isaya wuod Amoz nooro ni Hezekia wach niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel owacho ni osewinjo lemo mikwayego nikech wach maSenakerib ruodh Asuria osesiemigo, 21omiyo osewuoyo kuom Senakerib kama:"In Senakerib,dala Sayun ochayi kendo jari!Ee, dala Sayun twenyoni ume!22To koro in,en ng’ano ma isejarokendo iyanyo?Koso en ng’a, ma isekokne,kijowo wang’i!Nyaka ing’e nien Ng’ama Ler mar Israel!23Isejaro Ruoth Nyasayekimiyo jooteni wacho niya,‘Aseidho gode maboyo mag Lebanon,mi achopo midimidi,ka an gi gechena mag lweny mang’eny mokadho akwana. Bende asetong’o yiend sida madongo,kod yiend saipras man kuno. Asechopo nyaka e chuny bungu,kuma ni iye mogik,kendo ma yien odichie. 24Asekunyo sokni,mi amodho pi pinje mamoko. Bende aore mag Misri noduono,ka anyonogi gi tienda!’25To in Senakerib,kata obedo ni iwacho kamano,donge ing’eyo ni an Ruoth Nyasaye ema nachano chonmondo gigo otimre?Adier, ne achanogi chon,to koro amiyo gitimore. An ema ne achanomondo imuk mier mochiel motegnoolokre gundni. 26Ma joma odakie chalo gi lum mae pap,maonge gi teko,kata ka lum matwi e tat ot,to ner ka pok odongo,nimar ne gionge gi teko,kendo ne ging’eng’ka luoro omakogi. 27To ang’eyo timbeni duto:ang’eyo kata ka ichung’kata ka ibet piny,kata kiwuokkata kiduogo dala. 28Asewinjo kaka iyanya malich,kendo kaka isungori,omiyo abiro keto mbedo e umi,kod rajaki e dhogi,mondo awichiidog thuru gi yo mane ibirogo.
"To winji, in Hezekia, ranyisi ma amiyi ema: E higa mokwongoni,unucham gik matwi kendgi, kendo e higa mar ariyo unucham orowe moloth ehiga mokwongono, to e higa mar adek unuket kodhi, kendo unuka cham. Bende unupidh mzabibu, kendo unucham olembgi.  30Jo-Juda modong’ nochalgi yath matero tiendene piny, kendo nyago olemo e bedene, 31nimar jomanok modong’ nowuog Jerusalem.  Adier, oganda mar joma otony noa e gotSayun.  Ruoth Nyasaye oseketo chunye mondo otim mano. "32Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye owuoyo kuom ruodh Asuria kama: "Ok nodonj edala Jerusalem, kendo ok nobaye gi asere, kata monjogo koting’o kuot oknomonje.  Bende ok noging pith mondo oidhgo ohingane.  33Enodog gi yo manobirogo, to ok nodonj Jerusalem, 34nimar anaked ni dalani mondo aresi,nikech nyinga, kendo nikech Daudi jatichna. "35Otienono, malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nodhi monego jo-Asuria alufu miaachiel gi piero aboro gabich (
,
) e kambigi, kendo kane ji ochiewgokinyi, to ringre joma otho ema ne ginwang’o kopie piny.  36Mano omiyoSenakerib ruodh Asuria noa kuno, mi odok Nineve odakie.  37To chieng’moro, kane oyudo olemo e od Nisrok nyiseche, yawuote ma Adramalek giSharezer nobiro monege.  Bang’e ne giringo, mi gidhi e piny Ararat, toEsarhadon nodoko ruoth kar Senakarib wuon mare.
Ruodhi 20Tuo mar Hezekia(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)1E ndalogo, Hezekia ne tuo, kendo ohewore.  Janabi Isaya wuod Amoz nobiroire, mowachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owachoni ni mondo ilam mwanduni niyawuoti, nimar ibiro tho, ok nikwo. " 2Kane Hezekia owinjo kamano,nolokore mong’iyo kor ot, kokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye niya,
"A Ruoth Nyasaye,asayi, parie kaka asewuotho e nyimi gi adieri kod chuny mobidhore, kaatimo gik malong’oni. " Eka ne oywak malit.  4To kane Isaya pok ochopo edier laru, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobirone niya,
"Dogi iwach ni Hezekia majatend joga, ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Daudi kwaru owacho kama:‘Asewinjo kwayoni, kendo aseneno pi wang’i.  Omiyo abiro changi, kendobang’ ndalo adek inidhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  6Abiro medi ndalo moromohigni apar gabich, bende abiro resi kaachiel gi dala Jerusalem e lwetruodh Asuria, kendo abiro rito dalani nikech nyinga, kendo nikech Daudijatichna. ’ "7Eka Isaya nowacho ni jood Hezekia ni mondo okel ng’owo moswagi omwon ebur mane okuodo Hezekia.  Ne gitimo kamano, mi Hezekia nochango. 8Bang’ mano, Hezekia nopenjo Isaya niya, "Ere gima biro bedona ranyisini Ruoth Nyasaye biro changa, kendo ni anadhi e Hekalune bang’ ndaloadek?" 9Isaya nodwoke, ka penje niya, "Diher mondo tipo mar wang’chieng’manie raidhi odhi nyime ondamo apar, koso mondo odog chien ondamo apar?Mano e ranyisi ma Ruoth Nyasaye onyisigo ni enotim gima osewacho. " 10ToHezekia nokone niya, "En gima yot mondo tipo odhi nyime ondamo apar. Emomiyo tipo mondo odog mana chien ondamo apar. " 11Eka Isaya janabinokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye kamano, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko tipo chien ondamoapar e raidhi mane Ahaz oloso. Hezekia orwako joote moa Babulon(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)12E ndalogo Merodak-baladan nooro joote ir Hezekia gi barupe kod mich,nikech nowinjo ni yande otuo.  13Hezekia norwako jootego, monyisogimwandune duto mane nie ode mar keno, kaka fedha gi dhahabu gi gikmang’ue ng’ar, gi mo ma nengone tek, kod gige mag lweny, kaachiel gi gikmoko duto mane ni kuonde kenone.  Onge gimoro amora e ode kata e pinyemane ok onyisogi. 14To bang’e janabi Isaya nobiro ir Ruoth hezekia, mopenje niya, "Jogi oakanye? To wach ang’o mokelogi?" Hezekia nodwoke ni, "Gia e piny Babulon,kuma bor. " 15Isaya nomedo penje niya, "To ang’o ma gineno e odi?"Hezekia nodwoke ni, "Giseneno gik moko duto manie oda.  Onge gimoro amoramodong’ mak anyisogi e kuonde kenona. " 16Eka Isaya nowacho ni Hezekianiya, "Winj wach Ruoth Nyasaye! 17Ndalo biro ma gik moko duto manie odi,ma kwereni osekano nyaka chil kawuono, noter Babulon.  Bende RuothNyasaye omedo wacho ni onge gima nodong’ kata achiel mak oter kuno. 18Yawuoti moko nolok wasumbni.  Adier, moko kuom yawuoti hie nolokwasumbni mabuoch e od ruodh Babulon. " 19Hezekia ne odwoke niya, "WachRuoth Nyasaye ma isenyisa ber. " To ne odwoke kamano, koparo ni en to kuebiro siko e ndalone duto. Tho mar Hezekia(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)20Weche moko mag Hezekia, gi tekone duto, kendo kaka noloso yawo gifereji maduong’ mane kelo pi Jerusalem, ondik e Kitap Weche mag Ndalomag Juda.  21Hezekia notho, moyiki but kwerene.  Manase wuode nodoko ruothkare.
Ruodhi 21Loch Manase, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)1Manase ne jahigni apar gariyo kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom hignipiero abich gabich, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Hefziba.  2TimbeManase ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kaka timbe makuero mag ogendinimane Ruoth Nyasaye oriembo mondo owe thuolo ni jo-Israel.  3Nochako olosohembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore mane Hezekia wuon mare oseketho, kendonogero kuonde liswa ni Baal.  Nochungo siro milamo miluongo ni Ashera,kaka Ahab ruodh Israel notimo, bende nolamo sulue duto, kotiyonigi. 4Nogero kende mag liswa e Hekalu mane Ruoth Nyasaye osewuoyo kuome niya,"Jerusalem ema naketie nyinga. " 5Bende nogero kende mag misango ni sulueduto e laru ariyo mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  6Nowang’o wuode bende, kotimogomisango.  Noyie gi jokor wach gi jo nyakalondo kod ajuoke.  Timbenemaricho ne ng’eny e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, omiyo mirima nomako RuothNyasaye.  7Siro milamo mane oseloso, nochungo ei Hekalu, to Ruoth Nyasayenosewuoyo kuom Hekaluno, kawacho ni Daudi gi Solomon wuod Daudi niya,"Aseyiero Hekaluni gi Jerusalem kuom dhoudi duto mag Israel mondo nyingaobedie nyaka chieng’.  8Ka jo-Israel orito gik moko duto mane achikogi,kendo gitimogi, bende ka giluwo chike duto mane Musa jatichna onyisogi,to ok nariembgi e piny mane amiyo kweregi. " 9To ne gitamore winjo, kendoManase nosemogi ni mondo gimed timbegi maricho e nyim Ruoth Nyasayemoloyo ogendini mane Ruoth Nyasaye otieko mondo owe thuolo ni jo-Israel. 10Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo jotichne ma jonabi owacho niya,
"Manase ruodhJuda osetimo tim makuero, kod richo madongo moloyo mago duto manejo-Amor otimo chon, kendo osemiyo jo-Juda bende obedo joricho, nikechnyisechene manono.  12Emomiyo abiro kelo masira malich kuom Jerusalem giJuda, ma ka ng’ato owinjo, to ite nopopni.  13Abiro pimo Jerusalem gi tolmane apimogo Samaria, kendo gi rapim mane apimogo dhood Ahab.  Abironang’o Jerusalem mapoth, mana kaka kungu nang’o puodho.  14Anawit jogaawuon modong’, kendo anachiwgi e lwet wasikgi duto, mondo opegi, kendooyakgi, 15nikech gisemiya mirima gi timbegi maricho, chakre ndalo manekweregi owuokie Misri nyaka chil kawuono. "16To ewi richo duto mane Manase otimo, komiyogo jo-Juda obedo joricho enyim Ruoth Nyasaye, en ni nomedo chuero remb ji mang’eny maonge ketho,nyaka remo nomol ka ohula e Jerusalem. 17Weche moko mag Manase, gi timbene duto, gi richo mane otimo, ondiki eKitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Juda.  18Manase notho, moyike eorundune mane nie puoth Uza.  Amon wuode nodoko ruoth kare. Loch Amon, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)19Amon ne jahigni piero ariyo gariyo kane ochako tich, morito piny kuomhigni ariyo, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Meshulemeth nyar Haruzma ja-Jotba.  20Timbe Amon ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye mana kaka timbeManase wuon mare.  21Noluwo yore duto mane wuon mare oluwo, kotiyo ninyiseche manono mane wuon mare tiyonigi, kendo kokulorenigi.  22NoweyoRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwerene, kendo notamore luwe.  23Jodong ruothAmon nojame, monege e ode.  24To jo-Juda nonego jogo duto mane ojame,kendo ne giketo Josia wuode mondo obed ruoth kare. 25Weche moko mag Amon ondiki e Kitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi magJuda.  26Noyike e liende mane nie puoth Uza.  Josia nodoko ruoth kare.
Ruodhi 22Loch Josia, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Josia ne jahigni aboro kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higni pieroadek gachiel, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Jedida nyar Adaya maja-Bozkath.  2Timbe Josia ne long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo noluwotimbe duto mag Daudi kwar mare, ma ok oweyo kata achiel. Kitap Chik oyudi e Hekalu(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)3Kane Josia obedo ruoth, kuom higni apar gaboro, nooro Shafan jagorowuod Azalia ma wuod Meshulam e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kowachone niya,
"Dhiyoir Hilkia jadolo maduong’, inyise mondo okwan kar romb pesa mosekel eiOd Ruoth Nyasaye, ma jorit osechoko kuom ji.  5Pesago mondo oket e lwetnyipeche marito tich Od Ruoth Nyasaye, 6mondo gichulgo jotich bao gijogedo kod jopa kite maloso kuonde mokethore e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendomondo ging’iewgo yien gi kite mopa milosogo kuonde mokethorego.  7To kikpenjgi kaka gitiyo gi pesa momigi, nikech gin joma ogen. "8Kindeno ema Hilkia jadolo maduong’ nowachoe ni Shafan jagoro niya,"Aseyudo Kitap Chik e Od Ruoth Nyasaye. " Mi nomiyo Shafan kitabuno,mosomo.  9Shafan jagoro notero ni ruoth wach niya, "Jotichni osegolo pesamane oyud e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo gisemiyo nyipeche marito tich odno. "10Eka nomedo wacho ni ruoth niya, "Hilkia osemiya kitabu moro. " Minosome ni ruoth. 11Kane ruoth owinjo weche manie kitap chik, noyiecho lepe.  12Eka nochikoHilkia jadolo, gi Ahikam wuod Shafan gi Akbor wuod Mikaya, gi Shafanjagoro, kod Asaya jatich ruoth, niya,
"Dhiuru upenj Ruoth Nyasaye gimabiro timorena, kendo ni jo-Juda duto, nikech weche manie kitabumwaseyudoni.  Nyaka bed ni Ruoth Nyasaye okecho kodwa malich, nikechkwerewa ne ok orito chike manie kitabuni, kata timo gik moko dutomondikie. "14Omiyo Hilkia jadolo gi Ahikam gi Akbor gi Shafan kod Asaya ne jodhi irHulda janabi madhako ma chi Shalum wuod Tikva, ma wuod Harhas, jarit leplemo, mane odak Jerusalem e migawo mar ariyo.  Ne giwuoyo kode, 15minodwokogi niya, "Nyisuru ng’at mane oorou ira ni 16Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel owacho kama: ‘Abiro kelo masira e pinyni, kendo kuom jomaodakie, kaluwore gi weche duto manie kitabu ma ruodh Juda osesomo.  17Negikwinya gi timbegi ka giweya, kendo ka giwang’o ubani ni nyisechemanono.  Emomiyo mirimba nobed mager kuom pinyni, kendo ok norum. ’ 18Towachuru ni ruodh Juda mane oorou mondo upenjne Ruoth Nyasaye wach, niRuoth nyasaye owacho kama:
‘Kane iwinjo wechena mane awacho kuompinyni kod joma odakie, ni ginibed joma okuong’ kendo okwedi, chunyi neyom, kendo odembore, miyiecho lepi kendo iywak e nyima.  Emomiyo an bendeasewinjo ywakni.  20Noyiki e liendi gi kue, kiluwo kwereni, ma katawang’i ok none masira ma abiro kelo kae. ’ "
Ruodhi 23Josia oloso piny Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)1Kane jootego odwoko ni ruoth wach, noluongo jodongo duto mag Juda gimag Jerusalem.  2Nodhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye gi jo-Juda kod jo-Jerusalemduto; joma omew gi jochan machalre, kaachiel gi jodolo kod jonabi, minosomonigi weche duto mane nie kitap singruok mane nie Od Ruoth Nyasaye. 3Eka nodhi e bath siro, mochung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kosingore nienoluw Ruoth Nyasaye gi chunye duto kod tekone duto, komako chikene giwechene kod buchene, kamano mondo orit weche mag singruok mondiki ekitabuno.  Mi ji duto bende notimo singruokno.
Eka ruoth nochiko Hilkia jadolo maduong’, gi jadolo maluwe, kod joritdhoot, ni mondo gik moko duto milamogo Baal gi siro miluongo ni Asherakod sulue, ogol e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  Nowang’ogi e bath Jerusalem e pawaora Kidron, mi notero buchgi nyaka Bethel.  5Nogolo jodolo mag nyisechemanono mane ruodhi mag Juda oketo mondo owang’ ubani e hembko mag miechJuda, kod mag gwenge mokiewo kod Jerusalem, kendo nogolo joma ne wang’oubani ni Baal gi wang’chieng’ gi due kod sulue duto.  6Nogolo siro milamomiluongo ni Ashera e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, motero e dho aora Kidron e bathJerusalem.  Nowang’e kanyo but aora, motoye matindotindo nyaka olokoreburu.  Eka nokawo buche, mopuko e liete ji ajiya.  7Nomuko ut jochode manenie Od Ruoth Nyasaye, mane ji terorego, kaka kit lemogi nobet.  Udigo emane mon twang’oe pasia mag Ashera. 8Bang’e Josia noluongo jodolo mane nie miech Juda, kendo noketho hembkomane jodologo wang’oe ubani, chakre Geba nyaka Beer-sheba.  (Bende nomukohembko mar jochiende mane oger e dhoranga Joshua jaduong’ Jerusalem, batkoracham kidonjo e dala. ) 9Kata obedo ni noluongo jodolo mag hembko maneni kuonde moting’ore kamano, to ne otamogi ni kik gitim misango ekendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye man Jerusalem, to noyienigi manachamo makati ma ok ketie thowi kaachiel gi jodolo wetegi.  10Ruoth Josianoketho Tofeth manie holo mar Ben-hinom ni kik ji wang’ie nyithindgi kamisango ni Molek.  11Nogolo kido mag farese mane ruodhi mag Juda oseketoni wang’chieng’.  12Nomuko kende-mag-misango mane nie wi gorofa mar odAhaz, mane ruodhi mag Juda oloso e laru ariyo mag od Ruoth Nyasaye. Notoyogi matindotindo, mopuko ng’injogi e aora Kidron.  13Ruoth nokethobende kuonde hembko mane ni yo milambo mar got Zeituni, man yo wuokchieng’ mar Jerusalem, mane Solomon ruodh Israel ogero ni Ashteroth,nyasaye ma kuero mar jo-Sidon, gi Kemosh, nyasach jo-Moab, kod Milkom,nyasach jo-Amon.  14Noturo sirni mag kite gi mag yien mane ji lamo,motoyogi matindotindo, mi kuonde mane gichungie nodino gi choke ji.
Josia nomuko kendo-mar-misango man Bethel, kaachiel gi hembkone maneJeroboam wuod Nebat oloso.  Notoyo kitene, molokore buru, kendo nowang’osiro milamo mane ni kanyo.  (Jeroboam nogo ema nomiyo jo-Israel obedojoricho. ) 16Kane Josia owichore, noneno liete ewi got.  Nooro ji, mogolochoke e lietego, mi ne giwang’ogi e kendo-mar-misango.  Kamano nokethokendono, kaluwore gi wach Ruoth Nyasaye mane ng’at Nyasaye okoro kaneJeroboam ochung’ e dho kendo chieng’ sawo cha.  Eka Josia noting’owang’e, moneno liend ng’at Nyasaye mane okoro wechego.  17Nopenjo niya,"Mano liend ng’a, ma aneno loka cha?" Jodalanoo nodwoke niya, "En liendng’at Nyasaye mane oa Juda, mokoro gik moko duto misetimo kuomkendo-mar-misangoni. " 18Eka Josia nowacho niya, "Weyeuru! Ng’ato kik golchokene. " Omiyo ne giweyo chokene kaachiel gi choke janabi mane oaSamaria. 19Bende Josia noketho od lemo mane nie hembko man kuonde moting’ore,mane ruodhi mag Israel ogero e miech Samaria, kamiyogo Ruoth Nyasayemirima.  20Jodolo duto mane Josia onwang’o e hembko nonego ekende-mag-misango.  Eka nodok Jerusalem. Jo-Israel orito Sap Pasaka(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)21Ruoth nochiko ji duto ni mondo otim Pasaka ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachgi, kaka ondiki e Kitap Singruok.  22Adier, Pasaka ma kamano nepok otim, e ndalo mane jobura ritoe Israel, kata e ndalo mag ruodhi magIsrael gi Juda.  23To e higa mar apar gaboro mar loch Josia kende ema neotimie Pasaka makama ni Ruoth Nyasaye, Jerusalem. Mirimb Nyasaye osiko kuom jo-Juda24Bende Josia nogolo jonyakalondo, gi ajuoke, gi kido mag nyisechemanono miluongo ni Terafim, gi nyiseche mamoko molos gi lwet dhano,kaachiel gitimbe makuero duto mane onwang’ e piny Juda, kendo eJerusalem.  Kamano noluwo weche mag chik mane ondik e kitabu mane Hilkiajadolo oyudo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  25Onge ruoth moro kata achiel maneoluwo Ruoth Nyasaye gi chunye duto, kod tekone duto, komako chike dutomag Musa, kaka Josia notimo. 26Kata kamano chuny Ruoth Nyasaye ne ok olendo kuom mirima mager maneokechogo gi jo-Juda nikech timbe maricho mane Manase ochwanyego.  27Tonowacho niya, "Abiro riembo jo-Juda bende mondo oa e nyima, kaka neariembo jo-Israel.  Abiro jwang’o Jerusalem, dala mane ayiero, kendoabiro wito Hekalu mane awacho ni nyinga nobedie. "Tho mar Josia(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)28Weche moko mag Josia, kod timbene duto, ondiki e Kitap Weche mag Ndalomag Ruodhi mag Juda.  29E ndalo Josia ema ne Farao-neko, ruodh Misri,odhi kedoe gi ruodh Asuria e dho aora Yufrate.  Ruoth Josia nodhi Megidokedo kode, to kane girado, Farao nonege.  30Joge nogolo ringre Megido,koting’e e gari.  Ne gikele Jerusalem, mi giyike e liende owuon.  Eka jiduto nokawo Jehoahaz wuod Josia, moketo ruoth kar wuon mare. Loch Jehoahaz, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)31Jehoahaz ne jahigni piero ariyo gadek kane odoko ruoth, morito pinykuom dueche adek, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Hamutal nyarJeremia ma ja-Libna.  32Timbe Jehoahaz ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,mana kaka timbe kwerene.  33Farao-neko notere Ribla e piny Hamath,motueye kuno, mondo kik obed ruodh Jerusalem, kendo noketo ni jo-Judaosuru moromo kilo alufu adek mag fedha, gi kilo mia adek mag dhahabu. 34Eka Farao-neko noketo Eliakim wuod Josia mondo obed ruoth kar Josiawuon mare, kendo noloko nyinge ni Jehoyakim.  Jehoahaz to notero Misri,kuma nothoe. 35Jehoyakim noketo ni jo-Juda osuru ma dirom pesa mane Farao dwaro. Ng’ato ka ng’ato nogolo dhahabu gi fedha kaka mwandune obet.  KamanoJehoyakim nochulo fedha gi dhahabu mane Farao oketone. Loch Jehoyakim, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Jehoyakim ne jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, morito pinykuom higni apar gachiel, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Zebida nyarPedaya ma ja-Ruma.  37Timbe Jehoyakim ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, manakaka timbe kwerene.
Ruodhi
E ndalo Jehoyakim, Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon nobiro, mi Jehoyakimnobet e bwo lochne kuom higni adek.  To bang’e nopiem kode, modagi lochne2Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nooro mony mag jo-Babulon gi mag jo-Aram, gi magjo-Moab kod mag jo-Amon, mondo oked gi jo-Juda, kendo ne giketho pinygichuth, kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosemiyo jatichne ma janabi owacho.  3Adier,gigo notimore kuom jo-Juda mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho, ni mondoogolgi e nyime.  Ruoth Nyasaye nodagi weyonigi kethogi, nikech richo maneManase otimo, 4kopong’o Jerusalem gi remb joma onge ketho.  5Weche mokomag Jehoyakim gi timbene duro, ondiki e Kitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhimag Juda.  6Jehoyakim notho, moluwo kwerene, mi Jehoyachin wuode nodokoruoth kare.  7Ruodh Misri ne ok owuok kendo e pinye, nimar ruodh Babulonnosemaye pinje duto mane nie bwo lochne, chakre aora manie tong’ Misrinyaka chop aora Yufrate. Jehoyachin gi jodong Juda oter Babulon e tuech(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)8Jehoyachin ne jahigni apar gaboro kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuomdueche adek kende, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Nehushta nyarElnathan ma ja-Jerusalem.  9Timbe Jehoyachin ne richo e nyim RuothNyasaye mana kaka timbe wuon mare. 10Ndalono jolwenj Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon nodhi monjo Jerusalem kendone gilworo dalano.  11Kane pod gilworo Jerusalem, Nebukadnezar nodhi kunoowuon, 12mi piny nohewo Jehoyachin, mochiwore ni ruodh Babulon, kaachielgi min mare, gi jong’adne rieko, gi jodonge kod jotende.  Nomake e higamar aboro mar loch ruodh Babulon.  13Nebukadnezar nokawo gik mabeyo dutomane nie Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kod mane nie kar keno mar od ruoth, kendonong’ado ong’ado gik moko duto mag dhahabu mane Solomon ruodh Israeloloso, mane nie Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  Kamano wach Ruoth nochopo kare. 14Nebukadnezar nodaro jo-Jerusalem duto, kotero jodongo kod jomwandu madirom alufu apar e tuech kaachiel gi jotheth, kod ji duto molony kuomtich lwedo.  Onge ng’ato mane odong’ mak mana joma odhier.  15Ruothkaachiel gi min mare, gi monde gi jotende, kod jodong gwenge.  16Nogolojogo duto Jerusalem kaachiel gi jomwandu duto ma dirom alufu abiriyo, gijotheth kod joma olony kuom tich lwedo ma dirom alufu achiel.  Giduto negin joma otegno, moromo lweny.  17To ruodh Babulon noketo Matania maowadgi wuon Jehoyachin mondo obed ruoth kar Jehoyachin.  Noloko nyingMatania ni Zedekia. Loch Zedekia, ruodh Juda(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Jeremia
.
-
)
Zedekia ne jahigni piero ariyo gachiel kane odoko ruoth, morito pinykuom higni apar gachiel, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Hamutalnyar Jeremia ma ja-Libna.  19Timbe Zedekia ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,mana kaka timbe Jehoyakim.  20Jo-Jerusalem gi jo-Juda nomiyo RuothNyasaye mirima, nyaka nogologi e nyime.
Ruodhi 25Jo-Babulon okawo Jerusalem(Jeremia
.
-
;
.
-
)Zedekia nopiem gi ruodh Babulon, modagi lochne.  1Omiyo chieng’ due apar,due mar apar, e higa mar ochiko mar loch Zedekia, Nebukadnezar ruodhBabulon nobiro gi joge mag lweny, mi gimonjo Jerusalem.  Ne gigero kambioko mar dala, eka ne gichielone ohinga molwore.  2Ne gigoyo ni Jerusalemageng’a nyaka higa mar apar gachiel mar loch Zedekia.  3Koro kech ne liche dalano, kendo ji ne onge gi chiemo chuth.  4Chieng’ due ochiko, due marang’wen, jo-Babulon nomwomo ohinga mar dala, mi Zedekia notemo ringo gijolwenje duto gotieno, kata obedo ni jo-Babulon nosedhogo dala koni gikoni.  Ne giluwo rangach mane nie kind ohingni ariyo, ka ging’ado orunduruoth, mi gichiko yo holo mar Jordan.  5To jolweny mag babulon nolawoZedekia, mojuko e paw Jeriko, mi jolwenje duto oringo oweye.  6Ne gimakemi gitere Ribla ir ruodh Babulon, mong’adone bura kuno.  7Ne ginegoyawuot Zedekia e wang’e koneno, eka ne gitoko wengene oko, kendo gitueyegi nyororo, mi gitere Babulon. Odar jo-Juda moter Babulon e tuech(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
; Jeremia
.
-
;
.
-
)8Chieng’ due abiriyo due mar abich, e higa mar apar gochiko mar lochNebukadnezar, jatend joma ne rito ruodh Babulon, nobiro Jerusalem,9Nowang’o Od Ruoth Nyasaye, gi od ruoth, kod udi duto mag Jerusalem,10kendo joge mag lweny nomuko ohinga duto mane olworo Jerusalem. 11Bang’e Nebukadnezar nomako ji duto mane odong’ Jerusalem moteroBabulon, kaachiel gi joma ne oseringo modok ni ruodh Babulon, kod jotichmolony mane pod odong’ kuno.  12To joma odhier ahinya, mane onge gigimoro, noweyo e piny Juda mondo oti e puothe mzabibu, kendo e puothemamoko.
Jo-Babulon notoyo sirni mag mula, gi rachungi mane itiyogo e Hekalu,kod karaya maduong’ mar mula ma bende ne ni kanyo.  Bang’e ne giteromulago duto Babulon.  14Bende ne gidhi gi agulini gi rachodhi gi rangisnigi bakunde miting’oe remb misango, kod gik moko duto mag mula mane olosni tich Hekalu.  15Bende jatend jolweny nokawo gik moko duto molos gidhahabu kata molos gi fedha, kaka kikombe gi tegni mag mach.  16Pek mulamane ruoth Solomon olosogo sirni ariyo gi karaya maduong’ ne ng’enymokadho apima.  17Sirni ariyogo ne romre.  Moro ka moro borne modhi malone romo mita ochiko.  Ewi siro ka siro ne nitie gima chalo agulu marmula, ma borne modhi malo romo mita achiel gi nus, to alwora mare neoketie gik mong’inore ong’inore ka machunga, ma bende nolos gi mula. 18Nebuzaradan, jatend lweny maduong’, nomako Seraya jadolo maduong’, giZefania jadolo maluwe, kod ji adek ma jorit dhood Hekalu.  19Bende nokawong’at mane osebedo jatend jolweny, gi jagoro mare mane tichne en ndikonying joma onego obed jolweny, kaachiel gi ji abich kuom joma ne ng’adoni ruoth rieko, kod jodongo piero auchiel mane pod ni Jerusalem.  20Jogoduto notero Ribla ir ruodh Babulon, 21mi ruoth nogolo chik, mi ogogikendo oneggi kuno e piny Hamath.  Kamano e kaka nodar jo-Juda e pinygi,moter e tuech. Jo-Juda modong’ oringo odhi Misri22 To kuom joma nodong’ e piny Juda, Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon noyieroGedalia wuod Ahikam ma wuod Shafan, mondo obed jatendgi.  23Jodong lwenyduto, kaachiel gi jogi, nowinjo ni ruodh Babulon oseyiero Gedalia.  MiIshmael wuod Nethania, gi Johanan wuod Karea, gi Seraya wuod Tanhumethja-Netoifa, kod Jaazania wuod ja-Maaka ne jodhi ir Gedalia kaachiel gijogi.  24Gedalia nokuong’orenigi kowacho niya, "Kik uluor jo-Babulon. Daguru adaga e pinywani kuyie loch ruodh Babulon, to unune maber. " 25Toe due mar abiriyo, Ishmael wuod Nethania ma wuod Elishama ma anywolajoka ruoth, nobiro gi ji apar, momonjo Gedalia.  Ne ginege, kaachiel gijo-Yahudi kod jo-Babulon mane ni kode Mizpa.  26Eka ji duto, kaachiel gijodong lweny, noringo modhi Misri, nimar ne giluoro jo-Babulon. Ogony Jehoyachin, kendo omiye duong’ e dala Babulon(Jeremia
.
-
)27Kane Jehoyachin ruodh Juda osetue higni piero adek gabiriyo,Evil-merodak ruodh Babulon nogonye.  Mano notimore chieng’ due pieroariyo gabiriyo, mar due apar gariyo, e higa mane Evil-merodak ochakoetich ruoth.  28Evil-merodak norito Jehoyachin gi ng’wono, kendo ne omiyeluor maduong’ moloyo ruodhi duto mane ni Babulon e tuech.  29Kuom manoJehoyachin nolonyo lep tuech, kendo nochiemo e od ruoth ndalone duto. 30Odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ kuom higni duto mane ongima, ne imiye gikmoko morome konyorego.
Weche mag Ndalo 1Nyikwa Adam(Chakruok
.
-
)1Adam nonywolo Seth, to Seth nonywolo Enosh.  2Enosh nonywolo Kenan, toKenan nonywolo Mahalalel.  Mahalalel nonywolo Jared, 3to Jared nonywoloEnok.  Enok nonywolo Methusela, to Methusela nonywolo Lamek.  4Lameknonywolo Nowa, to Nowa nonywolo Shem gi Ham kod Jafeth. Nyikwa yawuot Nowa(Chakruok
.
-
)5Jafeth nonywolo Gomer gi Magog, gi Madai gi Javan gi Tubal gi Meshakkod tiras.  6To Gomer nonywolo Ashkenaz gi Rifath kod Togarma.  7Javan tononywolo Elisha gi Tarshish gi Kitim kod jo-Rodan. 8Ham nonywolo Kush gi Misri gi Put kod Kanaan.  9To Kush nonywolo Seba giHavila gi Sabta gi Raama kod Sabteka.  To Raama nonywolo Sheba kod Dedan. 10Kush ne wuon Nimrod bende, ma nokwongo bet ruoth e piny.  11NyikwaMisri ne gin jo-Lud, gi jo-Anam gi jo-Lehab gi jo-Naftu 12gi jo-Pathrusgi jo-Kaslu kod jo-Kaftor, ma jo-Filistia nowuok kuomgi.  13Kanaannonywolo yawuowi ariyo; Sidon wuode makayo gi Heth.  14Nyikwaye ne ginjo-Jebus gi jo-Amor gi jo-Girgash 15gi jo-Hivi gi jo-Arki gi jo-Sini16gi jo-Arvad gi jo-Zemar kod jo-Hamath. 17Shem nonywolo Elam gi Ashur gi Arpaksad gi Lud kod Aram.  To Aramnonywolo Uz gi Hul gi Gether kod Mash.  18Arpaksad nonywolo Shela, toShela nonywolo Eber.  19Eber nonywolo Shela, to Shela nonywolo yawuowiariyo: wuode makayo nochak ni Peleg (tiende ni, Pogruok), nikech endalone ema nopogie piny, to owadgi ne nyinge Joktan.  20Joktan nonywoloAlmodad gi Shelef gi Hazarmoth gi Jera 21gi Hadoram gi Uzal gi Diukla22gi Ebal gi Abimael gi Sheba gi 23Ofir gi Havila kod Jobab.  Jogo dutone joka Joktan. Nyikwa Shem(Chakruok
.
-
)24Shem nonywolo Arpaksad to Arpaksad nonywolo Shela.  25Shela nonywoloEber, to Eber nonywolo Peleg.  Peleg nonywolo Reu, 26to Reu nonywoloSerug.  Serug nonywolo Nahor, to Nahor nonywolo Tera.  27Tera nonywoloAbram, ma bang’e niluongo ni Ibrahim. Nyikwa Ishmael gi Ketura(Chakruok
.
-
,
-
)28Yawuot Ibrahim ne Isaka gi Ishmael, 29to Ishmael nonywolo Nebayothwuode makayo, kod Kedar gi Abdeel gi Mibsam 30gi Mishma gi Duma gi Masagi Hadad gi Tema 31gi Jetur gi Nafish kod Kedema.  Jogo duto ne jokaIshmael. 32Ketura ma chi Ibrahim machielo nonywolo Zimram gi Jokshan gi Medan giMidian gi Ishbak kod Shua.  To yawuot Jokshan ne Sheba gi Dedan.  33ToMidian nonywolo Efa gi Efer gi Hanok gi Abida kod Eldaa.  Jogo duto nejoka ketura. Nyikwa Esau(Chakruok
.
-
)34Isaka wuod Ibrahim nonywolo Esau gi Israel. 35Esau nonywolo Elifaz gi Reuel gi Jeush gi Jalam kod Kora.  36To Elifaznonywolo Teman gi Omar gii Zefi gi Gatam gi Kenaz gi Timna kod Amalek. 37To Reuel nonywolo Nahath gi Zera gi Shama kod Miza. 38Seir nonywolo Lotan gi Shobal gi Zibeon gi Ana gi Dishon gi Ezer kodDishan.  39To yawuot Lotan ne Hori gi Homam.  Bende ne en gi nyamin manyinge Timna.  40Yawuot Shobal ne gin Alian gi Manahath gi Ebal gi Shefikod Onam.  Yawuot Zibeon ne Aya gi Ana.  41Wuod Ana ne Dishon.  YawuotDishon ne gin Hamran gi Eshban gi Ithran kod Keran.  42Yawuot Ezer ne ginBilhan gi Zaavan kod Jaakan.  To yawuot Dishan ne Uz gi Aran. 43Koro ruodhi mane rito piny Edom kane jo-Israel pod onge gi ruoth emagi: Ruoth mokwongo ne en Bela wuod Beor, ma dalane niluongo niDinhaba.  44Kane Bela otho, Jobab wuod Zera ma ja-Bozra nodoko ruothkare.  45To kane Jobab otho, Husham ja-Teman nodoko ruoth kare.  46Bang’tho Husham, Hadad wuod Bedad nodoko ruoth kare.  Hadadno ema noloyojo-Midian e lweny e piny Moab.  Dalane niluongo ni Avith.  47Kane Hadadotho, Samla ja-Masreka nodoko ruoth kare.  48Kane Samla otho, Shaulja-Rehoboth man but aora Yufrate nodoko ruoth kare.  49To kane Shaulotho, Baal-hanan wuod Akbor nodoko ruoth kare.  50To bang’ thoBaal-hanan, Hadad nodoko ruoth kare.  Dalane niluongo ni Pai.  Nyingchiege ne Mehetabel nyar Matred ma nyar Mezahab. 51Magi e jodongo mane rito piny Edom kane Hadad osetho: Timna gi alia giJetheth 52gi Oholibama gi Ela gi Pinon 53gi Kenaz gi Teman gi Mibzar54gi Magdiel kod Iram.  Jogo duto ne jodong Edom.
Weche mag Ndalo 2Yawuot Israel(Chakruok
.
-
)1Yawuot Israel ne gin Reuben gi Simeon gi Lawi gi Juda gi Isaka giZebulun 2gi Dan gi Josef gi Benjamin gi Naftali gi Gad kod Asher. Nyikwa Juda3Yawuot Juda ma od Bath-shua nyar Kanaan ne gin Er gi Onan kod Shela.  Totimbe Er, wuod Juda makayo, ne richo e nyiom Ruoth Nyasaye, mi RuothNyasaye nonege.  4Bang’e Juda nonywolo yawuowi moko ariyo gi Tamar chiwuodeno, ma nyinggi Perez gi Zera.  Koro yawuot Juda duto ne abich. 5Yawuot Perez ne Hezron gi Hamul.  6Zera ne nigi yawuowi abich.  Ne ginZimri gi Ethan gi Heman gi Kalkol kod Dara.  7Wuod Karmi ne en Akan, manokelo ni jo-Israel chandruok nikech noketho, kokawo gima ochiw ni RuothNyasaye.  8Wuod Ethan ne en Azaria. 9Yawuot Hezron ne gin Jerameel gi Ram kod Kaleb.  10Ram nonywoloAminadab, to Aminadab nonywolo Nashon mane jaduong’ jo-Juda.  11Nashonnonywolo Salmon, to Salmon nonywolo Boaz.  12Boaz nonywolo Obed, to Obednonywolo Jesse.  13Jesse nonywolo Eliab wuode makayo, gi Abinadab, wuodemar ariyo, gi Shimea, wuode mar adek, 14gi Nethaneel, wuode marangg’wen, gi Radai wuode mar abich, 15Gi Ozem, wuode mar auchiel, giDaudi wuode mar abiriyo.  16Nyiminegi ne Zeruya gi Abigail.  Zeruya nenigi yawuowi adek: Abishai gi Joab kod Asahel.  17Abigail mane chi JatherJa-Ishmael, nonywolo Amasa. 18Kaleb wuod Hezron ne nigi dhako ma nyinge Azuba.  Azuba nonywoloJerioth gi Jesher gi Shobab kod Ardon.  19Kane Azuba osetho, Kalebnokendo Efrath, mane ginywologo Hur.  20Hur nonywolo Uri, to Uri nonywoloBezalel. 21Kane Hezron jahigni piero auchiel, nokendo nyar Makir wuon Gilead. Chiegeno nonywolo Segub, 22to Segub nonywolo Jair mane nigi mier pieroariyo gadek e piny Gilead.  23To Geshur kod Aram nomayogi Havoth-jair, giKenath kod mier matindo mokiewo kode, duto mier piero auchiel.  Jogo dutone nyikwa Makir wuod Gilead.  24Kane Hezron osetho, Kaleb notero Efrathachi Hezron wuon mare, mi ne ginywologo Ashur wuon Tekoa. 25Jerameel ne kach Hezron, to yawuot Jerameel ne gin Ram, wuode makayo,gi Buna gi Oran gi Ozem kod Ahija.  26Jerameel ne nigi dhako machielo manyinge Atara, ma nonywolone Onam.  27Ram ma wuod Jerameel makayo nonywoloMaaz gi Jamin kod Eker.  28To yawuot Onam ne Shamai gi Jada.  To yawuotShamai ne Nadab gi Abishur.  29Chi Abishur mane nyinge Abihail nonywoloAban gi Molid.  30Yawuot Nadab ne Seled gi Apaim, to Seled notho maongenyathi.  31Apaim nonywolo Ishi, to Ishi nonywolo Sheshan, to Sheshannonywolo Alahi.  32Yawuot Juda ma omin Shamahi ne Jether gi Jonathan. Jether notho maonge nyathi, 33to yawuot Jonathan ne Pelleth gi Zaza. Jogo duto ne joka Jerameel. 34Sheshan ne onge gi yawuowi, to nonywolo mana nyiri kende, to ne en gimisumba ma ja-Misri ma nyinge Jerha.  35Jali ema Sheshan nomiyo nyaremokendo, mi ne ginywolo wuowi ma nyinge Atai.  36Atai nonywolo Nathan, toNathan nonywolo Zabad.  37Zabad nonywolo Eflal, to Eflal nonywolo Obed. 38Obed nonywolo Jehu, to Jehu nonywolo Azaria.  39Azaria nonywolo Helez,to Helez nonywolo Eleasa.  40Eleasa nonywolo Sismai, to Sismai nonywoloShalum.  41Shalum nonywolo Jekamia, to Jekamia nonywolo Elishama. 42Kaleb omin Jerameel, nonywolo Mesha wuode makayo, to Mesha nonywoloZif.  Zif nonywolo Meresha, to Meresha nonywolo Hebron.  43Yawuot Hebronne gin Kora gi Tapua gi Rekem kod Shema.  44Shema nonywolo Raham, toRaham nonywolo Jorkeam.  Rekem nonywolo Shamai, 45to Shamai nonywoloMaon.  Maon to nonywolo Bethzur.  46Chi kaleb moro, ma nyinge Efa,nonywolo Haran gi Moza kod Gazez.  To Haran nonywolo Gazez.  47Yawuotjadai ne gin Regem gi Jothan gi Geshan gi Pelet gi Efa kod Shaaf. 48Maaka, ma bende chi Kaleb nonywolo Sheber gi Tirhana, 49gi Shaaf, kodSheva.  Shaaf ne wuon Madmana, to Sheva ne wuon Makbena gi Gibea, BendeKaleb ne nigi nyako ma nyinge Aksa.  50Jogo duto ne joka Kaleb. To joka Hur e magi: Hur, wuod Efratha makayo, nonywolo Shobal wuonKiriath-jearim, 51gi Salma wuon Bethlehem, kod Haref wuon Beth-gader. 52Shobal wuon Kiriath-jearim nonywolo Reaya, kendo ne en kwar jokaManahath joka Manahath.  53Jo-Kiriath-jearim ne gin jo-Ithri gi jo-Pu gijo-Shuma, kod jo-Mishra.  Jo-Zora gi jo-Eshtaol nowuok kuom ogendnigo. 54Joka Salma ne gin jo-Bethlehem gi jo-Metofa gi jo-Atroth-beth-joab gijoka Manahath modong’, gi jo-Zor 55gi dhout jondiko ma nodak Jabez, gijo-Tira gi jo-Shimea kod jo-Suka.  Jogi ne jo-Keni ma kwargi ne or jokaRekab.
Weche mag Ndalo 3Yawuot Daudi(
Samuel
.
-
;
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)1Yawuot Daudi mane onywolo Hebron e magi: Wuode makayo ne Anon, ma minmare ne Ahinoam nyar Jezreel.  Mar ariyo ne Daniel, ma min mare neAbigail nyar Karmel.  2Mar adek ne Absalom, ma min mare ne Maaka nyarTalmai ruodh Geshur.  Mar ang’wen ne Adonija ma min mare ne Hagith.  3Marabich ne Shefatia ma min mare ne Abital.  Mar auchiel ne Ithream, wuodchiege ma nyinge Egla.  4Daudi nonywolo yawuowi auchielgo kodak Hebron,kuma nobetie ruoth kuom higni abiriyo gi dueche auchiel.  Bang’e nodakJerusalem, korito piny kuom higni piero adek gadek.  5Kane odak Jerusalemnonywolo Shimea gi Shobab gi Nathan kod Solomon ma min-gi ne Bathshebanyar Amiel.  Bang’e Daudi nonywolo yawuowio moko ochiko.  6Ne gin Ibhar giElishama gi Elifelet.  7Gi Noga gi Nefeg gi Jafia 8gi Elishama gi Eliadakod Elifelet.  9Jogo duto ne yawuot Daudi, ka ok okwan mond yawuotemamoko.  Ne gin gi nyamingi ma nyinge Tamar. Nyikwa Solomon10Solomon nonywolo Rehoboam, to Rehoboam nonywolo Abija.  Abija nonywoloAsa, to Asa nonywolo Jehoshafat.  11Jehoshafat nonwolo Jehoram, toJehoram nonywolo Ahazia, Ahazia nonywolo Joash, 12to Joash nonywoloAmazia, Amazia nonywolo Azaria, to Azaria nonywolo Jotham.  13Jothamnonywolo Ahaz to Ahaz nonywolo Hezekia.  Hezekia nonywolo Manase, 14toManase nonywolo Amon.  Amon to nonywolo Josia.  15Yawuot Josia ne ginJohanan, wuode makayo, gi Jehoyakim wuode mar ariyo, gi Zedekia wuodemar adek, gi Shalum, wuode mar ang’wen.  16Yawuot Jehoyakim ne Jekonia giZedekia. 17Jekonia, mane oter e tuech, nonywolo Shealtiel 18gi Malkiram gi Pedayagi Shenazar gi Jehamia gi Hosham kod Nedabia.  19Pedaya nonywoloZerubabel gi Shimei, to yawuot Zerubabel ne Meshulam gi Hanania.  Ne gingi nyamin-gi ma nyinge Shelomith.  20Zerubabel nonywolo yawuowi mokoabich.  Ne gin Hashuba gi Ohel gi Berekia gi Hasadia kod Jushab-hesed. 21Hanania nonywolo Pelatia, to Pelatia nonywolo Jeshaya.  Jeshayanonywolo Refaya, to Refaya nonywolo Arnan.  Arnan nonywolo Obadia, toObadia nonywolo Shekania, 22Shekania to nonywolo yawuowi auchiel, manyinggi Shemaya gi Hatush, gi Igal gi Baria gi Nearia kod Shafat. 23Nearia nonywolo yawuowi adek, ma nyinggi Elioenai gi Hizkia kodAzikram.  24Elioenai nonywolo yawuowi abiriyo.  Ne gid Hodavia gi Eliashibgi Pelaya gi Akub gi Johanan gi Delaya kod Anani.
Weche mag Ndalo 4Nyikwa Juda1Joka Juda ne Perez gi Hezron gi Karmi gi Hur kod Shobal.  2Reaya wuodShobal nonywolo Joath, to Joath nonywolo Ahumai gi Lahad.  Giduto ne ginjoka Hora. 3Yawuot Etam ne gin Jezreel gi Ishama kod Idbash.  Ne gin gi nyamingi manyinge Hazelelponi.  4Penuel ne wuon Gedor.  Ezer ne wuon Husha.  Ne ginjoka Hur wuod Efratha makayo ma wuon Bethlehem. 5Ashur wuon Tekoa ne nigi mon ariyo ma nyinggi Hela gi Naara.  6Naaranonywolo Ahuram gi Hefer kod jo-Timni gi jo-Ahashtar.  Mago ne jokaNaara.  7To yawuot Ela ne Zereth gi Zoar gi Ethman kod Koz.  8Koz nonywoloAdub gi Zobeba kod joka Aharhel wuod Harun. 9Jabez ne ng’at marahuma moloyo owetene duto.  Min mare nochake ni Jabeznikech nonywole gi rem malit.  10Jabez nokwayo Nyasach Israel niya, "Yieigwedha, kendo imed mbap pinya, bende lweti orita mondo kik gima rachhinya. " Mi Nyasaye nomiye gima nokwayono. 11Kelub owadgi Shua nonywolo Mehir ma wuon Eshton.  12Eshton nonywoloEfratha gi Pasea kod Tehina wuon Irnahash.  Jogo duto ne joka Reha. 13Yawuot Kenaz ne Othniel gi Seraya, to yawuot Othniel ne Hathath giMeonithia.  14Meonithia nonywolo Ofra, to Seraya nonywolo Joab ma wuonjo-Geharashim.  Ne ochakgi nyingno nikech ne gin jopa bao. 15Yawuot Kaleb wuod Jefune ne gin Iru gi Ela kod Naam, to wuod Ela neKenaz.  16Yawuot Jehalelel ne Zif gi Zifa gi Tiria kod Asarel.  17YwuotEzra ne Jether, gi Mered gi Efer kod Jalon.  Mered nokendo Bithia nyarFarao mi Bithia nonywolo Miriam gi Shamai kod Ishba ma wuon Eshtemoa. 18Chi Mered ma nyar Yahudi nonywolo Jared wuon gedor, gi Heber wuonSoko, kod Jekuthiel wuon Zanoa.  19Yawuot Hodia ma od nyamin Naam neKeila ja-Garbi, kod Eshtemoa ja Maaka.  20Yawuot Shimon ne gin Amnon giRina gi Ben-hanan kod Telon.  Yawuot Ishi ne Zoheth gi Ben-zoheth.  21JokaShela wuod juda ne gin Er wuod Leka, gi Laada wuon Maresha, gi dhoutjotueng’o ma nodak Bethashbea 22Gi Jokim gi jo-Kozeba gi Joash kod Sarafma nochwanyore gi jo-Moab modok Bethlehem.  (Wechegi nondik chon ahinya. )23Jogo ne jochue agulini.  Ne gidak Nataim gi Gedara, ka gitiyo ni ruoth. Nykwa Simeon24Yawuot Simeon ne gin Nemuel gi jamin gi Jarib gi Zera kod Shaul. 25Shaul nonywolo Shalum, to Shalum nonywolo Mibsam, to mibsam nonywoloMishma.  26To joka Mishma e magi: Mishma nonywolo hemuel, to hemuelnonywolo Zakur.  Zakur to nonywolo Shimei.  27Shimei nonywolo yawuowi apargauchiel kod nyiri auchiel, to owetene ne ok ne nigi nyithindo mang’enykamano, kendo dhoodgi ne ok onya kaka jo-Juda.  28Ne gidak beer-sheba giMolada gi Hazarshual 29gi Bilha gi Ezem gi Tolad 30gi Bethuel gi Hormagi Ziklag 31gi Bethmarkaboth gi Azar-susim gi beth-biri, kod Shaaraim. Mago ne miechgi nyaka chop ndalo loch Daudi.  32Miechgi abich mamoko negin Etam gi Ain gi Rimon gi Token kod Ashan, 33kaachiel gi mier mokiewokodgi nyaka Baalath.  Mago kuonde mane gidakie.  Nyinggi mane ondik ne gin34Meshobab gi Jamlek gi Josha ma wuod Amazia 35gi Joel gi Jehu wuodJosibia ma wuod Seraya ma wuod Asiel, 36gi Elioenai gi Jaakoba giJeshohaya gi Asaya gi Adiel gi Jesimiel gi Benaya 37gi Ziza wuod Shifima wuod Alon ma wuod Jedaya ma wuod Shimri ma wuod Shemaya.  38Jogo dutone jodong dhoudi, kendo dhoutgi nonya ahinya.  39Ne gia kama idonjogoGedor, yo wuok chieng’ mar holo, ka gidwaro lek ni jambgi.  40Mi neginwang’o lege momew kendo mabeyo.  Pinyno ne lach ahinya.  Jo-Ham emanokwongo dakie.  41Joma nyinggi osendikgo nochopo kuno e ndalo Hezekiaruodh Juda.  Ne giketho hemb jo-Ham kod jo-Maun, mane giyudo kuno kendone ginegogi duto, ma pok ndachgi oneno nyaka chil kawuono.  Piny nokue,kendo oboch, mi ne gidak e pinyno, nikech ne nitie lek ni jambgi.  42Toji mia abich kuom jo-Simeon nodhi nyaka got Seir.  Jotendgi ne Pelatia giNearia gi Refaya kod Uziel, ma yawuot Ishi.  43Ne ginego jo-Amalekmodong’ kendo pod gidak kuno nyaka chil kawuono.
Weche mag Ndalo 5Nyikwa Reuben1 Reuben ne en wuod Israel makayo, to noterore gi chi wuon mare, omiyokata obedo ni ne en kayo kamano, duong’ne mar dala ne omi yawuot Josefma wuod Israel.  To joka Josef ne ok omi duong’ mar dala kaka owinjoretim ni dhood wuowi makayo, 2nimar Juda noloyo owetene gi duong’, nikechode ema nodoko od ruoth.  To adier duong’ mar dala ne en mar Josef. 3Yawuot Reuben ma wuod Israel makayo ne gin Hanok gi Palu gi Hezron kodKarmi.
Joka Joel e magi:Joel nonywolo Shemaya, to Shemaya nonywolo Gog, Gog nonywolo Shimei, 5toShimei nonywolo Mika.  Mika nonywolo Reaya, to Reaya nonywolo Baal.  6Baalto nonywolo Beera.  Beera ne en achiel kuom joma ne Tiglath-peleser ruodhAsuria odaro, motero e tuech piny mabor.  Ne en jaduong’ joka Reuben.  7Mae kaka ochan owetene e dhoutgi: Jeyel ne jatelo, eka Zekaria 8kod Belawuod Azaz ma wuod Shema ma wuod Joel ne luwo.  Ne gidak Aroer, mi negilandore nyaka Nebo gi Baal-meon.  9Bende ne gidak e yo wuok chieng’nyaka chop e thim mopogo kindgi gi aora Yufrate, nikech jambginosemedore e piny Gilead.  10E ndalo loch Saulo ne gikedo gi jo-Hagri, miginego, kendo gidak e miechgi e piny man yo wuok chieng’ mag Gilead. Nyikwa Gad11Jo-Gad nomanyore gi jo-Reuben, ka gidak e piny Bashan nyaka Saleka. 12Joel ma jatendgi gi Shafan jalupne gi Janai kod Shafat ne jodakBashan.  13Jowetegi nowuok kuom dhout Mikael gi Meshulam gi Sheba giJorai gi Jakan gi Zia kod Eber.  14Ji abiriyogo ne yawuot Abihail wuodHuri ma wuod Jaroa, ma wuod Gilead, ma wuod Mikael, ma wuod Jeshishai,ma wuod Jado, ma wuod Buz.  15Ahi wuod Abdiel ma wuod Guni ne jatenddhoodgi.  16Ne gidak e piny Gilead kod e miech Bashan, kendo e thimSharon nyaka mbape.  17Nying jogo duto nondik e ndalo mag lochh Jothamruodh Juda, kendo Jeroboam ruodh Israel. Weche man kuom jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel18Jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel ne nigi jolweny molonyalufu piero ang’wen gauchiel gi mia abiriyo kod piero auchiel.  Ne gikoregi kuodi gi tong’ kod asere.  19Ne gikedo gi jo-Hagri gi jo-Getur gijo-Nafish kod jo-Nodab.  20Nyasaye nokonyogi e lweny nikech ne giywaknekane gikedo.  Nowinjogi nikech ne gigene, mi ne giloyo jo-Hagri gi jiduto mane jo-Hagri oseriworego.  21Ne gipeyo jamb jo-Hagri, ngamia alufupiero abich gi rombe alufu mia ariyo gi piero abich, kod kenje alufuariyo, kendo ne gimako ji alufu mia achiel.  22Ne ginego ji mang’eny,nikech Nyasaye ema nomiyo lwenyno obedoe.  Bang’e ne gidak e pinyno karjogo, nyaka ndalo mane odargi kiterogi e tuech Babulon ochopo. 23Jo-Manase konchiel nodak e pinyno chakre Bashan nyaka Baal-hermon giSenir kod Got Harmon.  Ne ging’eny, 24kendo jotend dhoutgi ne Efer giIshi gi Eliel gi Azriel gi Jeremia gi Hodavia kod Jadiel.  Ne ginthuondi, kendo joma rahuma.  25To ne giweyo Nyasach kweregi, kagindhogore gi nyisech ogendni mag pinyno mane Nyasaye otieko mondooyawnegi thuolo.  26Omiyo Nyasach Israel nomiyo Pul, ma bende iluongo niTiglath-peleser ruodh Asuria mondo omonj jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kodjo-Manasego.  Nodarogi moterogi nyaka Hala gi Habor gi Hasa kod aoraGozan, kuma gidakie nyaka chil kawuono.
Weche mag Ndalo 6Nyikwa Lawi1Yawuot Lawi ne gin Garshon gi Kohath kod Merari.  2Yawuot Kohath ne ginAmram gi Izhar gi Hebron gi Uziel.  3To yawuot Amram ne Harun gi Nadab giAbihu gi Eleazar kod Ithamar.  4Eleazar nonywolo Finehas to Finehasnonywolo Abishua.  5Abishua nonywolo Buki, to Buki nonywolo Uzi.  6Uzinonywolo Zerahia.  To Zerahia nonywolo Merayoth.  7Merayoth nonywoloAmaria, to Amaria nonywolo Ahitub.  8Ahitub nonywolo Zadok, to Zadoknonywolo Ahimaaz.  9Ahimaaz nonywolo Azaria, to Azaria nonywolo Johanan. 10Johanan nonywolo Azaria, mane jadolo e Hekalu mane Solomon ogeroJerusalem.  11Azaria nonywolo Amaria, to Amaria nonywolo Ahitub, 12Ahitubnonywolo Zadok, to Zadok nonywolo Shalum.  13Shalum nonywolo Hilkia toHilkia nonywolo Azaria.  14Azaria nonywolo Seraya, to Seraya nonywoloJehozadak.  15Kane Nyasaye omiyo Nebukadnezar odaro jo-Juda gijo-Jerusalem koterogi Babulon e tuech, Jehozadak bende noter kodgi.
Yawuot Lawi ne gin Gershon gi Kohath kod Merari. 17Yawuot Gershon ne Libna gi Shimei.  18To yawuot Kohath ne gin Amram giIzhar gi Hebron kod Uziel.  19To yawuot Merari ne Mali gi Mushi.  Dhoutjo-Lawi, kaluwore gi kweregi e magi:20Joka Gershon:Nonywolo Libni, to Libni nonywolo Jahath.  Jahath nonywolo Zima, 21toZima nonywolo Joa.  Joa nonywolo Ido, to Ido nonywolo Zera, to Zeranonywolo Jeatherai. 22Joka Kohath e magi:Kohath nonywolo Abinadab, to Abinadab nonywolo Kora.  Kora nonywolo Asir. 23To Asir nonywolo Elkana, Elkana nonywolo Ebiasaf, to Ebiasaf nonywoloAsir.  24Asir nonywolo Tahath, to Tahath nonywolo Uriel.  Uriel nonywoloUzia, to Uzia nonywolo Shaul.  25Yawuot Elkana ne Amasai gi Ahimoth. 26Ahimoth nonywolo Zofia, to Zofia nonywolo Nahath.  27Nahath nonywoloEliab, to Eliab nonywolo Jeroham, to Jeroham nonywolo Elkana.  28WuodSamuel makayo ne Josef, to jalupne ne Abija. 29Joka Merari e magi:Merari nonywolo Mali, to Mali nonywolo Libni, to Libni nonywolo Shimeito Shimei nonywolo Uza.  30Uza nonywolo Shimea, to Shimea nonywolo Hagia,to Hagia nonywolo Asaya. Daudi oketo jower mag Hekalu31Daudi noyiero jo-Lawi moko mondo obed jotend wer, chieng’ mane Sandukokan e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  32Ne giwer e nyim Hemb Romo nyaka Solomonnotieko gero Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye Jerusalem, kendo ne gitiyo tijegikaka nochanegi.  33Jower kaachiel gi yawuotgi e magi:Kuom joka Kohath, jatend wer ne en Heman ma jathum, ma wuod Joel, wuodSamuel, 34wuod Elkana, wuod Jeroham, wuod Eliel, wuod Toa, 35wuod Zuf,wuod Elkana, wuod Mahath, wuod Amasai, 36wuod Elkana, wuod Joel, wuodAzaria, wuod Zefania, 37wuod Tahath, wuod Asir, wuod Ahiasaf, wuod Kora,38wuod Izhar, wuod Kohath, wuod Lawi, wuod Israel.  39Jalup Heman ne Asafomin mare, mane ochung’ e bade korachwich.  Asaf ne wuod Berakia, ma wuodShimea, 40wuod Mikael, wuod Baaseya, wuod Malkija, 41wuod Ethni, wuodZera, wuod Adaya, 42wuod Ethan, wuod Zima, wuod Shimei, 43wuod Jahath,wuod Gershon, wuod Lawi. 44Joka Merari nochung’ yo koracham.  Jatendgi ne en Ethan wuod Kishi, mawuod Abdi, wuod Maluk, 45wuod Ashabia, wuod Amazia, wuod Hilkia, 46wuodAmzi, wuod Bani, wuod Shemer, 47wuod Mali, wuod Mushi, wuod Merari, wuodLawi.  48Jowetegi ma jo-Lawi nomi tije duto mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye. Nyikwa Harun49To Harun gi dhoode ema ne tiyo tije duto mag Kama Ler Moloyo, kakaMusa jatich Nyasaye nochiko.  Ne gitimo misango e kendo-mar-misango,kendo ne giwang’o ubani e kendo mar ubani, kendo ne gitimo misangomigologo richo mag jo-Israel. 50Joka Harun e magi:Harun nonywolo Eleazar, to Eleazar nonywolo Finehas.  Finehas nonywoloAbishua, 51to Abishua nonywolo Buki, Buki nonywolo Uzi.  To Uzi nonywoloZerahia.  52Zerahia nonywolo Merayoth, to Merayoth nonywolo Amaria, toAmaria nonywolo Ahitub, 53to Ahitub nonywolo Zadok, to Zadok nonywoloAhimaaz. Mier mopog ni jo-Lawi(Joshua
.
-
)54Koro magi e kuonde dak kod gwenge mane omi joka Harun, kane ogoombulu.  Nyikwa Harun ma joka Kohath 55ema nomi Hebron e piny Judakaachiel gi lege mokiewogo.  56To puothe gi mier matindo mag Hebron nomiKaleb wuod Jefune.  57Joka Harun nomi Hebron, dala ma ng’at moneko nyalotonyie, gi Libna gi Jatir gi Eshtomoa 58gi Hilen gi Debir 59gi Ashan kodBeth-shemesh, kaachiel gi legegi.  60To e piny Benjamin joka Harunnoyudoe Geba gi Alemeth koth Anathoth, dala ka dala gi legene.  Kamanojoka Harun noyudo mier apar gadek. 61Joka Kohath moko noyudo mier apar mane opognigi kogo ombulu e pinymane jo-Manase konchiel odakie.  62Joka Gershon noyudo mier apar e pinjemag jo-Isakar gi jo-Aser gi jo-Naftali kod jo-Manase ma nodak e pinyBashan.  63Joka Merari noyudo mier apar gariyo e pinje mag jo-Reuben gijo-Gad kod jo-Zebulun.  64Miergo, kaachiel gi legegi ema ne jo-Israelomiyo jo-Lawi kogo ombulu, 65mana kaka jo-Juda gi jo-Simeon kodjo-Benjamin bende nomiyogi mier mosekwan malogo. 66Dhout jo-Kohath moko noyudo mier kuom jo-Efraim.  67Ne gin Shekem, dalama ng’at moneko nyalo tonyie, manie piny gode mag Efraim, kod Gezer 68giJokmeam gi Beth-horon 69gi Aijalon kod Gath-rimon kaachiel gi legegi. 70Jo-Kohath modong’ noyudo Aner gi Bileam kod legegi e piny manejo-Manase konchiel odakie. 71Joka Gershon noyudo Golan manie piny Bashan gi legene kod Ashtarothbende gi legene e piny mane jo-Manase komachielo odakie.  72To e pinyIsakar ne giyudoe Kedesh gi Daberath 73gi Ramoth kod Anem, kaachiel gilegegi.  74To e piny Asher ne giyudoe Mashal gi Abdon 75gi Hukok kodRekob, kaachiel gi legegi.  76To e piny Naftali ne giyudoe Kedesh-galili,gi Hamon kod Kiriathaim, kaachiel gi legegi. 77Joka Merari modong’ noyudo Rimona gi Tabor, kaachiel gi legegi e pinyZebulun.  78To e piny Reuben man yo wuok chieng’ loka Jordan, momanyoregi Jeriko, ne giyudoe Bezer manie thim, kod Jaza, 79gi Kedemoth kodMefaath, kaachiel gi legegi.  80To e piny Gad ne giyudoe Ramoth-gilead giMahanain 81gi Heshbon kod Jazer, kaachiel gi legegi.
Weche mag Ndalo 7Nyikwa Isakar1Isakar ne nigi yawuowi ang’wen.  Ne gin Tola gi Pua gi Joshub kodShimron.  2To Tola nonywolo Uzi gi Refaya gi Jeriel gi Jamai gi Ibsam kodShemuel.  Ne gin jotend joka Tola, kendo ne gin thuondi marateke endalogi.  E ndalo Daudi kwan-gi ne romo ji alufu piero ariyo gi miaauchiel.  3Uzi nonywolo Izrahia, to Izrahia nonywolo Mikael gi Obadia kodJoel.  4Jodongo abichgo ne nigi mon gi nyithindo mang’eny.  Omiyojolwenjgi ne romo alufu piero adek gauchiel, mane ochan e monje kakadhoutgi obet.  5To jowetegi ma jo-Isakar ne romo ji alufu piero aborogabiriyo.  Giduto ne gin thuondi marateke, kendo joka kwaro. Nyikwa Benjamin6Benjamin nonywolo yawuowi adek.  Ne gin Bela gi Beker kod Jediael.  7ToBela nonywolo yawuowi abich, ma gin Ezbon gi Uzi gi Uziel gi Jerimothkod Iri.  Ne gin jotend dhoutgi, kendo thuondi marateke.  Ne gitelo nijolweny alufu piero ariyo gariyo kod piero adek gang’wen ma joka kwaro. 8Joka Beker ne gi Zemira gi Joash gi Eliezer gi Elioenai gi Omri giJeromoth gi Abija gi Anathoth kod Alemeth.  9Mago e kar romb joka Beker. Ne gin jotend dhoutgi, kendo thuondi marateke.  Ne gitelo ni jolwenyalufu piero ariyo gi mia ariyo, ma joka kwaro.  10Jediael nonywoloBilhan, to Bilhan nonywolo Jeush gi Benjamin gi Ehud gi Kenaana giZethan gi Tarshish kod Ahishahar.  11Jogo duto ne joka Jadiael, kendo negin jotend dhoutgi.  Ne gin gi jolweny marateke alufu apar gabiriyo gimia ariyo motiegore ni lweny. 12Jo Dan ne gin Hushim ma wuode, gi yawuot Aher. Nyikwa Naftali13Yawuot Naftali ne gin Jaziel gi Guni gi Jazer kod Shalum.  Jogo duto negin joka Bilha. Nyikwa Manase14Manase ne nigi dhako ma nyar Aram mane onywolo Makir, wuon Gilead. 15Makir nokendo nyako ma nyinge Maaka.  Wuod Manase mar ariyo neZelofehad, to Zelofehad nonywolo mana nyiri. 16Maaka chi Makir nonywolo wuowi, mochako ni Peresh, to nying owadgiPeresh ne Sheresh.  Sheresh nonywolo Ulam gi Rekem.  17To Ulam nonywoloBedan.  Jogo duto ne joka Gilead, wuod Makir, ma wuod Manase.  18Gilead nenigi nyamin mare ma nyinge Hamoleketh, ma nonywolo Ishdod gi Abiezer kodMala.  19Yawuot Shemida ne gin Abihan gi Shekem gi Liki kod Aniam. Nyikwa Efraim20Jo-Efraim e magi:Efraim nonywolo Shuthela, to Shuthela nonywolo Bered.  Bered nonywoloTahath, to Tahath nonywolo Eleada.  To Eleada nonywolo Tahath, 21toTahath nonywolo Zabad, to Zabad nonywolo Shuthela.  Yawuot Efraim moko negin Ezer gi Elead, mane jo-Gath onego kodhi peyo jamni.  22Efraim wuon-ginoywak ndalo mathoth nyaka owetene nobiro mondo okue chunye.  23Bang’eEfraim noriwore gi chiege, monywolo wuowi.  Nochake ni Beria, (tiende ni,masira), nikech ode noseyudo masira.  24Ne en gi nyako ma nyinge Sheera,ma nogero Beth-horon mamalo kod Uzen-sheera.  25Beria nonywolo Refa, toRefa nonywolo Reshef.  Reshef nonywolo Tela, to Tela nonywolo Tahan. 26Tahan nonywolo Ladan.  Ladan nonywolo Amihud.  Amihud nonywolo Elishama,27to Elishama nonywolo Nun, to Nun nonywolo Joshua.  28Lopgi gi miechgine Bethel gi mier matindo mokiewo kode, kaachiel gi Naaran man yo wuokchieng’.  To yo podho chieng’ ne gin gi Gezer gi Shekem gi Aya, kod miermatindo mokiewo kodgi.  29To jo-Manase ne nigi Beth-shean gi Taanak giMegido kod Dor gi mier matindo mokiewo kodgi.  Ji duto ma nodak e miergone nyikwa Josej wuod Israel. Nyikwa Asher30Jo Asher e magi:Asher nonywolo Imna gi Isva gi Ishvi gi nyamin-gi ma nyinge Sera. 31Yawuot Beria ne gin Heber gi Malkiel.  Malkiel nonywolo Birzaith, 32toHeber nonywolo Jaflet gi Shomer gi Hotham kod Shua ma nyamin-gi. 33Yawuot Jaflet ne gin Pasak gi Bimhal kod Ashvath.  Mago e kar rombyawuot Jaflet.  34To yawuot Shomer owadgi Jaflet ne gin Roga gi Jehubakod Aram.  35Yawuot Hotham ma bende owadgi Jaflet ne gin Zofa gi Imna giShelesh kod Amal.  36Joka Zofa ne gi Sua gi Harnefer gi Shual gi Beri giImra 37gi Beezer gi Hod gi Shama gi Shilisha gi Ithran kod Beera. 38Yawuot Jether ne gin Jefune gi Pispa kod Ara.  39Yawuot Ula ne gin Aragi Haniel kod Rizia.  40Mago duto ne jotend dhout Asher.  Ne gin jolwenymarateke kendo jotend jodongo.  Kar romb jolweny mag dhoutgi ne alufupiero ariyo gauchiel.
Weche mag Ndalo 8Nyikwa Benjamin1Benjamin nonywolo Bela, wuode makayo, gi Ashbel, wuode mar ariyo, giAhiram, wuode mar adek, 2gi Noha, wuode mar ang’wen, kod Rafa, wuode marabich.  3Bela bende nonywolo yawuowi.  Ne gin Adar gi Gera gi Abihud 4giAbishua gi Naaman gi Ahoa 5gi Gera gi Shefufan kod Huram.  6Joka Ehud negin jodong dhoudi ma nodak Geba e ndalo mane odargi kiterogi Manahath etuech.  7Nyinggi ne Naaman gi Ahija kod Gera ma nyinge moro Heglam wuonUza gi Ahihud.  8Shaharaim nonywolo nyithindo e piny Moab, koseriemboHushim gi Baara ma monde.  9Chiege moro ma nyinge Hodesh nonywoloyawuowi, ma nyinggi Jobab gi Zibia gi Mesha gi Malkam 10gi Jeuz giShakia kod Mirma.  Yawuotegi duto ne gin jodong dhoudi. 11Shaharaim bende ne nigi yawuowi mane chiege ma Hushim onywolo.  Ne ginAbitub gi Elpaal.  12Elpaal ema nogero Ono gi Lud kod mier mokiewo kodgi. Yawuot Elpaal ne gin Eber gi Misham gi Shemed 13gi Beria gi Shema 14giAhio gi Shashak kod Jeremoth.  Beria gi Shema ne jodong’ riembo jo-Gath elweny.  Ahio gi Shashak gi Jeremoth 15gi Zabadia gi Arad gi Eder 16giMikael gi Ishpa kod Joha ne gin yawuot Beria.  17To Zebadia gi Meshulamgi Hizki gi Heber 18gi Ishmerai gi Izlia kod Jobab ne gin yawuot Elpaal. 19To Jakim gi Zikri gi Zabdi 20gi Elienai gi Zilethai gi Eliel 21giAdaya gi Beraya kod Shimrath ne gin yawuot Shimei.  22Ishpan gi Eber giEliel 23gi Abdon gi Zikri gi Hanan 24gi Hanania gi Elam gi Antothia 25giIfdeya kod Penuel ne gin yawuot Shashak.  26Shamsherai gi Sheharia giAthalia 27gi Jaareshia gi Elija kod Zikri ne gin yawuot Jeroham.  28Magoe kar romb jodong dhoudi ma nodak Jerusalem. Anywola Saulo(
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)29Jeyel wuon Gibeon nodak Gibeon, to nying chiege ne Maaka.  30Wuod Jeyelmakayo ne Abdon, to yawuote mamoko ne Zur gi Kish gi Baal gi Nadab 31giGedor gi Ahio gi Zeker 32kod Mikloth.  To Mikloth nonywolo Shimea.  Jogobende nodak Jerusalem mokiewo gi owetegi.  33Ner nonywolo Kish, to Kishnonywolo Saulo, to Saulo nonywolo Jonathan gi Malkishua gi Abinadab kodEshbaal.  34Wuod Jonathan ne Meribaal.  Meribaal nonywolo Mika, 35to Mikanonywolo Pithon gi Melek gi Tarea kod Ahaz.  36Ahaz nonywolo Jehoada, toJehoada nonywolo Alemeth gi Azmoth kod Zimri.  Zimri nonywolo Moza, 37toMoza nonywolo Binea.  Binea nonywolo Rafa, to Rafa nonywolo Eleasa,Eleasa nonywolo Azel, 38to Azel nonywlo yawuowi auchiel ma nyinggiAzrikam gi Bokeru gi Ishmael gi Shearia gi Obadia kod Hanan.  Giduto negin yawuot Azel.  39To yawuot Eshek owadgi Ezel ne gin Ulam, wuodemakayo, gi Jeush, wuode mar ariyo, kod Elifelet, wuode mar adek. 40Yawuot Ulam ne gin thuondi molony kuom diro asere.  Ne gin gi yawuowigi nyikwayo mang’eny moromo mia achiel gi piero abich.  Jogo duto ne ginjo-Benjamin.
Weche mag Ndalo 9Jo-Israel mane oduogo e pinygi, koa Babulon(Nehemia
.
-
)1Jo-Israel duto nokwan koluwore gi dhoutgi, kendo ne ondik nyinggi eKitap Ruodhi mag Israel gi Juda kane pok odargi kiterogi Babulon e tuechnikech richogi.
Joma nokwongo dak e miechgi ne gin jo-Israel gi jodolo gi jo-Lawi kodjotich Hekalu.  3To jo-Juda gi jo-Benjamin gi jo-Efraim kod jo-Manasenodak Jerusalem.  4Jo-Juda ne gin Uthai wuod Amihud, ma wuod Omri, wuodImri, wuod Bani, ma achiel kuom nyikwa Perez ma wuod Juda.  5Joka Shelane Asaya ma wuowi makayo, kaachiel gi yawuote.  6Joka Zera ne Jeuel kodowetegi mia auchiel gi piero ochiko. 7Jo-Benjamin ne Salu wuod Meshulam, ma wuod Hodavia, ma wuod Hasenua,8gi Ibneya wuod Jeroham gii Ela wuod Uzi ma wuod Mikra, kod Meshulamwuod Shefatia, ma wuod reuel, wuod Ibnija.  9Jogo kaachiel gi jowetegimane nyinggi ochan, ne romo ji mia ochiko gi piero abich gauchiel. Giduto ne gin jodong dhoudi. 10To jodolo ne gin Jedaya gi Jehoyarid gi Jakin 11gi Azaria wuod Hilkia,ma wuod Meshulam, ma wuod Zadok, ma wuod Merayoth, ma wuod Ahitub manejatelo e Od Nyasaye 12gi Adaya wuod Jeroham, ma wuod Pashur, ma wuodMalkija, kod Maasa wuod Adiel ma wuod Jazera, wuod Meshulam, wuodMeshilemith, wuod Imer.  13Jogo ne nigi owetegi ma jodong dhoudi alufuachiel gi mia abiriyo gi piero auchiel.  Giduto ne gin joma dongo molonye tich Od Nyasaye. 14Jo-Lawi ne Shemaya wuod Hashub wuod Azrikam, wuod Hashabia ja-Merari,15gi Bakbakar gi Heresh gi Galal gi Matania wuod Mika, ma wuod Zikri,wuod Asaf, 16gi Obadia wuod Shemaya, ma wuod Galal, wuod Jeduthun, kodBerekia wuod Asa wuod Elkana, ma nodak gi joka Netola. 17Jorit rangeye ne gin Shalum gi Akub gi Talmon gi Ahiman kod owetegi. To Shalum ne jatendgi.  18Mokwongo noketgi yo wuokchieng’ mar ranga dalaruoth, ka girito rangeye mag kar dak jo-Lawi.  19Shalum wuod Koreah, mawuod Abiasaf, wuod Kora, kaachiel gi owetene ma jo-Kora ne rito rangeyemag Hema Maler kaka kweregi ne rito rangeye mag kambi jo-Ruoth Nyasaye. 20Chon Finehas wuod Eleazar ne jatendgi.  (Ruoth mondo obed kode!)21Zekaria wuod Meshelemia norito ranga Hemb Romo.  22Joma noyier mondoobed jorit rangeye ne gin ji mia ariyo gi apar gariyo, mochan koluworegi miechgi.  Daudi gi Samuel ma janen ema noketogi e tich, nikech ne ginjoma kare.  23Omiyo gin gi yawuotgi, ne girito rangeye Od Ruoth Nyasaye,tiende ni Hema Maler.  24Jorit rangeye nodak e bath Hekalu korwuokchieng’ gi kor podho chieng’ gi kor nyandwat gi kor milambo.  25Toowetegi ma nodak oko e mier ne nyaka bi konyogi rito kuom ndalo abiriyokinde ka kinde.  26Jorit ang’wen ma jotelogo noyier nimar ne gin jomakare.  Ne gin jo-Lawi, kendo ne girito udi gi kuonde keno mag Od Nyasaye. 27Ne gidak ei alwora mar Od Nyasaye, nikech nomigi tich yawo rangeyepile gokinyi. 28Jomoko kuomgi nomi tich rito gik lemo.  Ne gikwano gigo kigologi karkeno, kendo kidwokogi.  29To moko ne rito gik Hekalu kod gik mowal nitich Ruoth Nyaaye, kod mogo mayom gi divai gi mo gi ubani kod gikmang’ue ng’ar.  30To jodolo ema neruwo gik mang’ue ng’argo. 31Ja-Lawi moro ma nyinge Matithia, mane kach Shalum ja-Kora, ema nomitich tedo chapat michiwo ni Nyasaye nikech ne en ng’at makare. 32To owetegi moko ma jo-Kohath nomi tich teto makati e nyim RuothNyasaye, chieng’ Sabato ka Sabato. 33Mago ne jower kendo jodong dhout jo-Lawi.  Ne gidak e udi moko magHekalu.  Ne ok omigi tich moro machielo, nikech nonego gibed moikore nitichgi odiechieng’ gotieno. 34Jogo duto, kaka dhoutgi giwegi nochanogi, ne gin jodong dhout jo-Lawi,kendo ne gidak Jerusalem. Anywola Saulo35Jeyel wuon Gibeon nodak Gibeon, to nying chiege ne Maaka.  36Wuod Jeyelmakayo ne Abdon, to yawuote mamoko ne Zer gi Kish gi Baal gi Ner giNadab 37gi Gedor gi Ahio gi Zekaria kod Mikloth, 38to Mikloth nonywoloShimeam.  Jogo bende nodak Jerusalem mokiewo gi owetegi.  39Ner nonywoloKish, to Kish nonywolo Saulo, to Saulo nonywolo Jonathan gi Malkishua giAbinadab kod Eshbaal.  40Wuod Jonathan ne Meribaal.  Meribaal nonywoloMika, 41to Mika nonywolo Pithon gi Melek gi Terea kod Ahaz.  42Ahaznonywolo Jara, to Jara nonywolo Alemeth gi Azmoth kod Zimri.  Zimrinonywolo Moza, 43To Moza nonywolo Binea.  Binea nonywolo Refaya, toRefaya nonywolo Eleasa.  Eleasa nonywolo Ezel, 44to Ezel nonywolo yawuowiauchiel ma nyinggi ne Azrikam gi Bokeru gi Ishmael gi Shearia gi Obadiakod Hanan.  Mago e kar romb yawuot Azel.
Weche mag Ndalo 10Tho mar Saulo gi yawuote(
Samuel
.
-
)1Noyudo jo-Filistia kedo gi jo-Israel, kendo jo-Israel noringo, kinegogie got Gilboa.  2Jo-Filistia nojuko Saulo gi yawuote ma Jonathan giAbinadab kod Malkishua, kendo ne ginego yawuotego.  3Lweny nohingo Saulo,mi jo-asere noyude, mochiele kendo ohinye.  4Saulo nowacho ni jating’negilweny nita, "Wuodh liganglani inegago, nono to joma kia Nyasayegi,biro nyiera. " To jating’ gilwenje nodagi, nikech noluor ahinya.  EmomiyoSaulo nomako liganglane owuon, mochwoworee.  5To kane jating’ne gilwenyoneno ni Saulo osetho, en bende nochwowore e liganglane, motho.  6KamanoSaulo notho kaachiel gi yawuote adek kod joode duto chieng’ achiel. 7Kane jo-Israel mane odak e holo oneno ni jolweny oseringo, kendo niSaulo gi yawuote josetho, ne gibolo miechgi kanyo, mi gin bende negiringo.  Bang’e jo-Filistia nobiro, modak e miergo. 8Kinyne, kane jo-Filistia obiro dedo joma otho, ne giyudo ringre Saulogi ringre yawuote koriere e got Gilboa.  9Ne gidedo Saulo, kendo neging’ado wiye, mi gikawo gige mag lweny.  Eka ne gioro joote e pinyFilistia duto, mondo oter wach maberno ni nyisechegi, kendo ni jopinygi. 10Ne giketo gi Saulo mag lweny e od nyisechegi, to wiye ne giguro e korhekalu mar Dagon nyasachgi.  11To kane jo-Jabes-gilead owinjo gima nejo-Filistia osetimo ni Saulo, 12thuondgi duto nowuok modhi oomo ringreSaulo gi ringre yawuote.  Ne gikelogi Jabesh, mi giyiko chokegi kuno etiend yath moro, kendo ne gitueyo chiemo kuom ndalo abiriyo.  13KamanoSaulo notho nikech noweyo Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ne ok orito chik Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo kar penjo Ruoth Nyasaye wach, to nodhi mana ir jonyakalondo mondoonyise wach.  14Mano emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nonege, momiyo Daudi wuodJesse lochne.
Weche mag Ndalo 11Oket Daudi ruodh Israel(
Samuel
.
-
)1Bang’e jo-Israel duto nochokore gi Daudi Hebron, mi giwachone niya,"Ng’e ni wan mana remo achiel kodi.  2E ndalo mokadho, kane Saulo podruoth, in ema nitelo ni jo-Israel e lwenjegi duto, kendo Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachi nowachoni niya, ‘Inibed jakwadh joga Israel, kendo in emanibed jatendgi. ’ " 3Kuom mano, jodong Israel duto nobiro Hebron ir ruothDaudi, kendo Daudi notimo kodgi singruok kuno e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, mine giwire gi mo mondo obed ruodh Israel, kaluwore gi wach mane RuothNyasaye omiyo Samuel owacho. Daudi okawo dala mar Sayun(
Samuel
.
-
)
Bang’e Daudi gi jo-Israel duto nodhi Jerusalem, mane iluongo ni Jebuskuma ne jo-Jebus odakie.  5Jo-Jebus gogo nowacho ni Daudi niya, "Oknidonj kaeri!" To kata kamano Daudi nokawo Sayun, dala mane ochielmotegno ahinya.  Tinde iluonge ni Dala Daudi.  6Daudi nosewacho niya,"Ng’at ma nokwong nego ja-Jebus ema nobed jatelo kata jaduong’ lweny. "Joab wuod Zeruya ema nokwongo timo kamano, mi nokete jatelo.  7Daudinodak e dala mochiel motegnono, emomiyo nochak kanyo ni Dala Daudi. 8Nogero udi molwore, kochakore gie ohinga mar Milo, to Joab nolosokuonde mamoko mane okethore e dalano.  9Duong’ mar Daudi koro nomedoreahinya, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ne ni kode. Thuondi mag Daudi(
Samuel
.
-
)10Koro thuondi madongo moloyo, mane konyo Daudi gi tekregi duto mondookete ruoth, kaluwore gi wach mane Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kuom jo-Israel emagi:11Jashobeam ja-Hakmon ne jatend thuondi adek madongo.  En ema nonego jimia achiel gi tong’, odiechieng’ achiel.  12Ng’at mane luwe ne en Eleazarwuod Dodo ja-Ahohi.  13Ne en gi Daudi Pasdamim, kuma ne jo-Filistiaochokoree ni lweny.  Ne nitie puoth shairi kuno.  Jolweny moko dutonoringo jo-Filistia, 14To gin ne gichung’ gineno jo-Filistiago e dierpuodhono, ka girite, kendo ne ginego jo-Filistiago.  Mano e kaka RuothNyasaye noreso jo-Israel, komiyogi loch maduong’. 15Kane jolweny mag jo-Filistia ojot e holo Refaim, ji adek kuom thuondipiero adek madongo nodhi ir Daudi e lwanda man but rogo mar Adulam. 16Kindego Daudi ne nie rogo, to jolweny mag jo-Filistia nosekawoBethlehem.  17Daudi noomo chunye ka siso omake, mowacho niya, "Yaye! Madng’ato kelna pi soko man but ranga Bethlehem mondo amodhi!" 18Ekathuondi adekgo nomwomo oganda mar jo-Filistia.  Ne gidhi omo pi sokono,mi gikelo ni Daudi, to nodagi modho pigno, moole piny ka misango niRuoth Nyasaye, 19kowacho niya, "Nyasaye mondo orita kik amodh pigni,nikech ochalo mana remb jogo mane odhi ome koyie wito ngimagi. " Manoemomiyo Daudi notamore modhe.  Gik makamago ema thuondi adekgo ne timo. 20Abishai omin Joab ema ne jatend thuondi piero adekgo.  Nonego ji miaadek gi tong’, mi nobedo ng’at marahuma kuom thuondigo.  21Ne en rahumamoloyo kuomgi, mobedo jatendgi, to kata kamano ne ok ochopo e rang’inymag ji adek kande. 22Benaya wuod Jehoyada, thwon Kabzeel marahuma, nosetimo timbe thwonmang’eny.  Bende nonego thuond Moab ariyo.  Chieng’ moro, kane kodh peosechue, nolor e bur moro, monegoe sibuor.  23Bende en ema nonegoja-Misri marabet mane borne romo mita ariyo gi nus.  Ja-Misrino ne nigitong’ machal gi lodi, to Benaya nodhine gi odunga.  Noyudho tong’ e lwetja-Misrino, monegego.  24Timbe machal kamago ema ne Benaya wuod Jehoyadaoyudogo huma kaachiel gi thuondi piero adek kande.  25Ne en rahuma moloyoji piero adekgo, to kata kamano ne ok ochopo e rang’iny mag thuondi adekmadongo kande.  Daudi nokete jatend joge mag lweny mane rito ng’imane. 26Thwond jolweny mag Daudi ne gin Asahel omin Joab, gi Elhanan wuod Dodoja-Bethlehem, 27gi Shamoth ja-Horad, gi Helez ja-Pelon, 28gi Ira wuodIkesh ja-Tekoa, gi Abiezer ja-Anathoth, 29gi Sibekai ja-Hushath, gi Ilaija-Ahohi, 30kod Maharai gi Heled wuod Baana ma jo-Netofa, 31gi Benjamin,gi Benaya ja-Pirathon, 32gi Hurai ma ja-Gaash, piny aore, gi Abielja-Beth-araba, 33gi Azmoth ja-Bararim, gi Eliaba ja-Shaalbon, 34giHashem ja-Gizon, kod Jonathan wuod Shagee, 35gi Ahiam wuod Sakar majo-Harar, gi Elifal wuod Ur, 36gi Hefer ja Mekera, gi Ahija ja-Pelon,37gi Ezbai, 38gi Joel owadgi Nathan, gi Mibhar wuod Hagri, 39gi Zelek jaAmon, gi Naharai ja Beerroth, mane jating’ gi lweny mag Joab wuodZeruya, 40kod Ira gi Gareb ma jo-Ithri, 41gi Uria ja-Hiti, kod Zabadwuod Alai.  42Jatend thuondi piero adekgo ne Adina wuod Shiza ja-Reuben,ma jatend jo-Reuben.  43Jomoko mane ni kodgi ne gin Hanan wuod Maaka, giJoshafat ja-Mithni, 44gi Uzia ja-Asheteroth, kod Shama gi Jeyel yawuotHotham ja-Aroer, 45kod Jadiael wuod Shimri gi Joha owadgi, ma jo-Tizi,46gi Eliel ja-Mahav, kod Jeribai gi Joshavia yawuot Elnaam, gi Ithmaja-Moab, 47kod Eliel gi Obed kod Jaasiel jo-Zoba.
Weche mag Ndalo 12Thuond Daudi mane ni kode Ziklag1Koro magi e joma nobiro Ziklag ir Daudi kane Saulo wuod Kish oseriembee nyime.  Gin bende ne gin thuondi mane konyo Daudi lweny.  2Ne ginyalodiro asere kata bayo orujre gi bat korachwich kata gi bat koracham.  Negin jo-Benjamin, dhoodgi Saulo.  3Jotendgi ne Ahiezer, gi Joash owadgi,ma yawuot Shemaa ja-Gibea, kod Jeziel gi Pelet yawuot Azmoth, kod Berakagi Jehu jo-Anathoth, 4gi Ishmaya ja-Gibeon ma achiel kuom jotend thuondipieradekgo, kod Jeremia gi Jahaziel gi Johanan gi Jozabad ja-Gedera, 5giEluzai gi Jerimoth gi Bealia gi Shemaria gi Shefatia ja-Haruf, 6kodElkana gi Ishia gi Azereel gi Joezer gi Jashobeam jo-Kora, 7kod Joela giZebadia yawuot Jeroham ma ja-Gedor. 8Jo-Gad moko bende nobiro ir Daudi kane enie rogo e thim.  Ne gin jomarateke motiegore ni lweny, mong’eyo kedo gi kuodi kod tong’.  Ne giger kasibuoche, kendo tiendgi ne yot ka tiend mwanda maringo e got.  9Ezer nejatendgi, to Obadia jalupne, eka Eliab mar adek, 10Mishmana mar ang’wen,Jeremia mar abich, 11Atai mar auchiel, Eliel mar abiriyo, 12Johanan maraboro, Elzabad mar ochiko, 13Jeremia mar apar, Makbanai mar apargachiel.  14Joka Gadgo ne jodong oganda lweny.  Ng’at matinie moloyokuomgi muche ne romre gi much ji mia achiel, to much ng’at maduong’moloyo ne romre gi much ji alufu achiel.  15Jogo ema nong’ado aora Jordane due mokwongo kane opong’ moo, kendo oimo genge duto.  Ne giriembo jiduto ma nodak e holni man yo wuok chieng’ gi yo podho chieng’ maraorano. 16Jomoko kuom jo-Benjamin gi jo-Juda bende nobiro ir Daudi e rogo. 17Daudi nowuok romonigi, mowachonigi niya, "Ka usebiro ira kaka osiepemondo ukonya, to arwakou gi mor.  To ka ubiro ni mondo undhoga, kendouketa e lwet wasika, to onge gima aseketho, to Nyasach kwerewa mondo onewachno, kendo ong’adnu bura. " 18Eka Roho nolor kuom Amasai, jatendthuondi piero adek kande mowacho niya,"Wan kodi!Wan jogi, wuod Jesse. Wamosi! Wamosi!Wamoso jakonyni bende!En Nyasachi makonyi. "Eka Daudi norwakogi, moketogi kuom joge mag lweny. 19Kane Daudi dhi gi jo-Filistia mondo giked gi Saulo, jo-Manase mokonoweyo Saulo modok ni Daudi.  Kata kamano Daudi ne ok okonyo jo-Filistia,nimar kane jotendgi oseporo wach, ne giriembe.  Ne giwacho niya, "Dipokondhogowa kodok ni Saulo ma ruodhe, mi okelnwa masira. " 20Jo-Manase manodok ni Daudi kane odhi Ziklag, ne gid Adna gi Jozabad gi Jadiael giMikael gi Jozabad gi Elihu kod Zilthai.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomgi nejatend jolweny alufu achiel mag jo-Manase.  21Gin ema ne gikonyo Daudikedo gi joma ne monje, nimar giduto ne gin thuondi mager, kendo Daudinoketogi jotend jolweny.  22Ji ne medo biro ir Daudi odiechieng’kodiechieng’ mondo okonye, nyaka ne gidoko oganda mang’ongo mar jolweny. Thuond Daudi mane ni kode Hebron23Jolweny ma nobiro Hebron ir Daudi mondo okaw loch Saulo omi Daudi kakaRuoth Nyasaye nosewacho e magi: 24Jo-Juda mane oting’o kuodi gi tong’ nealufu auchiel gi mia aboro.  25Jo-Simeon ma thuondi mager ne alufuabiriyo gi mia achiel.  26Jo-Lawi ne alufu angwen gi mia auchiel27kaachiel gi Jehoyada jaduong’ dhood Harun, mane nigi ji alufu adek gimia abiriyo, 28kod Zadok, wuowi mathwon kendo mager, mane nigi jodonglweny piero ariyo gariyo moa e dhoodgi.  29Jo-Benjamin, ma owete Saulo,ne romo ji alufu adek, to ji mang’eny kuomgi nopandore kuom dhood Saulonyaka thone.  30Jo-Efraim ne thuondi alufu piero ariyo gi mia aboro, mangi huma e dhoutgi.  31Jo-Manase konchiel mane oyier mondo obi oket Daudiruoth ne romo alufu apar gaboro.  32Jo-Isakar ne gin joma riek kuom nyisojo-Israel gima onego gitim, kendo kinde monego gitimee.  Ne gin jotelomia ariyo, ma nobiro gi jolwenjgi.  33Jo-Zebulun ne jolweny molony alufupiero abich man gi gi lweny mopogore opogore.  Ne gin thuondi mager mangi chuny achiel.  34Jo-Naftali ne jotend jolweny alufu achiel gi ji alufupiero adek gabiriyo moting’o kuodi gi tong’.  35Jo-Dan ne ji alufu pieroariyo gaboro gi mia auchiel moikore ni lweny.  36Jo-Asher to ne ji alufupiero ang’wen mochwiny kendo moikore ni lweny.  37To joma noa loka Jordankuom jo-Reuben gi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel ne gin ji alufu miaachiel gi piero ariyo, ma noting’o kit gilweny duto. 38Jolweny maratego duto nobiro Hebron gi chuny achiel ni nyaka giketDaudi ruodh jo-Israel duto.  Jo-Israel modong’ bende ne nigi paro achielmar timo kamano.  39Ne gibet kuno gi Daudi kuom ndalo adek, ka gichiemokendo gimetho, nikech jowetegi noseikonigi gik moko duto.  40Bende jomanokiewo kodgi, chakre piny Isakar gi Zebulun kod Naftali nokelonigichiemo mane giting’o gi kenje gi ngamia gi nyumbu kod ruedhi.  Ne ginmogo gi olembe mag ng’owo gi mag mzabibu motwo mong’in kod divai gi mo,kaachiel gi dhok kod rombe mang’eny ahinya, nikech mor mane nitie eIsrael.
Weche mag Ndalo 13Daudi dwaro kelo Sanduk mar Nyasaye Jerusalem1Daudi noporo wach gi jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo, kod joteloduto.  2Nowacho ni jo-Israel mane ochokore niya "Ka wachni bernu, kendoen dwaro mar Nyasachwa, to mondo waor joote ir jo-Israel wetewa dutomodong’ dala, kendo ir jodolo gi jo-Lawi ma nopognigi mier man gi lege,mondo obi irwa.  3Eka mondo waom Sanduk mar Nyasaye obed kodwa, nimar newajwang’e e ndalo Saulo. " 4Mi oganda duto noyie timo kamano, kendowachno ne ber ni piny duto. Daudi odhi omo Sanduk mar Nyasaye(
Samuel
.
-
)
Omiyo Daudi nochoko jo-Israel duto kanyakla, chakre aora Shihor nyakakama idonjogo Hamath, yo nyandwat, mondo giom Sanduk mar NyasayeKiriath-jearim.  6Mi Daudi gi jo-Israel duto nodhi Baala, ma bendeiluongo ni Kiriath-jearim, manie piny Juda, mondo giomie Sanduk marNyasaye miluongogo nying Ruoth Nyasaye, mobet kuom kerubi kaka ruoth bete kom duong’ne.  7Ne gigolo Sanduk mar Nysaye e od Abinadab, ka giting’ee gari manyien.  Uza gi Ahio ema ne chiko garino.  8Daudi gi jo-Israel tone jomiel gi tekregi duto e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, ka giwer, kendo gigoyothumbe gi nyidwonge gi ongeng’o kod tung’. 9To kane gichopo kar dino mar Kidon, dhok mane ywayo gari nochwanyore,mi Uza norieyo bade mondo ojuk Sanduk mane oyudo dhi podho.  10To RuothNyasaye nokecho kode, mochwade nikech nomako Sanduk, mi notho kanyo enyim Nyasaye.  11Daudi nokecho nikech Nyasaye nomwomore kuom Uza.  Omiyonochako kanyo ni Perez-uza, (tiende ni, mwomruok kuom Uza. ) Pod iluongekamano nyaka chil kawuono.  12Daudi noluoro Nyasaye chieng’no, mowachoniya, "Kara Sanduk mar Nyasaye ok onego kel e dalana!" 13Omiyo ne okokelo Sanduk e dalane, to nobaro kode, motere e od Obed-edom ma ja-Giti. 14Sanduk mar Nyasaye nodong’ e hembe but od Obed-edom kuom dueche adek. Mi Ruoth Nyasaye noguedho od Obed-edom kod gige duto. Dholuo DC Bible © Bible Society of Kenya and Bible Society of Tanzania,
.
Weche mag Ndalo 14Hiram ruodh Turo oyie gi Daudi(
Samuel
.
-
