)1Hiram ruodh Turo nooro joote ir Daudi gi yiend sida, kaachiel gi jogedomag kite kod jopa bao, mondo oger ni Daudi ot.  2Koro Daudi nong’eyo nikara Ruoth Nyasaye osekete ruodh Israel kendo osetego lochne ahinyamondo oguedhgo joge Israel. Nyithind Daudi mane onywol Jerusalem(
Samuel
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)3Daudi nokendo mon moko Jerusalem, mi nomedo nywolo yawuowi gi nyiri. 4Nying nyithindo mane onywolo kuno e magi: Shamua gi Shobab gi Nathan giSolomon 5gi Ibhar gi Elishua gi Elphet 6gi Noga gi Nefeg gi Jafia 7giElishama gi Beeliada kod Elifelet. Daudi oloyo jo-Filistia(
Samuel
.
-
)8Kane jo-Filistia owinjo ni osewir Daudi mondo obed ruodh Israel duto,ne gibiro kar rombgi mondo gimonje.  To kane Daudi owinjo kamano, nowuokmondo orad kodgi.  9Noyudo ka jo-Filistia osemonjo joma odak e HoloRefaim.  10Daudi nopenjo Nyasaye wach niya, "Kadhi kedo gi jo-Filistia,inichiwgi e lweta koso?" Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "Dhiyo! Nachiwgi elweti. " 11Mi Daudi nodhi Baal-perazim, momonjogi, kendo oloyogi.  Ekanowacho niya, "Nyasaye osemiyo amwomo wasika mana kaka aora mwomogenge. " Mano emomiyo nochak kanyo ni Baal-perazim, (tiende ni ruodhmwomruok. ) 12Jo-Filistia noringo moweyo nyisechegi kanyo, mi Daudinogolo chik, mowang’gi. 13Chieng’ machielo jo-Filistia nochako omonjo holo cha.  14Daudi nochakoopenjo Nyasaye wach, mi Nyasaye nodwoke niya, "Kik ichomgi tir, to ng’adyo ka ng’egi, mondo imonjgi kama omanyore gi yien maboyo kande. 15Kiwinjo mutni ewi yien, machalo gi mutni mar ji mawuotho, to imonjjolweny mag jo-Filistia, nimar asetelo nyimi mondo adhi alogi. " 16Daudinotimo kaka Nyasaye nochike, mi jo-Israel noriembo jo-Filistia, chakreGibeon nyaka Gezer.  17Humb Daudi nolak e pinje duto, kendo Ruoth Nyasayenomiyo ogendini duto oluore. Dholuo DC Bible © Bible Society of Kenya and Bible Society of Tanzania,
.
Weche mag Ndalo 15Daudi okelo Sanduk mar Nyasaye jerusalem(
Samuel
.
-
)1Daudi nomedo gero udi e Dala Daudi, kendo noloso kama Sanduk marNyasaye nyalo betie, mogurone hema.  2Eka nochiko ni onge ng’at moro manyalo ting’o Sanduk mar Nyasaye mak mana jo-Lawi kende nimar gin ema neNyasaye oyierogi mondo giting’e, kendo gitine nyaka chieng’.  3Bang’mano, Daudi nochoko jo-Israel duto Jerusalem mondo giter Sanduk marRuoth Nyasaye kuma noselosone.  4Nochoko bende joka Harun kod jo-Lawikanyakla.  5Ne gin joka Kohath mia achiel gi piero ariyo, mane Urielotelonigi, 6gi joka Merari mia ariyo gi piero ariyo, mane Asayaotelonigi, 7gi joka Gershom mia achiel gi piero adek, mane Joelotelonigi, 8gi joka Elizafan mia ariyo mane Shemaya otelonigi, 9gijo-Hebron piero aboro, mane Eliel otelonigi, 10kod joka Uziel mia achielgapar gariyo, mane Aminadab otelonigi.  11Eka Daudi noluongo Zadok giAbiathar ma jodolo kod Uriel gi Asaya gi Joel gi Shemaya gi Eliel kodAminadab ma jo-Lawi.  12Nowachonigi niya, "Un ma un jodong dhout Lawi,pwodhreuru kaachiel gi oweteu mondo uter Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel kuma aseikone.  13Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ne omwomorekuomwa e kinde mokwongo, nikech ne ok untie mondo uting’ Sanduk, kendonikech ne ok warite kaka owinjore. " 14Omiyo jodolo gi jolawi nopwodhoremondo oter Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel kama noseikne. 15Jo-Lawi noting’o Sanduk mar Nyasaye e gokgi gi ludhe, koluwore gi wachNyasaye kaka Musa nochiko. 16Daudi nochiko jotend jo-Lawi bende mondo oyier owetegi ma jower molonykendo mong’eyo goyo thumbe mopogore opogore mamit.  17Omiyo jo-Lawinoyiero Heman wuod Joel, gi Asaf wuod Berekia ma owadgi.  To kuom owetegima joka Merari ne giyiero Etham wuod Kushaya.  18Owetegi mane jolupgi etich ne Zekaria gi Jaaziel gi Benaya gi Maaseya gi Matithia gi Elifelehukod Mikneya, kaachiel gi Obed-edom kod Jeyel ma jorit rangeye.  19Hemangi Asaf kod Etham ma jower noyierr mondo ogo ongeng’o mag mula, 20toZekaria gi Jaaziel gi Shemiramoth gi Jehiel gi Uni gi Eliab gi Maaseyakod Benaya noyier mondo ogo nyigwerni.  21Matithia gi Elifelehu giMikneya gi Obed-edom gi Jeyel kod Azazia noyier mondo ogo thumbe, kagitelo ni jower.  22Kenania ma jatend jo-Lawi ema notelo ni wer nikechnolonyie.  23To Berekia gi Elkana ne jorit dhout od Sanduk.  24Shebania giJehoshafat gi Nethaneel gi Amasai gi Zekaria gi Benaya kod Eliezer majodolo ne goyo tung’ e nyim Sanduk mar Nyasaye.  Obed-edom gi Jehia bendene jorit dhout Sanduk. 25Bang’ mago Daudi gi jodong Israel kod jotend lweny mane rito jo-lwenyalufu achiel, nodhi gi mor mondo oom Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye e odObed-edom.  26Ne gitimo misango gi ruedhi abiriyo kod imbe abiriyo, nimarNyasaye ne konyo jo-Lawi ma noting’o Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye. 27Daudi gi jo-Lawi duto ma noting’o Sanduk, kaachiel gi jower norwakoaroche mag bafta.  Daudi norwako law dolo mar bafta bende.  28Kamanojo-Israel nokelo Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye ka gigoyo sigalagala gitung’ gi oporo gi ongeng’o gi nyigwerni kod thumbe.  29Kane Sanduk ochopoe dala Daudi, Mikal nyar Saulo nong’icho gie dirisa moneno ruoth Daudika miel kendo tugo, mi nochaye gi chunye.
Weche mag Ndalo 161Ne gikelo Sanduk mar Nyasaye mi giketo ei hema mane Daudi ogurone.  Ekane gitimo misengni miwang’o pep kod misengni mag kue e nyim Nyasaye. 2Kane Daudi osetieko timo misengnigo, noguedho jo-Israel e nying RuothNyasaye, 3kendo nopogonigi chiemo giduto.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato ma dichwokata madhako noyudo makati achiel gi ring’o kod olembe mar mzabibu motwomong’in. 4Daudi noyiero jo-Lawi moko mondo oti e nyim Sanduk mar Ruoth Nyasaye,ka gigoyone erokamano, kendo gipake ka giparego.  5Jotendgi ne gin Asaf,to jalupne ne Zekaria, to moko ne gin Jaaziel gi Shemiramoth gi Jehielgi Matithia gi Eliab gi Benaya gi Obed-edom gi Jeyel mane jogo nyigwernigi thumbe.  Asaf ne goyo ongeng’o, 6to Benaya gi Jahaziel ma jodolo negoyo tung’ odiechieng’ thole e nyim Sandug Muma mar Nyasaye. Wend Daudi ma ogoyogo ni Nyasaye erokamano(Zaburi
.
-
;
.
-
;
.
-
)7Chiengno ema ne Daudi okwongo chikoe Asaf gi owetene mondo opak RuothNyasaye gi wendni:13Un nyikwa Israel,jotich Ruoth Nyasaye. Adier, un yawuot Jakobo,jotichne moyier,8gouru erokamano ni Ruoth Nyasaye. Luonguru nyinge,kendo landuru humb timbene ni ogendini duto. 9Pakeuru gi wende kod zaburi,10bende paruru timbene madongo duto. Moruru nikech nyinge ler. Joma dwaro Ruoth Nyasaye mondo obed mamor!11Dwaruru Ruoth Nyasaye mamiyou teko. Dwareuru ndalo duto. 12Paruru honni gi timbe madongo mosetimo,kaachiel gi buche moseng’ado14En e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwakendo tekone okwako piny ngima. 15Noparo singruokne manyaka nenema nosik kuom tienge gana gi gana,
mane otimo ni Ibrahim. Bende noparo kuong’ruok mane okuong’orego ni Isaka,
kod singruok mane otimo ni Jakobo. En singruok mochwere ni Israel. 18Nowacho niya,"Anamiyi piny Kanaan mondo obed mwanduni gi nyikwayi. "19Ne pod gin ji manok ahinya,kendo jodak adaka e pinyno. 20Ne giwuotho e kind ogendinika gidak kuonde mopogore opogore.
Ruoth Nyasaye ne ok oyiemondo ng’ato otimnigi tim mamono,nikech noherogi. To nokwero ruodhi,kowachonigi niya,
"Kik umul joga maseyiero,kendo kik utim ni jonabi maga marach. "23Weruru ni Ruoth Nyasaye,un ji duto modak e piny,kendo pile ka pile,landuru kaka olocho. 24Huluru ni ogendini duong’ne malermondo ji duto owinj timbene madongo. 25Ruoth Nyasaye duong’,kendo nyaka pake malich!Adier, nyaka miye duong’,moloyo nyiseche mamoko duto,26nikech nyiseche mag ogendini mamokogin mana gik manono,Ruoth Nyasaye to nochweyo polo. 27Duong’ maler gi duong’ mar loch okete dier,kendo teko gi ber duto ni kar dakne. 28Un ji duto modak e piny,pakuru Ruoth Nyasaye!Dendeuru nikech duong’ne gi tekone. 29Miuru nyinge duong’ mowinjore kodekendo keluru chiwo,ubigo e nyime!Ka Ng’ama Ler othinyore,30to un ji duto manie piny,kulreuru e nyime kutetni!En ema oseguro piny motegno,ma ok onyal ng’ingni31Un polo gi piny,beduru gi mor,kendo un ji,nyisuru ogendni ni,"Ruoth Nyasaye e Ruoth!"32In nam wuo,kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iyi. Un pewe, beduru mail,kaachiel gi gik moko duto ma un-go33Kendo yien duto mae bunge,mondo okog gi more nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,nikech obiro mondo orit piny.
Gouru erokamano ni Ruoth Nyasaye,nikech ober,kendo herane mosiko ochwere. 35Wachuru kama:Reswa, in Nyasaye ma jawarwaChokwa, kendo reswakuom ogendni mag piny,mondo wago erokamano ni nyingi maler,kendo wayud mor kwapaki. 36Odend Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasach Israel higni gi higni. Eka ji duto nowacho niya, "Amin!" kendo ne gipako Ruoth Nyasaye. Daudi oketo jo-Lawi moko mondo orit Sanduk mar Nyasaye37Daudi noweyo Asaf kod owetene e nyim Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye,mondo giti kanyo ndalo duto, kaka ne dwarore odiechieng’ kodiechieng’. 38To noketo Obed-edom wuod Jeduthun kod Hosa mondo obed jorit dhoutHema.  Obed-edom gi owetene ne gin ji piero auchiel gaboro.  39Daudinoweyo bende Zadok jadolo kod owetene ma jodolo e Hema mar RuothNyasaye, mane nie hembko mar Gibeon, 40mondo gitim ni Ruoth Nyasayemisengni miwang’o pile okinyi godhiambo e kendo-mar-misango kaka ondikie kitap chik mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo jo-Israel.  41Daudi nomiyo Heman giJeduthun kod jomoko mane oyier kendo oluong gi nyingegi ni mondo obedjower magoyo erokamano ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma herane mosiko ochwere. 42Heman gi Jeduthun ne nigi tung’ gi ongeng’o kod kit thumbe mokomipakogo Nyasaye.  To yawuot Jeduthun noket jorit dhoudi.
Bang’e ji duto noa modhi miechgi.  Daudi bende nodhi mondo one joode.
Weche mag Ndalo 17Nyasaye otimo singruok gi Daudi(
Samuel
.
-
)1Kane Daudi osechako dak e ode mane ogero, nowacho ni Nathan janabiniya, "Koro an adak e ot moger maber gi yiend sida, to Sandug Muma marRuoth Nyasaye nie hema. " 2Nathan nodwoko Daudi niya, "Tim duto midwaro,nikech Nyasaye ni kodi. "3To gotienono, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro ni Nathan niya,
"Dhi inyisDaudi jatichna ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya: ‘In ok ema nigerna ot mondoadagie.  5Chakre ndalo mane agoloe jo-Israel e piny Misri nyaka chilkawuono, pok adak e ot, to asebet kadak e hema.  6Kuonde duto maneawuothoe gi jo-Israel, ne ok apenjo achiel kuom jobura mane aketo mondoobed jokwadh joga Israel gimomiyo ok gigerona ot mar yiend sida. ’ 7Bendeinyis Daudi ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho kama: ‘Nagoloie lek kuma nikwayoe rombe, mondo ibed jatend joga Israel.  8Asebet kodikuonde duto midhiye, kendo asetiekoni wasiki duto.  Abiro miyo nyingibedo gi huma, ka humb joma dongo mag piny, 9kendo abiro miyo joga Israelpinygi giwegi.  Anagurgi kuno, mi gidagie mak othaggi kendo.  Jomahundu oknochak ochandgi kaka ne chandogi chon, 10chakre ndalo mane aketoe joburamondo orit joga Israel, to natiek wasiki duto.  An Ruoth Nyasaye anamiyiduong’, kendo anaguedh dhoodi mondo osiki.  11Kisetho, miluwo kwereni,anaket achiel kuom yawuoti kari, kendo anagur lochne obed motegno.  12Enema nogerna ot, kendo anami lochne osik nyaka chieng’.  13Anabedne kawuon mare, to enobed ka wuoda.  Ok nagol herane kuome, kaka ne agolo kuomjal mane okuongoni bedo ruoth, 14to anami obed motegno, kendo anamilochne gurre kuom joga nyaka chieng’. ’’15Nathan nonyiso Daudi weche duto mane ofwenyne, 16mi ruoth nodhi e nyimRuoth Nyasaye, mobet piny.  Nowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, an ng’a, kosodhooda en ang’o, momiyo imiya duong’ kama? 17A Nyasaye, gima isetimonapod in ikwano ka gima tin, nimar bende isewacho ni dhooda nosik kuomndalo mang’eny, kendo isenyisa kaka tienge ma biro nochal.  18A RuothNyasaye, in ema ing’eya oko gi iye.  Ang’o ma damed wachoni kuom duong’ma isemiya? 19Isemiya duong’ ma kama nikech ihera, kendo nikech mano emaidwaro.  20A Ruoth Nyasaye, pok wawinjo ni nitie Ruoth Nyasaye moromachal kodi.  Onge Nyasaye machielo, to mak mana in.  21Ere oganda moro epiny, machalo gi jogi Israel? Bende nitie jopiny moro mane isedhi miwaroe tich wasumbni, miloko jogi? Isemiyo nyingi duong’ kuom timbe madongokendo malich nikech iseriembo ogendi moko mondo owe thuolo ni jogi maneireso kigolo e piny Misri.  22Niloko jo-Israel mondo obed jogi nyakachieng, kendo in Ruoth Nyasaye, ema isedoko Nyasachgi.  23To koro RuothNyasaye, mi singruok misetimona kaachiel gi dhooda mondo osik nyakachieng’, kendo ichop gima isewacho.  24Singruoknino mondo ogurre, kendonyingi oyud duong’ nyaka chieng’, ka ji wacho niya, ‘Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto, ma Nyasach Israel en Nyasachgi adier!’ Kamanodhooda nodongi e nyimi.  25In, Nyasacha, isenyisa ni ibiro dongo oda. Kuom mano asebedo gi chir mondo alem e nyingi.  26A Ruoth Nyasaye, in eNyasaye kendo isesingorina maber kama.  27Emomiyo, Ruoth Nyasaye, yieiguedh oda mondo osik e nyimi nyaka chieng’, nimar gima iseguedho, nobedgi hawi ndalo duto. "
Weche mag Ndalo 18Daudi omedo pinye(
Samuel
.
-
)1Bang’e Daudi noloyo jo-Filistia, mi gibedo moboch, kendo nomayogi Gathgii mier mokiewo kode.  2Noloyo jo-Moab bende, mi gibet e bwo lochne,kendo ne gigolone osuru. 3Bende Daudi noloyo Hadadezer ruodh Zoba-hamath, kane ruodhno dhi chungorapar mar lochne e lweny but aora Yufrate.  4Daudi nomaye geche lwenyalufu achiel, kendo nomako joidh farese alufu abiriyo, kod jolweny mokoalufu piero ariyo.  Nong’ado odond farese duto mag geche lweny, moweyomana farese mia achiel.  5To kane jo-Aram moa Damaski obiro mondo okonyHadadezer ruodh Zoba, Daudi nonego ji alufu piero ariyo gariyo kuomgi. 6Eka noketo askeche ma jorit e piny jo-Aramgo, mi ne gibedo e bwolochne, kendo ne gigolone osuru.  Kuonde duto mane Daudi dhiye, RuothNyasaye ne miyo olocho.  7Daudi noyako gilweny mag dhahabu mane joritHadadezer oting’o mokelo Jerusalem.  8Bende noyako munde mathoth ahinya eTibhath kod Kun ma miech Hadadezer.  Mundego ema ne Solomon olosogo gimane iluongo ni Nam gi sirni kod gik moko duto mitiyogo e Hekalu. 9Kane Tou ruodh Hamath owinjo ni Daudi oseloyo jolweny mag Hadadezer,10nooro Hadoram wuode ir ruoth Daudi mondo omose, kendo opake kuom loyoHadadezer nimar Hadadezer ne jasik Tou.  Hadoram nokelo ni Daudi gik mokomag dhahabu gi mag fedha kod mag mula.  11Magi bende ruoth Daudi nochiwoni Ruoth Nyasaye, kaachiel gi fedha kod dhahabu ma noyako kuom ogendnimamoko duto mane oseloyo, kaka jo-Edom gi jo-Moab gi jo-Amon gijo-Filistia kod jo-Amalek.
Abishai wuod Zeruya nonego jo-Edom alufu apar gaboro e holo Kado. 13Noketo askeche ma jorit e piny Edom, mi jo-Edom duto nobet e bwo lochDaudi.  Kuonde duto mane Daudi dhiye, Ruoth Nyasaye ne miyo olocho. Jodong Daudi(
Samuel
.
-
;
.
-
)14Daudi nobedo ruodh Israel duto, morito piny gi kue, kong’ado bura kareni joge duto.  15Joab wuod Zeruya ne jatend jolweny, to Jehoshafat wuodAhilud ne jachan weche.  16Zadok wuod Ahitub kod Ahimelek wuod Abiatharne jodolo, Savsha to ne jagoro.  17Benaya wuod Jehoyada ne jatendjo-Kereth kod jo-Peleth, kendo yawuot Daudi ne jodongo ma konye.
Weche mag Ndalo 19Daudi oloyo jo-Amon gi jo-Aram(
Samuel
.
-
)1Bang’e, Nahash ruodh jo-amon notho, mi wuode nodoko ruoth kare.  2Daudinowacho niya, "Abiro timo ni Hanun wuod Nahash maber, mana kaka wuonmare notimona maber. " Omiyo Daudi nooro joote mondo oduog chunye kuomtho wuon mare.  To kane joote Daudi ochopo e piny jo-Amon, mi gidhi irHanun mondo giduog chunye, 3jodong Amon nowacho ni Hanun niya, "Bendeiparo ni Daudi oseoro jogi mondo omi wuoru duong’ adier? Ooyo, gibiromana ni mondo gicheng pinywa, eka oyud yo ma onyalo loyego. " 4Kuom mano,Hanun nomako joote Daudi molielo tikgi, kendo ong’ado lepgi nyabathe,chakre nungogi kalor piny.  Bang’e noriembogi.  5Kane Daudi owinjo gimaotimore, nooro ji mondo oromnigi, nikech ne giyudo wichkuot maduong’. Nowacho ni mondo gibed jeriko mondi, nyaka yie tikgi dongi, eka giduogi. 6Hanun gi jo-Amon noneno ni gisemiyo Daudi ojok kodgi, omiyo ne giorofedha moromo kilo alufu piero adek mondo giholgo geche lweny gi jomadidhgi kuom jo-Aram-naharaim gi jo-Aram-Maaka kod jo-Zoba.  7Ne giwakoruodh Maaka gi jolwenje kendo ne giholo gechene mag lweny alufu pieroadek gariyo, mi jogo nobiro mojot but Madeba.  Jo-Amon bende nowuok emiechgi, kendo ne giyworo ni lweny.  8Kane Daudi owinjo wachno, nooroJoab kod joma rateke duto mondo oked kodgi.  9Jo-Amon nowuok, mi negiriedo ni lweny e dhoranga dala, to ruodhi mane obiro konyogi nochanoree pap. 10Joab noneno ni lweny olwore, omiyo noyiero thuond jo-Israel moko,mochano kochomo jo-Aram.  11To jomoko duto modong’, noketi e lwet Abishaiowadgi, ka gichomo jo-Amon.  12Nowachone niya, "Kineno ka jo-Aram tekmadwaro loya, to nyaka ibi ikonya.  To ka jo-Amon dwaro loyi, eka nabiakonyi.  13Bed gi chir, waked matek ni jowa, kendo ni miech Nyasachwa.  ToRuoth Nyasaye mondo otim gima oneno ni ber. " 14Kamano Joab gi jogenorado gi jo-Aram, moriembo.  15Kane jo-Amon oneno ni jo-Aram ringo, ginbende ne giringo Abishai owadgi Joab, mi gidonjo e dalagi.  Eka Joabnodok Jerusalem. 16To kane jo-Aram oneno ni jo-Israel oseloyogi, ne gioro joote mondooluong jo-Aram mane odak loka aora Yufrate, mi ne gibiro, ka Shobak majatend oganda lweny mar Hadadezer otelonigi.  17Kane Daudi oyudo wach nigibiro, nochoko jolwenj Israel duto kanyakla, mi giidho loka Jordanmondo gikanigi.  Jo-Aram bende noriedo ni lweny, kochomo Daudi gi jogi,mi ne girado.  18To jo-Israel noloyogi, mi giringo, kendo Daudi gi jogenonego joidh farese alufu abiriyo, gi jolweny mamoko alufu pieroang’wen.  Shobak bende notho.  19Kane jo-Hadadezer oneno ni jo-Isareloloyogi, ne giywagre ni Daudi, mi gibedo e bwo lochne.  Bang’ mano,jo-Aram nodagi konyo jo-Amon kendo.
Weche mag Ndalo 20Daudi okawo dala mar Raba(
Samuel
.
-
)
E ndalo chakruok oro, mane ruodhi thoro wuokie kadhi kedo, Joab nowuokgi jolwenje, mogoyo jo-Amon asasa.  Ne gichopo Raba, kendo ne gilwore, toDaudi nodong’ Jerusalem.  Joab noloyo Raba, moketho chuth.  2To Daudinogolo osimbo ewi Milkom ma nyasach jo-Amon, mi nosidhe e wiye owuon. Pek mar dhahabu molosego noromo kilo piero adek, kendo kidi ma nengonetek ne ochom kuome.  Bende Daudi noyako gik mathoth e dalano, 3kendonodaro joma odakie, moketo e tich payo bao gi kunyo kite kod tong’oyien.  Kamano e kaka Daudi notimo ni miech jo-Amon duto.  Eka nodokJerusalem gi joge duto. Joma rabede mane thuondi Daudi onego(
Samuel
.
-
)4Bang’ mano, lweny nowuok Gezer e kind jo-Israel gi jo-Filistia, tojo-Israel noloyo jo-Filistia.  E lwenyno, Sibekai ja-Husha nonego Saf, maja-Refaim.  5Lweny nowuok kendo e kindgi gi jo-Filistia, mi Elhanan wuodJakir nonego Lami owadgi Goliath ma ja-Giti, ma bond tong’e ne chalolodi.  6Lweny nochako owuok Gath, kama ne nitie ng’at ma gana maraboraman gi lith lwedo auchiel gi lith tielo auchiel koni gi koni, duto pieroariyo gang’wen.  Jalo bende ne ja-Refaim.  7To kane othiano ni jo-Israel,Jonathan wuod Shimea owadgi Daudi nonege.  8Jogo duto ne jo-Refaim, toDaudi gi joge nonegogi duto.
Weche mag Ndalo 21Daudi okwano jo-Israel gi jo-Juda(
Samuel
.
-
)1Koro Satan ne dwaro hinyo jo-Israel, mi nosundo Daudi mondo okwan gi. 2Omiyo Daudi nochiko Joab gi jodong oganda ni mondo odhi okwanjo-Isarel, chakre Dan yo nyandwat, nyaka Beer-sheba yo milambo, kendomondo onyise kar rombgi.  3To Joab nodwoke niya, "Kata da bed ni RuothNyasaye omedo joge nyadi mia achiel, donge giduto digibed jotichne?Ang’o momiyo idwaro kwanogi? Gima kamano biro mana miyo jo-Israel dokojoketho!" 4Kata kamano, ruoth nochuno Joab momiyo owuotho e pinyjo-Israel duto.  Bang’e nodwogo Jerusalem 5monyiso Daudi kar romb ji.  Epiny Israel ne nitie ji tara achiel gi alufu mia achiel (
,
,
)manyalo kedo, to e piny Juda ne nitie ji alufu mia ang’wen gi pieroabiriyo (
,
), ma bende nyalo kedo.  6To Joab ne ok okwano jo-Lawi gijo-Benjamin, nikech nosin gi chik ruoth. 7To gima nosetimore ne ok long’o ni Nyasaye, mi nokumo jo-Israel.  8EkaDaudi nowacho ni Nyasaye niya, "Aseketho ahinya kuom gima asetimo.  Tokoro akwayi ni mondo iwena richona, nikech asetimo gima ofuwo. " 9MiRuoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Gad jakor wach mar Daudi niya,
"Dhiyo, inyisDaudi ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama: ‘Aketo gik moko adek e nyimi: yierachiel kuomgi monego atimni. ’ " 11Omiyo Gad nodhi ir Daudi mowachoneniya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni mondo iyier achiel kuom gik moko adekgi:12Higni adek mag kech kata dueche adek ma wasiki lawoue kendo negou,kata ndalo adek ma Ruoth Nyasaye owuon kelonu tho ka dera marach biro epiny kendo malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nego ji e piny Israel duto.  Koronyisa gima dadwok Jal ma noora. " 13Daudi nodwoko Gad niya, "An gi masiramaduong’, to ber mondo abed e lwet Ruoth Nyasaye, nimar ng’wonone duong’gi lala.  To kik abed e lwet dhano. "14Omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nooro tho malit kuom jo-Israel, monego ji alufupiero abiriyo.  15Nyasaye nooro malaika mondo oketh Jerusalem, to kaneoneno ka malaika kethe, noloko parone kuom masira mane odwaro kelo,omiyo nowacho ni malaika mane nego ji niya, "Oromo! Koro duok lweti. " Tonoyudo ka malaikano ochung’ but kar dino mar Ornan ja-Jebus.  16Daudinong’iyo malo moneno malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye kochung’ e kind polo gipiny ka en gi ligangla e lwete ma nodwaro tiekogo Jerusalem.  Daudi gijodonge noriere piny auma ka girwakore gi pien gugru.  17Daudi nowacho niNyasaye niya, "An ema nagolo chik mondo okwan ji, kendo an e jakwathmosebedo ka timo marach.  Rombe machandoregi to otimo ang’o? A RuothNyasaye ma Nyasacha, akwayi ni an ema mondo ikuma kod dhoodwa, to igeng’tho malitni kik mak jogi. "18Eka malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Gad mondo ochik Daudi odhikar dino mar Ornan ja-Jebus, ogerie kendo-mar-misango ji Ruoth Nyasaye. 19Omiyo Daudi notimo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo Gad owachone, modhikanyono.  20To Ornan noyudo diemo ngano.  Kane oting’o wang’e, nonenomalaika, to yawuote ang’wen mane ni kode noringo mopondo.  21Kane Daudiochopo machiegni, Onan nowichore, kendo ka noneno ruoth, nowuok oa kardino.  Nodhi mogoyo chonge piny e nyim Daudi mokulore nyaka e lowo. 22Daudi nowachone niya, "Yie ing’iew kar dinoni gi nengo makare, mondoagerie kendo-mar-misango ni Ruoth Nyasaye, mondo tho manego joga orum. "23Onan nodwoko Daudi niya, "Ruodha, kawe, kendo itim kode gima idwaro. To bende ruedhi minyalo timogo misango, kod yien mag dino minyalochwako, kaachiel gi ngano minyalo timogo misango mar mogo, eki amiyiduto!" 24To ruoth Daudi nodwoko Onan niya, "Ooyo, abiro mana ng’iewe ginengo makare, ok nakaw giri ami Ruoth Nyasaye, kata timone misango gigima ayudo nono. " 25Kuom mano, Daudi nong’iewo kar dinono gi Onan kuomdhahabu moromo kilo abiriyo.  26Eka nogero ni Ruoth Nyasayekendo-mar-misango kanyono, motimoe misengni miwang’o pep gi mag sawo,kolamo Ruoth Nyasaye.  Mi Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoke gi mach moa e polo,molwar e kendo-mar-misango.  27Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko malaika mondoodwok ligangla e olalo. Daudi oyiero kama ibiro geroe e Hekalu28Kane Daudi oneno ni Ruoth Nyasaye oseneno kwayone mane okwayo kar dinomar Ornan ja-Jebus, nochako timo misango kanyo.  29Kata obedo ni endalogo Hema Maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye kod kendo-mar-misango mane Musaoloso e thim ne pod ni e hembko man Gibeon, 30Daudi ne ok odhi kanyomondo openj Ruoth Nyasaye wach, nikech ligangla mar malaika mar RuothNyasaye nobwoge.
Weche mag Ndalo 221Omiyo koro Daudi nowacho niya, "Ma e kama od Ruoth Nyasaye nobedie,kaachiel gi kendo ma jo-Israel notimie misango. "Daudi oiko gik mibiro gerogo Hekalu2Daudi nogolo chik mondo ochok jodak duto manie piny Israel.  Ekanoketogi mondo gipa kite kendo giger Od Nyasaye.  3Bende noiko nyinyomodhuro mondo olosgo musmande gi teke miriwogo dhoudi, kaachiel gi mulamokalo apima 4kod yiend sida mak kwan, nimar jo-Sidon gi jo-Turonokelone yiend sida mang’eny.  5Daudi nowacho niya, "Solomon wuoda podrawera mayot, to ot midwaro gero ni Ruoth Nyasaye onego obed mabermiwuoro, kendo ma humbe olak e pinje duto.  Omiyo nyaka aikne gik gedo. "Kuom mano Daudi noiko gik mogundho ka pok otho. 6Bange noluongo Solomon wuode, mochike ni mondo oger ot ni Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasach Israel, 7kowacho niya, "Solomon wuoda, nachano mondo ager otmamiyogo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha duong’.  8To Ruoth Nyasaye nokwera,kawachona niya, ‘Isechuero remo mang’eny, kendo isekedo lwenje madongo enyima, omiyo ok nigerna ot.  9To ininywol wuowi ma lochne nobed gi kue. Anamiye kue, kamiyogi yueyo e ndalone.  10En ema nogerna ot.  Enobedwuoda, kendo anabed wuon mare, mi nagur lochne e Israel nyaka chieng’. ’11Koro wuoda, Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi obed kodi, kendo oguedhi, mondoigerne Hekalu, kaka nosingore.  12Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi mondo omiyirieko duto mondo irit chikne koseketi ruodh Israel.  13Inibed gi hawimana kimako chik kod buche Ruoth Nyasaye mane Musa omiyo jo-Israel.  Bedgi chir, kendo gi jing’o! Kik chunyi nyosre, kata kik ibed jaluoro.
"Kata obedo ni an gi thagruok mang’eny, to koro aseiko ni Od RuothNyasaye dhahabu ma dirom kilo tara adek, kod fedha moromo kilo tarapiero adek gabich, kaachiel gi mula kod nyinyo mokadho apima.  Yien gikite bende aseiko.  In bende nyaka imed moko.  15To bende in gi jotichmang’eny, kaka jopa kite gi jogedo gi jopa bao, kod jotich moko mathoth16molony e tije mopogore opogore mag dhahabu gi fedha gi mula kodnyinyo.  Omiyo koro chak tich, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye mondo obed kodi!"17Daudi nochiko jodong Israel ni mondo okony Solomon wuode, kowachoniginiya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ni kodu.  Osemiyou kue kuonde duto,kendo osechiwo joma odak e pinyni e lweta, mi koro giyie loch RuothNyasaye gi joge.  19Omiyo koro keturu chunyu gi parou kuom dwaro RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu.  Chakuru gero Hekalu ni nying Ruoth Nyasaye mondoSandug Muma mare, kod gik maler mitiyogo kilame, oyudie kar bet. "
Weche mag Ndalo
Kane Daudi koro oseti, kendo hike oniang’, noyiero Solomon wuode mondoobed ruodh Israel. Daudi opogo jo-Lawi gi jodolo e migepegi mag tich2Nochoko jodong Israel duto kaachiel gi jodolo kod jo-Lawi.  3Jo-Lawimachwo ma johigni piero adek kata moloyo kanyo nondik nyinggi, mi karrombgi noromo alufu piero adek gaboro.  4Alufu piero ariyo gang’wenkuomgi noket mondo oti e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, to alufu auchiel mondo obedjotelo kod jong’ad bura, 5to alufu ang’wen noket jorit dhorangeye, kendoalufu ang’wen mondo opak Ruoth Nyasaye gi thumbe mane Daudi oloso. 6Daudi nopogogi e migepe miluongo gi nying Gershon gi Kohath kod Merari,ma yawuot Lawi. 7Yawuot Gershon ne gin Laadan kod Shimei.  8Laadan nonywolo yawuowi adek,ma nyinggi Jehiel, ma nodoko jatelo, gi Zetham kod Joel.  9Mago ne jotenddhout Laadan.  10Yawuot Shimei ne gin ang’wen, ma nyinggi Jahath gi Zizagi Jeush kod Beria.  11Jahath ne en jatelo, to Ziza ne jalupne.  Jeush giBeria nokwan kaka dhoot achiel, nikech nyithindgi ne nok. 12Yawuot Kohath ne gin angwen, ma nyinggi Amram gi Izhar gi Hebron kodUziel.  13Yawuot Amram ne gin Harun kod Musa.  To Harun gi dhoode nowal nimondo oti tich dolo ni Ruoth Nyasaye, ka gichiwone gik maler, kendotimone misango, kendo guedho ji e nyinge nyaka chieng’.  14To joka Musa,ng’at Nyasaye, ne okwan kuom jo-Lawi.  15Yawuot Musa ne Gershom kodEliezer.  16Kuom joka Gershom, Shubael nobedo jatelo, 17to kuom jokaEleazer, Rehabia ema notelo.  Eleazer ne onge yawuowi moko, to Rehabiawuode nonywolo yawuowi mang’eny.  18To kuom joka Izhar, Shelemoth nejatelo.  19Yawuot Hebron ne gin Jeria mane obedo jatelo, gi Amariajalupne, gi Jahaziel mar adek, kod Jekameam mar ang’wen.  20Yawuot Uzielne gin Mika, ma nobedo jatelo, kod Ishia jalupne. 21Yawuot Merari ne gin Mali kod Mushi.  To yawuot Mali ne gin Eleazar kodKish.  22Eleazar notho, moweyo nyiri lilo, kendo owetegi ma yawuot Kishnokendogi.  23Yawuot Mushi ne gin adek, ma nyinggi Mali gi Eder kodJeremoth. 24Mago ne gin jo-Lawi, ma nyinggi ochan kaluwore gi nying jodongdhoutgi.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomgi ma hike piero ariyo kata moloyo kanyo,nomi tich e Od 25Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech Daudi nosewacho niya, "RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel osemiyo joge kue, kendo koro Jerusalem e kardakne nyaka chieng’.  26Omiyo koro jo-Lawi ok onego oting’ Sanduk katagik lemo moko mitiyogo kode. " 27Kuom wechene mogikgo, Daudi nochikomondo ondik jo-Lawi ma hikgi piero ariyo kata moloyo kanyo.  28Tichgi neen konyo joka Harun tiyo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  Nomigi tich rito udi mag OdNyasaye gi alworane, kendo lwoko gik lemo duto, kod tiyo tije moko dutomag Od Nyasaye.  29Ne giiko makati miketo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye pile, kodmogo mayom mitimogo misango, gi makati ma ok ketie thowi kod chapat gikek moko mikonyruokgo e lemo, kendo ne girito gik mipimogo gik moko. 30Ne onego giti e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye pile, okinyi godhiambo, ka gipakekendo gigoyone erokamano.  31Ne gikonyo bende joma ne timo misangomiwang’o pep ni Ruoth Nyasaye e ndalo Sabato, kendo ka due opor, kendoen ndalo moketi, kaka nochan-gi.  32Jo-Lawi nomi bende tich rito HembRomo, kod Kama Ler, to joka Harun owetegi ema nomi tich dolo e Od RuothNyasaye.
Weche mag Ndalo 241Migepe mag joka Harun e magi: Yawuot Harun ne gin Nadab gi Abihu giEleazar kod Ithamar, 2to Nadab kod Abihu notho motelo ni wuon-gi, kendone ok giweyo yawuowi.  Kuom mano joka Eleazar kod joka Ithamar kende emanobedo jodolo.  3Daudi nochanogi e migepe mondo opognigi tich, ka Zadokjaka Eleazar gi Ahimelek jaka Ithamar konye.  4Jodong joka Eleazar neng’eny moloyo joka Ithamar, omiyo dhood Eleazar ne nigi jodongo apargauchiel, to dhood Ithamar jodongo aboro.  5Nochan-gi gi ombulu, nimar nenitie jodong Hekalu, ma tindeni jodong Nyasaye, kuom joka Eleazar, kendokuom joka Ithamar bende.  6Ja-Lawi moro ma jagoro, ma nyinge Shamaya wuodNethaneel nondiko nyinggi duto e nyim ruoth gi jodonge gi Zadok jadologi Ahimelek wuod Abiathar, kaachiel gi jotelo mag dhout jodolo kodjo-Lawi. 7Ombulu mokwongo noyiero Jehoyarib, mar ariyo noyiero Jedaya, 8to maradek Harim, mar ang’wen Seorim, 9mar abich Malkia, mar auchiel Mijamin,10mar abiriyo Hakoz, mar aboro Abija, 11mar ochiko Jeshua, mar aparShekania, 12mar apar gachiel Eliashib, mar apar gariyo Jakim, 13mar apargadek Hupa, mar apar gang’wen Jeshebeab, 14mar apar gabich Bilga, marapar gauchiel Imer, 15mar apar gabiriyo Hazir mar apar gaboro Hapizez,16mar apar gochiko Pethahia, mar piero ariyo Jehezekel, 17mar pieroariyo gachiel Jakin, mar piero ariyo gariyo Amul, 18mar piero ariyogadek Delaya, to mar piero ariyo gang’wen Maazia.  19Mano e kakanochan-gi mondo giti e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kaluwore gi chik mane RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel omiyo Harun kwargi. 20To jo-Lawi moko e magi: Shubael, jaka Amram, gi Jedaya jaka Shubael,21gi Ishia jatend joka Rehabia, 22gi Shelemoth jaka Izhar, gi Jahathjaka Shelemoth.  23Kuom dhood Hebron, Hebron ne jatelo, Amaria jalupne,Jahaziel mar adek, kendo Jekameam mar ang’wen.  24Jomoko ne gin Mika jakaUziel, gi Shamir jaka Mika, 25gi Ishia owadgi Mika, gi Zekaria jakaIshia, 26gi Mali gi Mushi kod Jaazia, joka Merari, 27gi Beno gi Shohamgi Zakur kod Ibri, yawuot Jaazia, 28gi Eleazar jaka Mali mane onge giyawuowi, 29gi yawuot Kish ma joka Kish, gi Jeremeel, 30kod Mali gi Ederkod Jerimoth ma joka Mushi.  31Mago e dhout jo-Lawi.  Dhoudigo dutomadongo kod matindo kanyakla, nogoyo ombulu kaachiel gi owetegi ma jokaHarun e nyim ruoth Daudi gi Zadok gi Ahimelek kod dhout jodolo gijo-Lawi.
Weche mag Ndalo 25Daudi opogo jower e migepegi mag tich1Daudi gi jodonge nowalo yawuot Asaf gi yawuot Heman gi yawuot Jeduthunni tich lemo, mondo gikor wach ka gigoyo thumbe gii nyigwerni kodongeng’o.  Joma nomi tijno e magi: 2Yawuot Asaf ne gin Zakur, gi Josef giNethania kod Asarela.  Jatendgi ne Asaf mane jakor wach ni ruoth.  3YawuotJeduthun ne gin Gedalia gi Izri gi Isaya gi Shimei gi Hashabia kodMatithia.  Jatend ji auchielgo ne Jeduthun wuon-gi, mane koro wach kagigoyo thum, kendo ka gigoyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye erokamano ka gipake. 4Yawuot Heman janen mar ruoth, ne gin Bukia gi Natania gi Uziel giShubael gi Jerimoth gi Hanania gi Hanani gi Eliatha gi Gidalti giRomamti-ezer gi Joshbekasha gi Malothi gi Hothir kod Mahazioth.  5Jogoduto ne yawuot Heman mane Nyasaye omiye mondo opakego, kaka nosesingore. Nyasaye nomiyo Heman yawuowi apar gang’wen kod nyiri adek, 6to giduto negikonyo wuon-gi wer e Od Ruoth Nyasaye e kinde mag lemo.  To Daudi owuonema ne chiko Asaf gi Jeduthun kod Heman e tijegi.  7Jogo duto, kaachielgi owetegi ma nolony kuom wer ni Ruoth Nyasaye, ne gin mia ariyo gipiero aboro, 8ne gipogo tijgi gi ombulu, kendo ne giwer ka gikikore,jomadongo gi jomatindo, molony kod mapuonjore kaachiel. 9Joma noyier gi ombulu ne magi: Mokwongo ne Josef, 10mar ariyo Gedalia,11mar adek Zakur, mar ang’wen Izri, 12mar abich Nethani, 13mar auchielBukia, 14mar abiriyo Asarela, 15mar aboro Isaya, 16mar ochiko Matania,17mar apar Shimei, 18mar apar gachiel Azareel, 19mar apar gariyoHashabia, 20mar apar gadek Shubael, 21mar apar gang’wen Matithia, 22marapar gabich Jeremoth, 23mar apar gauchiel Hanania, 24mar apar gabiriyoJoshbekasha, 25mar apar gaboro Hanani, 26mar apar gochiko Malothi, 27marpiero ariyo Eliatha, 28mar piero ariyo gachiel Hothir, 29mar piero ariyogariyo Gidalti, 30mar piero ariyo gadek Mahazioth, 31to mar piero ariyogangwen Romamti-ezer.  Jogo duto ombulu ema noyiero.  Ng’ato ka ng’atokuomgi ne nigi ji apar gariyo ma yawuote kata owetene.
Weche mag Ndalo 26Jorit rangeye kod jotend tich mag Hekalu1Magi e migepe mag jorit rangeye: Joka Kora ne gin Meshelemia wuod Korema wuod Ebiasaf.  2Yawuot Meshelemia ne gin Zakaria wuod Makabayo, giJediael mar ariyo, gi Zebedia mar ang’wen, 3gi Elam mar abich, giJehohanan mar auchiel, kod Elioenai mar abiriyo.  4Nyasaye noguedhoObed-edom momiye yawuowi ma nyinggi Shemaya wuode makayo, gi Jehozabadmar ariyo, gi Joa mar adek gi Sakar mar ang’wen, gi Nathaneel mar abich,5gi Amiel mar auchiel, gi Isakar mar abiriyo, kod Peulthai mar aboro. 6Shemaya wuod Obed-edom nonywolo yawuowi ma nobedo jotelo kuom joodgi,nikech ne gin gi rieko.  7Yawuot Shemaya gogo ne gin, Othni, gi Refael giObed kod Elzabad, to ominene ma bende ne nigi rieko ne gin Elihu giShemakia.  8Mago duto ne gin joka Obed-Edom.  Gin kaachiel gi owetegi kodyawuotgi, ne gin joma riek kendo mowinjore kod tich Hekalu.  Giduto negin ji piero auchiel gariyo.  9Yawuot Meshelemia kod owetene ne gin jiapar gaboro ma bende ne nigi rieko.  10Yawuot Hosa ja-Merari ne ginShimri mane Hosa oketo jatelo, kata ne ok en kayo kamano, 11gi Hilkiamar ariyo, gi Tebalia mar adek, kod Zekaria mar ang’wen.  Kar romb yawuotHosa kaachiel gi owetene ne apar gadek. 12Jodong dhoudi ema notelo ni migepe mag jorit rangeye.  Tijgi ne en tiyoe Od ruoth Nyasaye kaachiel gi owetegi.  13Dhoudi madongo gi matindonogoyo ombulu e kindgi giwegi mondo gipog tich rito rangeye.  14Ombuklumar rangach man yo wuok chieng’ nolwar kuom Shemelia.  Eka ne gigoyoombulu ni wuode Zekaria, ma jabura mariek, moyudo rangach man yonyandwat.  15Obed-edom noyudo rangach man yo milambo, to yawuote noyudotich rito od keno.  16Hosa noyudo rangach man yo podho chieng’ kod rangaShekeleth man e yo maidho.  17Arita duto noket machalre.  Ndalo duto,jo-Lawi auchiel ne rito rangach man yo wuok chieng’ to ang’wen ne ritoman yo nyandwat, kendo ang’wen man yo milambo, to ariyo ariyo ne rito odkeno ka od keno.  18Ji auchiel ne rito laru mochiel gi sirni man yo podhochieng’.  Ang’wen kuomgi ne rito yo michopogo e laruno, to ariyo ne ritolaru hie.  19Mago ne e migepe mag joka Kora gi joka Merari mane ritorangeye. 20Jo-Lawi moko ne rito od keno mag Od Nyasaye kod kuonde mikanoe chiwomomi Ruoth Nyasaye.  21Kuom nyikwa Laadan ma jaka Gershon 22Jehiel kodowetene ma Zetham gi Joel ema ne rito kuonde keno mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye. Ne gin jotend dhout Laadan jaka Gershon.  23Kuom dhout Amram gi Izhar giHebron kod Uziel 24Shubael jaka Gershom ma wuod Musa ne jatend joritkuonde keno.  25To Shelemoth wuod Zikri, ma wuod Joram, ma wuod Isaya, mawuod Rehabia, ma wuod Eliezer, ne jatend joka Eliezer owadgi Gershom,26Shelemothno kaachiel gi owetene ema ne rito udi mikanoe chiwo maneDaudi gi jodong dhoudi, gi jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo, kodjotend jolweny moko osechiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  27Ne giwalo gik moko kuomgik mane ope e lweny mondo otigo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  28Bende gik maneSamuel janen, gi Saulo wuod Kish, gi Abner wuod Ner, kod Joab wuodZeruya ochiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ne nie lwet Shelemoth kod owetene nikechgin ema ne girito gik moko duto mochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  29Kuom jokaIzhar, Kenania kod yawuote ne gin jogoro gi jong’ad bura e piny Israel. 30Kuom joka Hebron, Hashabia kod owetene ema nobedo jotend jo-Israelmodak yo podho chieng’ mar aora Jordan, ka ging’iyo tich Ruoth Nyasayekod tich ruoth.  Ne gin ji mariek, moromo alufu achiel gi mia abiriyo. Jeria ne en jatend joka Hebron-go.  31E higa mar piero ang’wen mar lochDaudi, nonon anywola joka Hebron, kendo noyud ni kara joma riek ma nodakJezer-gilead ne gin joka Hebron.  32Ruoth Daudi noketo jodong dhoudimariek alufu ariyo gi mia abiriyo ma joodgi Jeria mondo orit jo-Reubengi jo-Gad kod jo-Manase konchiel e yore duto mag tich Nyasaye kod tichrito piny.
Weche mag Ndalo 27Jotend piny Israel1Koro magi e nying jo-Israel mane rito migepe apar gariyo mane tiyo tichRuoth duto, ka giwilore due ka due e higa ngima.  Ne gin jodong dhoudi gijotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo, kaachiel gi jondiko maggi.  Migawoka migawo ne nigi ji alufu piero ariyo gang’wen. 2Jotelo mokwongo ne Jeshobeam wuod Zabdiel ma notiyo e due mokwongo.  3Neen nyakwar Perez, kendo ne en jatend jodong lweny duto e due mokwongo. 4To Eleazar wuod Doidai ja-Ahohi ema notelo e due mar ariyo.  5Jatelo maradek ne en Benaya jatend ogend lweny, ma wuod Jehoyada jadolo maduong’. 6Benaya nogo ne en achiel kuom thuondi piero adek kande, kendo ne enjatendgi.  To Amizabad wuode ema norito migape.  7Jatelo mar due marang’wen ne en Asahel omin Joab.  Bang’ thone, Zebadia wuode nokawo kare. 8Jatelo mar due mar abich ne en Shamhuth jaka Zera. 9Jatelo mar due mar auchiel ne en Ira wuod Ikesh ja-Tekoa.  10Jatelo mardue mar abiriyo ne en Helez ja-Pelon ma ja-Efraim.  11Jatelo mar due maraboro ne en Sibekai jaka Zera, ma ja-Husha.  12Jatelo mar due mar ochikone en Abiezer ja-Anathoth manie piny Benjamin.  13Jatelo mar due mar aparne en Maharai jaka Zera, ma ja-Netofa.  14Jatelo mar due mar apar gachielne en Benaya ja-Pirathon manie piny Efraim.  15To jatelo mar due mar apargariyo ne en Heldai jaka Othniel ma ja-Netofa.  Jotelogo duto ne tiyo dueachiel achiel, kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato ne nigi migawo moromo ji alufupiero ariyo gang’wen. 16Jotend dhout Israel nene e magi: Kuom jo-Reuben, Eliezer wuod Zikri nejatelo, to kuom jo-Simeon, jatelo ne Shefatia wuod Maaka.  17Kuom jo-Lawine ne Hashabia wuod Kemuel.  Kuom joka Harun ne en Zadok.  18Kuom jo-Judane en Elihu ma wat Daudi.  Kuom jo-Isakar ne en Omri wuod Mikael.  19Kuomjo-Zebulun ne en Ishmaya wuod Obadia.  Kuom jo-Naftali ne en Jerimothwuod Azriel.  20Kuom jo-Efraim ne en Hoshea wuod Azazia.  Kuom jo-Manasekonchiel ne en Joel wuod Pedaya, 21to kuom jo-Manase komachielo ma nodakGilead, jatelo ne en Ido wuod Zekaria.  Kuom jo-Benjamin ne en Jaasielwuod Abner.  22To kuom jo-Dan ne en Azareel wuod Jeroham.  Mago e kar rombjotend dhout Israel.
Daudi ne ok okwano joma hikgi pok ochopo piero ariyo, nikech RuothNyasaye nosesingore ni nomi jo-Israel bedo mang’eny ka sulue mae polo. 24Joab wuod Zeruya nochako kweno, to ne ok otieko.  Kwenono nokelo mirimbNyasaye kuom jo-Israel, omiyo ne ok ondik kar rombgi e Kitap Weche magNdalo mag loch ruoth Daudi. 25Azmoth wuod Adiel ne jarit kuonde keno mag ruoth.  Jonathan wuod Uziato ne rito kuonde keno manie mier madongo gi matindo, kendo e miechlweny mochiel gi ohinga.  26Ezri wuod Kelub to ne rito jotich puodho. 27Shimei ja-Rama to ne rito jotich puothe mag mzabibu, to Zabdija-Shefem ne rito olemb mzabibu milosogo divai.  28Baal-hanan ja-Geder nerito yiend zeituni gi ng’owo mae pewe.  Joash to ne rito udi mikanoe mo. 29Shitrai ja-Sharon ne jarit kweth dhok mane kwayo Sharon, to Shafatwuod Adlai ne rito mago mane kwayo e holni.  30Obil ja Ishmael ne jakwathngamia, to Jedaya ja-Meronoth ne jarit kenje.  31Jaziz ja-Hagar ne jaritjamni matindo.  32Jehiel ja-Hakmon, gi Jonathan owadgi wuon Daudi majabura mariek kendo mosomo, ema nopuonjo yawuot Daudi.  33Ahithofel nejabuch ruoth, to Hushai ja-Arki ne osiep ruoth.  34Bang’ tho Ahithofel,Jehoyada wuod Benaya kod Abiathar ne jokawo kare.  To Joab ne jaduong’jolweny.
Weche mag Ndalo 28Daudi omiyo Solomon tich gero Hekalu1Daudi nochoko jotend Israel duto Jerusalem.  Ne gin jodong dhoudi, gijotend joma ne tiyo ni ruoth, gi jotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo,gi joma ne rito mwandu kod jamb ruoth gi mag yawuote, kaachiel gijong’ad bura gi thuondi kod joge duto mane nigi teko.  2Eka Daudinochung’ mowacho niya, "Winjuru owetena gi jothurwa.  Ne achano mondoager ot ma Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye nyalo betie, mondoo obed ratentiend Nyasachwa.  Omiyo ne aiko gik moko duto ma dagerego.  3To Nyasayenowachona niya, ‘Ok inigerna ot, nikech in ijalweny, kendo isechweroremo. ’ 4Kata kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel noyiera kuom joodwaduto mondo abed ruodh Israel nyaka chieng’, nikech dhood Juda ema nomiyoloch, to kuom dhood Juda, od wuora ema noyiero, to kuom yawuot wuora anema noyiera, mi oketa ruodh Israel.  5Ruoth Nyasaye osemiya yawuowimang’eny, to kuom yawuowigo duto, Solomon ema oseyiero mondo obed ruodhIsrael, korito jo-Ruoth Nyasaye.  6Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, ‘Solomonwuodi ema aseyiero mondo ogerna ot gi lache, nikech aseyiere mondo obedwuoda to an abed wuon mare.  7Korito chikna kaka iritogi sani, to anagurlochne nyaka chieng’. ’ 8To koro akwayou uduto e nyim Nyasaye, kendo enyim jo-Ruoth Nyasaye duto ni mondo unon matut chike mag Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachu, mondo piny maberni osik maru, kendo uweye kodong’ ninyithindu nyaka chieng’.
"To in Solomon wuoda, par Nyasach wuoru, kendo ichiwri mondo itine gichunyi duto, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ng’iyo chuny ji duto, kendo ofwenyoparo mag dhano.  Kidware, to iniyude, to kiweye, to enojwang’i nyakachieng’.  10Emomiyo par malong’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye oseyieri ni mondo igerot moyangne.  Bed gi jing’o kendo igere!"11Daudi nonyiso Solomon wuode kit gedo mar agoch Hekalu kod utene, gi utkeno gi ut gorofa gi udi maiye, kod raum mar Sandug Muma, miluongo nikar-ng’wono.  12Nonyise bende paro ma en go kuom gero laru mag Od RuothNyasaye, gi udi mane olwore, gi ut keno mag Od Nyasaye kod udi manokanie mich maler mochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  13To bende nonyise kakaodwaro mondo ochan jodolo gi jo-Lawi e migepegi, kendo opognigi tijeduto mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye kendo kaka onego los gik mitiyogo e lemo. 14Bende nonyise pek mar dhahabu gi fedha monego losgo gik lemo duto,15kaka: sis teyni mag dhahabu gi techegi, gi sis teyni mag fedha gitechegi ma moro ka moro owinjore gi tije, 16gi mesni mag dhahabu miketoemakati e nyim Nyasaye pile, gi mesni moko mag fedha, 17kod rachwopi ginyilerni kod kikombe mag dhahabu maler gi tewni mag dhahabu gi magfedha, 18gi kendo miwang’oe ubani, kod gach lweny mar dhahabu maler, matiende ni kerubi moyaro bwombegi mondo oumgo Sandug Muma mar RuothNyasaye.  19Daudi nowacho niya, "Magi duto Ruoth Nyasaye owuon emaonyiso.  Tichna ne en mana dwaro rieko kaka digere. " 20Bang’e Daudinowacho ni Solomon wuode niya, "Bed gichir, kendo gi jing’o! Kik chunyinyosre, kendo kik iluor, to chak mana tich, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasacha nobed kodi, kendo ok nojwang’i kata weyi ka pok itieko tijeduto mag Ode.  21Migepe mag jodolo kod jo-Lawi oikore ni tich Od Nyasaye. Jotich duto molony bende oikore konyi e tije duto, kendo jotelo,kaachiel gi ji duto, nobed e lueti. "
Weche mag Ndalo
Bang’ mago, Daudi nowacho ni oganda jo-Israel mane osechokore niya,"Solomon wuoda ma Nyasaye oseyiero, pod en rawera to tijni e tichmaduong’, nikech odni ok en mar dhano, to en mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  2Asetemokar nyalona, maiko gik moko ni tich Od Nyasacha, kaka dhahabu gi mula ginyinyo gi yien kod kite mabeyo ma nengogi tek mag loso ot, kendo maggedo.  3To bende agolo kuom mwanduna awuon 4dhahabu moa Ofir, moromo kiloalufu mia achiel, gi fedha maler moromo kilo mia ariyo, mondo obawgo korudi, nikech ahero Od Nyasacha.  5Mago notigo tich dhahabu gi tich fedhakod tich moro amora ma jotich molony dwaro.  To koro ere ng’ama oyie golochiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye gi chuny achiel kawuono?"6Mi jodong dhoudi, gi jotelo mane rito dhout Israel gi jotend ogendlweny madongo gi matindo kod jotelo mag tich ruoth, 7noyie gi chunyachiel mogolo dhahabu moromo kilo alufu mia ariyo, gi pesa moromo darikalufu apar, gi fedha kilo alufu mia ang’wen, gi mula kilo alufu miaauchiel, gi nyinyo moromo kilo tara ang’wen mondo ogergo Od Nyasaye. 8Bende joma ne ni kod kite ma nengogi tek nochiwogi ni Jahiel maja-Gershon mondo okan-gi e kar keno mar Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  9Ji duto nemor ahinya nikech ne gineno ka jogo golo chiwo ni Ruoth Nyasaye gi chunyachiel. Daudi ogoyo ni Nyasaye erokamano10Daudi bende ne mor, kendo nopako Ruoth Nyasaye e nyim ogandano,kowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, nyingi mondo obed giduong’ ndalo duto nyaka chieng’.  11A Ruoth Nyasaye, duong’ gi pak giteko gi loch gin magi, nimar in e wuon gik moko duto manie polo gi piny,kendo iduong’ moloyogi duto.  12Mwandu gi duong’ a kuomi, kendo in emairito ji duto.  Teko gi nyalo bende ipogo ni ji.  13Koro wagoyonierokamano Nyasachwa, kendo wapako nyingi maler.
"An to an ng’a, kata joga gin ng’a gini, ma dimi wagol chiwo gi morkama? In ema ichiwo gik moko duto, kendo wadwokoni mana gik misemiyowa. 15Wan mana welo kendo jodak e nyimi, kaka kwerewa bende nobet.  Ndalowa epiny ka, chalo gi tipo makadho, kendo waonge kar dak mosiko.  16RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachwa, mwandugi duto mwasechoko mondo wagernigo ot oakuomi, kendo gin meki.  17A Nyasaye, ang’eyo ni inono chuny dhano, kendoadiera ema ihero.  Asemiyi chiwogi duto gi mor kendo gi chuny makare, tokoro amedo bedo gi ilo kaneno jogigi, bende ka goloni chiwo gi mor.  18ANyasach Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Israel kwerewa, yie imi jogi obed gi chunymang’won kama nyaka chieng’, kendo imi gipari.  19Kony Solomon wuodamondo omak chikeni gi bucheni mondo ochopgi duto, kendo oger Hekalu makoro aseikone gik moko. "Solomon odoko ruodh Israel kar Daudi(
Ruodhi
.
-
)20Eka Daudi nowacho ni ji duto niya, "Denduru Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu!" Mi oganda duto nopako Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi, kagigoyo chonggi piny, mi gikulore nyaka e lowo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo e nyim Ruoth. 21Kinyne ne gitimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni gi ruedhi alufu achiel, giimbe alufu achiel, gi nyirombe alufu achiel, kaachiel gi misengni miolopiny, kod misengni moko mang’eny moromo jo-Israel duto.  22Chieng’no negichiemo kendo gimetho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye gi mor maduong’.  Bang’e negichako giketo Solomon wuod Daudi e kom ruoth, kendo ne giwire gi momondo obed jatendgi ma Ruoth Nyasaye oyiero.  To Zadok bende ne owirmondo obed jadolo.  23Kuom mano, Solomon nobedo ruodh jo-Ruoth Nyasayekar Daudi wuon mare, mi nodhi maber, kendo jo-Israel duto nomiye luor. 24Jotelo kod jolweny duto, kaachiel gi yawuot Daudi, nosingore niginiyie loch Solomon.  25Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo Solomon duong’ ma ongeruodh Israel moro mane osebedogo. 26Daudi wuod Jesse nobedo ruodh Israel duto 27kuom higni piero ang’wen. E Hebron nobedoe ruoth kuom higni abiriyo, to e Jerusalem higni pieroadek gadek.  28Notho ka hike oniang’, kendo ka en gi luor kod mwandumogundho.  Solomon wuode nodoko ruoth kare.  29Gik moko duto mane otimoree ndalo loch Daudi ondiki e Kitap Samuel janen, gi Kitap Nathan janabi,kod Kitap Gad ma bende janen.  30Weche duto mag loch Daudi, gi tekone,kod weche Israel, kaachiel gi mag pinje duto ondiki e kitepego.
Weche mag Ndalo 1Solomon okwayo Nyasaye rieko(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Solomon wuod Daudi nogurore e tich ruoth e pinye.  Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasache ne ni kode, kendo nomiye duong’ ahinya.  2Solomon noluongojotend ogend lweny madongo gi matindo, kod jong’ad bura, gi jotelo dutomag Israel ma jodong gwenge.  3Eka Solomon gi ji duto ma nochokore kodene jodhi e hembko mane ni Gibeon, ni mar Hemb Romo mane Nyasaye romoe gijoge, mane Musa jatich Ruoth Nyasaye oloso e thim, ne ni kanyo, 4Daudinosegolo Sanduk mar Nyasaye Kiriath-jearim motero Jerusalem, nimarnosegurone hema kuno.  5To kendo-mar-misango mar mula mane Bezalel wuodUri ma wuod Hur oloso ne ni Gibeon e nyim Hema mar Ruoth Nyasaye. Solomon kod oganda duto nolamo Ruoth Nyasaye kanyo.  6Solomon noidhomochung’ e bath kendo-mar-misango mar mula mane nie nyim Hemb Romo,motimoe misengni miwang’o pep alufu achiel e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye. 7Gotieno nogo Nyasaye nofwenyore ni Solomon mowachone niya, "Kwa gimaidwaro mondo amiyi. " 8Solomon nodwoko Nyasaye niya, "Ninyiso ni iheroDaudi wuora gi hera mosiko, kuom ket ma iketago ruoth kare.  9A RuothNyasaye, iseketa ruodh oganda ma ji thothie ka kwoyo, koro yie ichopsingruok mane isingorigo ni Daudi wuora.  10Yie imiya rieko mondo ang’ekaka datel ni ogandani, nimar ere ng’amam dinyal rito jogi mang’enygi?"11Eka Nyasaye nodwoko Solomon niya, "Nikech chunyi chalo kamano kendo okikwayo mwandu kata fedha, kata pak, kata tho wasiki, kata kwayo ni mondoidag aming’a, to isekwayo mana rieko mar ng’eyo kaka ditel ni ogandamaseketi ruodhgi, 12ero amiyi rieko kod ng’eyo.  To bende abiro medifedha, gi mwandu, kod pak moloyo ruodhi duto mosekuongoni kata ma nowuogbang’i. " 13Eka Solomon noa e nyim Hemb Romo, kolor a hembko mane niGibeon, modhi Jerusalem, kuma noritoe piny Israel. Ohand farese kod geche lweny ma Solomon oloko(
Ruodhi
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)
Solomon nochako dwaro geche mag lweny gi farese, nyaka nobedo gigeche alufu achiel gi mia ang’wen, gi farese alufu apar gariyo.  Mokokuomgi noketo e mier mag geche to moko ne en go Jerusalem.  15Nomiyofedha gi dhahabu obedo mang’eny Jerusalem ka kuoyo, kendo nomiyo yiendsida odoko mang’eny ka ng’owo mae pap.  16Solomon ne omo farese Misri giKoah.  Jo-ohande ne omogi kuno gi nengo moketi: 17gari achiel neging’iewo Misri gi kilo abiriyo mag fedha, to faras achiel gi kiloariyo.  Johalago ne terogi ne ruodhi mag jo-Hiti gi mag jo-Aram.
Weche mag Ndalo 2Solomon otimo winjruok gi Hiram ruodh Turo(
Ruodhi
.
-
;
.
-
)1Solomon ne dwaro gero Hekalu ni nying Ruoth Nyasaye kod ode mar ruoth. 2Nondiko joting’ alufu piero abiriyo gi ji alufu aboro mondo opa kite egode, kod nyipeche alufu adek gi mia auchiel.  3Solomon nooro ni Hiramruodh Turo wach niya, "Kaka nitimo ni Daudi wuora, kikowone yiend sidamondo ogergo ode, yie itimna kamano an bende, 4nimar adwaro gero otmoyang ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha, kama jodolo nowang’ie ubani mang’weng’ar e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo nochiwie makati miketo e nyime pile,kendo notimie misengni miwang’o pep okinyi godhiambo, kod miwang’o endalo mag Sabato, kendo ka due por, kendo e ndalo sewni ma Ruoth Nyasayeoseketo ni Israel nyaka chieng’.  5Ot madwaro gero nobed maduong’, nimarNyasachwa duong’ moloyo nyiseche duto.  6To en ng’a ma dinyal gerone ot,ka kata polo maduong’ manade ok nyal rome dakie? An to an ng’a, madagerne ot modakie, mak mana kar wang’o ubani e nyime? 7Emomiyo yieiorna ng’ato molony kuom loso gik dhahabu, gi mag fedha, gi mag mula,kod mag nyinyo, kendo mong’eyo loso law maralik, gi makwar, kod mambulu,kendo molony kuom goro gik moko.  Enoti gi jotichna molony man Juda giman Jerusalem mane Daudi wuora oketo.  8Bende orna yiend sida gi saiprasgi algum mag Lebanon, nimar ang’eyo ni jotichni olony kuom tong’o yiendLebanon.  Jotichna noti kaachiel gi jotichni, 9mondo gikna yien mogundho,nimar ot madwaro gero nobed maduong’ kendo miwuoro.  10Anami jotichni majotong’o gunde alufu piero ang’wen mag ngano, gi gunde alufu piero ariyomag shairi, gi degii alufu ang’wen mag divai, kod depe alufuu ang’wenmag mo. "11Hiram ruodh Turo nodwoko Solomon gi barua mondikoe niya, "RuothNyasaye ohero joge, emomiyo oseketi ruodhgi. " 12Eka nodhi nyime kowachoniya, "Apako Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, ma jachuech polo gi piny,nimar osemiyo ruoth Daudi wuowi man gi rieko kod ng’eyo ma biro geroHekalu ni Ruoth Nyasaye kod ot ma ruoth dakie.  13Koro aseoro ng’atmolony kendo mariek ma nyinge Huram-abi, 14wuod ja-Turo ma min mare nyarDan.  En ng’at molony kuom tich dhahabu gi fedha gi mula gi nyinyo gikidi kod yien, kendo ong’eyo loso law maralik kata mambulu kata makwarkod law katana maber, kendo olony kuom tich goro, kod loso kido moroamora momiye.  Onyalo tiyo kod jotichni molony, kendo gi jotich Daudiwuoru.  15Emomiyo, ruodha, yie iornwa ngano gi shairi gi mo gi divaimisewacho.  16Wanatong’ yien Lebanon moromo kaka idwaro, mi watuegikanyakla kendo wakwang’gi e nam nyaka Jopa, eka iniomgi kuno kiterogiJerusalem. "17Solomon nokwano jodak duto mane nie piny Israel, kaka Daudi wuon marenokwanogi.  Ne giromo alufu mia achiel gi piero abich gadek kod miaauchiel (
,
. ) 18Noketo ji alufu piero abiriyo kuomgi mondo obedjoting’, to ji alufu piero aboro opa kite e gode kod nyipeche alufu adekgi mia auchiel ma kwayogi.
Weche mag Ndalo 3Solomon ogero Hekalu mar Nyasaye(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Solomon nochako gero Od Ruoth Nyasaye Jerusalem e laru mar Ornanja-Jebus, mane nie got Moria.  Daudi wuon mare ema noyiero laruno nikechRuoth Nyassye nofwenyorene kanyo.  2Nochako gedo e due mar ariyo e higamar ang’wen mar lochne.  3Hekalu mane Solomon dwaro gero ni Ruoth Nyasayene romo kama: Borne ne mita piero adek, to lachne ne mita apar.  4Bor maragola mane nie nyim Hekalu ne romo mita apar, maromre gi lach marHekalu, kendo borne modhi malo ne mita apar.  Nobawo iye gi dhahabumaler.  5Hekalu to nochwado iye gi saipras, kendo obawo gi dhahabu maler,mogoroe othidhe gi thiwni.  6Nolicho Hekalu gi kite mamil ma nengogi tek. 7Dhahabu mane ogolo Parvein ema nobawogo Hekalu duto, koda ka sirni, gipewe dhoudi, gi kor ot, kod dhoudi, kendo nogoro kido maket gi malaikamiluongo ni kerubi e kor ot.
Kama Ler Moloyo, to nogero kama: Borne ne romo mita apar, maromre gilach mar Hekalu duto, to lachne bende mita apar.  Nobawe gi dhahabu mapekne oromo mita piero ariyo.  9Pek dhahabu mar musmal mane otiyogonoromo nus kilo.  Nobawo udi mamalo bende gi dhahabu.
Kama Ler Moloyo nolosoe kerubi ariyo kod bao, mobao gi dhahabu.  11Bormar bwombe kerubigo ne romo mita apar, nikech bor bwom ka bwom ne mitaariyo gi nus.  12Bwom achiel mar kerubi ka kerubi nogik e kor ot.  Tobwombege modong’ noromo e dier ot.  13Bwombegi noyarore mi borgi duto neromo mita apar.  Kerubigo nochung’ komanyo Kama Ler.  14Noloso pasia gilaw mambulu, gi maralik, gi makwar, kod law katana maber, motwang’iekido mag Kerubi. Tich ma Huram otiyo e Hekalu(
Ruodhi
.
-
)15Noloso sirni ariyo ma borgi ne romo mita ochiko, moketo e nyim Hekalu. Noumo wi siro ka siro gi gima chal gi agulu maduong’ ma borne romo mitaariyo gi nus.  16Noloso thiwni machal gi tik ng’ut motueyo kuomagulinigo.  Bang’e noloso gik mong’inore ong’inore mag mula mia achiel,mi oliero e thiwnigo.  17Nochungo sirnigo e nyim Hekalu, koketo achielkorachwich, to machielo koracham.  Mano mane oketo korachwich nochako niJakin, to ma koracham nochako ni Boaz.
Weche mag Ndalo
Huram noloso kendo-mar-misango mar mula, ma borne romo mita apar,kendo lachne bende mita apar, to borne modhi malo mita abich.  2Ekanolenyo mula, moloso gima duong’ mating’o pi machal gi karaya, mochakeni Nam.  Lach dhoge ne romo mita abich, kendo tutne mita ariyo gi nus toalwora mar dhoge mita apar gabich.  3E bwo dhoge ne nitie gik ma maradadimonginore ong’inore molwore.  Noriedgi e laini ariyo ma borgi romo mitaapar gabich.  Namno nochue kaachiel gi gik ma maradadigo.  4Norenje e ng’eruedhi apar gariyo mag mula.  Ruedhi adek nomanyo nyandwat, to adek yopodho chieng’, adek yo milambo kendo adek yo wuok chieng’, to iwgi nodokkaiye.  5Mith mula molosego ne romre gi lach lith lwedo ang’wen.  Dhogenolos ka dho kikombe, machal gi thiep oyungu.  Nonyalo ting’o pi ma diromdepe alufu auchiel.  6Bende noloso kareche apar mag luoko, moketo abichkorachwich, to abich mamoko koracham.  Karechego ema nilwokoe gik misangomiwang’o, to Nam ema ne jodolo lwokoree.
Huram noloso sis teche apar mag dhahabu kaka nochike, moketogi eHekalu, abich korachwich to abich koracham.  8Noloso mesni apar bende,moketo e Hekalu, abich korachwich to abich koracham, kendo noloso tewnimia achiel mag dhahabu. 9Noloso laru mar jodolo gi laru maduong’ kod dhoute, mobawo dhoudigo gimula, 10to Nam cha noketo e bath Hekalu korachwich momanyo kind yo wuokchieng’ gi yo milambo. 11Achien Huram noloso agulini gi rajope, kod tewni.  Kamano notieko gikmane oloso ni ruoth Solomon e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  12Ne gin: Sirni ariyo,gi agulini madongo ariyo mane nie wi sirni, gi oserni ariyo mane oumoagulini ariyogo, 13kod gik mong’inore ong’inore mia ang’wen mane oried elaini ariyo e kor oserni.  14Bende noloso rachungi, gi kareche mane orenjkuom rachungigo, 15Kaachiel gi Nam achiel cha, gi ruedhi apar gariyomane orenje e, gi agulini gi rajope kod rachwopi.  16Huram-abi noloso niruoth Solomon gik moko duto mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye gi mula mang’angni. 17Nolosogi ni ruoth e paw aora Jordan e lop chwech manie kind Sukoth giZareda.  18Solomon noloso gik mathoth ahinya, ma pek mula molosgigo ne okong’ere. 19Solomon noloso gik moko duto mane nie Od Nyasaye ne gin:Kendo-mar-misango mar dhahabu, gi mesni mag makati miketo e nyim Nyasayepile, 20gi rachung teyni, kod techegi monego liel e nyim Kama Ler Moloyokaka nochiki, 21kod maupe gi teyni gi ramekni, 22gi rangis teyni, gidegi gi tewni mag ubani, kod tegni mag mach.  Mago duto nolos gi dhahabumaler.  Pata mag dhoudi maiye midonjogo Kama Ler Moloyo, kod mag dhoudimag Kama Ler mag Hekalu nolos gi dhahabu bende.
Weche mag Ndalo 5Solomon oketo Sanduk mar Nyasaye e Hekalu(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Kamano Solomon notieko tich duto mag Ruoth Nyasaye, eka noomo gik mokoduto mane Daudi wuon mare osechiwo ni Nyasaye, mi noketogi kuonde kenomag Od Nyasaye.  Ne gin fedha gi dhahabu kod gik lemo moko.
Solomon nochoko jodong Israel duto Jerusalem mondo oom Sandug Muma marRuoth Nyasaye e dala Daudi miluongo ni Sayun.  3Eka jo-Israel nochokoregi ruoth chieng’ sawo ma nitimo e due mar abiriyo higa ka higa.  4Kanejodong Israel duto osebiro, jodolo gi jo-Lawi noting’o Sandug Muma, 5giHemb Romo, kod gik moko duto mane nie hema, mitiyogo tich Nyasaye. 6Ruoth Solomon gi jo-Israel duto mane ochokore kode ne ni e nyim Sandukka gitimo misengni gi rombe kod ruedhi mang’eny mokadho akwana.  7Jodolonorwako Sandug Muma mar Ruoth Nyasaye kama olosne e bwo bwombe kerubi eot ma iye mar Hekalu, miluongo ni Kama Ler Moloyo, 8nimar kerubi noyarobwombegi ewi kar Sanduk, ka giume kaachiel gi ludhe miting’ego.  9Ludhegine boyo ahinya ma wigi ne nenore oko e Kama Ler mane nie nyim ot maiye,to ne ok ginen oko mar Hekalu.  Pod gin kanyo nyaka chil kawuono.  10Neonge gimoro ei Sanduk, mak mana kite ariyo mopa mane Musa oketoe ka neen Horeb, kuma Ruoth Nyasaye notimoe singruok gi jo-Israel ka ne giaMisri.
Kane jodolo owuok oa Kama Ler, bor polo nopong’o Od Ruoth Nyasayeduto.  Nonwang’o ka jodolo duto osepwodhore mondo oti tijgi, ma ok gidewondalo mochan-gie.  12Jo-Lawi duto ma jower nochung’ yo wuok chieng’ markendo-mar-misango.  Ne gin Asaf gi Heman gi Jeduthun kod yawuotgi gijowetegi.  Ne girwako lewni mag law katana maber, ka gigoyo ongeng’o githumbe mopogore opogore.  Jodolo mia achiel gi piero ariyo bende ne goyotung’.  13Joma ne goyo tung’go kaachiel gi jower, ne wer ka pako RuothNyasaye, kendo goyone erokamano.  Ne gigoyo tung’ gi thumbe mopogoreopogore ka gipako Ruoth Nyasaye gi wer niya,"Ruoth Nyasaye ber!Herane mosiko ochwere. "14Jodolo ne ok nyal tiyo tijgi nikech bor polono, nimar duong’ maler marRuoth Nyasaye nopong’o Hekalu.
Weche mag Ndalo 6Solomon oguedho Hekalu(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Solomon nowacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye niwacho ni nidag e mudhomandiwa.  2To koro asegeroni ot man gi duong’ mondo idagie nyakachieng’. " 3Eka ruoth nowichore, kendo kane jo-Israel duto ma ne ochokoree nyime ochung’, noguedhogi.  4Nowacho niya, "Apako Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel, mosechopo singruok mane otimo ni Daudi wuora, kowachoneniya,
‘Chakre ndalo mane aresoe joga kagologi e piny Misri, pok ayierodala moro kuom dhoudi duto mag Israel mondo ogernae ot ma nyinga betie,mak mana Jerusalem, 6kendo ne ok ayiero ng’at moro obed jatend jogaIsrael, mak mana Daudi. ’ 7Ung’eyo ni Daudi wuora ne dwaro gero ot niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, 8to Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya,‘Nitimo maber kuom paro gerona ot.  9Kata kamano, in ok niger odno tomana wuodi mibiro nywolo ema nogernago. ’ 10Koro Ruoth Nyasaye osechoposingruok mane otimo, nikech osebet kar Daudi wuora, kendo an e ruodhIsrael, mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nosingore, mi asegero ot ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, 11kendo aseketoe Sandug Muma moting’osingruok mane Ruoth Nyasaye otimo gi jo-Isarel. "12Eka Solomon nochung’ e dho kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye e nyimjo-Israel duto, kendo noyaro bedene.  13Noseloso raidhi mar mula, maborne gi lachne mita ariyo gi nus maromre, to borne modhi malo mitaachiel gi nus, moketo e dier laru, noidhe, mogoyoe chonge piny e nyimjo-Israel duto mane ochokore.  Norieyo bedene malo, 14kowacho niya, "ARuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, onge Nyasaye moro e polo kata e pinymachal kodi.  Irito singruok mitimo gi jotichni mawuotho e yoreni, gichunygi duto, kendo iherogi gi hera mosiko.  15Isechopo singruok manitimo ni Daudi wuora ma jatichni.  Adier, gima niwacho ema koro isetimo. 16Emomiyo, in Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, yie ichop singruok maneitimo ni Daudi wuora ma jatichni kiwachone niya, ‘Anywolani nobed ruodhimag Israel nyaka chieng’, to mana ka yawuoti oritore kendo owuotho echikena kaka isewuotho. ’ 17To koro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel,wachni ma iwacho ni Daudi jatichni mondo otimre.
"In Nyasaye, bende nidag kod ji e piny? Ka kata polo maduong’ manadiok nyal romi, to koro ot ma asegeroni direm marom nadi! 19Kata kamano,Ruoth Nyasacha, yie mondo iwinj lemona gi kwayona, kendo iwinj ywaknamakeloni.  20Odiechieng’ gotieno mondo irang ot misewacho ni nyinginobedie, kendo iwinj lemo ma abiro bedo ka akwayogo kaeri.  21Iwinj kwayoma an kod jogi Israel biro kwayi.  Yie iwinjwa e polo kama idakie, tokiwinjo, mondo iwenwa richowa.
"Ka ng’ato otimo ni wadgi marach, kendo okete mondo ocham muma, miokuong’ore e nyim kendo-mar-misango manie odni, 23to yie mondo iwinj epolo, kendo ing’ad buch jotichni, kikumo ng’at moketho, kendo kidwokorichone e wiye owuon.  To jal ma kare mondo iket kare, mimiye pok moromogi timne maber.
"Ka wasigu oloyo jogi Israel nikech gisekethoni, to eka gilokore,kendo giyie duong’ni ka gilami kendo gisayi e odni, 25to yie mondoiwinjgi e polo, kiweyonigi richogi, kendo idwokgi e pinygi mane imiyokweregi.
"Ka polo ong’awo, ma koth onge, nikech jogi Israel osekethoni, tobang’e gilemo kaeri kendo giyie duong’ni ka gilokore giweyo richoginikech ikumogi, 27to yie mondo iwinjgie polo, kiweyonigi richogi.  Nyisgiyo maber ma onego giwuothie, kendo imi koth chue e pinyi misemiyo jogimondo obed mwandugi.
"Ka kech, kata dera mar tho marach, nie piny, kata ka cham orochoreewi dongo kata ka bonyo kata kungu nitie, kata ka wasikgi oluoro dalamoro, kata ka tho kata tuo manadi nitie, 29mi ng’ato olami ka kwayigimoro, korieyo bedene kochomo Hekaluni, (nimar ng’ato ka ng’ato ong’eyogima thage kendo chando chunye) 30to yie mondo iwinj e polo kama idakie,iwene richone, kendo ichop lemone, kimiye pok moromo gi timbene nikechin kendi ema ing’eyo chuny ji duto, 31kuom mano mondo giluori, kendogiluw chikeni ndalo duto ma gidakgo e piny mane imiyo kwerewani.
"Ka ng’ama wendo ma ok achiel kuom jogi Israel obiro mondo olem eHekaluni koa e piny mabor nikech nyingi maduong’ gi lweti motegno, kodbadi morie, 33to yie mondo iwinj e polo kama idakie, kendo itim duto mang’at ma wendono okwayi.  Kamano ji duto manie piny mondo ong’e nyingikendo olwori mana kaka jogi Israel, kendo mondo ging’e ni Hekalu maasegeronini en mari adier.
"Ka jogi dhi e lweny kedo gi wasikgi kamoro amora miorogie, mi gilamika gichomo dala miseyiero kod Hekalu masegeronini, 35to yie mondo iwinjgie polo lemo ma gikwayigo, kendo ikonygi.
"Ka gitimo gima isekwero, (nimar onge ng’at ma ok kethi), kendo ikechokodgi, michiwogi e lwet wasikgi mondo otergi e tuech e piny mabor katamachiegni, 37to eka bang’e giloko parogi e piny motuegieno, mi chunygiolokore, kendo gikwayi niya, ‘Waseketho kwatimo wich teko kod richo,’38mi giduogo iri gi parogi duto kendo gi chunygi duto e piny manotuegieno, kendo gilemo ka gichomo pinygi ma nimiyo kweregi, kod dalama niyiero, gi Hekalu masegeronini, 39to yie mondo iwinj e polo kamaidakie lemo ma gikwayigo, kendo ikonygi kiweyo ni jogi richo ma gisetimoe nyimi.
"A Nyasacha, yie mondo iwinj lemo mikwayigo ka.  41A Ruoth Nyasaye, mijodoloni obed joma owar adier, kendo jogi molwori mondo obed mamornikech iguedhogi.  42A Ruoth Nyasaye, kik ilok ng’eyi ni ruoth mowirmiseyiero.  Par herani mosiko mane iherogo Daudi jatichni. "
Weche mag Ndalo
Kane Solomon osetieko lemo, mach noa e polo motieko misango miwang’okod misengni mamoko, kendo duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nopong’oHekalu.  2Jodongo ne ok nyal donjo e Hekalu nikech duong’ mar RuothNyasaye nopong’e.  3Kane jo-Isarel duto oneno mach kalor piny kod duong’mar Ruoth Nyasaye ka nie Hekalu, ne gikulore piny e laru.  Ne gilamoNyasaye kendo gigoyone erokamano ka giwacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ber,herane mosiko ochwere. "4Eka ruoth kod ji duto notimo misengni ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  5Ruoth Solomonnotimo misango gi ruedhi alufu piero ariyo gariyo, kod rombe alufu miaachiel gi piero ariyo.  Mano e kaka ruoth kod ji duto noyango Hekalu niRuoth Nyasaye.  6Jodolo nochung’ kargi, kendo jo-Lawi nopako RuothNyasaye gi wende mane Daudi ochuogo ka giwer niya, "Herane mosikoochwere. " Ne gigoyo thumbe mane Daudi oloso mondo odendgo Ruoth Nyasaye. Jodolo bende nogoyo tung’ ka ochung’ momanyore gi jo-Lawi. 7Solomon noyango ni Ruoth Nyasaye dier laru mane nie nyim Hekalu, nimarkanyo ema notimoe misengni miwang’o kendo owang’oe boche mag misengnimag sawo, nikech kendo-mar-misango mar mula ma noseloso ne tin, mane oknyal timie misengnigo duto. 8E ndalogo Solomon kaachiel gi jo-Israel duto notimo sawo kuom ndaloabiriyo.  Ne en chokruok maduong’ ahinya moa piny Israel duto, chakre yonyandwat, kama idonjogo Hamath nyaka aora man yo milambo e kind pinygigi piny Misri.  9Chieng’ mar aboro ne gitimo sawo maduong’, nimar pwodhokendo-mar-misango notieko ndalo abiriyo, kendo sawo bende ndalo abiriyo. 10Due piero ariyo gadek due mar abiriyo Solomon nomiyo ji thuolo modokmiechgi ka mor ahinya nikech gik mabeyo duto mane Ruoth Nyasaye osetimoni Daudi gi Solomon, kendo ni joge Israel. Nyasaye ochako ofwenyore ni Solomon(
Ruodhi
.
-
)11Solomon notieko Od Ruoth Nyasaye, gi ode owuon.  Bende gik moko dutomane ochano mondo otim e Od Ruoth Nyasaye gi ode owuon, notieko maber. 12Ruoth Nyasaye nofwenyore gotieno, mowachone niya, "Asewinjo lemoni,kendo aseyiero Hekaluni mondo obed kama itimonae misango.  13Ka aloropolo ni kik koth chue, kata kakelo bonyo mondo ocham piny, kata kaorodera mar tho marach, 14to ka joga miluongo gi nyinga obolore ka lamakendo dwara, ka giweyo yoregi maricho, eka nawinj e polo, mi nawenigirichogi kendo nares pinygi.  15Ka gilemo e Hekaluni, anaranggi gi wang’akendo nawinjgi gi ita.  16Aseyiero Hekaluni, kendo asewale obed maler,mondo nyinga obedie, kendo arange gi chunya duto nyaka chieng’.  17To in,kiwuotho e nyima kitimo duto masechiki, kendo kimako chikena gi buchenakaka Daudi wuoru notimoo, 18eka anagur loch mar nyikwayi, mana kakanasingora ni Daudi wuoru, kawachone niya, ‘Ndalo duto nyikwayi nobedruodhi mag Israel. ’ 19To kulokoru, mi ok umako wechena gi chikena manaketo e nyimu, mudhi tiyo ni nyiseche mamoko kendo lamogi, 20napudhjo-Israel ka buya, mi nagolgi e piny ma namiyogi, kendoo Hekalu maasegwedho mondo nyinga oyudgo duong’ni, naketh mondo olal e wang’a, minaloke ka ngero, kendo gima ji duto jaro.  21Ji duto makadho but Hekalu,ma koro duong’ kamani, nowuor ka gipenjo niya, ‘Ang’o momiyo RuothNyasaye osetimo gima kama ni pinyni kendo ni hekaluni?’ 22Eka nodwokginiya, ‘Ne giweyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi ma noresogi ka gologie piny Misri, mi ne gilamo nyiseche ma moko kendo gitiyonigi.  EmomiyoNyasaye osekelo masichegi duto kuomgi. ’ "
Weche mag Ndalo 8Gik mamoko ma Solomon otimo(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Kane higni piero ariyo mane Solomon ogeroe Od Ruoth Nyasaye gi odeowuon oserumo, 2noloso mier mane Hiram omiye, moketoe jo-Isarel. 3Koro Solomon nodhi Hamath-Zoba mokawo dalano.  4Noloso Tadmor mane niethim, kaachiel gi mier mag keno duto ma nosegero Hamath.  5Bende nogeroBeth-horon mamalo gi Beth-horon mamwalo mochielo gi ohinga moketonigirang’eye miloro motegno gi lodi.  6Nogero Baalath gi mier duto mag keno,kaachiel gi mier duto ma nokanoe gechene mag lweny gi miech joge majoidh farese.  Kendo Solomon nogero udi duto Jerusalem kod Lebanon kendoe pinye duto kaka nodwaro.  7Ji duto ma nodong’ e piny Israel kuomjo-Hiti gi jo-Amor gi jo-Perizi gi jo-Hivi kod jo-Jebus, ma okjo-Israel, 8Solomon noloko wasumbni michuno mondo oti gi thwon, kakaobet nyaka chil kawuono.  Ne gin joma notamo jo-Israel tieko.  9Solomon neok oloko jo-Israel wasumbni, to noketogi jolweny kod jotend jolweny gijotend joidh faresene.  10Ne en gi jotelo madongo mia ariyo gi pieroabich mane rito ji. 11Solomon nogolo nyar Farao e dala Daudi mokete e ot ma nogerone, nimarnowacho niya, "Chiega ok nyal dak e od Daudi ruodh Israel, nikech kuondeduto ma Sanduk osebedoe oyang ni Ruoth Nyasaye. "12Solomon notimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengini miwang’o pep, kod misenginimag sawo e kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye ma noseketo e nyim agola. 13Odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ notimo misengni koluwo chik Musa.  Notimogichieng’ ma due opor, kendo e ndalo sewni adek mag higa, ma gin SapMakati ma ok ketie Thowi, gi Sap Jumbe, kod Sap Kiche.  14Solomon noritochik mane Daudi wuon mare ma ng’at Nyasaye oketo.  Nochan jodolo e tichdolo mopogore opogore, kendo nomiyo jo-Lawi tich wer kod konyo jodolokaka ne dwarore odiechieng’ kodiechieng’, kendo nopogo jorit rangeyetich rito rangach ka rangach.  15Kuom weche duto mane ruoth omiyo jodologi jo-Lawi ne onge moro amora mane giweyo kata mana wach keno. 16Kamano Solomon notieko tich duto chakre chieng’ keto mise mar Od RuothNyasaye nyaka rumone. 17Solomon nodhi Ezion-Geber gi Eloth manie dhonam e piny Edom.  18MiHiram nooro jotichne motero ni Solomon yiedhi kaachiel gi jokwang’molony kuom tich nam.  Ne gidhi Ofir kaachiel gi jotich Solomon, kuma negiomoe dhahabu moromo kilo alufu apar gauchiel, mi ne gikelo ni RuothSolomon.
Weche mag Ndalo 9Ruoth madhako mar Sheba olimo Solomon(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Kane ruoth madhako mar Sheba owinjo humb Solomon, nobiro Jerusalemmondo oteme gi penj matek.  Nobiro gi oganda maduong’ ahinya kod ngamiamoting’o gik mang’ue ng’ar gi dhahabu mogundho kod kite mabeyo manengogi tek.  Kane obiro ir Solomon nopenjo weche duto mane nie chunye. 2To Solomon nodwoko wechene duto, ma onge moro mane otame dwoko.  3Kaneruoth madhako mar Sheba oseneno riekone, gi ot ma nosegero, 4gi chiembode, gi kuonde dak jodonge, gi kit tich mag jotichne, gi rwakruokgi, gijolos divai mage gi rwakruokgi, kod misengni ma notimo e Od RuothNyasaye, dhoge nomoko. 5Nowacho ni Ruoth niya, "Kara humb timbeni gi riekoni ma nawinjo e pinyaen adier! 6Kane pok abiro mi anenogi gi wang’a, ne ok anyal yie ni ginadier.  To koro aneno ni nonyisa mana dir wach mar riekoni maduong’. Giloyo huma ma nawinjo.  7Mondi kod jotichni johawi, mawinjo riekonindalo duto.  8Apako Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi moheri kendo oketi e komduong’ne, mondo ibedne ruodh Israel.  Ruoth Nyasaye ohero jo-Israel kendoodwaro mondo gigurre motegno nyaka chieng’, emomiyo oseketi ruodhgi,mondo ing’ad bura kare. " 9Eka nomiyo ruoth Solomon dhahabu moromo kiloalufu abiriyo, gi gik mang’ue ng’ar mogundho kod kite mabeyo ma nengogitek.  Solomon ne ok ochako oyudo gik mang’ue ng’ar machal gi mago maneruoth madhako mar Sheba omiye. 10To bende jotich Hiram gi jotich Solomon mane odhi Ofir omo dhahabu nekelo yiend algum gi kite mabeyo ma nengogi tek.  11Yien-go ruoth nolosogoraidhi mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye gi mag ode owuon kod thumbe nyatiti ginyigwerni ma ne jower wergo e Hekalu.  Yien machal kamago ne pok one epiny Juda nyaka nene. 12Ruoth Solomon nomiyo ruoth madhako mar Sheba gimoro amora ma nokwayokaachiel gi gik moromo mich ma nokelo.  Eka ruodh Sheba nodok e pinyekaachiel gi jotichne. Mwandu Solomon gi humbe(
Ruodhi
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)13Pek mar dhahabu mane ikelo ni Solomon higa ka higa ne romo kilo alufupiero ariyo gadek, 14ka ok okwan mago mag osuch johala gi johono; kendoruodhi duto mag piny Arabia kod jorit piny Solomon ne kelone fedha gidhahabu.  15Ruoth Solomon nochuogo kuodi mia ariyo, ma kuot ka kuot nobawgi dhahabu moromo kilo abiriyo.  16Kendo nochuogo okumbini mia adek, maokumba ka okumba nogaw gi dhahabu moromo kilo adek gi nus.  Magi dutoruoth noketo e Od Bungu mar Lebanon.  17Bende Ruoth noloso kom duong’mang’ongo mar lakliech, mi nobawo gi dhahabu maler.  18Kom duong’no nenigi raidhi man gi kuonde minyono auchiel gi raten tielo mar dhahabumomakore gi kom.  To sibuoche ariyo mag dhahabu nochung’ e bath bede komkoni gi koni.  19Kende sibuoche apar gariyo moko nochung’ moro ka moro edir raidhi koni gi koni.  Onge piny moro ma nolosie kom ruoth machal gimano. 20Kikombe Solomon duto nolos gi dhahabu, kendo gik moko dutomikonyruokgo e Od Bungu mar Lebanon bende nolos gi dhahabu maler.  Fedhane ok kwan ka gimoro e ndalo mag Solomon, 21nimar yiedhi mage ne dhiTarshish gi jotich Hiram, kendo bang’ higni adek ne gikelo dhahabu gifedha gi lak liech gi ong’eche kod bimbe. 22Kamano ruoth Solomon noloyo ruodhi duto mag piny gi mwandu kendo girieko.  23Ruodhi duto mag piny ne biro ir Solomon mondo owinj rieko maneNyasaye omiye.  24Higa ka higa, ng’ato ka ng’ato ne kelone chiwo mag gikmolos gi fedha gi dhahabu kaachiel gi lewni kod gilweny gi gik mang’ueng’ar gi farese kod nyumbu.  25Solomon ne nigi udi alufu ang’wen magfarese gi mag geche, kod joidh farese alufu apar gariyo.  Moko kuomginoketo e miech geche, to moko ne en go Jerusalem.  26Ruodhi duto ne niebwo loch Solomon chakre aora Yufrate nyaka piny Filistia gi tong’ pinyMisri, 27Ruoth nomiyo fedha obedo mang’eny ka kuoyo e Jerusalem, kendoyiend sida bende ne ng’eny ka ng’owo mae pap.  28Solomon ne omo fareseMisri kod pinje moko duto mane giyudoree. Tho mar Solomon(
Ruodhi
.
-
)29Weche moko mag Solomon a chakruokgi nyaka gikogi ondik e Kitap Nathanjanabi, kendo e kitabu moting’o weche mane Ahija ja-Shilo okoro, kendo ekitap Iddo janen mondikie fwenyruok ma noneno kuom Jeroboam wuod Nebat. 30Solomon nobedo ruodh Israel duto kuom higni piero ang’wen kodakJerusalem.  31Notho moyike e dala Daudi wuon mare.  Rehoboam wuode nodokoruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo 10Dhout Israel mamoko opogore gi jo-Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Rehoboam nodhi Shekem nikech jo-Israel duto nosechokore kuno mondookete ruoth.  2To kane Jeroboam wuod Nebat owinjo wachno, noduogo koaMisri, nikech ne pod en Misri kuma nodhiye koringo ruoth Solomon.  3Negiorone wach mondo obi Shekem.  Nobiro gi jo-Israel duto mi ne giwacho niRehoboam niya,,
"Wuoru nomiyowa ting’ mapek; omiyo in koro ng’ad ting’mapek ma noketo kuomwa, eka wanatini. " 5Nodwokogi niya, "Dhiuru to uduogbang’ ndalo adek. " Mi ne gia. 6Ruoth Rehoboam noporo wach gi jodongo ma yandi ng’ado rieko ni Solomonwuon mare ka pod ngima, kowachonigi niya, "Nyisauru gima dadwok jogo. "7Ne gidwoke niya, "Kiyie bedo mang’won ni jogi kilombogi kendo iwuoyokodgi maber, eka gibiro bedo jotichni ndalo duto. " 8To Rehoboam nodagirieko ma jodongo nong’adone.  Noporo wach gi yawuowi ma mbesene ma ne nikode, 9kopenjogi niya, "Ere kaka dadwok jogi mosekwaya mondo ang’adting’ mapek ma wuora noketo kuomgi?" 10Ne gidwoke niya, "Dwok jomaokwayi mondo ing’adnigi ting’ mapek ma wuoru nomiyogi kiwachonigi kama,‘Lith lweta matung’ duong’ moloyo nungo wuora.  11Wuora ero nomiyou ting’mapek, an to abiro medou moloyo.  Wuora nochwadou gi del, an to abirochwadou gi thomoni. ’ "12Chieng’ mar adek, Jeroboam kod oganda duto nobiro ir ruoth Rehoboamkaka nochikogi mondo gidog ire.  13Ruoth nodwokogi kager.  Noweyo riekomane jodongo ong’adone, 14to noluwo rieko mbesene, kowacho niya, "Wuoranomiyou ting’ mapek, to an abiro medou moloyo.  Wuora nochwadou gi del,to an abiro chwadou gi thomoni. " 15Kamano ruoth ne ok odewo ji.  ToNyasaye ema nomiyo gigo otimore kamano, mondo ochop singruokne maneomiyo Ahija ja-Shilo owacho ni Jeroboam wuod Nebat.
Kane jo-Israel oneno ni Ruoth ok odewogi, ne gidwoke niya,"Waonge wat gi Daudi!Ok wan libamba achiel gi wuod Jesse!Wadoguru dala, wan jo-Israel duto!Un, oganda Daudi,koro rituru mana dhoodu kendu!"17Kamano jo-Israel duto nodok miechgi. 18Ruoth Rehoboam nooro Adoram mane jarit joma ichuno mondo oti gi thwon,to jo-Israel duto nogoye gi kite nyaka otho.  Kuom mano ruoth Rehoboamnoidho geche piyopiyo, moringo nyaka Jerusalem mondo otony.  19Chakrechieng’no, jo-Israel osebet ka dagi loch dhood Daudi nyaka chil kawuono,mak mana jo-Israel mane odak e dier jo-Juda kende ema nobet e bwo lochRehoboam.
Weche mag Ndalo 111Kane Rehoboam ochopo Jerusalem, nochoko jolweny moyier alufu mia achielgi piero aboro (
,
) kuom jo-Juda gi jo-Benjamin.  Ne gidhi kedo gijo-Israel, mondo gidwok loch ni Rehoboam.  2To wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobironi Shemeya ng’at Nyasaye niya,
"Wuo gi Rehoboam wuod Solomon, ruodhJuda, kod jo-Israel duto mae Juda gi Benjamin, 4kiwachonigi ni RuothNyasaye owacho kama: ‘Kik udhi uked gi oweteu, to ng’ato ka ng’ato mondoodog dala, nikech gima timoreni oa kuoma. ’ " Ne giwinjo wach RuothNyasaye, mi ne ok gidhi kedo gi Jeroboam. Loch Rehoboam ogurore motegno5Rehoboam nodak Jerusalem, kendo nogero mier mag siro lweny e Juda. 6Nogero Bethlehem, Etam, Tekoa, 7Bethzur, Soko, Adulam, 8Gath, Maresha,Zif, 9Adoraim, Lakish, Azeka, 10Zora, Aijalon, kod Hebron.  Gin miechJuda gi Benjamin mochiel gi ohinga.  11Nochielogi matek ahinya, moketoejotend jolweny, kendo okanoe chiemo gi mo kod divai.  12Nokano kuodi gitonge e miergo duto, kendo nolosogi motegno ahinya.  Kamano e kaka noritoJuda gi Benjamin. 13Jodolo gi jo-Lawi duto ma nodak kuom jo-Israel noduogo ir Rehoboam kagia kuonde duto mane gidakie.  14Jo-Lawi noweyo lopgi gi mwandugi, migidhi Juda gi Jerusalem, nikech Jeroboam gi yawuote noriembogi e tichdolo mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  15Jeroboam noketo jodolone owuon e hembko maneni kuonde moting’ore, kendo mondo odol ni kido mochue mag nyisechemanono kod nyiroye ma noseloso.  16Ji moko kuom dhoudi duto mag Israel manoketo chunygi kuom lamo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel ne luwo jodologi jo-Lawigo, kendo ne gidhi Jerusalem mondo gitim misango ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi.  17Kamano ne gitego piny Juda, kendo kuomhigni adek, ne gimiyo loch Rehoboam wuod Solomon obedo motegno, nimarkuom higni adekgo ne giwuotho e yor Daudi gi Solomon. 18Rehoboam nokendo Mahalath, nyar Jerimoth, wuod Daudi, ma min mare neAbihail nyar Eliab, wuod Jesse, 19ma nonywolone yawuowi ma nyinggi Jeushgi Shemaria kod Zaham.  20Bang’ Mahalath Rehoboam nokendo Maaka nyarAbishalom ma nonywolone Abija gi Atai gi Ziza kod Shelomith.  21Rehoboamnohero Maaka, nyar Abishalom, moloyo monde duto.  Nokendo mon apar gaborogi nyiri piero auchiel.  22Rehoboam noketo Abija, wuod chiege ma Maaka,jatend owetene, nimar nodwaro mondo obed ruoth bang’ thone.  23Notiyo girieko, moketo yawuote moko e mier mochiel gi ohinga e gwenge duto magJuda gi Benjamin.  Nopogonigi mwandu mang’eny kendo nokendonigi.
Weche mag Ndalo 12Shishak, ruodh Misri, omonjo piny Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Kane loch Rehoboam osegurore motegno, en, kaachiel gi jo-Israel duto,ne giweyo chik Ruoth Nyasaye.  2Emomiyo e higa mar abich mar lochne,Shishak ruodh Misri, nomonjo Jerusalem 3gi geche alufu achiel gi miaariyo kod joidh farese alufu piero auchiel.  Jo-Libia gi jo-Suk kodjo-Kush ma nobiro kode koa Misri ne ng’eny ma ok kwan.  4Nokawo miechJuda mochiel gi ohinga nyaka nochopo Jerusalem.  5Eka Shemeya janabinodhi ir Rehoboam gi jodong Juda mane oseringo odhi Jerusalem nikechbiro mar Shishak.  Nowachonigi niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama: ‘Aweyoue lwet Shishak, nikech un bende useweya. ’ " 6Eka ruoth gi jodong Israelnobolore kawacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ni kare. " 7Kane Ruoth Nyasayeoneno ka gibolore kamano, nonyiso Shemaya niya, "Gisebolore omiyo oknatiekgi, to abiro resogi bang’ ndalo manok, kendo ok nato mirimba kuomJerusalem gi lwet Shishak.  8Kata kamano ginibed e bwo lochne, mondoging’e ni tiyona opogore gi tiyo ni ruodhi mag pinyni!"
Shishak nomonjo Jerusalem, mokawo mwandu duto mag od Ruoth Nyasaye gimag od ruoth.  Bende nokawo kuodi mag dhahabu mane Solomon oloso, 10miruoth Rehoboam noloso kuodi mag mula kar mago, momiyo jotend jorit rangadala ruoth.  11Kane ruoth dhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, jorit ne ting’okuodigo, eka bange ne gidwokogi ka od jorit. 12Kane Rehoboam osebolore kamano, mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye nodok chien, mine ok otieke.
