To bende weche ne dhi maber e Juda.  13Ruoth Rehoboamnorito piny kodak Jerusalem, kendo lochne nomedo gurore.  Ne en jahignipiero ang’wen gachiel kane odoko ruoth, kendo norito piny kuom higniapar gabiriyo, kodak Jerusalem, dala mane Ruoth Nyasaye oyiero kuomdhout Israel duto mondo nyinge obedie.  Min mare ne nyinge Naama, nyarAmon.  14Timbe Rehoboam ne richo, nikech ne ok oketo chunye kuom RuothNyasaye. 15Weche duto mag Rehoboam a chakruokgi nyaka gikogi ondiki e Kitap Wechemag Ndalo mag Shemaya janabi gi Kitap Iddo janen.  Ne nitie lweny e kindRehoboam gi Jeroboam ndalo duto.  16Rehoboam notho, moyiki but kwerene edala Daudi, Abija wuode nodoko ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo 13Loch Abija ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1E higa mar apar gaboro mar loch Jeroboam, Abija nodoko ruodh Juda. 2Norito piny kuom higni adek kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Mikayanyar Uriel ja-Gibea. Ne nitie lweny e kind Abija gi Jeroboam.  3Abija nowuok gi oganda jolwenymoyier marateke alufu mia ang’wen, kendo Jeroboam nochano jolweny moyiermarateke alufu mia aboro momanyore kod jo-Abija.  4Abija nodhi mochung’ewi got Zemaraim manie piny gode mag Efraim, mokok niya, "Winjuru inJeroboam gi jo-Israel duto! 5Donge ung’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma NyasachIsrael nomiyo Daudi gi nyikwaye loch Israel nyaka chieng’ kotimo kodgisingruok ma ok kethre? 6To kata obedo kamano Jeroboam wuod Nebat jatichSolomon wuod Daudi nopiem gi ruodhe.  7Kendo jomahundu manono noriworekode mokwedo Rehoboam wuod Solomon ka ne pod en rawera ma chunye yom,kendo ma ok nyal sirogi.
"To koro uparo ni unyalo dagi loch ma Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo nyikwa Daudimana nikech ung’eny, kendo un gi nyiroye mag dhahabu mane Jeroboamomiyou mondo obed nyisecheu? 9Donge useriembo jodolo mag Ruoth Nyasayema nyikwa Harun kod jo-Lawi, muketo jodolou kaka jopinje mamoko timo?Ng’ato ang’ata mobiro koyiedhore gi nyarwath kata gi imbe abiriyo nyalodoko jadolo ni gik ma ok Nyasaye.  10Wan to Ruoth Nyasaye e Nyasachwa,kendo ok waseweye.  Wan gi jodolo ma nyikwa Harun kod jo-Lawi ma konyogi. 11Giwang’o ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni kod ubani mang’we ng’ar okinyigodhiambo kendo giketo makati e nyime e mesa mar dhahabu maler, kendogirito sis taya gi techene mondo oliel otieno kotieno.  Kamano waritoochik Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, to un useweye.  12Neuru kaka Nyasaye nikodwa, kotelonwa.  Neuru kaka jodolone ting’o tungegi mag lweny ma gibirogoyo mondo warad kodu.  Un jo-Israel kik uked gii Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach kwereu, nimar ok unyal loye. "13Jeroboam nosepando jolweny moko mondo opo jo-Juda gi yo ka ng’egi. Kamano ogandane mar jolweny ne nie nyim jo-Juda, to joma opondo ne nikang’e gi.  14Kane jo-Juda ong’icho, ne gipo ka gineno jolweny koni gikoni, mi giywak ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo jodolo nogoyo tung’.  15Ekajo-Juda nogiyo, kendo kane gigiyo kamano, Nyasaye nokeyo Jeroboam kodjo-Israel duto e nyim Abija gi jo-Juda.  16Jo-Israel noringo jo-Juda, miNyasaye nochiwogi e lwet jo-Juda.  17Abija kod joge ne onegogi malichahinya, mi jo-Israel marateke moyier alufu mia abich notho.  18Kamano neolo jo-Israel chieng’no.  Jo-Juda to ne olocho nimar ne gigeno kuom RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi.  19Abija nolawo Jeroboam, mokawo mieche moko,kaka Bethel gi Jeshana gi Efron kod mier mokiewo kodgi.  20Loch Jeroboamne ok ochako obedo motegno kendo e ndalo mag Abija.  Bang’e Ruoth Nyasayenochwade motho.  21To loch Abija nomedo gurore motegno.  Nokendo mon apargang’wen, monywolo yawuowi piero ariyo gariyo, gi nyiri apar gauchiel. 22Koro weche moko mag Abija gi timbene duto ondiki e kitap Iddo janabi.
Weche mag Ndalo 14Loch Asa, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Abija notho moyiki but kwerene e dala Daudi.  Asa wuode nodoko ruothkare.  Piny nokue higni apar ndalo lochne.  2Timbe Asa ne beyo kendolong’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache.  3Nogolo kuonde liswa magnyiseche mag jopinje mamoko.  Noketho hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore,kendo omuko sirni milamo mag kite gi mag yien.  4Nojiwo jo-Juda mondooluw Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwerene ka gimako buchene gi chikene. 5Noketho hembko duto mane ni kuonde moting’ore gi kende mag ubani emiech Juda duto, mi piny nokue e ndalo lochne.  6Noyudo thuolo mar chielomiech Juda gi ohinga, nimar piny nokue.  Lweny ne onge e ndalone, nikechNyasaye nomiye kue.  7Asa nowacho ni jo-Juda niya, "Wageruru miechwagi,kendo wachielgi gi ohinga man gi kuonde maboyo mag ng’icho, mi wketnigirangeye miloro motegno gi lodi.  Piny pod marwa, nimar waseluwo RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachwa, mi osemiyowa kue kuonde duto. " Omiyo ne gigedo,kendo gidhi nyime maber.  8Asa ne nigi jolweny ma jo-Juda alufu mia adekmoting’o kuodi gi tong’, kod jo-Juda alufu mia ariyo gi piero aboro(
,
) moting’o okumbni gi atunge.  Jogi duto ne thuondi mager. 9Zera ja-Kush nomonjogi kod jolweny tara achiel, kod geche lweny miaadek, mochopo nyaka Maresha.  10Asa nodhi mondo oked kode, mi negichanore ni lweny e paw Zefatha but Maresha.  11Asa noywak ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasache niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, konywa nikechwageno kuomi, kendo wabiro rado gi ogandani mana e nyingi.  A RuothNyasaye, in e Nyasachwa, kik dhano adhana loyi!"12Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo Asa gi jo-Juda oloyo jo-Kush, mi jo-Kushnoringo.  13Ne gilawogi nyaka Gera, ka ginegogi oyokre, nimar RuothNyasaye gi jolwenje ema notiekogi.  Mi jo-Juda noyako gik mang’enyahinya.  14Ne giketho mier duto mokiewo gi Gera, nikech luoro moa kuomRuoth Nyasaye nomako pinyno.  Ne giyako miego duto, nimar ne nitie mwandumang’eny ma noyudo jogo oseyako.  15Ne gituro kuonde dhok, kendo negipeyo rombe gi ngamia mathoth.  Eka ne gidok Jerusalem.
Weche mag Ndalo 15Asa oloso piny Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Roho mar Nyasaye nobiro kuom Azaria wuod Oded, 2modhi romo gi Asa. Nowacho ni Asa gi jo-Juda kod jo-Benjamin niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ni kodu,to mana ka pod un kode.  Kudware, unuyude; to kuweye en bende noweu. 3Kuom higni mathoth Israel nobedo maonge gi jodolo ma puonjogi, kendo maonge gi chik.  4To ka ginie thagruok, ginidog ir Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachgi, kendo ginidware, mi giniyude.  5E ndalogo, kue nobed maonge ning’ato e yorene duto, nimar chandruok maduong’ nobi kuom ji duto modak epinyni.  6Ginitiekre kendgi ka libamba kedo gi libamba kendo dala kedo gidala, nimar Nyasaye nomigi thagruok mang’eny.  7To un, timuru chir! Lwetukik jony, nimar nochulu kuom tichu. "8Kane Asa owinjo weche mane Azaria wuod Oded okorone, notimo chir mogolonyiseche mokwer e piny Juda gi Benjamin duto kod mier duto ma nokawo epiny gode mag Efraim.  Noloso kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye manenie nyim agoch Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  9Nochoko jo-Juda gi jo-Benjamin duto gijodak ma jo-Efraim gi Manase kod Simeon, nimar ji mang’eny noseweyoIsrael mobiro ire ka gineno ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache ni kode.  10Negichokore Jerusalem e due mar adek mar higa mar apar gabich mar lochAsa.  11Chieng’no ne gitimo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni gi dhok mia abiriyomane gigolo kuom gik mane gipeyo.  12Ne gisingore mondo giluw RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi gi chunygi duto, 13kendo mondo oneg ng’atoang’ata, matin kata maduong, ma dichwo kata madhako, ma ok dwar luwoRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel.  14Ne gitimo singruok ni Ruoth Nyasayegi dwol madwong’, ka gikok kendo ka gigoyo tung’ gi oporo.  15Jo-Judaduto ne mor nikech singruokno, nimar ne gisingore gi chunygi duto.  Negidwaro Ruoth Nyasaye gi siso maduong’, mi ne giyude, kendo nomiyogi kuekuonde duto. 16Bende Asa nogolo Maaka min mare e duong’ne mar bedo min ruoth, nikechnoloso kido makuero maket gi nyasaye ma dhako miluongo ni Ashera.  Asanomuko gima ketno, mong’ade matindotindo, kendo nowang’e e dho aoraKidron.  17To ne ok oketho hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore e pinyIsrael.  Kata kamano chunye nodimbore e nyim Nyasaye ndalone duto. 18Nokawo fedha gi dhahabu kod gik lemo, mi oketo e Od Nyasaye.  Moko negin gik mane wuon mare ochiwo ni Nyasaye, to moko en ema nochiwo. Asa otimo winjruok gi Benhadad, ruodh Aram(
Ruodhi
.
-
)19Ne onge lweny nyaka higa mar piero adek gabich mar loch Asa,
Weche mag Ndalo 161to e higa mar piero adek gauchiel mar lochne, Baasha ruodh Israel nodhimomonjo jo-Juda, kendoo nochielo Rama gi ohinga, moketoe jolweny mondoogeng’ ni ji duto ma dhi ka Asa ruodh Juda, kata maa kuno.  2Eka Asanokawo fedha gi dhahabu kuom mwandu mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye kod mag odeowuon.  Noorogi ni Benhadad ruodh Aram ma nodak Damaski gi wach niya,
"Winjruok mondo obed e kindwa kodi, kaka winjruok mane nie kind wuoragi wuoru.  Ero, aoroni fedha gi dhahabu; yie iketh winjruok mane kindu giBaasha ruodh Israel, mondo owe kedo koda. " 4Benhadad noyie kwayo marruoth Asa, mi nooro jotend jolweny mondo omonj miech jo-Israel.  NokethoIjon gi Dan gi Abelmaim kod miech keno duto mag Naftali.  5Kane Baashaowinjo gima otimore, noweyo gero ohinga mar Rama, mi tijno nochung’. 6Eka ruoth Asa nodhi gi jo-Juda duto mi gigolo kite gi yien duto maneBaasha gerogo ohinga mar Rama, mi nochielogo Geba gi Mizpa. 7E ndalogo, Hanani janen nobiro ir Asa ruodh Juda mowachone niya,"Jolweny mag ruodh Aram biro tony e lweti, nikech nigeno kuom jo-Aram,to ne ok igeno kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi.  8Donge jo-Kush gijo-Libia ne gin oganda maduong’ man gi geche gi joidh farese mang’enyahinya? To Ruoth Nyasaye nochiwogi e lweti, nimar nigeno kuome, 9nikechwang’ Ruoth Nyasaye ng’iyo piny duto koni gi koni mondo onyis tekonemokonyogo joma chunygi odimbore e nyime.  Nitimo gima ofuwo kuom wachni,omiyo chakre kawuono ibiro bedo gi lwenje. " 10Wachnoo nomiyo Asa okechogi janen, mi otueye gi nyororo e od tuech.  To bende Asa nochako sandojomoko e ndalogo. 11Chakruok weche Asa nyaka gikogi ondiki e kitap Ruodhi mag Juda gi magIsrael.  12Kane Asa osebedo ruoth kuom higni piero adek gochiko, tuonomako tiendene.  Tuoneno nomedore ahinya, to kata kamano ne ok okwayoRuoth Nyasaye mondo okonye, to nodhi mana kuom ajuoke.  13Asa notho higamar piero ang’wen gachiel mar lochne moluwo kwerene.  14Noyike e liendema nokunyo e dala Daudi.  Ne gikete e ng’ango mopong’ gi gik mang’ueng’ar mane joma olony e tijno oseloso, kendo ne giloso mach mang’ongoahinya ka gimiyego duong’.
Weche mag Ndalo 17Loch Jehoshafat ogurore motegno1Jehoshafat nodoko ruoth kar Asa wuon mare.  Noikore mondo osir Israel,2omiyo noketo jolweny e miech Juda duto mochiel gi ohinga, kendo noketojotendgi e piny Juda kod e miech Efraim duto mane Asa wuon mare osekawo. 3Ruoth Nyasaye ne konyo Jehoshafat nimar Jehoshafat noluwo timbemokwongo mag wuon mare ka ok oluwo Baal.  4Nogeno Nyasach wuon marekomako buchene mak oluwo timbe jo-Israel.  5Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyolochne obedo motegno kendo jo-Juda duto nokelone mich mi nobedo gimwandu mang’eny kod huma maduong’.  6Chunye nojiwore e yor Ruoth Nyasaye,bende noketho hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore, kaachiel gi sirni milamomane nie piny Juda. 7E higa mar adek mar lochne nooro Banhail gi Obadia gi Zekaria giNethaneel kod Mikaya ma jodonge mondo odhi opuonj e miech Juda.  8Bendenooro Shemai gi Nethania gi Zebadia gi Asahel gi Shemiramoth giJehonathan gi Adonija gi Tobija kod Tobadonija ma jo-Lawi kaachiel giElishama gi Jehoram ma jodolo.  9Ne giwuotho e miech Juda duto gi KitapChike mag Ruoth Nyasaye ka gipuonjogo ji. 10Luoro moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye nomako ruodhi mag pinje mokiewo gi Juda,mi ne ok gikedo gi Jehoshafat.  11Jo-Filistia moko ne kelo ni Jehoshafatmich, kaachiel gi fedha ma gichulogo osuru.  Jo-Arabu bende nokelone imbealufu abiriyo gi mia abiriyo kod nyuogi alufu abiriyo.  12Teko Jehoshafatne medore ameda.  Nogero mier mochiel gi ohinga gi mier mag keno e Juda. 13Nokano gilweny e miego, kendo ne en gi jolweny marateke Jerusalem. 14Ma e kar rombgi, kaluwore gi dhoutgi: Jatend jolweny mar dhood Juda neen Adna mane nigi jolweny marateke alufu mia adek.  15Jalupne ne enJehohanan mane nigi ji alufu mia ariyo gi piero aboro, (
,
) kendo16jatelo mar adek ne en Amasia wuod Zikri ma nochiwore ni tich RuothNyasaye.  En to ne en gi jolweny marateke alufu mia ariyo.  17To jatendjolweny mar dhood Benjamin ne en Eliada thwon mager.  Ne en gi ji alufumia ariyo moting’o atung’ gi okumbini.  18Jalupne ne en Jehozabad manenigi jolweny alufu mia achiel gii piero aboro (
,
) moikore nilweny.  19Mano e kar romb joma ne nie tich ruoth, ka ok okwan jogo maneruoth oketo e miech Juda duto mochiel gi ohinga.
Weche mag Ndalo 18Mikaya okoro ni ibiro loyo Ahab kod Jehoshafat(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Jehoshafat koro ne nigi mwandu mang’eny kod huma maduong’ ahinya. Nomiyo jodhoodgi okendore gi jodhood Ahab, mondo okelgo winjruok.  2Bang’higni moko nodhi Samaria limo Ahab, mi Ahab noyang’one rombe gi ruedhimogundho mondo ocham gi joma nowuotho kohoye mondo owuoth gijo-Ramoth-gilead.  3Nopenjo Jehoshafat niya, "Iyie dhi kodwaRamoth-gilead?" Nodwoke niya, "Ayie, joga e jogi.  Wabiro dhi kodi elweny. "4Eka Jehoshafat nowacho ni ruodh Israel niya, "To mokwongo onego wapenjRuoth Nyasaye wach. " 5Omiyo ruodh jo-Israel nochoko jonabi mia ang’wenmopenjogi niya, "Wadhi waked gi jo-Ramoth-gilead, koso wawe?" Ne gidwokeniya, "Dhiyo nikech Nyasaye biro miyi dalano. " 6To Jehoshafat nopenjeniya, "Janabi moro mar Ruoth Nyasaye onge ka koso, ma dwapenj wach?"7Ruodh Israel nodwoke ni, "Ee, ng’at achiel pod odong’ ma dipenjnwaRuoth Nyasaye wach, en Mikaya wuod Imla, to asin kode, nikech ok okorgik mabeyo kuoma, to okoro mana gik maricho. " To Jehoshafat nowachoneniya, "Kik iwuo kamano. " 8Eka ruodh Israel noluongo jatichne moro,mowachone niya, "Dhi piyo iluong Mikaya wuod Imla. " 9Koro noyudo karuodh Israel gi Jehoshafat ruodh Juda obet e alap manie dhorangaSamaria, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato obet e kom duong’ne, korwako lawe marruoth, kendo jonabi duto ne koro wach e nyimgi.  10Zedekia wuod Kenaananosethedho tunge mag nyinyo morwako, mi nowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasayeowacho kama, ‘Ibiro chwowo jo-Aram gi tungegi. ’ " 11Jonabi duto bendenokoro wach machal kamano ka giwacho niya, "Dhiyo Ramoth-gilead mondoilo.  Ruoth Nyasaye biro chiwe e lweti. "12Jaote mane odhi luongo Mikaya nowachone niya, "Jonabi duto osekorowach nyalhodia ka giwacho ni gima ber biro timore ni ruoth.  In bende yieikor wach maber kaka gisekorono. " 13To Mikaya nodwoke niya, "Akuong’oragi nying Ruoth Nyasaye ni gima Nyasaye owachona ema abiro wacho. " 14KaneMikaya ochopo e nyim ruoth, ruoth nopenje ni, "Wadhi waked gijo-Ramoth-gilead, koso wawe?" Nodwoko niya, "Dhi mondo ilo! RuothNyasaye biro chiwogi e lweti. " 15Ruoth nowachone ni, "Asesiemi nyadidini kik iwach miriambo, to mak mana adiera kende e nying Ruoth Nyasaye?"16Mikaya nowacho niya, "Naneno jo-Israel duto koke e gode ka rombemaonge jakwath, kendo nawinjo ka Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, ‘Jogi onge giwuon-gi, we mondo gidog e miechgi gi kue. ’ "17Ruodh Israel nowacho ni Jehoshafat niya, "Donge nawachoni ni jali okdikorna wach maber, to mana marach?" 18Mikaya nowacho niya, "Koro winjwach Ruoth Nyasaye: Naneno Ruoth Nyasaye kobet e kom duong’ne, kendooganda polo duto kochung’ e bathe koni gi koni.  19Ruoth Nyasayenopenjogi niya, ‘Ere ng’ama diho Ahab ruodh Israel odhi Ramoth-gileadmondo otho kuno?’ To roho ka roho nochiwo parone, 20nyaka roho moronosudo mochung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kawacho niya, ‘An ema abiro hoye,’Ruoth Nyasaye nopenje ni, ‘Ere kaka ibiro hoye?’ 21Nodwoke ni, ‘Abirodhi bet roho mar miriambo e dho jonabine duto. ’ Ruoth Nyasaye noyieneni, ‘Ee, in ema ibiro hoye.  Dhiyo itim kamano. ’ 22Koro sani RuothNyasaye oseketo roho mar miriambo e dho jonabini duto.  To kata kamanoRuoth Nyasaye oseng’adoni buch masira. "23Eka Zedekia wuod Kenaana nosudo machiegni mothalo lemb Mikaya kopenjeniya, "Ere kaka Roho mar Ruoth Nyasaye ne nyalo a kuoma mondo owuokodi?" 24Mikaya nodwoke niya, "Chieng’ ma inidonji e ot maiye mondoipondie, eka ning’e!" 25Ruodh Israel nowacho ni, "Makuru Mikaya, uter irAmon jaduong’ Samaria kod Joash wuod ruoth, mondo jorite.  26Wachnigiuruniya, ‘Ruoth owacho ni mondo uket ng’atni e od tuech, kendo umiye manakuon abang’a gi pi kende nyaka aduog kangima. ’ " 27To Mikaya nowachoniya, "Kiduogo kingima, to kara ok asewuoyo gi dho Ruoth Nyasaye. "28Kamano ruodh Israel gi Jehoshafat ruodh Juda nodhi Ramoth-gilead. 29Ruodh Israel nowcho ni Jehoshafat niya, "Kwadhi e lweny, abiro rwakolewni moko mondo kik ji ng’eya, to in rwak lepi mag ruoth. " Kamano ruodhIsrael noloko kite kendo ne gidhi e lweny.  30To ruodh Aram nosechikojodong lweny ma jotend gechene ni kik giked gi ng’at moro amora, makmana ruodh Israel kende.  31Kane jotend geche oneno Jehoshafat, negiwacho niya, "Jal cha e ruodh Israel. " Ne gilokore ire mondo gikedkode, to Jehoshafat nogiyo, mi Ruoth Nyasaye nokonye.  Nyasaye nogologikuome, 32nimar kane jotend geche oneno ni ok en ruodh Israel, ne giweyolawe.  33To ng’at moro nodiro asere, morodhno gi kor ruodh Israel e kindchumbe mag lweny ma norwako.  Mi ruoth nowacho ni jariemb gache niya,"Wichri, igola e lweny, nikech ahinyora malit. " 34Lweny nomedorechieng’no; mi ruodh Israel noyiengore e gache kochomo jo Aram nyakaodhiambo, mi notho ka chieng’ podho.
Weche mag Ndalo 19Janabi Jehu okwero Jehoshafat1Jehoshafat ruodh Juda nodok dalane Jerusalem kongima.  2To Jehu wuodHanani ma janen nodhi romone mopenje niya, "Bende itimo maber kikonyojoricho kendo ihero joma ok ohero Ruoth Nyasaye? Mirima osemako RuothNyasaye kodi nikech wachni.  3Kata kamano kamoro bende iber, nimar nigolosirni milamo e piny, kendo iketo chunyi kuom luwo Nyasaye. "Jehoshafat oketo jong’ad bura4Jehoshafat nodak Jerusalem, to nochako owuok kolimo joge chakreBeersheba nyaka piny gode mag Efraim, modwokogi ir Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach kweregi.  5Noketo jong’ad bura e miech Juda duto mochiel giohinga, 6kendo nowachonigi niya, "Paruru gima utimo, nimar ok ung’adbura e nying dhano, to ung’ado e nying Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech ok en kodukung’ado bura.  7Emomiyo tiuru kuluoro Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ritreuru kuom gimautimo, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ok oyie gi ng’ado buch amworkata buch nyakonchiel kata chamo asoya. "8Bende Jehoshafat noketo jo-Lawi gi jodolo moko kod jodong dhout Israele Jerusalem mondo ong’ad bura e nying Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo otheg buchemilaruokie.  Od bura ne ni Jerusalem.  9Jehoshafat nochikogi kama, "Unutitijeu gi adiera kendo gi chunyu duto kuluoro Ruoth Nyasaye.  10Kamano kajoweteu modak e mier mamoko okelo wach moro e nyimu, bed ni en wach nekkata wach ketho chik Nyasaye, kata buch piny, kata buch dini, kata chikmoro amora, to nyaka upuonjgi ni kik giketh e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, nimardokech kodu kaachiel gi joweteugo.  Kutimo kamano, ok nubed gi ketho. 11Amaria jadolo maduong’ ema notelnu e weche duto mag Ruoth Nyasaye, toZebadia wuod Ishmael ma jaduong’ dhood Juda notelnu e weche duto magruoth, kendo jo-Lawi nobed jogoro.  Timuru chir, kendo Ruoth Nyasayemondo okony jogo man gi adiera. "
Weche mag Ndalo 20Jo-Moab gi jo-Amon olo e lweny1Bang’ mano jo-Moab gi jo-Amon kod jo-Meun moko nobiro kedo giJehoshafat.  2Jomoko nonyiso Jehoshafat niya, "Oganda maduong’ moa Edomloka nam biro mondo omonji, kendo gisechopo Hazazon-tamar, miluongobende ni Engedi. " 3Luoro nomako Jehoshafat, moketo chunye ni kwayo RuothNyasaye, kendo nochiko jo-Juda duto mondo otue chiemo.  4Ji noa e miechJuda duto, mi ochokore kaachiel mondo okwa kony kuom Ruoth Nyasaye. 5Kane jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem osekoro e od Ruoth Nyasaye, Jehoshafatnochung’ e nyim laru manyien, 6mokwayo niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachkwerewa, donge in e Nyasaye manie polo? Donge in e ruoth ogendini duto?Nyalo gi teko duto nie lueti maonge ng’ato ma nyalo siri.  7A Nyasachwa,donge in ema nichiwo pinyni ni nyikwa Ibrahim ma osiepni, kiriembo jomanodakie mondo owe thuolo ni jogi Israel, odagie nyaka chieng’? 8Migisedakie kendo gisegeronie Hekalu mondo nyingi obedie, 9ka giwachoniya, ‘Ka gima rach obiro kuomwa, kaka lweny kata sand kata dera katakech to wanachung’ e nyim Hekalu kendo e nyimi, nimar nyingi nika. Wanaywag e nyimi nikech masichwa, kwang’eyo ni iniwinjwa kendoinireswa. ’ 10Kane jo-Israel oa e piny Misri, ne ikwerogi ni kik gimonjjo-Amon gi jo-Moab gi jo-got Seir, omiyo ne giweyogi ma ok gitiekogi. 11To kar goyonwa erokamano, to koro gidwaro riembowa e piny mane imiyowamondo obed marwa.  12A Nyasachwa, donge ibiro kumogi? Wan waonge gi tekoma dwasirgo oganda maduong’ mabiro monjowani! Ok wang’eyo gima dwatim,to wageno mana kuomi. "13Jo-Juda duto, kaachiel gi mondegi kod nyithindgi kata matindo manadi,nochung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  14Eka Roho mar Ruoth Nyasaye nolor kuomJahazia ja-Lawi, mane nie dier chokruok.  Ne en wuod Zekaria, ma wuodBenaya, ma wuod Jeyel, ma wuod Matania, ma achiel kuom nyikwa Asaf. 15Nowacho niya, "Un jo-Juda duto gi joma odak Jerusalem, kod ruothJehoshafat, winjuru gima Ruoth Nyasaye owachonu.  Owacho ni kik uluoroganda maduong’ni, kendo chunyu kik parre, nimar lweny ok en maru to enmar Nyasaye.  16Kiny uwuognigi awuoga.  Gibiro biro ka giluwo yor Ziz,kendo unuyudgi e giko pony, yo wuok chieng’ mar thim Jeruel.  17To un,jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem, ok onego uked e lwenjni.  Kuseriedo ni lweny, touchung’ achung’a, mondo une kaka Ruoth Nyasaye biro lochonu.  Kik uluor,kendo chunyu kik parre.  Kiny uwuognigi awuoga, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye birokonyou. "18Eka Jehoshafat nogoyo chonge piny, mokulo wiye nyaka e lowo, mijo-Juda gi joma odak Jerusalem bende nogoyo chongi piny e nyim RuothNyasaye ka gilame.  19Koro jo-Lawi ma jo-Kohath gi jo-Kora nochako wer niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel gi dwol maduong’ ahinya. 20Jo-Juda ne ochiew gokinyi mang’ich mondo odhi e thim Tekoa, to kanegidhi, Jehoshafat nochung’ mowachonigi niya, "Winjuru un jo-Juda gi jomaodak Jerusalem! Genuru kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mi unukwo, kendogenuru kuom jonabi mage, mi unulo. " 21Kane oseporo wach gi joge, noyierojoma onego tel nyim jolweny korwako lep lemo, mondo opak Ruoth Nyasaye,ka wer kama:"Gouru erokamano ni Ruoth Nyasaye,nimar herane mosiko ochwere. "22Kane gichako wer kendo peko, Ruoth Nyasaye norundo jo-Amon gi jo-Moabkod jo-got Seir, mane obiro monjo jo-Juda, mi nologi.  23Noyudo kajo-Amon kod jo-Moab onywako ni jo-got Seir, motieko chuth, kendo kanegisetiekogi kamano, ne gichako negore kendgi giwegi. 24Kane jo-Juda ochopo kama oting’ore manie thim, mondo gine wasikgimang’enygo, ne gineno mana ringre joma otho ka opie piny, maonge ng’amaotony.  25Kane Jehoshafat kod joge odhi mondo oyeki, ne giyudo dhokmathoth, gi mwandu gi lewni kod gik moko mabeyo mang’eny, mane ok ginyalting’o duto.  Ne gitieko ndalo adek ka pod giyeko, nimar gigo ne ng’enyahinya.  26To chieng’ mar ang’wen ne gichokore e holo mi gipakoe RuothNyasaye.  Emomiyo kanyo ne ochak ni, holo mar Pak, nying ma pod iluongegonyaka chil kawuono.  27Eka jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem ne jodok Jerusalem, kaJehoshafat otelonigi, ka gimor nikech Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo giloyowasikgi.  28Ne gidhi Jerusalem, e Od Ruoth Nyasaye ka gigoyo tung’ githumbe mopogore opogore. 29Kane ruodhi mag pinje mamoko duto owinjo kaka Ruoth Nyasaye osekedo giwasik Israel, luoro moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye nomakogi.  30Kamano pinyJehoshafat nobet gi kue, nimar Nyasache nokelo kue e kindgi gi pinjeduto mokiewo kode. Loch Jehoshafat, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)31Mano e kaka Jehoshafat norito Juda.  Ne en jahigni piero adek gabichkane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higni piero ariyo gabich, kodakJerusalem, Min mare ne nyinge Azuba nyar Shilhi.  32Jehoshafat noluwotimbe Asa wuon mare adimba.  Timbene ne long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  33Tokata kamano, hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore ne ok okethi, kendo ji nepok oketo chunygi kuom Nyasach kweregi. 34Chakruok weche Jehoshafat nyaka gikogi yudore e kitap Jehu wuodHanani, ma koro ondik e Kitap Ruodhi mag Israel. 35Bende Jehoshafat ruodh Juda notimo winjruok gi Ahazia ruodh Israelmane timbene richo.  36Noriwore kode e tich hondho yiedhi madhi Tarshish,kendo ne gilosogi Ezion-geber.  37Eka Eliezer wuod Dadavahu ma ja-Mareshanokoro wach marach kuom Jehoshafat niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye biro ketho gimauseloso, nikech isetimo winjruok gi Ahazia. " Kamano yiedhi nobarore, maok nyal dhi Tarshish.
Weche mag Ndalo 21Loch Jehoram, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Jehoshafat notho moyike but kwerene e dala Daudi, mi Jehoram wuodenodoko ruoth kare.  2Ne en kod owetene ma nyingegi Azaria, Jahiel,Zekaria, Azaria, Mikael, kod Shefatia.  Giduto ne gin yawuot Jehoshafatruodh Juda.  3Wuon-gi nopogonigi mwandu mang’eny mag fedha gi dhahabu kodgik moko ma tekregi ng’eny kaachiel gi miech Juda mochiel gohinga.  Toloch nomiyo Jehoram nimar ne en wuode makayo.  4Kane Jehoram osebet e komduong’ mar wuon mare kendo oguroree, nonego owetene duto kod jodongomoko bende mag Israel. 5Jehoram ne jahigni piero adek gariyoo kane odoko ruoth, kendo noritopiny kuom higni aboro, kodak Jerusalem.  6Noluwo timbe ruodhi Israel kakajodhood Ahab notimo, nimar nokendo jodhood Ahab.  Timbene ne richo e nyimRuoth Nyasaye.  7To kata kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ne ok otieko dhood Daudi,nikech nosesingorene kaachiel gi nyikwaye ni anywolane nobed e komduong’ ka taya malielne nyaka chieng’.
E ndalo loch Jehoram, jo-Edom nodagi bet e bwo loch Juda, mi ne giketoruodhgi giwegi.  9Omiyo Jehoram nodhi kuno kaachiel gi jodonge mag lwenygi gechene duto, to jo-Edom nolworogi, mi Jehoram gi jotend gechenenochiew gotieno momwomo.  10Mano e kaka jo-Edom notieko loch Juda e Edomnyaka chil kawuono.  E ndalogo Libna bende nodagi bedo e bwo lochJehoram, nimar noseweyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwerene. 11Bende noloso hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore e piny gode mag Juda,momiyo jo-Jerusalem oweyo Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo omiyo jo-Juda oruenyo. 12Eka barua noa kuom Elija janabi niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Daudikwaru owacho kama,
‘Nakel masira maduong’ kuom jogi gi nyithindgi gimondi kod gigi duto, 14kendo in iwuon nibed gi tuo marach ma nochamdhokchindi kuom ndalo mang’eny nyaka giniwuog oko nikech ne ok iluwotimbe Jehoshafat wuoru kata timbe Asa ruodh Juda, 15to niluwo mana timberuodhi mag Israel.  Bende nimiyo jo-Juda gi jo-Israel oweyo Ruoth Nyasayekaka dhood Ahab nomiyo jo-Israel oweye, kendo ninego oweteni ma yawuotwuoru mane joma kare moloyi. ’ "16Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo jo-Filistia kod jo-Arabu mokiewo gi jo-Kush obedowasik Jehoram, 17mi ne gimonjo jo-Juda kendo ne gikawo gik moko dutomane giyudo e od ruoth kaachiel gi yawuote gi monde, mak mana Ahaziawuode machogo ema nodong’. 18Bang’ mago duto Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo tuo mar dhokchin ma ok nyalchango omako Jehoram.  19Tuo nomedore, mi bang’ higni ariyo dhokchindenowuok oko mi notho gi rem malit.  Joge ne ok olosone mach kaka nolosnikwerene.  20Ne en jahigni piero adek gariyo kane odoko ruoth, kendonorito piny kuom higni aboro kodak Jerusalem.  Notho ma onge ng’amaoywage.  Ne giyike e dala Daudi, to ok e liete ruodhi.
Weche mag Ndalo 22Loch Ahazia, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Mony mabiro gi jo-Arabu e lwenjno nosenego yawuot Jehoram madongo duto. Kamano e kaka Ahazia wuod Jehoram machogo nodoko ruodh Juda.  2Ahazia nejahigni piero ang’wen gariyo kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higaachiel, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Athalia nyakwar Omri. 3Ahazia bende noluwo timbe dhood Ahab nimar min mare nopuonje timbemaricho.  4Timbene ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye mana kaka timbe jodhoodAhab, nikech bang’ tho wuon mare, jogo nodoko jong’adne rieko marach mane okethe.  5Noyie puonjgi modhi Ramoth-gilead gi Joram wuod Ahab maruodh Israel mondo giked gi Hazael ruodh Aram.  To jo-Aram nohinyo Joram,6modok Jezreel ni mondo ochang kuom hinyruok ma noyudo Rama kokedo giHazael ruodh Aram. Jehu onego Ahazia(
Ruodhi
.
-
)Ahazia wuod Jehoram ma ruodh Juda nodhi Jezreel mondo one Joram wuodAhab nikech notuo.  7To Nyasaye nosechano ni mondo Ahazia otho kodhi limoJoram, omiyo, kane Ahazia ni kuno, nowuok gi Joram mondo girom gi Jehuwuod Nimshi, mane Ruoth Nyasaye oyiero mondo otiek od Ahab.  8Kane Jehunego jodhood Ahab, noromo gi jodong Juda kod Ahazia, monegogi.  9Ekanochako dwaro Ahazia, monwang’e Samaria kuma noyudo opondoe.  Ne gikeleir Jehu mi ginege.  Ne giyike maber, nikech ne giwacho ni en nyakwarJehoshafat mane oluwo Ruoth Nyasaye gi chunye duto.  Ne onge ng’ato e odAhazia manyalo bedo ruoth. Athalia okawo loch gi thwon(
Ruodhi
.
-
)10Kane Athalia min Ahazia oneno ni wuode osetho, nonego jood ruodh Judaduto.  11To Jehosheba, nyar ruodh Jehoram nogolo Joash wuod Ahazialing’ling’ kuom yawuot ruoth mane idwaro nego, mi opande e od nindokaachiel gi japite.  Jehosheba nyar ruoth Jehoram ma chi Jehoyada jadolo,kendo ma nyamin Ahazia nopando Joash, mi Athalia ne ok onege.  12Joashnodak kodgi kuom higni auchiel, kopondo e Od Nyasaye, e kinde mar lochAthalia.
Weche mag Ndalo 231E higa mar abiriyo, Jehoyada notimo chir motimo winjruok gi jotendogend lweny, ma gin Azaria wuod Jehoram, gi Ishmael wuod Jehohanan, giAzaria wuod Obed, gi Maaseya wuod Adaya, kod Elishafat wuod Zikri.  2Negiwuotho e piny Juda duto ka gichoko jo-Lawi mane nie miech Juda duto,kod jodong dhout israel, mi gibiro Jerusalem.  3Eka joma nochokore dutonotimo singruok gi ruoth e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo Jehoyada nowachoniginiya, "Neuru wuod ruoth! Waketeuru ruoth kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho kuomnyikwa Daudi.  4Gima onego utim e ma: Un jodolo gi jo-Lawi kod joritrangeye, pogreuru migepe adek.  Migawo mokwongo mondo obi e Hekaluchieng’ Sabato.  Migawo mar ariyo nyaka rit od ruoth, 5kendo migawo maradek nyaka rit rangach miluongo ni Ranga Mise, to ji mamoko duto nobed elaru mar Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  6Jodolo gi jo-Lawi makonyogi kende ema nyalodonjo e Hekalu, nimar gin joma owal ni Ruoth Nyasaye, to ji mamoko dutokik donji kata achiel, kaluwore gi chik Ruoth Nyasaye.  7Jo-Lawi nyakalwor ruoth ka girite, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato omako gilwenje e lwete.  Kang’ato moro amora dwaro donjo e Hekalu, to negeuru.  Bende kamoro amorama ruoth dhiye, to koweuru kurite. "8Jo-Lawi gi jo-Juda duto notimo gik moko duto mana kaka Jehoyada jadolonochikogi.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomgi nokelo joge mane onego a e tichchieng Sabato, kaachiel gi mago mane onego ochak tich chieng’no, nimarJehoyada jadolo ne ok omiyo migawo moro amora thuolo mara.  9Nopogo nijotend askechego tonge gi kuodi kod okumbni mane mag ruoth Daudi maneokan e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  10Nochano ji duto mondo orit ruoth, ka ng’atoka ng’ato omako gilweny e lwete, chakre yo milambo nyaka nyandwat marHekalu, ka giluwo kendo-mar-misango kaachiel gi Hekalu.  11Eka Jehoyadanogolo ruoth oko, mosidhone osimb duong’, kendo omiye kitap chik, migikete ruoth.  Jehoyada gi yawuote nowire gi mo ka gikok niya, "Ruothmondo odag aming’a!"12Kane Athalia owinjo mahu mar joma ringo kendo pako ruoth, nodhi e OdRuoth Nyasaye kama ne gintie.  13Noneno ruoth kochung’ e bath sich ruothe dhoot, ka tung’ ywak kendo ji wer.  Ji duto ne mor kendo ne goyo tung’,ka jower otelonigi gi thum.  Athalia noyiecho lepe ka kok niya, "Ujemo!Ujemo!" 14Eka Jehoyada jadolo noluongo jatend askeche, mowachonigi niya,"Goleuru oko! Kik unege e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo ka ng’at moro oluwe,to neguru ng’atno. " 15Omiyo ne gimake, kendo kane gichopo e dhorangadala ruoth miluongo ni Ranga Farese, ne ginege kanyo. 16Eka Jehoyada, kaachiel gi ji kod ruoth bende, ne josingore ni ginibedjo-Ruoth Nyasaye.  17Mi ji duto nodhi momuko od Baal, gi kende-mag-liswa,kod kido duto mag Baal e nyim kende-mag-liswago.  18Jehoyada noketo jorite Od Ruoth Nyasaye e bwo jodolo gi jo-Lawi.  Daudi nosechano jodolo gijo-Lawi mondo orit Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo omiye misengni miwang’o pep,kaka ondiki e chik Musa, ka giwero wende mor kaluwore gi chik mane enowuon ogolo.  19Jehoyada noketo jorit e dhorangeye mag Od Ruoth Nyasayeni kik ng’ato man gi chola donjie.  20Eka nodhi gi jotend askeche gijodongo kod jotend ji kaachiel gi ji duto, kendo ne giwuok gi ruoth e OdRuoth Nyasaye.  Ne gikowe nyaka od ruoth, ka giluwo dhorangach mamalo, mine gikete e kom duong’ne.  21Kane Athalia oseneg, ji duto nobedo mamor,kendo Jerusalem nokue.
Weche mag Ndalo 24Loch Joash, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Joash ne jahigni abiriyo kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higni pieroang’wen, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Zibia nyar Beer-sheba. 2Timbe Joash ne long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kuom ndalo duto mag Jehoyadajadolo.  3Jehoyada noyudone mon ariyo, mane onywologo yawuowi gi nyiri. 4Bang’ mano Joash noketo chunye mondo olos Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  5Nochokojodolo gi jo-Lawi, mowachonigi niya, "Wuothuru e miech Juda, usol pesakuom jo-Israel duto mondo ulosgo od Nyasachu higa ka higa.  Neuru niutimo piyo. " To jo-Lawi ne ok otimo kamano.  6Omiyo Ruoth noluongoJehoyada jadolo maduong’, mopenje niya, "Ang’o momiyo ok ijiw jo-Lawimondo osol osuru kuom jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem? En osuru mane Musa jatichRuoth Nyasaye oketo kuom jo-Israel mondo olosgo Hemb-Romo.  7Neye kakaAthalia, dhako machachno, gi yawuote, oseketho Od Nyasaye, kendogisekawo gik moko duto mitiyogo tich Nyasaye, mi giketo ni Baal. "8Bang’e ruoth nogolo chik mondo olos sanduk, oket e dhood Hekalu marRuoth Nyasaye gi yo ka oko, 9kendo ogo milome e Juda gi Jerusalem dutomondo ji ochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye osuru mane Musa jatich Nyasaye oketokuom jo-Israel e thim.  10Mano omiyoo jodongo gi ji duto nokelo osuru gimor, ma giketo e sandugno nyaka ne gitieko.  11E kinde ka kinde manejo-Lawi onenoe ka pesa ng’eny e sanduk, ne gitere ni jodong ruoth.  Ekajogoro mar ruoth gi jatich jadolo maduong’ ne jobiro mondo okaw sanduk. Kane gisegolo pesa, ne gidwoko sanduk kare.  Kamano e kaka ne gitimo pilepile, mi ne gichoko pesa mogundho.  12Ruoth kod Jehoyada nomiyo nyipechemane rito tich loso Od Ruoth Nyasaye pesago.  Jogo nondiko jogedo gi jopabao kod joma olony e tich chuma, gi mula mondo olos Od Ruoth Nyasaye. 13Kamano jotich ne tiyo, kendo tich nodhi nyime malong’o e lwetgi, mi negiloso Od Nyasaye maber kendo motegno, moloyo kaka ne en chon.  14Kanegisetieko tich, ne gikelo pesa modong’ ni ruoth gi Jehoyada, mi negilosogo tewni mag ubani gi agulini mag dhahabu gi mag fedha mondookonyruokgo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye kuom misengni miwang’o pep, kod tije mokomag Hekalu. Ne gitimo misengni miwang’o pep e Od Ruoth Nyasaye pile pile ndalo dutomag Jehoyada. 15Jehoyada koro noti, kendo hike oniang’, mi notho kane en jahigni miaachiel gi piero adek.  16Ne oyike e dala Daudi but liete ruodhi, nikechnosetimo maber e Israel kotiyo ni Nyasaye, kendo koloso Hekalu. 17Kane Jehoyada osetho, jodong Juda nolondho ruoth, mi noyie luworiekogi.  18Koro ji noweyo Od Ruoth Nyasaye, mi gitiyo ni sirni milamo ginyiseche mamoko.  Kethono nomiyo Nyasaye okecho kod jo-Juda gijo-Jerusalem.  19Kata kamano nooronigi jonabi mondo odwokgi ire.  Jonabigonosiemogi, to ne gidagi winjo.
Roho mar Nyasaye nobiro kuom Zekaria wuod Jehoyada jadolo, minochung’ kama oting’ore, mowacho ni ji niya, "Nyasaye owacho kama,‘Ang’o momiyo uketho chikna, momiyo ok unyal yudo hawi? Un useweya,omiyo an bende aseweyou. ’ " 21To ne giriwore ni Zekaria mi ne gigoye gikite e laru mar Od Ruoth Nyasaye kaka ruoth nochikogi, mi otho.  22Kamanowi ruoth Joash nowil gi ng’wonoo mane Jehoyada otimone, konegoo Zekariawuod Jehoyada ma notho kaywak niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye mondo one, kendoochul kuor. "23Bang’ higa achiel jolweny ma jo-Aram nobiro monjo Joash.  Ne gibiroJuda gi Jerusalem, mi ne ginego jodongo duto mag pinyno, to mwandu dutomane gikawo kuomgi ne gioro ni ruodh Damaski.  24Kata nobedo ni jo-Aramnobiro gi jolweny manok, Ruoth Nyasaye nochiwo oganda maduong’ magjolweny e lwetgi, nimar jo-Juda noseweyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachkweregi.  Kamano jo-Aram notimo gima buch Ruoth Nyasaye noseng’ado kuomJoash. 25Kane jo-Aram osea, ne giweyo Joash kohinyore malit.  Eka jodongenoriwone nikech remb wuod Jehoyada jadolo, mi ne ginege e kitandane. Kamano e kaka notho, mi ne giyike e dala Daudi, to ok kar yiko ruodhi. 26Joma noriwone ne gin Zabad wuod Shimeath nyar Amon, kod Jehozabad wuodShimrith nyar Moab.  27Weche mang’eny mane jonabi okoro kuome kagisiemego, kendo kaka noloso Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kaachiel gi timbeyawuote, ondiki e kitabu monyisie weche mag Kitap Ruodhi.  Amazia wuodenodoko ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo 25Loch Amazia, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Amazia ne jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, kendo noritopiny kuom higni piero ariyo gochiko, kodak Jerusalem.  2Timbe Amazia nelong’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, to ne ok otimgi gi chunye duto.  3Kaneosegurore e tich ruoth, nonego joma nonego wuon mare mane ruoth.  4Ne okonego nyithindgi, to noluwo chik mondiki e kitap Musa, kama RuothNyasaye owachoe niya, "Kik uneg wuone nikech richo mag nyithindgi, bendekik uneg nyithindo nikech richo mag wuonegi, to ng’ato ka ng’ato nonegmana nikech richone owuon. "5Eka Amazia nochoko jo-Juda gi jo-Benjamin duto moketonigi jotelomadongo gi matindo kaluwore gi dhoutgi.  Nokwano joma osetieko hignipiero ariyo kod mosekadho kanyo, monwang’o ni gin joma ochwiny alufu miaadek moromo kedo, kendo mong’eyo diro tong’ kod ting’o okumba.  6Bendenondiko jo-Israel mathwondi alufu mia achiel kuom kilo alufu adek magfedha.  7To ng’at Nyasaye moro nobiro ire mowachone niya, "A Ruoth, kikiwe jolweny mag jo-Israel dhi kodi nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ok ni kodjo-Israel ma jo-Efraimgi.  8To kiparo ni mano e kaka inyalo loyo lweny,to Nyasaye biro mana miyo wasiki loyi, nimar en ema en gi teko mar konyokata mar wito. " 9Amazia nopenjo ng’at Nyasaye niya, "To wabiro timoang’o kuom kilo alufu adek ma asemiyo jolweny ma jo-Israel?" Ng’atNyasaye nodwoke niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye nigi teko mar miyi moloyo mago. "10Eka Amazia noriembo jolweny mane oa Efraim, mi ne gidok miechgi kagikecho ahinya gi jo-Juda.  11To Amazia notimo chir, mowuok gi jo-Juda kagidhi holo Kado, mi ne ginego jo-Seir alufu apar kuno.  12Bende ne gimakoji alufu apar kangima, mi ne gitero ewi lwanda moro, kendo ne gidhirogipiny, mi githo ka gitur bonje bonje.  13To jolweny mane Amazia oriembo niok ginyal dhi kode e lweny nomwomore kuom miech Juda chakre Samarianyaka Beth-horon, mi ne ginego ji alufu adek, kendo gipeyo gik mang’eny. 14Kane Amazia oa nego jo-Edom, nobiro gi nyiseche jo-Seir, moketogi kanyisechene, kolamogi kendo owang’onigi ubani.  15Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasayenokecho gi Amazia, moorone janabi moro, mopenje niya, "Ang’o momiyoigeno kuom nyiseche mag jopiny moro mane ok nyal reso joma lamogi elweti?" 16Kane pod janabino wuoyo, ruoth nopenje niya, "Waseketi jabuchruoth koso? Ling’! Koso idwaro tho?" Mi janabi noling’ matin, to bang’enowacho niya, "Koro ang’eyo ni Nyasaye osechano mondo otieki, nikechisedagi winjo puonjna. "17Bang’e Amazia ruodh Juda noporo wach gi joge mane ng’adone rieko, miooro joote ir Jehoash wuod Jehohoahaz ma wuod Jehu, ruodh Israel,kowachone niya, "Bi mondo waradi. " 18To Jehoash ruodh Israel nodwokoAmazia ruodh Juda gi ngero niya, "Okuro moro man Lebanon nooro wach niyath maduong’ man Lebanon, kowachone niya, ‘Yie mondo wuoda okendnyari. ’ To nopo ka le moro kadho kanyo, monyono okurono, moketho.  19InAmazia, iwuorori ni iseloyo jo-Edom, mi koro iwuoyo gi sunga.  To bermondo ibed mana e dala.  Ang’o momiyo iero miero ma biro tieki kaachielgi jo-Juda?"20To Amazia ne ok odewo, nimar ne en dwaro Nyasaye mondo ochiw jo-Juda elwet wasikgi, nikech ne gigeno kuom nyiseche jo-Edom.  21Omiyo Jehoashruodh Israel nodhi Beth-shemesh dala mar Juda.  Nokedo gi Amazia ruodhJuda kuno, 22kendo jo-Israel noloyo jo-Juda, moringo nyaka miechgi. 23Jehoash ruodh Israel nomako Amazia wuod Joash ma wuod Ahazia, ruodhJuda, e Beth-Shemesh, modwoko Jerusalem.  Nomuko bath ohinga marJerusalem ma borne mita mia ariyo, chakre dhoranga Efraim nyakadhorangach kama ohinga ogomogo.  24Nokawo fedha gi dhahabu kod gik mokoduto mane onwang’o e Od Ruoth Nyasaye mane Obed-edom rito.  Nokawo bendemwandu mag od ruoth, kaachiel gi ji moko, motueyo ka gir singo.  Ekanodok Samaria. 25Amazia wuod Joash ruodh Juda nodak higni apar gabich bang’ tho Jehoashwuod Jehoahaz, ruodh Israel.  26Chakruok timbe Amazia nyaka gikogi,ondiki e Kitap Ruodhi mag Juda gi Israel.  27Chakre ndalo mane Amaziaoweyoe Ruoth Nyasaye, jo-Jerusalem moko nojame, mi noringoo nyakaLakish.  To ne gilawe, mi ginege kuno.  28Ne giting’o ringre gi farese, kagidwoko e dala Daudi, mi noyike but kwerene.
Weche mag Ndalo 26Loch Uzia, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Jo-Juda duto noketo Uzia ruoth kar Amazia wuon mare, ka en jahigni apargauchiel.  2Kane wuon mare osetho, nokawo dala mar Elath modwoko nijo-Juda, eka nochiele gi ohinga.  3Uzia ne jahigni apar gauchiel kaneodoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higni piero abich gariyo, kodak Jerusalem. Min mare ne nyinge Jekolia nyar Jerusalem.  4Timbe Uzia ne long’o e nyimRuoth Nyasaye mana kaka timbe Amazia wuon mare.  5Noketo chunye kuom luwoNyasaye e ndalo Zekaria, jal mane opuonje luoro Nyasaye, kendo ndaloduto mane oluwoe Ruoth Nyasaye, noyudo gueth. 6Uzia nodhi kedo gi jo-Filistia, momuko ohinga mar Gath gi mar Jabne kodmar Ashdod.  Nogero mier e gweng’ Ashdod kod kuonde moko e piny Filistia. 7Nyasaye nokonye loyo jo-Filistia, gi jo-Arabu mane odak Gur-baal, kodjo-Meun.  8Uzia noketo ni jo-Amon osuru, kendo humbe nolak nyaka mbapMisri, nimar nosedoko ruoth maduong’ ahinya.  9Nogero kuonde maboyo magng’icho e Jerusalem e dhorangach kama ohinga ogomogo, gi e dhorangaHoho, kod e giko ohinga, moketoe gilweny.  10E thim bende nogeroe kuondemaboyo mag siro lweny, kendo nokunyo yewni mang’eny, nimar ne en gijamni mathoth e piny gode kendo e piny pap, bende ne en gi jopur gijopith mzabibu mane tiyone e gode kod kuonde momew, nikech nohero pur. 11Uzia ne nigi joma oikore ni lweny, mopog e migepe kaka Jeyel jagoro giMaaseya jatelo nosechano.  Achiel kuom jotend lweny mag ruoth ma nyingeHanania ema noritogi.  12Kar romb jodong dhoudi mane thuondi mager wuokiene alufu ariyo gii mia auchiel.  13Ne gin jotend jolweny marateke alufumia adek gabiriyo gi mia abich (
,
) ma dikony ruoth kedo gi wasike. 14Uzia noiko ni jolweny kuodi gi tong’ gi ogute kod akor mag chuma, giatunge gi kite midiro gorujre.  15Noloso masinde midirogo aserni gi kitemadongo mane joma riek ofwenyo, moketo kuonde maboyo mag ng’icho, kodkuonde ma ohinga ogomogo e Jerusalem.  Humbe nolak malach ahinya, kendonodoko motegno nikech Ruoth Nyasaye nokonye miwuoro. 16Kane Uzia osedoko motegno kamano, nobedo jasunga mi okethore.  NochayoRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache, modonjo ei Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye mondoowang’ ubani e kendo-mar-ubani.  17To Azaria jadolo, kaachiel gi jodolomamoko mag Ruoth Nyasaye piero aboro ma jochir noluwe mondo okwere, 18kagiwachone niya, "Wang’o ubani ni Ruoth Nyasaye ok en tiji, Uzia, to entich jodolo ma nyikwa Harun, mowal ni tijno.  Aye Kama Ler! Iketho! RuothNyasaye nyalo kumi nikech wachni. " 19To Uzia nokecho.  Noyudo ka en gitap mach e lwete, mondo owang’ie ubani.  To kane mirima omake gi jodolokamano, dhoho notuch e lela wang’e e nyim jodolo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye butkendo-mar-ubani.  20Kane Azaria jadolo maduong’ gi jodolo duto orange, negineno dhoho e lela wang’e, mi gigole oko mapiyo.  To en bende noretomondo owuogi, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye nosechwade.  21Ruoth Uzia nobedojadhoho nyaka chieng’ thone, emomiyo nodak e ot kar kende, kendo ne okoyiene donjo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  Jotham wuode nobedo jatend od ruoth,kendo norito piny. 22Chakruok weche Uzia nyaka gikogi, Isaya janabi wuod Amoz ema nondiko. 23Uzia notho, moyike but kwerene e paw liete ruodhi, to ok e lietegihie, nimar ne en jadhoho.  Jotham wuode nodoko ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo 27Loch Jotham, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Jotham ne jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuomhigni apar gauchiel, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyinge Jerusha nyarZadok.  2Timbe Jotham ne long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kaka timbe Uziawuon mare, kendo en ne ok odonjo e Hekalu kaka wuon mare nodonjo.  Totimbe ji ne pod richo. 3Jotham nogero dhorangach mamalo mar Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo notiyoahinya kuom gero ohinga mar Ofel.  4Bende nogero mier e piny gode magJuda gi kuonde maboyo mag ng’icho kod mag siro lweny e gode motimobunge.  5Nokedo gi ruodh jo-Amon, mi oloyo.  E higano jo-Amon nomiye kiloalufu ang’wen mag fedha, gi gunde alufu apar mag ngano, kod gunde alufuapar mag shairi.  Ne gimedo miye kamano e higa mar ariyo kod mar adek. 6Kamano Jotham nobedo gi teko, nikech timbene ne long’o e nyim RuothNyasaye ma Nyasache. 7Koro weche moko mag Jotham, gi lwenjene, kod timbene duto, ondiki ekitap Weche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Israel gi Juda.  8Ne en jahignipiero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higni apargauchiel, kodak Jerusalem.  9Notho moluwo kwerene, mi noyike e dalaDaudi.  Ahaz wuode nodoko ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo 28Loch Ahaz, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Ahaz ne jahigni piero ariyo kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higniapar gauchiel, kodak Jerusalem.  To timbene ne ok long’o e nyim RuothNyasaye kaka timbe Daudi kwar mare ne long’o.  2Noluwo timbe maricho magruodhi mag Israel, mothedho koda ka kido mag Baal.  3Nowang’o ubani eholo mar Ben-hirom, kendo nowang’o yawuote ka misango, koluwo timbemakuero mag ogendini mane Ruoth Nyasaye oriembo mondo owe thuolo nijo-Israel.  4Bende notimo misengni, kendo nowang’o ubani e hembko, gi ewigode, kod e tiend yath moro amora motimo otiep.
Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache ne ochiwe e lwet ruodh Aram, mioloye, kendo omako joge mang’eny, motero Damaski.  Bang’e Ruoth Nyasayenochiwe e lwet ruodh Israel ma bende noloye, monego joge oyokre. 6Odiechieng’no, Peka wuod Ramalia nonego jo-Juda ma thuondi mia achielgi piero ariyo.  Ne ologi nikech ne giseweyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachkweregi.  7Zikri thwon Efraim nonego Maaseya wuod ruoth, gi Azkiramjaduong’ od ruoth, kod Elkana jalup ruoth. 8Jo-Israel nomako owetegi alufu mia ariyo, (
,
) kaachiel gi mondgigii nyithindgi machwo kod manyiri.  Bende ne giyako mwandugi mang’eny magitero Samaria.  9To noyudo ka janabi mar Ruoth Nyasaye ni kuno ma nyingeOded.  Nodhi romo ni jolweny mane dok Samaria, mowachonigi niya, "RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu nochiwo jo-Juda e lwetu nimar nokecho kodgi,to un koro usenegogi achadha marach, mi wachno osetundo e polo.  10To ekapod udwaro ni mondo jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem machwo gi mamon obedwasumbni mau! Un uwegi donge un gi ketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu? 11Koro winjuru! Weuru oweteu mane umako odhi, nimar RuothNyasaye chiegni kecho kodu. " 12Azaria wuod Johanan gi Berekia wuodMeshilemoth gi Jehizkia wuod Shalum kod Amasa wuod Hadlai ma jodongEfraim bende nodhi romo ni joma ne a e lweny, 13mokwerogi, kawachoniginiya, "Ok unyal kelo joma omaki kaeni, nimar kutimo kamano, to ubiromiyo waketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kwamedo richo ewi mago mane wasetimo. Kethowa osebedo mang’eny ahinya, omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye okecho malich gijo-Israel. " 14Kane jolweny owinjo wechego, ne gigonyo joma omaki, kendone gidwoko gik mane oyaki, ka jodongo gi joma nochokore neno.  15Mi jomanyinggi oseluongigo nokonyo joma omaki, kamiyo joma ne ni duge nengnimogol kuom gik moyaki.  Ne gichiwonigi lewni kod wuoche, kendo negimiyogi chiemo, bende ne giwirogi gi mo.  Ne giting’o jogo duto moyomnogi kenje, ka giterogi kuom jowetegi Jeriko, dala mar othidhe.  Bang’e negidok Samaria. 16E kindeno ruoth Ahaz nokwayo ruodh Asuria mondo okonye, 17nikechjo-Edom noseduogo momonjo jo-Juda, mi oloyo, kendo omako ji mang’eny. 18Jo-Filistia bende nosemonjo miech Juda manie piny pap kod manie thim. Ne gikawo Beth-shemesh gi Aijalon gi Gederoth kod Soko gi Timna gi Gimzokod mier mokiewo kodgi, mi gidakie.  19Ruoth Nyasaye nothiro jo-Judanikech Ahaz ruodhgi notimo timbe machach e Juda, koweyo Ruoth Nyasaye. 20Tiglath-pileser ruodh Asuria nobiro ir Ahaz, to kar konye, to nomonje. 21Emomiyo Ahaz nokawo gik moko e Od Ruoth Nyasaye gi od ruoth kod utjodongo, momiyo ruodh Asuria kaka osuru, to mano ne ok okonye. 22To Ahaz achielni nomedo ketho ni Ruoth Nyasaye e ndalo marchandruokne, 23nikech notimo liswa ni nyiseche mag jo-Damaski mane oyudooseloye.  Nowacho niya, "Abiro golo liswa ni nyiseche mag ruodhi Aram,mondo okonya kaka ne gikonyo ruodh Aram. " To ne gimiyo othirno kaachielgi jo-Juda duto.  24Bende Ahaz nochoko gik lemo mag Od Nyasaye, mong’adoong’ado.  Noloro dhout Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo nogerokende-mag-liswa kuonde duto e Jerusalem.  25Noloso hembko e mier duto magJuda mondo owang’ie ubani ni nyiseche manono, kokwinyogo Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasach kwerene. 26Chakruok weche Ahaz nyaka gikogi, kaachiel gi timbene duto, ondiki eKitap Ruodhi mag Juda gi Israel.
Ahaz notho, moluwo kwerene, mi noyike Jerusalem, to ok e liete ruodhiIsrael.  Hezekia wuode nodoko ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo 29Loch Hezekia, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Hezekia ne jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, morito pinykuom higni piero ariyo gochiko, kodak Jerusalem.  Min mare ne nyingeAbija nyar Zekaria.  2Timbe Hezekia ne long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, kakatimbe Daudi kwar mare. Hezekia ochako oloso wach lemo e Hekalu3E due mokwongo mar higa mane ochakoe lochne, noyawo dhout Hekalu marRuothh Nyasaye, moloso.  4Noluongo jodolo gi jo-Lawi, mochoko e laru mayo wuokchieng’, 5mi nowachonigi niya, "Winjuru un jo-Lawi! Pwodhreuru,kendo upwodh Od Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kwereu, kugolo chilo man KamaLer.  6Kwerewa noweyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa kane gitimo timbemaricho e nyime.  Ne giweye, mi gilokone ng’egi, kendo kata mana kardakne, ne ok gidwar neno.  7Bende ne ginego teyni, mi giloro dhout agola,kendo ne giweyo wang’o ubani kata timo misengni miwang’o pep ni NyasachIsrael e Hekalu.  8Emomiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho, moloko jo-Juda giJerusalem gima lich miwuoro, mabwogo ji, kendo michicho, kaka unenouwegi.  9Mano emomiyo wuonewa notho e lweny, kendo yawuotwa gi nyiwa kodmondwa oseter kuma bor e tuech.  10Koro adwaro singora ni Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasach Israel ni wanamak chikne, mondo chunye olend kuom mirimamager ma en go kodwa.  11Un nyithinda, kik koro umalru, nimar RuothNyasaye oseyierou mondo uti e nyime ka jodolone, kutimone misengni. "12Eka Mahath wuod Amasai gi Joel wuod Azaria ma joka Kohath, kod Kishwuod Abdi gi Azaria wuod Jahalel ma joka Merari, kod Joa wuod Zima giEden wuod Joa ma joka Gershon, 13kod Shimri gi Jeuel ma joka Elizafan,kod Zekaria gi Matania ma joka Asaf, 14kod Jehuel gi Shimei ma jokaHeman, kod Shemaya gi Uziel ma joka Jeduthun, ma duto jo-Lawi, 15nochokojowetegi kaachiel.  Ne gipwodhore giduto, eka ne gidonjo e Od RuothNyasaye, mi gilose kaka ruoth nochikogi e nying Ruoth Nyasaye.  16Jodolonodonjo e ot maiye mar Hekalu mondo gilosi.  Ne gigolo chilo duto manegiyudo e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, mi giketo e laru mar Hekalu, eka jo-Lawinokawo chilono, motero e aora Kidron.  17Ne gichako tich loso hekaluchieng’ mokwongo mar due mokwongo, mi ne gichopo e agoch Hekalu chieng’mar aboro mar dueno.  Eka ne giloso Od Ruoth Nyasaye kuom ndalo aboromoko, mi ne gitieko tich chieng’ mar apar gauchiel mar due mokwongono. 18Bang’e ne gidhi ir ruoth Hezekia e ode, mi giwachone niya, "WaselosoOd Ruoth Nyasaye duto, kaachiel gi kendo-mar-misango, kod mesa marmakati miketo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye pile, kaachiel gi gik lemo duto. 19Bende gik moko duto mane ruoth Ahaz owito e ndalo lochne kane oweyoRuoth Nyasaye, waseiko mwapwodho, kendo koro waseketogi e nyimkendo-mar-misango mar Ryuoth Nyasaye. "20Kinyne Hezekia nochiew gokinyi mang’ich, moluongo jodong Jerusalemkanyakla, mi gidhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  21Ne gikelo ruedhi abiriyo girombe abiriyo gi nyirombe abiriyo kod nyuogi abiriyo, mondo gitimgomisango mar go richo mag dhood joka ruoth gi mag jodolo kod mag jo-Judaduto.  Nochiko jodolo ma nyikwa Harun mondo otim kodgi misango ekendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  22Omiyo noyang’ ruedhi gi imbe kodnyirombe, kendo rembgi nomi jodolo, moolo e kendo-mar-misango.  23Ekanokel nyuogi mag misango mar golo richo e nyim Ruoth gi joma ochokore,mi ne giketo lwetgi kuomgi.  24Bang’e jodolo noyang’ogi mi gitimo misangomar golo richo kod rembgi e kendo-mar-misango mondo ochulgo richo magjo-Israel duto.  Ne gitimo kamano nikech ruoth nochiko mondo otim misangomiwang’o pep, kod misango mar golo richo, mondo opwodhgo richo magjo-Israel duto. 25Hezekia noketo jo-Lawi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, momiyogi thumbe mopogoreopogore, kaluwore gi chik Daudi, gi mar Gad janen mar ruoth, kod marNathan janabi.  Chik mane jonabi ogolono noa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye.  26Kanejo-Lawi oseikore gi thumbe mane Daudi oloso, kendo jodolo bende oikoregi tungegi, 27Hezekia nogolo chik mondo otim misango miwang’o pep ekendo-mar-misango.  Kane jodolo ochako timo misango miwang’o pepno,jo-Lawi bende nochako wer, kendo ne gigoyo tung’ kaachiel gi thumbe maneDaudi ruodh Israel oloso.  28Joma nochokore duto nolamo Nyasaye, ka jowerwer, kendo jogo tung’ goyo tungegi.  Mano nodhi nyime nyaka misangomiwang’o pep norumo.  29Eka ruoth kod ji duto mane ni kode nokulore,kalamo Ruoth Nyasaye.  30Bang’e ruoth Hezekia kod jodonge nochiko jo-Lawimondo opak Ruoth Nyasaye gi wende mane Daudi kod Asaf janen ochwogo.  Negiwer gi mor, kendo ne gikulore ka gilamo Ruoth Nyasaye. 31Eka Hezekia nowacho niya, "Kaka usechiworu ni Ruoth Nyasaye, korokeluru misengni mag erokamano e Od Ruoth Nyasaye. " Mi joma nochokorenokelo misengni mag erokamano.  32Gik mane okel mondo otimgo misangomiwang’o pep, ne gin ruedhi piero abiriyo, gi imbe mia achiel, kodnyirombe mia ariyo.  Mago duto nochiw mondo otimgo misango miwang’o pepni Ruoth Nyasaye.  33To mago mane okel ni mondo otimgo misengni magerokamano ne ruedhi mia auchiel gi rombe alufu adek.  34Jodolo ne nokahinya, mane ok nyal yang’o jamni mitimogo misengni miwang’o pep,emomiyo jowetegi ma jo-Lawi nokonyogi tich nyaka jodolo moko notiekopwodhore.  Jo-Lawi ne jokinda kuom tich pwodhruokgi moloyo jodolo.  35Ewitich timo misengnigo ne nitie bende tich dolo mar wang’o bor magmisengni mag erokamano, kaachiel gi misengni miolo piny kuom misengnimiwang’o pep.  Kamano e kaka tich Od Ruoth Nyasaye nodwok kare, 36Hezekiagi joge duto ne mor nikech gima Nyasaye nosetimonigi, nimar ginonitimore apoya.
Weche mag Ndalo 30Ji ochako timo Sap Pasaka kendo1 Hezekia nooro joote ir jo-Israel gi jo-Juda duto, kendo nondiko barupebende ni jo-Efraim gi jo-Manase koluongogi ni mondo gibi Jerusalem e OdRuoth Nyasaye mondo gitim Sap Pasaka ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel. 2Ruoth noseporo wach gi jodonge kod jobura duto man Jerusalem ni mondogitim Pasaka e due mar ariyo.  3Ne ok ginyal time e ndalo monego timee,nimar jodolo ne pok opwodhore mang’eny moromo, to ji bende ne pokochokore Jerusalem.  4Wachni ne ber ni ruoth kod jobura duto.  5Kamano neging’ado bura mondo ogo milome e Israel duto, chakre Beer-sheba, yomilambo nyaka Dan, yo nyandwat, mondo ji obi Jerusalem otim Pasaka niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, nikech ji ne pok otime mang’eny kakachik dwaro. 6Omiyo joote nodhi e piny Israel gi Juda duto, kaka ruoth nochiko, kagitero barupe moa kuom ruoth gi jodonge, mondikie niya, "Un jo-Israelmosetony e lwet ruodhi mag Asuria, koro duoguru ir Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Ibrahim gi Isaka kod Israel, mondo en bende oduog iru.  7Kikuchal gi kwereu kod oweteu mane oweyo ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi,momiyo noweyogi ma gikethore chuth kaka uneno.  8Koro kik utim wichtekokaka kwereu notimo, to chiwreuru ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo udonj e Hekalu,ma Ruoth Nyasaye oseguedho mondo obed mare nyakachieng’.  Tiuru ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu, mondo chunye olend kuom mirima mager ma en go kodu. 9Kuduogo kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, eka oweteu gi nyithindu noyud ng’wono kuomjoma nomakogi, mi giniduogi e pinyni, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachung’won, kendo jamiwafu, omiyo ka uduogo kuome, to ok noloknu ng’eye. "10Kamano joote nodhi e dala ka dala e piny Efraim gi Manase duto nyakaZebulun, to ji nonyierogi anyiera ka charogi.  11Mak mana jomoko manok machunygi muol ema noa Asher gi Manase kod Zebulun, mobiro Jerusalem.  12Topiny Juda ema ne Nyasaye otiyoe gi teko, momiyogi chuny achiel mar winjowachne kaka ruoth gi jodonge nochikogi.  13Omiyo ji mang’eny nochokoreJerusalem e due mar ariyo, mondo gitim Sap Makati maduong’ miwuoro.  14Negigolo kende-mag-liswa duto mane ni Jerusalem, kaachiel gi kendemiwang’oe ubani, mi giwito e holo Kidron. 15Ne ginego nyarombo mar Pasaka chieng’ due apar gang’wen mar due marariyo.  Jodolo gi jo-Lawi noyudo wichkuot, omiyo ne gipwodhore mi gikelomisengni miwang’o pep e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  16Ne gikawo keregi e tich,kaluwore gi chik Musa ng’at Nyasaye, kendo jodolo nokiro remo manejo-Lawi ogamonigi.  17Ne nitie ji mang’eny e chokruok mane pok opwodhore,omiyo jo-Lawi nonego nyarombo mar Pasaka ni ng’ato ka ng’ato mane okler, mondo opwodhe ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  18Adieri, ji mathoth, ma ng’enyginoa Efraim gi Manase gi Isakar kod Zebulun, ne pok opwodhore, to katakamano ne gichamo Pasaka, ka ok giluwo chik.  To Hezekia nokwayonigikawacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye mang’won, ma Nyasach kwerewa, mondo ong’wonni ng’ato ka ng’ato 19moketo chunye kuome, kata obedo ni ng’atno okopwodhore kaka chik Hekalu dwaro. " 20Mi Ruoth Nyasaye nowinjo kwayoHezekia moweyo ni ji kethogi. 21Jo-Israel mane ni Jerusalem notimo Sap Makati ma ok ketie Thowi gi mormaduong’ kuom ndalo abiriyo, kendo jo-Lawi gi jodolo ne pako RuothNyasaye odiechieng’ kodiechieng’, ka giwerne gi tekogi duto.  22Hezekianopako jo-Lawi duto, nimar ne gitiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachkweregi. 23Eka joma nochokorego duto noyie ni mondo gimed timo sawo kuom ndaloabiriyo moko, mi ne gitimo kamano gi mor.  24Hezekia ruodh Juda nomiyogiruedhi alufu achiel gi rombe alufu abiriyo mondo gitimgo misango, tojodongo nochiwo ruedhi alufu achiel gi rombe alufu apar.  Mi jodolomang’eny ahinya nopwodhore.  25Joma nochokore duto mane oa Juda, kodjodolo gi jo-Lawi, kaachiel gi ji mane oa Israel kod jodak manie Israelgi Juda ne jobedo gi mor maduong’.  26Kamano ne nitie mor maduong’ ahinyaJerusalem, nimar chakre ndalo Solomon wuod daudi ruodh Israel, gimoromachal kamano ne pok otimore Jerusalem.  27Jodolo gi jo-Lawi noguedhojoma nochokore, mi Nyasaye nowinjogi, ka lemogi otundo kar dakne e polo.
Weche mag Ndalo 311Kane mago duto oserumo, jo-Israel duto mane osechokore Jerusalem nodhie miech Juda.  Ne gimuko sirni milamo mag kite gi mag yien, gi ut lemomag hembko, kod kende-mag-liswa e piny Juda gi Benjamin kod Efraim giManase, nyaka ne gitieko kethogi duto te.  Eka jo-Israel duto nodok emiechgi. Hezekia opogo mwandune ni jodolo gi jo-Lawi2Bang’e Hezekia nopogo jodolo gi jo-Lawi e migepe mopogore opogore, kakatichgi nobet.  Moko noketo mondo otim misengni miwang’o pep, to mokomisengni mag sawo, kendo moko mondo orit dhorangeye mag Od RuothNyasaye, to moko mondo ogo erokamano kendo opak Ruoth Nyasaye gi wer.
Ruoth ne golo kuom mwandune owuon gik mitimogo misengni miwang’o pepokinyi godhiambo, kod miwang’o e ndalo mag Sabato, kendo ka due opor,kendo e ndalo mag sewni moketi, kaka ondiki e chik Ruoth Nyasaye.  4Bendenochiko joma nodak Jerusalem mondo ochiw ni jodolo gi jo-Lawi pokgi,mondo gichiwre ni chopo chik Ruoth Nyasaye.  5Kane wachni oselandore epiny, jo-Israel nochiwo cham ma gikwongo kayo, gi divai ma gikwongoloso, gi mor zeituni mokwongo nyak, gi mor kich, kod gik moko magpuodho, kendo ji mang’eny nokelo achiel kuom apar mag gik moko duto. 6Jo-Juda gi jo-Israel mane odak e miech Juda nokelo achiel kuom apar mardhok gi rombe bende, kod gik mosechiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi, mine giketogi pidhe pidhe.  7Ne gichako dhuro pidhego e due mar adek, kendone gitieko dhurogi e due mar abiriyo.  8Kane Hezekia gi jodonge obiromoneno pidhego, ne gipako Ruoth Nyasaye gi joge Israel bende.  9EkaHezekia nopenjo jodolo gi jo-Lawi wach pidhego, 10mi Azaria jadolomaduong’, ma jadhood Zadok, nodwoke niya, "Nyaka ne gichak kelo chiwo eOd Ruoth Nyasaye, wasechiemo mwayieng’, kendo chiemo mang’eny pododong’, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye oseguedho joge.  Mano emomiyo wadong’ gichiemo mang’enygi. "11Eka Hezekia nochikogi mondo gilos kuonde keno e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  Kanegisetimo kamano, 12ne gikano chiwo mag achiel kuom apar, kod gik mochiwni Ruoth Nyasaye kaka nochikgi.  Konania ja-Lawi ne jarit maduong’ margigo, kendo Shimei omin mare nobedo jalupne, 13to ruoth Hezekia giAzaria jaduong’ Hekalu noketo Jehiel gi Azazia gi Nathan gi Azahel giJerimoth gi Jozabad gi Eliel gi Ismakia gi Mahath kod Benaya mondookonygi.  14Koreh wuod Imna ja-Lawi ma jarit dhorangach ma yo wuokchieng’ norito gik ma ji chiwo ni Nyasaye kuom herogi.  Tichne ne en pogoni jodolo gik mochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kod chiwo maler moloyo.  15Eden giMiniamin gi Jeshua gi Shemaya gi Amaria kod Shekania ne konyo Koreh giKinda, ka gidak e miech jodolo.  Ne gipogo gik moko ni owetegi madongo gimatindo duto te, 16mosetieko higni adek, mak mana joma chwo ma nyingginosechan ema ne ok pognigi gimoro, nikech ne giyudo pokgi pile, ka gidhie Od Ruoth Nyasaye mondo giti tichgi e migepegi.  17Jodolo nochankaluwore gi dhoutgi, to jo-Lawi mosetieko higni piero ariyo nochankaluwore gi tichgi.  18Jodolo nochan kaachiel gi mondgi kod nyithindgimachwo gi manyiri duto, nimar ne gitimo kinda kuom bedo joma kare e nyimNyasaye.  19Noyier ji moko e mier mopogore opogore mondo opog gik moko nijodolo ma nyikwa Harun mane odak oko e puothe man but miechgi madongo,kendo ni jo-Lawi duto ma nyinggi osechan. 20Kamano e kaka Hezekia notimo e piny Juda duto.  Timbene ne beyo e nyimRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasache, kendo ne ok oweye.  21Tije duto ma notimo e OdNyasaye notimo koluwo chik, kendo kodwaro Nyasaye gi chunye duto, minoyudo gueth.
Weche mag Ndalo 32Senakerib ruodh Asuria omonjo piny Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)1Kata obedo ni Hezekia nosetiyo ni Nyasaye maber kamano, Senakerib ruodhAsuria, nobiro momonjo jo-Juda, kendo nolworo miechgi mochiel gi ohingani mondo okaw.  2Kane Hezekia oneno ni Senakerib ruodh Asuria osebiromondo omonj Jerusalem, 3noporo wach gi joge kod joma rateke ni mondoodin sokni mane chiegni gi Jerusalem, mi ne gikonye timo kamano.  4Jimang’eny nochokore, mi ne gidino sokni gi aore mane mol kanyo, kagiwacho niya, "Onge gimomiyo ruodhi Asuria onego oyud pi mang’eny kamaka gibiro ka. " 5Hezekia noketo chunye moloso ohinga kuonde dutomomukore, kendo nomedo geroe kuonde maboyo mag ng’icho.  Nogero ohingamachielo molworo mokwongono, kendo noloso Milo mane nie dala Daudi mondoobed motegno.  Bende noloso gilweny kod okumbni mogundho.  6Noketo jodonglweny mondo otel ni ji, mi noluongogi ire e laru manie dhorangach.  Ekanotego chunygi kowachonigi niya,
"Jiwreuru kendo timuru chir.  Kik uluorruodh Asuria, kendo oganda lweny maduong’ mobirogo kik bwogu, nimar Jalmakonyowa tek moloyo jal makony.  8Teko mar dhano ema en go, to wan,Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa ema konyowa, kendo kedo lwenjewa. " Kane jiowinjo weche Hezekia ruodh Juda, ne gitimo chir. 9Beng’ mano Senakerib ruodh Asuria mane oyudo olworo Lakish kod ogandaneduto mag lweny, nooro joote Jerusalem ir Hezekia ruodh Juda gi jo-Judaduto ma nodak kuno, kowacho niya,
"Senakerib ruodh Asuria owacho kama:Ugeno kuom ang’o momiyo uhedhoru mondo uked kodwa kwamonjo Jerusalem?11Ok upar ni Hezekia witou mondo kech gi riyo onegu kowachonu ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachu biro resou e lwet ruodh Asuria? 12Donge Hezekiaachielni osegolo hembko man kuonde moting’ore gi kende duto mag misangomag Ruoth Nyasaye, kochiko jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem niya, ‘Unulam e nyimkendo-mar-misango achiel kende, kendo wi kendono ema unuwang’iemisengini mau?’ 13Donge ung’eyo gik mwasetimo gi kwerewa ni jopinjemoko? Bende nyiseche jopinjego duto ne nyalo resogi e lweta adier?14Kuom nyiseche duto mag ogendini mane kwerena otieko chuth, ere moromane nyalo reso joge e lweta, momiyo ugeno ni Nyasachu dinyal resou?15Omiyo koro kik uyie Hezekia wuondu kendo witu kamano, bende kik uyiewechene, nimar onge nyasach oganda moro kata piny moro amora mane nyaloreso joge e lweta kata e lwet kwerena.  To koro ere kaka Nyasachu diresue lweta?"16Jootene nomedo wuoyo marach kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo kuom Hezekiajatichne.  17Bende Senakerib nondiko barupe mojarogo Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel kowuoyo marach kuome niya, "Kaka nyiseche mag jopinjegone ok nyal resogi e lweta, e kaka Nyasach Hezekia bende ok nores joge elweta. " 18Jootego nowacho kamano ni jo-Jerusalem mane ni ewi ohinga, kagikok gi duol maduong’ gi dho jo-Juda mondo obwoggi kendo omigi luoro,eka mondo gikaw dalano.  19Ne giwuoyo kuom Nyasach Jerusalem mana kaka negiwuoyo kuom nyiseche mag jopinje mamoko molos gi lwet dhano. Nyasaye oreso Hezekia(
Ruodhi
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)20Omiyo ruoth Hezekia kod Isaya janabi ma wuod Amoz nolemo ka ywak niNyasaye.  21Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nooro malaika e kambi mar ruodh Asuria,motieko thuondi gi jodongo kod jotend jolweny duto.  Omiyo nodok e pinyeka en gi wichkuot.  To kane odonjo e od nyasache, yawuote moko nonegekanyo.  22Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye noreso Hezekia gi jo-Jerusalem e lwetSenakerib ruodh Asuria kendo e lwet wasike duto, mi nomiyogi kue embapgi duto.  23Ji mang’eny nobiro Jerusalem, ka gikelo ni Ruoth Nyasayemich, kendo Hezekia ruodh Juda bende ne gimiyo gik ma nengogi tek, kendochakre kanyo ogendini duto nomiye duong’. Tuo Hezekia(
Ruodhi
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)24E ndalogo Hezekia nobedo matuo modwaro tho, mi nokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye,mowinje kendo omiye ranyisi.  25To Hezekia ne ok odwoko erokamano maromgi ber mane otimne, to nodoko jasunga.  Emomiyo ruoth Nyasaye nokechokode kaachiel gi jo-Juda kod jo-Jerusalem.  26To Hezekia nobolore moweyosunga.  Jo-Jerusalem bende notimo kamano.  Omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ne okosandogi e ndalo duto mag Hezekia. Hezekia orwako joote moa Babulon(
Ruodhi
.
-
; Isaya
.
-
)27Hezekia ne nigi mwandu mang’eny kod huma maduong’.  Noloso ut keno magkano fedha gi dhahabu gi kite ma nengogi tek gi gik mang’ue ng’ar giokumbni kod gik moko mabeyo mopogore opogore.  28Nogoyo dere mag cham,kendo nochueyo degi mag divai gi mag mo, kendo nogero kunde jamnimopogore opogore kod abich rombe.  29Bende nogero mier modakie, kendonobedo gi rombe gi dhok mogundho, nimar Nyasaye nomiye mwandu mang’enyahinya. 30Hezekia nogono nogeng’o soko mar Gihon gi yo ka malo, mochiko pi, miomol kochomo dala Daudi yo podho chieng’.  Tije duto mane Hezekia ochako,notieko maber.  31Kamano bende e kaka notieko wach joote jodong Babulon,mane oor ire mondo onon tiend hono ma nosetimore e pinye.  Chutho Nyasayenoweye kende e wachno, to mana ni mondo oteme, kendo mondo ong’ego gimanie chunye. Tho mar Hezekia(
Ruodhi
.
-
)32Weche modong’ mag Hezekia gi timbene mabeyo ondik e weche mag Isayajanabi wuod Amoz e Kitap Ndalo mag Ruodhi mag Juda gi Israel.  33Hezekianotho moluwo kwerene mi ne giyike gi yo ka malo mar liete joka Daudi. Jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem duto ne joyike gi luor maduong’.  Manase wuodenodoko ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo 33Loch Manase, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Manase ne jahigni apar gariyo ka nodoko ruoth, kendo norito piny kuomhigni piero abich gabich kodak Jerusalem.  2Timbene ne richo e nyim RuothNyasaye kaka timbe makuero mag ogendini mane Ruoth Nyasaye oriembo mondoowe thuolo ni jo-Israel.  3Nochako oloso hembko man kuonde moting’oremane Hezekia wuon mare oseketho, kendo nogero kuonde liswa ni Baal. Nochungo sirni milamo, kendo nolamo sulue duto kotiyonigi.  4Nogerokende-mag-liswa ei Hekalu, mane Ruoth Nyasaye osewuoyo kuome niya,"Jerusalem ema nyinga nobedie nyaka chieng’. " 5Nogero kende mag liswa nisulue duto e laru ariyo mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  6Nowang’o yawuote bende kaliswa e holo mar wuod Hinom.  Noyie gi jokor wach gi jonyakalondo kodajuoke.  Timbene maricho ne ng’eny e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, omiyo RuothNyasaye nokecho kode.  7Kido mar nyasaye manono ma noseloso, noketo eiHekalu.  To Nyasaye nosewuoyo kuom Hekaluno, kowacho ni Daudi gi Solomonwuod daudi niya, "Aseyiero Hekaluni gi Jerusalem kuom dhoudi duto magIsrael mondo nyinga obedie nyaka chieng’.  8Ka jo-Israel orito kendootimo gik moko duto ma nachikogi, kendo oluwo buche gi chike duto maneMusa onyisogi, to ok nariembgi e piny mane amiyo kweregi. " 9Manasenosemo jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem, mi ne gimedo timo richo e nyim RuothNyasaye moloyo ogendini mane Ruoth Nyasaye otieko mondo owe thuolo nijo-Israel. 10Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyoo gi Manase kod joge, to ne ok gidewe.  11EmomiyoRuoth Nyasaye nomiyo jotend jolweny mag ruodh Asuria odhi kedo kodgi.  Negimako Manase gi olowu, kendo ne gitueye gi ratege mag mula, mi gitereBabulon.  12Koro kane ene thagruok, nohombo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachemondo ong’wonne.  13Nokwayo Nyasach kwerene kobolore ahinya, mi Nyasayenowinjo ywakne mokonye, kendo nodwoke Jerusalem e lochne.  Koro manasenong’eyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye e Nyasaye. 14Bang’e nogero ohinga moro e holo gi yo ka oko mar dala Daudi kor podhochieng’ mar Gihon.  Ohingano nochopo e Dhoranga Rech, mi odhogo got Ofelkendo nodhi malo mabor ahinya.  Bende noketo jotend jolweny e miech Judaduto mochiel gohinga.  15Nogolo nyiseche manono kaachiel gi kido marnyasaye manono mane nie Od Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo nomuko kende mag liswaduto ma noseloso e god hekalu kendo Jerusalem, mi nowitogi oko.  16Bendenochako oloso kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mi notimoe misengnimag sawo kod mag erokamano, kendo nochiko jo-Juda mondo oti ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel.  17Kata kamano ji ne pod timo misengni ehembko man kuonde moting’ore, to mana ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi. 18Weche moko mag Manase, gi lemo mane okwayogo Nyasache, kod weche manejonen owachone e nying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, ondiki e Kitapweche mag Ndalo mag Ruodhii mag Israel.  19To lemone, kendo kaka Nyasayenowinjo kwayone, kaachiel gi kethone gi richone duto, kod kuonde maneogeroe hembko moketoe sirni milamo gi kido mag nyiseche manono, kane pokchunye olokore modembore kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, ondiki e Kitap Weche magNdalo mag Jonen. 20Manase notho moluwo kwerene, moyike e ode.  Amon wuode nodoko ruothkare. Loch Amon, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)21Amon ne jahigni piero ariyo gariyo kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuomhigni ariyo, kodak Jerusalem.  22Timbene ne richo e nyim Ruoth Nyasayemana kaka timbe Manase wuon mare.  Notimo liswa ni kido manono duto maneManase wuon mare oloso, kendo notiyonigi.  23Amon achielni ne ok oboloree nyim Ruoth Nyasaye kaka Manase wuon mare nobolore, to nomedo kethomoloyo.  24Jodonge nojame, monege e ode.  25To jo-Juda nonego jogo dutomane ojame, kendo ne giketo Josia wuode mondo obed ruoth kare.
Weche mag Ndalo 34Loch Josia ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)
Josia ne jahigni aboro kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom higni pieroadek gachiel, kodak Jerusalem.  2Timbene ne long’o e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo noluwo timbe Daudi kwar mare, ma ok oweyo kata achiel. Josia oloso piny Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)3E higa mar aboro mar lochne, kane pod en rawera, nochako luwo Daudikwar mare.  To e higa mar apar gariyo nochako pwodho Juda gi Jerusalem,koketho hembko mane ni kuonde moting’ore, gi sirni milamo, kod kido mopagi mothedhi.  4Nogolo chik, mi ji omuko kende-mag-liswa mag Baal,kaachiel gi kende miwang’oe ubani mane ochung’ e wigi.  Nomuko sirnimilamo kod kido mopa gi mothedhi, eka notoyogi molokogi buru, kendonokiro burugo e liete joma nosetimonigi liswa.  5Bende nowang’o chokejodolo e kende mane gitimoe liswa, kopwodho Juda gi Jerusalem.  6Notimokamano bende e miech Manase gi Efraim kod Simeon nyaka chop Naftali,komuko ute jodologo.  7Nomuko bende kende-mag-liswa kod sirni milamo, gikido manono, mi otoyogi molokogi buru.  Noketho kende duto miwang’oeubani e piny Israel duto.  Eka nodok Jerusalem. Kitap Chik oyudi e Hekalu(
Ruodhi
.
—
.
)8Koro e higa mar apar gaboro mar lochne, kane osepwodho piny kod Hekalu,nooro Shafan wuod Azalia gi wuod Joahaz jagoro mondo olos Od RuothNyasaye ma Nyasache.  9Ne gidhi ir Hilkia jadolo maduong’, mi gimiye pesamane osekel e Od Ruoth Nyasaye, ma jo-Lawi ma jorit dhoot nosechoko kuomjo-Manase gi jo-Efraim gi jo-Israel modong’ duto, gi jo-Juda gijo-Benjamin duto, kendo kuom jo-Jerusalem.  10Ne giketo pesago e lwetnyipeche mane rito tich Od Ruoth Nyasaye, mi nyipechego nochiwo pesago elwet jotich, mondo olosgo Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  11Pesago jotich bao gijogedo ne jong’iewogo kite mopa kod yiend ripo gi sirni, mondo gilosgoudi mane ruodhi mag Juda oseweyo okethore.  12Mi ne gitiyo tijno kagiketo chunygi.  Jahath gi Obadia jo-Lawi ma joka Merari, gi Zekaria kodMeshulam ma joka Kohath, ema nobedo joritgi.  Jo-Lawi duto mane olonykuom goyo thum 13ema ne rito joting’, kendo chiko jotich moko duto kuomtich moro amora.  Jo-Lawi moko bende ne jotelo, kendo moko ne joritdhorangeye. 14Chieng’ moro, kane oyudo gigolo pesa mosekel e Od Ruoth Nyasaye,Hilkia jadolo noyudo kitabu mondikie chik Ruoth Nyasaye mane Musaochiwo.  15Eka Hilkia nowacho ni Shafan jagoro niya, "Aseyudo kitap chike Od Ruoth Nyasaye. " Mi Hilkia nomiyo Shafan kitabuno.  16Shafan notereni ruoth kendo nowachone niya, "Jotichni tiyo tich duto mane omigi. 17Gisegolo pesa mane ochoki e Od Ruoth Nyasaye kendo giseketo e lwetnyipeche kod jotich. " 18Eka nomedo wacho ni ruoth niya, "Hilkia osemiyakitabu moro. " Mi nosome ni ruoth. 19Kane ruoth owinjo weche mag chik, noyiecho lepe.  20Nochiko Hilkia, giAhikam wuod Shafan, gi Abdon wuod Mika, gi Shafan jagoro kod Asayajatich ruoth, kowachonigi niya,
"Dhiuru upenj Ruoth Nyasaye wach makuoma, gi man kuom jo-Isarel gi jo-Juda modong’, kor wach weche maniekitabu mwaseyudoni.  Nyaka bed ni Ruoth Nyasaye okecho kodwa malich,nikech kwerewa ne ok orito wachne, kata timo gik moko duto mondiki ekitabunii, bende ne ok gitimo. "22Omiyo Hilkia, gi jogo mane ruoth ooro, nodhi ir Hulda janabi madhakoma chi Shalum wuod Tikva, ma wuod Harhas, jarit lep lemo, mane odakJerusalem e migawo mar ariyo.  Ne giwuoyo kode kuom wachno, 23minodwokogi niya, "Nyisuru ng’at mane oorou ira ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel owacho kama:
‘Abiro kelo masira e pinyni, kendo kuomjoma odakie kaluwore gi kuong’ duto manie kitabu ma nosesom e nyim ruodhJuda.  25Ne gikwinya gi timbegi, ka giweya, kendo ka giwang’o ubani ninyiseche manono.  Emomiyo akecho kodgi, kakumogi nyaka chieng’. ’ 26Towachuru ni ruodh Juda mane oorou mondo upenjne Ruoth Nyasaye wach niRuoth Nyasaye owacho kama:
‘Asewinji nikech kane iwinjo wechena maneawacho kuom pinyni kod joma odakie, chunyi ne yom kendo odembore,miyiecho lepi, kendo iywak e nyima.  28Noyiki e liendi gi kue, kiluwokwereni, ma kata wang’i ok none masira ma abiro kelo kuom dalani, kendokuom joma odakie. ’ "Kane jootego odwoko ni ruoth wach, 29noluongo jodongo duto mag Juda giJerusalem.  30Nodhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye gi jo-Juda kod jo-Jerusalem duto,joma omew gi jochan machalre, kaachiel gi jodolo kod jo-Lawi, minosomonigi weche duto mane nie kitap singruok mane oyud e Od RuothNyasaye.  31Eka ruoth nodhi kar betne, mochung’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasayekosingore ni enoluw Ruoth Nyasaye gi chunye duto kod tekone duto, komakochikene gi wechene kod buchene, kamano mondo orit weche mag singruokmondiki e kitabuno.  32Eka nomiyo jo-Jerusalem duto okuong’ore ni giniritsingruokno.  Mi jo-Jerusalem norito singruok mar Nyasach kweregi. 33Bang’e Josia nogolo gik makuero duto mane nie piny Israel, mi nomiyoji duto modak e Israel otiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi.  Ne ok giweyoluwo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach kweregi e ndalo Josia duto.
Weche mag Ndalo 35Josia otimo Sap Pasaka(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Josia notimo Pasaka ni Ruoth Nyasaye e Jerusalem kendo ne oneg nyarombomar Pasaka chieng’ due apar gang’wen mar due mokwongo.  2Noketo jodolo etijegi, mojiwogi mondo giti maber e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  3Eka nowuoyo gijo-Lawi mane owal ni tich ruoth Nyasaye, mane puonjo jo-Israel duto,kowachonigi niya, "Keturu Sanduk Maler e Hekalu mane Solomon wuod Daudi,ruodh Israel, ogero.  Ok onego uting’e e goku kendo.  Omiyo koro tiuru niRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, kendo ni joge Israel.  4Chanreuru e migepe,kaluwore gi dhoutu, kaka Daudi ruodh Israel gi Solomon wuode nochiko. 5Chanuru tijeu e Hekalu, kaluwore gi dhout oweteu ma ok jo-Lawi, mondodhoot ka dhoot obed gi migawo moro makonye.  6Neguru nyiromb Pasaka,kendo pwodhreuru mondo ukony oweteu luwo chik mane Ruoth Nyyasaye omiyoMusa ogolo. "7Eka Josia nochiwo ni joma nosechokore nyirombe gi nyidiek moromo alufupiero adek, kod ruedhi alufu adek, mondo otimgo misango mar pasaka.  Magoduto nochiwo kogolo kuom mwandune owuon.  8Jodonge bende ne mor gi kelochiwo ni ji gi jodolo kod jo-Lawi.  Hilkia gi Zekaria kod Jehiel, jotelomadongo mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye, nochiwo ni jodolo nyirombe gi nyidiekalufu ariyo gi mia auchiel, kod ruedhi mia adek, mondo otimgo misangomar Pasaka.  9Konania bende, kod Shemaya gi Nethanel ma owetene kodHashabia gi jeyel kod Jozabad, ma jodong jo-Lawi, nomiyo jo-Lawinyirombe gi nyidiek alufu abich kod ruedhi mia abich mondo otimgomisango mar Pasaka. 10Kane gik moko duto oseikore, jodolo nochung’ keregi, kendo jo-Lawinobedo e migepegi, kaluwore gi chik ruoth.  11Kane oneg nyiromb Pasaka,jo-Lawi ema noyang’ogi, to jodolo nokiro remo mane jo-Lawi gamonigi. 12Ne gipogo boche mag misengnii ni migepe mag dhoudi ma ok jo-Lawi,mondo owang’ ni Ruoth Nyasaye kaka ondiki e Kitap Musa.  Kamano e kaka negitimo gi ruedhi bende.  13Ne gibulo nyiromb Pasaka kaka chik nowacho, toring misengni maler ne gitedo e agulini gi sufriache, eka ne giteropiyopiyo ni ji duto ma ok jo-Lawi. 14Bang’e ne giloso maggi giwegi kod mag jodolo, nikech jodolo ma yawuotHarun nodich gi timo misengni miwang’o pep, kod tich wang’o bor, nyakaotieno.  Mano emomiyo jo-Lawi nooloso maggi giwegi kod mag jodolo mayawuot harun.  15Jower ma yawuot Asaf ne ni keregi, kaluwore gi chikDaudi, gi mar Asaf, gi mar Heman, kod mar Jeduthun janen mar ruoth. Jorit dhorangeye bende ne rito dhorangeye duto.  Onge ng’ama nonego a etije mondo odhi olos chiemo, nikech owetegi ma jo-Lawi nosetedonigi. 16Kamano tich Ruoth Nyasaye duto mar Pasaka kod mar timo misengnimiwang’o pep e kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye notim chieng’ono,kaka ruoth Josia nochiko.  17E ndalono jo-Israel mane osechokore notimoPasaka kod Sap Makati ma ok ketie thowi kuom ndalo abiriyo.  18Pasakamachal kamano ne pok otimie Israel chakre ndalo mag Samuel janabi.  Ongeruodh israel moro amora ma nosetimo Pasaka machal gi mano mane Josiakaachiel gi jodolo gi jo-Lawi gi jo-Jerusalem kod ji duto ma noa Juda giIsrael otimo.  19Ne en higa mar apar gaboro mar loch Josia mane otimiePasakano. Tho mar Josia(
Ruodhi
.
-
)20Bang’e kane Josia osetieko loso Hekalu, noyudo ka Neko ruodh Misriodhi kedo Karkemish man but aora Yufrate mi Josia nodhi mondo orad kode. 21To Neko noorone joote gi wach niya, "Walar ang’o kodi, ruodh Juda? Inok ema abiro monji kawuono, to abiro mana monjo dhoot ma an go gi lweny,kendo Nyasaye osechika mondo atim piyo.  Kik ipeam gi Nyasaye man kora,nono to abiro tieki. " 22Kata kamano Josia ne ok nyal weye, to noramoarama ni nyaka oked kode.  Ne ok odewo wach mane Nyasaye omiyo Nekoowacho, too nodhi adhiya mi girado e paw Megido.  23Jodir asere nochieloruoth Josia, mi nowacho ni jotichne niya, "Golauru oko nimar asehinyoramalich. " 24Omiyo jotichne nogole e gache mi gitere Jerusalem ka giting’ee gache machielo.  Notho kuno, mi ne giyike but kwerene, kendo jo-Juda gijo-Jerusalem duto noywage.  25Jeremia bende nochuogo wend ywak ni Josia,kendo jower duto, machwo gi mamon, pod wero wendno nyaka chil kawuono. Gino oselokore tim jo-Israel kendo wendno ondik e Kitap Wende Ywak. 26Weche moko mag Josia, a chakruokgi nyaka gikogi, gi timbene mabeyomoluwore gi chik Ruoth Nyasaye, 27ondiki e Kitap Ruodhi mag Israel giJuda.
Weche mag Ndalo 36Loch Jehoahaz, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
)1Ji duto noketo Jehoahaz ruoth e Jerusalem kar josia wuon mare.  2Ne enjahigni piero ariyo gadek kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom duecheadek, kodak Jerusalem.  3Bang’e Neko ruodh Misri nogole e tich ruoth,modare Jerusalem, kendo noketo ni piny Juda osuru moromo kilo piero adekmag dhahabu.  4Eka noketo Eliakim owadgi Jehoahaz ruodh Juda giJerusalem, kendo noloko nyinge ni Jehoyakim.  Jehoahaz to notero Misri. Loch Jehoyakim, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
—
.
)
Jehoyakim ne jahigni piero ariyo gabich kane odoko ruoth, morito pinykuom higni apar gachiel, kodak Jerusalem.  Timbene ne richo e nyim RuothNyasaye ma Nyasache.  6Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon nomonje, motueye giratege kendo notere Babulon.  7Nebukadnezar nokawo bende bath gik mokomag Od Ruoth Nyasaye, motero Babulon e ode.  8Timbe moko mag Jehoyakim gigik makuero ma notimo, kod ketho maling’ling’ ma nofweny kuome, ondiki eKitap Ndalo mag ruodhi mag Israel gi Juda.  Jehoyachin wuode nodoko ruothkare. Jehoyachin ruodh Juda oter Babulon e tuech(
Ruodhi
.
-
)9Jehoyachin ne jahigni aboro kane odoko ruoth, morito piny kuom duecheadek gi ndalo apar kodak Jerusalem.  Timbene ne richo e nyim RuothNyasaye.  10E ndalo oro ruoth Nebukadnezar nooro joote mokelo JehoyachinBabulon kaachiel gi mwandu mag Od Ruoth Nyasaye, mi Nebukadnezar noketoZedekia owadgi Jehoyachin ruodh Juda gi Jerusalem. Loch Zedekia, ruodh Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
; Jeremia
.
-
)
