Ka uhulo ni nyinge nigi duong’ moloyo. 5Weruru ni Ruoth Nyasaye wende pak nikech oselocho,kendo mano nyaka ng’ere e piny duto. 6Un joma odak Sayun, koguru gi mor,nimar Ng’ama Ler mar Israel odak e dieru gi duong’ne duto. "Isaya 13Wach mokor kuom Babulon1 Ma e wach mane Nyasaye onyiso Isaya wuod Amoz kuom Babulon e fweny:2Chunguru bandera ewi got mojuerkaka ranyisi muluongogo wasik Babulon. Gwelgiuru mondo gidonj e dhoranga Babulon. 3An awuon ema agolo chik ni jolwenja. Adier, asechiko joga marateke ka akecho,mondo otim gima adwaro. Gigombo mondo an ema alo lweny. 4Winjuru kaka koko mar oganda mang’ongo gore ewi gode!En koko mar ogendini ma chokorekaa e pinje mopogore opogore. Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutochoko oganda mang’ongo mar lwenyno. 5Gia e piny mabor, manie tung’ piny mogik. Ruoth Nyasaye ema kelo jogo kaka gige mag lwenymondo okethgo piny gi mirimbe mager.
Gouru uwi, un jo-Babulon,nimar chieng’ ma Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto oseketonukoro ochopo machiegni!En odiechieng’ ma abiro keloe masira maduong’ e piny. 7Chieng’onogo lwet ng’ato ka ng’ato nowengni,kendo kibaji nogo ji duto, ma chunygi a chuth. 8Rem bende noneggi mana ka dhako ma muoch kayo. Ng’ato ka ng’ato nong’i wadgi ka kihondko omako,kendo ka neno awedho. 9Adier, chieng’ ma Ruoth Nyasaye oseketo biro. En odiechieng’ mirima gi ichwang’ mager,ma obiro kethoe piny, mi lokre thim,kendo otiekie joricho duto.
Sulue mag polo ok norieny,kendo wang’chieng’ nolokre mudho ka wuok. Due bende ok norieny. 11Abiro kelo masira e piny,kendo abiro kumo joma timbegi mono kaka owinjore,mondo ng’ayi mag josunga orum,kendo athir nyadhi mag joma wang’gi tek. 12Abiro miyo ji doko manokmana kaka dhahabu maberie moloyo migolo Ofir nok. 13Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye nokech malichmi polo notetni, kendo piny noyiengni mi leng’re. 14Bang’ mano, ng’ato ka ng’atoo nodog thurgi ir joodgi,mana ka le ma jodwar lawo,kata ka rombe moke ma onge ng’ama chiko. 15Ji duto moyudi nochwow, mi tho. Adier, ng’ato ka ng’ato momaki, ligangla ema nonegi. 16Nyithindgi bende nochwad piny e wang’gi ka gineno. Utegi noyaki, kendo mondgi bende nomak gi thwon. 17Abiro kelo jo-Media, ma ok dew fedha kata ok gomb dhahabu,mondo omonjgi. 18Jo-Media biro nego yawuotgi gi asere,gin joma ok kech kata mana nyithindo.
Kamano, kata obedo ni Babulon,en dala maberie moloyo mier mag pinje mamoko duto,kendo ma jo-Babulon sungorego,to Nyasaye nokethe mana kaka noketho Sodom gi Gomora. 20Ng’ato ok nochak odag kuno kuom tienge duto mabiroonge ja-Arabu ma nogur hembe kanyo,bende onge jakwath ma nokwa jambgi kuno.
Kanyo ema ondiegi mae thim nonindie,kendo gik maricho mag bungu nopong’ udi man kuno. Tula mag thim bende nodagie,kendo jochiende notugie. 22Otoche noywagre e udigo. Bwe bende nodagi e udi madongo mabeyo. Yaye! Ndalo Babulon sudo machiegni. Adier, kinde matin ema odongne!Isaya 14Ogo siboi ni Ruodh Babulon1Ruoth Nyasaye biro kecho jo-Israel ma nyikwa Jakobo, mi ochak oyiergi,kendo oketgi e pinygi giwegi.  Jopinje mamoko nobi mondo odag kodgi, migilokre jo-Israell.  2Ogendini nodwuok jo-Israel thurgi, kuma ne giaye,mi jo-Israel nolok ogendnigo wasumbgi e piny Israel, ma Ruoth Nyasayeoseyiero.  Jo-Israel nomak joma nomakogi, mi giti joma notiyogi. 3Kamano ka Ruoth Nyasaye ogolo rem gi luoro kod tich misumba malit majo-Israel nigo, kendo omiyogi kue 4to ginigo agoro ni ruodh Babulon kagiwer kama:"Neyeuru kaka giko mar josand ji chalo,kendo kaka sungane otieki. 5Ruoth Nyasaye oseturo ludh loch mar joricho,ma lochgi orumo. 6In ruodh Babulon,ne isando ogendini pile gi gero, kigoyogi,kendo kinyonogi piny gi mirima maonge yueyo. 7Koro piny duto oyueyo, kendo nigi kue,omiyo ji kok gi mor. 8Yiend saipras gi yiend sida mag Lebanon bende mor, kendo giwacho niya,‘Kaka osetieki, koro onge ng’at ma biro tong’owa. ’9Piny joma otho otuk duto mondo oromni kidonjo kuno. Adier, joma ne osetho ochiew mondo oromni,koda ka mago, mane osebedo jotelo e piny ka. Ee, jogo duto mane osebedo ruodhi mag pinje a malo e kombegi. 10Giduto giwachoni niya,‘Kara in bende isedoko mayomyom ka wan!Koro ichal mana kodwa!’11Duong’ ma yande in go,kaachiel gi thumbe ma yande iwinjo,osedhi kodi e Piny Joma Otho. Kudni e godhro minindoe,kendo e baranget miumorigo.
In ratego, sulue mar okinyi marieny matek,mano kaka isepodho ka ia e polo!
Ne iparo e chunyi niya,‘Abiro idho nyaka e polomi aket koma mar loch malo moyombo sulue mag Nyasaye. Bende anabedi e got man yo nyandwatkuma nyiseche chokoree. 14Anaidh malo moyombo boche polo,kendo anachal gi Nyasaye Maduong’ Moloyo. ’15To kata obedo ni iparo kamanoto ibiro boli piny kuma tut mogik e piny joma otho. 16Ji duto maneni biro rangi,kendo gininoni maber ka gipenjore niya,‘Bende ma e ng’at mane yiengo piny,17kendo miyo ruodhi tetni, mi lok piny thim,kendo mane ok gony joma osetueyo dog thuchegi?’18Ruodhi mag ogendini yueyo e lietegi molos malich,19to in, osewiti oko, mi irieri piny mak oyiki,mana ka guok motho. Joma oneg e lweny, mowit e bur motimo kite,ema ogangore kuomi. 20Ringri mosenyon pinyno ok bi yikikaka oseyik ruodhi mamokogo,nikech iseketho pinyi, mi inego jogi iwuon. Nyithindi bende ok nobed ruodhi bang’i. "21Ikreuru uneg yawuote nikech richo wuon gi,mondo kik gichak giyud loch mi gikaw piny,kendo gipong’e gi miechgi. 22Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya, "Anaked kodgi, mi anegjo-Babulon duto, koda ka nyithindgi gi nyikwagi, mi nyinggi lal nono. 23Abiro loko Babulon siany, kendo time kama chiewo chiewo ema dakie. Anakethe chuth mana ka gima oywe gi yuech. " Mago e weche mar RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto. Okor wach ni noketh Asuria24 Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto osekuong’ore kawacho niya,"Gima aseparo biro timore manaa kaka asechano. Adier, kaka asechano e kaka notimre. 25Ananeg jo-Asuria manie piny,kendo nanyon-gi piny gi tienda e godenaeka nagol jok mane ruodh Asuria oketo kuom joga,kendo nagony ting’ mapek mane omiyogi. 26Mano e wach ma aseiko ni piny ngima,kendo abiro rieyo bada kuom ogendini duto mondo otimre,27nimar ka Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema ochano gimoroto ere ng’ama ditamekendo ka en ema orieyo badeto ere ng’ama dimi odwok bade piny?Wach mokor kuom piny Filistia28 Wach mane Nyasaye onyisa e fweny e higa mane Ahaz othoe ema:
Yaye un jo Filistiakata obedo ni luth mane goyou osetur kamano,to kik ubed mamor,nimar nyathi thuol nobed mager moloyo wuon,kendo nobed ndemu man gi kwiri marach!30Joma odhier to nokwa jambgi e legena,kendo jochan noyue gi kue. To un jo Filistia, nami kech neg nyithindu,kendo jou manok modong’ bende nanegi. 31Un miech Filistia, ywaguruUn jo-Filistia duto, laluru nono,nimar oganda lweny maduong’ biro, koa yo nyandwat,kochanore maber, kendo ma onge kata ng’at achiel ma digni. 32Koro ere dwoko ma onego mi joote mag ogandano?Dwokgiuru niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyo Sayun ogurore motegno,kendo kanyo ema joge ma jochan biro tonyie. "Isaya 15Wach mokor kuom piny Moab1 Fweny mane Nyasaye onyiso kuom Moab e ma:Ibiro keth Ar gi Kir, miech Moab, otieno achiel,mi piny Moab rum. 2Jo Dibon noring kaidho gode mondo olem e hembko man kuno. Jo-Moab to noywag nikech Nebo gi Medeba osekethi,kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato noliel wiye kod tike. 3Ji nowuoth e yore korwako piende gugru,bende giniywagi ewi udi kendo e akek yore4Jo-Heshbon kod jo-Eleale noywagi,mi ywakgi nowinjre nyaka Jahaz. Mano emomiyo thuond Moab marateke luoro nomakikendo chir ma gin-go norum. 5Chunya lit nikech masira mabiro mako Moab,nimar jodonggi noring nyaka Zoar, mi chop Eglath-shelishia. Ginidh e yo ma dhi Luhith ka giywak,kendo nowinjgi ka giywak malit e yo madhi Horonaim. 6Sokni mag Nimrim nodwon. Lum bende notwo, kendo oboke duto noner,ma onge gimoro amora mang’ich ma nodong’. 7Mano emomiyo jo-Moab nokaw mwandugi,ma giseyudo kuom tich matek, kod pesagi duto,mi ging’adgo aora Arabim. 8Ywak ma giniywaggo ni mondo okonyginowinjre nyaka e tong’ piny Moab. Adier, nduru ma ginigo nochop nyaka Eglaim kod Beer-elim. 9Remo nopong’ sokni mag Dimon,to eka masiche madongo pod nomak amaka Dimon!Sibuor nomak ng’ato ang’ata maringo kaa Moab,kod ji manok modong’ e pinyno. Isaya 161Ruodhi mag Moab noor chiwo mag rombe Jerusalem,ka gin Sela e thim. 2Ka mond Moab ochopo e kuonde mong’adogo aora Arnon,to ginichal mana nyithi winy morwenyo,ma huyo koni gi koni. 3Giniwach niya, "Konywauru gi tekou duto,kendo tipou mondo ogeng’nwa chieng’ makech’mondo ochalnwa ka gima en otieno. Panduru jowa ma oseriembi,kendo kik uyie mondo omak joma oringo lweny. 4Weuru mondo jo-Moab ma onge mier oyud kar konyruok kuomu,kendo pandgiuru mondo kik joyeko yudgi. Ka thak mithagogo ji oserumo,kendo jokeyo osetieko tijgi,mi jogo duto mathiro ji oa e piny,5To kom loch nogur kuom ng’wono mar Nyasaye,kendo jang’ad bura mar adier ma nyakwar Daudiema nobed e komno. Enobed ng’at madwaro mana adiera,kendo ma timo gik makare mak odeko. 6Wasewinjo humb jo-Moab, kaka gin josunga. Adier, wasewinjo kaka ging’are malich,kendo kaka wechegi opong’ gi miriambo lilo. 7Kuom mano, jo-Moab biro ywak. Adier, gibiro ywak malit. Giniywag olemb mzabibu motwo mag Kir-haresethma osekethore chuth,8kendo giniywag puothe mag Heshbon mowe,kod mzabibu mosener mag Sigma,ma yande divachgi mero jotend ogendini. Ne gigawore nyaka Jazer, mi gitundo e thim kod nam. 9Kuom mano, abiro ywago mzabibu mag Sigma mana kaka aywago Jezer. Un jo-Heshbon kod jo-Eleale, pi wang’a biro lwokou,nimar mahu mar lweny ema biro winjoree puotheu mag olembe monyak maber. 10Mor kod ilo norum chuth e puotheu mabeyo,kendo onge wer ma nower e puotheu mag olembe,bende onge ng’ama nogo koko gi mor. Ok unuchak ubi mzabibu kuonde bicho,kendo mahu mag mor mugoyo e ndalo keyo biro rumo. 11Kuom mano, chunya ywago jo-Moab gi jo-Kirhereseth,mana ka ng’ama goyo thum e liel. 12Kata ka jo-Moab chandore kadhi e hembko manie wi gode,mondo otim misengnikendo kata ka gidonjo e hekalu margi mondo gilem,to onge gima giniyudi. 13Mago e weche mane Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kuom jo-Moab chon.  14To koroowacho niya, "Bang’ higni adek, ma ok okadho ngang’, duong’ mar Moabnorum, kendo ji manok marichoricho ema notony kuom joge mang’enygo. "Isaya 17Wach mokor kuom Damaski1 Ma e wach mane Nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom Damaski:Damaski biro kethore chuth,mi ute mukre kendo dhurre pidhe pidhe. 2Ji ok nodag e mier mage nyaka chieng’kendo miergo nodong’ mana kuonde ma jamni kwayoe mosma onge gima thaggi. 3Piny Israel ok nochak oobed gi dala mochiel motegno,bende Damaski ok nochak obed gi ruoth,kendo jo-Aram manok modong’ noneg duto,nimar duong’gi nolal nono,mana kaka duong’ mar Israel biro lal. Mago e weche mag Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto. Bura ma ibiro ng’ado ni Israel4E ndalogo, duong’ mar Israel nomich matin,mana ka ng’at ma tuo ochamo dende,kendo chue ma yande ochuego olal nono,5kata ka tiang’ cham moseka. Adier, piny Israel nojwang’mana ka puothe cham moseka e Holo Rafaim,kendo ma johulo osehuloe. 6Joge manok kende ema nodong’,mana kaka olembe manok kende ema dong’ e yath kosepon. Olembe ariyo kata adek nyalo dong’e bede yath man malo midimidi,to ang’wen kata abich nyalo dong’e bedene moyarore gi piny. Mago e weche Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo gik Moko Duto. 7E ndalogo, ji nopar Nyasaye ma jachuechgi,kendo ginigen kuom Ng’ama Ler mar Israel. 8Ok ginichak giket genogi kuom kende-mag-liswa, ma lwetgi ema oloso,kata kuom gimoro amora ma gin giwegi ema giseloso,bed ni en sirni milamo, kata kende mag ubani. 9E ndalogo miechu mochiel motegno nodong’ nono, mi kethre, mana ka miechjo-Hivi gi jo-Amor mane giweyo ka jo-Israel obiro. 10Mano notimre nimar wiu ne owil gi Nyasaye mane oresou. Adier, ne ok uparo lwanda ma en kar konyruoku,emomiyo, kata ka upidho cham mabeyomondo umigo nyisecheu manono duong’,11bende kata obedo ni umiyo chamgo twimana chieng’ ma upidhogieno, mi kinyne githiew,to unuka mana chandruok kod rem ma ok rum!12Winjuru! Mano e koko mar ogendini mang’eny,gimor mana ka nam ma wuo!Chikuru itu!Donge uwinjo kaka ogendini mwomore,gimwomore mana ka apaka madongo!13To Nyasaye biro kwerogi, mi giring gidhi mabor,mana ka mihudhi mipiedho e gode, kendo ma yamo tero,kata ka buru ma kalausi keyo. 14Kihondko nomak jo-Israel godhiambo,gokinyi to wasikgi norum pep!Mano e pok mowinjore gi joma yakowa. Isaya 18Wach mokor kuom Ethiopia1 Nitie piny moro loka aora mag Ethiopia, ma yiedhi ng’enyie. 2Pinyno oro joote kaluwo aora Naelgi yiedhi mohondhi gi odundu. Un joote ma jong’wech, doguru ir jou,gin ji maboyo kendo ma dendgi poth,ma ji oluoro kuonde dutogin ji marateke moloyo ogendini mamoko,kendo ma pinygi aore opogo opogo. 3Un ji duto modak e piny,unune koting’ bandeche lweny malo ewi gode,kendo unuwinj ka tung’ ywak. 4To Ruoth Nyasaye nosewachona kama:"Abiro rango piny gie polo kar dakna, ka ayueyo mos,mana kaka piny kue mos ka chieng’ liet,kata ka tho omoko gokinyi e ndalo keyo. 5Ananeg joma dwaro monjou ka pok gichopo,mana ka ng’ama ng’ado bede mzabibu gi ratong’e kinde ma keyo podi, ma mzabibu osemoyo,kendo olembgi chiegni chiek,6ringregi duto nodong’ ni winy mae gode,mondo ocham e ndako oro,kendo ni ondiegi mondo ocham e ndalo chwiri. "7E ndalogo, ogandano noter chiwo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto.  Gin ji maboyo ma dendgi poth, ma ji oluoro kuonde duto.  Gin jimarateke, maloyo ogendini mamoko, kendo ma pinygi aore opogo opogo. Ginikel chiwogo e got Sayun, kama ji lamoe Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko duto. Isaya 19Wach mokor kuom Misri1 Wach mane Nyasaye onyiso fweny kuom Misri e ma:Neuru kaka Ruoth Nyasaye biro piyopiyo e boche polo. Obiro e piny Misri,emomiyo nyiseche manono mag Misri kirni. 2Owacho niya,"Abiro thuwo jo-Misri e kindgi giwegi,mi ng’ato ka ng’ato gore gi wadgi. Dala ka dala noked gi dala machielo,kendo gweng’ ka gweng’ bende noked gi wadgi. 3Chuny jo-Misri nonyosre,kendo anaketh rieko ma ging’ado,mi ginipenj nyiseche manono mondo onyisgi wach,bende ginidhi ir ajuoke mopogore opogore. 4To anaket piny Misri e lwet jatelo mager. Adier, ruoth makwiny ema notigi. An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutoema awacho kamano. "5Aora Nael noduon, mi two6kendo kuonde ma pi luwo nodum marach. Aore mamoko mag Misri nodwon mi two,kendo odundu gi se bende nowang’. 7Lege duto man but aora Nael, kod gik mopidhi e bathe,duto yamo nolalgo nono. 8Jolupo duto moywagi. Adier, jogo duto malupo gi olowo e aora Nael,kaachiel gi mago machiko tonde kuno, chunygi nonyosre. 9Joma chueyo nengni gi tworo kata gi pamba none marach,nikech gigo ok nochieg maber. 10Ee, jotueng’o mag Misri nodhier nono,kendo jotich duto nobed gi chuny malit. 11Mano kaka ufuwo, un jotelo mag Zoan. Adier, unyalo bedo jong’ad rieko mag Farao mabeyo moloyo. Omiyo ere kaka unyalo wacho ni Farao niya,"Wan yawuot joma riek ma nyikwa ruodhi machon"?12Koro in Farao, ere jogi mariek,mondo obi opuonji kendo omi ing’egima Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto osechano timo e Misri?13Jotend Zoan ofuwo adier,kendo jodong Nof paro e chunygi giwegi ni giriek, to ok giriek. Kamano jotend dhout Misri osewito jogi. 14Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyogi chuny mar fuwo. Emomiyo rieko duto ma ging’ado obam,kendo gimiyo jo-Misri kier e gik moko duto ma gitimo,mana kaka ng’at momer kier e ng’okne. 15Jo-Misri ok nodhi nyime maber e gimoro amora ma gitimo,bed ni jatelo ema time, kata ng’ama chal nade ema time. 16E ndalogo jo-Misri nobed manyap ka mon.  Ginibed maluor, kendoginikirni ka Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto orieyo lwete kuomgimondo okumgi.  17Piny Juda nolokre masira ni jo-Misri.  Nyinge kende kajo-Misri owinjo, to nogogi gi kihondko, nikech gik ma Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto osechano timonigi. 18E ndalog, noyud ka joma odak e mier abich mag Misri wuoyo gi dhoHibrania, ka kuong’ore ni noluw Ruoth Nyasaye manyalo Gik Moko Duto. Dala achiel kuomgi noluong ni Dala Wang’chieng’. 19E kindego, nobedie kendo-mar-misango mar Ruoth Nyasaye e dier Misri,kod siro maler mochung’ ni Ruoth Nyasaye e tong’ piny Misri.  20Sirononochung’ kanyo kaka ranyisi, kendo kaka rapar ni Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto e Misri, mondo ka giywakne e kinde ma wasikgi thirogi, tooornigi jawar, mondo okonygi kendo oresgi.  21Ruoth Nyasaye noyangre nijo-Misri mondo ong’eye, kendo chieng’no giniyie kuome, mi ginitimnemisango mar cham kod misengni mamoko.  Bende ginikuong’re, mi gichopkuong’ruokgigo.  22Ruoth Nyasaye nogo jo-Misri, to kata kamano,enochanggi mana e kinde ma ogoyogieno.  Pile ka giduogo ire, to enowinjkwayogi, mi ochanggi. 23E kindego ndara maduong’ nobedie moa Misri kadhi Asuria.  Jo-Asurianobi Misri, kendo jo-Misri bende nodhi Asuria.  Kamano jo-Misri gijo-Asuria nolam Nyasaye kaachiel. 24E ndalogo, duong’ mar Israel nobed maromre gi duong’ mar Misri kod marAsuria, kendo pinje adekgo nobed gueth e dier piny.  25Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko duto noguedhgi, ka wacho kama: "Oguedh jo-Misri majoga, kendo oguedh jo-Asuria ma chuechna, bende oguedh jo-Israel ma ginmwanduna awuon. "Isaya 20Okor wach ni Asuria biro loyo Misri gi Ethiopia1Sargon ruodh Asuria ne ooro jatend lweny mare Ashdod, mi okawo dalanobang’ lweny mager.  2E kindeno Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Isaya wuod Amozniya, "Gony pien gugru manie nungonino, kendo ilony wuocheni. " Isayanotimo kamano, mowuotho duk, gi tiende nono.  3Bang’e Ruoth Nyasayenowacho niya, "Kaka Isaya osewuotho duk, kendo gi tiende nono, kuomhigni adek, kobedo ranyisi misieomogo Misri kod Ethiopia, 4e kaka ruodhAsuria nosemb jo-Misri kod jo-Ethiopia ma osemako duto, joma dongokaachiel gi nyithindo.  Giniwuoth duge gi tiendegi nono, ka siandagineno, mi Misri noyud wichkuot.  5Ji duto nogore nyang’eng’a ka geno magigenogo kuom jo-Ethiopia, kendo sunga ma gisungorego ni jo-Misridikonygi, nolal nono.  6Chieng’no joma odak a donam nowach niya, ‘Neurugima osetimore ni joma ne wageno kuomgi, mi waringo irgi mondo oreswakuom ruodh Asuria! To koro wan to dwatony nadi?’ "Isaya 21Wach mokor kuom Babulon1Wach mane Nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom thimm man but nam e ma:E fweny malichno nanenoe kalausi magerkaa e thim man yo milambo, ma en piny ma ji oluoro. 2Ne aneno kaka dala mandhogo ji, ondhogi. Ne awinjo ka Nyasaye jiwo jo-Elam kod jo-Mediani mondo odhi omonj Babulon kendo olwore,mondo sungane orum. 3Kane aneno fwenyno ne apuodora ka rem rama malit,mana ka dhako ma muoch kayo. Gik mane aneno kendo awinjo ne ogoya gi kibaji, mi adhier nono. 4Dhoga nomoko kendo natetni ma ok anyal konyoNe asegeno ni abiro yueyo godhiambo, ka chieng’ opodho,to kindeno nolokorena mana masira. 5Bende naneno ka chiemo oseket piny, mi ochan kombe,kendo ka jatend jo-Babulon chiemo kendo metho,to e sano ne gipo ka oluonggimondo gimanre gi gigi mag lweny. 6Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona kama:"Ket jang’icho mondo ohul gik ma oneno. 7Ka oneno geche lweny ka biro,ma farese ariyo ariyo ywayo,kaachiel gi joma oidho kenje kod ngamia,to mondo orang ane maber gima timore. "8Bang’e jang’icho nokok niya,"Jaduong’, asebet ka achung’ kar ng’ichoodiechieng’ gotieno duto pile,
to koro echa aneno joidh farese ka biro,kaachiel gi geche lweny ma farese ariyo ariyo ywayo. "Eka nawinjo dwoko niya,"Babulon osepodho!Osepodho, kendo nyisechene manono osemuki moriere piny. "10Yaye, jothurwa ma jo-Israel,ma osenyon ka kal minyono kidino,asenyisou gik ma Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ma Nyasach Israelowachona. Wach mokor kuom Duma11Ma e wach mane Nyasaye oyiso e fweny kuom Duma:Ne awinjo ng’ato ka luonga Seir. Ne openjo niya, "In jang’icho koro en sa adi mar otieno?"12Ne adwoko niya,"Piny chiegni ru, to obiro yuso kendo. To kudwaro penjo kendo, to uduog ira. "Wach mane okor kuom jo-Arabu13Ma e wach mane Nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom jo-Arabu:Un jo-Dedan ma bworo e thim gi jo-Arabu,14kod un joma odak Tema,rwakuru joma oseringo, kumiyo chiemoo gi pi,15nikech giseringo lweny mager,minegoe ji gi ligangla kod asere mabith. 16Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho niya, "Kapok higa achiel orumo ngang’, toduong’ duto mar jo-Arabu ma Kedar notieki.  17Jo asere marateke maggimanok kende ema nodong’, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel emaowacho kamano. "Isaya 22Wach mokor kuom holo mar Hinom1Wach mane Nyasaye onyiso kuom holo mar Hinom e ma:Un jo-Jerusalem, nyisauru gima omiyo uduto uidho ewi udi. 2Yaye, in dala ma ji goyoe mahu, kendo ma koko opong’o,bende ok ginitho e lweny. 3Jotendu mag lweny duto noringi,kendo nomaki kapok oywayo atungegi. Kata mana jou marateke bende noring kuma bor. 4Mano emomiyo awacho niya,. "Weuru ng’iya! Weuru aweya, aywag malit!Kik utem kueyo chunya, nikech jowa oserumo. "5Aywak nikech Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutooseketo chieng’ lweny gi koko kod masira. Nomuk ohinga e holo mar fweny,kendo ji nokogi ewi gode, kadwaro kony. 6Jo-Elam biro kawo aserni maggi,kendo jo-Aram biro tueyo farese e gechegi mag lweny. Jo-Kir bende nokaw kuodigi. 7Geche lweny nopong’ holni mau mabeyo,kendo joidh farese noried ni lweny e dhorangeyeu. 8Kamano teko mar Juda norum. Chieng’no unubed gi chir nikech giu mag lwenymokan e ot miluongo ni Od Bungu. 9Bende unurang ohinga mar dala Daudi,mondo ulos kuondene mang’eny momukore. Unuchik pi Soko Mamwalo mondo ochokre,10kendo unukwan ut Jerusalem,mi unumuk moko mondo ulosgo ohinga obed motegno,11bende unukuny yawo e kind ohinga ma oko kod ohinga maiyemondo pi Soko Machon odonjie. To kata kamano ok nupar Jachuech gik moko duto,kata dewo Jal mane oseloso gigo duto chon, ok nudew. 12Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto noluongumondo uywagi kendo udengi,kendo mondo uliel wiu kendo urwak piende gugru.
To kar timo kamano, to unutug atuga kumetho,kendo kuyang’o dhok gi rombe uchamo,ka uwacho niya,"Wachiemuru kendo wamethuru, nikech kiny wanatho. "14To Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto osebirona e fweny,mi awinjo ka okuong’ore ni,richou ok nopwodhi nyaka chop thou. Mano e wach Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto!Okor ni Eliakim biro kawo kar Shebna15Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nowachona niya,"Dhiyo ir jakeno ma nyinge Shebna, ma jarit od ruoth,mondo ipenje kama:
‘Ere gima itimo ka, koso ere wadu man ka,momiyo isekunyo bur mibiro yikie kae?Chutho, ang’o momiyo ikunyo bur malo e lwanda,mondo obed liel ma ringri biro yueyoe?17Ruoth Nyasaye biro teng’i oko,mana ka ng’ama teng’o nyuogo oko e nanga. 18Eka eno g’wasi motueyi matek,kendo oboli e piny malach, mana ka mpira mowit e pap,kendo gecheni mag lweny mayande isungorigo nosik mana kuno. ’ "19Ruoth Nyasaye wachoni niya, "Anagoli e tiji, mi adwoki e piny. 20Chieng’no analuong jatichna Eliakim wuod Hilkia mondo okaw kari. 21Anarwake gi lawi mar duong’, mi asidhne kilembani, kendo enobed wuonjo-Jerusalem gi jo-Juda 22Anamiye rayaw mar od Daudi, kendo gima oyawo,onge ng’ama nolor; bende gima oloro, onge ng’ama noyaw.  23Enobed jateloma nomi joodgi yud duong’, kendo anagure matek, mana ka musmal.  24Kuomeema joodgi duto te, koda ka modhier, nobed kayudoe konyruok, mana kakagik mang’eny mopogore opogore liero kong’aw e musmal.  25To an, RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, amedo wachoo ni, chieng’no musmal maneogur motegnono nopudh oko.  Adier, nong’adee mi olwar, kendo gik mokoduto mayande olier kuome nokethi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "Isaya 23Wach mokor kuom Turo gi Sidon1 Wach mane Nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom Turo ema:Un yiedhi madongo mag Turo madhi Tarshish, ywaguru,nikech dhowath mugowoe ibiro kethi chuth. Ubiro winjo wachni e yo kurawo e chula Saiprus. 2Un joma odak e dho nam, ling’uru thi. Ywaguru, un joohala mag Sidon,3ma jotendgi ng’ado nembe mondo oom cham Shihor,kendo ma yudo ohala kuom ting’o mwandu mag ogendini. 4Dala mar Sidon, ma en dhowath mochiel motegno,noywagi ka wiye okuot ka wacho niya,"Tinde ok awinj rem mar muoch. Nyithindo bende ok anywol. Aonge gi nyithindo ma yawuowi kata ma nyiri ma apidho. "5Ka jo-Misri owinjo masira ma biro mako Turo,to ginichandre malit mi giwach niya,
"Yaye, un joma odak e dhonam, ywaguru,kendo idhuru yiedhi udhi Tarshish. 7Yande jou dhi e pinje mamoko maboyo mondo oyud kuonde dak,to koro dalau mane mor, kendo humbe olak chon,odong’ mana gunda!"8To en ng’a mosechano kelo masira kuom Turo,dala ma pinje moko nie bwoye,kendo ma joohala mage gin joma ogen e piny ngima?9Ruoth Nyasaye manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema osechano kelo masiranokendo okel achaya kuom ji duto moluor ahinya e piny. 10Kuom mano, pururu lowo un jo-Tarshish,nikech ohandu biro rumo!11Ruoth Nyasaye oserieyo bade e nam mondo olok loch ruodhi,bende osegoolo chik mondo omuk miech Kanaan mochiel motegno. 12Osewacho niya,"Yaye, un jo-Sidon, dala mothir, ok unuchak uubed mamor. Kata ka ung’ado nam mudhi Saiprus,to kuno bende ok unuyudie yueyo. 13Ranguru uneye piny jo-Babulon. Jo-Babulon ema nolok Turo thim ma ondiegi dakie,to jo-Asuria ok ema noloke. Ginidhur lowo mondo ginyon ka giidho ohingane,kendo ginimuk ut ruodhi, mi giketh dalano chuth. 14Ywaguru, un yiedhi madongo madhi Tarshish,nikechh dhowath mugowoe ibiro kethi. 15Chakre chieng’no wich nowil gi Turokuom higni piero abiriyo, maromre gi hik ruoth achiel. To ka higni piero abiriyogo oserumo,to Turo nochandre ka dhako ma jachode miwero niya:16In dhako ma jachode mojwang’,kaw thumi iwuothgo e dala koni gi koni,kigwelo puch mamit, kendo kiwero wendi duto,mondo chwo ochak opari. "17To bang’ higni piero abiriyo Ruoth Nyasaye nokech Turo, mi resi, tokata kamano, dalano nodog e tije machon, mi oyud ohala kuom tiyo niogendini duto mae piny ngima, mana kaka dhako ma jachode yudo ohala kuomdwanyruok gi chwo.  18To ohala moyudo e tijeno nochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye. Ok nokunggi, bende ok nokan-gi, to nong’iew kodgi chiemo mathoth kodlewni mabeyo ni jodolo mag Ruoth Nyasaye. Isaya 24Okor wach ni Nyasaye biro kumo piny1Winjuru! Ruoth Nyasaye biro teng’o piny, mi dong’ nono. Obiro bare, mi oloke ataro, kendo oke joma odakie. 2Chieng’no jadolo nobed maromre gi ji ajia,kendo misumba nobed maromre gi ruodhe. Jahon gik moko bende nobed maromre gi jang’iewo,kendo jahol ji nobed maromre gi ng’ama holo. 3Piny nodong’ nono haa, kendo nokethre chuth,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ema osewacho kamano. 4Piny notwo kendo gik mantie noner. Adier, piny duto noner kendo notwo,koda ka kuonde moting’ore duto. 5Ji modak e piny osedwanyo piny,nikech gidagi rito chike, mi giketho muma mochwere. 6Mano emomiyo kuong’ biro mwonyo piny,kendo joma odakie none chandruok nikech richogi,bende ginilal nono, mak mana ji manok kende ema nodong’. 7Yiend mzabibu noner, mi divai mobi manyien nobed matin. Joma mor bende chunygi nobed malit. 8Nyiduonge noling’ thi,bende mahu ma joma mor goyo norumkendo thumbe ok noywagi. 9Onge ng’ama nochak omadh divai ka wer,kendo kong’o nobed marach ni jamath. 10Dala Manono nokethre chuth,kendo ot ka ot nolor mondo joyeko kik donjie. 11Ji noywagre e wang’yore nikech divai nobed maonge. Tuke duto bende norum,kendo mor nobed maonge e piny. 12Dalano nodong’ mana gunda,kendo dhorangach notur matindotindo. 13Mano e gima biro timore e piny ngima,kendo ni oganda ka oganda. Ji manok kende ema nodong’mana kaka olemo manok ema dong’ e yadh zeituni moyiengi,kata e yadh mzabibu mihulo bang’ keyo. 14Ji biro ywak matek yo podho chieng’,ka gikok niya,"Mano kaka duong’ mar Ruoth Nyasaye ng’ongo!15Kuom mano ji mondo omi Ruoth Nyasaye duong’ e pinje man yo wuokchieng’,kendo nying Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel opakie dhonembe gi chulni man yo podho chieng’. "16Wasewinjo ka giwer e tung’ piny ka tung’ piny niya,"Mano kaka Ng’ama Kare ber!"An to chunya pod lit ahinya,nimar ji pod osiko ka timo atima richo,kendo ndhogruok opong’o piny. 17A yaye, un joma odak e piny,masira gi bur kod obadho ema ochomou!18Ka uringo masira, to ununyumru e bur,kendo ka utony mak unyumoru e bur, to obadho nomaku,nikech masira biro lwar kuomu koa e polo,kendo piny duto noyiengni marach. 19Piny nobarre, mi gik moko duto lal nono. 20Adier, piny notagre mana ka ng’at momer,kendo noukni mana ka kiru ma yamo yiengo. Nopodhi, to ok nochak ochung’ kendo,nimar richo ji ohinge gi pek. 21Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye nong’ad bura,mi malaika mae polo, nokum e polo,kendo ruodhi mae piny, nokum e piny. 22Enochokgi mana ka joma omaki,mi ketgi e od tuech nyaka chop yalgi, kendo kumgi. 23Due norieny matiptip, kendo wang’chieng’ bende noimre,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nogur lochnee got Sayun man Jerusalem,mi duong’ne maler norieny e nyim jodonge. Isaya 25Wer mipakogo ng’wono mar Nyasaye1A Ruoth Nyasaye, in e Nyasacha!Anating’ nyingi malo, kendo anapaki,nikech honni mane ichano chon, isetimo gi adiera. 2Iseketho mier, mi udi momukore odhurore pidhe pidhe. Adier, iseloko mier mochiel motegno pidhe mag kite,mi udi mabeyo mag jopinje mamoko osekethore chuth,kendo ok nochak oger. 3Mano emomiyo oganda makwiny miyi luor. Adier, mier mag ogendini mager oluori,4nikech isebedo kar konyruok ni ng’at modhier machandore. Ee, in e kar bwogo koth, kendo e tipo ma geng’o chieng’e ndalo ma joma ger monjowaka koth machwe maduong’ e ndalo chiri,5kata ka chieng’ marieny mager e ndalo oro. In ema itieko koko mar wasikwa mager,mana kaka boche polo geng’o liet mar chieng’,mi wer ma wasikwago chayowago lal nono. 6Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutobiro loso sawo mamit ni ji duto ewi got Sayun. Enobed sawo mar divai mochiek chuth, kendo modhing’ maber,kod chiemo mamit motimo mo. 7Ewi godni ema Ruoth Nyasaye nogolie kanikmoumo wang’ ogendini duto.
Enotiek tho nyaka chieng’. Bang’e enoywe pi wang’ ng’ato ka ng’ato,kendo nogol achaye man kuom joge e piny duto. Ruoth Nyasaye ema owacho kamano. 9Chieng’no ji nowach niya,"Ma e Nyasachwa, ma waserito mondo oreswa. Adier, ma e Ruoth Nyasachwa ma wageno kuome,omiyo wabeduru mamor kendo moil, nikech osewarowa,
kendo nikech lwete nobed ewi godni mondo okonywa. Jo-Moab to nonyon gi tiende,mana kaka dhok nyono tiang’ e kul. 11Kanyo ema jo-Moab norieye bedegimana kaka ng’ama goyo abal rieyo bedene ka kwang’,to Nyasaye notiek sungagi,kaachiel gi gimoro amora ma lwetgi oseloso. 12Ruoth Nyasaye nomuk ohinga margi marabora ma gigeng’orego,mi ruombre piny e buru. "Isaya 26Wer migenogo kony mar Ruoth Nyasaye1Wer ma nower e piny Juda chieng’no e ma:"Wan gi dala mochiel motegno,kendo resruok ma Ruoth Nyasaye osekelonwaema obedo ohinga mwageng’orego. 2Yawuru dhorangeye mondo oganda moyie kuom Nyasaye odonji. 3Joma parogi osiko kuomi, A Nyasaye, irito gi kue. Gin gi kue nikech gigeno kuomi. 4Genuru kuom Ruoth Nyasaye nyaka chieng’,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye owuon en lwanda mosiko. 5Joma ne odak e dala moting’ore osedwoko piny,kendo osemuko dalagi, mi orwombore piny e buru,6mondo joma ithiro kendo ma jochan onyone gi tiendgi. "7Yor ng’at makare oriere tir,nikech in ema iloso ni joma long’o yo ma onego giluw. 8Wan bende waluwo yo mondiki e chikeni,kwageni, A Ruoth Nyasaye. Gima chunywa dwaro moloyo en ni mondo nyingi oyud duong’. 9Otieno duto chunya dwari. Adier, amanyi ka aketo chunya,nikech ka ibiro e piny, ming’ado bura,to eka joma odakie puonjore tim makare. 10Jaricho to kata da dhial manade,to pod ok onyal puonjore tim makare,to omedo ameda timo richo e piny ma adiera nitie,ka ok odew duong’ mar Ruoth Nyasaye.
A Ruoth Nyasaye iselocho, to joricho ok ne mano. We gineye hera matut miherogo jogi, mondo wigi okuodi,kendo mach ma iseiko ni wasiki otiekgi!. 12A Ruoth Nyasaye, inimiwa kue,nikech gik moko duto ma wasetimo, in ema itimonwa. 13A Ruoth Nyasachwa, ruodhi moko ma ok in osebedo ka ritowa,to koro in kendi ema walami. 14Joma otho ok nochak obed mangima. Adier, joma osenindo e liel ok nochak ochier. Mano emomiyo isekumoo ruodhigo mi itieko,kendo imiyo wich owil kodgi. 15A Ruoth Nyasaye, inimed ogandawa. Ee, inimede kiyaro tong’ pinywa mondo nyingi oyud duong’. 16Ne wamanyi, a Ruoth Nyasaye ka wan e chandruok,kendo kane ikumowa, to ne walami mos. 17Kaka dhako winjo rem kendo ywak ka muoch kayo,e kaka wachalo ka wan e nyimi, A Ruoth Nyasaye. 18Wasebedo kwanegore gi tich, to onge gima wasetimo,mana ka dhako mosebedo ka muoch kayo,to onywolo mana yamo!Kata obedo ni wasechandore kamano,to ok wasekelo resruok ni pinywa. 19Jogi duto mosetho nochak obed mangima. Adier, ringregi nochier kendo. Joma onindo e lowo biro chier, mi kog gi mor,nimar tekoni biro lor kuomgi mana ka tho ma moko e lum,mi piny nogol joma notho chon oko. 20Un joga, donjuru e uteu, mi ulor dhoudi,mondo upond matin mi mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye kadhi,21nikech Ruoth Nyasaye biro biro, koa kar dakne,mondo okum joma odak e piny nikech richogi. Piny noel remo mosechuer kuome,kendo ok nopand joma osenegi. Isaya 27Okor wach ni nores jo-Israel, mi chokgi kanyakla1 Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye nokaw liganglane mabith kendo motegno, mioneggo Levayathan, kod thuol malich kendo manudore, modak e nam. 2Chieng’no wer ma nower ema:"Israel e puodho maber mar mzabibu. 3To an Ruoth Nyasaye e jaritne,kendo akelone pi pile mondo kik pot mzabibu lwar. Arite gotienoo kendo godiechieng’,4to ok onyagna olemo ma anyalo losogo divai. Omiyo ochalo mana gi puodho ma kudho gi pedo ema opong’o. Kuom mano, abiro monje, mi awang’e pep,5mak mana ka jo-Israel oringo kuoma kaka kar konyruokgi,mi gitimo koda winjruok. Adier, onego gitim koda winjruok. 6E ndalo mabiro, nyikwa Jakobo nogurre motegno. Ee, jo-Israel nobed ka yath ma dongo kendo thiewonyaka nyag olemo, mi pong’ piny ngima. "7To bende Nyasaye osekumo jo-Israel matek,kaka nokumo joma nosesandogi?Koso bende osenego jo-Israel matek,kaka nonego wasigu mane onegogi?8Ooyo, ose mana riembogi gidhi e piny mabor,ka gima yamo mager moa yo wuok chieng’ ema oterogi. 9Kapok richo mag jo-Israel opwodhi,to nyaka giketh kendegi mag liswa,mi gireg kitegi olokre buru, kendo ging’ad oko yien gi sirni dutomilamo. 10To dala ma ochiel motegno nodong’ gunda. Enobed dala mojwang’ maonge ng’ama odakie,kendo nolokre thim. Jamni nokwa kuno, ka chamo bede yien. 11Bende mon mamoto nojak bede yien motwo, ochwakgo mach. Mano notimre nikech ogandano onge gi rieko. Omiyo, Jachuechgi ok nokechgi. Adier, Ng’ama nochueyogi ok nong’wonnigi. 12Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye nochoku un jo-Israel, achiel achiel,chakre aora Yufrate nyaka aora Nael,ka gima ookwanyo olemb yath moyiengi. 13Chieng’no tung’ maduong’ noywagi,mi joma olal e piny Asuria nobi,kaachiel gi joma noter Misri e tuech,mi ginilam Ruoth Nyasaye e got maler man Jerusalem. Isaya 28Siem mosiemgo jo-Israel1Yaye, inine malit, in dala Samaria manie holo momew,ma jomer mag Israel sungorego ka osimbgi. Duong’ni biro rumo mana ka maua moner,in dala ma joge lwokore gi kong’o!2Winjuru!Ruoth Nyasaye biro kelo ng’at maratego moseyiero mondo oketh pinyu. Obiro biro mana ka yamb koth makelo pe, maketho piny,kata mana ka pi ohula mabubni kaywoyo gik moko. 3Bang’e osimbo ma jomer mag israel sungoregono nonyon piny,4mi duong’ne biro rumo ka maua moner,kata ka olemo mokwongo chiek,ma ng’ato ang’ata moneno, to pono chamo ka rikni. 5Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema nobed osimbo mabermar duong’ ni joge manok modong’.  6Enomi jong’ad bura mau bed gi chunymar ng’ado bura gi adiera, kendo enomi jolwenju ma kedo matek gi wasigue dhorangeyeu bed gi chir mathoth. Siem kod singruok momi jo-Jerusalem7To koro jotend Jerusalem duto bende gin jomer. Jodolo mage kod jonabine mer kendo kwang’nikech kong’o makech,omiyo gitimo gik mofuwo. Gitagore ataga ka gineno fweny, kata ka ging’ado bura. 8Ging’ok e mesni, kendo kuonde duto ma gintie onywandore. 9Giwacho niya,"Koro ere ng’ama Janabi paro ni biro puonjo?Koso ere joma biro winjo tiend gima opuonjo?Mit koparo ni wan nyithindo ma tinde eka oweyo dhoth?10Onwoyonwa gik mowacho ndalo mang’eny,kodhum gi weche ma onge tiendgi. "
To chutho, kamano e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye biro loso kodgi,kowuoyo gi dhok moro nono ma ok ginyal winjo. 12Chon Nyasaye nowachonigi niya,"Achiwonu yueyo maradier, kendo joma ool mondo oyue. Adier, mano e yueyo. "To ne gidagi winjo. 13Mano omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nochak owuo kodgikadhum gi weche ma onge tiendgi!To ka giwinjo wechego, to ginichwanyre,mi gipodh kendo gitur. Ginimok e obadho, mi makgi, kendo tergi e tuech. 14Kuom mano, chikuru itu,un josunga, ma jotend jo-Jerusalem. 15Uwacho niya,"Wasetimo winjruok gi tho. Adier, wasetimo singruok gi Piny Joma Otho. Omiyo ka ohula miwachono biro, to ok obi ywoyowa,nikech waseloso miriambo ka kar konyruokwa,kendo wuondruok e okumba ma wageng’orego. "
To koro Ruoth Nyasaye wacho kama:"Winjuru! Abiro keto kidi mar mise e Sayun,mondikie ni, ‘Ng’ama oyie ok norikni. ’En kidi motegno, moyier, ma nengone tek, momako kor ot. 17Anami adiera bed rapim,kendo anami tim makare bed tol mipimogo ot, kigero. To kodh pe biro ywero miriambo ma ugeng’orugo. Kendo pi ohula biro mwomo kar konyruoku,18mi winjruok mane utimo gi tho, kethre,kendo singruok mane utimo gi Piny Joma Otho, rum. Pi mabubni noywo gik moko,mi unuchal gi piny ma ohula omwomo!19Pile pile ohula nobi, mi yweru. Adier, noywou okinyi kokinyi, kendo odiechieng’ gotieno. Kuwinjo wachni, to unukirni,20nimar unubed e thagruokmana ka ng’ama onindo e kitanda machiek,ma ok nyal riere tir,kendo ma baranget ma oumorego tin,ma ok nyal ume maber. "
Ruoth Nyasaye biro a malo gi mirima,kaka ne oa malo e got Perazim,kendo kaka ne otimo e holo mar Gibeon,mondo oti tije magalagala ma osechano timo,ma ji ok par ni onyalo timo. 22Koro weuru sunga, nono to ibiro tueu gi ratego motegno,nimar asewinjo ka Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto golo chik mondooketh piny duto. 23Chikuru itu mondo uwinj wechena:24Uparo ni ng’ato nyalo siko ka puro apura puodho,to ok chwowe kodhi?Koso onyalo buso abusa nyalandra,to ok opidh gimoro?25Donge ka osetieko buso,to ochuoyo kothe mopogore opogore,moro ka moro gi kare mowinjore kode?26Ong’eyo gima onego otim,nikech Nyasaye ema puonje,kendo nyise yo maber monego otimee. 27Cham duto ok diem machalre. Moko idino gi radin, to moko iteng’o gi luth. 28Ngano en cham mayom, omiyo ok dine matek,nimar dipo ka ong’inyore matindotindo. Chutho, ok dine nyalandra. Kata ka obedo ni iywayo gari kuome mondo tiende gari odine,to ok tim kamanoo aming’a, nimar dipo ka orege mayom. 29Wachno bende oa kuom Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto,ma ng’ado rieko mabeyo, kendo ma tekone duong’!Isaya 29Jerusalem gi wasike1Yaye, inine malit in Jerusalem,dala mane Daudi obworoe!Kuom higa achiel kata higni ariyo sewni mitimo higa ka higa pod timore,2to bang’e anakelni masira,mi ywagruok gi nduru nobedie,kendo inichal gi kendo-mar-misango ma remo ochuerie!3Anabed jasiki, mi agoni ageng’a. 4Nadwoki piny, mi iwuo mana gie lowo,kendo wecheni nowuog mana e buru. Duondi nochal gi dwond ng’at ma jajuogi,ma dwonde pilore ka wuok piny. 5To oganda maduong’ ma kedo kodi nochal gi buru. Adier, oganda magerno nochal gi mihudhi ma yamo tero. 6Piyopiyo nono, Ruoth Nyasaye manyalo Gik Moko Duto biro biro mondookonyi. Polo nomor, kendo piny noyiengni gi koko maduong’. Kodh yamo bende nobedie, gi kalausi,kod polo ma goyo gik moko. 7Ogendini mang’eny ma goyoni ageng’a kendo kedo kodi,nolal nono mana ka lek mar otieno, yaye Jerusalem. 8Ginichal gi ng’at modenyo ma leko ni chiemo,to chiew, yudo ni onge gima ochamo,kata ka ng’at ma riyo oloyo, ma leko ni modho,to chiew, yudo ni onge pi mosemodho. Mano e kaka ogendini makedo gi got Sayun nochal. "Jo-Israel gin muofni kendo andhoke9Nenore ni udhier nono.  Ara galreuru agala kanyo!Meruru amera, to ok gi divai, bende tagreuru ataga to ok nikech kong’o.
Nimar Ruoth Nyasaye osemiyo ubedo gi chuny mar nindo matut. Ee, osedino wengeu, (tiende ni jonabiu),kendo oseumo wiyeu, (tiende ni jou ma koronu wach. )11Weche duto ma bironu e fweny, chalo gi kitabu modin gi dwogo. Kichiwo kitabuno ni ng’at mong’eyo somo,mi ikwaye ni mondo osomnigo,to obiro dwoki ni ok onyal some nikech odine. 12To kata ka ichiwo kitabuno ni ng’at makia somo,mi iwachone ni mondo osome,to obiro dwoki ni ok ong’eyo somo.
Bang’ mano ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya,"Jogi lama mana gi dhogi kende,kendo gimiya luor mana gi dhogi ma oko,to chunygi bor koda, kendo luor ma giluoragoen mana chik mar dhano, momak gi wich.
Emomiyo anachak abwog jogi kendo,ka atimo gik malich ma miyo giwuoro. Rieko mar jogi mariek nolal nono,kendo paro matut mar jogi mang’ado rieko, norum. "15Yaye, unune malit, un joma temo pando parogi ni Nyasaye,kendo ma, kosetimo timbegi e mudho, to wacho niya,"Ere ng’ama nenowa, koso ere ng’ama ong’eyo gima watimo?"
To koro mano kaka uloko weche ataro,mana ka gima jachuech bende romre gi lowo mochueyo. Bende gimoro ma ochue dikwer ni jachuechne ok ochueye?Koso agulu bende diwachi ni ng’ama ochueye onge gi rieko?Okor wach ni nores jo-Israel17Bang’ kinde matin, Lebanon biro lokore puodho momew,mi yien mabeyo nodongie. 18Chieng’no, joma itgi odinoo nowinj wach, ka isomo kitabu,kendo joma wengegi osebedo kotimo mudho mandiwa, nonen. 19Joma muol nochak obed mamor kuom Ruoth Nyasaye. Adier, joma odhierie moloyonobed mamor kuom Ng’ama Ler mar Israel. 20Joma ger norum, kendo josunga ok nobedie,mi jogo duto ma timbegi mono notieki. 21Gin jogo ma ketho nying ji,kendo ma buto mondo ohiny jong’ad bura,bende gimiyo buch ng’at makare iketho katyiem nono. 22Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach joka Jakobo,kendo mane owaro Ibrahim wacho kama:"Koro Jakobo ok bi yudo wichkuot,kendo kibaji ok nogoye,23nikech ka nyikwaye oneno gima asetimo ni ogandagi,to ginimi nyinga duong’. Ee, ginidend Ng’ama Ler mar Jakobo. Adier, ginimi Nyasach Israel luor. 24Joma parogi bayo noyud rieko,kendo joma wigi tek bende nopuonji!"Isaya 30Fuwo ma jo-Israel nigo kuom geno kuom jo-Misri1Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya,"Yaye, unune malit, un nyithinda ma jopiem!Uchano timo gik moko ma ok meka,bende utimo winjruok gi ogendini mamoko, to an ok ahero. Kamano umedo mana richo ewi richo!2Urikni kudhi Misri mondo uyud resruok kuom Farao,kendo ugeng’oru e tipo mar Misri, to ok upenja. 3Gen mugenogo kuom Farao ok nokonyu,kendo geng’ruok mugeng’orugo e tipo Misri,nokelnu mana wichkuot,4nimar kata obedo ni jotelo mage ni Zoan,kendo jootene chopo nyaka Hanes,5to uduto unuyud wichkuot kuom oganda ma ok nyal konyouno. Adier, ok unuyud konyruok kata ohala moro,to mana wichkuot kod achaye. "6Wach mane Nyasaye onyiso e fweny kuom ondiegi manie piny milambo ema:"Jooteugo kadho e piny ma masira gi parruok malit opong’o,kama sibuoche mamon nitie, kendo sibuoche machwo rutoe,bende kama thuonde mager mahuyo odakie. Kenje gi ngamia oting’o mwandugi,ka gitero ni oganda ma ok nyal konyou. 7Adier, kata ka gitero mwandugi ni jo-Misri kamano,to kony ma ubiro yudo kuomgi romre gi nono. Mano ema omiyo achako Misri ni Rahab,ondiek ma budho abudha. 8Koro dhiyo mondoo indik wachno kamoro. Ee, ndike mondo obed ranyisi e ndalo mabiro nyaka chieng’. 9Jogo gin joma jopiem. Gin yawuowi ma jomriambo,ma odagi winjo chike ma Ruoth Nyasaye ogolo. 10Giwacho ni jokor wach niya, ‘Kik une fweny. ’Jonabi to giwachonigi ni,‘Kik ukor wach moro mar adiera,to kornwauru mana weche mamit mag wuondruok. 11Baruru uwe yo moriere tir,mondo kik wachak wawinj wach Ng’ama Ler mar Israel. ’ "12To Ng’ama Ler mar Israel wacho kama,"Ok usewinjo wachnano,bende usando ji, kendo utimo timbe mag miganga,kuparo ni gik ma kamago nyalo konyou,13omiyo richouno biro chalonu okak manie ohinga mabor,ma miyo ohinga barore tiarara, kendo podho ka diemo wang’,14mi ng’inyre matindotindo mana ka agulu motore,ma ok nyal yud take mikwanyogo mach,kata pate mitwomogo pi. "15Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ng’ama Ler mar Israel owacho niya,"Kuduogo ira, mi ubedo gi kue, to unuyud resruok. Bende kudemboru, kendo uketo genou kuoma, to un ubed gi teko. "To kata kamano ne udagi, 16mi uwacho niya,"Ooyo, wabiro idho farese mondo waringi. "To mano ber, ringuru aringa, uyombi, kunyalo!To kata obedo ni uringo matek manade,to wasiku biro ringo matek mi juku. 17Ng’at achiel noriemb jou alufu achiel,kendo ji abich kobwogou to unuring uduto mi uke nono,mana ka yien mokelore okelore ewi got. Nyasaye osingore ni obiro ng’wono ni joge18To kata kamano, Ruoth Nyasaye pod dwaro ng’wononu,kendo ogombo ahinya mondo okechu,nimar en Nyasaye ma jaadiera. Mano kaka jogo duto mogeno kuome gin johawi!19Un jo-Sayun modak Jerusalem, ok unuchak uywagii.  Ruoth Nyasaye birong’wononu, kendo obiro dwokou ka owinjo ywaku.  20Kata obedo ni omiyochiembu gi piu doko matin, mi uthagru, to en, ma en japuonju, ok nochakopondnu kendo, to unubed kunene gi wang’u pile.  21To kubaro korachamkata korachwich, mi uweyo yo, to unuwinj gi itu uwegi ka dwol morowachonu gi kang’eu niya, "Ma e yo, luweuru. " 22Bang’e unukaw nyisecheumanono mubawo gi fedha kata gi dhahabu, mi uwiti ka ukwanogi ka gik maok ler, kaka tutu kata chieth.  23Ruoth Nyasaye nokel koth ni chambu,kendo nomi puotheu chieg cham mogundho.  Jambu bende nokwa e legemadongodongo, 24kendo ruethu kod kenjeu mupurogo nocham mana nganomopidhi maber, kendo mokirie kado.  25Chieng’ nek maduong’no, ma ikethoekuonde mochiel motegno, aore kod sokni mamol nobed ewi gode madongo kodpidhe maboyo duto.  26Chieng’no due nobed karieny maler ka wang’chieng’kendo wang’ chieng’ nobed ka rieny maler nyadibiriyo moloyo kaka orienypile.  Nochal mana gi ler mar ndalo abiriyo moriw e odiechieng’ achiel!En chieng’ ma Ruoth Nyasaye nochomie tiende joge kod bedegi motur, kendoochangie adhondegi. Kum ma Ruoth Nyasaye biro kumogo jo-Asuria27Neuru! Ruoth Nyasaye biro, kaa kuma bor. Mirimbe liel ka mach ma dhuolore. Dhoge tetni gi mirima mager,kendo lewe otimo mach makakni, mawang’o gik moko duto. 28Muche bende chalo gi aora mopong’ ma mwomo genge,kendo imo ng’ato nyaka ng’ute. Obiro piedho ogendini gi rapiedhi mar tho,mi omi giba yo ma gidwaro luwo,mana ka faras michiko gi chuma ma otue e dhoge. 29To un, unuwer wende mor,mana ka wende miwero e otieno mitimoe sawo maler. Unubed mamor e chunyu,mana kaka jolemo bedo mamore kinde ma jago asili otelonigika gidhi e god Ruoth Nyasaye ma en lwanda mar Israel. 30Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nomi winj dwonde man gi duong’,kendo nonyis bade motimo mach mawang’o gik moko duto,ka lor gi mirima mager,ka polo mor gi koth maduong’, machue gi pe kod yamo mager. 31Kihondko nomak jo-Asuria ka giwinjo dwond Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo ka ogoyogi gi ludhe. 32Un to nubed mamor kugoyo thumbe, kendo uwere kinde duto ma ruoth Nyasaye goyogie. 33To mach miwang’oe ringre joma otho ne oseik chonmondo owang’ie Molok, nyasach Asuria. Kendono duong’ ahinya, kendo odhurie yien mogundho. Much Ruoth Nyasaye ma chalo gi mach malielema biro mokoe. Isaya 31Jo-Misri gin mana ji, ok gin Nyasaye1Mano kaka utimo gima ofuwo, un joma dhi Misri mondo uyud konyruok!Uketo genou kuom farese, kendo kuom geche mag lweny mang’eny ka kuoyo,kod joidh farese gana gi gana, to ok udew Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ng’ama Lermar Israel, kata kwaye mondo otelnu.  2To Ruoth Nyasaye riek, kendoonyalo kelo masira, bende ok olok parone.  Obiro kumo oganda mar joricho,kaachiel gi joma konyogi.  3Jo-Misri gin mana ji, to ok gin Nyasaye,bende faresegi gin mana ring’o to ok gin roho.  Omiyo ka Ruoth Nyasayeorieyo bade mondo okumgi, to joma ikonyo kaachiel gi joma konyogi,nopodh piny, mi gilal nono giduto. 4Ruoth Nyasaye osewachona niya, "Kaka sibuor kata nyathi sibuor ng’ur,kachamo chiayo mosemako, to ok odew, bende ok oluor kata ka jokwathmang’eny ochokore ka goyo koko, mondo oriembe, e kaka Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto nolor piny mondo oked ewi got Sayun.  5Bende kakawinyo huyo but ode, ka rito nyithinde, e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko Duto nobed karito Jerusalem.  Ee, norite kendo nokonye, bendenorese. "6Yaye, jo-Israel, duoguru ir Nyasaye ma useweyo chuth, 7nimar chieng’ maunuwitie nyisecheu manono mag fedha gi dhahabu, ma useloso gi lwetumotimo richo, 8to noneg jo-Asuria gi ligangla, to ok gi ligangla madhano kedogo.  Giniring lweny, mi yawuotgi ma jolweny nolok wasumbni. 9Kihondko nomak jodonggi, mi dhier nono, kendo jotendgi mag lweny bendekibaji nogo ma ok nyal ringo.  Mano e wach maradier mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mamaye omoki Sayun.  Adier, maye ng’ang’ni Jerusalem. Isaya 31Jo-Misri gin mana ji, ok gin Nyasaye1Mano kaka utimo gima ofuwo, un joma dhi Misri mondo uyud konyruok!Uketo genou kuom farese, kendo kuom geche mag lweny mang’eny ka kuoyo,kod joidh farese gana gi gana, to ok udew Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ng’ama Lermar Israel, kata kwaye mondo otelnu.  2To Ruoth Nyasaye riek, kendoonyalo kelo masira, bende ok olok parone.  Obiro kumo oganda mar joricho,kaachiel gi joma konyogi.  3Jo-Misri gin mana ji, to ok gin Nyasaye,bende faresegi gin mana ring’o to ok gin roho.  Omiyo ka Ruoth Nyasayeorieyo bade mondo okumgi, to joma ikonyo kaachiel gi joma konyogi,nopodh piny, mi gilal nono giduto. 4Ruoth Nyasaye osewachona niya, "Kaka sibuor kata nyathi sibuor ng’ur,kachamo chiayo mosemako, to ok odew, bende ok oluor kata ka jokwathmang’eny ochokore ka goyo koko, mondo oriembe, e kaka Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto nolor piny mondo oked ewi got Sayun.  5Bende kakawinyo huyo but ode, ka rito nyithinde, e kaka Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko Duto nobed karito Jerusalem.  Ee, norite kendo nokonye, bendenorese. "6Yaye, jo-Israel, duoguru ir Nyasaye ma useweyo chuth, 7nimar chieng’ maunuwitie nyisecheu manono mag fedha gi dhahabu, ma useloso gi lwetumotimo richo, 8to noneg jo-Asuria gi ligangla, to ok gi ligangla madhano kedogo.  Giniring lweny, mi yawuotgi ma jolweny nolok wasumbni. 9Kihondko nomak jodonggi, mi dhier nono, kendo jotendgi mag lweny bendekibaji nogo ma ok nyal ringo.  Mano e wach maradier mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mamaye omoki Sayun.  Adier, maye ng’ang’ni Jerusalem. Isaya 32Ruoth ma timne kare1Winjuru!Ruoth moro biro biro ma norit piny e yo makare,kendo jotende noti gi adiera. 2Adier, ng’at moro nobed ni jika kama gibwogoe koth gi yamo,bende noduog chuny ji mana ka aore mamol e piny motwo,kata ka tipo mang’ich mar lwanda maduong’,man e piny maliet ma chieng’ kechie. 3Wenge joma neno onge gima nomon neno,bende it joma winjo nowinj awinja. 4Chuny ng’at mamwomore nobed gi rieko,kendo ng’at ma radwal nolos maber. 5Ng’at ma achach ok nochak oluong ni ng’at malong’o,bende ng’at ma jamganga ok nochak oluong ni ng’ama ogen,6nimar ng’at ma achach nobed kawuoyo ka ng’ama achach adier,kendo chunye ka paro mana timo timbe manono. Gik motimo duto nobed gik maricho,kendo ka owuoyo to owacho miriambo koda ka kuom Ruoth Nyasaye. Omono joma odenyo chamo gik ma onego gicham,bende otamo joma riyo oloyo modho. 7Ng’at ma achach yorene richo. Ochano gik maricho e chunye,mondo ohiny joma odhier gi weche mag miriambo, kendo otamo jochan eadiera monego giyudi. 8Ng’at ma jaadiera to paro mana gik makare,kendo ok we adiera kata matin. Osiem mond Jerusalem9Un mon modak e ngima maber,auru malo mondo uwinj gima awacho!Un nyiri ma ok dew gimoro. 10E sani pod onge gima badhou,to bang’ higa achiel gi ndalo moko manok,unubed gi kibaji, nikech cham ok nochiegi,omiyo ok nuyud gima ukayo. 11Un mon ma sani odak e ngima maber, parreuru!Weuru dhil mudhilgono!Lonyreuru duk mondo utue piende gugru e nungou,12kendo ywaguru, nikech puotheu momewkod mzabipu ma nyago olemo mabeyo biro kethore. 13Kudho kod pedo ema biro gawore e puothe joga,nimar ot ka ot ma yande mor nitie e dalau maduong’, nodong’ nono. 14Ji noring owe udi mabeyo madongodongo duto,mi dala ma yande ji thothie nodong’ nono. Nobed lek maber ni le mae thim,kendo jamni bende nokwae. Kuonde moting’ore mochiel motegno mag siro lwenykod kuonde maboyo mag rito,nolokre thim kuom ndalo mang’eny,15nyaka chop roho moa e polo malo lor kuomwa. Eka piny motwo nolokre puothe momew,mi yien mabeyo dongie. 16Bang’e adiera gi tim makare nobedi e piny duto,kuonde momew koda ka kuonde motimo ongoro,17mi kue nosik nyaka chieng’, kendo luoro ok nobedie. 18Kamano joga nobed e piny mokue,ka gidak gi mor, ma onge koko. 19Tik gode ma otimo bungu nobed mang’ich maber,kendo mier manie pap nobed gi kue. 20Koro mano kaka unubed mamor,ka ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu chwoyo chambe e bath aora,kendo weyo jambe wuotho awuotha kaka ohero!Isaya 33Ruoth Nyasaye biro kelo warruok1Yaye unune malit un jo-Asuria!Useketho gik moko, to un pok okethu. Bende usendhogo ji, to un pok ondhogu. To koro ka usetieko ketho gik moko,to uun ema ibiro kethu,kendo ka utieko ndhogo ji,to un ema ibiro ndhogu. 2A Ruoth Nyasaye, wan too kechwa nimar wageno kuomi. Yie imiwa teko okinyi kokinyi,kendo reswa e kinde mar masira. 3Ka ji owinjo kiting’o dwondi, mi imor, to giringo,kendo ka ia malo, to ogendini ke. 4Mwandugi noyaki, mi tieki,mana kaka bonyo nang’o lum, mi tieki. Adier, ji nopot kuomgi mana ka det bonyo. 5Ruoth Nyasaye duong’ moloyo, nikech odak e polo malo. Opong’o Sayun gi adiera kod tim makare,6kendo ubiro yiengoru kuome e ndalou duto. Rieko gi ng’eyo ema kelo resruok,kendo luor ma oluorgo Ruoth Nyasaye e mwandune!7Neuru kaka thuondu ywak e wang’yore. Adier, joote museoro mondo odwar kue, ywak malit. 8Yore madongo odong’ nono; jowuoth ok luwgi. Singruok duto okethi, kendo winjruok motim ok dew. Dhano bende ok kwan ka gimoro. 9Piny ywak, kendo dok chien. Lebanon two, kendo kethoreSharon bende olokore thim,kendo Bashan gi Karmel oyaki modong’ nono. 10Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni jo-Asuria niya,"Koro abiro a malo mondo anyis duong’na maler. 11Gik ma uchano timo gin gik manono,kendo yamo maliet ka mach biro tiekou pep. 12Ogendini nokethi chuth, mi lokre pidhe mag choka,kendo ginichal gi kudho mobeti, mi owang’ e mach. 13Un mudak kuonde maboyo, winjuru gima asetimo. To un ma un machiegni, yieru ni aratego. "14Joricho modak Sayun biro tetni ka luoro omako. Adier, joma ok dew Nyasaye kihondko nomaki,mi ginipenjre niya, "Bende nitie ng’ato kuomwamanyalo dak gi mach mawang’o gik moko duto?Koso en ng’a ma didag gi mach maliel nyaka chieng’?"15Ng’atno nyakaa bed mana ng’at ma timbene oriere,kendo ma wacho adiera,bende ma ok dwar mwandu miyudo gi malang’,kendo ma riembo asoya kucha,bende ma dino ite ni weche mag chwero remo,kendo ma umo wang’e ni timbe mamono. 16Ng’at ma kamano nodag kama oting’ore mokue. Got mabor motimo lwendni ema nobed kare mar g’eng’ruok,kendo enobed koyudo chiemo gi pi morome. 17Enone Ruoth gi duong’ne duto,kendo norang piny moyarore malach. 18Chunye nonyise gik machon,kendo nopar kaka ne oluoro wasigumane ochung’ e tok ohinga mar dalagi,ka chano kaka dimwom ohingano, mi yakgi. 19Ok enochak one oganda mager ma dhogi tek winjo,kendo mawuoyo kabodho wach ma ok winjreno. 20Ka orango Sayun, dala mwatimoe sewni,to enone ni en dala man gi kue. Ee, kong’iyo Jerusalem,to enone ni ochalo gi hema ma ok tungni,ma loyene ogur motegnokendo ma kata tonde achiel ok ochot. 21Kanyo ema duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nonenreeEnochalnwa aora malach man gi bade mang’eny. Onge yiedhi ma nokwang’ kanyo, kikiewo,kata ma noringie gi tanga. Tondegi ombekni ma ok nyal rido murungot, kata ywayo tanga,22nimar Ruoth Nyasaye en jang’adnwa bura. En e ruodhwa, ma ketonwa chik, kendo en ema noreswa. 23Bang’e ng’ama muofu kod ng’ama rang’olbende noyud pok kuom gik moyaki. 24Onge ng’at ma odak kuno ma nowach ni otuo,kendo richo mag ji man kuno nong’wonnigi. Isaya 34Ruoth Nyasaye okecho gi Edom kod ogendini mamoko1Un ugendini mae piny, biuru ka mondo uchik itu. Piny ngima kod gimoro amora manie iye, mondo owinj wachna,2nimar Ruoth Nyasaye nigi mirima mager kod ogendini duto,kod jogi mag lweny. Kuom mano osekuong’ogi ni mondo oneggi, mi tiekgi chuth. 3Jogi monegi nowe oko mak oyiki,mi ringregi pong’ piny gi mifuolu,kendo rembgi nobubni e gode.
E ndalono gik moko duto manie polo malo noleny, mi lal nono. Polo bende nodol mana ka kalatas,kendo sulue nolwar piny mana ka oboke moner,kata ka olemo mochiek.
To ka ligangla mar Ruoth Nyasaye osetieko tichne e polo,to obiro lwar kuom jo-Edom,ma en oganda ma osekuong’o mondo otieki. 6Ligangla mar Ruoth Nyasaye notim remo lilo,kendo boche nogawre kuome,mana ka gima gin boche mag nyiroke imbe,kod remb rombe gi diek mitimogo misango,nimar Ruoth Nyasaye biro timo misango Bozra, dala Edom. Ee, obiro neko malich e piny Edom. 7To kar nego jope, to ruodhi ema obiro nego, kendo kar nego ruedhi,to oganda mar joma rateke ema nonegi,mi remo pong’ piny, kendo piny leny nikech boche,8nimar Ruoth Nyasaye oseketo chieng’ ma obiro chuloe kuor. Adier, oseketo higa ma nokumie jo-Edomkuom gima ne gitimo ni Sayun. 9Aore mag Edom nolokre lam,kendo lowo man kuno nolokre mach lilo,
mi pinyno lokre lam maliel otieno gi odiechieng’,ma ok nyal negi, bende iro nodumie mochwere. Enodong’ thim kuom higni gi higni,kendo onge ng’ama nochak oluw kuno. 11Nobed kama otenga gi chiew gi tula kod agak ema odakie. Ruoth Nyasaye nopim pinyno, mi oyud ni oromo gi kethoo,omiyo enodog’ nono. 12Onge ruoth ma noti pinyno, bende jodonge norum pep. 13Kudho ema noyugno e udi madongodongo man kuno,kendo aila kod pedo nogawre e mier mage mochiel gi ohinga. Enobed piny marach ma ondiegi ema nitie,kendo ma tula ema odakie. 14Le mae thim kod ondiegi norom kuno,kendo kanyo ema jochiende noyudree. Gik malich mag otieno nodag kanyo,mi yud kar yueyo. 15Aywer noger ode kuno,mi nywolie tonge, kendo toye nyithindo. Noumgi gi buombe mondo kik gimoro chamgi. Otenga bende nochokre kuno, moro ka moro gi wadgi. 16Somuru kitap Ruoth Nyasaye,to ubiro yudo ni onge achiel kuom gigo ma nobed maonge,kendo roho mare ema nochokgi. 17En ema oseyiero ni moro ka moro kare,kendo osepogonigi piny, kipimo gi tol. Pinyno nobed margi nyaka chieng’,kendo ginidagie tieng’ gi tieng’. Isaya 35Gueth ma Ruoth Nyasaye guedhogo Israel1Thimbe kod pinje motwo nobed mamor,kendo maupe mabeyo nothiew kuondego. 2Ee, ginithiew mang’eny, kendo piny nopong’ gi wende mor. Kuonde ma yande otwo nobed mang’ichmana ka gode mag Lebanon,kata ka lege mabeyo mag Sharon kod mag got Karmel,kendo jo-Israel none duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasachgi.
Teguru bede mayomyom,kendo rieuru chong monyosore,4bende nyisuru chuny mool niya,"Beduru motegno, kendo kik ubed maluor. Neuru! Nyasachu biro mondo ochul kuor. Ee, obiro mondo okum wasiku kaka owinjore, kendo oresu. "
Bang’e muofni nonen, kendo joma itgi odino nowinj wach. 6Rang’onde bende nochikre ka nyidiek,kendo momni nower gi mor,nimar pi nobubni e piny motwo,kendo aore nobed ka molie. 7Lop kuoyo ma yande chieng’ oowo gi lietnolokre dago mar pi,kendo sokni nowuog e lowo motwo,mi kuonde ma yande ondiegi ema odakiebed kuonde ma lum gi odundu gi togo dongoe. 8Wang’yo maduong’ nobed e thimno,kendo noluonge ni, ‘Wang’yo Maler’Joma ok ler gi joma ofuwo ok nowuothie. 9Sibuoche ok nodhi kuno,kendo onge kata mana ondiek magerma nosud machiegni kode. To yorno ema joma Ruoth Nyasaye osewaro nowuothie. 10Adier, joma Ruoth Nyasaye osereso noluw yorno,ka duogo dala. Ginidonj Sayun ka gikok gi mor kendo ka giil,to kuyo gi parruok nolal nono. Isaya 36Senakerib omonjo Juda(
Ruodhi
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)1E higa mar apar gang’wen, mar loch Hezekia, Senakerib ruodh Asurianomonjo miech Juda mochiel motegno duto, mokawo.  2Ne ooro Rabshake kodoganda lweny mang’ongo ka en Lakish mondo odhi Jerusalem ir ruothHezekia.  Kane Rabshake ochopo kuno, ne ochung’ but fereji magolo pi eyawo mamalo man yo mochiko puodho milyuongo ni Pwoth Jalwok Lewni. 3Eliakim wuod Hilkia ma jaduong’ od ruoth, gi Shebna jagoro, kod Joawuod Asa jachan weche mag piny ne jowuok modhi ire kanyo.  4Eka Rabshakenowachonigi niya, "Nyisuru Hezekia ni ruoth maduong’ ma ruodh Asuriaowacho kama: ‘Ere gima omiyo idhialori kamano? 5In iparo ni weche awechanyalo lokore rieko kod teko miloyogo lweny? En ng’a ma igeno ni birokonyi piem koda? 6Ang’eyo ni idhialori nikech jo-Misri, to nyaka ing’eni jo-Misri chalo gi odundu mobarore, ma ka ng’ato oyiengoree, to pilorekendo chwowo lwete.  Mano e kaka Farao, ruodh Misri, chalo, ni jogo dutomogeno kuome!’ 7To kuwachona ni ugeno kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, todonge en e Nyasaye ma Hezekia hembko gi kuonde mitimonee misengni,kochiko jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem ni nyaka lem mana e nyimkendo-mar-misango man Jerusalem kende?
"Koro in Hezekia, singri ni ruodh Asuria ma atiyone! Ayie miyi faresealufu ariyo kapo nono ni inyalo yudo joma idhogi! 9Ka jo-Misri ema igenoni biro konyi gi geche kod joidh farese, to ere kaka iparo ni dilo katamana achiel matinie moloyo kuom jotend lweny mag ruodha? 10Koso iparo niasebiro mana ni mondo amonj amonja Jerusalem, akethi, ka ok RuothNyasaye ema oyiena? Ng’eni Ruoth Nyasaye ema nowachona ni mondo abiamonj pinyni akethi. "11Eka Eliakim gi Shebna kod Joa nowacho ni Rabshake niya, "Wasayi, yieiwuo kodwa gi dho Aram, nikech en dhok mwang’eyo, to we wuoyo kodwa gidho Hibrania kae, nimar joma ni ewi ohinga nyalo winjowa. " 12To Rabshakene odwokogi, ka penjogi niya, "Uparo ni un kod ruodhu kende ema neruodha oora iru mondo awachnu wechegi? Ooyo, oora ir joma nie wi ohinga,ma ochunore ni nyaka cham chiethgi, kendo madh lachgi giwegi, mana kakaun bende unutim!" 13Bang’ mano nochung’ mokok gi dwol maduong’ gi dhoHibrania niya, "Winjuru wach ruoth maduong’ ma ruodh Asuria! 14Owacho nikik uyie Hezekia wuondu, nikech ok onyal resou.  15Bende kik uwe ohou nimondo ugen kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, kowachonu ni, adier Ruoth Nyasaye emanoresu, kendo ni ruodh Asuria ok nokaw dala maduong’ni.  16Kik uwinj wachHezekia, nimar ruodh Asuria owacho niya, ‘Winjreuru koda, mondo ubi ira,mi ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nocham olemb mzabipe kod ng’ope, bende nomodhpi e sokone owuon, 17nyaka chop abi mi agolu kendo ateru e piny machalgi pinyuni.  En piny ma cham gi mzabibu chiekie maber, kendo ma makati gidivai ng’enyie.  18Tang’uru, nono to Hezekia owitou, kowuondou ni RuothNyasaye biro konyou.  Bende nitie nyasach piny moro mosereso pinye e lwetruodh Asuria? 19Nyiseche mag Hamath gi Arpad ni kanye? Koso ere nyisechemag Sefarvaim? Bende ne gireso Samaria e lweta? 20Kuom nyiseche duto magpinjego, ere moro mosereso pinye e lweta, ma dimi upar ni Ruoth Nyasayenyalo reso Jerusalem e lweta?’ "21To ji noling’ thi, ma onge ng’at modwoke wach kata achiel, nikechruoth Hezekia nosegolo chik ni kik dwoke.  22Eliakim wuod Hilkia majaduong’ od ruoth, gi Shebna jagoro kod Joa wuod Asaf ma jachan wechemag piny ne jobiro ir Hezekia, ka joyiecho lepgi, mi ginyise gima neRabshake owacho. Isaya 37Nyasaye oreso piny Juda e lwet Senakerib(
Ruodhi
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)1Kane ruoth Hezekia owinjo wechego, noyiecho lepe, mi orwako pien gugru,kendo odhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye.  2Nooro Eliakim ma jaduong’ ode, gi Shebnama jagoro kod jodolo madongo ir janabi Isaya wuod Amoz ka jorwako piendegugru, 3mondo odhi owachne niya, "Hezekia owacho ni kawuono en chieng’dhier gi kum kod wichkuot.  Wachalo gi dhako ma muoch kayo, to onge muyamocholgo nyathi.  4Nyalo bet ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachi osewinjo wecheRabshake, ma ruodh Asuria oseoro, mondo oyany Nyasaye Mangima.  Omiyokoro obiro kumo Rabshake nikech weche ma osewinjo ka Rabshake wachogo. Kuom mano, in Isaya, lem ni jowa mapod odong’. "5Kamano, kane jodong ruoth Hezekia ochopo ir Isaya, mowachone wechego,6ne odwokogi niya, "Dhiuru uwach ni ruodhu ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama:‘Kik iluor weche ma isewinjo ka ruodh Asuria yanyago 7nikech abiro miyechuny man gi kibaji, ma kowinjo wach moro marach, to noring odog epinye, kuma nami onegee. ’ "8Rabshake nodok, moyudo ni ruodh Asuria osea Lakish, odhi monjo Libna. Omiyoo nodhi ire kuno.  9To kane ruodh Asuria owinjo ni Tirhaka ruodhEthiopia obiro monje, nochako oro joote ir Hezekia ruodh Juda kowachoniya,
"Kik iyie Nyasachi migeno kuomeno wuondi ni ruodh Asuria oknokaw Jerusalem.  11Chutho, isewinjo kaka ruodhi mag Asuria osekethopinje mane gikedogo chuth.  To koro iparo ni in ema dikwo? 12Kwerenanonego jo-Gozan gi jo-Haran gi jo-Rezef kod jo-Eden ma nodak Telasar. Koro dak ne nyisechegi okonyogi? 13Koso ere ruodhi mag Hamath gi Arpadgi Sefarvaim gi Hena kod Iva?"14Hezekia nokawo barua mane joote okelone, mi osomo.  Bang’e ne odhi eHekalu, mi oyaro baruano e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, 15kokwaye niya,
"ARuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ma Nyasach Israel, mobet ewi kerubikaka ruoth bet e komduong’ne, in kendi e Nyasach ogendini duto mae piny,kendo in ema nichueyo polo gi piny.  17A Ruoth Nyasaye, chik iti mondoiwinji, kendo iyaw wang’i mondo inen.  Winj weche ma Senakerib yanyigo,in Nyasaye Mangima! 18A Ruoth Nyasaye, en adier ni ruodhi mag Asuriaoseketho pinje duto, 19mi gibolo nyisechegi e mach, kendo gisekethogichuth, nimar ne ok gin nyiseche kata matin, to mana tich dhano molos giyath kata gi kidi.  20To koro Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, reswa e lwetSenakerib, mondo ogendini duto mae piny ong’e ni in kendi e Nyasaye. "21Eka Isaya wuod Amoz nooro ni Hezekia wach niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Israel owacho ni osewinjo lemo mikwayego nikech wach maSenakerib ruodh Asuria osesiemigo, 22omiyo osewuoyo kuom Senakerib kama:In Senakerib, dala Sayun ochayi kendo jari!Ee, dala Sayun twenyoni ume!23To koro in, en ng’ano ma isejaro kendo iyanyo?Koso en ng’a ma isekokne ka ijowo wang’i?Nyaka ing’e ni en Ng’ama Ler mar Israel!24Isejaro Ruoth Nyasaye gi dho jooteni, kiwacho niya,‘Aseidho gode maboyo mag Lebanon, mi achopo midimidi,ka an gi gechena mag lweny mang’eny mokadho akwana. Bende asetong’o yiend sida madongo,kod yiend saipras mabeyo man kuno. Asechopo nyaka e chuny bungu, kama ni iye mogik,kendo ma yien odichie. 25Asekunyo sokni, mi amodho pi pinje mamoko. Bende aore mag Misri noduono, ka anyonogi gi tienda!’26To in Senakerib, kata obedo ni iwacho kamano,donge ing’eyo ni an Ruoth Nyasaye ema ne achano chon mondo gigo otimre?. Adier, ne achanogi chon, to koro amiyo gitimore. An ema ne achano mondo imuk mier mochiel motegno, olokre gundni,27ma joma odakie chalo gi lum ma e pap, maonge gi teko,kata ka lum matwi e tat ot, to ner kapok odongo,nimar ne gionge gi teko,kendo ne ging’eng’ ka luoro omakogi. 28To ang’eyo timbeni duto:ang’eyo kata ka ichung’, kata ka ibet piny,kata kiwuok, kata kiduogo dala. 29Asewinjo kaka iyanya malich, kendo kaka isungori,omiyo abiro keto mbedo e umi, kod rajaki e dhogi,mondo awichi idog thuru gi yo mane ibirogo. 30To winji, in Hezekia, ranyisi ma amiyi ema:E higa mokwongoni, unucham gik matwi kendgi,kendo e higa mar ariyo unucham orowe moloth e higa mokwongono,to e higa mar adek unuket kodhi, kendo unuka cham. Bende unupidh mzabibu, bende unucham olembgi. 31Jo-Juda modong’ nochal gi yathma tero tiendene piny, kendo nyago olemo e bedene,32nimar joma nok modong’ nowuog Jerusalem. Adier, oganda mar joma otony noa e got Sayun. Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutooseketo chunye mondo otim kamano. 33Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye owuoyo kuom ruodh Asuria kama:"Ok nodonj e dala Jerusalem,kendo ok nobaye gi asere,kata monjogo koting’o kuot ok nomonje. Bende ok nong’ing pith mondo oidhgo ohingane. 34Enodog gi yo ma nobirogo, to ok nodonj Jerusalem,35nimar anaked ni dalani mondo aresi,nikech nyinga, kendo nikech Daudi jatichna. "36Malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nodhi monego jo-Asuria alufu mia achiel gipiero aboro gabich (
,
) e kambigi, kendo kane ji ochiew gokinyi, toringre joma otho ema ne ginwang’o kopie piny.  37Mano omiyo Senakeribruodh Asuria noa kuno, mi odok Nineve, odakie.  38To chieng’ moro, kaneoyudo olemo e od Nisrok nyasache, yawuote ma Adramelek gi Sharezernobiro monege.  Bang’e ne giringo, mi gidhi e piny Ararat, to Esarhadonnodoko ruoth kar Senakerib wuon mare. Isaya 38Tuo omako Hezekia(
Ruodhi
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)1E ndalogo, Hezekia ne tuo, kendo ohewore.  Janabi Isaya wuod Amoz nobiroire, mowachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni mondo ilam mwanduni niyawuoti, nimar ibiro tho, ok nikwo. " 2Kane Hezekia owinjo kamano,nolokore mong’iyo kor ot, kokwayo Ruoth Nyasaye niya,
"A Ruoth Nyasayeasayi; parie kaka asewuotho e nyimi gi adiera kod chuny mobidhore, kaatimo gik malong’oni. " Eka ne oywak malit! 4Bang’e wach Ruoth Nyasayenobiro ni Isaya niya,
"Dhiyo iwach ni Hezekia ni Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasach Daudi kwaru owacho kama: ‘Asewinjo kwayoni, kendo aseneno piwang’i.  6Omiyo abiro medi ndalo moromo higni apar gabich, bende abiroresi kaachiel gi dala Jerusalem e lwet ruodh Asuria, kendo abiro ritodalani. ’ " Eka Isaya ne owacho ni jood Hezekia ni mondo okel ng’owomoswagi, omwon e bur mokuodo Hezekia.  Ne gitimo kamano, mi bur nochango. Bang’ mano, Hezekia nopenjo niya: Ere gima biro bedona ranyisi ni abirodhi e Od Ruoth Nyasaye? 7To Isaya nodwoke ni, "Ranyisi ma Ruoth Nyasayeonyisigo ni obiro timo gima osewacho e ma: 8Rang ane tipo mar wang’chieng’ manie raidhi mar dhood Ahaz.  Abiro dwoko tipono chien ondamoapar. " Kamano wang’chieng’ nodok chien ondamo apar e raidhi mane oyudooselorie. 9Koro weche mag Hezekia ruodh Juda mane ondiki ka osechango e magi:
"Ne aparo ni abiro tho kapod atin,kendo ni abiro tieko ndalona duto e piny joma otho. 11Ne awacho niya:Ok anachak aneni A Ruoth Nyasaye, e piny joma ngima,bende ok nachak ane dhano gi wang’a kaka joma ngima neno. 12Osepudh oda, mi owit kucha,mana kaka ipudho kiru mar jakwath. A Ruoth Nyasaye, iseng’ado ngimana machiekmana kaka jatueng’o dolo usi, kendo ng’ado. Isanda, chakre okinyi nyaka odhiambo,13kendo aywak ka an gi rem malit nyaka piny ru. Chokena duto otur, mana ka gima sibuor ema oturo. Adier, isanda, chakre okinyi nyaka odhiambo,14omiyo aywak mana ka opija kata akuru,kendo wengena otho bo kuom rango malo. A Ruoth Nyasaye, winj ywakna mondo ibed jawarna. 15Ere kaka dater ywakna ni Ruoth Nyasaye?Koso en ang’o ma dawachne,ka en owuon ema osetimona gigi duto,nikech chandruok ma chunya nigo. 16To pod chunya nobed mana kodi, A Ruoth Nyasaye. In ema imiyo chunya yueyo. Duoga iri mondo abed mangima. 17Chutho, koro aseneno ni chandruok duto mane aseyudo konya,nimar iseresa e tho nikech herani. Bende isewito richona duto ka dieng’eyi. 18Piny joma otho ok nyal goyoni erokamano!Adier, joma otho ok nyal paki. Chutho, joma osedhi e bur ok nyal geno adiera mari. 19To joma ngima kende ema nyalo goyoni erokamanokaka agoyoni kawuononi. Wuone bende nyiso yawuotgi adiera mari, A Nyasaye. 20Ruoth Nyasaye oikore mondo oresa!Kuom mano, waweruru wende pak,ka wagoyo thumbe e Od Ruoth Nyasayee ndalo duto mag ngimawa. "Isaya 39Hezekia oyudo joote moa Babulon(
Ruodhi
.
-
;
Weche mag Ndalo
.
-
)1E ndalo Merodak-baladan wuod Baladan, ma ruodh Babulon, nooro joote irHezekia gi barupe kod mich, nikech ne owinjo ni yande otuo, to koroosedoko mangima.  2Hezekia norwako jootego, monyisogi mwandune duto maneni e ode mar keno, kaka fedha gi dhahabu gi gik mang’ue ng’ar, gi mo manengone tek kod gilweny, kaachiel gi gik moko duto mane ni kuondekanone.  Onge gimoro amora e ode kata e pinye mane ok onyisogi. 3To bang’e janabi Isaya nobiro ir ruoth Hezekia, mopenjee niya, "Jogi oakanye? To wach ang’o mokelogi?" Hezekia nodwoke ni, "Gia e piny Babulon,kuma bor. " 4Janabi Isaya nomedo penje niya, "To ang’o ma gineno e odi?"Hezekia nodwoke ni, "Giseneno gik moko duto manie oda.  Onge gimoro amoramodong’ mak anyisogi e kuonde kenona. " 5Bang’ mano Isaya nowacho niHezekia niya, "Winj wach Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto.  6Ndalobiro ma gik moko duto manie odi, ma kwereni osekano nyaka chil kawuono,noter Babulon.  Bende Ruoth Nyasaye omedo wacho ni onge gima nodong’ kataachiel mak oter.  7Yawuoti moko nolok wasumbini.  Adier moko kuom yawuotihie nolok wasumbni mabuoch e od ruodh Babulon. " 8Hezekia ne odwoke niya,"Wach Ruoth Nyasaye ma isenyisa ber. " To ne odwoke kamano, koparo ni ento kue biro siko e ndalone duto. Isaya 40Weche mane Ruoth Nyasaye ohoyogo chuny jo-Jerusalem1Nyasachu wacho kama:"Houru chuny joga! Hogiuru!2Wuouru gi jo-Jerusalem gi muolo,kuwachonigi ni gisetieko ndalogi mag tuech,kendo ni osekumgi moromo. Ruoth Nyasaye osekumogi nyadiriyo kuom richogi duto. "
Dwol moro kok niya,"Losuru ni Ruoth Nyasaye yo e thim. Losuru ni Nyasachwa ndara mopie e piny motwo. 4Hohni duto nobugikendo gode duto nopie. Yore motimo gogni bende nobed maler,kendo kuonde motimo gode nobed pewe. 5Eka duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nofwenyre,mi ji duto nonene kaachiel,nimar Ruoth Nyasaye owuon ema owacho kamano. "
Dwol moro wacho niya, "Ting’ dwondi iwuo. "To moro dwoko ni, "Ere gima dawachi?""Wach niya, ‘Dhano ka dhano chalo gi lum,kendo berne duto chalo gi maua manie pap. 7Lum ner, kendo maua two,ka much Ruoth Nyasaye okudhogi. Chutho, dhano chalo gi lum. 8Adier, lum two, maua bende ner,to wach Nyasachwa to osiko nyaka chieng’. ’ "9In mikelo ni Sayun wach maber,idh wi got mabor, kendo ikogi matek. Ee, in mikelo ni Jerusalem wach maber,ting’ dwondi, ikogi matek ka ok iluor,kiwacho ni miech Juda niya, "Eri, Nyasachu ni ka. "
Ng’euru ni Ruoth Nyasaye biro gi teko. Obiro loyo piny gi tekone maduong’neuru, obiro gi joge mogonyo e lweny ka wuotho e nyime,ka gik moyako.
Ochalo jakwath ma sembo jambe,koting’o nyirombe e bade, kendo oriwogi e kore,kotelo ni mago man gi nyithindo, kotero modho. Nyasach Israel ok pim gi nyasaye moro12En ng’a mane opimo pi nembe e chuny lwete,kata mane opimo duong’ mar polo gi lith lwete?En ng’a mane opimo lowo duto manie piny,kata mane opimo gode madongo gi matindo e ratilmak mana Ruoth Nyasaye?
Ere ng’at ma oseng’ado ni Ruoth Nyasaye rieko,kata mosechung’ e dire ka puonje?14Bende Ruoth Nyasaye osedwaroe rieko moro kuom ng’ato,kata dwaro ni mondo ng’ato opuonje adiera kod yore mabeyo?Ooyo, ok osetimo kamano,15nikech ogendini duto mag piny ok gimoro kipimo kode. Giromre mana gi pi maton kaa e dapi,kata ka buru momoko e ratil. Adier, chulni gi dhonembe duto yotne mana ka muya!16Yien duto manie piny Lebanon,kaachiel gi le duto man kuno,ok nyal romo timonego misango miwang’o pep. 17Ogendini duto ok gimoro e nyime. Okwanogi ka gik manono ma onge tich.
En ng’a ma dipim gi Nyasaye?Koso ang’o ma diwachi ni chal kode?19Dochal gi kido ma ng’ato ochueyo,kendo ma jatheth dhahabu obawo gi dhahabu,mi othedhone thiwni mag fedha koso?20Koso dochal gi yien maber ma ok tow ma ng’ato oyiero,mi oluongo japecho molonymondo olosnego kido mopa ma ok nyal podho?21Donge ung’eyo, koso pok uwinjo,22ni Nyasaye obet e polo malo,kendo ni joma odak e piny chalone mana dede. Ok osewachnu kamano chakre chon?Koso pok uparo nyaka ne chue pinyni en ema ne oyaro polo mana ka pasia,kendo ogure mana ka hema midakie?23Odwoko ruodhi gi jotelo duto piny, mi lokre gima nono. 24Ka okudho muya kuomgi, to giner,mi kalausi dhi kodgi mana ka mihudhi,nimar gichalo gi kodhi mokom machiegni,ma tiendegi pok ochwowo lowo. 25Ng’ama Ler penjo niya,"To koro en ng’a ma duporago?Koso ere ng’ama dirom koda?26Ting’uru wengeu malo e polo,mondo upar ane ng’ama ne ochueyo gigo duto. Donge en mana Jal mane otelo ni oganda mar sulue,ka oluongo moro ka moro gi nyinge,mana ka gima en jaduong’ lweny motelo ni jolwenje?Tekone maduong’ malich omiyo onge kata mana sulue achielma ok ochung’ kare. 27Un jo-Israel ma nyikwa Jakobo, ere gima omiyo ung’ur,kuwacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye ok ne yorewa,kendo ok ong’adnwa bura maber"?28Donge ung’eyo, koso pok uwinjo,ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasaye mochwere,kendo ma Jachuech piny malichni duto,ok ol, kendo ok nyosre?Parone tut, ma odhiero dhano ng’eyo. 29En ema omiyo joma ool teko. Adier, omedo muya ni joma tekogi orumo. 30Joma tindo nyalo ol, mi nyosre,kata mana yawuowi mopong’ bendenyalo chwanyore, mi podhi. 31To joma ogeno kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, tekogi noduogi. Ginihu ka ongo, mana ka gima gin gi buombegi,kendo giniringi, to ok giniol,bende giniwuothi, to tekregi ok norum. Isaya 41Nyasaye osingore ni obiro guedho jo-Israel1Un pinje mae dhonembe, kod chulni chikuru itu,ka uling’ thi e nyima. Ogendini mondo obi abia!Gibi abia machiegni mondo giwuo ane. Waduto wanadonj kaachiel kama ing’adoe bura. 2Ng’at moa yo wuok chieng’,ma locho kamoro amora modhiye cha, ere ng’ama okele?Koso en ng’a moketo ogendini e lwete,kendo miyo oloyo ruodhi mi onyon piny?Okeyogi gi liganglane mana ka buru,kendo oriembogi gi asere, mana ka mihudhi ma yamo tero. 3Olawogi koriembogi matek mana ka gima ohuyo,to en okadho maber mak ohinyore. 4To koro apenjo ni, mano en tij ng’a?Koso en ng’a mamiyo mago duto timore?En ng’a mamiyo tienge luwore nyaka ne piny chakre?En mana an, Ruoth Nyasaye. An ema akwongo, kendo anie nyamgiko. 5Pinje mae dhonembe kod chulni osewinjo wachno,modoko maluor,kendo ji duto kirni, chakre tung’ piny nyaka tung’ piny. 6Ng’ato ka ng’ato konyo wadgi,kendo jiwe, kawacho ni mondo obed gi chir. 7Kamano japecho jiwo jathedh dhahabu,kaloso nyasaye manono,kendo jal matiyo gi nyundo jiwo jal ma goyo musmalkawacho ni tich riwo nyinyo osetim maber. Eka oguro nyasaye manono gi musmalmondo kik oyiengni.
To un jo-Israel jotichna,aseyierou, mi agolou e giko piny kuonde mane untie. Adier, un nyikwa Jakobo ma aseyiero,kendo ma koth Ibrahim osiepna,9ne aluongou mondo ua kuonde maboyo. Aseluongou ni jotichna,kendo aseyierou ma ok awitou. 10Kik uluor gimoro nikech an kodu. Kik kibaji gou, nimar an e Nyasachu. Amiyou teko, kendo akonyou,bende asirou gi bada ma korachwich ma alochogo. 11Koro neuru! Jogu duto ma mon kodu wigi biro kuot, mi gidhier nono. Adier, jogo duto ma kedo kodu norum mi lal nono. 12Unudwar wasikugo, to ok unuyudgi. Chutho, jogo mane kedo kodu ok nobed gimoro kata matin,13nikech an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu ema amako badu ma korachwich,kendo awachonu niya,"Kik ubed maluor, nimar an ema akonyou. "14In oganda Jakobo, in kudni akuda, to kik ibed maluor. Yaye, in Israel ma onge ndhathe, kik kibaji goyi. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. 15Neuru! Abiro miyo uchalo gi gir diemo ngano manyien ma lekene bitho. Unumuk gode madongo gi matindo, kutoyogi matindotindo, mi gilokremihudhi. 16Unupiedhgi mi yamo notergi mabor, kendo kalausi nokegi. To un to unubed mamor,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ng’ama Ler mar Israel. 17Joma odhier kod joma chandore manyo pi, to ok ginwang’,omiyo dwondgi otwo nikech riyo,to an Ruoth Nyasaye abiro dwoko kwayogi. Adier, an Nyasach Israel ok najwang’gi. 18Abiro miyo aore wuogi kuonde motwo motimo kwoyo, kendo sokni tuchi eholni. Bende abiro miyo yewni bedi e piny motimo ongoro,mi pi bubni e piny motwo. 19Abiro pidho yien mopogore opogore kuonde motwo,20mondo ji duto one kendo ong’e ni,Ruoth Nyasaye, ma Ng’ama Ler mar Israel ema osetimo kamano. Ruoth Nyasaye charo nyiseche manono21Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ruodh joka Jakobo wacho niya,"Biuru, uwach wachu ane. 22Nyisecheu mondo obi onyiswa ane gik matimore. Onego ginyiswa ane tiend gik mane osetimore. 23Nyiswauru ane gik mabiro timore e kinde mabiro,mondo wayie ni kara un nyiseche adier. Timuru ane gimoro, maber kata marach,manyalo miyo wang’eng’ mi wadhier nono. 24To en adier ni ok unyal gimoro,kendo gik mutimo onge tich. Bende ng’ato ang’ata ma kwanou ka nyisechene en raura ka un!"25An to aseluongo ng’ato yo nyandwat ma yo wuok chieng’ mondo obi. En ng’at mabiro lama. Enonyon ruodhi mana ka lowo mimwonogo ot,kendo nonywasgi mana kaka jachuech nywaso lop agulu. 26En ng’a, mane okoro wachno, ni mondo wang’e?Koso en ng’a mane onyisowa chon ni wachno biro timore,mondo wayie ni en adier?. Onge ng’ato mane ohule, kata mane owuoyo kuome. Adier, wecheu ne ok owinji kata matin. 27Ne asenyiso jo-Sayun chon ni, "Ero gibiro,"kendo ne aoro ni Jerusalem jaote materonigi wach maber. 28To kane arango nyisecheu,to ne ok aneno moro manyalo dwoko penjona. 29Neyeuru kaka gin gik manono. Gimoro amora ma gitimo onge tich. Nyisechego in mana yamo makudho!Isaya 42Jatich Ruoth Nyasaye1 Neuru! Ma e jatichna ma atayo. En ng’at ma aseyiero, kendo ma chunya morgo. Aseketo roho mara kuome,omiyo obiro kelo adiera ni ogendini. 2Ok nokogi, kata nduru ok nogo,dwonde bende ok nowinji e yore. 3Kata mana odundu motore ok notur mi owiti ka gima nono,bende ok nosim kata mana taya maliel marachrach,to enong’ad bura mana gi adiera. 4Ok nochwanyre kata chunye ok nonyosreto enokel adiera e piny,kendo pinje manie dhonembe rito mondo chikne obi.
Ruoth Nyasaye mane ochueyo polo mi oyaro,kendo ochueyo piny gi gik mangima duto mantie,mi ochiwo muya ni joma odakie kod gik moko duto mangima,wacho kama:
"An Ruoth Nyasaye, aseluongini mondo itim gima kelo resruok. Asemako lweti mondo ariti,kendo anami ibed ng’at ma kelo singruok e kinda gi ji,7mondo iyaw wenge muofnikendo igol joma otue e mudho kuma gidakie. 8An e Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo mano e nyinga. Ok ayie mondo duong’ ma imiya omi nyasaye moro machielo,bende ok ayie mondo pak mipakago opakgo gik ma opa. 9Neuru kaka gik mane akoro osetimore. To koro anyisou gik manyien ma biro timore.  Adier, ahulonugi kapokgitimore. "Pak mipakogo Ruoth Nyasaye kuom reso ji10Weruru ni Ruoth Nyasaye wer manyien,kupako nyinge e piny duto. Un mukwang’ e nam, pakeuru kaachiel gi gik manie nam. 11Thim, kod mier man kuno, mondo obed mamor,kaachiel gi kuonde dak mag jo-Arabu ma Kedar. Un joma odak Sela, koguru gi mor ewi gode. 12Un duto mudak e dhonembe gi chulni, pakeuru. Kamano ji duto mondo omi Ruoth Nyasaye duong’. 13Ruoth Nyasaye biro wuok oko ka thwon maratego.
