.
;
W. Nda
.
—
.
. E ndalo loch ruoth Josia, RuothNyasaye nopenja niya, "Iseneno gima jo-Israel otimo ka giweya? Giseidhogode duto, kendo gisedhi e tiend yien duto motimo otiep, mi gilamoenyiseche manono mana kaka dhako ma jachode ringo koni gi koni kadwarochwo.  7An Ruoth Nyasaye ne aparo ni gibiro duogo ira bang’ timo magoduto, to ne ok giduogo, kendo owetegi ma jo-Juda noneno timbegigo.  8Negineno bende kaka ne ariembo jo-Israel nikech ne giweya ka dhako moweyochwore, to dwanyore gi chwo mamoko.  To jo-Juda ma owetegigo ma bendejoma andhoke ne ok odewo, mi gin bende ne giweya, kendo ne gidhigidwanyore ka dhako moweyo chwore to dwanyore gi chwo mamoko.  9Negidwanyo adwanya piny gi timbegi mag lamo kite kod yien.  10To kata bang’mago duto jo-Juda ma andhoke ma owete jo-Israel nowuondore ni duogo ira,to ok ne gidwogo gi chunygi duto. "11Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Kata obedo ni jo-Israel ne oweya, togisenyiso ni gibeyo moloyo jowetegi ma andhoke ma jo-Juda.  12Omiyo dhiyoe piny man yo nyandwat mondo iwach ni jo-Israel kama: ‘Duoguru ira unjo-Israel ma andhokegi.  Aherou gi hera mosiko, omiyo ok nasik ka akechokodu nyaka chieng’.  13Mak mana ni nyaka uyie ni useketho, kendo nyakauyie ni usepiem gi Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu.  Bende yieuru niusedwanyoru gi nyiseche mamoko e tiend yien duto motimo otiep, kendo neok uwinjo wachna. ’ An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Duoguru ira un nyithinda moseweya, nimar an ruodhu.  Abiro golo jomanok kuomu e miechu kendo e dhoutu, mi adwoku e got Sayun.  15Abiroketonu jotelo moluora, kendo gibiro ritou gi rieko kod winjruokmaber.  16Bang’e kusemedoru kendo unya, to ji ok nochak owuo kuom SandugMuma mar Ruoth Nyasaye kendo.  Ok unupare, kendo ok unudware, bende okunulos moro machal kode.  17E ndalogo noluong Jerusalem ni komduong’ marRuoth Nyasaye, kendo ogendini duto nochokre kuno mondo omi nyingaduong’.  Ok ginichak gitim tim wich teko, bende ok ginibed gi chuny martimo richo.  18Jo-Israel biro riwore gi jo-Juda, kendo gibiro wuothokanyakla, ka gia yo nyandwat, ka giduogo e piny mane amiyo kwereu mondoobed mwandugi nyaka chieng’.
"Un jo-Israel aseyie kawou ka yawuota, mondo amiu piny maberie moloyopinje mamoko duto.  Ne aparo ni ubiro luonga ni wuonu, kendo ok nuchakuweya.  20To un jo-Israel useweya mana ka dhako moweyo chwore.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Koko gore ewi gode! Gin jo-Israel ma ywak ka kwayo ng’wono, nimargisebedo ka giluwo yore maricho, ka ok gidew Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachgi.  22Duoguru un nyithinda moseweya, mondo aloku joma kare. Udwoka niya, ‘Ee, waduogo iri, nimar in e Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachwa.  23Onge resruok ma wanyalo yudo kuom lemo ewi gode, kata kuomjoma goyo koko kuonde moting’ore.  Konyruok ma wayudo wan jo-Israel, wuokmana kuom Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa.
" ‘Chakre tindowa, gik moko duto ma wuonewa osetiyo moyudo, kaka jamnikod yawuowi gi nyiri, oselalnwa kuom lamo Baal, nyasachwichkuot.  25Onego wanind piny ka wiwa okuot, kendo ka timbewa marichooumowa.  Wan kaachiel gi kwerewa waseketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachwa, chakre tindowa, kendo ok wasewinjo wachne. ’ "JEREMIA 41Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Un jo-Israel, ka uyie lokoru, to duoguruira.  Wituru nyisecheu manono ma Amon-go mondo uluw mana an.  2Kaukuong’oru gi nying Ruoth Nyasaye gi adiera gi bura makare kendo gi timmalong’o, to ogendini biro kwaya mondo gin bende aguedhgi kakaaseguedhou, kendo gibiro miya duong’.  3Hos
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye wacho nijo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem niya, ‘Paruru puotheu ma mbora, mondo kik uketkodhi e kind kudho.  4Un jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem, rituru singruokna,kendo timuru gik madwaro, nono to gik maricho musetimo biro miyo mirimbaliel ka mach ma onge ng’ama nyalo nego. ’Onyis jo-Juda ni wasigu biro monjogi5"Gouru tung’, e piny duto, kendo koguru matek, kunyiso jo-Juda gijo-Jerusalem mondo oring odhi e mier mochiel motegno.  6Nyisuru ji yomadhi Sayun.  Ringuru mondo utony, kik udeki, nikech Ruoth Nyasaye kelomasira kaa nyandwat mabiro ketho piny malich.  7Jaketh ogendini osewuokoko ka sibuor mowuok e gonde.  Osewuok kama odakie mondo obi oketh pinyu. Miech Juda nodong’ gundni ma onge ng’ama odakie.  8Kuom mano, rwakreurugi piende gugru, kendo uywagi ka ugoyo nduru, nikech mirima mager maRuoth Nyasaye nigo gi jo-Juda pok orumo. "9Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Chieng’no chuny ruodhi gi chuny jodongononyosre, kata jodolo bende nobuogi kendo jonabi nong’eng’. " 10Kaneawinjo kamano, nawacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, isewuondo jo-Jerusalemchuth! Niwacho ni kue biro betie, to koro ligangla ema nie ng’utwa!"11Ndalo biro, mibiro nyisie jo-Jerusalem ni yamo maliet moa e thim kudhokoni, kochomo jo-Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ok nokudh mos maber minyalo piedhgocham, 12to nobed kalausi ma Ruoth Nyasaye okelo.  Ruoth Nyasaye owuon emakoro kumo joge. 13Neuru, wasigu biro mogingore ka boche polo.  Gechegi mag lweny chalo gikalausi, kendo faresegi ringo matek moloyo ongo.  Yaye! Warumo! 14Unjo-Jerusalem, lwokuru richo manie chunyu mondo oresu.  Ubiro siko kuparoweche maricho nyaka karang’o? 15Winjuru! Jaote moa Dan ema hulo nimasira biro, kendo jago milome moa e gode mag Efraim bende wachokamano.  16Nyisuru ogendini kendo landuru wach ni, Jerusalem ibiro kethi. Wasigu biro moa e piny mabor, kendo gibiro goyo koko ni joma odak emiech Juda.  17Gibiro timo ageng’a ni piny Juda mana ka joma olworopuodho, nikech oganda jo-Juda oseweya.  Ruoth Nyasaye ema owacho kamano.
"Un jo-Juda, un ema usekelo masira kuomu uwegi, nikech yoreu gi timbeumaricho.  Ee, richou ema okelonu masira kum malitni. "19Iya nyawni! Awinjo rem malit! Yaye chunya! Chunya diko malit! Ok anyalling’ nikech awinjo tung’ gi mahu mag lweny.  20Masira achiel luwomachielo, kendo piny duto okethi, piyopiyo nono hembena omuki, kendorageng’ni maggi oyiech matindo tindo.  21Nyaka karang’o ma ananeyebandeche mag lweny ka kwadhore, kendo nawinjie tung’ lweny ka ywak. 22Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Joga ofuwo, kendo ok ging’eya.  Gichalo ginyithindo momemore, kendo maonge rieko.  Richo ema ging’eyo timo, to timogima ber otamogi. "23Bang’e narango piny, maneno ni onge gi kido.  Polo bende ne onge gimarienyie.  24Ne arango gode madongo, maneno ka giyiengni; kuondemoting’ore bende ne rundore koni gi koni.  25Naneno ka ji onge kuno,kendo winy duto noseringo.  26Piny momew noselokore thim, kendo mier mankuno noselokore gundni, nikech mirima mager mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  27RuothNyasaye osewacho ni piny ngima biro dong’ nono, to ok nokethechuth.  28Ji duto modak e piny noywagi, kendo polo nolokre mudho.  RuothNyasaye osewacho, kendo ok nolok parone! Oseparo mogik, kendo ok nodogchien.  29Ka ji winjo ni joidh farese gi jo asere biro, to ng’ato kang’ato noringi.  Jomoko noring odhi e bunge, to moko noidh lwendni, mipond kuno.  Mier duto nodong’ nono, ma onge ng’ama odakie.  30Unjo-Jerusalem, urumo! Ere gimomiyo urwakoru gi lewni mabeyo, koso eregima omiyo urwako stadi kendo uwiro wengeu? Ubisoru maber kayiem nono,to chodeu oseweyou, kendo koro dwaro negou.  31Ne awinjo ywak ka mardhako ma muoch kayo.  Ee, mana kaka mar dhako ma hango nywol.  Kara ne enmana dwond Jerusalem, ma gamo yueyo, kendo orieyo bade kawacho niya,"Arumo! Chunya dwaro a, nikech jonek lwora mondo onega. "JEREMIA 5Richo mag jo-Jerusalem kod mag jo-Juda1Un jo-Jerusalem, wuothuru e yore mag dalau kendo e chirniu, mondo uneane ka nitie kata ng’at achiel makare mohero adiera.  Kuyudo, to RuothNyasaye nowe ni jodalano richogi.  2Kata ka ukuong’oru gi nying RuothNyasaye, to ukuong’oru mana gi miriambo.  3Donge adiera ema Ruoth Nyasayedwaro? Ne agoyou piny, to ne ok udewo.  Ne osandou malit, to ne utamoruwinjo puonjne.  Wiu tek ka lwanda, kendo udagi duogo ire, 4Bang’e nowachoniya, "Chutho jogi gin joma ofuwo maonge rieko.  Ok ging’eyo yor RuothNyasaye kod gima Nyasachgi dwaro.  5Omiyo koro abiro dhi ir jotelo mondolosgo, nimar nyaka bed ni gin ema ging’eyo yor Ruoth Nyasaye, kod gimaNyasachgi dwaro. " To kara gin bende gisedagi loch mar Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo gitamore rito chikne.  6Mano emomiyo sibuor moa e bungu bironegogi.  Ee, ondiek moa e thim biro kidhogi, kendo kwach nowuoth emiechgi.  Ng’ato ang’ata mowuok oko nokiddh matindo tindo.  Magi dutonotimre nikech richogi thoth, kendo nikech giseweyo Nyasaye nyading’eny. 7Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Ere gima dimi awe ni joga richogi?Yawuotgi oseweya, mokuong’ore gi nying nyiseche manono.  Ne amiyo jogagik moko duto mane gidwaro, to pod ne giterore atera ka giketho sechegigi mon ma jochode.  8Ng’ato ka ng’ato oowore kuom gombo chi wadgi, manaka faras moyieng’ ma gombo ohewo.  9Donge onego akumgi kuom gik makamago? Donge onego achul kuor ni oganda ma kama?.  10Abiro chiko wasikgimondo ochadh yiend mzabibu maggi, to ok ginikethgi chuth nimar abironyisogi mondo gilwer mana bedegi oko nikech ok gin maga.  11Jo-Israel gijo-Juda oseweya adier.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "12Jo-Ruoth Nyasaye osekwede, ka giwacho niya, "Ok obi timo gimoro.  Ongemasira moro, kaka lweny kata kech, ma nobi kuomwa. " 13Giwacho bende nijonabi nobed ka yamo ma kudho, maonge gi wach moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye. 14An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto abiro nyisi, in Jeremia, gimabiro timore ni jogi nikech gik ma gisewachogo.  Abiro loko wechena mawuoke dhogi obed mach, to jogi abiro loko yien mondo mach owang’gi pep.  15Unjo-Israel, akelo oganda moro, maa e piny mabor mondo obi omonju.  Enoganda machon kendo maratego ma ok uwinj dhogi, kata mana weche magiwacho bende ok ung’eyo.  16Jogi ma jo asere nego ji mathoth, kendogiduto gin jolweny marateke.  17Gibiro tieko chambu kaachiel gi chiembupep, kendo gibiro tieko yawuotu gi nyiu.  Gibiro tieko jambu kod olembeumag mzabibu gi ng’opeu.  Giniketh miechu mochiel motegno, mugeno kuomgi. 18To kata e ndalogo, an Ruoth Nyasaye awacho ni ok natieku chuth.  19Tokupenja gimomiyo natimonu gigo duto, to anadwoku niya, ‘Kaka nene uweya,mutiyo ni nyiseche mag pinje mamoko e pinyu uwegi, e kaka unuti nijopinje mamoko e piny ma ok maru!’20In Jeremia, nyis joka Jakobo gi jo-Juda niya, 21Isa
.
,
; Ezek12.
; Mar
.
. "Winjuru un joma ofuwo, man gi wenge, to ok nen, bendeman gi it, to ok nyal winjo.  22Ayub
.
-
. An Ruoth Nyasaye apenjokama: Ere gimomiyo ok unyal luora? Koso ang’o momiyo ok unyal kirni enyima? Nene aketo kuoyo manie dhonam mondo ogeng’ nam, kendo obed tong’mosiko ma pi ok nyal kadho.  Apaka mag nam nyalo gingore, kendo wuomatek, to ok nyal kadho, kata mwomo.  23To un wiu tek, kendo uhero piem. Usepiem koda adier, muweya! 24Ne ok uwacho e chunyu niya, ‘Ber waluorRuoth Nyasachwa, ma miyowa kodh chwiri gi kodh opon e kinde mowinjore,kendo ma miyowa kinde mwakeyoe higa ka higa. ’ 25To timbeu marichooseketho gigo, kendo richou osemono gik mabeyo ma kamago bironu.  26Jogamoko gin joma richo.  Gichalo jodwar ma chiko obadho mondo omakgo winy,to ji ema gimako.  27Gipong’o utegi gi gik mokwal, mana kaka jachik winy. Mano emomiyo gin gi teko kendo gimew, 28bende emomiyo gichwe kendodendgi leny.  Timbegi maricho ng’eny mokadho akwana.  Ok gikony nyithikiye mondo oyud bura makare, bende ok ging’ad bura makare ni jomaodhier.  29Donge abiro kumogi kuom mago duto? Ee, abiro chulo kuor niogandani.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano!"30Gima lich ma buogo ji osetimore e pinyni.  31Jonabi koro weche magmiriambo, jodolo bende chwakogi, to kendo mano e gima joga ohero! Togibiro timo ang’o, chieng’ ma gigo orumo?JEREMIA 6Masira ma nomak Jerusalem gi Juda1Un jo-Benjamin, ringuru mondo utony! Ringuru ua Jerusalem! Gouru tung’e Tekoa, kendo mokuru mach ewi Beth-hakerem mondo onyis ji ni lwenybiro, nimar chandruok kod masira madwong’ chiegni biro koa nyandwat.  2Unjo-Sayun uchalo gi lek maber mar jamni, 3to ruodhi biro buoro kanyo gijogi mag lweny, mana kaka jokwath dibi gi rombgi mondo okwa.  Gibiro gurohembegi ka gilworou, kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato nokaw gima odwaro.  4Giniwachniya, "Waikreuru mondo wamonj Jerusalem! Ikreuru! Wabiro monjogigodiechieng’ tir. " To eka ginilok parogi ka giwacho niya, "Ooyo, sa korong’eny, piny dwaro yuso, kendo tipo lor.  5To ikreuru, nimar wabiromonjogi kawuono gotieno, mi wamuk ut Jerusalem mabeyo kendo madongo. "6Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto osegolo chik niya, "Tong’uru yien,kendo uging lowo pidhe pidhe e tiend ohinga, mondo umonj Jerusalem. "Osewacho bende niya, "Abiro kumo dalani nikech bura makare onge kanyochuth.  7Kaka pi soko bubni pile, e kaka richo Jerusalem bende osiko kabubni.  Dalano opong’ gi lweny kod masiche, kendo tuoche gi adhonde emaaneno kanyo.  8Puonjreuru kuom mano, un jo-Jerusalem, nono to aweyou, mialoko dalau thim, ma onge ng’ama dakie. "9Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nowachona niya, "Duog iresjo-Israel modong’ ka ng’ama dok e puoth mzabibu mondo opon olemomodong’. " 10Ne adwoke niya, "Ere ng’ama diwinja, ka awuoyo kodgi, kataka akwerogi kamano? Gisedino itgi, omiyo ok ginyal winjo.  Gisetamorewinjo wachni, kendo gitugo mana gi gima iwacho.  11Kuom mano, RuothNyasaye, mirimbi opong’a, kendo koro ohewa. "Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia nira, "Ol mirimba kata mana kuomnyithindo matugo e yore, kendo kuom yawuowi mochokore kanyakla.  Mon gichwo ibiro kawo koda ka joma oti mojwajni.  12Utegi gi puothegi kodmondgi bende nomi jomoko nono, nimar abiro kumo jopinyni.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Ji duto madongo gi matindo temo yudo pesa e yore mag miganga, katamana jonabi gi jodolo bende migengni.  14Ezek
.
. Gichalo jothiethmathiedho jotuo marachrach, mana ka gima ok gituo, nimar giwacho ni gikmoko beyo, to chutho, gik moko ok beyo.  15Jer
.
-
. Bende uparo niwigi nokuot nikech gik makuero mane gitimogo koso? Ooyo, wigi ne okokuot kataa matin, to bende gionge gi wichkuot! Kuom mano, ginipodhikaka jomoko osepodho, kendo ka akumogi to ginirum.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano. "16Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni joge niya, "Chung’uru e akek yo, mondo urangwang’yore machon, kupenjo kuma yo maber nitie.  Wuothuru e wang’yorno, miunuyud kue. " To gidwoko niya, "Ok wanawuothi e wang’yorno. "17Ruoth Nyasaye noketo jorit mondo ka gigoyo tung’ to ji owinji.  To jinowacho niya, "Ok wanawinji. " 18Omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya,"Winjuru un ogendini mondo ung’e gima biro timore ni joga.  19Un jo-piny,winjuru! Akelo masira kuom jogi mana moromo gi timbegi, nikech gisedagiwechena, kendo ok giserito puonjna.  20Ere tiende kelona ubani moa Sheba,kata gik mang’ue ng’ar moa e pinje maboyo? Ok anayie misengni miwang’opep, kendo ok anabed mamor gi misengni mamoko ma gitimona. "21Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama: "Anami jogi chwanyre, mi podhi. Wuone gi yawuowi biro tho, kaachiel gi osiepegi kod joma odak machiegnikodgi. " 22An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho niya, "Oganda moro biro, moa e pinyman yo nyandwat.  Ee, oganda marang’ongo man kuma bor ikore nilweny.  23Gin gi aserni kod tonge, giger kendo ok gikech ng’ato; tiendfaresegi mor ka apaka mar nam mawuo.  Gikore kedo gi Sayun. " 24To unjo-Jerusalem uwacho niya, "Wasewinjo wachno, mi thudhno omako luetewa. Kibaji goyowa mana ka dhako ma muoch kayo.  25Ok wahedhre wuok oko, katabayo e wang’yore, nikech wasikwa oikore ni lweny kuondego, kendo masicheng’eny koni gi koni. " 26To an Ruoth Nyasaye awachonu niya, "Un joga,rwakreuru gi piende gugru, kendo bukreuru gi buru.  Ywaguru malit kang’ama ywago wuode ma miderma, nimar ng’at ma biro tiekou biro poyou. "
"In Jeremia, aseketi japim joga.  Pimgi, eka mondo ifwenytimbegi.  28Giduto gin joma wigi tek, moseweya.  Gibayo e piny ka gikuodhoji.  Chunygi tek ka mula kendo ka chuma; giduto gin joma okethore.  29Kataobedo ni obuk mach matek, mondo oleny fedha kendo opwodhi, to en manaketho kinde kayiem, nikech ng’iend fedha tamore wuok.  30Emomiyo ibiroluongo joga ni fedha mowe, nikech an Ruoth Nyasaye aseweyogi. "JEREMIA 7Ochik jo-Juda mondo olok timbegi1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia 2mondo odhi ochung’ e dhoranga Hekalumar Ruoth Nyasaye, ogo milome niya, "Winjuru wach Ruoth Nyasaye, unjo-Juda duto madonjo e dhorangani, ka biro lame.  3Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel, owacho ni mondo ulok yoreu gitimbeu maricho, eka owe udak kaeri.  4To un usiko kuwacho niya, ‘MaHekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye! Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye! Hekalu mar RuothNyasaye!’ Wach muwachono, en miriambo, omiyo kik ugen kuome.  5Lokuruyoreu gi timbeu, kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo otim ni wadgi gimakare.  6Weuru sando jopinje mamoko modak kuomu, kata nyithi kiye, katamond liete.  Bende kik uchuer remb joma onge ketho kaeri, kendo kik ulamnyiseche mamoko, nimar mano ditieku chuth.  7Kulokoru kamano to anyaloweyo udag kaeri e piny mane amiyo kwereu chon mondo obed margi nyakachieng’.  8Onge gima uyudo kuom keto chunyu e wach miriambomuwachono.  9Ukwelo, unego ji, uteroru, ukuong’oru gi miriambo, utimolisweche ni Baal, kendo ulamo nyiseche manono ma yande ok ung’eyo.  10Tokusetimo gik ma kamago to eka ubiro e nyima e Hekalu ma nyinga nitieni,kendo uwacho niya, ‘Wasekwo. ’ To uparo ni unyalo kwo adier, ka utimotimbe makuero kamano? 11Math

Kata obedo ni neakawo chandruok, mi aloso kodu, to ne ok udewa, bende kane aluongou, tone ok uyiena.  14Omiyo abiro timo ni Hekalu mara mugeno kuome mana kakanatimo ni Shilo.  Kata mana dalau mane amiyo kwereuni, bende abiro timonekamano.  15Abiro riembou mondo ua e wang’a mana kaka ne ariembo oweteu majo-Efarim duto te. Mirima omako Ruoth Nyasaye gi nyiseche manono16"In Jeremia, kik ulem ni jogi, bende kik ikwaya wach moro nikech gin,kata kik ihomba, nimar ok nawinji! 17Donge ineno gik ma gitimo e miechJuda kendo e yore mag Jerusalem? 18Jer
.

. Nyithindo modo yien, ekawuonegi moko mach, to mon dwalo mogo mondo olosgo kek obed misango ninyasaye ma dhako ma iluongo ni Ruodh Polo.  Bende gitimo ni nyisechemamoko misengni miolo piny, mondo gichwanyago.  19To iparo ni an Ruothnyasaye ema gichwanya? Ooyo, gin ema gichwanyore giwegi, kendo gikelowichkuot kuomgi kendgi.  20Emomiyo an Ruoth Nyasaye, abiro olo mirimbamager ka eri.  Abiro ologi kuom ji kendo kuom jamni, to bende abiro olekuom yien gi cham.  Mirimba biro chalo gi mach mager, ma ng’ato ok nyalnego. "Kum ma jo-Juda noyud kuom wich teko21Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ma Nyasach Israel owacho niya,"Chamuru achama misengni monego wang’ pep, kaachiel gi misengni moyienuchamo.  22Kane agolo kwereu e piny Misri, ne ok awacho gimoro kuommisengni miwang’o pep kod misengni mamoko, kata golo chik kuomgi ne okagolo.  23To ne achikogi matek mondo giluora, eka abed Nyasachgi, kendogibed joga.  Bende nanyisogi ni nyaka gitim gik mane achikogi, eka mondogidhi maber.  24To ne ok gidewa, bende ne ok giwinjo wachna.  Ne gisiko kagitimo timbe mag wichkuot, kendo kar dhi nyime, to ne gidokchien.  25Chakre chieng’ mane kwereu owuokie Misri nyaka chil kawuono,asekawo chandruok, mi aoronigi jotichna ma jonabi.  26To kata kamano neok gidewa, bende ne ok giwinja, to wigi nomedo doko matek moloyo katamana wi kweregi.  27To in Jeremia, kata obedo ni inyisogi weche dutokamano, to ok giniwinj wachni, kendo kata obedo ni iluongogi, to okginiyieni.  28Eka bang’e ininyisgi niya, ‘Ogandani odagi winjo wach RuothNyasaye ma Nyasachgi, kendo ok giyie mondo opuonjgi.  Ok ginyal wachoadiera, nikech adiera oselalnigi. ’
"Yaye, jo-Jerusalem, ma yie wiu maboyo en ranyisi ni un joma owalna,dhiuru uliego oko, kendo udhi uywagi ewi gode, nimar an Ruoth Nyasayeasedagi joma akechogogi kendo aseweyogi.
"Jo-Juda osetimo gima rach e nyima.  Giseketo nyisechegi makuero eHekalu mara, mi gidwanyo.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.

. Anatiek mor gi ilo duto e miech Juda, kendo ewang’ yore man Jerusalem, ma kata mana dwond miaha gi chwore ok nowinji,nikech noyud ka piny oselokore thim. JEREMIA
"E ndalono ji nogol choke ruodhi gi choke jodongo mag Juda e lietegi,kaachiel gi choke jodolo gi mag jonabi kod mag ji mamoko duto mane odakJerusalem.  2Chokego nowit oko mondo chieng’ gi due kod sulue, manegihero kendo gilamo, orieny kuomgi.  Kar chokogi mondo oyikgi, to nowegiaweya gitow ewi lowo.  3Ji duto motony e oganda marachni, mi odak kuondeduto ma asekeyogie, nogomb mana tho kar bedo mangima.  An Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik moko Duto ema awacho kamano. "Richo gi bura4In Jeremia, wach ni joga ni an Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kama: "Ka ng’atoopodho, to donge ochako ochung’? Koso ka ng’ato obaro moweyo yo, todonge oduogo e yo kendo? 5Ka kamano, to ere gima omiyo gibaro giweya maok ginyal duogo ira ngang’? Gituere kuom nyisechegi manono, kendo gidagiduogo ira.  6Ne achiko ita mondo awinj wechegi, to ne ok giwacho adierakata achiel.  Onge kata ng’at achiel kuomgi moseloko chunye kuom timbegimaricho, kata moseywagore kuom richo mosetimo.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato mwomoree timbene, mana ka faras lweny mochodo kochiko wasigu.  7To kata ogungomae kor polo ong’eyo ndalogi mag dar, kendo kata akuru gi opija ginyamnaha bende ong’eyo ndalo ma giduogoe, joga to kia chikena.
"Ere kaka ginyalo wacho ni giriek kendo ging’eyo chikena, to jopuonjchik mag miriambo osegajo chikena? 9Jorieko wigi okuot.  Wach ogoyoginyang’eng’o kendo dhogi omoko.  Gisedagi wechena, koro ere rieko magin-go? 10Kuom mano mondgi kaachiel gi puothegi abiro miyo jomoko nono. Ji duto, madongo gi matindo, temo yudo pesa e yore mag miriambo, katamana jonabi gi jodolo duto bende jomriambo, 11Ezek
.
. nimar giwachoni gik moko dhi nyime maber to chutho gik moko ok dhi nyime maber.  Kuommano gichalo gi jothieth mathiedho jotuo marachrach, mana ka gima okgituo.  12Jer
.
-
. Bende uparo ni wigi okuot nikech timbe makuero manegitimogo koso? Ooyo, wigi ok okuot kata matin, bende gionge gi wichkuot. Kuom mano, gibiro podho kaka ji mamoko osepodho, kendo ka akumogi toginirum.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Abiro tieko joga chutho, nikech gichalo yiend mzabibu kata ng’owomaonge olemo, ma kata potgi bende osener. "14Jo-Nyasaye penjore niya, "Ere gimomiyo wabet abeta? Biuru wadhi e miermochiel motegno wathoe, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye oseng’adonwa buch tho. Osemiyowa pi motimo kwiri mondo wamodhi, nikech timbewa osebedo marichoe nyime.  15Ne wageno kue, to mana kayiem nono.  Bende ne wageno ni wabiroyudo resruok, to masira ema obwogowa.  16Ne wawinjo ka farese mag wasigufuto ka Dan, kendo ywakgi ne miyo piny duto yiengni.  Wasigugo osebiromondo oketh pinywa, kod gik moko duto mantie, kaachiel gi dalawani kodjoma odakie. " 17Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Ng’euru ni abiro kelothuonde mager kuomu.  Gin thuonde man gi kwiri maricho, ma ok nyal bo,omiyo gibiro kayou. "Jeremia ywago Juda gi Jerusalem18"Akuyo ma ok anyal yudo kue, kendo chunya tuo.  19Ling’uru ane, awinjoka joga ywak kuonde duto ma gintie, ka gipenjo niya, ‘Ruoth Nyasayeoseweyo Sayun koso? Ruodh Sayun onge kuno adier?’ To Ruoth Nyasaye maruodhgi dwoko niya, ‘Ere gima omiyo usemiya mirima kuom lamo nyisechemag pinje mamoko?’ "20Ji ywak kawacho niya, "Ndalo keyo osekadho mak wayudo gimadwaresrego. "21Chunya lit, nikech itimo ni joga malit.  Aywak kendo akuyomarach.  22Yath tinde orumo e piny Gilead koso? Jathieth onge kuno adier?Ere gima omiyo pok othiedh joga?JEREMIA
"Mad wiya lokre soko mar pi, kendo pi wang’a lokre aora, mondo aywagiodiechieng’ gotieno nikech joga mosenegi.  2Mad abed ki kiru mar bworo ethim, kuma anyalo betie mabor gi joga, nimar giduto gin joma terore,kendo oganda ma andhoga.  3Lewni chalo gi atung’ moywa, kendo diromiriambo mana kaka atung’ diro asere, bende timbe miganga ema opong’opiny. "Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Joga timo richo kinde duto, kendo okgidewa.  4Ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka tang’ ni osiepne, kendo onge ng’amanyalo geno owadgi, nimar owete duto gin jowuond ka Jakobo, bende ng’atoka ng’ato kuodho osiepne.  5Giduto giwuondo osiepegi, kendo onge ng’amawacho adiera.  Gisepuonjo lewgi wacho miriambo, kendo gisedonjo matut ericho ma ok ginyal wuokie.  6Gitimo timbe mahundu kinde duto, timbegi magwuond bende osiko asika, to gitamore yie kuoma.
"Kuom mano, an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto awacho ni abiropwodho joga, ka ng’at malenyo mula mondo ogol ng’iende.  Joga osetimoricho, koro ere gima datimnigi? 8Lewni chalo gi asere man gi kwirimager, kendo dhogi wacho weche mag miriambo.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato wuoyomang’won gi wadgi, to kara e chunye kucha to ochikone mana obadho! 9Korodonge abiro kumogi kuom timbe ma kamago? Adier, abiro chulo kuor nioganda machal kamano! An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano!"10Jeremia nowacho niya, "Abiro ywago gode gi lege, nikech gisetwo, kendoonge ng’ama wuothoe.  Ywak mar jamni tinde ok winji, kendo winy gi leduto mae thim oseringo. "11Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Abiro loko miech Jerusalem gundni kamaondiegi ema odakie, kendo miech Juda abiro loko thim. "Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni onyalo daro joge12Jeremia nopenjo Ruoth Nyasaye niya, "Ere gimomiyo piny okethore kendootwo, ka piny motimo ongoro ma onge ng’ama wuothoe? Ere ng’ama riekmanyalo winjo tiend wachni? Koso en ng’a ma isenyiso tiende mondo onyisjoma moko?" 13To Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoka niya, "Gima kama osetimore nikechjo-Israel oseweyo chik mane amiyogi.  Ok giseluora, to bende ok gisetimogik mane awachonigi ni mondo gitim.  14Gisebedo mana ka wigi tek, kagitimo dwarogi giwegi, kendo giselamo kido manono mag Baal, kaka nekweregi opuonjogi.  15Kuom mano, winji gima abiro timo, an Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma nyasach Israel.  Abiro miyo joga alodemakech mondo ocham, kod pi motimo kwiri mondo gimodhi.  16Abiro keyogi ekind ogendini ma ok ging’eyo, kendo ma kata kweregi bende ne ok ong’eyo. Bende abiro kelonigi wasigu mondo omonjgi nyaka chop atiekgi chuth. "17Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya, "Luonguru mon majoywak.  Ee, oruru wach mondo mon mong’eyo ywak obi.  18Gibi piyo mondogidengnwa, nyaka wengewa pong’ gi pi wang’, mi owre nikechywak.  19Winjuru ywak maywagore Sayun, ‘Waserumo chuth, kendo waseyudowichkuot miwuoro.  Osedarwa e pinywa, kendo miechwa osekethi. ’ "20Jeremia nowacho niya, "Un mon, chikuru itu ni gima Ruoth Nyasayeowacho, mondo uwinj wachne.  Puonjuru nyiu gi osiepeu wende ywak.  21Thoosedonjo gie dirisewa, koda ka e miech ruodhiwa, kendo osenego nyithindoe pewe oko, kod yawuowi e chirni. "22Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ringre joma otho biro dhurore pidhe mana kaowuoyo mool e puothe.  Ginichal gi cham ma jokeyo osebeto, to pok ochoki. Ng’eyo Nyasaye e mor mar dhano23"Ji mariek kik sungre nikech riekogi, joma rateke bende kik sungrenikech tekogi, kata joma omew kik sungre nikech mwandugi.
Kor
.
;
Kor
.
. To ng’at madwaro sungore, to mondo osungre mana nikechong’eya, kendo wechena osedonjone, nimar an Ruoth Nyasaye ahero ji gihera mosiko, kendo atimo gik makare kendo mowinjore e piny, nikechkamano e kaka adwaro.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "25Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni ndalo biro ma nokumie ji duto moternyangu, 26kaka jo-Misri gi jo-Juda gi jo-Edom gi jo-Amon kod jo-Moab,kaachiel gi ji duto modak e thim ma timgi en tito yie wigi, nikech teronyangu mar jogo duto, kaachiel gi mar jo-Israel, ok en tero nyangu marchuny to en mana mar ringruok. JEREMIA 10Nyiseche manono kod Nyasaye ma adiera1Un jo-Israel winjuru wach ma Ruoth Nyasaye osewachonu:
"Kik uluw timbeogendini mamoko, kendo kik chunyu parre kuom honni muneno e kor polo,kata obedo ni gimiyo ogendini parore.  3Gik ma jogo lamo gin gik manono,nimar gin mana yien motong’ e bungu, kendo japecho payogi mana gi koyo,eka obawogi gi fedha kod dhahabu, 4kendo oriwogi gi musmal mondo kikgiwuore.  5Gichalo gi gik mibwogogo winy e pwothe nikech ok ginyal wuoyo. Iting’ogi ating’a nimar ok ginyal wuotho, omiyo kik uluorgi nimar okginyal hinyou, to bende onge gima ber ma ginyalo timo. "6A Ruoth Nyasaye, onge ng’ato machal kodi, iduong’ kendo nyingi bendeduong’.  7Fweny
.
. A Ruodh ogendini duto, ere ng’ama ok diluori, nikechin iwinjori gi luor.  Kuom jorieko duto mag ogendini, kata kuom ruodhigiduto, onge ng’ato maromo kodi.  8Giduto gifuwo kendo gionge rieko, nikechgiyudo riekogi manono mana kuom yien mopa! 9Kido magi manonogo obaw gifedha mogol Tarshish, kendo gi dhahabu mogol Ufaz.  Gin mana tich lwedo. Irwakogi gi lewni mambulu gi maralik, ka jachuech molony ema ochueyo. 10To Ruoth Nyasaye e Nyasaye maradier.  En e Nyasaye mangima, kendo ruothmochwere.  Ka okecho to piny yiengni, kendo ogendini ok nyal siromirimbe. 11Nyaka inyis jogo ni nyiseche mane ok ochueyo polo gi piny ibiro kethi. Ok ginichak gibed kamoro amora e piny.  12Ruoth Nyasaye nochueyo piny gitekone, mogure motegno kendo noyaro polo gi riekone.  13Omiyo pi man etok polo wuo, kendo otugo boche polo e tung’ piny duto.  Bende omiyo polomil ka koth chue, kendo ogolo yamo kar kenone mondo okudhi.  14Gik makamago miyo ji ng’eng’, kendo bedo mofuwo.  Jotheth duto yudo wichkuotkuom gik ma githedho, nikech gin mana nyiseche manono, ma onge gingima.  15Gin gik manono moromo chayo, kendo gibiro rumo, chieng’ maRuoth Nyasaye biro mondo otiekgi.  16Nyasach Jakobo to ok chal gi gigo,nimar en ema ochueyo gik moko duto, kendo oseyiero jo-Israel mondo obedjoge owuon.  Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto e nyinge. Masira ma biro mako jo-Juda17"Un jo-Jerusalem ma osetimnigi ageng’a, chokuru giu, 18nimar RuothNyasaye owacho ni obiro golo ji duto modak e pinyni, kendo obiro sandounyaka urum pep. " 19Jo-Jerusalem ywak niya, "Mano kaka wahinyore malit,kendo adhondewa ok nyal chango, to ne waparo ni en gima wanyalodhilgo.  20Hembewa osekethore chuth, kendo tonde mane otuegigo osechot. Yawuotwa duto osea modhi mabor, koro onge ng’ama odong’ ma dichak gurnwahembewa, bende onge ng’ama nyalo lieronwa rageng’ni maggi. "21Jeremia nodwokogi niya, "Jotelo mau onge gi rieko, nikech ok gipenjwach kuom Ruoth Nyasaye.  Mano emomiyo ok gisetimo gimoro maber, kendojowa oseke kuonde duto.  22Winjuru! Wach osebiro! Koko maduong’ timore epiny moro yo nyandwat.  Gin jolweny mabiro ketho miech Juda, mi lokrethim ma ondiegi ema dakie.  23A Ruoth Nyasaye, ang’eyo ni ngima ng’ato oknie tekone owuon, bende onge ng’ama nyalo yiero yore owuon.  24Kuom mano,A Ruoth Nyasaye, riewa gi bura, to ok gi mirimbi, nono to itiekowapep.  25Ol mirimbi kuom ogendini ma ok oyie kuomi.  Ee, kech kod jogo maok lami! Gisenegowa, wan nyikwa Jakobo, mi gitiekowa duto, kendo gikethopinywa. "JEREMIA 11Jo-Juda oketho singruok1Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya,
"Winj weche mag singruok maabiro wachoni, eka inyis jo-Juda gi joma odak Jerusalem 3ni RuothNyasaye ma Nyasach Israel okuong’o ng’ato ang’ata motamore rito wachsingruokni.  4En singruok mane atimo gi kweregi kane agologi e pinyMisri, e sand mager ka mach makakni.  Ne awachonigi ni ka girito chikena,kendo gitimo gik moko duto ma anyisogi, to ginibed joga, kendo anabedNyasachgi.  5Bang’e eka anachop singruok mane atimo gi kweregi ni namigipiny maber kendo momew, ma koro gintieni. " Jeremia nodwoko Ruoth Nyasayeniya, "Ee, ayie timo kamano. "6Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia ni, "Dhiyo iland wechegi e miechJuda kendo e yore mag Jerusalem, kinyiso ji mondo owinj kendo orit wechemag singruokna.  7Chakre kinde mane agoloe kweregi e piny Misri nyakachil kawuono, asebedo kasiemogi matek mondo girit wechena.  8To negitamore winjo kata dewo.  Kar timo kamano to ng’ato ka ng’ato ka timotimbene mag wich teko.  Ne oyudo ka osechikogi mondo girit singruokno, tone gidagi.  Mano emomiyo nakelonigi kum duto mane singruokno oting’o. "9Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya, "Jo-Juda gi joma odakJerusalem piem koda.  10Gisedok e richo kweregi mane otamore timo gima neawacho, nikech gisebedo ka gilamo nyiseche manono.  Jo-Israel gi jo-Judaoseketho singruok mane atimo gi kweregi.  11Kuom mano an Ruoth Nyasayeasiemogi ni abiro kelo masira kuomgi kendo onge ng’at ma notony.  To kataka giywak mondo akonygi, to ok nadewgi.  12Bang’e jo-Juda gi joma odakJerusalem biro dhi ir nyisechegi ma gisebedo ka gitimonigi misengni,mondo okonygi.  To nyisechego ok noresgi ka masira obiro.  13Jo-Juda niginyiseche mang’eny mana ka miechgi, kendo joma odak Jerusalem bendeoseloso kende-mag-misango mang’eny, mana moromo gi yore mag dalagi,mondo gitimie misengni ni Baal.  14Kuom mano, in Jeremia, kik ilam nijogi, kata kik isaya mondo akonygi nimar kata ka ginie chandruok migiluonga, to ok nadewgi. "15Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Joma ahero, timo timbe maricho.  Eregimomiyo oyienigi biro e oda? Koso giparo ni ginyalo geng’o masira kuomtimo kuong’ruok kendo kuom wang’o boche ma gitimogo misengni? Bendegiparo ni ginitony adier? 16Chon ne aluongogi ni yadh zeituni ma obokeneng’eny, kendo manyago olembe mathoth mabeyo, to koro abiro wang’oobokene kod bedene gi mach mariadore ka mor polo.
"An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo gik Moko Duto ema napidho jo-Israel gijo-Juda kaka ng’ato pidho yath, to koro abiro bwogogi gi masira nikechricho ma gisetimo.  Gisekelo gima kama kuomgi giwegi, nikech gimiyamirima kuom timo misengni ni Baal. "Jo-Anathoth ochano timo ni Jeremia marach18Ruoth Nyasaye nonyisa gik maricho mane wasika dwaro timona.  19Neachalo gi nyarombo mogol e abila, ka kia ni idwaro nego, kendo ne okang’eyo ni ichano gik marichogo kuoma.  Ne giwacho niya, "Wanegeuru mondonyinge olal nono. " 20Eka nalemo niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto, in e jang’ad bura makare, kendo ma temo chuny ji gi parogi.  Weaneye ka ichulo ni jogo kuor, nikech aseketo wachna e lweti. "21Jo-Anathoth ne dwaro nego Jeremia, kendo ne giwachone ni gibiro negeka pod osiko koyalo e nying Ruoth Nyasaye.  22Kuom mano Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto nowuoyo kuomgi niya, "Abiro kumogi.  Yawuotgi birotho e lweny.  Nyithindgi bende kech biro nego.  23Onge kata ng’at achielkuomgi ma nodong’, chieng’ ma achano ni akelo masira kuom jo-Anathoth. "JEREMIA 12Ywagruok Jeremia kod dwoko mar Ruoth Nyasaye1"A Ruoth Nyasaye, ang’eyo ni kata ka akeloni ywakna, to biro yudore niin ema in kare.  Kata kamano pod daher penjie wach kuom adiera mari.  Eregimomiyo joma richo yudo mwandu? Koso ere gimomiyo joma jowuond dhimaber?.  2Ipidhogi, mi gigol tiendegi, kendo gidongo, mi ginyag olemo. Pile giwuoyo maber kuomi, to chutho chunygi bor kodi.  3To Ruoth Nyasaye,ing’eya, kendo ineno gik ma atimo, bende inono chunya mondo ine kakaaheri.  Ywa joma richogi oko ka rombe ma idwaro yang’o, kendo ketgi tengenyaka chieng’ minegogie chopi.  4Nyaka karang’o ma pinywa biro bedomotwo, kendo lum manie lege biro wang’ie? Le gi winy tho, nikech timbemaricho mag joma odak e pinyni, mawacho ni ok ine gik maricho magitimo. "5Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "In Jeremia, ka ringo gi ji oseoli, tokoro ere kaka dipiem gi farese? Ka piny maber midakieni ema iywagorie,to ere kaka ibiro betie bungu mandiwa manie geng Jordan? 6Koda kaomineni hie osendhogi, kendo giseriwore gi jomoko ma monji.  Kik igen-gi,kata obedo ni giwachoni weche mabeyo kamano. "7An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho niya, "Aseweyo ogandana mane ayiero, miadagigi.  Aseketo joga ma ahero e lwet wasikgi.  8Joga awuon oselokorewasika.  Giserutona ka sibuor manie bungu, mi koro amon kodgi.  9Jogaawuon chalo gi olith ma kite okikokiko, ma olidhe mamoko gueyo koni gikoni.  Un ogendini, biuru mondo ugoru kuom joga, mi uyaki mana kakaondiegi gore kuom gima gimako, mi gikidhi.  10Jotelo mag pinje mamokooseketho puotha mar mzabibu.  Gisenyono puothena piny gi tiendgi, migiloko pinya maber odoko motwo ma ok nyag gimoro.  11Gisekethe, ma orieree nyima kanyo ma onge tich.  Piny duto oselokore thim, to onge ng’amadewo.  12Ji oseng’ado gode mae thim ka gibiro mondo giyeki.  To an emaaoro lweny mondo otiek pinyno, ma onge ng’at manyalo dakie gikue.  13Joga pidho ngano, to kuthe ema gikayo.  Gisetiyo matek, to okgiyud gimoro.  Pinygi otho nikech mirimba mager. "14Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "An gi gima adwaro wacho kuom ogendinimaricho mokiewo gi jo-Israel.  Abiro pudhogi oko e pinygi ka yienmipudho, mi nares jo-Juda kuomgi.  15To ka asepudhogi oko kamano, ekaanakechgi, mi aduog oganda ka oganda e lope, kendo e pinye owuon.  16Chonogendinigo ne kuong’ore gi nying Baal, kendo ne gipuonjo joga mondo otimkamano.  To ka koro ginyalo yie luwo dini mar joga gi chunygi duto, migikuong’re gi nyinga, to gin bende ginibed joga.  17To ka oganda morootamore, to anapudhe oko, mi akethe chuth.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano. "JEREMIA 13Ngech law mokethore1Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona mondo adhi ang’iew law, atue e nungona, to kikabude e pi.  2Omiyo ne ang’iewo lawno kaka Ruoth Nyasaye ne ochika, miarwako.  3Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo koda kendo, mowachonaniya,
"Dhiyo e aora Yufrate, ilony law mirwakono mondo ipandi e burlwanda. " 5Omiyo ne adhi mi apande but aora Yufrate kaka ne Ruoth Nyasayeochika.  6Bang’ kinde moko, Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona mondo adogi Yufrateaom lawno.  7Kuom mano nadok Yufrate, mi arango kama ne apandoe lawno, neayude, mi anwang’o ka okethore, ma onge tich.  8Ruoth Nyasaye nochakoowuoyo koda, ka wachona niya,
"Mano e kaka abiro ketho sunga marjo-Juda kaachiel gi sunga marach mar jo-Jerusalem.  10Oganda marachniosetamore winjo wachna, mi gisebedo joma wigi tek, kendo ma timbegiricho.  Giselamo nyiseche mamoko, kendo gitiyonigi.  Kuom mano gibirochalo mana gi law ma koro onge tichni.  11Kaka law atueya mako nungong’at morwake matek, e kaka nadwaro ni mondo jo-Isarel gi jo-Juda omakamatek, mondo gibed joga, kendo gikel pak kod duong’ ni nyinga.  To katakamano ne gitamore luora. "Ngech agulni12"In Jeremia, nyis jo-Isarel ni an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi awachokama: ‘Agulini mag divai onego opong’ gi divai. ’ To gibiro dwoki ni,‘Wang’eyo maber ni agulini mag divai onego opong’ gi divai. ’ 13Eka ichakiwachnigi ni an Ruoth Nyasaye abiro miyo jopinyni madho divai nyaka mer. Koda ka ruodhi ma nyikwa Daudi gi jodolo gi jonabi kod jo-Jerusalem dutobiro mer.  14Bang’e anarwadgi duto, wuone gi nyithindo machalre.  Oknakechgi kendo ok nawegi, bende ok nang’wonnigi ngang’, to naneggiduto. "Ruoth Nyasaye osiemo jo-Israel ni obiro darogi15"Un jo-Israel, winjuru! Ruoth Nyasaye ema wuoyo, omiyo kik usungru, miutamru winje.  16Miuru Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu duong’, ka pok okelomudho, mi uchwanyoru e gode gotieno, kendo kapok oloko ler mugenonomudho mandiwa.  17Ka utamoru winjo siemnni, to anaywagu gi chunya nikechsungau.  Anaywagu malit, mi pi wang’a nochuer nyaka wang’a owre, nikechodar jo-Ruoth Nyasaye, kitero e tuech. "18Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya, "Dhiyo inyis ruoth gi min maremondo joa e kombegi mag duong’ nikech osimbegi mag loch osea e wigimolwar piny.  19Oselwor miech piny milambo, kendo onge ng’ama nyaloresogi.  Osedar jo-Juda mi oter e tuech. "20Un jo-Jerusalem, neyeuru! Wasiku biro, koa malo yo nyandwat.  Ereoganda mane chalonu gi kweth maber, mane omiu mondo uriti? 21Unuwach niji ang’o ka joma yande uparo ni osiepeu ema koro oket e wiu ka jotendu?Ubiro bedo gi rem mana ka dhako ma muoch kayo! 22To eka upenjo gimomiyogima kama osetimorenu, kendo gimomiyo oseyiech lepu kuomu, mi odwanyu,to ubiro yudo ni mano otimore nikech richou lich.  23Bende ja-Nubi nyaloloko kit dende? Koso kwach dilok kite marabok dok kido moro nono? Kaponi gigo nyalo timore, to kara un bende mutimo gik maricho unyalo timogik mabeyo! 24Ruoth Nyasaye biro keyou ka mihudhi ma yamo mager moa ethim keyo.  25Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho ni mano e gima biro timorenu. Osechano mondo otimnu kamano nikech useweye, mi ugeno mana kuom nyisechemanono.  26Ruoth Nyasaye owuon ema noyiech lepu kuomu, mi dugunonen.  27Ruoth Nyasaye oseneno kaka utimo gik ma omon-go.  Ulawo nyisechemanono e gode kendo e pewe, mana ka ng’at ma gombo chi wadgi, kendo kafaras ma dichwo ma lawo madhako! Un jo-Jerusalem urumo! Unuben malerkarang’o?JEREMIA 14Wach Ruoth Nyasaye kuom oro mane omako piny1Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremia kuom oro mane omako pinyniya,
"Jo-Juda ywak kendo miechgi kethore.  Jogi oriere piny kokuyo,kendo jo-Jerusalem ywak mondo okonygi.  3Jodongo oro jotichgi mondooumbnigi, to ka gichopo e sokni, to ok giyud pi, omiyo giduogo gi dapigenono.  Giumo wigi nikech gidhier nono, kendo gikia gima ginyalotimo.  4Chuny jopur lit, nikech koth onge, kendo piny otwo, omiyo giumowigi.  5Mwanda bende nywolo nyathi, to oweyo mana kanyo nikech lumonge.  6Kenje mag thim chung’ ewi gode, kendo gamo yueyo mana ka bwe. Wengegi wingni nikech lum onge.
"Joga ywakna niya, ‘A Ruoth Nyasaye, kata ka richowa nyiso ni wanjoketho, to yie ikonywa kaka isesingori.  Adier, waseweyi ndalo mang’eny,kwaketho e nyimi.  8To in kendi ema jo-Israel ogeno kuomi, nimar in emairesowa ka wanie chandruok.  Ere gima omiyo ichalo wendo e pinywa mabworo kuom otieno achiel kende? 9Ere gima omiyo ichalo gi ng’at mobwokkata ka jalweny ma onge gi teko ma dokonygo ng’ato? Adier, in RuothNyasaye in kodwa, kendo wan jogi, omiyo kik iwitwa. ’ "10Ruoth Nyasaye wuoyo kuom jogi niya, "Gihero ringo weya kamano, kendogibayo kamoro amora ma gihero.  Kuom mano, ok amor kodgi, to aparo richoma gisetimo, kendo abiro kumogi nikech richogigo. "11Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Kik ikwaya mondo akony jogi.  12Kata kagitueyo chiemo, to ok nawinj ywakgi, kendo kata ka gichiwona misengnimiwang’o pep, gi mag erokamano, to ok nabed mamor kodgi.  Abiro miyogitho e lweny, kendo kech gi tuo biro negogi. " 13An to ne adwoke ni, "ARuoth Nyasaye, donge ing’eyo ni jonabi wacho ni ji niya, ‘Kech katalweny biro bedo maonge, nimar nisingori ni kue kende ema nobed epinywa’?" 14To Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Jonabigo koro weche magmiriambo e nyinga.  An ne ok aorogi, kendo ne ok amiyogi chik, bende neok awuoyo kodgi.  Gik ma giwachonugo gin fweny ma ok owuok kuoma, togikoro mana weche manono ma giparo apara.  15An Ruoth Nyasaye anyisi gimaabiro timo ni jonabi mane ok aorogo.  Giwuoyo gi nyinga ka giwacho nilweny kod kech ok bi mako pinyni, to adier, kech gi lweny ema abironegogigo.  16Joma ne giwachonigi gigo bende lweny gi kech biro nego. Ringregi kaachiel gi mag mondgi kod nyithindgi nowiti e yore magJerusalem, ma onge ng’ama noyiki, nikech abiro kumogi kuom timbegimaricho.
"In Jeremia, wach ni ji kama: ‘Pi wang’a mondo omol odiechieng’gotieno! Onego kik awe ywak nimar joga osego matek, mi ohinyoremalit.  18Ka awuok oko e pap, to aneno ringre joma onegi e lweny, to kaadonjo e dala moro, to aneno joma kech nego.  Jonabi gi jodolo dhi nyimegi tijegi, to chutho ok ging’eyo gima gitimo. ’ "Ywagruok jo-Juda19"A Ruoth Nyasaye iseweyo jo-Juda chuth koso? Adier, ichayo jo-Sayun?Ere gimomiyo isehinyowa malit kamano, ma ok wanyal chango? Ne wageno niwabiro yudo gik mabeyo, to onge gima ber mane wayudo.  Ne waparo ni ibirochangowa, to masira malit ema nopoyowa.  20A Ruoth Nyasaye, wahulorichowa kaachiel gi richo kwerewa.  Adier, waseketho e nyimi.  21Kikijwang’wa, nikech dipo ka nyingi okethore.  Bende kik iyie jomoko chaJerusalem, kama kom duong’ni nitie.  Rit singruok mane itimo kodwa, kendokik ikethe.  22Bende nyiseche manono mag ogendini nyalo kelo koth adier?Koso polo giwegi nigi teko mar miyo koth chue? Ooyo, in ema waketochunywa kuomi, A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachwa, nikech in kende ema inyalotimo gik ma kamago. "JEREMIA 15Mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye mager kuom jo-Juda1 Wuok
.

; Kwan
.
-
;
Sam
.
-
. Ruoth Nyasaye nowachonaniya, "Kata da bed ni Musa gi Samuel ema jochung’ e nyima ka, to okanyal weyo ni jogi richogi.  Wachnigi mondo gia e wang’a.  2Fweny
.
. Toka gipenjo ni gidhi kanye, to nyisgi ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama:Jomoko kuomu tuo biro nego,kendo mano e kuma gibiro dhiye. To moko biro tho e lweny,kendo kuno ema gibiro dhiye!Bende moko kech biro nego,mi kuno ema gibiro dhiye!To moko ibiro tero e tuech,kendo kuno ema gibiro dhiye!
"An Ruoth Nyasaye asechano ni masiche ang’wen biro makogi.  Ibiro neggimi guogi biro kidho ringregi.  Winy nochamgi kendo ondiegi nochamringregi modong’.
Ruo
.
-
;
W. Nda
.
-
. Abiro miyo ogendiniduto mag piny bwog konenogi, nikech gik maricho mane Manase wuod Hezekiaotimo Jerusalem kane en ruodh Juda.
"Ere ng’ama biro kechou, un jo-Jerusalem? Koso ng’ama biro ywagou? Enng’a ma biro chung’ mondo omosu? 6Ne uweya, kendo udagi wachna, omiyo neabiro, mi atiekou, nikech ne ok anyal geng’o mirimba kendo.  7Ne akeyou emier duto, mana ka mihudhi ma yamo keyo.  Un joga ne atiekou, mi anegonyithindu, nikech ne udagi weyo timbeu maricho.  8Ne anego chwo mang’eny,mi ubedo gi mond liete mathoth ka kuoyo mae dhonam ne anego yawuotugodiechieng’, mi akelo ne minegi kuyo.  9Dhako man gi yawuowi abiriyoopodho piny ka muche orumo, nikech yawuotego duto osenegi.  Piny othonemudho ka wiye okuot, kendo chunye chandore.  Abiro miyo wasigu neg jou mapod odong’ ka ngima.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "10Jeremia noywagore niya, "Yaye! Hapa rach! Ere gima omiyo ne mamaonywola, nimar ji duto osiko ka dhaw adhawa koda? Pok aholo ng’atopesana, bende pok aholo pesa kuom ng’ato, to kata kamano, ji dutokuong’a.  11A Ruoth Nyasaye, kapo ni ok asetiyoni maber, kata ka okasekwayi mondo ikech wasika ka chandruok omako to kuong’ duto magikuong’ago mondo omaka.  12Onge ng’ama nyalo turo chuma, to moloyo chumamonywas gi mula, moa e piny ma yo nyandwat. "13Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoka niya, "Abiro kelo wasigu oyak mwandu joga, mondoakumgi kuom richo ma gisetimo e pinygi duto.  14Abiro miyo giti niwasikgi e piny ma ok ging’eyo, nikech mirimba chalo mach, kendo biroliel nyaka chieng’. "Nyasaye okueyo chuny Jeremia15Jeremia nodwoke niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye, in ing’eyo weche duto, omiyopara kendo ikonya.  Chul kuor ni joma sanda.  Kik iwegi, nono to ginega. Ng’e ni giyanya nikech in.  16Ne iwuoyo koda, mi awinjo wecheni duto.  ARuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, an ng’ati, omiyo wecheni opong’ochunya gi mor kod ilo.  17Ne ok abet e kanyakla mar joma mor, bende ne okaneno ber, to ne an mana kenda, ka apong’ gi siwuori, nikech tich maneimiya.  18Ere gima omiyo asiko ka an gi rem malit? Ang’o momiyo adhondenaok nyal chango? Koso idwaro bedona ka aora ma duono ndalo oro?"19To Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoka niya, "Ka iduogo ira, to abiro rwaki, miinichak ibed jatichna, ka iwacho weche makare, ma ok weche manono, toinichak ibed janabina.  Ji biro biro iri, to ok inidhi irgi.  20Abiro lokimotegno ka ohinga mar chuma, mondo eka isir jogo.  Gibiro kedo kodi, took giniloyi, nikech abiro bet kodi mondo ariti.  21Abiro resi kuom jomatimbegi richo, kendo abiro konyi kuom jomahundu.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano. "JEREMIA 16Ruoth Nyasaye ong’ado ni joge bura1Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owuoyo koda, kowachona niya,
"Ok nikendi, kendook ninywol nyithindo ka.  3Abiro nyisi gima biro timore ni nyithindomonywol ka, kaachiel gi jonywolgi.  4Tuoche maricho biro negogi, to ongeng’ama noywaggi, bende ok noyikgi.  Ginidhurre pidhe pidhe mana ka owuoyomiolo e puothe.  Moko notho e lweny to moko kech nonegi, kendo winy giondiegi nocham ringrergi.
"Kik idonj e ot miywagoe ngat motho, to bende kik iywag ng’ato, nimarasegolo kue mara gi herana kod ng’wonona kuomgi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano.  6Joma omew kaachiel gi joma odhier biro tho e pinyni, toonge ng’ama noywaggi kata noyikgi.  Onge ng’ama noter buchgi kata manoliel wiye ma nyiso ni en e lit 7Ka ng’ato ng’ate otho, to onge ng’amanobi ochiem kode kata ometh kode mondo oduog chunye, bed ni wuon katamin ema otho.
"Kik idonj e ot ma ji timoe sawo.  Bende kik ibed piny mondo ichiemkendo imeth kodgi.  9Jer
.
;
.
; Fweny
.
. An Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto awacho kama: Abiro tieko mor kod ilo ma jogo nigo,ma kata dwond mon ma miehni gi chwogi ok nowinj kaeri.  Gigi duto notimrekapod gingima kendo gineno gi wang’gi!"
"Ka inyisogi wechegi, to gibiro penji gima omiyo asechano mondo akumgimalit kamano.  Bende gibiro penji gima giseketho, kata richo ma gisetimoe nyim Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi.  11To dwokgi ni Ruoth Nyasaye owachokama: ‘Kwereu noweya, mi otiyo ni nyiseche mamoko kendo olamo.  Ne giweyakendo ne ok giwinjo chikena.  12Koro un to usetimo gik maricho moloyokata mane kwereu otimo.  Un duto un joma richo ma wigi tek, ma ok nyalluora.  13Kuom mano abiro riembou e pinyni, mi ateru e piny ma okung’eyo, kata ma kwereu bende ne ok ong’eyo.  Kuno unulamie nyisechemamoko odiechieng’ gotieno, to ok anakechu. ’ 14To ndalo biro ma ongeng’ama nokuong’re gi nyinga ka Nyasaye mangima mane ogolo jo-Israel epiny Misri.  15To ginikuong’re gi nyinga mana ka Nyasaye mangima maneogolo jo-israel e piny man yo nyandwat gi pinje mamoko duto maneosekeyogie.  Anaduoggi e pinygi giwegi mane amiyo kweregi.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Abiro oro ji mang’eny mondo omak jogi, mana kaka jolupo maluwo rech. Bang’e naor jodwar mang’eny mondo odwargi e gode duto koda ka e kindlwendni.  17Aneno gik moko duto ma gitimo, kendo onge gima opondona,bende richogi ok nyal kadhona mak aneno.  18Abiro miyo gichul nyadiriyokuom richogi gi timbegi mamono.  Gisedwanyo pinya gi nyisechegi maonge gingima mana ka ringre joma otho, kendo gisepong’o piny gi nyisechegimamono gogo. "19Eka Jeremia nolemo ka wacho kama: "A Ruoth Nyasaye, in ema imiya teko,kendo irita, bende in e kara ma abwokie e kinde mag chandruok.  Ogendinimoa tung’ piny ka tung’ piny nobi iri, kawacho niya, ‘Kwerewa ne lamonyiseche manono ma gin mana kido ma onge tich.  20Dhano bende nyalo losonyiseche owuon? Ooyo, mago ok dibed nyiseche kata matin!’ "21Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko niya, "Mano emomiyo abiro nyisogi tekona giduong’na dichiel kendo mogik, mi gibiro ng’eyo ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye. "JEREMIA 17Chuny jo-Juda ogawore gi richo1Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Un jo-Juda, richou ondik gi kalamb chuma,kendo ogorgi gi gima bith e chunyu, kendo e tunge kendeu magliswa.  2Yawuotu paro kende-mag-liswa kod sirni milamo mane ochung’ etiend yien duto motimo tiep, kendo e pidhe 3kod gode duto manie pewe. Abiro miyo wasiku yak mwanduu duto, nikech richo ma usetimo kuonde dutoe pinyu.  4Ubiro a e piny mane amiyou, kendo abiro miyo utiyo ni wasiku epiny ma ok ung’eyo, nimar mirimba chal gi machh, kendo biro liel nyakachieng’. "5Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya,"Okuong’ ng’at ma baro weya,to geno mana kuom dhano,ka parone bor koda. 6Ochalo kudho manie thim,madongo e piny motwo,mana e lowo motimo chumbi,ma onge gima odongoe maber. Onge gima berma ng’atno nyalo yudo. 7To oguedh ng’at ma ogena kendo oyie kuoma,
Zab
.
. nimar ochalo gi yathmopidh but aora,matero tiendene kochomo pi. Onge gima thage,kata ndalo oro,ma chieng’ rienyie mager,nikech pote osiko ka ng’ich ang’icha. Ok odew kata ka koth ok chue,to osiko konyago anyaga olemo.
"Ere ng’ama nyalo ng’eyo gima chuny dhano paro? Onge gima jamriambokaka chuny dhano.  En gi tuoche mang’eny ma ok nyal chango.  10Fweny
.
;Zab
.
. An Ruoth Nyasaye amanyo paro mar dhano, kendo apimo rieko magji.  Atimo ni ng’ato ka ng’ato mana kaka ochalo, kendo mana ka luwore gitimbene.  11Ng’ato ma yudo pesa e yor miriambo chalo gi winyo matoyotong’ mane ok otoko.  Gibiro lalne kapok obet ng’at moti, kendo bang’enolokre mana ng’at mofuwo. "12Hekalu marwa chal gi kom duong’ mang’ongo, mogur ewi got mabor nyakane piny chakre.  13Ruoth Nyasaye ema jo-Israel ogeno kuome, omiyo ji dutomoweye noyud wichkuot.  Ginilal nono mana ka nying mondik e buru, nikechgiseweyo Ruoth Nyasaye ma en soko mar pi maliw. 14Jeremia nokwayo niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, changa mondo adok mangima. Resa mondo ayud kue.  In ema apaki.  15Ji penja ni, ‘Ere masiche maneRuoth Nyasaye obwogowago? Wadwaro mondo okelgi sani!’ 16To RuothNyasaye, bende ne akwayi mondo ikelnigi masira? In Ruoth Nyasaye ing’eyoni ne ok agomb mondo giyud thagruok, kendo in ing’eyo gimaasewacho.  17Kik ilokrina masira, nimar in e kara mar resruok ka masiraoyuda.  18Kel wichkuot kuom joma sanda, to an mondo iweya, kendo kelnigikihondko, to an kik ibwoga.  Kelnigi masira, kendo kethgi chuth. "Chieng’ Sabato nyaka rit maler19Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Jeremia, dhiyo mondo ichung’ edhorangach miluongo ni Ranga Ji, kama ruodhi mag Juda donjogo kendowuokgo Jerusalem.  Bang’e idhi e dhorangeye mamoko mag dala.  20Nyisruodhi kod jo-Juda duto, kaachiel gi ji duto modak Jerusalem maluwodhorangeyegi mondo ochik itgi owinj gima awacho.  21Neh
.
-
. Nyisgini ka ok gidwar tho, to kik giting’ misike chieng’ Sabato.  Bende kikgiting’ gimoro ka gikadhogo e dhorangeye mag Jerusalem chieng’no.  22Wuok20.

; T. Chik
.
-
. Kata mana ting’o gik moko ka gigolo e utgi kikgiting’.  Nyaka girit chieng’ Sabato obed maler, kaka ne achiko kweregi,kendo kik giti tich moro chieng’no.  23To kweregi ne ok odewo winjowachna, kendo wigi ne odoko matek, mi gidagi luora, kata obedo niasekumogi kamano.
"Nyisgi ni nyaka giluora gi chunygi duto.  Kik giting’ misigo moroamora ka gikadho e dhorangeye mag dalani chieng’ Sabato, to giritchieng’ Sabato obed maler, mak gitiyo tich moro.  25Kamano eka ruodhimaggi gi jodonggi didonj e dhorangeye mag Jerusalem, kendo bed gi duong’mane ruoth Daudi nigo.  Gin kaachiel gi jo-Juda kod jo-Jerusalem giniidhgeche gi farese, kendo ji nodag Jerusalem nyaka chieng’.  26Ji nobi koa emiech Juda kod mier mokiewo gi Jerusalem.  Bende ji moa e piny Benjaminnobi kaachiel gi joma odak e tiend gode, gi ewi gode, kod e piny Negeb. Ginikel misengni miwang’o pep gi misengni mag cham kod ubani, kaachielgi misengni mag erokamano gi misengni mamoko e Hekalu mara.  27To ka okgiluora, mi gitamore rito chieng’ Sabato obed maler, kendo giting’omisigo moro amora ka gikadho e dhorangeye mag Jerusalem chieng’no, toanamok mach e dhorangeye mag Jerusalem, mi majno nowang’ ut ruodhi magJerusalem, kendo onge ng’ama nonege. "JEREMIA 18Ngech jachue agulni1Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya,
"Dhiyo e od jachue agulini, kendo abiromiyi wechena kuno. " 3Omiyo ne adhi mi ayudo ka jachue agulini nietichne.  4To e sa asaya mane gima odwaro chueyo ok owuok maber, to neokawo lowono, kendo olosogo gima chielo, mana kaka ohero. 5Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nopenja niya,
"Donge un jo-Israel anyalo timoumana gima jachuech timo gi lowo? Ng’euru ni unie tekona, mana kaka lowoni e teko jachuech.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.  7Kapo ni asiemooganda moro, kata piny moro, ni abiro ketho kata tieko kata dhuolo gilop tiende, 8to bang’e ogandano olokore moweyo timbene marachno, to anbende koro aloko parona kuom gima rach mane awacho ni abiro timo.  9Tobende kapo ni awacho ni abiro pidho kendo gero oganda moro, 10miogandano otimo richo, kendo otamore rito chikna, to nyaka alok paronakuom gima ber mane awacho ni natim.  11Omiyo koro dhi inyis jo-Juda gijo-Jerusalem ni achano kelonigi masira, kendo abiro kumogi.  Kwergi mondogiwe richogi.  Kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato olok yorene gi timbenemaricho.  12To gibiro dwoki niya, ‘Ok wanyal loko timbewa! Wabiro timomana gima wahero, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato timo mana gima wiye omiye. ’
"Kuom mano an Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kama: Penjieuru ogendini duto kagima kama osetimore nyaka nene.  Jo-Israel osetimo gima rachmiwuoro! 14Bende wi got Lebanon motimo lwendni nyalo bet maonge peadier? Koso aore mag godno nyalo duono? Ooyo, gisiko asika kamano.  15Tojoga wigi osewil koda, kendo giwang’o ubani ni kido manono. Gisechwanyore mi giweyo wang’yo ma onego giluw, mi koro ok giluw yoremachon, to giwuotho e yore mogondore ma ok opa.  16Giseketho pinygi,modoko gima bwogo ji, kendo ma ji charo nyaka chieng’.  Ji duto ma kadhomachiegni biro bwok kuom gima gineno, kendo gibiro kino wigi kagiwuoro.  17Anake joga e nyim wasikgi, mana ka buru ma yamb ugue keyo. Abiro lokonigi ng’eya, kendo ok nakonygi ka masira omakogi. "Lemo ma Jeremia okwayogo ka enie masira18Bang’ mano ji nowacho niya "Wang’aduru rieko mondo wanyal Jeremia.  Podnobedie abeda jodolo manyalo telonwa, gi joma riek manyalo ng’adonwarieko, kod jonabi manyalo nyisowa wach Nyasaye.  Biuru wahangne wach,kendo wawe dewo gima owacho. "19To Jeremia nolemo niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, winj gima akwayo, kendo winjgima wasika wacho kuoma.  20Richo bende ichulo kuom ber? Gin togisekunyona bur mondo anyumrae.  Par kaka ne abiro iri, mi awuoyo kodi,kakwayi mondo kik mirima maki kodgi.  21To koro Ruoth Nyasaye, we kechoneg nyithindgi, kendo we githo e lweny.  Joma chwo gi nyithindo mondootho, kendo mon mondo odong’ mond liete, kendo maonge nyithindo.  Tuochemondo oneg jodongo, to yawuowi mondo otho e lweny.  22Kel mony apoya,mondo oyak miechgi, mi giywag ka kihondko omakogi.  Gisekunyona bur mondoanyumrae, kendo gisechikona obadho mondo omaka.  23To in Ruoth Nyasaye,ing’eyo gik moko duto ma gitimo ka gidwaro nega.  Omiyo kik ing’wonngikuom timbegi maricho, kendo kik iwenigi richogi.  Kelgi e nyimi kagichwanyore, kendo kumgi ka in gi mirima mager. "JEREMIA 19Ngech agulu moto1Ruoth Nyasaye nonyisa mondo adhi ang’iew agulu.  Bende nonyisa mondoakaw jodongo moko kod jodolo madongo,

. adhigo e holo mar Ben-hinom, mokiewo gi dhorangach miluongo ni RangaTegni.  Kuno ema ne adhi huloe wach mane obiro miya.  3Ruoth Nyasayenokona mondo awach niya, "Winjuru un ruodhi mag Juda kod jo-Jerusalem. An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto kendo ma Nyasach Israel, awachokama: Abiro kelo masira malich kuom dalani, ma ng’ato ka ng’ato mowinjo,to ite nopopni.  4Abiro timo kamano nikech useweya, mudwanyo dalani,kutimoe lisweche ni nyiseche mamoko ma ok ung’eyo, to kata mana kwereugi ruodhi mag Juda bende ne ok ong’eyo.  Usemiyo remb ji maonge kethoopong’o ka, 5T. Lawi
.
. kendo usegero kende-mag-liswa mondo uwang’ienyithindu ka liswa ni Baal.  To ne ok achikou mondo utim kamano, bendewach ma kamano ne ok aparo kata matin.  6Emomiyo an Ruoth Nyasaye, awachoni ndalo biro ma ok noluongie holoni ni Tofeth, kata ni holo Ben-hinom,to noluonge ni holo Nek.  7Ka eri ema nakethie gik moko duto ma jo-Judagi jo-Jerusalem chano timo.  Anawe wasikgi logi, mi neggi e lweny, kendoanami winy gi ondiegi cham ringregi.  8Anaketh dalani gi keth malich, ming’ato ang’ata makadho machiegni nobwogi, kawuoro gima osetimore nidalani.  9Anami ji modak ka cham ringre nyithindgi giwegi.  Bende ginichamringre jowadgi e kinde marach ma wasigu nobed ka lworo dalagi, ka dwaronegogi. "10Bang’ wacho wechego, Ruoth Nyasaye nonyisa mondo ato agulu cha e nyimjoma ne asedhigogo, 11kendo awachnigi ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto nosewacho kama: "Abiro toyo jogi gi dalani mana kaka itoyo agulu maok nyal chak chom.  Joma otho noyik kata mana e Tofeth, nikech ok noyudkamoro nono ma diyikgie.  12Mano e kaka abiro timo ni dalani, kaachiel gijoma odakie, kendo analoke mana ka Tofeth.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano.  13Naketh udi mag Jerusalem gi ut ruodhi Juda, to moloyo udi dutoma osewang’ ubani ewi tetgi ni sulue, kendo ma osepukie lisweche miolopiny ni nyiseche mamoko, mi ginibed mogak mana ka Tofeth. "14Bang’ wechego, ne awuok aa Tofeth, kuma ne Ruoth Nyasaye oorae, mondoadhi ahulie wachne.  Ne adhi mi achung’ e laru mar Hekalu, eka anyiso jiduto niya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ma Nyasach Israelowacho ni obiro kelo masiche duto mane osiemogo dalani kaachiel gi mierduto mokiewo kode, nikech un joma tokgi tek, motamore winjo wachne. "JEREMIA 20Okuong Pashur kuom keto Jeremia e tuech1Kane Pashur wuod Imer jadolo, kendo jatelo maduong’ e Hekalu owinjo gikmane Jeremia okoro, 2nogolo chik mochwad Jeremia, kendo otueye e lodi edhoranga Hekalu miluongo ni Ranga Benjamin mamalo.  3Kinyne gokinyi,Pashur ne ogonyo Jeremia, mi Jeremia nowachone niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye okluongi ni Pashur, to oluongi ni Magor-misabib, tiende ni, masira nikuonde duto.  4Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho ni obiro miyo ilokri masira ni iniwuon, kendo ni osiepeni, kendo wasigu noneg osiepenigo duto e lwenymana kineno.  Abiro keto jo-Juda duto e teko mar ruodh Babulon, kendoenoter moko e tuech Babulon, to moko nogol chik mondo onegi.  5Bendeanawe wasikgi yak mwandu duto manie Jerusalem kaachiel gi gik moko dutomantie, koda ka gik mabeyo duto mag ruodhi Juda, mi gikaw gidhigoBabulon 6To in Pashur, nomaki kaachiel gi joodi, mi teri Babulon kumainithoe kendo yikie but osiepeni ma isebedo ka ihulonigi weche magmiriambo!"Jeremia oywagore7"A Ruoth Nyasaye, ne iwuonda, mi iwuonda adier.  In itek moloya, omiyone ihewa.  Ji duto tugo koda kendo ginyiera odiechieng’ duto.  8E kindeduto ma awuoyoe, to aywak kendo akok niya, ‘Mahundu gi masira nitie!’ ARuoth Nyasaye, gichara kendo giyanya kinde duto nikech ahulo wachni.  9Toka awacho ni abiro weyi mondo kik achak awuo e nyingi, to wachni wang’ochunya, mana ka mach.  Opong’o chokena, kendo ohewa ting’o ma ok anyalsiro.  10Awinjo ka ji kuodha gi nying’ ma gichaka ni ‘Masira ni kuondeduto,’ kendo giwacho niya, ‘Kwedeuru! Ee, wakwede!’ Kata mana osiepenama ageno bende gombona mana chwanyruok.  Giwacho niya, ‘Dipo ka oyondhe,mi omoko, kendo wachulone kuor. ’ 11To in Ruoth Nyasaye, in koda, itek,kendo iduong’, omiyo joma sanda biro chwanyore, kendo ok ginyal gimoro. Wigi biro kuot malich, nikech ok gibi loyo.  Wichkuotgino nosik nyakachieng’, kendo wich ok nowilgo.  12In Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutoimiyo ji tem makare, kendo inono chunygi gi parogi.  Omiyo yie ichulnakuor kuom wasika, nimar aketo wechena duto e lweti.
"Weruru ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo pakeuru, nikech osereso joma ithiro elwet joma timbegi richo.

Mad owinj kaji ywagore malit gokinyi, kendo owinj tung’ lweny godiechieng’tir, 17nikech ne ok onega kapok onywola.  Kamano dine oyika ei mama, miok dine onywola.  18Ere gima omiyo ne onywola mana ni mondo ane lit gimasira, kendo atho mana gi wichkuot?"JEREMIA 21Jeremia okoro wach ni Jerusalem ibiro kethi1Ruoth Zedekia nooro Pashur wuod Malkia kod Zefania wuod Maaseya jadoloir Jeremia kokwaye niya,

. "Yie ipenjnwaRuoth Nyasaye wach, nikech Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon kedo kodwa.  Dipoka Ruoth Nyasaye otimonwa hono moro kaka ne ojatimo, mi ochunNebukadnezar mondo owewa. "3Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremia, mi Jeremia nowacho ni jootego 4nimondo onyis Zedekia ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel owacho niya,"Jolweny ma konyo Zedekia kedo gi ruodh Babulon gi joge mag lwenymolworo ohinga mar Jerusalem abiro dwoko ei dala, kendo abiro dhurogikgi mag lweny pidhe pidhe e chuny dala.  5An awuon abiro kedo kodu kaiya owang’, kendo ka an gi mirima mager.  6Abiro nego ji duto modakdalani.  Tuo marach biro nego ji kaachiel gi jamni.  7To Zedekia ruodhJuda gi jodonge kod jodalani duto ma otony e lweny, kendo otony e kechgi tuo, abiro keto e lwet ruoth Nebukadnezar, kendo e lwet wasikgi madwaro negogi.  Nebukadnezar biro negogi, kendo ok obi weyogi kata kechogikata timonigi ng’wono.  An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kamano!"8Ruoth Nyasaye ne ochako owacho ni Jeremia mondo onyis ji kama: "Winjuruan Ruoth Nyasaye aketonu yore ariyo mondo uyier achiel kuomgi.  Achiel endhi e ngima, to machielo en dhi e tho.  9Ng’ato ang’ata modong’Jerusalem, lweny kata kech kata tuo noneg, to ng’ato ang’ata modhiochiwore e lwet jo-Babulon ma koro monjo dalani, ok nonegi.  To enoresmana ngimane kende.  10Aseng’ado wach ni ok anyal weyo dalani, to nyakaakethe.  Ibiro kete e lwet ruodh Babulon, kendo obiro wang’e morum pep. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano!"Weche mokor kuom ruodhi mag Juda11"In Jeremia, nyis jood ruodh Juda ma nyikwa ruoth Daudi mondo owinjgima Ruoth Nyasaye owacho.  12Timuru gik makare pile.  Konyuru ng’at maithiro e lwet joma thire, ka ok kamano, to timbeu maricho biro wang’oiya, ka mach ma ok nyal negi.  13Un jo-Jerusalem, dalau obet e bath holnimana ka lwanda mogingore e pap.  To an Ruoth Nyasaye abiro kedo kodu. Uwacho ni onge ng’at ma nyalo monjou kata ma nyalo mwomo ohingau.  14Toan Ruoth Nyasaye abiro kumou mana maromre gi kethou.  Abiro wang’o odruodhu gi mach ma nowang’ gik moko duto machiegni kode.  An Ruoth Nyasayeema awacho kamano. "JEREMIA 221Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Dhiyo e od ruodh Juda ma nyakwarDaudi, 2mondo iwachne, kaachiel gi jodonge kod joge madonjo edhorangeyegi, ni Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama: 3An Ruoth Nyasaye awachonuni mondo utim gik makare kendo madier.  Konyuru ng’at ma ithiro e lwetjoma thire.  Kik usand kata kik uthir jodak gi nyithi kiye kod mondliete, bende kik uneg joma onge ketho kama oyangnani.  4Ka utimo kakaawachono to nyikwa Daudi nodhi mana nyime ka bedo ruodhi, kendo ginkaachiel gi jodonggi kod jogi gibiro siko ka gidonjo e dhoranga odruoth, ka giidho geche mag lweny kod farese.  5Math
.
; Luka
.
. Toka ok urito wechego, to akuong’oranu ni od ruodhuni biro lokore gunda. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Od ruodh Juda berna mana ka piny Gilead, kendo ka got Lebanon, to katakamano abiro loke thim, kama onge ng’at madakie.  7Abiro oro ji mondookethe.  Giduto gibiro biro gi ledhi, mi ging’ad yiend sida duto mabeyomogerego, mi giwiti e mach.  8Bang’e achien, jopinje mamoko nobed kakadho kanyo, kendo ginipenjre kendgi ni, ‘Ere gimomiyo Ruoth Nyasayeosetimo gima chal kama ni dala maduong’ni?’ 9Eka nodwokgi niya, ‘Manoosetimore nikech jogi oseweyo singruok mane Nyasachgi otimo kodgi, migilamo nyiseche mamoko kendo gitiyonigi. ’
"Jo-Juda, kik uywag ruoth Josia, ma koro osethoni, to ywaguru wuode maShalum, nikech osetere e piny moro, kendo ok noduogi, bende ok ochak onepiny mane onywolee.

W. Nda
.

. To nikech RuothNyasaye osewuoyo kuom Shalum wuod Josia mane obet ruodh Juda kar wuonmare kowacho niya, ‘Osea ka chuth, kendo ok noduogi.  12Enotho e piny magiseteree, kendo ok nochak one pinyni. ’
"En gima lit manadi kuom ng’at ma gero od gorofa e yor miganga kendoka miyo jowetene tiyo kayiem, to ok migi misara.  14En gima lit manadikuom ng’at mawacho ni obiro gero ot marang’ongo man gi udi madongo malo. Bang’e oketne dirise mi ochwade gi yiend sida, kendo owire gi rangemaber.  15Bende gero ut sida mabeyo moloyo mag jomoko nyalo nyiso ni inruoth adier?"Wuoru nodak maber.  Pile ne en ng’at makare kendo jaadiera, omiyo gikmoko duto mane otimo ne odhi maber.  16Ne oyalo jochan kare, omiyo gigeduto nodhi maber.  Gik ma kamago ema nyiso ni ng’ato ong’eyo RuothNyasaye.  17In to ineno mana gigi iwuon.  Inego joma onge ketho, kendoithiro jogi gi gero.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "

. Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye wuoyo kuomJehoyakim wuod Josia, ma ruodh Juda niya, "Onge ng’ama noywage, kawachoni, ‘Yaye Ruoth! Thoni lit manadi!’ 19Noywaye mi wite oko e dhorangaJerusalem, mana ka punda motho.  20Un jo-Jerusalem, dhiuru e got Lebanon,mondo ukogi, kendo dhiuru e piny Bashan mondo uywagi.  Ywaguru gie godemag Abarim, nikech joma uriworugo oselo.  21Nawuoyo kodu kapod udhimaber, to ne utamoru winjo.  Adier, usiko kutamoru luora chakretindou.  22Jotendu, yamo ema biro tero.  Joma uriworugo ibiro kawo mi tere tuech.  Bang’e unuyud wichkuot kendo nog’eng’u nikech timbeumaricho.  23Un joma odak Lebanon, moloso kuonde dakgi e yiend sida,unuywag manade ka rem malit ka rem mar muoch ochopo kuomu!"

Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jekonia wuodJehoyakim ma ruodh Juda niya, "An Nyasaye mangima akuong’ora ni kata kainie tere manie lweta ma korachwich to pod dawuodhi oko, 25mi achiwi nijoma iluoro madwaro negi, kata mana e lwet Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulonkod joge mag lweny.  26Abiro witi kaachiel gi meru, e piny moro mane okonyuolue, kendo unutho kuno uduto.  27Ok unuduog e pinyu muheroni. "28Jeremia nowacho niya, "Uparo ni Jekonia en agulu motho, mowit oko, mang’ato ok dwar koso? Ka ok kamano, to ere gima omiyo owite kaachiel ginyithinde e piny ma ok ong’eyo?
"Yaye, piny, piny! Winjuru wach Ruoth Nyasaye.  30Ng’atni okuong’,omiyo enotho maonge nyathi.  En ng’at ma ok nyal dhi nyime maber. Nyikwaye ok nobed ruodhi mag Juda ka Daudi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano. "JEREMIA 23Ji manok ema noduogi1"Enobed malich manade kuom jotelo ma weyo joga inego kendo ikeyo.  2AnRuoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel awuoyo kuom jotelo mane onego rit joganiya, ‘Usekeyo joga, mi uriembo, bende ok useritogi maber.  Koro abirokumou nikech gik maricho ma usetimo.  3Abiro choko joga modong’, kagolo epinje duto mane akeyogie, kendo nadwokgi e pinygi.  Gininywol nyithindomang’eny mi ginya.  4Anaketnigi jotelo ma noritgi maber, mi onge gimanobwoggi kata ma nomi gibed maluor, bende onge ng’ato kuomgi ma noyudkolal.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. ’
Jer
.
-
. "Ndalo biro ma nayierie nyakwar Daudi hie mondo obedruoth.  Enorit piny gi rieko, kotimo gik ma owinjore kendo makare epiny.  6E ndalo lochne, jo-Juda nodag gi kue, kendo jo-Israel bende nodagmaonge ng’ama chandogi.  Ginichak ruodhno ni ‘Ruoth Nyasaye ma resowa. ’ "
"An Ruoth Nyasayye awacho niya, ‘Ndalo biro ma onge ng’ama nokuong’regi nyinga ka Nyasaye mangima mane ogolo jo-Israel e piny Misri, 8toginikuongre gi nyinga mana ka Nyasaye mangima mane ogolo jo-Israel epiny man nyandwat, kendo e pinje mamoko duto mane asekeyogie.  Bang’e ekaginidag e pinygi giwegi. ’ "Nyasaye okwedo jonabi ma jomriambo9Jeremia nowuoyo kuom jonabi niya,"Chunya ool morumo, kendo atetni. Achal gi ng’at momer,mosemadho kong’o mang’eny,mana nikech Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo nikech wechene maler. "10Joma oseweyo Ruoth Nyasaye opong’o piny.  Timbegi richo, kendogikonyore gi tekogi e yo marach.  Piny ywak kendo lege otwo nikechosekuong’gi. 11Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Timbe jonabi gi timbe jodolo ok ler. Asejukogi ka gitimo richo kata mana e Hekalu mara! 12Yore ma giluwo birobedo mapothpoth kendo motimo mudho.  Abiro miyo gichwanyre kendo gipodhi,nikech abiro kelo masira kuomgi chieng’ makumogie.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano.
"Aseneno ni jonabi mag Samaria gin joma ofuwo.  Ne gikoro weche e nyingBaal, mi gimiyo joga Israel olal.  14Chak
.
; Ezek
.
. To bendeaseneno ka jonabi mag Jerusalem timo mana gik mamono.  Giterore, to kendogiwacho miriambo, bende gijiwo joma timo richo, omiyo onge ng’ama nyaloweyo timbene maricho.  Giduto gichalna gi jo-Sodom gi jo-Gomora.  15Kuommano, an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, awuoyo kuom jonabi magJerusalem, ni abiro miyogi alode makech mondo gicham, kod pi motimokwiri mondo gimodhi, nikech giselando weche makwedo Nyasaye e pinygiduto. "16Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho ji jo-Jerusalem niya, "Kikuwinj gima jonabi wachonu, nikech gimiyo ugeno kuom gik ma ok bi timore. Ginyisou gik ma giparo apara giwegi, to ok gik ma an emaawacho.  17Gisiko ka giwacho ni ji motamore winjo wachna niya, ‘Gik mokoduto biro dhinu maber. ’ Bende giwacho ni joma wigi tek ni masira oknomakgi.  18To onge kata ng’ato achiel kuom jonabigo moseng’eyo wechemopondo mag Ruoth Nyasaye.  Bende onge ng’ato kuomgi mosewinjo katamoseng’eyo wechne, kata mana mosechiko ite kuom gik ma an Ruoth Nyasayeawacho.  19Mirimba chalo gi ahiti maduong’ ma biro utho joricho.  20Ok obirumo kapok otieko timo gik ma adwaro.  E ndalo mabiro un joga ubirong’eyo tiend wechegi duto malong’o!"21Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "An, ne ok aoro jonabgo, to ne girikniarika ka gidhi.  Bende ne ok amiyogi wach moro, to pod ne giwuoyo mana enyinga! 22Ka dine ging’e parona mopondo, to dine gilando wachna ni jogamondo owe yoregi gi timbegi maricho.
"An, an Nyasaye man kuonde duto, to ok man kanyachiel kende.  24Ongeng’ama nyalo pondo kamoro ma ok anyal nene.  Donge ung’eyo ni an, ankuonde duto, e polo kendo e piny.  25Asewinjo weche mag miriambo majonabigo osehulo e nyinga ka giwacho ni giseleko, mi giyudo wach moakuoma.  26Koro jonabigo biro wuondo joga gi miriambo ma giparo aparanyaka karang’o?.  27Giparo ni lek ma giwachogo biro miyo wi joga wil kodakaka wi kweregi nowil koda, modok ni Baal.  28Janabi ma oseleko lek,onego owach ni en mana lek, to janabi moseyudo wachna onego ohulwachnano kare.  Koso mihudhi gi cham yande chalre? 29Wachna chalo gi machkendo chalo gi nyundo ma baro lwanda matindotindo.  An Ruoth Nyasaye emaawacho kamano.  30Amon gi jonabi ma kawo weche jowetegi, kendo hulokagima gin wechena.  31Bende amon gi jonabi ma wacho wechegi giwegi, towuondore ni wechego oa kuoma.  32Winjuru gima awacho, an Ruoth Nyasaye!Amon gi jonabi mahulo lek mag miriambo, nimar giwito joga kod sungagi gilekgigo.  Ne ok aorogi, bende ne ok achikogi mondo gidhi gitim kamano,omiyo onge gima gikonyogo jogagi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho. "
"In Jeremia, ka ng’ato kuom joga kata kuom jonabi kata kuom jodoloopenji wach moa kuoma, kowacho niya, ‘Ere ting’ mapek moa kuom RuothNyasaye,’ to wachne ni, ‘Un e ting’ mapek ma Ruoth Nyasaye nigo, kendoobiro witou. ’ 34To kapo ni janabi kata jadolo kata achiel kuom jogiomulo wechego, kawacho niya, ‘Wach mapek moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye,’ toanakume kaachiel gi joode.  35Kar mulo wechego to ng’ato ka ng’ato mondoopenj osiepene kaachiel gi jowetene niya, ‘Ere kaka Ruoth odwokowa?’Kata ni, ‘Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho nang’o?’ 36To kik gichak gimul weche mawacho ni, ‘Wach Ruoth Nyasaye en ting’ mapek,’ nikmech ka ng’atoomulogi, to anami wachna bedne mapek adier! Ji oseketho weche Nyasachgi,ma Nyasaye mangima, kendo ma Ruoth Nyasaye anyalo Gik Moko Duto.
"Jeremia, in ema nyaka ipenj jonabi niya, ‘Ere kaka Ruoth Nyasayenodwokou? Nowacho nang’o?’ 38To ka giwacho niya, ‘Wach Ruoth Nyasaye enting’ mapek,’ to iwachnigi ni, abiro ting’ogi mi awitgi kuma bor, nikechgisemulo weche mane akwerogi ni kik gimul.  39Gibiro lal e wang’a,kaachiel gi dala maduong’ mane amiyogi gi kweregi.  40Abiro miyogiwichkuot mochwere kod achaya ma wich ok nowilgo. "JEREMIA 24Ngech ng’owo mabeyo kod ng’owo maricho1

Ruoth Nyasaye ne onyisa atonge ariyomoting’o ng’owo, koket e nyim Hekalu, mano notimore kane Nebukadnezarruodh Babulon osetero Jekonia wuod Jehoyakim ma ruodh Juda e tuechBabulon, kaachiel gi jotend Juda gi jotheth kod joma olony e tichlwedo.  2Atonga achiel noting’o ng’owo mabeyo machiek atamalo, to atongamachielo noting’o ng’owo maricho ma ok nyal cham.  3Bang’ mano, RuothNyasaye nopenja niya, "Jeremia, ang’o mineno?" Ne adwoke ni, "Anenong’owo, ma moko kuomgi beyo ahinya to moko richo ahinya ma ok nyalcham. "4Eka ne Ruoth Nyasaye owachona niya,
"An Ruoth Nyasaye ma NyasachIsrael akwano joma ne oter e tuech Babulon ka ng’owo mabeyogo, kendoabiro guedhogi.  6Abiro ritogi maber, kendo anaduoggi e pinyni.  Abirogerogi, kendo ok namukgi.  Abiro pidhogi, kendo ok napudhgi.  7Anamigichuny mar ng’eyo ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye.  Bang’e ginibed joga, kendoanabed Nyasachgi, nikech giniduog ira gi chunygi duto.
"To Zedekia ruodh Juda gi jodonge kod jo-Jerusalem mamoko dutomosedong’ kae, kata mosedhi Misri, abiro kwano mana ka ng’owo maricho maok nyal chamgo! 9Abiro kelo kuomgi masira malich ma nomi ogendini dutobed maluor.  Ji nobed ka ngerogi, kendo tugo kodgi.  Bende ji nochargi,kendo noluong nyinggi ka gima okuong’ kuonde duto ma akeyogie.  10Anakelkuomgi lweny gi kech kod tuo, nyaka chop girum pep e piny mane amiyogigi kweregi. . E higa mar ang’wen mar lochJehoyakim wuod Josia ma ruodh Juda, Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo gi Jeremiakuom jo-Juda.  Mano ne higa mokwongo mar loch Nebukadnezar ruodhBabulon.  2Jeremia janabi nonyiso jo-Juda kaachiel gi jo-Jerusalem dutoniya,
"Kuom higni piero ariyo gadek, chakre higa mar apar gadek marloch Josia wuod Amon ruodh Juda nyaka chil kawuono, Ruoth Nyasayeosebedo kawuoyo koda, kendo asetimo kinda kanyisou gik mowacho, to okusedewo.  4Ruoth Nyasaye bende osetimo kinda kaoronu jotichne ma jonabi,to ok usewinjo, kendo ok usedewo.  5Jonabigo ne nyisou mondo uwe yoreu gitimbeu maricho, eka udag e piny mane Ruoth Nyasaye omiyou kaachiel gikwereu ka mwanduu mosiko.  6Ne gikwerou ni kik uti ni nyiseche mamoko,kendo kik ulamgi.  Bende ni kik umi Ruoth Nyasaye mirima kuom lamo kidomanono muloso uwegi.  Ka da bed ni ne uluoro Ruoth Nyasaye, to dine okokumou.  7To Ruoth Nyasaye owuon wacho ni udagi winjo wachne, kendo karluore to ne umiye mana mirima gi kido manono mane uloso, mi un uwegi emaumiyo okumou.
"Emomiyo, kaka ne udagi winjo wechene, Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto wacho niya,
‘Abiro kelo ogendini duto moa yo nyandwat, kendo abirokelo jatichna Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon.  Ogendinigo biro kedo gi pinynikod joma odakie kendo gibiro kedo gi ogendini duto modak machiegni. Abiro tiekogi chuth, mi piny biro dong’ nono malich, mabwogo ji, kendoma ji chayo.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.  10Jer

.
. Pinyni duto biro dong’nono, kendo nobed gima lich mabwogo ji.  Ogendini duto nobed ka tiyo niruodh Babulon kuom higni piero abiriyo.  12To bang’ mano, anakum ruodhBabulon kaachiel gi joge kuom richogi.  Anaketh pinygi, mi osik kokethorenyaka chieng’.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.  13Abiro kelo niogandano kum duto ma asesiemogigo, tiende ni gik moko duto mondik ekitabuni.  Gin gik mane Jeremia osewacho kuom ogendinigi.  14Ogendinimang’eny kod ruodhi madongo nolokgi wasumbini, kendo abiro chulonigikuor kuom timbegi. ’ "Masira mabiro mako ogendini15Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel nowacho niya, "Ma e kikombe mopong’ gimirimba.  Kawe mondo imi ogendini duto ma aori irgi omadhe.  16Kagisemadhe, to gibiro kwang’ kendo neko biro makogi nikech lweny ma abirokelonigi. "17Omiyo ne agamo kikombe e lwet Ruoth Nyasaye, mi amiyo ogendini dutomane oora irgi omadhe.  18Ogendini mane omi omadhego ne gin jo-Jerusalemkaachiel gi joma odak e miech Juda, kod ruodhigi gi jotendgi.  Ne omigimadhe mondo gin gi pinygi gilokre gima owe ma ji chayo, kendo gimalich mabwogogi.  Bang’e nyinggi nobed gima ikuong’ogo ji.  Kamano e kakapod ochal nyaka chil kawuono. 19Jomoko ma bende ne omi omadho kikombe mar ngimano e magi: Farao ruodhMisri gi jotende kod jodonge, gi jo-Misri duto, 20Kaachiel gi jopinjemamoko modak kuomgi, gi ruodhi duto mag piny Uz, gi ruodhi duto magmiech Filistia, ma Ashkelon gi Gaza gi Ekron kod dir Ashdodmodong’, 21gi jo-Edom gi jo-Moab kod jo-Amon duto, 22gi ruodhi duto magpinje mae dhonam Mediterania, 23gi mier mag Dedan gi Tema kod Buz giogendini duto ma timgi en tito yie wigi, 24gi ruodhi duto mag pinyArabia, gi ruodhi duto mag ogendini modak e thim, 25gi ruodhi duto magZimri gi Elam kod media, 26kaachiel gi ruodhi duto mag pinje man yonyandwat, kuonde maboyo gi machiegnni duto. Jopinjego duto ne omi omadho kikombeno.  Bang’e mogik, ruodh Babulon biromadhe. 27Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Nyis ji ni an Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto kendo Nyasach Israel, achikogi mondo gimethi, mi gimerkendo ging’ogi nyaka gipodh piny ma ok ginyal kata chung’, nikech lwenyma abiro kelonigi.  28To ka gidagi kawo kikombeno e lweti mondo gimadhi,to nyisgi ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko duto owacho ni nyakgimadhe! 29Dala ma abiro kuongo kumo en mana dalani.  Koso giparo ni nawemak akumogi? Ooyo, abiro kumogi mak orem, nikech abiro kelo lweny kuomji duto modak e piny.  An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema awachokamano.
"To in Jeremia,nyaka ihul weche duto ma asewacho,kinyiso ji niya,‘Ruoth Nyasaye ruto gie polo. Ee, owuoyo gie polo malo. Oruto korogo joge,kendo okok ka ng’ama biyo mzabibu,kendo ji duto modak e piny winje. 31Dwonde winjore e tung’ piny duto,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye yalo ogendini. Ee, oyalo ji duto,kendo ong’ado ni joricho buch tho. ’ "32Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho niya, "Masira biro makoogendini duto moro ka moro, kendo ahiti maduong’ chokore e tung’ pinykuma bor.  33Chieng’no ringre joma Ruoth Nyasaye onego nokere, chakretung’ piny konchiel nyaka komachielo, kendo onge ng’ama noywaggi.  Oknokaw ringregi mondo oyiki, to gining’ielre ang’iela e lowo ka owuoyomiolo e puothe.
"Ywaguru un jotelo! Ywaguru matek! Ywaguru kendo bukreuru gi buru,nikech kinde minegoue osechopo, kendo ibiro negou ka imbe machwe.  35Oknobedie yo moro ma jotelo nyalo tonygo.  36Giywak kendo gigoyo uwi ka gingi lit, nimar Ruoth Nyasaye oseketho pinygi, 37kendo miechgi mane nigikue osedoko gundni nikech mirimbe mager.  38Ruoth Nyasaye oseweyo jogemana ka sibuor ma oweyo gonde.  Timbe malich mag lweny osemiyo mirimbRuoth Nyasaye mager oloko pinyni thim. "JEREMIA 26Osiem Jeremia gi tho1

. Kane Jehoyakim wuod Josia odoko ruodhJuda, 2Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jeremia niya, "Dhiyo ichung’ e laru marHekalu mondo inyis joma odak e miech Juda ma biro lemo e Hekalu weche maasenyisi.  Kik iwe kata wach achiel makinyisogi.  3Kamoro dipo ka jiowinjo wechego, mi ng’ato ka ng’ato oweyo timbene maricho.  Ka giweyotimbegi maricho kamano, to analok parona kuom masira mane adwaro kelokuomgi.
"Iniwachnigi ni, An Ruoth Nyasaye asewacho ni nyaka uluora, kuluwochike mane anyisou.  5Asetimo kinda ka aoro jotichna ma jonabi mondoowachnu wechena, to ok usedewo gik ma giwacho.  6Josh

;Jer
.
