"Wuod dhano,kaw luth moro, indikie ni, ‘Jo-Juda’, eka ichak ikaw luth machielo,indikoe ni, ‘Jo-Israel ma nyikwa Josef, kata nyikwa Efraim. ’ 17Koro riwludhe ariyogo e lueti, mondo onenre ka luth achiel.  18To ka jou openjimondo inyisgi tiend gima itimono, 19to dwokgi ni an Ruoth Nyasaye awachoni abiro kawo luth mochung’ kar jo-Israel, mi ariw gi luth mochung’ karjo-Juda.  Kamano anariwgi gibed luth achiel ma amako e lweta.
"Ka isemako ludhego e lueti, mi ji duto onenogi, 21to nyisgi ni anRuoth Nyasaye awacho ni abiro choko jo-Israel, kagolo kuom ogendini maneokegie, mi adwokgi e pinygi giwegi.  22Anariwgi mondo gibed oganda achiele piny gode mag Israel.  Ginibed gi ruoth achiel maritogi, bende okginichak gipogre ogendini ariyo, kata pinje ariyo.  23Ok ginichakgidwanyre gi nyiseche manono kendo makuero, bende ok ginindhogre giricho.  Anaresgi, kagologi e yore duto mag richo koda ka mago magindhogago.  Anapwodhgi, mi gibed joga, kendo anabed Nyasachgi. 24Jatichna Daudi ema nobed ruodhgi.  Kamano giduto giniriwre e bwo ruothachiel, mi gimak chikena.  25Ginidag e piny mane amiyo Jakobo jatichna. En e piny mane kweregi odakie.  Ginidag kuno kaachiel gi nyithingdi kodnyikwagi nyaka chieng’, kendo jatichna Daudi nobed ruodhgi mochwere. 26Abiro timo kodgi singruok mochwere makelonigi kue.  Anami gimedre, miaket Hekaluna e pinygi, kendo nobed kuno nyaka chieng’.  27Anadag kodgikanyo, mi abed Nyasachgi, kendo gibed joga.  28Ka aketo Hekaluna kanyomondo obed e kindgi nyaka chieng’, eka ogendini nong’e ni an, RuothNyasaye, ema aseyiero jo-Israel obed joga awuon. "Ezekiel 38Wach mokor kuom Gog1Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo koda mowachona niya,
"Wuod dhano, chung’ kichomoGog, modak e piny Magog.  En ruoth maduong’ mar ogendini mag Meshek kodTubal.  Kwede, 3kinyise ni an Ruoth Nyasaye awachone kama: In Gog, anjasiki.  4Abiro mbedo dhogi gi mbedo, mi awichi, kendo aywayi okokaachiel gi jogi duto mag lweny.  Ogandani mar lweny, kod farese gi joidhfarese morwakore gi lep lweny, ng’eny ahinya.  Jalweny ka jalweny omanoregi kuode kod liganglane.  5Jo-Persia gi jo-Ethiopia kod jo-Libya ni kodi. Giduto bende giting’o kuodi, kendo gisidho konde mag lweny.  6Jolwenyduto moa e piny Gomer, kendo e piny Beth-togarma man yo nyandwat kumabor, ni kodi, kaachiel gi ji mang’eny moa kuom ogendini mamoko.  7In Gog,anyisi mondo iikri, kaachiel gi jogi mag lweny.  8Bang’ higni mathoth,kinde nochopi ma ananyisie mondo imonj piny moro ma ji osebet kodakie gikue maonge lweny, chakre ndalo mane oduoggie, kigologi kuom ogendinimang’eny.  Inimonj gode mag Israel mane oselokore thim, kendo mane owekokethore chon, to koro ji duto odakie gi kue.  9In gi jogi mag lweny,kod ogendini mang’eny man kodi, numonj pinyno mana ka yamb ahiti, kendounuume mana ka rumbi. "10Ruoth Nyasaye nomedo wacho ni Gog niya, "Ka kindeno ochopo, to inibedgi paro marach.  11Iniwach e chunyi niya, ‘We adhi amonj piny kama jiodakie mos gi kueno.  En gi mier ma ok ochiel gi ohinga, kendo maonge gidhorangeye molor matek. ’ 12Eka in idhi iyak kendo ipe gik mantie, kendoinimonj kuonde mane okethore chon, to tinde ji odakie.  Gin joma neosechoki kigolo kuom ogendini mamoko, ma koro nigi jamni kod mwandumamoko.  Pinygi nie dier pinje madongo.  13Jo-Sheba gi jo-Dedan kod johalamag miech Tarshish biro penji kama: ‘Isechoko jogi mag lweny, idhigokoso?’
"Kuom mano, wuod dhano, dhiyo inyis Gog ni an Ruoth Nyasaye awachonekama: ‘E kinde ma joga Israel odakie gi kueno, 15to iniwuogi ia thuru yonyandwat kuma bor.  Inibi ka in gi oganda lweny maduong’ maratego moakuom ogendini mathoth.  Giduto ginibi ka giidho farese.  16Ununur kuomjoga Israel, mana ka rumbi maumo piny.  Ka kindeno ochopo, anaori mondoimonj pinya, to gima natimni nonyis ogendini ni an Ng’ama Ler, miging’eya, yaye Gog! 17In e ng’at mane awuoyo kuome chon kane aorojotichna ma jonabi mag Israel mondo owach pile ni e ndalo mabiro anakelng’ato mondo omonj Israel. ’ An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "18Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho bende niya, "Chieng’ ma Gog nomonjie Israel,mirima mager nomaka.  19Awacho ka akecho ahinya ni chieng’no piny Israelnoyiengni malich.  20Rech duto manie nam, gi winy manie kor polo, kod lemae thim gi gik mamol piny, kaachiel gi dhano duto mae piny notetni enyima.  Gode nomukre, kendo hohni bende noruombre piny, kendo ohingniduto nopodhi.
"Anabwog Gog gi masiche mopogore opogore.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano.  Joge noked kendgi ng’ato gi ng’ato.  22Anakume gi tuoche kod nek. Bende anahon koth mang’ongo gi pe madongo gi mach kod kite maliel kuome,kendo kuom joge mag lweny kod ogendini mathoth man kode.  23Mano e yo maananyisgo ogendini duto ni aduong’ kendo aler.  Eka gining’e ni an eRuoth Nyasaye. "Ezekiel 391Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Wuod dhano, kwed Gog, ruoth maduong’ marogendini mag Meshek kod Tubal, kinyise ni an Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kama:Gog, an jasiki.  2Abiro wichi, mi agoli yo nyandwat kuma bor nyaka chopibi e gode mag Israel.  3Eka anago atung’i e badi ma koracham, kod asernie badi korachwich, mi lwar piny.  4In Gog, kod ogandani mar lwenykaachiel gi ogendini makonyi, ubiro tho e gode mag Israel, kendo anamikit winy duto gi ondiegi cham ringreu.  5Adier, unutho mana oko e pap.  AnRuoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Abiro moko mach e piny Magog kod dhonembe duto ma ji odakie gi kue, ming’ato nong’e ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye.  7Anami joga Israel ng’e nyingamaler, kendo ok nawe nyinga chak kethre.  Eka ogendini nong’e ni an RuothNyasaye an Ng’ama Ler mar Israel. "8Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho niya, "Chieng’ ma awuoyo kuomeno biro biromak orem.  An ema asewacho kamano.  9Bang’e joma odak e miech Israel nodhimondo ochok gi-lweny mojwang’, mondo obed yien ma gichwako.  Kuodi giokumbni, kod aserni gi atunge, kaachiel gi arunge kod tonge ma gichokonobed yien moromogi chwako kuom higni abiriyo.  10Ok ginidhi e thim mondogimoti, kata dhi e bungu mondo gitong’ yien, nikech ginibed ka gichwakogi-lweny mojwang’go.  Ginipe kendo giniyak jogo mane opeyogi kendooyakogi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "11Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho kendo niya, "Chieng’ ma gigo duto otimore toanami Gog kar yik e Israel, e holo miluongo ni, Holo Jowuoth, man yowuokchieng ma yo Nam Kado.  Gog kod jolwenje duto noyik kanyo, kendoholono noluong ni Holo mar Oganda Jolwenj Gog.  12Jo-Israel notiek duecheabiriyo ka yiko ringre joma otho duto, mondo gichak gipuodh pinygikendo.  13Ng’ato ka ng’ato modak e pinyno noyikgi, kendo mano nomi giyudduong’, chieng’ ma alocho.  An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kamano.
"Ka dueche abiriyogo oserumo, to noyier ji ma nosiki ka wuotho e pinymondo oyik ringre joma otho ma giyudo ka pod oriere ewi lowo.  Kamanomondo gipuodh piny obed maler.  15Ka giwuotho e piny koni gi koni tokinde duto ma giyudoe chok dhano to giniket ranyisi e bathe mondo kajokunyo obiro, to mondo oyike e Holo Oganda Jolwenj Gog.  16Kamano pinynochak opwodhi. " (Nitie dala moro machiegni gi kanyo mochak nyingeoganda jolwenjno. )
Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho niya, "Wuod dhano, nyis winy duto kodondiegi duto man kuonde duto ni awachonigi kama: Biuru mondo uchammisango ma adwaro timonu.  Obiro bet sawo maduong’ ahinya ewi gode magIsrael, kuma ubiro chamoe ring’o kendo madhoe remo.  18Adier, ubiro chamoringre jolweny, kendo ubiro madho remb ruodhi mag piny.  Giduto ginibednuka imbe gi nyirombe gi diek gi ruedhi machwe mag Bashan mitimogomisango.  19Ka anego jogo ka misango kamano, to un winy kod ondiegi,unucham boche, mi uyieng’ kendo umadh remo mi umer.  20E mesana tounuchamie farese gi joidhgi kod thuondi gi jolweny mamoko duto nyakauyieng’.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "Gueth ma ibiro guedhogo Israel21Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Abiro miyo ogendini neno duong’na maler,kendo ka asekumo ji duto matek, to gibiro ng’eyo kaka ang’ado bura kare. 22Chakre kanyo jo-Israel nong’e ni an e Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi,23kendo ogendini mamoko nong’e ni ne oter jo-Israel e tuech nikech richomane gitimo ka giweya.  Ne ajwang’ogi e lwet wasikgi, kendo aweyo githogiduto e lweny.  24Ne atimonigi maromre gi dwanyruokgi kod timbegimamono, mi alokonigi ng’eya. "25Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho niya, "Koro abiro kecho jo-Israel manyikwa Jakobo, mi ami gichak gidhi nyime maber, kendo ok nayie nyingamaler kethre.  26Ka gichako gidak gi kue e pinygi giwegi, ka onge ng’amabwogogi, to ok ginipar wichkuot mane giyudo kuom ndhok mane gindhogago. 27Anaduoggi, kagologi e pinje duto mag wasikgi mondo anyis ogendinimang’enygo ni an Nyasaye Maler 28Eka joga nong’e ni an e Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasachgi, nikech ne aterogi e tuech, to koro achokogi kaduogogi epinygi giwegi ma ok aweyo kata achiel chien.  29Anapong’ jo-Israel giRoho mara, mi ok nachak awegi kendo.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano. "Ezekiel 40Ezekiel oneno Hekalu manyien e fweny1Due apar mar higa manyien, ma en higa mar apar gang’wen bang’ kawoJerusalem, kane wasetieko higni piero ariyo gabich e tuech, ne awinjo kateko mar Ruoth Nyasaye obiro kuoma, mi oting’a.  2Ne aneno e fweny kaNyasaye otera e piny Israel, moketa ewi got mabor.  Kuno ne anenoe udimochokore kanyachiel e nyima, machalo dala.  3Ruoth Nyasaye ne oteramachiegni gi udigo, mi apo kaneno ng’at moro marieny ka mula.  Ne ochung’e dhorangach, koting’o tol mipimogo gik moko, kod rapim mar bao e lwete. 4Ng’atno nowachona niya, "Wuod dhano, rang maber, kendo chik itimalong’o, mondo iwinj weche duto ma abiro wachoni, nimar mano ema omiyoosekeli ka.  Bang’e idhi inyis jo-Israel gimoro amora ma iseneno ka. "Rangach ma yo wuokchieng’ mar Hekalu5 Gima ne aneno ne en Hekalu, kendo ne nitie ohinga molwore.  Ng’at maneaseneno cha nogolo rapim mar bao ma borne mita adek, mi opimogo ohinga. Borne noromo mita adek to lach mar kore bende mita adek.  6Eka ng’atnonodhi e rangach ma yo wuokchieng’.  Ne oidho raidhi manie dhorangach, miopimo dhorangach, moyudo ni lachne modhi iye romo mita adek.  7E tokdhorangajno ne nitie yo ma ji kadhoe man gi udi mag rito adek e bathekoni gi konu.  To ot ka ot ne borne kod lachne mita adek maromre, kendolach mar kor ot mane ni e kindgi ne mita ariyo gi nus.  Kisekadho utritogo, to nitie yo madhi e ot maduong’ momanyore gi Hekalu.  Bor maryorno ne mita adek.  8Ng’atno nopimo odno, moyudo ni lachne modhi iyeoromo mita ang’wen.  Ne omakore gi dhorangach kendo en ema ne ochiegniemoloyo gi Hekalu.  9Lach mar kor ot mogik tung’ mar odno ne romo mitaachiel.  10Udi mag rito mane ni e bath yo koni gi koni ne romre duto,kendo korgi bende ne romre duto koni gi koni. 11Bang’e ng’atno nopimo lach mar dhorangach.  Ne oromo mita auchiel ginus, to kane thike oyaw, to lach kama idonjogo ne romo mita abich.  12Enyim od rito ka od rito ne nitie ohinga machiek ma borne modhi malo romonus mita.  Bor kod lach mar udigo ne mita adek adek maromre. 13Bang’e ng’atno nopimo lach mar rangach, chakre e kor ot ma katok odrito achiel gi ka iye nyaka kor ot ma katok ot machielo momanyore kode,monwang’o ni oromo mita apar gariyo gi nus.  14Ot mane ni tung’ mogik emanidonjogo e laru.  Ne opime, moyudo ni lachne mita apar.  15Bor duto maryo makadho e kind udino, chakre oko mar rangach nyaka bath ot mogiktung’ ne romo mita piero ariyo gabich.  16Ne nitie dirise matindotindo ekor udi maoko mag udi duto, kendo e kor udi maiye manie kind udi.  Korudi ma yo ka iye, momanyore gi yo makadho e kind udino ne ogorie yiendothidhe. Laru maoko17Ng’atno nokawa mokadho koda e dhorangach nyaka e laru moro.  Kuno nenitie udi piero adek momakore gi ohinga maoko, to e nyim udigo ne nitiekama ochanie kite mopamore 18molworo laruno duto.  To laru ma okono ne nipiny moloyo laru maiye. 19Ne nitie rangach moro moting’ore gi malo mane idonjogo e laru ma iye. Ng’atno nopimo kind rangach maiye gi maoko, mi oyudo ni bor mae kindgiromo mita piero abich. Rangach ma yo nyandwat20Bang’e ng’atno nodhi mopimo rangach ma yo nyandwat midonjogo e larumaoko.  21Udi mag rito adek mane ni e bath yo koni gi koni, kod kor udimane ni e kindgi, kaachiel gi ot maduong’, duto ne romre gi mago manenie rangach ma yo wuokchieng’.  Bor duto mar rangach gi utene ne mitapiero ariyo gabich, to lachne mita apar gariyo gi nus.  22Ot maduong’ koddirise gi kido mag yiend othidhe mane ogor, ne chalo gi mago manierangach ma yo wuok chieng’.  Kaeri bende ne nitie raidhi man gi ondembeabiriyo midhigo e dhorangach, kendo ot maduong’ ne ni tung’ mogik, kumaomanyore gi laru.  23Ne nitie rangach moro machielo midonjogo e larumaiye momanyore gi rangach maokono, mana kaka ne nitie e rangach ma yowuokchieng’.  Ng’atno nopimo bor manie kind rangach maoko gi maiyeno,moyudo ni oromo mita piero abich. Rangach ma yo milambo24Eka ng’atno notera yo milambo, mi kuno ne wanenoe rangach machielo.  Neopime moyudo ni oromre gi rangeye mamoko duto.  25Udi mag rangajno nenigi dirise mana kaka rangeye mamoko.  Bor duto mar rangajno bende nemita piero ariyo gabich, to lachne apar gariyo gi nus.  26Ne nitie raidhiman gi ondembe abiriyo madhi e dhorangajno, kendo ot maduong’ mane nikuno bende ne ni tung’ mogik, kama omanyore gi laru.  Ne ogor yiendothidhe e kor udi maiye momanyore gi yo makadho e kind udi.  27Kanyobende ne nitie rangach machielo midonjogo e laru maiye.  Ng’atno nopimobor mae kind rangeyego, moyudo ni oromo mita piero abich. Rangach ma yo milambo mar laru maiye28Ng’atno nokawa mokadho koda e dhorangach ma yo milambo, mi wachopo elaru maiye.  Ne opimo rangajno, moyudo ni orom gi rangeye mamoko.  29Udimage mag rito gi ode maduong’ kod kor ute maiye ne chalre gi mago maneni e rangeye mamoko.  30Bende udi mag rangeye ne nigi dirise.  Borne dutone mita piero ariyo gabich, to lachne mita apar gariyo gi nus.  31Ne engi ot maduong’ momakore gi laru mamoko.  Yiend othidhe bende ne ogor ekor udi momanyore gi yo makadho e kind udi.  Raidhi man gi ondembe aborone dhi nyaka e dhorangajno. Rangach ma yo wuokchieng’ mar laru maiye32Koro ng’atno nokawa mokadho koda e dhorangach ma yo wuokchieng’, miwachopo e laru maiye.  Eka ne opimo rangajno moyudo ni orom gi rangeyemamoko.  33Ute mag rito gi ode maduong’ kod kor udi maiye ne romre gimago mane ni e rangeye mamoko.  Ne nitie dirise kuonde duto, koda ka e otmaduong’.  Borne duto bende ne mita piero ariyo gabich, to lachne mitaapar gariyo gi nus.  34Ot maduong’ ne omanyore gi laru maoko, kendo yiendothidhe nogor e kor udi manie bath yo makadho e kind udi.  Raidhi man giondembe aboro ne dhi nyaka e dhorangajno. Rangach ma yo nyandwat mar laru maiye35Ng’atno nochako okawa motera e rangach ma yo nyandwat.  Ne opime,moyudo ni oromre gi mamoko.  36Dhorangajno bende ne nigi udi mag rito, gikor udi maiye mogor, gi ot maduong’, kod dirise kuonde duto.  Borne dutone mita piero ariyo gabich, to lachne mita apar gariyo gi nus.  37Otmaduong’no ne omanyore gi laru maoko, kendo yiend othidhe ne ogor e korudi manie bath yo makadho e kind udi.  Raidhi man gi ondembe aboro ne dhinyaka e dhorangajno. Udi man machiegni gi rangach ma yo nyandwat38E laru maoko ne nitie ot moro momakore gi rangach maiye, odno ne nigidhoot madonjo e ot maduong’ mane omanyore gi laru.  Kanyo ema ne ilwokoejamni monegi, midwaro timogo misenghni miwang’o pep.  39Ne nitie mesniang’wen ei ot maduong’no, ariyo e bath ot konchiel, kendo ariyo e bathekomachielo.  Ewi mesnigo ema ne inegoe jamni mitimogo misengni mopogoreopogoore, kaka misengni miwang’o pep, kod mag golo richo, kod magomipwodhogo richo mag gowi.  40To oko mar odno bende ne nitie mesniang’wen, ariyo e bath rangach ma yo nyandwat konchiel kendo, kendo ariyoe bathe komachielo.  41Kamano ne nitie mesni ang’wen e ot kendo ang’wenmamoko oko.  Omiyo giduto ne gin mesni aboro mane inegoe jamni mitimogomisengni.  42Mesni ang’wen mane ilosoe misengni miwang’o pep ne mag kitemopa.  Borgi modhi malo ne nus mita to borgi kod lachgi ne mita achielachiel maromre.  Gik moko duto mane itiyogo kuom yang’o jamni mitimogomisengni ne iketo ewi mesnigo.  43Ndiri ma lachne lwedo achiel ne oketmolworo bath mesa ka mesa.  Mesnigo ema ne iketoe ring’o duto maneitimogo misengni. 44E bath rangach ma yo nyandwat e laru maiye, ne nitie ot moro mochomoyo milambo.  Bende e bath rangach ma yo milambo ne nitie ot machielomachal gi mano mochomo yo nyandwat.  45Ng’atno nonyisa niya, "Ot momanyoyo milambono en mar jodolo matiyo e Hekalu, 46to ot mochomo yonyandwatno en mar jodolo matiyo e kendo-mar-misango.  Jodologo duto nyakabed jo-Lawi ma nyikwa Zadok.  Gin kende ema oyienigi dhiyoe nyim RuothNyasaye mondo gitine. "Laro ma iye kod Hekalu hie47Ng’atno nopimo laru maiye, mi oyudo ni oromo mita piero abich koni gikoni.  To e nyim Hekalu hie ne nitie kendo-mar-misango. 48Eka ng’atno nokawa, motera e ot ma e dhood Hekalu.  Ne opimo dhootmidonjogo ei Hekalu, mi oyudo ni borne oromo mita ariyo gi nus, tolachne mita abiriyo.  Lach mar kor udi mage ne romo mita achiel gi nuskoni gi koni.  49Bor mar ot mane ni e dhootno ne romo mita apar, tolachne mita auchiel.  Raidhi man gi ondembe apar ne nie dhoodno.  Bende ebath dhoot koni gi koni ne nitie siro achiel achiel. Ezekiel 411Bang’ mago duto, ng’atno notera e ot madiere mar Hekalu, miluongo niKama Ler.  Ne opimo yo midonjogo e odno, mi oyudo ni borne mita adek, 2tolachne mita abich, kendo lach mar kor ot mita ariyo gi nus koni gi koni. Eka ne opimo ot madiereno, moyudo ni borne romo mita piero ariyo, tolachne mita apar. 3Bang’ mano, nodhi e ot maiye man tung’ mogik.  Nopimo yo midonjogo,moyudo ni borne mita achiel, to lachne mita adek, kendo lach mar kor otne romo mita adek gi nus koni gi koni.  4Eka ne opimo odno, moyudo niborne gi lachne mita apar maromre.  Bang’ mano nowachona niya, "Odni eKama Ler Moloyo. "Udi momakore gi Hekalu5Ng’atno nopimo lach mar kor udi maoko mag Hekalu, moyudo ni oromo mitaadek.  Udi moko ma lachgi mita ariyo, noger alwora, komakore gi Hekalu. 6Udigo ne mag gorofe adek, ma udi piero adek adek kuomgi nie gorofa kagorofa.  Kia malo, to lach mar kor udi mag Hekalu ne dongo mi bath udigokonchiel norenjore ewi ohinga, mondo yien moriw masirogi kik pow kor udimag Hekalu.  7Lach mar kor udi mag Hekalu ne nenore maromre gi oko,chakre piny nyaka malo, nikech udigo.  Ne nitie raidhi ma oger e tok udimolworo Hekalugo gi oko.  Mano omiyo ng’ato ne nyalo a e gorofa mapiny,to dhi e madiere nyaka gorofa mamalo.  8Ne aneno ndiri mochwe molworoHekalu duto gi oko.  Borne modhi malo ne mita adek, kendo wiye ne romregi mise mar udi mane oger momakore gi Hekalugo, to lachne ne romo mitaariyo gi nus.  9Lach mar kor udigo gi oko ne romo mita ariyo gi nus. 10Bende ne nitie kama odong’ nono molworo Hekalu, e kind ndiri gi udi majodolo tiyoe, ma lachne mita apar.  11Ne nitie dhoot moro midonjogo e udiman yo nyandwat mar Hekalu, kendo machielo midonjogo e udi man yomilambo. Udi man yo podho chieng’ mar Hekalu12Ne nitie ot moro yo podho chieng’ momanyore gi Hekalu.  Borne ne romomita piero adek gabich, to lachne mita piero ang’wen gabich.  Lach markor ute ne mita ariyo gi nus koni gi koni. Duong’ mar Hekalu, yo ka oko13Ng’atno ne opimo oko mar Hekalu, moyudo ni borne oromo mita pieroabich.  Chakre e tok Hekalu, kadhi ariwa mar laru nyaka chop e tok otkoma ogik yo podho chieng’ bende ne romo mita piero abich.  14Lach madhiariwa kanyim Hekalu, kaachel gi kama odong’ nono koni gi koni, noromomita piero abich.  15Bende ng’atno nopimo lach mar ot man yo podhochieng’ mar Hekalu, kaachiel gi lach mar kor udi koni gi koni, moyudo nioromo mita piero abich. Weche moko mag HekaluOt ne ni kama idonjogo e Hekalu kaachiel gi Kama Ler, kod Kama LerMoloyo, 16duto nobaw gi bao, chakre dier ot nyaka dirise.  Dirisego neinyalo umo.  17Kor udi ma yo ka i Hekalu, kadhi maloo nyaka ewi dhoudi,ne ogorie 18yiend othidhe kod kido mag malaika miluongo ni kerubi kuondeduto.  Ne ogorgi molworo ot, ka kido mar kerubi gi kido mar yadh othidheokikore.  Kerubi ka kerubi ne nigi lela wenge ariyo.  19Lela wang’ achielne mar dhano, mochomo kuma yadh othidhe nitie e bathe konchiel, to lelawang’e machielo ne mar sibuor, ma bende nochomo yadh othidhe e bathekomachielo.  Mano e kaka kor udi duto ne ogor, 20chakre dier ot nyaka ewidhoudi.  21Bor kod lach mag sirni mag dhoot mar Kama Ler ne romre koni gikoni. Kendo-mar-misango22E nyim dhoot midonjogo Kama Ler Moloyo ne nitie gimoro molos gi baomachalo kendo-mar-misango.  Borne modhi malo ne mita achiel gi nus, tolachne mita achiel.  Sirni mane nie kona mage, kaachiel gi siandane kodbethene, duto ne mag bao.  Ng’atno nonyisa niya, "Mano e mesa mochung’ enyim Ruoth nyasaye. "Dhout Hekalu23Kama Ler kod Kama Ler Moloyo ne nigi dhoudi madongo, mayawore giediergi, 24kendo banore diriyo.  25Dhood Kama Ler nogorie yiend othidhekod kido mag kerubi, mana kaka nogor e kor udi.  E nyim kama idonjogo eHekalu ne nitie gama molos gi bao.  26Bende ne nitie dirise e bethe odnokoni gi koni, kendo kor udi mage ne ogorie yiend othidhe. Ezekiel 42Udi mamoko ariyo man machiegni gi Hekalu1Ng’atno notera e laru maoko, nyaka e ot moro man yo nyandwat marHekalu, machiegni gi ot mogik, yo podhochieng’ mar Hekalu.  2Bor odno nemita piero abich, to lachne mita piero ariyo gabich.  3Bathe konchielmochomo kama ne odong’ nono, ma borne romo mita apar, molworo Hekalu, tobathe komachielo nochomo kama ochanie kite mopamore molworo laru maoko. Odno ne oger gorofe adek, ma moro ka moro lach moloyo mano manie wiye. 4E bath udi manie gorofano yo nyandwat, ne nitie yo ma lachne oromo mitaabich, to borne oromo mita piero abich.  Dhout udigo nochomo yo nyandwat. 5Udi mane ni e gorofa mamalo ne diny moloyo mago mane ni e gorofamadiere kod gorofa mamwalo, nikech gorofa ka gorofa ne lach moloyo maniewiye.  6Udi mane ni e gorofe adekgo duto ne ni ewi ndiri cha.  Ne giongegi sirni kaka udi mamoko mane ni e laru.  7Bor mar laini mar udi mane nie gorofa mamwalo ne romo mita piero ariyo gabich, 8kendo ohinga ma borneromo mita mita piero ariyo gabich ne ochuogore e kore, komanyore gilaini mamoko.  9E bath odno mogik koma ochomo yo wuokchieng’, kama neohinga ochakorego, ne nitie dhoudi midonjogo e laruu maoko.  10E bathHekalu koma odok yo milambo bende ne nitie ot moro machal gimachielonomane ni machiegni gi ot mogik, yoo podhochieng’ mar Hekalu.  11E nyimudigo ne nitie yo moro machal gi mano mane ni yo nyandwat.  Udi ariyogone romre kuom borgi gi lachgi, kendo ne gichalre chuth, koda ka dhoutgi. 12Ne nitie dhoudi e bath odno yo milambo, tung’ mogik yo wuokchieng’,kama ohinga ochakorego. 13Ng’atno nowachona niya, "Udi ariyogi duto owal ni tich Nyasaye.  E igiema nyaka jodolo matiyo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye chamie misengni maleriemoloyo.  Jodolo noket misengni malerie moloyo, kaka misegni mag cham, kodmisengni mag golo richo, kod mago mipwodhogo ketho mar gowi, ei udigo,nikech gin kuonde mowal ni tich Nyasaye.  14Ka jodolo dwaro wuok e Hekalumondo odhi e laru maoko, to nyaka giwe lewni maler mag dolo mane oyudogirwako ka gitiyo e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye.  Nyaka girwak lewni moko nono, kapok gidhi oko kuma ji ochokoree. "Bor gi lach mar kama Hekalu nitie15Kane ng’atno osetieko pimo kama ogerie Hekalu gi yoka iye, ne ogolaoko gi e dhorangach ma yo wuokchieng’, mi opimo kama Hekalu nitie gi yoka oko.  16Eka ne okawo rapim mar bao, mopimogo koma ochomo yowuokchieng’, moyudo ni oromo mita mia ariyo gi piero abich.  17Bang’e neopimo koma ochomo yo nyandwat 18gi yo milambo 19kod yo podhochieng’,moyudo ni giduto gin mita mia ariyo gi piero abich maromre.  20Ne en giohinga molwore, ma borne gi lachne mita mia ariyo gi piero abichmaromre.  Ohingano nopogo koma ler kod koma ok ler. Ezekiel 43Duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye oduogo, mopong’o Hekalu1Bang’ mago duto, ng’atno notera e rangachh mochomo yo wuookchieng’, 2mianeno duong’ maler mar Nyasach Israell kabiro koa yoo wuokchieng’.  DwondNyasaye ne wuo ka apaka mar nam, kendo duong’ne maler nomiyo piny rieny. 3Fwenyno ne chalo gi fweny mane aneno kane Nyasaye obiro kethoJerusalem, kendo ochal gi moro mane aneno e bath aora Kebar.  Bang’e neapodho piny auma.  4Duong’ maler mar Ruoth Nyasaye nokadho e dhorangachma yo wuokchieng’, modonjo e Hekalu. 5Roho noting’a, motera e laru maiye, mi aneno ka duong’ maler mar RuothNyasaye opong’o Hekalu.  6Kane ng’atno pod ochung’ e dira kanyo, neawinjo ka Ruoth Nyasaye wuoyo koda gie Hekalu niya,
"Wuod dhano,Hekaluni e koma mar duong’, kendo en e kama atenoe tienda.  Abiro dakkaeri e kind jo-Israel nyaka chieng’.  Jo-Israel, kata ruodhigi, oknochak okel ni nyinga maler wichkuot kuom lamo nyiseche mamoko, katakuom chungo kite ma giparogo ruodhigi motho.  8Ruodhigigo nogero utegimana momakore gi Hekaluna, mi kor ot kende ema opogo kinda kodgi.  Gikmodwanyore mane gitimo nokelo ni nyinga maler wichkuot, omiyo neatiekogi ka an gi mirima mager.  9To koro nyaka giwe lamo nyisechemamoko, kendo giwit kite ma giparogo ruodhigi.  Ka gitimo kamano, toanadag e kindgi nyaka chieng’. "Chike mag Hekalu10Ruoth Nyasaye nomedo wacho niya, "Wuod dhano, nyis jo-Israel wachHekalu, mondo ging’e kaka ochalo, eka wigi okuodi kuom timbegi maricho. 11To ka ineno ni wigi okuot kuom gik ma gisetimo, to nyisgi kido mogergoHekalu, kaachiel gi gik moko duto manie iye, kod dhorangeye midonjogo gimiwuokgo, kendo kaka gik moko duto ochan e iye.  Bende nyisgi chike dutoman kanyo.  Ndik gigo duto mondo ging’e kaka gik moko ochan, kendo gimakchikego duto.  12To chik Hekalu chalo kama: Kuonde duto molworo wi godnigin kuonde maler moloyo. "Kendo-mar-misango13 Kendo-mar-misango, kipimo gi rapim mane opimgo Hekalu, ne chalo kama. Bor modhi malo mar kama kendo-mar-misango orenjore romo nus mita, kendoolach moloyo kendo-ma-misango gi nus mita.  To lake koni gi konioting’ore malo moromo lwedo achiel.
-17Gi yo ka piny, to bor markendo-mar-misango kadhi malo ne romo mita achiel, to borne gi lachnemita aboro aboro maromre.  To e wiye ne nitie kamaa borne gi lachne oromomita abiriyo abiriyo maromre, to borne modhi malo mita ariyo.  To bor gilach mar wiye mogik, kama iwang’oe misango, ne romo mita auchielmaromre, to borne modhi malo bende mita ariyo.  Wiyeno ne nigi tungeang’wen.  Kendo-mar-misangono ne nigi raidhi miidhego e bathe ma yowuokchieng’.
Ruoth Nyasaye nowuoyo koda, mowachona niya, "Wuod dhano, chik itimondo iwinj gima awachoni.  Ka oseger kendo-mar-misango, to nyaka iwaleni tich Nyasaye, kiwang’oe misengni, kendo ikiroe remb jamni motimgomisengnigo.  19Jodolo ma jo-Lawi ma nyikwa Zadok kende ema nyaka bi enyima mondo otina.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema agolo chikno. "Nyaka imigi nyarwath mondo gitimgo misango mar golo richo.  20To nyakaikaw remb nyarwadhno moko mondo iwirgo tunge ang’wen magkendo-mar-misango, kendo iwirgo konde ang’wen mag kore kod ndiri mankoni gi koni.  Kamano e kaka ibiro pwodho kendo-mar-misango, kendo walogoni Nyasaye.  21Bang’e kaw nyarwath motimgo misango mar golo richono,mondo iwang; pep kama onego wangg’ie, oko mar Hekalu.  22Kinyne to kawnyuok maonge gi songa mondo itimgo misango mar golo richo.  Pwodhkendo-mar-misango gi remb nywogno mana kaka ne ipwodhe gi remb nyarwath. 23Ka isetieko timo kamano, to kaw nyarwath gi nyaim maonge gi songa,24ikel ira, an Ruoth Nyasaye.  Jodolo mondo okir kuomgi chumbi, otimnagoomisango miwang’o pep.  25Odiechieng’ ka odiechieng’ kuom ndako abiriyoonego chiw nywok gi nyarwath kod im ka misango mar golo richo.  Gidutonyaka gibed maonge gi songa.  26Kamano jodolo nyaka pwodhkendo-mar-misango kuom ndalo abiriyo mondo obed moikore ni tich Nyasaye. 27Ka ndalo abiriyo orumo, to jodolo nyalo chako timo misengni miwang’opep, kod misengni mag sawo ma ji kelo, e kendono.  Bang’e anabed mamorkodu.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "Ezekiel 44Tich Nyasaye e Hekalu1Ng’atno nochako otera e dhorangach maoko man yo wuokchieng’ mar kumaHekalu nitie, mi wanwang’o ni dhorangajno olor.  2Ruoth Nyasaye nowachonaniya, "Dhorangajni nyaka sik kolor, kendo ok nochak oyawe ngang’.  Ongedhano ma oyiene kadhoe, nikech an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israelasekadhoe.  Emomiyo nyaka osik kolore.  3Ruodh piny Israel kende ema nyalodhi kanyo kaka ruoth, mondo ocham sawo e nyima.  To nyaka odonji kendoowuogi kokadho mana e ot maduong’ ma iye mogik. "4Bang’e ng’atno nokadho koda e dhorangach ma yo nyandwat mar hekalu.  Neapodho piny auma.  5Mi Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Wuod dhano, rangmaber, kendo chik iti ni gimoro amora ma anyisi, nikech koro amiyi chikemag hekalu.  Nyaka ing’e joma oyienigi donjo e Hekalu.
"Nyis jo-Israel ma jopiemgo ni an ruoth Nyasaye ok nachak ayie gi gikmakuodo wich ma gisebedo ka gitimo.  7Gisedwanyo Hekaluna, ka giyie nijopinje mamoko ma ok ter nyangu kendo mochaya donjo e Hekalu e kinde maitimona misango gi boche kod remo.  Kamano joga oseketho singruok maneatimo kodgi, kuom gik mamono ma gisetimo.  8Kar timo tich ma onego utinae Hekalu, too use mana keto jopinje mamoko mondo otim.
"An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kama: Japiny moro amora ma ok ter nyangu kendomochaya ok nochak odonj e Hekaluna kata obed mana japiny moro modak eIsrael.
"Jo-Lawi mane oringo oweya kaachiel gi jo-Israel mamoko, mi olamonyiseche manono, nyaka kum kuomm richogino.  11Ginyalo toyona e Hekalu,ka girito dhorangeye, kendo ka gitiyona tije mamoko mag Hekalu.  Ginyaloyang’o jamni ma ji chiwo kaka misengni miwang’o pep kod misengni mamoko,kendo nyaka gichung’ e nyim ji ka gitiyonigi.  12To kaka ne gitiyo nijo-Israel e tij lemo kuonde milamoe nyiseche manono, mi gimiyo jo-Israelodonjo e richo, omiyo an Ruoth Nyasaye akuong’ora ni nyaka kumgi.  13Okginichak gitina kaka jodolo, bende ok ginidhi but gik maler mowalna,kendo ok ginidonj Kama Ler Moloyo.  Mano e wichkuot ma ginine kuom gikmaricho ma gisebedo ka gitimo.  14To abiro miyogi tije mamoko duto magHekalu.
"An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kama: Jodolo ma jo-Lawi ma nyikwa Zadok to neodhi nyime katiyona maber e Hekalu, ka jo-Israel mamoko to oringo oweya,kuom mano, koro gin ema nyaka gitina, kendo gibi e nyma mondo gichiwnaboche kod remo mag misengni.  16Gin e joma nodonj e Hekaluna, mi ti ekendona-mar-misango, kendo los kaka ilemo e Hekalu.  17Ka gidonjo edhorangach madhi e laru ma iye mar Hekalu, to nyaka girwakre gi lewnimabeyo mayom.  Ok ginyal rwako law moro amora molos gi yie rombo e sa maginie tich e laru maiye, kata e Hekalu.  18To nyaka girwak kilemba, kodsirueche molos gi law maber mayom, to bende kik gitue nungogi gi okanda,nimar dipo ka luya ochamogi.  19Kapok giwuok gidhi e laru maoko kuma jinitie, to nyaka gikuong gilony lepgi ma girwako ka gitiyo e Hekalu, migikan e udi mowal ni tich Nyasaye, nimar dipo ka lepgi malergo ogerekuom ng’ato, mohinyo.
"Jodolo ki liel wigi, to bende kik giwe wigi yugno ahinya, to nyakaging’adgi maber.  21Kik gimadh kong’o e kinde ma gidwaro donjo e larumaiye.  22Bende jadolo kik kend dhako ma chwore otho, kata dhako moweyochwore to nyaka okend mana nyako ma silili ma nyar Israel, kata chi lielma chwore ne jadolo.
"Jadolo nyaka puonj joga pogruok manie kind gik maler gi gik ma okler, kendo manie kind gik ma ogak gi gik ma ok ogak.  24Ka wach moroowuok ma ji laroree, to jodolo nyaka yal wachno, mi ng’ad bura manamoluwore gi chikna.  Ginirit ndalo mag sewni maga, kaluwore gi chikena,kendo ginirit ndalo mag Sabatona maler.
"Jadolo kik mul ringre ng’at motho, ma dimi obed mogak, mak mana kang’atno en wuon kata min, nyathine kata owadgi, kata nyamin ma pok odhitedo.  26To komulo watne motho kamano, to nyaka opwodhre.  Bang’puodhruokno nyaka oyue kuom ndalo abiriyo.  27Eka enodhi e laru maiyemondo otim misango mar golo richo, mondo eka ochak oti e Hekalu kendo. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Jodolo ok noyud lowo mopognigi e piny Israel ka mwandugi, to anRuoth Nyasaye ema nabed mwandugi.  29Misengni mag cham kod misengni maggolo richo gi ketho ema nobed chiembgi.  Bende giniyud gik moko dutomowalna e Israel.  30Gin ema giniyud cham mabeyo duto mokwongo chiekmochiwna.  E kinde ka kinde ma ji otedo makati, to ginimi jodolo makatimokwong tedi kaka chiwo mondo oguedh miechgi.  31Jadolo kik cham gimoroamora motho kende, kata ma ondiek onego, bed ni en winyo kata le. "Ezekiel 45Pogo piny Israel1Ka piny opogi mondo dhoot ka dhoot oyud lope, to lowo ma borne romokilomita apar nyaka wal ni Ruoth Nyasaye.  Kanyo duto nobed kama ler. 2Bath lowono, ma borne gi lachne mita mia ariyo gi piero abich maromrenoket tenge mondo ogerie Hekalu.  E alwora mar lop Hekaluno nobedie kamaodong’ nono ma lachne romo mita piero ariyo gabich.  3Bath lowono maborne romo kilomita apar gariyo gi nus, to lachne kilomita abich, nokettenge mondo ogerie Hekalu, ma bende iluongo ni Kama Ler Moloyo, 4kendomondo jodolo matiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye e Hekalu odagie.  Utegi nobed kanyokaachiel gi Kama Ler mogerie Hekaluno nobed mita mia ariyo gi pieroabich maromre, kaachiel gi kama odong’ nono molwore ma lachne mita pieroariyo gabich. 5To bende bath lowono komachielo ma borne bende oromo kilomita apargariyo gi nus, kendo lachne kilomita abich, noket tenge ni jo-Lawimatiyo e Hekalu.  Ginibed gi mier kuno ma gidakie.  6To lowo modong’ maborne oromo kilomita apar gariyo gi nus to lachne kilomita ariyo gi nusbende nyaka ket tenge mondo ogerie dala moro maduong’.  Enobed mokiewo gilowo mowal ni Nyasayeno, kendo nobed mar jo-Israel duto. 7Ruoth marito piny bende nyaka podne lowo, momakore gi kama owal niNyasaye kod lowo ma dala maduong’ nitie, koni gi koni.  Yo podhochieng’,lop ruoth nochwe nyaka nam Mediterenia, to yo wuokchieng’ nogik e tong’piny.  Kamano borne moa yo podhochieng’ nobed maromre gi lowo mopog nidhoot ka dhoot.  8Mano ema nobed lop ruoth marito piny Israel, mondo kikochak othir ji, to owe bath piny koma odong’ obed mar dhout Israel. 9Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Usetimo richo aming’a un jotend Israel. Weuru timbeu mag mecho kod mag thir muthirogo ji.  To timuru mana gikmakare kendo mowinjore.  Bende kik uchak uriemb joga e lopgi kendo.  AnRuoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. Rapim makare10 "Nyaka ji duto ti gi rapim makare kama: 11Rapim miluongo ni efa,mipimogo gik machalo cham, nyaka bed maromre gi rapim miluongo ni bath,mipimogo gik maliw.  To rapim miporogo rapim nyaka bed rapim miluongo nihomer.  Homer achiel nyaka bed maromre gi efa apar, kendo kod bath apar.
"Bende rapim mag pek gik moko nyaka chal kama: Gera piero ariyo nyakabed maromre gi shekel achiel, kendo shekel piero auchiel nyaka bedmaromre gi mina achiel. Chike mag gik michiwo ni Nyasaye13"Koro chiwo ma onego uket tenge e magi: Kukayo chambu, to nyaka ukettenge achiel kuom piero auchiel mag chamugo.  14Mor zeituni bende nyakauket tenge achiel kuom mia achiel muyudo kuom olemo ma yiendu onyago. Nyaka upim morno gi rapim miluongo ni kor.  15To bende kuom rombe miaariyo nyaka uchiw rombo achiel.  Gigo ema unukel mondo obed chiwomitimogo misengni mag cham gi misengni miwang’o pep, kod mago mag sawo,mondo richou owenu.  An Ruoth nyasaye ema agolo chik kamano.
"Jopinyu duto nyaka ter chiwogo ir ruoth marito piny Israel.  17En emanobed kochiwo jamni mitimogo misengni mag cham kod mago miolo piny, nioganda duto mar Israel e sewni duto, koda ka sewni mitimo ka due opor,kod mitimo ndalo Sabato.  Bende en ema nobed kochiwo misengni mag goloricho kod misengni mag cham gi mago miwang’o pep kod mag sawo mondoopwodhgo richo mag jo-Israel. "Pasaka(Wuok
.
-
)18Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Chieng’ mokwongo mar due mar achiel nyakautim misango gi rwath maonge songa, mondo upwodhgo Hekalu.  19Jodolonyaka kaw remo moko mag chiayo motimgo misango mar golo richo mondo owire sirni mag dhood Hekalu, kod tunge ang’wen, mag kendo-mar-misango,kendo e sirni mag dhorangeye midonjogo e laru maiye.  20Nyaka utim kamanobende chieng’ due abiriyo mar dueno, mondo upwodhgo richo ng’ato ang’atama oketho ka ok ong’eyo, kata moketho kobothne.  Mano e yo ma unumigoHekalu sik ka ler.  21Chieng’ due apar gang’wen unuchak timo sawo marPasaka, kendo kuom ndalo abiriyo ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka cham makati maok ketie thowi.  22Chieng’ mokwongo mar sawo, ruoth marito piny nyak chiwrwath ka misango migologo richone owuon kaachiel gi richo mag ji mamokoduto.  23To odiechieng’ kodiechieng’ mar ndalo abiriyo mag sawogo, nyakaochiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye ruedhi abiriyo kod imbe abiriyo maonge songa, kamisango miwang’o pep.  Bende nyaka ochiw nywok odiecheng’ kodiechieng’ kamisango mar golo richo.  24Nyaka chiw debe mar cham gi lita ang’wen magmor zeituni kuom rwath ka rwath kod im ka im motimgo misango.
"Kuom Sawo Maduong’ machakore chieng’ due apar gabich, due marabiriyo, ruoth marito piny Israel nyaka tim misengni mag golo richo gimisengni miwang’o pep pilepile kuom ndalo abiriyo, mana machalre gi magomitimo e Sap Pasaka, kendo bende nyaka bed maromre gi mago michiwo e SapPasaka. "Ezekiel 461Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Dhorangach ma yo wuokchieng’ midonjogo elaru maiye nyaka bed kolor kuom ndalo achiel ma ji tiyoe, to nyaka yawechieng’ Sabato ka Sabato, kod ndalo ka ndalo ma due oporie.  2Ruothmarito piny nyaka wuog e laru maoko mi dhi e ot maduong’ maniedhorangach ma yo wuokchieng’no, mi ochung’ e bath sirni mag dhorangajno,ka jodolo timone misengni miwang’o pep, kod misengni mag sawo.  Nyakaolem e dhorangach kanyo, eka bang’e owuog oko.  To dhorangach kik lornyaka odhiambo.  3Chieng’ Sabato ka Sabato, kendo ndalo ka ndalo ma dueopor, ji duto nyaka kulre mondo olam Ruoth Nyasaye e nyim dhorangajno. 4Chieng’ Sabato, ruoth morito piny nyaka kel ni Ruoth Nyasaye nyirombeauchiel gi im auchiel, duto maonge songa, kaka misango miwang’o pep.  5Imka im nyaka okel gi cham moromo debe achiel, obed misango mar chammitimego, to kuom nyarombo ka nyarombo onyalo chiwoe cham mang’eny kakaen ema ohero.  To kuom debe ka debe mar misango mar cham nyaka ochiwe morzeituni moromo lita ang’wen.  6Ka due opor, to nyaka ochiw nyarwath ginyirombe auchiel kod im achiel, duto maonge songa.  7Misango mar chamnyaka bed moromo debe achiel kuom rwath ka rwath gi im ka im, to kuomnyarombo ka nyarombo, onyalo chiwoe cham mang’eny kaka en ema ohero. Kuom debe ka debe mar cham to nyaka ochiw mor zeituni moromo litaang’wen.  8Ruoth marito piny nyaka wuog oko gi dhorangach koluwo otmaduong’, mana kaka ne otimo kodonjo.
"E kinde ma ji obiro lamo Ruoth Nyasaye e sawo moro amora, to jomaodonjo gi dhorangach ma yo nyandwat nyaka wuog gi dhorangach ma yomilambo, kendo jogo modonjo gi dhorangach ma yo milambo, nyaka wuog gidhorangach ma yo nyandwat.  Onge ng’ama onego owuog gi dhorangachmodonjogo, to ng’ato ka ng’ato nyaka wuog mana gi dhorangach momanyoregi mane odonjogo.  10Ruoth marito piny bende nyaka donji mana kaka jimamoko donjo, kendo wuogi mana kaka giwuok.  11E ndalo mag sewni tomisango mar cham nyaka bed debe achiel kuom rwath ka rwath, kata kuom imka im, to kuom nyarombo ka nyarombo, jalemo nyalo chiwoe cham mang’enykaka en ema ohero.  Kuom debe ka debe mar cham to nyaka chiwie morzeituni moromo lita ang’wen.
"Ka ruoth marito piny dwaro timo ni Ruoth Nyasaye misango kuom heroneowuon, bed ni en misango miwang’o pep, kata misango mar sawo, todhorangach ma yo wuokchieng’ midonjogo e laru maiye nyaka yawne.  Nyakaotim misango mana kaka otimo misango chieng’ Sabato, to ka osewuok, todhorangach nyaka lor.
"Okinyi ka okinyi nyarombo maonge songa ma hike achiel nyaka chiw niRuoth Nyasaye.  Misangono nyaka tim pilepile.  14Bende misango mar mogomoromo kilo ariyo nyaka tim okinyi kokinyi, kendo nyaka chiwe gi morzeituni moromo lita achiel, midwalego.  Chike mag misango mitimo ni RuothNyasaye nyaka sik mochwere.  15Nyarombo gi mogo kod mor zeitunigo nyakachiw ni Ruoth Nyasaye okinyi kokinyi nyaka chieng’. "Chike mag lop ruoth marito piny Israel16Ruoth Nyasaye ogolo chik niya, "Ka ruoth marito piny omiyo wuode morolowo moro amora kaka chiwo, to lowono nobed mar wuodeno chuth, kakamwandu moyudo kuom wuon mare.  17To ka ruoth ochiwo lope moro ni ng’atomatiyone, to lowono nochak odog ni ruoth ka higa miweyoe ji thuoloochopo.  En lope owuon, omiyo en kod yawuote kende ema ginyalo bet kodenyaka chieng’.  18To ruoth marito piny moro kik thir joge kamayogi mwandumoro amora, to nyaka opog ni yawuote lowo kuom lowo mopogne, mondo kikothir joga komayogi lopgi. "Kuonde tedo mag Hekalu19Ng’atno nokawa motera e dhoot midonjogo e udi man yo rangach ma yomilambo mar laru maiye.  Udigo ne udi maler, mowal ni jodolo.  Ne osiemokamoro yo podhochieng’ mar udigo, 20mowacho niya, "Mano e kama jodoloonego ochwakie ring’o ma gitimogo misengni mag golo richo kod magomipwodhogo ketho mag gowi, kendo kanyo ema gitedoe misengni mag cham. Kamano onge gimoro maler ma diter e laru maoko, kuma gino nyalo miyoe jihinyruok!"21Bang’e ne otera e laru maoko mi onyisa laru matin e kona ka kona marlaruno, 22ma borne mita piero ariyo, to lachne mita apar gabich.  23Moroka moro ne nigi ohinga mar kite molwore, kod kite mag tedo mogerkomakore gi ohinga.  24Ng’atno nomedo nyisa niya, "Magi e kuonde tedo majotich Hekalu onego ochwakie misengni ma ji chiwo. "Ezekiel 47Pi Hekalu machango ji1 Ng’atno nochako odwoka e dho Hekalu mi aneno pi kawuok gie bwodhoodno, ka mol kochomo yo wuokchieng’, koma Hekalu bende ochomo.  Neomol koridore mwalo, kokadho yo nyandwat mar kendo mar misango.  2Bang’eng’atno nogola oko mar Hekalu gie dhorangach ma yo nyandwat, mi oteraoko nyaka e rangach ma yo wuokchieng’.  Kuno to nanenoe aora matin mamolkawuok e bath rangajno gi yo milambo.  3Ng’atno nochomo yo wuokchieng’,koting’o tol mipimogo.  Nowuotho e bath aora nyaka koma oromo mita miaabich.  Eka nomiyo ayoro aorano kanyo, manwang’o ni pi ochopo mana eombong’na.  4Ne ochako opimo kama oromo mita mia abich.  Eka nomiyo ayorokanyo kendo, to koro ne ochopo e chonga.  Bang’ mano ne ochako opimo mitamia abich, mi kane ochako omiyo ayoro pigno, to ne otundo e nungona.  5Neochako opimo mita mia abich, to koro aora nodoko matut mane ok anyalyoro, mak mana ka agoyo abal.  6Ng’atno nowachona niya, "Wuod dhano,donge iseneno gima atimonino? Make maber!"Eka nogola e pi, modwoka e geng aora, 7to kane wachopo kanyo, ne anenoyien mang’eny e bath aora koni gi koni.  8Ng’atno nowachona niya, "Aoranimol kochomo yo wuokchieng’, kendo omol e holo mar aora Jordan, nyaka eNam Kado.  To kotundo e Nam Kado kuno, to pi namno nodok maliw.  9Kamoroamora ma aorani molie, kit le duto kod rech ng’enyie.  Adier, aorani nomipi Nam Kado bed maliw, kendo kamoro amora momolie, nokelie ngima. 10Jolupo nobed ka moyo tondegi e geng nam, chakre Engedi nyaka Eneglaim. Kit rech mang’eny mopogore opogore machalo mago manie Nam Mediterenianoyudre kuno.  11To pi man kuonde motimo siany kod degni manie bath namnook nolokre maliw.  Ginisik mana kaka gichalo, mondo gibed kuonde ma jiyudoe bala.  12E bath aora koni gi koni kit yien duto ma olembegi ichamonodongie.  Obokegi ok notwo, bende ok giniwe mak ginyago olemo, toginibed ka ginyak due ka due, nikech pi ma giyudo mol ka wuok e Hekalu. Olemb yien-go ema ji nocham, to obokegi nothiedhruokgo. "Tong’ mag piny Israel13Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Tong’ mag piny midwaro pogo e kind dhoutIsrael apar gariyo, ka joka Josef to yudo diriyo moloyo dhoudi mamoko, emagi: 14Ne akuong’ora ni kwereu, kating’o bada, ni anamigi pinyni.  Omiyokoro pogreuru maromre.
"Tong’ ma yo nyandwat noring kochomo yo wuokchieng’, chakre NamMediterenia nyaka dala mar Hethlon, kendo nyaka kama idonjogo Hamath. Eka nodhi nyime nyaka dala mar Zedad, 16gi dala mar Berotha kod Sibraimmanie kind piny Damaski gi piny Hamath, mi otund nyaka dala mar Tikonmanie tong’ piny Hauran.  17Kamano tong’ ma yo nyandwat nobed koa e NamMediterenia kochomo yo wuokchieng’ nyaka dala mar Enon ka ogoyo tong’ gipinje mag Damaski gi Hamath, man yo nyandwat.
"Tong’ ma yo wuokchieng’ noring koa dala moro manie kind piny Damaskigi piny Hauran, kochomo yo milambo.  Bang’ mano, aora Jordan nobed tong’mopogo kind piny Israel yo podho chieng’, kod piny Gilead, yowuokchieng’, nyaka Dala Othidhe man e bath Nam Kado.
"Tong’ ma yo milambo nochom yo milambo ma podhochieng’, chakre DalaOthidhe nyaka sokni mag Meriba-kadesh.  Eka bang’e nochom yo nyandwat mapodhochieng’, koluwo aora manie tong’ piny Misri, nyaka Nam Mediterenia.
"Nam Mediterenia ema nobed tong’ ma yo podhochieng’, kendo noringkochomo yo nyandwat nyaka moro man yo podhochieng’ mar kama idonjogoHamath.
"Mano e piny ma nyaka upogru gi ombulu e kind dhout Israel, 22mondoobed mwandugi mosiko.  Jopinje mamoko modak kuomu, kendo mosenywolonyithindgi e pinyu, bende nyaka yud lowo ka upogo piny.  Nyaka kwan gi kajo-Israel hie.  23Jo-pinje mamoko duto nyaka yud lopgi machalre gi dhootma gidak kuomgi.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "Ezekiel 48Pogo piny e kind dhoudi1Tong’ piny ma yo nyandwat noring koa e Nam Mediterenia, kochiko yowuokchieng’ nyaka dala mar Hethlon, kendo nyaka kama idonjogo Hamath,nyaka dala mar Enon, mochomo e tong’ manie kind piny Damaski gi pinyHamath.  Lowo mopog ni dhoot ka dhoot onego chakre e tong’ man yowuokchieng’ nyaka tong’ man yo podhochieng’.  Dhood Dan ema noyud lopgiyo nyandwat tung’ mogik.  2To lop dhood Asher ema nobed yo milambo marlop Dan.  3Bang’ Asher to lop dhood Naftali ema nobedie.  4Eka lop jokaManase nobed kaluwo lop Naftali.  5Bang’ lop Manase, to lop joka Efraimema nobedie.  6Eka lop dhood Reuben 7gi lop dhood Juda nobed kaluworekamano. 8To yo milambo mar lop Juda lowo mowal ni Nyasaye nobedie.  Enochakre etung’ piny ma yo wuokchieng’ nyaka yo podhochieng’, kendo borne nobedkilomita apar gariyo gi nus, mana machalre gi lowo mopog ni dhoudi duto. E dier lowono tir e kama nogerie Hekalu. Lowo mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye9Bor mar lowo mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye nyaka bed kilomita apar gariyo ginus, to lachne kilomita apar.  10Jodolo nyaka yud pok kuom lowo mowalno. Bethene ma yo nyandwat gi ma yo milambo nobed kilomita apar gariyo ginus, maromre, to bethene ma yo wuokchieng’ nobed kilomita abich abich. Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye to nyaka bed e dier lowono.  11Lowono nobed marjodolo ma nyikwa Zadok.  Ne gitiyona maber, mi ok giriwore gi jo-Israelmamoko kuom timo richo kaka jo-Lawi mamoko notimo.  12Kuom mano nyakagibed gi kargi giwegi e bath jo-Lawi mamoko, kendo kanyo nobed kamalerie moloyo.  13Jo-Lawi nyaka yud lowo ma borne kilomita apar gariyo ginus, to lachne kilomita abich, e bath lop jodolo.  14Lowo ma owal niRuoth Nyasaye e lowo maberie moloyo lowo duto, kendo onge kamoro amorakuome ma inyalo ng’iewo, kata wilo kata miyo ng’at moro machielo.  Oler,kendo owale ni Ruoth Nyasaye. 15Bath lowono koma odong’, ma borne romo kilomita apar gariyo gi nus, oknobed kama ler, to en kama ji duto nyalo konyorego kaka ohero.  Ginyalodak kuno, mi giti gi lowono kaka gidwaro, to dala nyaka bed e diere tir. 16Bor gi lach mar dala nyaka bed kilomita alufu ariyo gi mia ariyo gipiero abich maromre koni gi koni.  17Alwora mar dalano koni gi koni ebethene duto nobedie kama odong’ nono, ma ariwa mare oromo mita miaachiel gi piero ariyo gabich.  18Ka oseger dalano, to lowo modong’,moromo kilomita abich yo wuokchieng’ kendo kilomita abich yopodhochieng’ ma omanyore gi kama ler to nobed puothe ma joma odak edalano puro.  Ng’ato ang’ata matiyo e dala kanyo, nyalo puro lowono, kaok odew dhoot ma aoye.  20Lowo ma owal ni Nyasayeno duto nyaka bedkilomita apar gariyo gi nus koni gi koni maromre, kendo kama dala nitienobed e iye. Lop ruoth marito piny Israel21Ka gweng’ mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye, kod lowo mowe ni dala, ma lachne giborne kilomita apar gariyo gi nus maromre osekaw, to lowo duto modong’ ebath lowo mowalno koni gi koni, nobed mar ruodh piny.  Bathe ma yopodhochieng’ nodhi nyaka Nam Mediterenia, to bathe ma yo wuokchieng’’nodhi nyaka tong’ piny Israel.  Hekalu gi lowo mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye, gimano nomi jo-Lawi, 22kod kama dala nitie nobed e kind lope ruodhigo. Lowono duto ni e kind lowo mopog ni dhood Juda yo nyandwat, kod mopog nidhood Benjamin, yo milambo. Lop dhoudi abich modong’23Yo milambo mar lowono ema dhoudi modong’ noyudie lopgi, chakre tong’ma yo wuokchieng’ nyaka tong’ ma yo podhochieng’.  Dhood Benjamin emanoyud lowo momakore gi lowono, 24to lop dhood Simeon ema nobed yomilambo mar lop Benjamin.  25Bang’ lop Simeon, to lop dhood Isakar emanobedie.  26Eka lop dhood Zebulun nobed kaluwo lop Isakar, 27to dhood Gadema noyud lowo tung’ mogik. 28Yo milambo mar lowo mopog ni dhood Gad, tong’ piny Israel nochakre eDala Othidhe kochomo yo milambo ma podhochieng’, nyaka sokni magMeriba-kadesh.  Eka bang’e nochom yo nyandwat ma podhochieng’ koluwo aoramanie tong’ piny Misri nyaka Nam Mediterenia. 29Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Mano e kaka piny onego opogi ni dhoutIsrael, mondo obed mwandugi mosiko. "Dhorangeye kod nying Dala30 Dalano nobed gi dhorangeye apar gariyo.  Bor mar bath ohinga ka bathohinga nobed mita alufu ariyo gi mia ariyo kod piero abich, kendo nobedgi dhorangeye adek mochak dhoudi adek mag Israel.  31Dhorangeye mae bathohinga ma yo nyandwat nochakk Reuben gi Juda kod Lawi, 32to mae bathohinga ma yo wuokchieng’ nochak Josef gi Benjamin kod Dan.  33Dhorangeyemae bath ohinga ma yo milambo nochak Simeon gi Isakar kod Zebulun, 34tomae bathe ma yo podhochieng’ nochak Gad gi Asher kod Naftali. 35Kamano bor ohingano duto nobed mita alufu ochiko.  To nying dalanomosiko nobed, ‘Ruoth Nyasaye ni ka. ’DANIEL 1Somo mar Daniel gi osiepene1

W. Nda

. E higa mar adek mar loch Jehoyakim ruodhJuda, Nebukadnezar ruodh Babulon nobiro molworo jerusalem mondo okaw.  22Ruo
.
