Kor15.
. Uparo ni abiro reso jogi kuom tho, kata konyogi ni kik gidhi epiny joma otho? Ooyo! In tho, bi gi masicheni duto, kendo in piny jomaotho, bi gi kethruokni duto, nimar ok abi kecho jogi.  15Kata obedo nijo-Israel dhi nyime maber ka buya malandore, to abiro kelonigi jaketh manotiek gigi mabeyo duto mana kaka yamb oro moa e piny motimo ongoroduono sokni duto.  16Jo-Israel nyaka yud kum kuom kethogi, nimar gisepiemgi Nyasachgi.  Gibiro tho e lweny kendo nyithindgi nochwad piny, mi riediye mondgi mayach. "HOSEA 14Ohomb jo-Israel mondo odog ir Nyasaye1Duoguru ir Ruoth Nyasachu un jo-Israel.  Richou osemiyo uchwanyoru, miupodho.  2Duoguru ir Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo kar kelone chiwo, to lameurukama: "Wenwa richowa duto, kendo yie lemowa, mi wanapaki kakawasesingore.  3Jo-Asuria ok nyal resowa, bende ok wanadwar geche maglweny mondo waidhi.  Ok wanachak wawach ni gik mwaseloso gi lwetwa niya,‘Un e nyisechewa. ’ A Ruoth Nyasaye, in ema itimo ng’wono ni joma ongeng’ama konyogi. "4Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Abiro duogo joga ira, kendo anahergi gichunya duto, nikech koro ok akecho kodgi.  5Abiro chalo ni jo-Israel kakakoth e piny motwo.  Gibiro moyo ka maua, kendo tiendegi biro kar ka yiendLebanon.  6Gibiro loth kendo gibiro bedo mabeyo ka yiend zeituni.  Ginidummamit mana ka yiend sida mag Lebanon.  7Gibiro chako gidak e tipona, miginya ka cham, kendo ginyag mana ka yiend mzabibu.  Gibiro bedo gi humamana ka divai mar Lebanon.  8Jo-Israel ok nochak olam nyiseche manonokata matin, omiyo anawinj lemogi, kendo naritgi.  Anageng’gi mana ka yathma tipone ng’ich, nimar an ema amiyogi guethgi duto. " 9Joma riek mondoowinj weche mondik ka, kendo girwakgi e chunygi.  Yore mag Ruoth Nyasayeoriere tir, kendo joma kare luwogi, to joricho chwanyore kendo podhonikech ok giluwgi. JOEL 1Bonyo oketho piny Israel1Ma e wach Ruoth Nyasaye mane omiyo Joel wuod Pethuel.
"Winjuru, un joma dongo,kaachiel gi ji duto modak e piny Juda. Bende gima kama osetimore e ndalou,kata e ndalo kwereu?3Nyisuru nyithindu wachni,gin bende ginyis nyithindgi,kendo nyithindgigo onyis tieng’ maluwogi. 4Bonyo madongo nochamo oboke,bang’e rumbi mar bonyo ma pod tindo nochamo oboke mane odong’. 5Auru malo mondo uywagi, un jomergi!Ywaguru un jomadh divai,nikech mzabibu milosogo divai mamit osekethi!
Fweny
.
. Oganda bonyo maduong’ osemonjo pinywa. Gin gi teko mathoth, kendo gikadho akwana. Lekegi bitho mana ka leke sibuor. 7Giseketho yiendwa mag mzabibu,kendo giselwaro it ng’opewa. Gisechamo opoko chuth, mi bede odong’ ka rachere. 8Ywaguru mana ka nyako maywago ng’at ma nyocha dwaro kende. 9Onge mogo kata gima imadhoma inyalo chiwo e Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasayemondo otimgo misango mar cham kata misango miolo piny. Mano emomiyo jodolo matimo misengni ni Ruoth Nyasaye ywak. 10Puothe ni nono kendo piny ywak,nimar cham okethore,kendo yiend mzabibu gi yiend zeituni otwo. 11Ywaguru un jopur,nikech ngano gi shairi kod cham duto okethore. Un joma rito puothe mzabibu, ywaguru,nikech yiend mzabibu kod yiend ng’owo osener. 12Yien duto osetwo. Adier, komamanga gi othidhe kod yiend olemo mamoko, osetwo,kendo mor mar ji bende oserumo. 13Un jodolo matimo misengni e kendo-mar-misangorwakuru pien gugru mondo uywagi!Ee, un jotich Nyasachwa, donjuru e Hekalukendo ninduru kanyo e piende gugru otieno duto,nikech onge mogo kata divai e od Nyasachuma unyalo timogo misango mar cham kata misango miolo piny. 14Gouru milome mondo ji ori kech,kendo luonguru chokruok mar lemo. Un jodongo, chokuru jo-Juda duto e Od Ruoth Nyasaye mondo oywagne!
Isa
.
. Chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye chiegni,chieng’ ma Ng’ama Nyalo Gik Moko Duto keloe masira malich. Chieng’no nobed marach manade!16Cham kethore mana kwaneno;mor onge e Od Nyasachwa;17kodhi top e lowo motwo. Onge cham minyalo kano,omiyo dere man nono kethore. 18Dhok chur manade, kendo ng’eng’ ang’eng’a,nikech lek ongenigi. Rombe bende kech nego. 19Aywakni, A Ruoth Nyasaye,nikech legewa gi yiendwa otwo pep,mana ka gima mach owang’o. 20Kata mana le bende ywakni,nikech aore duto oseduono,kendo lege otwo mana ka gima mach owang’o. JOEL 21Gouru tung’ kendo gouru uwi e Sayun got maler mar Nyasaye. Jo-Juda duto mondo okirni,nikech chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye biro machiegni. 2Enobed chieng’ mudho machil,chieng’ mudho mandiwa kendo motimo rumbi. Rumbi maduong’ mar bonyo imo gode,kendo obiro mang’eny mana ka oganda jolweny marateke. Gima chal kodgi pok obetie, bende ok nobedie. 3Gichamo oboke mana ka gima mach owang’o!Piny ma pok gichopoe ber ka puoth Eden,to ka giseaye, to odong’ motwo tarara. Onge gima giweyo mak gichamo.
Fweny
.
-
. Kirangogi, to gichalo farese,kendo giringo ka farese mag lweny5Kiwinjogi ka gichikore ewi gode,to gichalo ka geche maringo,kata ka lum motwo ma mach wang’o. Ochan-gi mana ka oganda lweny maduong’ moriedo ni lweny. 6Ka gibiro, to ng’ato ka ng’ato kirni,kendo wenge ji lokore mamarmar. 7Gimonjo mier ka jolweny,kendo giidho ohinga ka askeche. Gisiko ka gidhi mana nyime tir,ma ok gibar kamoro,8bende moro ok tuomre gi wadgi. Gimwomo gik ma digeng’gi mak gichung’. 9Gimwomo dala lweny, kendo gikalo ohinga piyopiyo. Giidho kor udi, mi gidonjo gie dirisni ka jokuo.
Fweny
.
. Piny yiengni e nyimgi,to polo bende tetni. Wang’ chieng’ gi due oimore,sulue bende ok rieny.
Fweny
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye ruto e nyim ogandane mar lwenyno. Joge mag lweny ng’eny, kendo rateke. Ndalo Ruoth Nyasaye lich manade!Ere ng’ama nyalo siro chieng’no?Ng’wono mar Ruoth Nyasaye12Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya,"To kata mana sani, lokreuru gi chunyu duto,mondo uduog ira kuriyo kech,kendo kuywak kendo kukuyo. 13Chunyu mondo otur, eka onyis ni uywagoru,to kik uyiech ayiecha lepu. "Duoguru ir Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,nikech ong’won kendo okecho ji. Iye ok wang’ piyo, kendo onyiso herane mosiko,bende chunye lor a kuom kelo ni ji masira. 14Dipo ka Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu biro loko parone,mi oguedhu gi cham mogundhoEka unubed gi mogo kod divai, ma unyalo timonego misengni miolo piny. 15Gouru tung’ e got Sayun,gouru milome mondo ji ori kech,kendo luonguru chokruok mar lemo. 16Chokuru ji kanyakla,mondo giikre ni chokruok maler. Luonguru joma dongo,kendo chokuru nyithindo, koda ka ma pod dhoth. Kata mana joma nyocha okendo machiegni nyaka a e utgi mi bi. 17Jodolo ma tiyo ni Ruoth Nyasaye ei Hekalu, nyaka ywagi,kochung’ e kind dhorangach gi kendo-mar-misango. Giywak kama:"A Ruoth Nyasaye, kech jogi ma mwanduni,kik iwe ogendini mamoko jarwa mi nyierwa,ka giwacho niya, ‘Nyasachu ni kanye?’ "18Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nonyiso ni ohero pinye ahinya,kendo nokecho joge. 19Nowinjo ywakgi, modwokogi niya,"Koro abiro miyou cham gi mzabibu kod mo, mi unuyieng’. Onge ogendini mamoko ma nochak ojaru kendo. 20Abiro riembo wasiku mane oa nyandwat,mi ater e thim motwo. Moko motelo nariemb, mi tho e Nam Kado,to man chien notho e Nam Mediterenia. Gibiro tow, mi githing’ ji. Abiro timo kamano nikech gik madongo ma gisetimo.
"Kuom mano in lowo kik ibed maluor,to bed gi mor kendo gi ilo,nikech Ruoth Nyasaye osetimoni gik madongo!22Un le bende, kik ubed maluor,nikech lege loth, kendo yien nyago olemo. Ee, yiend ng’owo kod mzabibu nyago olemo mang’eny. 23Beduru mamor un jo-Sayun,beduru mail kuom gima Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu osetimonu. Omiyou koth maber moromo cham,adier, omiyou kodh chwiri gi kodh opon, kaka chon. 24Cham biro pong’o dere,kendo divai manyien gi mo biro pong’o kuonde keno. 25An ema naoronu bonyogo kaka ogandana mar lweny,to abiro dwokonu gik mane olalnu e higni mane gichamoe puotheu. 26Koro ubiro bedo gi chiemo mathoth, mucham nyaka uyieng’,mi unupak Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu, mosetimonu gik miwuoro. Bende joga ok nochak ojar kendo. 27Bang’e unung’e ni an e dieru, un jo-Israel,kendo ni an Ruoth Nyasaye e Nyasachu, maonge moro kendo,bende joga ok nochak ojar kendo. Nyasaye biro olo Roho mare kuom ji duto28"Bang’e naol Roho mara kuom ji duto. Yawuotu gi nyiu nokor wach,bende jou madongo nolek lek, kendo jou matindo none fweny. 29E ndalogo ema naorie Roho mara,kata mana kuom jotich machwo gi mamon. 30Anatim honni e polo kendo e piny, mondo obed ranyisi. Remo gi mach kod iro madhuolore nobedie,

Joote
.
-
.  Rumi
.
. Chakre kanyo ng’ato ka ng’ato moluongonying Ruoth Nyasaye noresi. Jomoko modak e got Sayun notony kuno. Ee, jomoko notony Jerusalem,mana kaka Ruoth Nyasaye osewacho. Joma Ruoth Nyasaye oluongo nobed mangima. "JOEL 3Ruoth Nyasaye biro ng’ado bura ni ogendini1Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya,"E ndalono nadwok mwandu jo-Juda gi mwandu jo-Jerusalem mane olalnigi,2kendo anachok ogendini duto, mi ater e holo Jehoshafat,(tiende ni, holo ma Ruoth Nyasaye ng’adoe bura. )Kanyo ema nang’adie buchgikuom gik ma gisetimo ni joga Israel,nikech gisekeyo joga awuon e pinje mamoko,mi gipogo pinya e kindgi giwegi. 3Ne gigoyo ombulu mondo gipoggo joga,kendo ne giuso yawuowi gi nyiri obed wasumbni,mondo pesa ma giyudo gichodgo, kendo gimadhgo kong’o.

. "Un jo-Turo gi jo-Sidon kod jo-Filistia duto, ang’omutimonani? Udwaro chulona kuor koso? Ka kamano, to kuor mudwaro chulonoabiro dwoko e wiu uwegi ka diemo wang’.  5Usekawo fetha gi dhahapa, kendoutero giga ma nengogi tek kuondeu mag lemo.  6Bende usekawo jo-Juda gijo-Jerusalem, mutero mabor gi pinygi, kendo ung’iewogi gijo-Yunani.  7Koro adhi gologi kuonde ma useng’iewogie, kendo abiro timonumana kaka natimonigi.  8Abiro miyo jo-Juda ng’iewo yawuotu gi nyiu, kendoginiusgi ni jo-Sabea, modak kuma bor ahinya.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano. "9Nyis ogendini niya,"Ikreuru ni lweny, kendo chokuru jokedo. Ee, luonguru jolweny duto mondo obi!
Isa
.
; Mika
.
. Thedhuru kweu obed ligengni,kendo thedhuru rabeti mau obed tonge. Kendo ng’ama ngoro nyaka nyis ni en thwon!11Returu ubi, un ogendini mokiewo,mondo uchokru e holo. "A Ruoth Nyasaye, mi jolwenji marateke olor kuno!12Ogendini nyaka ikre,mondo obi e holo ma Ruoth Nyasaye ng’adoe bura,nimar kanyo ema an Ruoth Nyasaye abiro betieka ayalo ogendini duto moa koni gi koni.

.
. Gin gi richo mang’eny,omiyo betgiuru duto ka cham mibeto chieng’ keyo. Nyon-giuru ka mzabibu minyono kar bicho,ma mzabibu opong’o, kendo divai o oko. 14Ji gana gi gana nie holo mar ng’ado bura. Kanyo ema chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye chiegni chopoe. 15Wang’ chieng’ gi due olokore mudho,kendo sulue bende ok rieny. Ores jo-Juda16 Amos
.
. Dwond Ruoth Nyasaye mor gi ewi got SayunEe, omor Jerusalem,kendo polo gi piny yiengni. To Ruoth nyasaye nores joge Israel,kobedonigi kama ginyalo geng’oree.
"Bang’e un jo-Israel unung’e ni an,Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu,adak Sayun, goda maler,kendo jopinje mamoko ok nonyone kendo. 18Kindeno yiend mzabibu manyak ahinya nopong’ gode,kendo jamni mathoth noyud e got ka got. Soko nomol kawuok e Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye,mi nomi holo Shitim bedo mang’ich. 19Piny Misri biro lokore thim,kendo piny Edom nolokre thim modong’ nono,nikech jopinjego nomonjo piny Juda,mochuero remb joma onge gi ketho.
,21Abiro chulo kuor ni jonekgo,kendo joketho ok nawe mak akumo. Ji nodag e piny Juda gi Jerusalem nyaka chieng’,kendo Ruoth Nyasaye nodag e got Sayun. "AMOS 1Bura mibiro ng’ado ni ogendini ma okiewo gi jo-Israel1

Jo-Aram ibi dar mi ter mabor e tuech e piny Kir. "

Anakum dala mar Ekron, kendo jo-Filistia duto modong’notho. " Mano e wach Ruoth Nyasaye.

RuothNyasaye owacho niya, "Jo-Moab osetimo richo mang’eny, omiyo abiro kumogimak orem, nikech ne giwango choke ruodh Edom mi giloko buru.  2Kuom manoabiro oro mach e piny Moab mondo owang’ kuonde mochiel motegno magKerioth.  Jo-Moab biro tho e chuny mahu mar lweny, ka jolweny giyo sigichlweny, kendo tung’ ywak.  3Abiro nego ruodh Moab, kaachiel gi jotendpinyno duto. " Mano e wach Ruoth Nyasaye. 4Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Jo-Juda osetimo richo mang’eny, omiyo abirokumogi mak orem, nikech gisechayo puonjna, kendo gisedagi rito chikena. Nyiseche manono mane kweregi lamo osemiyo gibaro, mi giweya.  5Kuom manoabiro oro mach e piny Juda mondo owang’ kuonde mochiel motegno magJerusalem. "Bura mibiro ng’ado ni jo-Israel6Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Un jo-Israel usetimo richo mang’eny, omiyoabiro kumou mak orem, nimar ung’iewo joma onge gi ketho, nikech pokgichulo gopegi.  Joma odhier ma ok nyal chulo kata mana nengo patpatbende ung’iewo ka wasumbni.  7Unyono jochan piny, kendo udhiro jomaodhier oko e yo.  Wuowi gi wuon mare dhi ir dhako achiel ma jachode marHekalu, ka gidwanyogo nyinga maler.  8Kuonde duto ma ji lamoe, ginindo elewni mosingnigi kuom gope.  Divai ma ukawo kuom joma ugoyo faini, umadhoe Hekalu mar Nyasachu.  9T. Chik
.
-
. To koro eka un ema numiyo atiekojo-Amor ma raboche ka yiend sida, kendo matek ka yiend ober.  Ne atiekogipep!"10Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owacho niya, "An ema nagolou e piny Misri, miatelonu e thim kuom higni piero ang’wen, kendo namiyou piny jo-Amormondo obed maru.  11Kwan
.
-
. Ne aketo yawuotu moko mondo obed jonabi,to moko naketo obed jo-Nazir.  Donge awacho adier, jo-Israel? 12To neumiyo jo-Nazir omadho divai, bende nuchiko jonabi ni kik hulwachna.  13Koro abiro diyou piny kama untie, mana kaka gari mopong’ gicham sikore e lowo.  14Jong’uech matek ok notony, kendo joma rateke nobedmool, bende kata mana jolweny mager ok nores ngimagi.  15Jo-Aserenoringi, kendo jong’wech matek ok noresre.  Bende joma oidho farese oknotony.  16To kata mana jolweny mathuondi moloyo noring duge chieng’no. "AMOS 3Tich jonabi1Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Un jo-Israel winjuru gima awacho kuomu.  Neagolo dhoutu duto e piny Misri, 2kendo un ema aseng’eyou kendo ritoukuom ogendini duto manie piny.  Kuom mano abiro kumou kuom richouduto.  3Uparo ni ji ariyo nyalo chako wuoth kaachiel ka pokgiwinjore? 4Koso sibuor beende ruto e bungu ka onge gima osemako? Katanyathi sibuor nyalo ng’ur e gono adier, ka onge gima ochamo?
"Bende winyo nyalo moko e obadho ka ok oketne kudni? Koso obadho nyalomeko ka onge gima otuge?
"Bende tung’ mar lweny nyalo ywak e dala mak omiyo ji luoro? Kosogimoro nyalo timore e dala ka ok Ruoth Nyasaye ema okelo?
"Adier, onge gima Ruoth Nyasaye timo ka ok onyiso jotichne ma jonabi.
"Ere ng’ama ok diluor ka sibuor ruto? Koso ere janabi ma diling’ makohulo gima Ruoth Nyasaye owachone?"Masira ma biro mako Samaria9Gouru milome e ut ruodhi mag Ashdod gi mag Misri, kuwacho niya,"Chokreuru kanyakla e gode moluoro Samaria, mondo uneye timbe pogruokmatimore e dalano, kendo kaka ithiro ji kuno. "10Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kama: "Jogo ok ong’eyo kaka digibed jomaobidhore.  Gipong’o utgi madongo gi gik moyaki.  11Kuom mano wasigu nolworpinygi, kendo noketh kuondegi mochiel motegno kod utgi madongodongo. "12Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Kaka jakwath reso lemo ariyo kata it romboma ondiek osechamo, e kaka Nyasaye nores mana jo-Israel manok modakSamaria.  13Koro chikuru itu mondo usiem nyikwa Jakobo ni Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho kama:
Ruo
.
. Chieng’ ma nakumjo-Israel kuom richogi, to naketh kende mag liswa man Bethel bende. Tunge mag kendogo nong’ad oko, mi ginipodh piny.  15Anamuk udi midakiendalo chwiri kod mago midakie ndalo oro.  Udi ma olich igi gi lak liechnodong’ gundni, kendo ot ka ot maduong, nokethi. "AMOS
"Winjuru, un mond Samaria machwe ka dhok makwayo e lege momew.  Uthagojoma onge teko, kendo usando joma odhier, bende ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomurungo chwore, ka wacho niya, ‘Kelna gima anyalo madho!’ 2To kaka RuothNyasaye en Ng’ama Ler, osesingore ni ndalo biro ma wasiku noywaue giolowu, kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu nochal mana gi rech ma olowuomako.  3Ginigolu e dala ka giluwo kama ohinga omukoree, mi giniwituoko. "Jo-Israel ok opuonjore kuom kum ma Nyasaye omiyogi4Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Un jo-Israel, kara dhiuru Bethel mondo utimatima richo e hekalu, kendo dhiuru Gilgal mondo utim richo kuno gitekreu duto! Keluru jamni mondo utimgo misengni okinyi kokinyi, kendokeluru chiwo mar achiel kuom apar chieng’ mar adek ka chieng’ maradek.  5Chiwuru makati ma ok ketie thowi ka misango mar erokamano, kendolanduru wach, kusungoru kuom misengni muchiwo kuom herou! Nimar gimakamano ema bernu ka utimo. "6Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "An ema nakelo kech e miechu duto, mi ubedoma onge gi chiemo.  To kata kamano ne ok uduogo ira.  7Ne atamo kothchuenu e ndalo monego ochuee.  Ne amiyo koth ochue e mier moko, to puothemane ok ochuee nowang’.  8Ji ne a e mier moko, kendo wuotho kool kadhi edala moro dwaro pi, to ne ok giyud moromogi.  To kata kamano, ne okuduogo ira.
"Naoro dera morocho chambu ewi dongo.  Bonyo nochamo chambu gi yiendumag mzabibu gi ng’owo kod zeituni.  Kata kamano ne ok uduogo ira.
"Ne akelonu yamo marach mar tho machal gi mano mane akelo ni jo-Misri. Bende namiyo yawuotu mang’eny otho e lweny, kendo amayou fareseu.  Neamiyo mifuond jomotho e kambeu othing’ou.  To kata kamano ne ok uduogoira.
Chak
.
. "Ne atieko jomoko kuomu kaka ne atieko Sodom gi Gomora,kendo ne uchalo gi luth moyudh e mach.  Kata kamano ne ok uduogo ira.
"Kuom mano un jo-Israel, abiro timonu mana gik ma kamago.  To nikechabiro timonu kamano, omiyo nyaka uikru ni romo ni Nyasachu. "13Nyasaye ema noloso gode, kendo ochueyo yamo.  Onyiso dhano parone,bende oloko ler mar odiechieng’ bedo mudho.  En e ruodh piny duto, kendonyinge en Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto. AMOS 5Oluong jo-Israel mondo olokre1Chikuru itu un jo-Israel mondo uwinj wend ywak ma achuogonu.
"Oganda Israel osepodho,to ok nochak oa malo. Opodho piny auma e lope owuon,kendo onge ng’ama ochunge. "3Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Dala Israel mane jolweny owuokie alufuachiel, biro duogoe mana ji mia kende.  To mano mane owuokie ji miaachiel, biro duogo mana ji apar. "4Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni jo-Israel niya,
"Kudwaro bedo mangima, toduoguru ira.  To kik udhi Bethel, kata kik udhi Gilgal, bende kik ukadhnyaka Beer-sheba, nimar jo-Gilgal ibiro daro mi ter e tuech, kendoBethel biro lal nono. "6Ka udwaro bet mangima, to dwaruru Ruoth Nyasaye, nono to obiro muochkuom joka Josef ka mach.  En mach mabiro wang’o jo-Israel maonge ng’amanego.  8Ayub
.
;
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye ema nochueyo Yugni gi Ratego, kendoen ema omiyo piny ru kendo yuso.  Oluongo pi nam mondo obi, kendo oologie piny.  9En ema omiyo sulue wuok kendo podho, kaluwore, chakre OluoroBudho nyaka Ratego. 7Mano wach manade kuom un ma loko bura makare ataro, kendo tuono ji gikmonego giyudi! 10Un to umon gi ng’ama odonjo ni jaketho, kendo uchayong’at mawacho adiera.  11Usethiro joma odhier, kendo usekawo chambgi mokokaka osuru.  Kuom mano ok unudag e udi mabeyo mag kite musegero, bende okunumadh divai kuom mzabibu mabeyo musepidho, 12nimar ang’eyo kaka kethoung’eny, kendo ang’eyo kaka richou okadho akwana.  Un usando joma onge giketho, kendo uchamo asoya, bende utamo joma odhier yudo buramakare.  13Emomiyo ng’at mariek ling’ aling’a, nikech piny rach. 14Dwaruru ber, to kik udwar rach, mondo ubed mangima, kendo RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto obed jakoru adier kaka uparono.  15Bedurumamon gi gik maricho, to heruru gik mabeyo, kendo gururu bura makare eut bura, nikech dipo ka Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto otimong’wono ni joka Josef modong’. 16Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho kama: "Ywak birobet e yore duto mag dala, kendo kuonde duto ji nobed kaywakie, ma katamana jopur noluong mondo oywagi kaachiel gi joma ong’eyo wendeywak.  17Ywak nobed e puothe duto mag mzabibu, nimar anabi mondoakumu.  18Un joma ofuwo ma dwaro mondo chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye obi, uparoni chieng’no nokelnu ang’o? Ok nobed chieng’ ler, to nobed mana chieng’mudho! 19Unuchal mana gi ng’at ma sibuor riembo, to romo gi ondiek, katamachal gi ng’at modonjo e ot, kendo oyiengo lwete e kor ot, mi thuolokayo! 20Chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye en mana mudho mandiwa.  Adier, en chieng’molil, maonge ler!
Isa
.
-
. "Amon gi sewni mutimona, kendo ajarogi, bende ok aheronyasi mau mag lemo.  22Ka utimona misengni miwang’o pep, kod misengni magcham, to ok nayiego, bende ok narang jambu mutimogo misengni magsawo.  23Weuru baro wiya gi wendeu mag pak, nikech ok adwar winjo thumbemugoyona.  24Weuru bura makare omol ka pi, kendo tim makare bende omol kaaora ma ok duon.
Joote
.
,
. "Apenjou, un jo-Israel, bende nutimona misengni, kendoukelona chiwo kuom higni piero ang’wen mane utieko e thimgo duto? 26Koronyaka uting’ nyisecheu manono mag sulue ma Sakuth gi Kaiwan maneuloso, 27kendo abiro darou mi ateru e tuech, e piny man loka machielomar Damaski. " Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho kamano. AMOS 6Oketh Israel1"Mano biro bedo wach marach manade kuom joma odak maber Sayun, kendokuom joma ogeno ni gode mag Samaria nyalo resogi.  Un joma dongo magoganda maduong’ moloyo, ma joma jo-Israel dhi irgi mondo oyudkonyruok, 2dhiuru uneye Kalne mi uchwe nyaka Hamath, eka ulor udhi Gathe piny jo-Filistia.  Uparo ni uber moloyo jo-pinjego? Koso pinyu duong’moloyo pinjegi? 3Un joma ok odewo ni chieng’ bura biro, to urikni manakutimo timbe mahundu! 4Un ma unindo e kitendni molos gi lak liech, kendoutaroru e kombe madongo, kuchamo nyirombe mugolo kuom jambu, kodnyiruedhi machue mopidh maber.  5Un muchuogo wende manono, kugoyo thumkendo uloso thumbe kaka ne Daudi loso, 6umodho divai gi ndope, kendouwiroru gi modhi ma nengogi tek, to ok litnu ka joka Josef rumo.  7Kuommano, ubiro bedo joma ikwongo daro, kitero e tuech.  Mano biro bedo gikomar mor mudhialorugono. "8Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto osesingore owuon niya, "Asin gisunga mar joka Jakobo, kendo asin gi utgi madongo dongo.  Abiro chiwoSamaria ma dalagi, kod gik moko duto man e iye e lwet wasigu.  9Ka jiapar odong’ e ot achiel, to ginitho giduto, 10kendo ka wat ng’at achielkuom joma othogo obiro mondo ogol ringre wadgi, owang’, nopenj niya,‘Pod nitie ng’ato modong’ koso?’ To dwoko nobed ni, ‘Ongee.  To ling’nimar nying Ruoth Nyasaye ok nyal hul. ’ "11Ruoth Nyasaye biro golo chik, mi udi madongo nomuki, mi lokre pidhe,to matindo noteng’ matindo tindo.  12Farese bende nyalo ringo e kite?Koso dhok nyalo puro nam? To un uloko bura makare mana gima kech, kendotim maber uloko mana gima rach.  13Umor kuom loyo dala maonge ndhathe,bende usungoru ni un gi teko moloyo kawo Karnaim.
"To un jo-Israel, abiro kelo oganda moro mondo omonju, kendoginisandu, chakre kama idonjogo Hamath, man yo nyandwat, nyaka holo manyo Araba, yo milambo.  An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema awachokamano. "AMOS 7Fweny adek1Ruoth Nyasaye nokona e fweny, mi anenoe rumbi mar bonyo monywol e ndaloma cham chiegni chiekie.  2E fwenyno naneno ka bonyogo osetieko chamogimoro amora mang’ich e piny.  Eka ne awacho niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye,ng’wonni jogi, ma joka Jakobo.  Ere kaka ginyalo resore, to ginokkamano?" 3Mi chuny Ruoth Nyasaye nolendo, mowacho niya, "Ee, ayie.  Gimakamano ok notimre. "4Ruoth Nyasaye nochako okelona fweny machielo, mi aneno ka ooro machmondo owang’ nam maduong’ manie bwo piny, kendo mondo otiek gik mokoduto manie piny.  5Eka naywak niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, akwayi ni we timokamano.  Ere kaka jo-Israel nyalo resore, to ginok kamano?" 6Mi chunyRuoth Nyasaye nochako olendo, mowacho niya, "Mano bende ok bi timore. "7Ruoth Nyasaye nokelona fweny moro machielo mi anenoe ng’ato mochung’ ekor ot, koting’o tol mar rapim mipimogo kor ot mondo one ane korieretir.  8Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nopenja niya, "Amos, ang’o minenono?" Ne adwokeniya, "Aneno tol mar rapim. " Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "Apimo chunyjoga Israel gi rapim, mana kaka ng’ama pimo kor ot, kendo ok nachakawenigi ngang’.  9Kuonde ma joka Isaka lemoe ibiro kethi, kendo kuondemaler duto mag Israel biro kethore, bende abiro biro mondo aked gi dhoodJeroboam. "Amos gi Amazia10Amazia jadolo man Bethel nonyiso Jeroboam ruodh Israel niya, "Amospiem kodi e Israel, kendo wechene biro ketho piny.  11Owacho niya,‘Jeroboam biro tho e lweny, kendo jo-Israel ibiro daro e pinygi, mi teree tuech. ’ "12Amos owuon, to ne Amazia okwero niya, "Dhi kucha, jakorni! Dhiyo epiny Juda mondo ikor wach kuno iyudgo chiembi.  13To kik ichak ikor wachBethel ka, nikech ma en Hekalu mar pinywa, kama ruoth lemoe. " 14To Amosnodwoko Amazia niya, "An ok an janabi, to bende mano ok tija.  An manajakwath, kendo jarit yiend ng’owo.  15To Ruoth Nyasaye ema nokawa kaakwayo rombe, mi owachona niya, ‘Dhiyo mondo ikor wach ni jogaIsrael’ 16Kuom mano koro winj wach Ruoth Nyasaye.  Ikwera ni awe korowach kuom jo-Israel, kendo ni awe wacho weche manono kuom jokaIsaka.  17To Ruoth Nyasaye wachoni kama: ‘Chiegi biro doko jachode e dalaSamaria, kendo yawuoti gi nyigi noneg e lweny.  Lopi nopog gipimo girapim, to in iwuon initho e piny moro nono, kendo jo-Israel nodar, miter e tuech. ’ "AMOS 8Fweny mar ang’wen: atonga moting’o olemo1Ruoth Nyasaye nokelona fweny machielo, mi anenoe atonga moting’oolemo.  2Ruoth Nyasaye nopenja niya, "Amos, ineno ang’o?" Ne adwoke ni,"Aneno atonga moting’o olemo mochiek. " Eka ne Ruoth Nyasaye owachonaniya, "Joga Israel bende ochiek ni yudo kum, kendo ok nachak awegi makakumogi.  3Chieng’no wende ma iwero e od ruoth nolokre mag ywak, kendoringre jomotho nopie kuonde duto, to piny noling’ thi. "Okor ni kethruok Israel chiegni4Winjuru un joma nyono jochan, kendo temo manyo joma odhier.  5Uwachokendu uwegi niya, "Mad ndalo mag lemo mar due manyien rum piyo, mondowaus cham. " Bende upenjoru niya, "Ndalo mag Sabato biro rumo karang’o,mondo wagol chambwa warundi? Eka wanyalo keto nengo mamalo, kendo tiyogi rapim ma ok ni kare mondo wawuondgo jong’iewo! 6Wabiro uso chammaricho e nengo maber.  Bang’e wanyalo ng’iewo joma odhier mondo obedwasumbni mana kuom nengo moromo patpat. " 7Jo-Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachjoka Jakobo osekuong’ore ni wiye ok nowil gi timbegi maricho.  8Kuom manopiny biro yiengni, kendo ji duto modakie noywagi! Piny duto biro tetni,bende obiro ting’ore mi opie, mana ka aora Nael manie piny Misri. 9Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Chieng’no nami chieng’ podhi odiechieng’tir, mi piny lokre mudho ka chieng rieny ha.  10Anami sewni mau lokreywak mar tho, kendo wendeu mag mor nolokre dengo.  Anami urwak pien gugruuduto, kendo uliel wiu.  Unuchal joma ywago wuodgi ma miderma, kendochieng’no nobed malit adier. "11Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ndalo biro ma anakelie kech e piny, ok kechmar chiemo, kata riyo mar pi, to mana riyo mar winjo wach RuothNyasaye.  12Ji nowuoth kadawo, chakre nyandwat nyaka milambo.  Ginidignichakre yo wuokchieng’ nyaka yo podho chieng’, ka gimanyo wach RuothNyasaye to ok giniyudi.  13Chieng’no nyiri ma jobeyo kod yawuowi bendenopodh piny nikech riyo.  14Ji duto makuong’ore gi nying Ashima, maNyasaye madhako mar Samaria, kata makuong’ore gi nyasach Dan, kendo ginyasach Beer-sheba, nopodh chuth, kendo ok nochak oa malo. "AMOS 9Buch Ruoth Nyasaye1Ne aneno Ruoth Nyasaye kochung’ e bath kendo mar misango, kowacho niya,"Tuom sirni mag hekalu,mondo agola duto oyiengni. Mukgi mondo gilwar ewi ji,to ji duto modong’ anami otho e lweny. Onge ng’at ma noringi,kata ma notony. 2Kata ka gikunyo bur,mi gichopo nyaka kar joma otho,to abiro gologi mana kuno. Kata ka giidho nyaka e polo,to abiro lorogi piny. 3Ka gipondo ewi got Karmel,to nadwargi nyaka amakgi. Ka gipondona e bwo pi matut,to anachik thuol mondo okagi kuro. 4Ka wasikgi omakogi ka terogi e tuech,to anachik mondo oneggi kuno. Aramo ni ok natimnigi maber,to nyaka atimnigi marach!"5Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto mulo piny,mi piny leny,kendo ji duto modakie ywak. Piny duto ting’ore malo,kendo pie,mana ka aora Nael. 6Ruoth Nyasaye gero ute e polo,kendo orenjo polo kuom piny. Oluongo pi nam mondo obi,kendo oologi e piny. Ruoth Nyasaye e nyinge!7Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Un jo-Israel, gima atimonu chalo mana gigima atimo ni jo-Ethiopia.  Bende nagolo jo-Filistia e piny Kaftor, kendonagolo jo-Aram e piny Kir, mana kaka un bende nagolou e pinyMisri.  8Arango piny jo-Israel motimo richoni, kendo abiro tieke e wang’piny.  Kata kamano ok anatiek joka Jakobo duto te.  9To anagol chik, mianapiedh jo-Israel e kind ogendini duto, ka cham mipiedho e odheru,kendo kata wang’ cham achiel ok nolwar piny.  10Joga duto ma jokethoibiro negi e lweny kata mana mago duto mawacho niya, ‘Nyasaye ok nowemasira chop kuomwa. ’Gueth mibiro guedhogo Israel11 Joote
.
-
. "Chieng’no anachung’ e dhood Daudi mosebet ka otmolokore gunda.  Analos kuonde momukore mondo oduog maber.  Abiro gerekendo, mi alose machal gi kaka nochal chon.  12Bang’e jo-Israel nolojo-Edom modong’ kaachiel gi ogendini mamoko duto ma chon yande meka. "Ruoth Nyasaye mabiro miyo gima kamano timore owacho kamano. 13Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ndalo biro ma cham nobed mang’eny, mi nogolpur ka ji pod keyo, kendo mzabibu nonyag mathoth, mi nochak oket kodhika ji pod loso divai.  Yiend mzabibu mang’eny mabeyo nonyag mathoth egode duto, mi unubed gi divai mang’eny.  14Abiro chako amiyo joga Israeldag e ngima maber.  Gibiro gero miechgi mane olokore gundni, mi gidagie,kendo gibiro pidho yiend mzabibu, mi gimadh divai.  Gibiro puro puothegi,mi gicham gik manyakie.  15Abiro pidhogi e lopgi mane amiyogi kendo oknochak opudhgi. "OBADIA 1Jo-Edom obolore1Magi e weche mane Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni Obadia e fweny kuom jo-Edom. Ruoth Nyasaye oseoro jaotene ir ogendini,kowacho niya,"Biuru mondo wadhi waked gi jo-Edom. "Kendo wasewinjo wachne. 2Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni jo-Edom niya,"Abiro miyo udokoe matinie moloyo e kind ogendini duto,mi ji duto biro jarou. 3Sunga ma un-go osewuondou!Udak e mbita mar lwanda motegno,kendo dalau ni ewi gode malo. Mano emomiyo uwacho kendu uwegi niya,‘Ere ng’ama didwokwa piny?’4To kata bed ni ugero dalau midimidi malo ka od ongo,mi uchal mana gi joma odak e kind sulwe kamano,to abiro dwokou piny. "Ruoth Nuasaye omedo wacho niya,
"Ka jokuo obiro gotieno to gikawo mana gik ma gidwaro,kendo ka ji pono mzabibu to pile giweyo moko. Un to wasiku oseyweyou oko gi yuech!6Yaye, joka Esau! Giseyudo mwanduu, kata mana mago mupando, mi giyako. 7Ogendini mane uriworugo osewuondou,mi giseriembou ua e pinyu. Joma ne ubetgo gi kue koro oseloyou,kendo osiepeu mane uchiemogo osechikonu obadhoka giwacho kuomu niya, ‘Riekogi cha duto koro olal kanye?’ "8Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya,"Chieng’ ma nakum piny Edom, anatiek jogi mariek,mi onge rieko ma nodong’ e piny gode mag Esau. 9Jolweny mag Teman biro bwok,mi noneggi, maonge kata achiel modong’ e piny gode mag Esau. 10Notieku kendo nochau nyaka chieng’ nikech ne unego oweteu ma jokaJakobo muyakogi. 11Chieng’ mane wasikgi moa e pinje mamoko omuko dhorangeyegi,ne uchung’ achung’a. Ne uricho mana ka wasigu mane oyako mwandu Jerusalem,mi opogo e kindgi giwegi gi ombulu.
"Ne ok onego ubed mamor gi masira mane oweteu ma jo-Juda oyudo,bende ne ok onego unyiergi chieng’ rumbgi. Ne ok onego usungru kuneno ka gin e chandruok. 13Chieng’ mane masira omako joga,ne ok onego udonj e dalagimondo unyiergi ka gin e thagruok, kendo uyak mwandugi.

. Ne ok onego uchung’ e akek yomondo ugeng’ ni joma dwaro tony,kendo chieng’ mane gin e chandruok,ne ok onego uketgi e lwet wasikgi.
"Chieng’ ma an Ruoth Nyasaye abiro ng’adoe bura ni ogendini chiegni. Yaye, jo-Edom! Gik ma usetimo ema notimnu,kendo timbeu maricho nodong’ mana e wiu uwegi. 16Joga oseyudo kum malit ewi goda maler,omiyo ogendini molworo joga biro yudo kum malit moloyo. Ibiro kumogi sidangg’, mi gilal nono!Jo-Israel olocho17"To jomoko modak e got Sayun biroo tony kuno,mi kanyono nobed kama ler. 18Joka jakobo gi joka josef nochal mach,mi ginitiek joka Esau manaa kaka mach wang’o tiang’ mi tieki. Onge nyakwar Esau moro ma nodong’ kangima. An Ruoth Nyasaye ema asewacho kamano. "19Jo-Israel modak yo milambo nokaw piny gode mag Esau,kendo joma odak e tiend gode mag Juda biro kawo piny jo-Filistia. Jo-Israel nokaw piny Efraim gi Samaria,to jo-Benjamin nokaw piny Gilead. 20Jo-Israel mamalo mane odar, mi oter e tuech,ma koro ni Sefarad, biro kawo mich piny man yo milambo. 21Jo-Israel biro dhi e got Sayun mondo oresi,mi god Esau nobed e bwo lochgi. To Ruoth Nyasaye ema nobed ruoth. JONA 1Jona oringo Ruoth Nyasaye1
Ruo
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Jona wuod Amitai niya,
"Wuogi,idhi Nineve, dala maduong’, mondo isiem jodalano, nikech richogiosechopo e nyima. " 3To kane Jona owinjo kamano, nowuok mondo oring odhiTarshish, oa e wang’ Ruoth Nyasaye.  Nodhi Jopa, kuma noyudoe yie madhiTarshish.  Nochulo nengo mar wuoth, mi oidho yie mondo odhi Tarshish kumabor gi Ruoth Nyasaye.  4To Ruoth Nyasaye nomiyo yamo okudho matek e nam,mi ahiti mager ne dwaro ketho yie.  5Kibaji nogoyo jokwang’, mi ng’ato kang’ato nolamo nyasache.  Gik mane gin go e yie ne giwito e nam, mondo yieodong’ mayot.  To sechego noyudo Jona oselor e yie piny, kendo orierekuno ka nindo ogoye ngoga.  6Jatend yie nopo konwang’o Jona kanyo,mopenje niya, "Ang’o momiyo inindo aninda? Chungi mondo iywag ninyasachi, dipo ka owinjo moresowa. "7Jokwang’ nowacho e kindgi giwegi niya, "Biuru wago ombulu, mondowang’ego ni ng’ano mokelonwa hawi marachni. " Kamano ne gigoyo ombulu, miombulu nolwar mana kuom Jona.  8Eka ne gipenje niya, "Ang’o mitimo ka?Nyiswa kuma iaye.  To ija kanye?" 9Nodwokogi niya, "An ja-Hibrania, kendoalamo Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach polo mane ochueyo nam gi piny. " 10Kanegiwinjo kamano, ne gidoko maluor ahinya, mi giwacho niya, "Mano kakaisetimo gima rach!" Ne giwacho kamano, nimar ne giseng’eyo ni Jona ringoa e wang’ Ruoth Nyasaye, nikech noyudo osewachonigi. 11Koro nam ne medo tugore marach moloyo, omiyo jokwang’ nopenjo Jonaniya, "Watimni ang’o, mondo nam okuenwa?" 12Jona nodwokogi niya,"Kawauru ubola e nam, to bang’e nam biro bedonu mokue, nimar ang’eyo niahiti maduong’ni obironu mana nikech an. " 13To jogo nokiewo yie matekmondo gigow e dho nam, to ne ok ginyal, nimar nam nomedo tugore giahiti, motamogi.  14Mogik ne giywak ni Ruoth Nyasaye, ka giwacho niya, "ARuoth Nyasaye, yie kik iwe watho kuom nego ng’atni, kendo kik ikwanwa kajonek kuom tho ng’at ma ok oketho, nimar gima osetimore en manadwaroni. " 15Kamano ne gikawo Jona, mi gibolo e nam, eka namnokue.  16Bang’ mano jokwang’ noluoro Ruoth Nyasaye ahinya, mi negitimone misango, kendo gikuong’orene.
Math
.
. To Ruoth Nyasaye nosechano ni mondo rech mang’ongo omwonyJona, omiyo Jona noriyo ei rechno ndalo adek, odiechieng’ gotieno. JONA 2Jona olemo ka goyo erokamano1Jona nolamo Nyasaye gi ei rech, kowacho niya,
"A Ruoth Nyasaye,ne aywakni ka an e masira, mi nidwoka. Naywak ka an e Piny Joma Otho mondo ikonya,mi niwinjo ywakna. 3Niluta e chuny nam mandiwa,mi ataro nolwora koni gi koni. Apaka gi ahiti duto nokadho kuoma. 4Naparo ni oriemba e nyimi,kendo ni ok nachak ane Hekalu mari maler. 5Pi nolwora, modwaro thung’a,nam matut noima chuth. 6Nadhi piny e tiend gode,mi buya mag nam nogajore e wiya. A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha,nanimo e piny moroma dhorangeyene olor nyaka chieng’. To kata kamano nigola e bur kangima. 7Kane chunya dwaro a,ne apari, A Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo lemona nochoponi e Hekalu mari maler. 8Joma lamo nyiseche manononyalo weyo gik ma gigeno kuomgi,9an to natimni misango,ka apaki gi wer. Anachul gima asingorani. Ruoth Nyasaye ema reso ji!"10Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko rechno, mi ong’ogo Jona e dhonam. JONA 3Jo-Nineve oweyo richogi1Ruoth Nyasaye nochako owuoyo gi Jona kendo, kowachone niya,
"Wuogi,idhi Nineve, dala maduong’, mondo isiem jodalano gi wach ma abiromiyi. " 3Kamano Jona nowuok modhi Nineve kaka Ruoth Nyasaye nochike.  ToNineve ne en dala maduong’ gilala, moromo wuodh ndalo adek, kia tung’ekoni nyaka kocha.  4Math
.
; Luka
.
. Jona nodonjo e dala, mowuothokuom odiechieng’ achiel.  Eka nogoyo milome kama: "Bang’ ndalo pieroang’wen, ibiro ketho Nineve!" 5Kane jo-Nineve owinjo gima Nyasayenowacho, ne giyiego.  Ne gigoyo milome mondo ji otue chiemo, kendo negirwako piende gugru giduto, joma dongo gi joma tindo machalre. 6Kane ruoth owinjo wachno, noa malo e kome, molonyo lepe mag ruoth,kendo norwako pien gugru, mi obet e buru.  7Ruoth gi jodonge nogoyomilome e Nineve duto niya, "Onge dhano kata chiayo ma nobil chiemo katadhi e kwath, kata mana modho pi.  8Nyaka girwakre gi pien gugru, kendogiywag ni Nyasaye gi tekregi duto.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato mondo owe yorenemaricho kaachiel gi timbene mag miero.  9Kamoro Nyasaye dipo ka olokoremoweyo mirimbe, mi ok watho. " 10Nyasaye noneno gima ne gitimo mokaka negiweyo yoregi maricho.  Omiyo nolokore, mi ok okelo masira kuomgi kakanosesiemogi. JONA 4Mirimb Jona gi ng’wono mar Nyasaye1Wachno nojogo Jona ahinya, mi iye owang’.  2Wuok
.
. Omiyo nowacho niRuoth Nyasaye niya, "A Ruoth Nyasaye, kane pod an thurwa, donge nawachoni ibiro timo gima kama? Mano emomiyo ne atemo ringo mondo adhiTarshish, nikech nang’eyo ni in Nyasaye ma jang’wono, kendo makecho ji. Iyi ok wang’ piyo, kendo inyiso hera mosiko, bende chunyi lor a kuomkelo ni ji masira.

.
. Omiyo koro kaw ngimana, A Ruoth Nyasaye. Da ber katho, moloyo bet mangima!" 4To Ruoth Nyasaye nopenje niya,"Bende iparo ni ber kikecho kamano?"5Jona nowuok modhi obet piny yo wuok chieng’ mar Nineve.  Nogero kirukanyo mobetie koyueyo chieng’, korito gima ditimre ni dalano.  6RuothNyasaye nomiyo otangle otwi e wi tat kiruno, mondo okel tipo ma dimiJona kue.  Omiyo Jona nobedo mamor ahinya gi otangleno.  7To kinyne kanepiny oru, Nyasaye nomiyo kudni ochwowo otangleno, mi otangle otwo.  8Kanechieng’ owuok, Nyasaye nokelo yamb ugue maliet, mi chieng’ ochamo wiJona, kendo nong’no otere.  Kuom mano, nogombo mondo otho, kowacho niya,"Da ber katho, moloyo bet mangima. " 9To Nyasaye nopenje niya, "Iparo niber kikecho kuom tho otangle?" Nodwoko niya, "Ee, ber ka akecho, katamana nyaka tho!" 10Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowachone niya, "Ka inyalo kechootangle, mane otwi otieno achiel, to otho otieno machielo, mane okipidho, kata miyo dongo kamano, 11an to donge dakech Nineve, dalamaduong’ man gi nyithindo moloyo alufu mia achiel gi piero ariyo,(

) kaachiel gi jamni mang’eny?"MIKA 1Ywak miywagogo jo-Samaria gi jo-Jerusalem1

. Kitabuni ondikie weche mane Ruoth Nyasayeomiyo Mika ja-Moresheth e fweny kuom Samaria gi Jerusalem e kinde lochJotham gi Ahaz gi Hezekia, ruodhi mag Juda. 2Winjuru un ogendini duto!Chikuru itu,un ji duto modak e piny!Ruoth Nyasaye nowuog e Hekalu maler,mondo onyis gik musetimo. 3Ruoth Nyasaye biro wuok kar dane maler,kendo nolor piny,mowuothi ewi gode. 4Gode biro leny e bwoyemana ka odok moket e mach. Giniruombre e holnimana ka pi mabubni e abururu. 5Mago duto biro timore nikech jo-Israel oseketho, mi oweyo Nyasaye.  Erejoma omiyo jo-Israel oweyo Nyasaye kamano? Gin mana jo-Samaria! Koso erejoma timo richo mar lamo nyiseche manono e piny Juda? Donge gin manajo-Jerusalem? 6Kuom mano Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Abiro miyo Samariadok gunda e pap, kama inyalo pidhoe mzabibu.  Anang’iel kite mag dalano eholo mi awe mise mage tangalare.  7Kido mopa mag nyisechegi ibiro toyomatindo tindo kendo wang’ gi mach, mi lokre pidhe mag yugi.  Ji nolosonyiseche manono gi mwandu mane giyudo kuom weyo Nyasaye, omiyo korogibiro yudo gima romre gi richo mar weyo Nyasaye. "8Bang’e Mika nowacho niya, "Abiro ywak malit nikech wachni.  Abiro wuothogi tienda nono, kendo ka an duk, mondo anyisgo kuyo ma an go.  Anahol kadhiang’ kendo naywag ka tula 9nimar adhonde Samaria ok nyal chango.  Katamana Juda bende osebedo gi adhondego, nikech masira osechopo e dhorangaJerusalem hie koma jowa odakie. "10Kik unyis jo-Gath ni oselowa, bende kik uwe gine ka waywak.  Bukreurugi buru e dala mar Beth-afra.  11Jo-Shafir idaro kitero e tuech duge, kawigi okuot.  To joma odak Zaanan ok nya wuok ka ngima.  Ka uwinjojo-Bethezel ka ywak, to unung’e ni ng’ato ok nyal kuo kuno.  12Jo-Marothtwenyore malit ka rem ramo, kendo gidwaro resruok, nikech Ruoth Nyasayeosekelo masira machiegni gi dhoranga Jerusalem.  13Un joma odak Lakish,tueuru fareseu e geche lweny.  Ne uluwo timbe maricho mag Israel, miumiyogo jo-Jerusalem odonjo e richo.  14Koro un jo-Juda gouru oriti nidala mar Moresheth-gath, nikech ruodhi mag Israel ok noyud konyruok edala mar Beth-akzib. 15Un jo-Maresha, Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni obiro ketou e lwet wasigu mabiro kawo dalau.  Ruodh Israel biro dhi pondo e rogo man Adulam.  16Unjo-Juda, pwodhuru wiu obed ranyisi ni uywago nyithindo muhero.  Ee,lokreuru rabonde ka achudhe, nikech nyithindugo ibiro mau. MIKA 2Masira ma biro mako joma thiro jochan1Enobed marach manade ni joma riere e kitanda ka paro timo timbemaricho! Gichiew ka piny yawore mondo gitim richogo, nikech ging’eyo nigin gi teko mar timo kamano.  2Ka gidwaro lop ng’ato, to gikawo akawa githwon.  To kata ka gidwaro udi, to mago bende gikawo akawa.  Gimayo jikata mana utegi kaachiel gi mwandugi, mi giwegi nono.  3Omiyo RuothNyasaye wacho niya, "Achano kelo masira kuomu, kendo enochal lodi eng’utu ma ok unyal gonyo.  Ok unuchak uwuothi ka uchung’ tir, nikechkindeno nobednu kinde marach.  4Ka kindeno ochopo, to ji nogou ngero, kawero wend ywak niya,‘Otiekwa chuth!Ruoth Nyasaye osekawo pinywa,mi omiyo joma oketowa e tuech!’5Kuom mano, onge ng’ato kuomu ma biro yudo lowo chieng’ ma ipoge kendoni Ruoth Nyasaye. "6Ji lwera, kawachona niya "Kik ilwerwa! We lwerowa gi weche ma kamago. Masira ma kamano ok bi makowa! 7Iparo ni okwong’ jo-Israel koso? BendeRuoth Nyasaye dikechi, mi tim gik ma kamago adier? Donge en ema owuoyomaber gi joma timbegi ni kare?"8To Ruoth Nyasaye dwoko niya, "To donge un ema uselokoru wasik joga?Joma duogo gi kue kaa e lweny ka paro ni masira orumo, umayolopegi.  9Uriembo mond joga e mier ma gihero, kendo gueth moa kuomausemayo nyithindgi nyaka chieng’.  10Auru malo mondo udhi! Ka eri ok enkama onego uyuee.  Ubiro rado gi masira.  11Aneno ni janabi ma ji ohero enmana ng’at ma lworore e kor gweng’, gi weche maag miriambo, kokoro ni jini gibiro yudo divai gi kong’o mang’eny.
"To un jo-Israel modong’ abiro chokou kanyakla mana ka rombe manieabila, kata ka kweth manie lek.  Koko nogore e pinyu nikech ng’eny marji.  13Jal ma noyawnigi rangach ema nogolgi oko.  Ginipusre e dhorangach,mi gitony.  Ruodhgi, ma en Ruoth Nyasaye owuon, ema notelnigi ka giwuok. "MIKA 3Okwed jotend Israel1Un jotend Israel winjuru! Donge en tichu, ng’ado bura makare?.  2To katakamaano, umon gi gima ber, kendo uhero mana gima rach! Usando joga malitmana ka ondiek makidho rombo kendo yuyo ring’o oko kuom choke, 3kata kang’ato maturo chok chiayo, kendo kango ring’o mondo otedi, ocham! 4Kindebiro ma unuywagie ni Ruoth Nyasaye, to ok nodwoku, kata mana winjo lemouok nowinji, nikech timbe maricho musetimo. 5Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Jonabi wuondo joga ka nyiso joma miyogi gikmoko ni gibiro yudo kue, to joma ok migi gimoro, to gibwogo ni gibirokelonigi lweny.  6Kuom mano ok ginichak giyud fweny moro gotieno, kendook ginichak gibed gi teko mar koro wach.  Ler ma gineno nolokre mudho,kendo wang’chieng’ biro podhonigi.  7Joma koro wach wigi biro kuot,nikech Nyasaye ok dwokgi. "8To an, Roho mar Ruoth Nyasaye opong’a, momiya teko gi rieko kod chirmar nyiso jo-Israel richogi.  9Winjuru, un jo-Israel mochayo timbemakare, kendo ma loko adiera bedo miriambo.  10Ugero Jerusalem, dalaNyasaye, gi remo kendo e yo mamono.  11Jodong dala ng’ado bura maber manani joma miyogi asoya; jodolo bende lero tiend chik ni joma miyogigimoro, kendo jonabi hulo gik ma gikoro mana ka omigi pesa.  To eka podgineno ni Ruoth Nyasaye biro konyogi! Giwacho niya, "Donge Ruoth Nyasayeni kodwa? Omiyo onge masira moro mabiro makowa. " 12Jer
.
. Gik mutimoma kamagogo biro miyo ipuro Sayun ka puodho, mi Jerusalem lokre gunda,kendo god Hekalu lokre bungu. MIKA 4Loch Ruoth Nyasaye man gi kue e piny ngima(Isaya
.
-
)1E ndalo mabiro,got ma Hekalu ochung’ienobed mabor moloyo gode moko duto,kendo ogendini mang’eny nodhi kanyo. 2Giniwach niya,"Waidhuru god Ruoth Nyasayemondo wadhi e Hekalu mar Nyasach Israel. Enopuonjwa yorene,mi wanaluwgi. "Puonj mar Ruoth Nyasaye wuok Jerusalem. Ee, Sayun e kama owuoyoe gi joge.
Isa
.
; Joel
.
. Enong’ad bura, ka othego ogendini,kendo enoyal weche mag ogendini maratekemodak kuonde maboyo. Ng’ato ka ng’ato nothedh liganglanemondo obed kwer,kendo tongegi ginithedhi rabetni. Onge oganda moro ma noked gi oganda machielo,kendo ji ok nochak opuonjre lweny.
Zek
.
. To ng’ato ka ng’ato nodag e dalane gi kue,koyueyo e tipo yiend mzabibu mare kod ng’ope,ma onge gima goye kibaji. Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema osesingore kamano. 5Oganda ka oganda lamo nyasache kendo tiyone.  Wan to wabiro lamo RuothNyasachwa, kendo en ema wabiro tiyone nyaka chieng’. Okor wach ni jo-Isral ibiro gonyo e tuech6Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Kinde biro ma abiro chokoe joma ne akumo,tiende ni joma ne oter e tuech mi othagore.  7Ging’ol kendo osedargimabor gi pinygi, to kata ginok kamano, to abiro miyo gibed ogandamaduong’, kendo abiro bedo ruodhgi e got Sayun, chakre chieng’no nyakachieng’. "8Omiyo in Jerusalem, dala ma Nyasaye ritoe joge, ibiro bedo dalamaduong’, kendo loch mane in go chon biro duogoni.  9Ere gima omiyo iywakmatek? Ionge gi ruoth koso? Koso ionge gi joma ding’adni rieko, momiyorem chami malit ka dhako ma muoch kayo?.  10Un jo-Jerusalem, rudhreuruarudha e lowo kuywak mana ka dhako manywol, nimar nyaka koro ua e dalauudhi udag oko e thim, kiterou Babulon, kuma Ruoth Nyasaye nokonyoue,kendo noresue kuom wasiku. 11Ogendini mathoth osechokore mondo omonju, ka wacho niya, "Jerusalemnyaka kethi! Wadwaro nenogo kokethore, mondo wagone siboi!" 12Toogendinigo ok ong’eyo gima Ruoth Nyasaye paro.  Gikia ni ochano chokogimondo okumgi, mana kaka ichoko cham midwaro dino! 13Mano emomiyo RuothNyasaye wacho niya, "Un jo-Jerusalem, chakuru kumo wasiku! Abiro miyoubedo maratego ka rwath ma tunge tek ka nyinyo, kendo ma tiende chalochuma.  Ubiro nyono ogendini mang’eny, kendo unuwalna mwandugi kod gik magiseyako, obed maga, an Ruoth Nyasaye ma ruodh piny ngima. "MIKA 51Un jo-Jerusalem, ng’oluru dendu manyiso ni un gi kibaji, nimar wasikwaolworowa, kendo gigoyo lemb jatend Israel gi luth. Loch jawar moa Bethlehem2 Math
.
; Joh
.
. Bethlehem Efratha, in e dala matinie moloyo miechJuda duto.  To kuomi ema jatend Israel biro wuokie, ma anywolane nitienyaka nene.  3Kuom mano, Ruoth Nyasaye biro weyo joge e lwet wasikginyaka dhako ma muoch kayo nywol wuode.  Bang’e jowete wuowino modong’ makotho e tuech, noduogi mi chak riwre gi jowetegi.  4To wuowino nobi, minobed jatend joge, koritogi gi teko kod duong’ moa kuom Ruoth Nyasaye. Joge nodag maber, nikech ji duto manie piny noyie lochne, 5mi enobedng’at makelo kue. Ka jo-Asuria omonjo pinywa, mi omwomo miechwa mochiel motegno, to wanaorjotendwa marateke moloyo, mondo oked kodgi, 6Chak
.
-
. mi ginikethpiny Asuria gi lweny.  Ginireswa ka jo-Asuria monjo pinywa. 7Jo-Israel modong’ mak otho nochal ni ogendini mang’eny ka koth ma RuothNyasaye okelo ni cham, nikech dhano ok nyal kelo koth, to Nyasaye emakele.  8Ee, jo-Israel motony nobed e kind ogendini mana ka sibuor madwaro le e bungu, kata madwaro rombe e lek.  Ka odonjo kuom rombe toopodho kuomgi kendo okidhogi matindo tindo ma onge ng’amaresogi.  9Jo-Israel biro loyo wasikgi mi tiek pep. 10Ruoth Nyasaye wachonu un jo-Israel niya, "E kindeno ananeg fareseukendo naketh gecheu mag lweny.  11Anaketh miechu, mi amuk kuondeu dutomochiel motegno mag siro lweny.  12Abiro ketho timbe ajuoke duto, kendook nuchak ubed gi jokor wach kata achiel.  13Abiro ketho nyiseche manonogi sirni milamo, kendo ok unuchak ulam gik ma uloso uwegi.  14Abiro mukosirni milamo e pinyu, mi aketh miechu, 15to bende abiro chulo kuor gimirimba mager ni ogendini ma ok oseluora. "MIKA 6Ruoth Nyasaye yalo jo-Israel1Winjuru kaka Ruoth Nyasaye yalo jo-Israel.  A Ruoth Nyasaye, bi mondoihul wachni ka gode winjo kendo bedo joneno. 2Un gode, kendo un mise mochwere mag piny, winjuru weche ma RuothNyasaye dwaro yalo, nikech en gi bura gi joge, kendo obiro yalo kodgi. 3Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Un joga, ere gima asetimonu? Ere kakaasemiyo ubedo mool? Dwokauru! 4Wuok

. Un joga, parieuru gima ne Balak ruodh Moab ochano timonu.  Kendokaka Balaam wuod Beor nodwoke.  Bende parieuru gik mane otimore e yo, kuaShitim udhi Gilgal, mana ni mondo ung’e timbe madongo mane atimo mondoaresugo. "Gik ma Ruoth Nyasaye dwaro kuom dhano6Ang’o ma dakel ni Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach polo, ka abiro mondo alame?Dakel nyiroye ma hikgi achiel achiel mondo awang’ne ka misango? 7KosoRuoth Nyasaye dibed mamor ka akelone rombe gana gi gana, kata ka akelonemor zeituni mamol ka aora? Koso onego achiw nyathina makayo ka misangomondo achulgo richona? 8To, in dhano, Ruoth Nyasaye osenyisi yo mabermonego iluw.  Odwaro mondo itim gik makare, kendo iher ji gi ng’wono,bende iluor Ruoth Nyasachi gi chunyi mamuol.  9Luoro Ruoth Nyasaye enrieko.  Ruoth Nyasaye luongo jo-Jerusalem niya, "Winjuru, un jomaochokore e dalani.  10Mwandu muyudo e yor miganga ema opong’o ut jomaricho.  Gipimo gik moko gi rapim ma ok ni kare, ma ok adwar.  11Bendeuparo ni anyalo weyo ni joma tiyo gi rapim ma ok ni karegorichogi? 12Joma jomoko manie dalani mayo joma odhier.  Gin jomriambomosiko ka hango wach ahanga.  13To koro asechako goyou gi goch malitmondo atieku nikech richou.  14Kuom mano, unuchiem to ok unuyieng’, kendokech pod nokau akaya.  Ka ugolo gik moko e uteu mondo upandi, to okunyal.  To kapo ni ureso gimoro, to abiro miyo okethre e lweny! 15Ubirochuoyo, to ok unuka cham, kendo ubiro biyo zeituni, mi uyud mo, to okunukonyru gi morno.  Bende unulos divai, to ok unumadhi.

. Useluwo timbe maricho mag ruodhOmri, gi mag dhood Ahab, kendo pok uweyogi.  Omiyo abiro tiekou, mi joubed joma ichayo.  Adier, ogendini mamoko duto biro mana charou. "MIKA 7Timbe maricho mag jo-Israel1A yaye! Koro achalo ng’ama kech kayo, mobiro pono olemo, to oyudo kayath odong’ nono, ma onge olemo minyalo cham kata mana ng’owo mamitnamanyak atamalo.  2Ji moluoro Nyasaye oserumo e piny Israel, kendo ongekata ng’at achiel makare modong’.  Ji duto kichore ni chuero remo, kendong’ato ka ng’ato chiko mana ni wadgi obadho.  3Gitimo timbe maricho gichunygi duto.  Jodongo kwayo gik moko mondo omigi, kendo jong’ad burachamo asoya, bende jotelo golo chik mana kaka gin ema gihero.  4Kuommano, kata mana timbegi mabeyo kendo modimbore obam, kendo chalo mana gibunge motimo kuthe.  To koro chieng’ ma Nyasaye kumogie osechopo, manakaka jonabi mage ne osiemogi ni enotim.  Omiyo koro kihondkoomakogi.  5Kik iyie gi weche wadu, kendo kik igen kuom osiepeni, to bendenyaka itang’ ni weche miwacho kata mana ni chiegi.  6Math
.
,
; Luka12.
. E ndalogi yawuowi jaro wuonegi, nyiri bende kwedo minegi, kendomond yawuowi kwedo weg utegi.  Kamano wasik ng’ato gin mana joodgi. Ruoth Nyasaye okelo ler gi warruok7An to abiro manyo Ruoth Nyasaye. Abiro rito Nyasaye jawarna,kendo Nyasacha biro winjo wachna. 8Yaye wasika, kik ogona siboi,nikech kata obedo ni asepodho,to abiro chung’ kendo. Kata obedo ni adak e mudho,to Ruoth Nyasaye nobedna ler. 9Aseketho e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye omiyo ayie mirimbe nyaka ochwaka,mi ong’adna bura maber,kendo ogola oko e ler,mi ane ni otimo gima kare kaka nosingore. 10Bang’e wasika mane penja ni,‘Ere Nyasachi nogono?’None gima osetimore,mi wigi nokuodi. Eka ananegi ka oselogi,kendo onyon-gi pinyka chuodho ma e wang’ yo. 11E ndalo gogo,un jo-Jerusalem unuchak uger ohingau,kendo unuyar tong’ pinyu,12mi jou noduog iru koa kuonde duto. Ginia Asuria yo wuok chieng’,kod Misri, yo milambo,kendo ginia e dho nembe gi gode duto. 13To piny nokethre,mi lokre thim,nikech timbe maricho mag joma odakie. Ruoth Nyasaye okecho jo-Israel14A Ruoth Nyasaye,rit jogi miseyiero,kaka jakwath kawo luth,kendo kwayogo jambe. Gidak mana kendgi e thim,ka piny momew olworogi koni gi koni. To we mondo gikwa e lege mag Bashan gi mag Gilead,kaka ne gitimo chon. 15Timnwa honni kaka nitimoe kinde mane iwuokie Misri. 16Ogendini one honnigo,mondo luoro omakgi,kata obedo ni gitek kamano. Giniling’ thi,kendo ok giniwinj gimoro. 17Gininang’ lowo mana ka thuol,kendo giniwuog kuonde ma gipondoemana ka gik malak piny. Giniduog ir Ruoth Nyasachwa ka giluor kendo ka gitetni. 18A Ruoth Nyasaye,onge Nyasaye moro maromo kodi. Iweyo ni jogi iwuon modong’ richogi,kendo ok ikechi nyaka chieng’,to iherowa gi hera mosiko. 19Inichak ikechwa kendo,mi inyon richowa e tiendi,kendo inyumgi e bwo nam. 20Initim gima kare, kendo iniher jo-Israel ma nyikwa Ibrahim gi heramosiko, mana kakane isingori ni kwerewa chon. NAHUM 1Mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye mochulogo kuor1 Isa
.
-
;
.
-
; Zef
.
-
. Ma e fweny mane Nyasaye omiyo Nahumja-Elkosh kuom dala mar Nineve. 2Ruoth Nyasaye en Nyasaye ma janyiegokendo ma jachul kuor gi mirimbe mager. Okano mirima e chunyemondo ochulgo ni wasike kuor. 3Iye ok wang’ piyo,to en gi teko mathoth. Chutho ok onyal weyo joricho mak okumo. En gi yore moluwoei kalausi kendo ei ahiti,bende boche polo e buru monyono. 4Kogolo chik, to nembe gi aore duono,mi lokre lowo motwo. Lege mabeyo mag Bashan gi Karmel two,kendo lumbe mang’ich man Lebanon wang’. 5Gode madongo gi matindotetni e nyime, kendo leny nono. Piny duto kod joma odakie bende tungni. 6En ng’a manyalo chomo mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye tir?Koso ere ng’ama nyalo siro gero ma en-go?Mirimbe o okomana ka aora mar mach,kendo lwendni barore abara e nyime. 7Ruoth Nyasaye ber. En e kar konyruok mar adierni joma dwaro mondo okonygi ka gin e thagruok,bende ong’eyo ji duto mogeno kuome,8kendo oresogi e ohula ma raywoyi. Joma opiem kode to otieko chuth,kendo oriembogi koterogi e mudho. 9Un jo-Asuria ere gima omiyo upiem gi Ruoth Nyasaye?Obiro tiekou en owuon!Joma mon kode ok nohedhre piem kode kendo!10Giduto giniwang’ pepmana ka kudho mochoki,kata ka tiang’ motwo. 11Ng’at machach ni kuomumachano gik maricho kuom Ruoth Nyasaye,12To Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya,"Kata obedo ni wasigu ng’eny kendo rateke,to ibiro negogi,mi girum chuth. To un jo-Juda,kata obedo ni asandou,to ok anachak asandu kendo. 13Koro abiro chodo nyororo motueugo,mi agolu e tich misumba. 14Ruodh Asuria to awachone kama:‘Asegolo chikmondo nyingi orum chuth!Yawuoti ok nobed ruodhi kari,kendo abiro ketho nyisecheni manie hekalu mari,mi ananegi nikech in gima nono!’ "Wach maber owinji ni Nineve oselo15 Isa
.
. Neyeuru kaka jaote ringo kalor e gode kakelo wach maber markue.  Owacho niya, "A yaye, un jo-Juda, timuru sewni mau, kendo chiwuruni Ruoth Nyasaye gik mane usekuong’oru ni unuchiw, nimar joma richo oknochak olou kendo, nikech osetiekgi chuth. "NAHUM
,2Un jo-Israel ma nyikwa Jakobo, Ruoth Nyasaye biro dwokonu duong’ mayande un go, kata obedo ni joma monjou oseyakou, mi okawo olemb mzabipu. Un jo-Nineve, oganda lweny mag wasiku ma ketho gik moko oselworoumoketou diere.  Ranguru yo, kendo jiwreuru gi tekou duto! 3Jolwenjgioserwakore gi nengni makwar, kendo kuodigi kwar ka remo.  Gechegi maglweny oriedo, kendo rieny mana ka wang’ chieng’! 4Giringo ka gimwomore ealap mar dala, ka moro ka moro tuomore gi wadgi.  Gichalo gi meny mang’angni kendo gimil e dir dala mana ka polo.  5Ruodh Nineve kok ka golochik ni jotende.  Gichwanyore ka gireto, kendo girikni mondo gidhi gichanjolwenjgi e ohinga.  6To dhorangeye mag aore molworo dala oseyawore,kendo kibaji goyo joka ruoth.  7Chi ruoth ogol oko duk, moter e tuech,kendo jotichne duto manyiri ywak malit komako wigi.  8Nineve koro chalogi yawo ma pige dwono, nikech jolwenje duto ringo weye.  Okoknigi kowachoni, "Chung’uru!" To onge ng’ama duogo. 9Mwandu mag fedha gi dhahabu oyaki, kendo nenore ni ging’eny ma ok rum. Gin mwandu mabeyoe moloyo ma chuny ng’ato nyalo gombo.  10Mago duto oyakimotieki, ma onge gima odong’.  Kibaji goyo joge, kendo chongegi tuomoreka gitetni, kendo wengegi olokore makwar haa!11Koro tinde ere dala mane ong’ere kaka gond sibuor, kama thuondi nenitie, kendo kama mon gi nyithindo ne odakie ka onge gimagiluoro? 12Nineve ne chalo gi sibuor.  Nonego wasike mondo opidhgonyithinde kod monde, mi opong’o dalane kod mieche mamoko gi mwandumoyaki kaachiel gi wasumbni. Okor wach ni Nineve ibiro kethi13Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Asedoko mamon kodi, kendo abiro wang’ogecheni mag lweny! Nyithindi duto biro tho e lweny, kendo gik moko dutomane iyako nomayi.  Bende dwond jotendi mioro ok nowinji. "NAHUM 31Mano kaka inine marach yaye dala Nineve! In dala momienore gi remokendo ma miriasia gi gik moyaki opong’o.  2Winjie kaka del michwadogofarese ywak, kendo kaka geche mag lweny ringo matek ka tiendegi wuo!Tiend faras diko piny matek, kendo geche lweny chikore kamwomore.  3Ligengni gi tonge ng’ang’ni, kendo mil.  Joma otho okadhoakwana, kendo ringregi odhurore pidhepidhe kuonde duto.  Ji chwanyoreachwanya kuomgi.  4Mago duto otimore nikech timbeni modwanyore.  Ne indala ma jaber, to ipong’ gi timbe mag juok.  Ne indhogo ogendini gitimbeni mag juok gi mag dwanyruokgo. 5Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya, "Amon kodi, kendo abiroelo lepi nyaka malo e ng’uti mondo ogendini duto one dugi, mi wiyikuodi.  6Abiro bolo kuomi gik mochido modwanyore ka akuodo wiyi, mondo jiduto onyieri.  7Ji duto moneni nobwogi, ka wacho niya, ‘Mano kaka Nineveokethore malich!’ To kata kamano, onge ng’ama noho chunyi.  Chutho erekama diyudie ng’ama diywagi?"8In iparo ni ditony moloyo jo-Amon, dala mane ni e but aora Nael, ka piolworo koni gi koni ka ohinga? 9Jo-Ethiopia gi jo-Misri ne e tekre,kendo ne gin gi teko mathoth.  Jo-Put kod jo-Libya bende ne konye.  10Tokata kamano, en bende ne oloye, mi omak joge moter e tuech.  Nyithinddalano ne ochwad piny e akek yore, mi otho, kendo ne ogo ombulu mondoong’ego joma dikaw jotende ka wasumbni.  Jodongo mage duto bende ne otuegi nyororo. 11Kamano e kaka in Nineve bende ibiro kwang’ ka ng’at momer, mi pinychami, kendo inimany kar tony kiringo wasigu.  12Kuondeni duto mochielmotegno mag siro lweny nopodhi.  Notiekgi mana ka ng’owo mokwongo chiek,ma lwar e dho joma yiengo yath.  13Jolwenji nodok manyap ka mon. Dhorangeye mag pinyi noyawre malach ni wasigu, kendo mach nowang’gi pep. 14Ikreuru ni ageng’a mabiro.  Umburu pi kendo nyonuru lowo, unywasi mondoogogo matafari mang’eny ulosgo kuonde mag siro lweny obed motegno.  15Toe kinde ma utimoe gigo, mach nowang’u, mi tieku pep, kendo liganglanonegu, mi wasigu notieku mana ka nyithi bonyo ma chamo gik moko duto magiyudo.  Kata obedo ni unywoloru ka dede kamano, to unulal nono mana kakarumbi mar dede mahuyo kendo lal nono. 16Jou ma johala ng’eny ka sulue ma e polo, 17kendo jodongu kod jotenduchokore kaachiel mana ka dede mopoto e chiel ka koyo ng’ich.  To gidutogibiro ringo mi gilal nono mana ka det bonyo ma ringo ka chieng oowopiny, kendo onge ng’ama ong’eyo kuma gidhiye. 18A yaye ruodh Asuria, jodongi oriere piny kotho, bende jogi oke e korgode ka onge ng’at machokgi.  19Adhondeni ok nyal chango, nimar gidhimarach.  Ji duto mowinjo gima otimoreni biro pamo lwetgi gi mor, nimaronge kata ng’at achiel e piny ngima ma pok isebedo kisando. HABAKUK 1Habakuk ywagore ni adiera onge1Ma e wach mane Ruoth Nyasaye onyiso janabi Habakuk e fweny. 2A Ruoth Nyasaye, nyaka karang’o ma anyalo ywaknie mondo ikonywa, to okiwinja? Aywakni ka awacho niya, ‘Masira’, to ok ireswa.  3Ere gima omiyoiweyo aneno chandruok machalo kamano? Koso ang’o momiyo iweyo anenotimbe mamonogi? Mecho kod timbe machach ema aneno, kendo miero gi lwenyolwora koni gi koni.  4Kuom mano ji ok luw chik, kendo buche ok yal giadiera, nimar joma timbegi mono thoth, mohewo joma kare.  Mano emomiyoadiera iloko aloka. Okor wach ni jo-Babulon biro sando jo-Juda5 Joote
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye ne odwoka niya, "Winjuru un joma andhokegi!Gimoro biro timore ma ubiro wuoro kendo biru bwogou, nimar abiro timogimoro e ndalou, ma ok unuyie kinyisou.
Ruo
.
. Abiro kelojo-Babulon, ma oganda mager kendo ma jomrima! Giwuotho e piny ngima kagimayo jomoko nono miechgi.  7Gin joma ger marach, kendo gitimo mana gimagin ema gidwaro to onge ng’ama geng’ogi.  8Faresegi jong’wech moloyokwach, kendo ger moloyo ondiegi mawuotho ka piny oselil.  Joidh faresegia kuma bor, kendo gihuchore mana ka ongo ma yudho gima omako, 9kendojoma temo geng’ogi, leny nono koneno kaka gilich.  Gichoko ji ma gimakomang’eny mana ka kuoyo.
"Gijaro ruodhi kod jodonggi, bende giseyo kuonde mochiel motegno magsiro lweny, nikech gidhuro pidhe mag lowo, ma giidhogo ohinga, kendogimuko kuonde mochiel motegnogo.  11Bang’e gikadho piyopiyo mana ka yamo,ka gidhi kamoro machielo.  To kata kamano gin joketho nikech gikwanotekregi giwegi ka nyasachgi. "Habakuk ywagore ni Ruoth Nyasaye12A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha kendo ma Ng’ama Ler, donge in e Nyasaye manyaka nene kendo mochwere? A Ruoth Nyasaye ma Lwandawa, in ema iketojo-Babulon mondo okumwa king’adonwa bura.  13In to iler ma ok inyal yieneno richo, kata yie nenoo timbe mamono.  Koro ere gima omiyo irangoaranga joma andhokegi, to ok itim gimoro? Koso ang’o momiyo iling’aling’a ka joma richo tieko joma kare moloyogi. 14Koro imiyo ji chalo mana gi rech ma e nam, kata gi gik malak piny, maonge gi jotelo.  15Jo-Babulon mako ji mana kaka jolupo mako rech giolowu, kendo ywayogi gi tol ka mor.  16Bang’e gikulore ni tondegigo kendogiwang’onigi ubani ka giwacho niya, "Magi e nyiseche ma kelonwa mwandu,momiyo wadak maber. " 17A Nyasaye, koro ibiro weyo gitimo kamano nyakachieng’ ka ginego ogendini anega, to ok idew?HABAKUK 2Ruoth Nyasaye odwoko Habakuk1Abiro chung’ kara.  Adier, abiro chung’ ewi kama oger mabor mar ng’icho,mi arit mondo ane ane gima Nyasaye biro dwoka kuom ywakna. 2Eka ne Ruoth Nyasaye odwoka kama: "Ndik wach mibiro yudo e fweny,kigoro maler e kite mopa, ma ng’ato nyalo somo mayot, mi ring nyis jomamoko.  3Hib
.
. To fweny mibiro yudono nigi kinde moketne, kendo kakindeno ochopo, to gigo notimre mana ma piyopiyo mak orem.  Kata ka inenoni odeko, to rite arita, nikech notimre maonge kiawa, kendo mana e kindemowinjore. "
Rumi
.
; Gal
.
; Hib
.
. Koro ma e fweny nogo: Ng’at ma chunyeok ni kare nopodhi, to ng’at makare nobed mangima nikech adierane. Masiche mabiro mako joma richo5Andhoke ma jo-Babulon sungore, to ok ginidhi maber.  Gisechoko ogendinimang’eny moa e pinje mopogore opogore, ka wuoro omakogi, to ok ginyalyieng’.  6To kinde biro ma joma koro gimakogo nong’ong’nigi, kawachoniginiya, "Unune malit, un jomecho ma doko momew gi mwandu moyaki kod gikmohol. " 7Donge joma uholo gik moko biro bandhou gigo? Koso donge gibirotucho apoya, mi giteng’u nyaka udong’ nono, mi ubed wasumbgi? 8Kaka neuyako ogendini mang’eny, e kaka ogendini duto bende noyaku, nikech remomane uchuero kod timbe mahundu mane utimo e piny kendo e mier, kusandogojoma odakie. 9Unune malit, un muyudo mwandu e yo marach, mondo ugergo dalau kamaoting’ore ma wasigu ok nyal monjoue.  10Tim musetimo kutieko ogendinimang’eny biro kelonu wichkuot, mi ket ngimau e masira.  11Kata mana kitemanie kor utu noywagrenu, kendo yien manie tetu nodwokgi!12Mano kaka unune malit, un joma gero mier gi pesa moyud kuom nek gimecho.  13Donge Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto osewacho ni gik maogendini mamoko oseyudo gi luchgi nowang’, mi lal nono?
Isa
.
. Kinde biro chopo ma joma ong’eyo duong’ mar Ruoth Nyasayenopong’ie piny ka, mana ka pi mopong’o nam. 15Unune malit, un joma sando jopinje makiewo kodu, mi kwang’ ka jomaomer, mana ni mondo unyiergi ka giwuotho duk.  16To un bende duong’ ma ungo biro lokore wichkuot, nikech ubiro madho kikombe ma mirimb Nyasayeopong’o mi ukwang’.  Ee, Nyasaye biro kumou malit mi unubed gi wichkuotmarach kar duong’ mane un-go.  17Timbe mahundu, mane utimo ni Lebanon,kendo nek mane unegogo le man kuno nodog e wiu, kendo nomi udhier nono,nikech usechuero remo e piny kendo e mier, bende usetimo timbe mahunduni joma odakie duto. 18Ere ohala muyudo kuom lamo nyiseche manono ma lwet dhano ema oloso?Gin mana kido mamiyo ji lal.  Ere ohala ma ng’at molosogi yudo kuomgi?Chutho oloso mana nyiseche manono ma ok nyal wuoyo! 19Unune malit, unjoma wacho ni yath mopa mondo ochiew, kendo ma kwayo kidi mondo oa malo. Bende gik makamago dikelnu wach moa kuom Nyasaye adier? Obawgi gi fedhakod dhahabu, kendo gionge gi ngima.  20Ruoth Nyasaye to nie Hekalu mare. Piny duto mondo oling’ thi e nyime!HABAKUK 3Lemo mar Habakuk1Ma e lemo mar Habakuk janabi:2A Ruoth Nyasaye,asewinjo humbi,kendo timbeni miya luoro. Chak itim timbeni machon mana e ndalogi,kendo kata obedo ni ikecho kamano to ng’wonnwae. 3Nyasaye biro koa Teman. Ee, Ng’ama Ler biro koa got Paran. Duong’ne maler opong’o kor polo kaachiel gi piny. 4Othinyore ka ler mar okinyi,kendo meny ariyo rieny e bathe koni gi koni. Kor polo kanyo e kama opandoe duong’ne maler. 5Tho malich otelo e nyime,to dera luwo bang’e. 6Ka ochung’ to piny yiengni,kendo ka ong’icho,to ogendini kirni,bende gode duto ma nyaka nene barore kendo nimo. Pod owuotho mana kaka ne owuotho chon. 7Aneno ka kihondko malichomako jo-Kushan gi jo-Midian,madak e hembe. 8A Ruoth Nyasaye,mirima omaki gi aore koso?Koso ikecho gi nam,ma omiyo ibiro kiidho fareseni kod gecheni ma ilochogo?9Igolo atung’ oko,kendo ipong’o olalo gi asere. Imiyo ohula baro piny,10bende ka gode orangi,to tetni ka luoro omako. Ohula mwomo ka ridore,kendo nam matut wuo matekka apaka gingore. 11Wang’ chieng’ gi dueochung’ achung’a keregi,ka gineno polo ka mil,mana ka gima gin aserni gi tong’ magi. 12Iwuotho e piny gi gero,kendo inyono ogendini piny gi mirima. 13Ibiro mondo ires jogi,kaachiel gi ruoth miseyiero. Iseketho od jaricho,chakre tado nyaka dier ot,kimuko mise mare chuth. 14Wasikwa nobiro ka kalausi,kaparo ni ibiro tiekowa,mana kaka inyalo tieko ng’at modhier man kar kende. To kata kamano ne itiekogimana gi gilwenjegi giwegi. 15Ka ingado nam gi fareseni,to apaka madongo gingore. 16Ka awinjo gigi to kibaji goya,kendo dhoga tetni. Chokena duto nyosore,kendo tiendena kirni ka luoro ohewa. Ahora mos,karito chieng’ ma masira biro makoe joma monjowa. 17Kata obedo ni ng’owo ok thiew,kendo mzabibu gi zeituni ok nyagi,bende puothe ok chieg cham,kendo rombe gi dhok onge dala,18to pod anamor amora kuom Ruoth Nyasaye,kendo anabed moil kuom Nyasaye jawarna.

Sam
.
; Zab
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye e tekra. En ema omiyo tienda bedo mayot ka tiend mwanda,mondo awuothgo kuonde moting’ore. ZEFANIA 1Chieng’ mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye1
Ruo
.
—
.
;
W. Nda
.
—
.
. Ma e wach Ruoth Nyasaye maneobiro ni Zefania wuod Kushi ma wuod Gedalia, ma wuod Amaria ma wuodHezekia, e ndalo Josia wuod Amon, ruodh Juda. 2Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Abiro yweyo gik moko duto manie piny, mi lalnono.  3Abiro tieko dhano kaachiel gi le, bende abiro tieko winy ma e korpolo, kod rech ma e nam.  Abiro goyo joma timbegi mono piny, mi atiekkoth dhano chuth.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano.
"Abiro kumo jo-Juda kod jo-Jerusalem duto, mondo atiek tich lamo Baalduto mitimo ka, mi kata mana nying jodolo manono ok nowinji.  5Bendeabiro tieko ji maidho ewi udi, kendo kulore piny kalamo gik mane korpolo, Kod joma lama an Ruoth Nyasaye, to kendo kuong’ore gi nyingMilkom, nyasaye manono, 6kaachiel gi joma oselokona ng’egi, kendo okmanya kata kwaya mondo akony. "7Ling’uru thi e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, nimar odiechienge chiegni.  RuothNyasaye oseloso misango, kendo osepwodho wende. 8Owacho niya, "Ka chieng’ ma atimoe misango ochopo, to anakum joka ruothkod jotendgi madongo, kaachiel gi joma luwo timbe jopinjemamoko.  9Chieng’no abiro kumo jogo duto mamiel e laru mar Hekalu, kendomapong’o od ruodhgi gi timbe mahundu kod timbe mag wuond.
"Chieng’no, ywak nowinjre e dhorangach miluongo ni Dhoranga Rech,kendo e bath dala koma nyien, bende koko maduong’ nogore e gode, 11kendoji modak e dala mamwalo noywagi, nimar joohala duto orumo, kendo jomaloko ohand fedha otiek pep.
"Chieng’no anamany Jerusalem, kamenye gi taya, mi akum joma osikokatimo atima richo, kendo wacho ni Ruoth Nyasaye ok bi timo gimoro katamatin.  13Mwandugi noyaki, kendo miechgi nokethi.  Giniger udi, to okginidagie, kendo ginipidh mzabibu, to ok ginimadh divachgi. "14Odiechieng’ mang’ongo mar Ruoth Nyasaye chiegni.  En odiechieng’marach, kendo obiro koringo piyopiyo, moloyo jalweny majang’wech.  15Chieng’no en chieng’ bura, kendo en chieng’ ywagruok girem, bende en chieng’ kethruok gi lal, kod mudho gi kuyo, kaachiel girumbi molil kod ong’ueng’o malich.  En chieng’ ma tung’ ywakie, 16kendosigich lweny winjoree e mier mochiel motegno, kendo kuonde moger maboyomag ng’icho. 17Ruoth Nyasaye owacho niya, "Abiro kelo ni ji thagruok malich, kendoginituomre atuoma ka muofni, nikech richo ma gisetimo e nyima.  Rembginochuer ka pi, kendo ringregi noriere, ka tow e lowo.  18Fethgi katadhahapgi ok noresgi. "Chieng’ ma Ruoth Nyasaye ng’adoe bura, nyiego mager ma en-go nowang’piny duto, mi tiek pep.  Kamano enotiek gik moko duto modak e piny manaka diemo wang’. ZEFANIA 2Okor wach ni piny Juda gi ogendini molwore biro podho1Chokreuru kanyakla, un oganda ma onge gi wichkuotni, 2ka pok oteru kumabor, mi ulal nono ka mihudhi! Ee, chokreuru, kapok Ruoth Nyasaye okelomirimbe mager kuomu, kata kapok chieng’ mirimbe ochopo.  3Dwaruru RuothNyasaye un jogo duto modak e piny, kobolore kendo korito chikene.  Bendedwaruru tim makare, bende beduru gi chuny mamuol nimar dipo ka uyudo karkonyruok, chieng’ mirimb Ruoth Nyasaye.  4Isa

. Dala mar Gaza ibiro we nono. Ashkelon bende biro dong’ gunda, kendo jo-Ashdod ibiro riembo manaodiechieng’ tir. Abiro kethe miaweye ka onge ng’ama odakie, 6kendo obiro dong’ mana kama jokwath kendeema kwayoe, kendo kama rombe ema nindoe.  7Jo-Juda modong’ ema nobed wegpiny man e dhonam.  Ginikwa jambgi e dhonam kuno, kendo giniyue e utjo-Askelon gotieno, nimar an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi, abiro konyogi,mi adwoknigi gueth mane gin-go chon.

"Kuom mano, an Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasach Israel, akuong’oragi nyinga awuon, ni Moab biro chalo gi Sodom, to Amon nochal gi Gomora,mi gibed kuonde ma aila gi bugni mag pundo ema opong’o, kendo mokethorenyaka chieng’.  Joga modong’ noyakgi mi kaw pinygi. "10Mano ema nobed pok ma giniyud kuom sunga ma gin go, nikech ne giyanyojo-Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, ka gikawore malich.  11To RuothNyasaye biro thinyore mondo okumgi marach! Obiro nego nyiseche duto magpiny gi kech, mi ji duto modak e pinje mae dhonembe kod chulni nokulreka lame, ng’ato ka ng’ato e dalane.

. Un jo-Ethiopia bende ligangla mar Ruoth Nyasayenonegu, 13Isa

; Nah
.
