.
. kendo norie bade kuom pinyman yo nyandwat, motiek Asuria, kendo olok Nineve piny motwo mana kapiny ongoro.  14Kueth mag jamni nogudre kuno, kaachiel gi le duto magthim.  Achuth gi otenga bende nobed kayueyo ewi sirni modong’ kochung’kuno, kendo tula kod agak noywagi e dirise kod dhoudi, bende yien mabeyomane obawgo kor udi nodong’ kong’iengore.  15Ji nopenjre niya, "Koro ma edala mane mor, kendo ogeno kuom lochne cha adier? Koso en e dala manesungore e chunye kawacho niya, ‘Anie kende, kendo onge moro maromokoda’? To koro okethore chuth, mi olokore mana kama le mae thim emaodakie, kendo ng’ato ang’ata ma kadho kanyo wuoro, ka tang’o lwete. "ZEFANIA 3Richo jo-Israel ong’wonnigi1Mano wach malit manade kuom dala Jerusalem, ma jasand ji, kendomonyorore ma japiem! 2Ne ok onyal yie kwer mane ikwerego, kendo ne odagiwinjo puonj.  Bende ne ok oyie kuom Ruoth Nyasaye, kata mana sudomachiegni kode ne ok osudo.  3Jotende ne chalo gi sibuoche ma ruto e iye,kendo ruodhi mage ne chalo gi ondiegi mawuotho gotieno, ma ok we piny runi gimoro ka pok gitieko, 4Jonabi mage ne joyiem, kendo ne ok gin jonabimadiera, bende jodolo mage ne ok dew gik mowal ni Nyasaye, kendo negiketho chik.  5To Ruoth Nyasaye man Jerusalem timo mana gik makare.  Okotim gimoro marach to ong’ado bura gi adiera okinyi kokinyi mak olewongang’.  Jaricho to wiye ok kuodi. 6Ruoth Nyasaye wacho kama: "Aseyweyo ogendini ka yuech, kendo ohingni magigeng’orego okethore chuth.  Asemiyo wang’yoregi olokore thim ma ongeng’ama luwo.  Miechgi bende okethore, kendo odong’ nono ma onge jomaodakie.  7Ne aparo ni jo-Jerusalem diwinj chikna, omiyo ne awachoniginiya, ‘Luorauru, kendo winjuru puonjna. ’ To kata kamano ne giketochunygi mana kuom timo timbegi mamono.
"Kuom mano an Ruoth Nyasaye, awachonu niya, ‘Ritauru! Adier, rituruchieng’ ma abiro chung’ie ka ayalou, nimar asechano choko ogendini koddhoudi kanyakla, mondo aol kuomgi mirimba duto maliet ka mach, kendomabiro wang’o piny duto ma tiek pep.  9Bang’e anapwodh dho ji mondo anRuoth Nyasaye ema gilama, ka gitiyona gi chuny achiel.  10Joga malamakendo moke loka aora mag Ethiopia, nobi kakelona mich.  11Chieng’no, inJerusalem ok niyud wichkuot kuom timbeni mamono mane ipiemgo koda, nimare kindeno anagol jogi ma josunga kendo ma jong’ayi, mi ok nichak isungrikendo e goda maler.  12To joma nawe nobed joma odhier kendomathagore.  13Fweny
.
. Jo-Israel modong’ noyud kar resruok e nyingRuoth Nyasaye.  Ok ginichak gitim timbe mamono, kendo weche mag miriambomiwuondogo ji ok nowuog e dhogi, nimar ginichal gi rombe machiemo kendonindo piny, ma onge ng’ama bwogo. ’ "14Un jo-Sayun, koguru gi mor! A jo-Israel, gouru mahu matek! Ee, bedurumamor gi chunyu duto, yaye, jo-Jerusalem, 15nimar Ruoth Nyasayeoseriembo wasiku, motero kuma bor.  Ruoth Nyasaye ma Ruodh Israel niekindu, omiyo ok unuchak uluor masira. 16Wach ma nobi ni Jerusalem chieng’no e ma: A jo-Sayun, kik ubed maluor,kendo kik uwe lwetu nyosre.  17Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachu nie kindu, mondooritu maber mana ka jalweny.  Obiro bedo mamor nikech un, mi ochak onyisuherane, kower gi mor nikech un, mana kaka ne otimo chon.  18Ruoth Nyasayewacho niya, "Abiro golo masiche oko kuomu, mi ok ginimiu wichkuotkendo.  19Winjuru! Ka kindeno ochopo, to anakum joma thirou.  Anakonyrang’onde, kendo anachok joma oke, mi alok wichkuot mane joga nigo obedpak gi huma e piny ngima.  20Ka kinde ochopo monego achokue, to anakeludala.  Anamiu pak kod huma e kind ogendini duto mae piny, ka adwokonugueth mane un-go chon, mana kuneno.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "HAGAI 1Ojiw jo-Israel mondo ochak oger Hekalu1 Ezra
.
—
.
;
.
. Chieng’ mokwongo mar due mar auchiel e higa marariyo mar loch Darius, Ruoth Nyasaye nokelo ni janabi Hagai wach mondoonyis Zerubabel wuod Shealtiel, ma jatend piny Juda, gi Joshua wuodJehozadak, jadolo maduong’ niya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutowacho kama: Ogandani wacho ni kinde pok ochopo mar chako gero Hekalumara. "3Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nochako ooro wach ni Hagai janabi mondo openjjo-Israel niya,
"Bende ma en kinde maber adier monego un uwegi udag eutu mugero mabeyo, ka Hekalunani to omukore kama? 5Mano emomiyo koro anRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto awacho ni, nonuru timbeu! 6Usechuoyomathoth, to ukayo matin, bende uchiemo to ok uyieng’.  Umetho to ok romu,kendo urwakoru to koyo pod chamou achama.  Jatich tiyo kendo chamo msara,to oketo pesane mana e mifuko motuch.
"Emomiyo an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto awacho kama: Nonurutimbeu! 8Dhiyouru e gode mondo ukel yien ugergo Hekalu ma amorgo, kendokama duong’na maler nyalo nenoree.  9Ugeno yudo gik mathoth, to uyudomana manok.  Ka ukelo cham dala, to akudhogi kucha.  An Ruoth Nyasayeapenjo ni, ‘Uparo ni atimo kamano nikech ang’o?’ To adwokou kama: ‘Atimokamano nikech Hekaluna odong’ gunda, ka un to, ng’ato ka ng’ato nigi odeowuon motimoe gige.  10Mano emomiyo polo otwo, ma koth ok chuenu, kendopiny otho ma ok nyag gimoro.  11Asehono oro mondo otwo piny kaachiel gigode, mi cham gi mzabibu kod zeituni, gi gik moko duto ma piny nyago,ner, mondo kech omak dhano gi jamni kendo oketh tije duto ma dhanooloso. ’ "12Zerubabel wuod Sheatiel, gi Joshua wuod Jehozadak jadolo maduong’,kaachiel gi ji moko duto mane oa e tuech nowinjo weche Ruoth Nyasaye,kaachiel gi weche mane Hagai owacho kane Ruoth Nyasachgi oore, mi luoromaduong’ nomakogi e nyim Ruoth Nyasachgi.  13Kuom mano, Hagai jaote maneRuoth Nyasaye ooro, nonyiso ji weche mane Nyasaye omiye, kowacho niya,"Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni en kodu. " 14Bang’ mano Ruoth Nyasaye nojiwochuny Zerubabel wuod Shealtiel ma jatend piny Juda, gi chuny Joshua wuodJehozadak, jadolo maduong’, kod chuny ji mamoko mane oa e tuech, 15mi negibiro mi gichako gero Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto maNyasachgi, due piero ariyo gang’wen, due mar auchiel. HAGAI 2Duong’ maler ma Hekalu manyien nobedgo1Due piero ariyo gachiel, due mar abiriyo e higa mar ariyo mar lochruoth Darius, weche mane Ruoth Nyasaye owacho gi dho janabi Hagai emagi:
"Penj Zerubabel wuod Shealtiel ma jatend Juda gi Joshua wuodJehozada, jadolo maduong, kod joma moko duto niya, 3Ezra
.
. ‘Bendenitie ng’ato modong’ kuomu duto mane oneno Hekaluni kapod nigi duong’nemachon? Ka kamano, to tinde onene kochal nadi? Donge ochalnu ka gimaonge?’ 4Bang’e nyis Zerubabel gi Joshua wuod Jehozadak jadolo maduong’kod ji moko duto mondo ojiwre obed motegno.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awachokamano. "Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho ni, "Chakuru achaka tich,nikech an kodu, 5Wuok
.
,
. kendo Roho mara ni kuomu.  Kik ubedmaluor, 6Hib
.
. nikech awacho kama: Gimoro achiel kende ema odong’;en ni abiro yiengo polo gi piny kod nam.  7Bende anayieng ogendini duto,mi mwandugi duto nobi ka, mi anapong’ Hekalu gi duong’ maler.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano.  8An e wuon fedha, kendo an e wuondhahabu.  9Duong’ ma Hekaluni biro bedogo achien nolo duong’ mane en gomokwongo, kendo anakel kue gi gueth ka.  An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko Duto awacho kamano. "Okwer ji kuom weyo Nyasaye10Due piero ariyo gang’wen, due mar ochiko, e higa mar ariyo mar lochDarius, wach Ruoth Nyasaye mane obiro gi dho janabi Hagai e ma: 11RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho kama "Nyis jodolo mondo odwok wachma apenjogini.
‘Ka nga’to oting’o ring’o mowal ni tich Nyasaye e riaklawe, mi riak laweno ogere e makati, kata e kado, kata e divai, kata emo, kata e chiemo moro amora, to gima ogere kuomeno bende didok mowal nitich Nyasaye koso?’ " Eka Hagai nopenjoo jodolo wachno, mi gidwoke ni,"Ooyo. " 13Kwan
.
-
. Hagai nodhi nyime kapenjogi niya, "To ka ng’atoomuloo ringre ng’at motho, mi koro odoko mogak, bang’e ogere kuomgimoro, koro gino bende didok mogak koso?" Jodolo nodwoke niya, "Dodokmogak. "14Eka Hagai nowacho niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye wacho kama: Mano e kakajo-Israel, kod gik moko duto ma gitimo, chalo.  Mano emomiyo gik mokoduto ma gichiwona e Hekaluni ogak.  15To paruru ane gima biro timorechakre kawuono.  Kane pok uchako gero Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye kendo, toere kaka ne uchalo? 16Donge kane ng’ato obiro kama ochokie cham, kaoparo ni obiro yudo gunde piero ariyo, to ne oyudo mana apar kende? 17Neasektho chambu duto gi dera marach kod pe, to kata kamano ne ok uduogoira.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "
"Paruru, chakre kawuono, due piero ariyo gang’wen due mar ochiko, maen odiechieng’ moketie mise mar Hekalu mara.  19Adier, chakre kawuonoparuru matut mondo une ane ka pod cham dibed matin, kata kapod mzabibugi komamanga kod zeituni ok dinyag olemo.  Ooyo, ok nobed kamano, nikechchakre kawuono abiro guedhou. "Nyasaye osingore ni Zerubabel20Chieng’ due piero ariyo gang’wenno, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nochako obironi Hagai niya,
"Nyis Zerubabel jatend Juda ni abiro yiengo polo gipinyu.  22Analok loch ruodhi, mi aketh teko mag pinje mamoko, kendo anagogeche mag lweny piny, kaachiel gi joithgi.  Ng’ato ka ng’ato noked giwadgi, mi farese kod joma idhogi nonegi.  23To chieng’no anakawi, injatichna Zerubabel wuod Shealtiel kendo anami ibed ruodh jogo, nikech inema aseyieri.  An Ruoth Nyasaye ema awacho kamano. "ZEKARIA 1Oluong jo-Israel mondo oduog ir Ruoth Nyasaye1 Ezra
.
—
.
;
.
. E due mar aboro, higa mar ariyo mar loch ruothDarius, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro ni janabi Zekaria, wuod Berekia mawuod Iddo, kawacho niya,
"Ruoth Nyasaye nokecho ahinya gikwereu.  3Emomiyo wach ni ji ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutoowacho kama: Duoguru ira mondo an bende aduog iru.  4Kik ubed machal gikwereu mane jonabi machon ywaknigi kwacho ni, ‘Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko Duto wacho niya, "Weuru yoreu maricho kod timbeu mamono mondo uduogira. " ’ To ne ok gichiko itgi kata dewo wechena ne ok gidewo.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano.  5Ang’eyo ni unyalo penja ni kwereu ni kanye,kata ni jonabigo pod ngima? 6To donge wechena gi chikena mane amiyojotichna ma jonabi mondo osiemgo kwereu ne otimore, mi masira omakogi?Koso donge ne gilokore mi giweyo timbegi maricho, ka giwacho niya,‘Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto osetimonwa kaka nochano.  Adier,osetimonwa mana maromre gi timbewa. ’ "Zekaria janabi oneno farese e fweny7Due piero ariyo gang’wen, due mar apar gachiel miluongo ni Shebat, ehiga mar ariyo mar loch Darius, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro ni Zekariajanabi, wuod Berekia ma wuod Iddo mi nowacho kama: 8Fweny
.
; Fweny6.
. Nende aneno fweny gotieno ni ng’ato oidho faras masilwal, kochung’ ekind yien e holo moro.  To kadieng’eye ne nitie farese ma silwende gimarabuore kod marachere.  9Kane anenogi kamano, ne apenjo malaika moromane oyudo wuoyo koda niya, "Jaduong’, magi ang’o?" Ne odwoka ni, "Abironyisi tiendgi. " 10Eka ng’at mane ochung’ e kind yienno nowacho niya,"Mago e joma Ruoth Nyasaye oseoro mondo owuothi e piny ngima koni gikoni. " 11Bang’e jogo nodwoko malaika mane ochung’ e kind yien niya,"Wasewuotho e piny ngima koni gi koni, mi wanwang’o ni okue kendooboch. " 12Eka malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho niya, "A Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto, nyaka karang’o ma ibiro betie ka ok idewoJerusalem kaachiel gi mier mag Juda, ma isebedo kikechogo kuom hignipiero abiriyogi?" 13Ruoth Nyasaye nodwoko malaika mane osebedo kawuoyokoda, kohoyo chunye gi weche mabeyo.  14Kuom mano, malaikano nowachonaniya, "Dhiyo inyis ji ni weche Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto emagi: ‘Hera maduong’ ma aherogo Jerusalem gi Sayun miya mirima.  15Akechoahinya gi ogendini ma neno maber, nikech kane pok mirima omaka ahinya gijoga to ne gisandogi moloyo kaka owinjore.  16Emomiyo an Ruoth Nyasayeawacho kama: Aseduogo Jerusalem gi ng’wono mondo akeche.  Omiyo kanyo emaibiro chako igeroe oda, kaachiel gi udi mamoko duto. ’ "17To bende malaikano nowachona ni mondo anyis ji ni, Ruoth Nyasaye wachokama: "Miecha duto biro pong’ gi gik moko mabeyo, mi anachak aho Sayun,kendo anatim Jerusalem dala ma ayiero. "Zakaria janabi oneno tunge gi jotheth e fweny18Ne ating’o wang’a mi aneno tunge ang’wen.  19Eka ne apenjo malaika manewuoyo koda ni, "Magi to ang’o?" Ne odwoka ni "Gin ruodhi mosekeyojo-Juda gi jo-Israel kod jo-Jerusalem. " 20Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nonyisajotheth ang’wen, 21mi apenjo gima gibiro timo.  Ne odwoka niya, "Gisebiromondo gibwog kendo gilo tunge ang’wen-go.  Tungego gin ruodhi mane okeyojo-Juda, ma onge kata ng’at achiel mane nyalo ting’o wiye. "ZEKARIA 2Zekaria janabi oneno ng’ato man gi tond pimo e fweny1Ne ating’o wang’a mi aneno ng’ato koting’o tond pimo e lwete.  2Neapenje kuma odhiye, mi odwoka ni odhi pimo Jerusalem, mondo one ane kakaborne gi lachne onego obedi.  3Kane malaika mane awuoyogo owuok dhi,malaika machielo nothinyore kabiro romone, mowachone niya,
"Ring idhiiwachne wuowi man gi rapimno ni Jerusalem biro bedo dala maonge giohinga, nikech ji mabiro dakie kaachiel gi jamni nobed mang’enymohinge.  5Ruoth Nyasaye owacho ni obiro bedone ohinga mar mach molwore,kendo obiro bedone duong’ maler e diere. "Oluong joma ne oter e tuech6Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Ne akeyou e tunge ang’wen mag piny, to koroauru, uring ua e piny ma yo nyandwat.  7Adier, ringuru, un jo-Sayun modakBabulon. " 8Ruoth Nyuasaye Manyalo Gik Mooko Duto oherou malich ahinya,ma ka ng’ato mulou, to ng’atno soko mana wang’a owuon.  Emomiyo RuothNyasaye mane oora gi ote maduong’ ir ogendini ma noyakou owachokama:
"Abiro goyogi, mi uyakgi, un joma ne tiyonigi. " Kamano unung’e niRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema ne oora. 10Ruoth Nyasaye wacho kama: "Un jo-Sayun, koguru matek, kendo bedurumamor, nikech abiro mondo adag e kindu. "11Chieng’no ogendini mang’eny nobi ir Ruoth Nyasaye mi bed joge kendoenodag e kindu 12Eka unung’e ni kara Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutoema ne oora iru.  Ruoth Nyasaye biro chako kawo piny Juda kendo ka mareowuon e piny maler mi ochak otim Jerusalem dala moyiero.  13Ji duto mondooling’ e nyim Ruoth Nyasaye, nimar osechiew, moa kar dakne maler. ZEKARIA 3Fweny mane Zekaria janabi oneno kuom Joshua, jadolo maduong1 Ezra
.
; Fweny
.
. Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nonyisa Joshua, jadolomaduong’, kochuny e nyim malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo ne aneno Satanbende kochung’ bad Joshua korachwich, mondo odonjne.  2Juda
.
. Ekamalaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Satan niya, "Yaye Satan, RuothNyasaye mondo okweri! Adier, Ruoth Nyasaye moseyiero Jerusalem obed mareowuon, mondo okweri! Ng’atni donge chalo gi yien moyudhi kaliel emach?" 3Noyudo ka Joshua ochung’ e nyim malaikano korwakore gi lewnimochido.  4Malaikano nowacho ni joma ochung’ e nyime niya, "Lonyneurulewni mochidogo oko. " Eka nowacho ni Joshua niya, "Neye kaka asegolorichoni oko kuomi! Koro abiro rwaki gi lewni mabeyo. " 5Nomedo wachoniya, "Sidhneuru kilemba e wiye".  Omiyo ne gisidhone kilemba maler,kendo girwakone lewni maler, ka malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye ochung’ kanyo. 6Bang’e malaika mar Ruoth Nyasaye nochiko Josha gi teko niya.
"RuothNyasaye owacho kama: Ka iwuotho e yorena, kendo imako chiknani, toinibed gi loch e Hekalu mara, kendo inirit alwora mar Hekalu, bendeanamiyi thuolo mar donjo e nyima kaachiel gi joma tiyonagi.  8Jer

;

; Zek
.
. Koro yaye Joshua jadolo maduong’, in kaachiel gi jowadumobet e nyima ka, chikuru itu.  Un duto un ranyisi maber mar gik mabiro. Abiro kelo jatichna miluongo ni Badyath.  9Aseketo kidi man gi betheabiriyo e nyim Joshua, kendo an awuon abiro ndiko kuome weche mawachoniya, ‘Abiro tieko richo mag pinyni e odiechieng’ achiel.  10Mika4.
. Chakre chieng’no un duto unudag e miechu gi kue, ka ng’ato ka ng’atoluongo wadgi mondo odhi olime.  An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik moko Dutoema awacho kamano. ’ "ZEKARIA 4Rachung taya kod yiend zeituni1Bang’e malaika mane osebedo ka wuoyo koda nodwogo mochiewa, mana kang’ama ochiew e nindo.  2Ne openja niya, "Ineno ang’o?" An to ne adwokeniya, "Aneno rachung taya mar dhahabu man gi tawo e wiye.  Rachung tayanooting’o teyni abiriyo, kendo taya ka taya nigi kuonde abiriyo mirwakoekitambi.  3Fweny
.
. Bende aneno yiend zeituni ariyo e bathe, ma moronie dir tawo korachwich, to machielo nie dire koracham. " 4Bang’e napenjomalaika mane wuoyo koda niya, "Jaduong’, magi to ang’o?" 5Malaikanodwoka kapenja ni, "Ikia gigi adier?" To ne adwoke ni, "Ooyo jaduong’,ok ang’eyogi. " 6Eka nowachona niya, "Ruoth Nyasaye wacho ni Zerubabelkama: ‘Gik moko matimore ok timre kuom teko kata kuom nyalo, to gitimorekuom Roho mara.  An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema awachokamano. ’ 7Kata da bed ni thagruok mochomo Zerubabel dongo ka gode, toginipie ka pewe.  En ema obiro keto kidi matieko gero Hekalu, ka ji kokniya, ‘Mano kaka Hekalu ber! Ruoth Nyasaye mondo oguedhe. ’ "8To bende wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobirona niya,
"Kaka Zerubabel ema oseketomise mar Hekalu, e kaka en bende ema obiro tieke.  Kamano unung’e niRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema ne oora iru.  10Ezra
.
. Fweny5.
. Adier, kawuono wachako tijni mana marachrach, to en ng’a ma dihedhrechaye, nikech ji nobed mabor koneno Zerubabel koting’o rapim migedogo elwete. "Olok tiend fweny mar rachung taya11 Fweny
.
. Malaikano nowachona niya, "Teyni abiriyogo gin wenge magRuoth Nyasaye marango piny ngima. " 14Bang’e nowachona niya, "Mago gin ji ariyomowal ni tij Ruodh piny ngima. "ZEKARIA 5Kalatas mahuyo e kor yamo1Ne ating’o wang’a, mi aneno kalatas moban kahuyo e kor yamo.  2Ekamalaika cha nopenja niya, "Ineno ang’o?" Ne adwoke ni "Aneno kalatasmoban kahuyo.  Borne oromo mita apar, to lachne mita abich. " 3Bang’enowachona niya, "Mano en kuong’ ma lak e piny ngima.  Weche mondik e bathkalatasno konchiel biro tieko jokuo duto, kendo weche mondik e bathekomachielo notiek ji duto ma kuong’ore gi miriambo.  4Ruoth NyasayeManyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho ni, ‘Anaor kuong’no e ut jokuo duto, kende eod ng’ato ang’ata makuong’ore gi miriambo e nyinga.  Kuong’no nosik eudigo, mi tiekgi pep, koda ka yien gi kite mogergigo. ’ "Dhako manie atonga5Malaika mane wuoyo koda cha ne oduogo ira mowachona niya, "Ting’ wang’imondo ineye gima birono kaka chalo. " 6Ne apenje ni en ang’o, mi odwokani en atonga ma opong’ gi richo duto motim e piny ngima.  7Eka raum mapekmolos gi chuma mane oumgo atongano noelore, mi apo ka aneno dhako mobetpiny.  8Malaika nowachona niya, "Dhakono e richo. " Eka ne odhiro dhakono,modwoko ei atonga, mi ochako oumo dhoge gi raum mapekno. 9Bang’ mano ne aneno mon ariyo mahuyo e kor yamo, ka biro irwa gi buombemachalo buombe ogungo.  Ne gikawo atonga, mi gidhigo e kor polomalo.  10Eka ne apenjo malaika mane wuoyo koda cha kuma giteroeatongano.  11Nodwoka niya, "Gitere e piny Babulon mondo ogerne ot kuno,kendo ka oseger odno, to norenj atongano kare molosne kanyo. "ZEKARIA 6One geche ang’wen mag lweny e fweny1Ne achako ating’o wang’a, mi aneno geche lweny ang’wen ka wuok e kindgode ariyo.  To godego ne mag mula.  2Fweny
.
; Fweny
.
. Gari mokwongone nigi farese ma silwende, to mar ariyo ne nigi maratenge.  3Fweny6.
. Mar adek to ne nigi farese marachere, kendo mar ang’wen ne nigimarang’eye.  4Ne apenjo malaika mane oyudo wuoyo koda cha niya,"Jaduong’, magi to ang’o?" 5Fweny
.
. Eka nodwoka ni, "Magi gin yembeang’wen mag polo mowuok e nyim Ruodh piny ngima, kuma gisebedoe kagitiyoe. " 6Gari man gi farese maratengeno dhiyo e piny ma yo nyandwat,to mano man gi farese marachere dhiyo e piny ma yo imbo man iye mogik,kendo mano man gi farese marang’eye dhiyo e piny Babulon man yo milambo. To kane farese marang’eye wuok, 7ne gigombo dhi wuotho e piny duto. Omiyo Ruoth Nyasaye nowachonigi niya, "Dhiuru uwuoth e piny koni gikoni. " Mi ne gitimo kamano.  8Eka ne oluonga monyisa niya, "Winji! Magomadhi yo nyandwatgo osemiyo chunya olendo gi piny ma nyandwatno. "Osidh ni Joshua osimbo mar rapar9Bang’e wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobirona niya,
"Kaw fedha gi dhahabu kuomjoma ne omak moter e tuech, ma nyinggi Heldai gi Tobia kod Jedaya, majoseduogo koa Babulon, mondo idhiyo e od Josia wuod Zefania mana chieng’mikawogieno.  11Kaw fedha gi dhahabugo mondo ilosgo osimbo, isidh ewiJoshua wuod Jehozadak jadolo maduong’, 12Jer

Obiro dhi nyime maber, kodongopiyopiyo kama entie, kendo obiro gero Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  13Adier,en ema obiro gero Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  Bende en ema obiro bedoruoth, kobet e kom duong’, kotiyo piny, ka jodolo konye, kendo kue nobede kindgi ji ariyogo. ’ 14To Heldai gi Tobia gi Jedaya kod Josia wuodZefania ema nobed karito osimbo kaka rapar e Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye. "15Ji moa kuonde maboyo nobi mondo okony tich gero Hekalu mar RuothNyasaye.  Kamano unung’e ni Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto emaoseora iru.  To mano notimre mana ka uyie winjo wach Ruoth Nyasaye maNyasachu. ZEKARIA 7Okwer riyo kech ma ok adier1Chieng’ due ang’wen, due mar ochiko e higa mar ang’wen mar loch ruothDarius, wach Ruoth Nyasaye nobiro ni Zekaria.  2Noyudo ka jo-Bethel ooroSherezer kod Regemelek kaachiel gi ji mamoko mondo okwa gueth kuom RuothNyasaye.  3Ne oorogi mondo gipenj jodolo manie Od Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto kod jonabi niya, "Wasebedo kwaywak kendo watweyo chiemo edue mar abich, kuom higni mang’enygi, to pod onego wamed timo kamanokoso?" 4Eka ne wach Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto obironakama:
"Nyis ane ji duto kod jodolo niya, ‘Bende ne umiya duong’ adier,kuom riyo kech mane uriyogo e due mar abich gi mar abiriyo, kuom hignipiero abiriyogo? 6Koso kane uchiemo kendo umetho, to donge ne utimokamano, mana ni mondo ubedgo mamor un uwegi?’ 7Donge mano e gima namiyojonabi machon ohulo e kinde mane kue nitie kendo ji opong’o Jerusalem gimier mane olwore koni gi koni, kaachiel gi piny ma yo milambo kod pinypap?"Wich teko ema nomiyo oter ji e tuech8Ruoth Nyasaye nowacho ni Zekaria kama:
"An Ruoth Nyasaye ne awachoniya, ‘Ng’aduru bura kare, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato miyo wadgi luor kendotimone ng’wono.  10Kik usand nyithi kiye gi mond liete, gi jopinje mamokomodak kuomu, kod joma odhier, bende kik ng’ato chan timo ni wadgi timmoroo mamono. ’ 11To ne gidagi, mi giloko ng’egi ka gidino itgi, mondo mikik giwinj wachna.  12Bende ne gijiwo chunygi mobedo matek ka kidi, migitamore winjo puonj kod weche duto mane Roho mara miyo jonabi machonpuonjogi.  Kuom mano an Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nakumogi gimirimba.  13Ne awacho niya, ‘Kaka ne gidagi winja ka aluongogi, e kaka neadagi winjogi ka giluonga, 14mi ariembogi kakeyogi e kind ogendini ma okging’eyo, ka giweyo pinygi kokethore, ma onge ng’ama luwo. ’ Kamano negimiyo pinygi maberno olokore thim. "ZEKARIA 8Okor ni Jerusalem ibiro guedho kendo1Wach Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nobirona niya,
"Magi e wecheRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto: Hera malich ma aseherogo Sayunosemiyo abedo gi mirima.  Adier, hera maherego osemiya mirimamager.  3Koro an Ruoth Nyasaye awacho ni aseduogo Sayun kendo abiro dakJerusalem.  Jerusalem ibiro luongo ni, ‘Dala ma Adiera Nitie’, kendo godRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto noluong ni, ‘Got Maler’.  4Bende anRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto awacho ni, Jodongo kod mon moti birochako bet e wang’yore mag Jerusalem kendo, ka moro ka moro sirore giluth nikech hike oniang’ ahinya.  5Bende yawuowi gi nyiri nopong’wang’yore mag dala ka tugo.
"An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto, awacho kama: Kata kapo ni gimakamano nenore ni joma odong’ e ogandani ka gima ok nyal timore, koro anbende nonenrena kamano? 7Winjuru! Abiro reso joga kagolo e pinje ma yowuokchieng’ gi ma yo podho chieng’, 8mi adwokgi Jerusalem mondo gidagie. Ginibed joga kendo anabed Nyasachgi, kuom adiera kod tim makare. "9Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho kama: "Beduru gi chir, unjoma ndaloni weche ma jonabi osebedo kawacho, chakre chieng’ mane iketoemise mar Hekalu mara, mondo ochak oger kendo.  10To kane pok kindenoochopo, ji kata jamni ne ok ti tich michulo, kendo kane ng’ato owuok dhie tije, to ok ong’ere kata ka doduogi, nikech wasigu ne ng’eny.  Bende neathuwo ng’ato ka ng’ato gi wadgi.  11To koro ok abi timo ni joma odong’ eogandani kaka natimo e kinde mokadho.  An Ruoth nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto ema awacho kamano.  12Ginichwo kodhi ka gin gi kue, mi mzabibunonyag olembe, kendo lowo nochieg cham.  Koth bende nochuenigi maber,kendo anaguedh joma odong’ kuom jogagi gi gigo duto.  13Un jo-Juda kodjo-Israel, usebedo ranyisi malong’o ni ogendini mamoko duto kuom gimatimore ni joma akuong’o, to koro abiro resou, mi ubed ranyisi mar gimatimore ni joma aguedho.  Kuom mano kik ubed maluor, to beduru gi chir. "14Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho niya, "Kaka ne awacho niabiro tiekou, nikech kwereu nomiya mirima, mi ok aloko parona, 15e kakaasechano mondo aguedh Jerusalem kod jo-Juda: omiyo kik ubedmaluor.  16Efes
.
. To gik ma onego utim e magi: Ng’ato ka ng’ato nyakawach mana adiera kende ni wadgi, kendo nyaka uyal bura kare, kendo giadiera, mondo kue obedie.  17Kik ng’ato chan timo gima mono ni wadgi,kendo kik ukuong’ru gi miriambo, nikech amon gi gik ma kamago duto.  AnRuoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema awacho kamano. "18Wach Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto nobirona niya,
"Kinde magriyo kech e due mar ang’wen gi mar abich gi mar abiriyo kod mar aparbiro lokore sewni mag mor gi ilo ni jo-Juda.  Omiyo beduru gi adiera kodkue. " 20Bende magi e weche Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto: "Kindebiro chopo ma ogendini madongo moa e pinje marateke kendo e mier madongonobi Jerusalem.  21Joma odak e dala moro nodhi ir joma odak e dalamachielo, mi wachnigi niya, ‘Wadhiuru ir Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto mondo walame, kendo wakwaye mondo oguedhwa. ’ 22Kamano ogendinimadongo kod ji marateke nobi Jerusalem mondo olam Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto kendo okwaye mondo oguedhgi. " 23Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo GikMoko Duto wacho niya, "E kindego ji apar moa e ogendini mamoko, mawachodhok mopogore opogore, nobi ir ja-Yahudi, mi mak riak lawe, ka wachoneniya, ‘Wadwaro dhi kodi, nimar wasewinjoBura mibiro ng’ado ni ogendini mokiewo gi jo-Juda1 Isa

. Wach moa kuomRuoth Nyasayee ema:Ruoth Nyasaye osechano kumo piny Hadrak, kod dala mar Damaski.  Piny dutoen mar Ruoth Nyasaye, mana kaka dhout Israel bende mage.  2Dala marHamath, mokiewo gi Hadrak bende mare, kaachiel gi mier ma Turo gi Sidon,kata obedo ni joma odak kuondego riek kamano, 3Jo-Turom osegero ohingama gigeng’orego, kendo gisedhuro fedha gi dhahabu mana ka lowo.  4ToRuoth Nyasaye biro mayogi mwandugi duto, mi wit e nam. . Ka dala Ashkelon oneno kamano, to biro bedomaluor.  Gaza bende kihondko biro mako, mi geno mane Ekron nigo rum. Ruodhi mag Gaza biro lal nono, bende Ashkelon nodong’ nono maonge jimodakie, 6kendo ji ma anywola ema nobed kodak Ashdod.  Ruoth Nyasayewacho niya, "Anaketh sunga ma jo-Filistia sungorego, 7mi ok ginichakgicham ring’o man gi remo, kata chamo chiemo moko makuero.  Jogi motonynobed joga, mi lokre achiel kuom dhout Juda.  Jo-Ekron bende nolokre jogakaka ne jo-Jebus olokore.
"Anachung’ e pinya ka jarito, mondo ng’ato kik donji kata wuogi, miwasigu ok nochak olo joga nimar aseneno thagruokgi gi wang’a. "Ruodh Sayun mabiro9 Math

; Joh
.
. Un jo-Sayun, beduru mamor!Koguru matek, yaye jo-Jerusalem,nimar ruodhu biro iru, kolocho. Obiro komuol,kendo koidho kanyna. Chutho oidho kanyna matin. Adier, en mana nyathi kanyna.
Zab
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Abiro golo geche mag lweny oa epiny Israel, kendo abiro tieko farese mag lweny man Jerusalem, Bendeatunge mag jolweny biro rumo.  Ruodhno nokel kue ni ogendini duto, kendolochne noyarre, koa e nam man yo imbo nyaka nam man yo wuok chieng’,bende koa e aora Yufrate nyaka tung’ piny koni gi koni. Okor ni nochak oger Sayun kendo11 Wuok
.
. "To un, abiro duoko jou motue, ka agolo e bur motwo maongepi, nikech singruok mane utimo koda gi remb misango.  12Un joma otue makoro nigi geno, duoguru e dalau mochiel motegno.  Ahulo ni abiro guedhounyadiriyo kuom sand mane osandugo.  13Aseloko Juda atung’ kendo asetimoIsrael asere.  Asekawo yawuoti yaye Sayun, mi aloko ligangla ma akedogogi jo-Yunani. "14Ruoth Nyasaye biro thinyore ewi joge malo, kendo obiro chielo aseremage ka mil polo.  Obiro goyo tung’, mi odhi gi ahiti moamilambo.  15Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto ema nobed okumbagi miginilo lweny ka ginyono kite mag orujre piny.  Ginigo koko ka joma omer,mi ginineg ji, mi rembgi chuer mana ka remb misango miolo gi tawo etunge mag kendo-mar-misango.  16Kamano Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasachgi noresjoge chieng’no mana kaka jakwath reso jambe, kendo enoketgi e pinye manaka kite ma nengogi tek miketo e osimbo mar duong mondo omil.  17Mano kakagin gi mwandu mogundho kod mor maduong’! Cham gi divai biro miyoyawuotgi gi nyigi bed gi del mabeyo. ZEKARIA 10Okor ni Ruoth Nyasaye biro waro joge1Kwauru Ruoth Nyasaye koth e kinde mowinjore, nimar en ema okelo bochepolo morweyo, eka koth chue mi dhano gi le yud chiemo.  2Math
.
; Mar6.
. Nyiseche manono wacho weche maonge tiendgi, kende ajuoke nenoranyisi mag miriambo.  Gileko lek ma ok adiera, kendo giwacho wechemawito ji.  Mano emomiyo ji bayo abaya ka rombe, kendo githagore nikechgionge jakwath. 3Ruoth Nyasaye wacho niya, "Mirima omaka gi jotend joga, omiyo abirokumogi.  To an Ruoth Nyasaye abiro konyo jo-Juda, ma akwano ka jamba, miami gibed marateke ka farese mag lweny.  4Bende ginibed motegno ka kitemoriwo kor ot, kendo ka loye migurogo hema.  Ginichal gi atung’ moywamochiek ni lweny, kendo kuomgi ema jotend lweny duto nowuogie.  5Ginibedka jolweny marateke ma nyono wasikgi ka chuodho, kendo ginikedi nikechan Ruoth Nyasaye an kodgi, bende ginilo kata mana joidh farese, migikuod wigi.  6Abiro miyo jo-Juda bed marateke, kendo abiro miyojo-Israel locho.  Bende anachak aguedhgi, nikech asekechogi, mi ginichalka gima ne ok ajwang’ogi, nikech an Ruoth Nyasachgi, kendo abiro dwokokwayogi.  7Jo-Israel nochal gi jolweny marateke, bende ginibed moil kajoma ometho.  Nyithindgi none kamano, mi bed mamor, kendo ginipak RuothNyasaye gi ilo.
"Abiro luongogi gi liyo mondo achokgi, mi ginibed mang’eny mana kaka negin chon.  9Kata obedo ni nakeyogi e kind ogendini man maboyo kamano, toginipara, mi gipidh nyithindgi kuondego.  Bang’e giniduogi.  10AnagolgiMisri gi Asuria, kakelogi dala, bende anakelgi e piny Gilead gi pinyLebanon, nyaka chop piny pong’ thich.  11Ka ging’ado nam Misri, to apakanokue.  Adier, kuonde matut duto mag aora Nael noduon.  Sunga ma jo-Asuriasungorego nodwok piny, kendo loch mar Misri norum.  12To an Ruoth Nyasayeema nami jo-Israel teko, mi ginipaka ka gimiyo nyinga duong’.  An RuothNyasaye ema awacho kamano. "ZEKARIA 111A Lebanon, yaw dhorangeyeni, mondo mach owang’ yiendi mabeyo mag sida!2Ywaguru un yien duto,nimar yiend sida osepodho. Adier, yien madongo osekethi. Un yiend Bashan, ywaguru,nimar bungu ma yien odichie osebeti. 3Winjuru kaka jotelo ywak ka chunygi lit,nimar duong’ ma yande gin-go olal nono. Adier, winjuru kaka giywak ka chunygi lit,nimar duong’ ma yande gin-go olal nono. Adier, winjuru kaka giywak ka sibuoche marutonimar bung Jordan ma gidakie osekethi. Jakwath maber gi jakwath marach4Ruoth Nyasaye ma Nyasacha nowachona niya, "Bed jakwadh rombe ma ibiroyang’o, 5nikech jokwadhgi giwegi ok dewgi.  Joma ng’iewogi bende negogi,to ok yud kum.  Giloko ringgi pesa, kendo giwacho niya, ‘Opak Ruoth,nikech waseyudo mwandu!’ "6Ruoth Nyasaye nomedo wacho niya, "Ok anakech joma odak e pinyni, toabiro keto ng’ato ka ng’ato e lwet jatende kendo e lwet ruodhe, mijotelogo noketh piny, to ok anares ji e lwetgi. "7Kuom mano ne adoko jakwadh rombe miyang’o, ka atiyo ni joohand rombe. Bang’e ne akawo ludhe ariyo, mi achako achiel ni, ‘Ng’wono’, to machielone achako nio, ‘Riwruok’.  Kamano ne abedo jakwadh rombe. 8Kane pok due achiel orumo, ne ariembo jokwath adek nikech ne gijoga,kendo gin bende chunygi nosin koda.  9Bang’e ne awacho ni rombe niya, "Okabi medo bedo jakwadhu kendo.  Mago kuomu matho, to otho athoya, kendomago madwaro lal, olal alala, to mago modong’, moro ka moro onegwadgi. " 10Eka ne akawo ludha miluongo ni Ng’wono, mi aturo, ka anyisogoni singruok mane Ruoth Nyasaye otimo gi ogendini duto okethi.  11Kamanosingruok ne okethi chieng’no, kendo joohand rombe mane ranga nong’eyo nien wach Ruoth Nyasaye.  12Math
.

. Math
.
. Ne awachonigi niya,"Ka uyie to miyauru pokna.  To ka ok kamano, to bedgouru. " Kuom mano negichula pokna moromo shekel piero adek mag fedha. 13Bang’e Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona niya, "Ket pesago kar keno mar Hekalu. "Omiyo ne akawo shekel piero adek mag fedhago, mane giparo ni ema oroma,mi aketo kar keno mar Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye.  14Bang’ mano ne aturoluth machielo miluongo ni Riwruok, ka anyisogo ni aketho riwruok maniekind jo-Juda gi jo-Israel.  15Ruoth Nyasaye nowachona kendo niya, "Kawgigi, ichak iwuondri ni in jakwath, to bed jakwath manono, 16kakaranyisi ni abiro keto jakwath e piny ma ok rang rombe matho, kata okmany molal, kata ok thiedh matuo, bende ma ok kwa mago mangima, to chamomana mago machue, kendo mwodo koda ka orengegi.  17Masira ochomo jakwathmanono ma jwang’o rombeno! Ligangla biro lwar e bade kendo e wang’e makorachwich, mi bade tal, kendo wang’e ma korachwich nokethre chuth. "ZEKARIA 12Res ma ibiro resogo jo-Israel1Ma en wach Ruoth Nyasaye kuom Israel: Ruoth Nyasaye mane oyaro polo,kendo oketo mise mar piny, mi omiyo dhano much ngima wacho kama:
"AnamiJerusalem chal gi agwata mar kong’o, ma ogendini mokiewo kode biromadho, mi kwang’ ka joma omer.  Ka ogendinigo goyo ni Jerusalem ageng’a,to miech Juda bende giniluor.  3Chieng’no ka ogendini duto mag pinyochokore mondo omonj Jerusalem, to naloke obed mapek ka kidi, ma ongeng’ama nyalo ting’o, kendo ogendini duto motemo ting’e, nohinyre marach.
"An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho niya, chieng’no anago farese duto gi kihondko,mi ami joma idhogi lokre joneko.  Anarit jo-Juda, to farese mag ogendinimamokogo analok muofni, 5mi dhout Juda nowach kendgi niya, ‘Joma odakJerusalem yudo teko kuom Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto maNyasachgi. ’
"E kindeno anami dhout Juda bed ka mach manie bungu kata manie puothtiang’.  Ginitiek ogendini duto mokiewo kodgi koni gi koni.  Jo-Jerusalemto nodag gi kue e dalagi.  7An Ruoth Nyasaye nakuong miyo dhoudi duto magJuda locho, mondo duong’ mar dhood Daudi kod jo-Jerusalem kik lo duong’ma jo-Juda mamoko nigo.
"Chieng’no an Ruoth Nyasaye nabed okumba ni jo-Jerusalem, mi kata manang’ama yomyomie moloyo kuomgi nobed motegno ka Daudi, kendo joka Daudinobed jotend ji mana kaka Nyasaye kata malaika mare.  9Bende anatiekogendini duto mabiro mondo omonj Jerusalem.  10Joh

; Fweny
.
. Anami joka Daudi gi jo-Jerusalem chuny mang’won, kendomohero lemo.  Eka bange giniteg wang’gi kuom jal mane gichwowo, mi otho,kendo giniywage mana ka joma ywago nyathi ma miderma.  Adier, giniywagmalit mana ka joma ywago wuodgi makayo.
"E kindeno ywak nobed malich Jerusalem mana ka ywak mane oywaggoHadad-rimon e paw Megido.  12Dhoudi duto ma e piny noywagi kar kendgi, kamondgi bende ywak kar kendgi.  Joka Nathan 13gi joka Lawi kod joka Shimeibende noywag kamano ka mondgi bende ywak kar kendgi.  14Dhoudi mamokoduto bende noywagi kar kendgi, ka mondgi bende ywak kar kendgi. "ZEKARIA 131Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto wacho niya, "Ka ndalogo ochopo, tosoko noyawre ni nyikwa Daudi kod jo-Jerusalem mondo opwodhgo richogi gitimbegi makuero.  2E kindeno, anaruch nying nyiseche manono e piny, mi oknochak opargi kendo.  Bende anatiek jokor wach kod chuny magombo timotimbe makuero.  3Bang’ mano, ka ng’ato pod nodhi adhiya nyime gi korowach, to wuon gi min nowachne niya, ‘Ok inichak ibed mangima kendo,nimar isewacho miriambo e nying Ruoth Nyasaye. ’ Kamano wuon gi minnochwowe gi tong’, mi nege, kokoro wach.  4Ndalogo jokor wach duto wiginokuodi gi fweny ma gineno, bende ok ginirwak lewni motimo yier ma jokorwach rwako, mondo giwuondgo ji, 5to moro ka moro nowach niya, ‘Ok anjakor wach, to an mana japur, kendo asebedo kayudo chiemba e lowo chakretinna. ’ 6To ka ng’ato openje ni, ‘Mbelni manie korigi to manade?’ Toenodwok niya, ‘Ne ayudogi e od osiepna. ’ "Ruoth Nyasaye ogolo chik mondo oneg jatend pinye7 Math
.
; Mar
.
. Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho niya,"In ligangla,a malo mondo ichadh jakwadha!Ee, chadh ng’at matiyona. Chutho, neg jakwath mondo rombe oke,nimar abiro kumo joga moyomno. "8An Ruoth Nyasaye awacho kama: "Mano biro timore e piny duto, mi ariyokuom adek ibiro negi, to achiel kuom adek nowe ka ngima.  9Bang’e anaketachiel kuom adek nogono e mach mondo opwodhgi maler mana kaka ipwodhofedha.  Adier, natemgi mana kaka itemo dhahabu.  Bang’e ginilama, mianadwok kwayogi, an awuon.  Anawachnigi ni gin joga.  Gin to giniwach nian Nyasachgi. "ZEKARIA 14Gik mabiro timore ni Jerusalem kod ogendini mamoko1Winjuru! Odiechieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye sudo machiegni, ma mwandu Jerusalemnoyakie, mi pog mana e wang’u kuneno.  2Enochok ogendini duto mondo okedgi Jerusalem, kendo dalano nokaw, mi mwandu manie udi noyaki, bende monnomak gi thwon.  Bath dala konchiel noter e tuech, to bathe komachielonowe mana kanyo.  3Eka Ruoth Nyasaye nowuogi mi ked gi ogendinigo mana kagima okedo e paw lweny.  4Chieng’no enochung’ e got Zeituni, ma omanyoregi Jerusalem yo wuok chieng’, kendo godno nobarre mi hoho maduong’,mochakore yo wuok chieng’ nyaka podho chieng’, poge ariyo.  Bath gotkonchiel nodog yo nyandwat to bathe komachielo nodog yomilambo.  5Unutony kuluwo hohono, nimar enochwe nyaka dhoranga dala. Adier, unutony kaka jou notony higni mang’eny mokadho, ka giringoyiengni piny mane otimore e ndalo Uzia ruodh Juda.  Bang’e Ruoth Nyasayema Nyasacha nobi kaachiel gi malaika mage duto. 6Chakre chieng’no koyo gi pe ok nobedie.  7Otieno bende ok nobedie, topiny nosik mana odiechieng’ lilo, kendo kata ka piny olokore odhiambo toler nosik asika.  Ruoth Nyasaye kende ema ong’eyo ndalo ma gigo birotimoree.

.
; Joh
.
; Fweny
.
. Chakre chieng’no, pi maliw nomolkawuok Jerusalem.  Moko nochik Nam Kado, man yo wuok chieng’ to mokonochik Nam Mediterenia, man yo podho chieng’.  Enosik komol e ndalochwiri kendo e ndalo oro mana machalre.  9Chakre chieng’no, Ruoth Nyasayenobed ruodh piny ngima, kendo ji duto nolame ka Nyasachgi, mi ng’eye ginyinge achiel ma Ruoth Nyasaye.  10Piny duto mokiewo gi Jerusalem nobedmopie ka pap, chakre Geba, kochomo milambo nyaka Rimon.  Jerusalem tonosik koting’ore ating’a kama entie, chakre dhorangach miluongo niDhoranga Benjamin, nyaka dhorangach man yo kama ohinga ogomogo, kendochakre kama oger mabor mar ng’icho mar Hananel nyaka kuonde mibiyoemzabip ruoth.  (Kuma ohinga ogomogo, chon ne nitie dhorangach moro. )
Fweny
.
. Ji nodag Jerusalem gi kue, ka onge ng’ama bwogogi ni ibirokuong’ dalagi mondo okethi.  12Ruoth Nyasaye nogo ogendini duto maneokedo gi Jerusalem gi tho marach.  Thono nochal kama: Ringregi notow manaka gichung’ gi tiendgi, kendo wengegi notow mana e wigi, to lewgi bendenotow mana e dhogi.  13Chieng’no Ruoth Nyasaye nogogi gi kihondko malich,kendo ng’ato ka ng’ato nomak wadgi mondo ogorego.  14Jo-Juda bende nokonyjo-Jerusalem e lweny kendo giniyak mwandu mag ogendini mokiewo kodgi,kaka fedha gi dhahabu kod lewni mogundho.  15Bende tho machalo gi manomane ogoyo jogo nogo farese gi nyumbu gi ngamia kod kenje manie kambimag wasigu, mi neg pep.
T. Lawi
.
-
. Bang’ lweny, ji duto motony e ogendini mane omonjoJerusalemgo nobi higa ka higa mondo olam Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik MokoDuto ka ruodhgi, kendo mondo otim Sap Kiche.  17To ka dhoot moro marogendini ma e piny ok odhi Jerusalem mondo olam Ruoth Nyasaye ManyaloGik Moko Duto ka ruodhgi, to koth ok nochue e pinygi.  18Bende kajo-Misri ok odhi mi ochopo e dalano, to giniyud tuo machal gi mano maRuoth Nyasaye biro kelo ni oganda moro amora ma ok odhi mondo otim SapKiche.  19Mano e kum ma ibiro kumogo jo-Misri kod ogendini mamoko ma okodhi Jerusalem mondo otim Sap Kiche. 20Chakre chieng’no, kata mana okode mag farese nogorie weche mawachoniya, ‘Mowal ni Ruoth Nyasaye,’ kendo agulni mitedogo e Hekalu nobedmowal ni tich Ruoth Nyasaye mana ka tewni mitiyogo ekendo-mar-misango.  21Agulni duto manie Jerusalem kod Juda nobed mowal nitich Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo ji duto matimo misengni nokaw moko mondoochwakie ring misango.  Kamano ka kindeno ochopo, to onge johala moroamora ma nochak oyud e Hekalu mar Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto. Malaki 1Ruoth Nyasaye ohero Jakobo gi nyikwaye1Ma e wach Ruoth Nyasaye mane omiyo Malaki mondo onyis jo-Israel.  2RuothNyasaye owacho niya, "Aherou. " To usedwoke kupenje ni, "Ere kakaiherowa?" To Ruoth Nyasaye odwoko ni, "Donge Esau gi Jakobo ne ginowete? Kata kamano ahero Jakobo gi nyikwaye.  3Esau gi nyikwaye toasin-go.  Aseketho piny gode mag Esau, mi aloko obedo thim ma ondiegidakie. "4Ka nyikwa Esau ma jo-Edom owacho ni kata obedo ni miechgi osekethikamano, to gibiro gerogi kendo, to Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Dutodwoko niya, "We mondo gigergi, to abiro kethogi kendo, mi ji noluongjogo ni oganda mar kethruok ma Ruoth Nyasaye okechogo nyaka chieng’. 5Ubiro neno gigo gi wang’u ka timore, mi unuwach niya, ‘Kara RuothNyasaye nigi teko kata e pinje mamoko ma ok Israel!’ "Ruoth Nyasaye okwero jodolo6Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho ni jodolo niya, "Wuowi nyakami wuon luor, kendo jatich bende nyaka luor ng’at ma otiyone.  To an dakumiya duong’, to an wuonu? Koso dak umiya luor, to an ema utiyona?Usejara, to eka upenja ni, ‘Ere kaka wasejari?’ 7Usejara kuom chiwochiemo ma chik ok oyiego e kendona mar misango, to eka upenja ni erekaka ok usemiya luor! To usejara kuchayo kendona mar misango.  8Uparo nien gima kare ka ukelo chiayo ma muofu kata mong’ol kata matuo mondoutimnago misango? To ka da bed ni uchiwo chiayo ma kamano ni ruodhu,bende da obedo mamor kodu, koso da orwakou? 9Koro sani un jodolo, kaponi utemo ni ukwayo Nyasaye mondo okonyu, to ok nowinj kwayou, kendo manoen kethou. "10Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho niya, "Da obedo maber kang’at achiel kuomu oloro dhorangeye mag laru mar Hekalu, mondo kik umokmach e kendona mar misango kayiem nono.  Ok amor kodu, kendo ok nayiemisengni muchiwona.  11Ji manie tung’ piny koni gi koni miyo nyingaduong’.  Giwang’ona ubani mang’ue ng’ar kuonde duto, kendo gichiwonamisengni ma ayiego.  Giduto gimiyo nyinga duong’.  12To uchaya, kuparo nikendona mar misango en kama odwanyore, ma unyalo chiwoe chiemo moroamora.  13Uwacho niya, ‘Mano kaka waol gi gik makamagi!’ Kendo utwenyonaumu.  To bende uchiwona jamni mokwal kata mong’ol kata matuo mondootimnago misango.  Uparo ni anyalo yie gi chiwo ma kamago? 14Okuong’ng’at ma jawuond ma timona misango gi chiayo modwanyore kamano mondoochopgo kuong’ruokne, to oweyo chiache maber e kul.  An e ruodh ruodhi,kendo ogendini duto oluora!"Malaki 21Un jodolo, Ruoth Nyasaye ochikou kama:
"Nyaka umi nyinga duong’ kuomgik mutimo.  To ka ok uwinjo wachna, kendo ok utimo kaka awacho, to abirokuong’ou, kendo anakuong’ gik moko duto mabeyo ma uyudo e tich dolo.  Ee,abiro kuong’o gigo nikech udagi rito chikna.  3Anang’ad bedeu oko kendoanarwadh owuoch jamni mutimogo misengni e pat wengeu, mi nariembu ua ewang’a.  4Eka ubiro ng’eyo ni an ema asemiyou chikni, mondo singruok maneatimo gi nyikwa Lawi osik kogurore motegno.
"Kane atimo kodgi singruokna, ne achikogi ngima kod dak maber,mamiyogi mago duto mondo gimiya luor.  Kamano ne gimiyo nyinga duong’,kendo giluora.  6Ne gipuonjo ji mana weche makare, maonge kata wachachiel mar miganga.  Ne gitimo gik makare ma adwaro, kendo ne gikonyo jimang’eny mondo owe timbe maricho.  7En tich jodolo mondo opuonj ji wachmar adiera mar Nyasaye, kendo ji onego odhi irgi mondo opuonjre chikNyasaye, nikech gin jootena, An Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto.  8Toun jodolo usebaro, muweyo yo makare.  Puonj maru osemiyo ji mang’enyochwanyore.  Bende un jo-Lawi, useketho singruok mane atimo kodu.  9Manoemomiyo an bende asemiyo jo-Israel jarou kendo chayou, nikech ok uluwchikena, to bende ka uponjo ji wachna, to ok utimnigi machalre giduto. "Ruoth Nyasaye okwedo jo-Israel kuom weye10Uwacho niya, "Donge waduto wuonwa en achiel? Donge Nyasaye achiel emane ochueyowa? Ka kamano, to ere gima omiyo waketho singruok mane Nyasayeotimo gi kwerewa, ka ng’ato ka ng’ato ketho singruok motimo gi wadgi?11Jo-Juda oseketho singruok mane gitimo ni Nyasaye, kendo gisetimo gikmaricho e Israel kendo e Jerusalem.  Gisedwanyo Kama Ler mar RuothNyasaye mohero, kendo gisekendo mon malamo nyiseche mamoko.  12RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto onego otiek ng’ato ang’ata matimo kamano,kendo ong’ad kare oko chuth kuom oganda joka Jakobo, kendo kuom jomachiwone misengni. "13To bende uywak kendo udengo, ka ulwoko kendo mar misango mar RuothNyasaye gi pi wang’u, nikech Ruoth nyasaye odagi ng’iyo misengnimuchiwone, kata yie kodgi ok oyie.  14To eka pod ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomupenjo gimomiyo otimo kamano.  Ruoth Nyasaye dwoko ni mano timore nikechuketho singruok mane utimo gi mon mane ukendo ka pod un yawuowi.  Ne ginmondeu, to useketho singruok mane utimonigi, kata obedo ni ne usingoru enyim Nyasaye ni ok unuwegi.  15Donge Nyasaye notimou ringruok achielkendo chuny achiel kodgi? Donge otimo kamano mana ni mondo wabed ginyithindo maluwo Nyasaye adier? Kuom mano, nyaka uritru mondo kik ng’atokuomu keth singruok mane otimo ni dhako mane okendo ka en wuowi.  16RuothNyasaye Manyaalo Gik Moko Duto ma Nyasach Israel owacho niya, "Amon giweruok manie kind dhako gi chwore.  Ok berna ka ng’ato timo gima rachkamano ni chiege.  Emomiyo ritreuru mondo ng’ato ka ng’ato kuomu kik timgima rach kamano ni chiege. "Chieng’ ng’ado bura chiegni17Wecheu osemiyo Ruoth Nyasaye ool.  To kupenjo ni ere kaka usemiyo ool,to odwokou niya, "Umiyo aol kuwacho ni Ruoth Nyasaye kwano joma richo kajoma beyo, kendo oherogi.  Bende usemiyo aol kupenjo ni, ‘Ere Nyasachwama ng’ado bura kare?’ "Malaki
To Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto dwoko kama: "Abiro oro jaotenaotel, mondo olosna yo.  Bang’e Ruoth mudwaro nobi apoya e Hekalu mare,kendo jaote mudwaro nenono nobi, mi nohul weche mag singruokna.  2Tochieng’ mobiroeno, ere ng’ama nosir? Koso chieng’ ma othinyoree, ereng’ama noting’ wiye? Enochal gi mach malenyo mula mondo obed maler,kendo enochal sabun ma luoko maler.  3Enobi mondo ong’ad bura mana kang’at malenyo fedha obed maler.  Enopwodh jodolo maler mana kaka ipwodhofedha gi dhahabu.  Bang’e ginitim ni Ruoth Nyasaye misengni makare.  4EkaRuoth Nyasaye nobed mamor gi misengni ma jo-Juda gi jo-Jerusalem kelone,kaka ne omor kodgi chon. " 5Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owachoniya, "Abiro ng’adonu bura, kendo bedo janeno kuomu piyo piyo, ka ayaloajuoke gi joma terore gi joma kuong’ore kayiem gi joma wuondo jotichgi eyor misara, kod joma ok oluora, ma timo marach ni mond liete gi nyithikiye kod jopinje mamoko modak kuomu. "Chudo mar achiel kuom apar6Ruoth Nyasaye omedo wacho niya, "An Ruoth Nyasaye, kendo ok alokra. Mano emomiyo un nyikwa Jakobo pok urumo chuth.  7Useweyo chikena, mi okurito, mana kaka kwereu noweyo.  To koro ka uduogo ira, to an bende abiroduogo iru.  Ka upenjoru niya, ‘Ang’o ma onego watim mondo wadog ire?8Dhano bende nyalo mayo Nyasaye gire koso?’ To adwokou niya, ‘Umayaadier!’ To ka upenja niya, ere kaka umaya? To adwokou niya, ‘Usemayakuom dagi miya chiwo mar achiel kuom apar kod mag misengni kaka chikdwaro. ’ 9Omiyo okuong’u uduto, nimar oganda duto osemaya giga.  10Keluruachiel kuom apar mag giu duto kar keno mar Hekalu, mondo chiemo obed eoda.  Temieuru timo kamano ane, ka ok nayaw dirise mag polo, kendo amiugik mabeyo mogundho, ma onge kama ikete.  11Ok nawe kute keth chambu,kendo yiendu mag mzabibu nonyag olembe mang’eny.  12Bang’e ogendini dutonoluongu ni johawi, nikech pinyu nobed kama ber dakie. "Pogruok manie kind joma kare gi joma richo13Ruoth Nyasaye owacho kendo niya, "Usewacho weche mag wich teko kuoma. To eka pod upenja niya, ‘Ang’o marach mwasewacho kuomi?’ 14Bendeusewacho ni, ‘Tiyo ni Nyasaye onge gi tiende.  Ere tiend timo gima RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho, kata ywagruok e nyime, kwanyise niwayie kethowa? 15Waneno ka joma josunga ema nigi mor.  Joma timbegi richodhi maber ahinya, to bende gitemo Nyasaye gi timbegi marichogo, to ongegima timogi. ’ "16Kane joma oluoro Ruoth Nyasaye owinjo wechego, ne giwuoyo e kindgigiwegi, kendo Ruoth Nyasaye nowinjo wechegi.  Nying joma oluoro RuothNyasaye kendo mamiye duong’ ne ondik e kitabu moro e nyime.  17RuothNyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho niya, "Chieng’ ma ang’adoe bura, toginibed joga awuon kendo ginibed mwanduna.  Anabednigi mang’won mana kakawuoro bedo mang’won ni wuode moluore.  18Bang’ mano unune pogruok maniekind joma richo, kendo e kind joma tiyona gi joma ok tina. "Malaki 4Chieng’ Ruoth Nyasaye1Ruoth Nyasaye Manyalo Gik Moko Duto owacho niya, "Winjuru, ndalo biroma josunga gi joma richo duto nowang’ie ka tiang’.  Chieng’no giniwang’adier, kendo onge gima nodong’ kuomgi.  2To un joma oluoro nyinga tekonanopilre kuomu ka wang’chieng’ ma kelo ler, mi noresu, kendo ler marenobed gima changou.  Unubed joma ni thuolo kendo mail ka nyiroyemoyawnigi abila.  3Chieng’ ma ang’adoe bura, unulo joma timbegi richo,kendo ginichalnu ka buru munyono.
"Paruru puonj mag Musa jatichna gi chike mane amiye e got Horeb, nimondo jo-Israel duto oluw.
"To ka pok chieng’ maduong’ kendo malich mar Ruoth Nyasaye ochopo,abiro oro Elija janabi, 6mondo ochak okel winjruok e kind wuone ginyithindo, nono to abiro, mi aketho pinyu chuth!"
